Francais: Adam, Seth, Enos,
Anglais: Adam, Seth, Enosh,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Adam, Set, Enok.
Bulu: Adam, Sét, Anos,
Guiziga: Adamu a yi Set, Set a yi Enos,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa danygol Aadamu: Aadamu danyi Setu, Setu danyi Enos,
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa danygol Aadamu: Aadamu danyi Setu, Setu danyi Enos,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Adam koo Sɛt, Sɛt koo Enɔs;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Adam koo Sɛt, Sɛt koo Enɔs;
Kapsiki_DC: Adam yitenyɛa Sɛt, Sɛt yitenyɛa Ɛnos.
Tupurri: Adam, Sed, Enog,

Francais: Caïnan, Malaléel, Jared,
Anglais: Kenan, Mahalaleel, Jared,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kenan, Malaleel, Yered;
Bulu: Kénan, Mahalalél, Yéréd,
Guiziga: Enos a yi Kenaŋ, Kenaŋ a yi Malaliyel, Malaliyel a yi Yeret,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Enos danyi Keenan, Keenan danyi Mahaleleel, Mahaleleel danyi Yarat,
Fulfulde_DC: Enos danyi Keenan, Keenan danyi Mahaleleel, Mahaleleel danyi Yarat,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Enɔs koo Kɛnaŋ, Kɛnaŋ koo Mahalalɛl, ɓɛɛ Mahalalɛl ko Yɛrɛd.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Enɔs koo Kɛnaŋ, Kɛnaŋ koo Mahalalɛl, ɓɛɛ Mahalalɛl ko Yɛrɛd.
Kapsiki_DC: Ɛnos yitenyɛa Kɛnan, Kɛnan yitenyɛa Malalɛyɛl, Malalɛyɛl yitenyɛa Yɛrɛd,
Tupurri: Kenan, Mahalaleel, Yered,

Francais: Hénoch, Mathusalé, Lamech,
Anglais: Enoch, Methuselah, Lamech,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Henok, Matusalem, Lamek,
Bulu: Hénok, Metuséla, Lemék,
Guiziga: Yeret a yi Henok, Henok a yi Matusalem, Matusalem a yi Lemek,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yarat danyi Henok, Henok danyi Matusala, Matusala danyi Lamek, Lamek danyi Nuuhu,
Fulfulde_DC: Yarat danyi Henok, Henok danyi Matusala, Matusala danyi Lamek, Lamek danyi Nuuhu,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yɛrɛd koo Enɔk, Enɔk koo Mɛtusela, Mɛtusela koo Lamɛk,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yɛrɛd koo Enɔk, Enɔk koo Mɛtusela, Mɛtusela koo Lamɛk,
Kapsiki_DC: Yɛrɛd yitenyɛa Ɛnok, Ɛnok yitenyɛa Matəsalɛm, Matəsalɛm yitenyɛa Lɛmɛk,
Tupurri: Henog, Metusalem, Lemeg,

Francais: Noé, Sem, Cham et Japheth.
Anglais: Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nuwa, Sem, Kam hiɗi Yafet.
Bulu: Noé, Sém, Sam a Yafet.
Guiziga: Lemek a yi Nowe, Nowe a yi Sem, kam waɗ Zafet,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nuuhu danyi Sem, Haamu bee Yafet.
Fulfulde_DC: Nuuhu danyi Sem, Haamu bee Yafet.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Lamɛk koo Nɔe, ɓɛɛ Nɔe ko Sɛm, Kam in Jafɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Lamɛk koo Nɔe, ɓɛɛ Nɔe ko Sɛm, Kam in Jafɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Lɛmɛk yitenyɛa Nowɛ. Nowɛ yitenyɛa yɛ Sɛm, Sham le Zhafɛt.
Tupurri: Nowe, Sem, Kam wo de Jafed.

Francais: Fils de Japheth; Gomer, Magog, Madaï, Javan, Thubal, Mosoch et Thiras.
Anglais: The sons of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Yafet: Gomer, Magog, Maday, Yavan, Tubal, Mekek hiɗi Tiras.
Bulu: Bone be Yafet: Gômer, Magôg, Madayi, Yavan, Tubal, Mésék a Tiras.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Zafetey i ti: Gomer, Magok, Maday, Yavaŋ, Tubal, Mesek waɗ Tiras.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Yafet ngoni: Gomer e Magog e Maday e Yawan e Tubal e Meesek e Tiras.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Yafet ngoni: Gomer e Magog e Maday e Yawan e Tubal e Meesek e Tiras.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Jafɛt nɛ́ Gɔmɛr, Magɔg, Madai, Yabaŋ, Tubal, Mɛsɛk in Tiras.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Jafɛt nɛ́ Gɔmɛr, Magɔg, Madai, Yabaŋ, Tubal, Mɛsɛk in Tiras.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Zhafɛt ne, yɛ Gomɛr, Magog, Maday, Yavan, Təwbal, Mɛshɛk le Tiras.
Tupurri: Jar ni Jafed wo diñ: Gomer, Magog, Maday, Yafañ, Tubal, Meseg wo de Tiras

Francais: - Fils de Gomer: Ascénez, Riphath et Thogorma.
Anglais: And the sons of Gomer; Ashkenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Gomer: Askenaz, Difat, hiɗi Togarma.
Bulu: Bone be Gômer: Akénag, Difat a Tôgarma.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Gomerey i ti: Asekenas, Rifat waɗ Togarma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Gomer ngoni: Askanas e Difat  e Togarma.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Gomer ngoni: Askanas e Difat  e Togarma.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Gɔmɛr nɛ́ Askenaz, Difat in Tɔgarma.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Gɔmɛr nɛ́ Askenaz, Difat in Tɔgarma.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Gomɛr: yɛ Ashekɛnaz, Difat le Togarma.
Tupurri: Jar ni Gomer wo diñ: Askenas, Difad wo de Togarma.

Francais: - Fils de Javan: Élisa, Tharsis, Céthim et Dodanim.
Anglais: And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Yavan: Elisa, Tarsisa, Kittim hiɗi Rodanim.
Bulu: Bone be Yavan: Elisa, Tarsisa, Kitim a Rôdanim.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Yavaŋhay i ti: Elisa, Tarsis, Kitim waɗ Rodanim.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Yawan ngoni: Elisa e Tarsis e Kitti'en e Rodani'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Yawan ngoni: Elisa e Tarsis e Kitti'en e Rodani'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Yabaŋ nɛ́ Elisa, Tarsis, Kitim in Rodanim.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Yabaŋ nɛ́ Elisa, Tarsis, Kitim in Rodanim.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Yavan: Ɛlisha, Tarsis, Kitim le Rodanim.
Tupurri: Jar ni Yafan wo diñ: Elisa, Tarsisa, Sitim wo de Rodanim.

Francais: Fils de Cham: Chus, Mesraïm, Phut et Chanaan.
Anglais: The sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Kam: Kus, Misrayim, Put hiɗi Kanaan.
Bulu: Bone be Sam: Kus, Mitsrayim, Put a Kanaan.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Kamay i ti: Kus, Misrayim, Put waɗ Kanaˀan.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Haamu ngoni: Kus e Misrayim e Put e Kanaana.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Haamu ngoni: Kus e Misrayim e Put e Kanaana.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Kam nɛ́ Kus, Misraim, Put in Kanaŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Kam nɛ́ Kus, Misraim, Put in Kanaŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Sham: Kəwsh, Misrayim, Pəwt le Kanan.
Tupurri: Jar ni Kam wo diñ: Kus, Misrayim, Pud wo de Kanaan.

Francais: - Fils de Chus: Saba, Hévila, Sabatha, Regma et Sabathacha. - Fils de Regma: Saba et Dadan. -
Anglais: And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabtah, and Raamah, and Sabtecha. And the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Kus: Seba, Havila, Sabta, Rayema hiɗi Sabteka. Gurona vi Rayema: Saba hiɗi Dedan.
Bulu: Bone be Kus: Seba, Avila, Sabta, Raéma a Sabtéka. Bone be Raéma: Saba a Kedan.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Kusoy i ti: Seba, Havila, Sapta, Rakma, Sapteka. Ziri mizile ngi Rakmahay i ti: Saba ati Dedaŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Kus ngoni: Seba e Hawila e Sabeta e Rama e Sabitka. Ɓiɓɓe Rama ngoni: Saba e Dedan.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Kus ngoni: Seba e Hawila e Sabeta e Rama e Sabitka. Ɓiɓɓe Rama ngoni: Saba e Dedan.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Kus nɛ́ Seba, Hawila, Sabta, Ragma in Sabteka. O bem ko Raɛma nɛ́ Saba in Dɛdaŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Kus nɛ́ Seba, Hawila, Sabta, Ragma in Sabteka. O bem ko Raɛma nɛ́ Saba in Dɛdaŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Kəwsh: Sɛba, Havila, Sabta, Rama le Sabtɛka. Ma ŋwalea Ragma: Saba le Dɛdan.
Tupurri: Jar ni Kus wo diñ: Seba, Hafila, Sabta, Raema wo de Sabteka. Jar ni Raema wo diñ: Seba wo de Dedan.

Francais: Chus engendra Nemrod; c'est lui qui commença à être puissant sur la terre.
Anglais: And Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be mighty upon the earth.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kus vuɗ Nimrod, nam kayni mi sa ma donot gaa kay nagat tun caw talamna.
Bulu: Kus a nga biaé Nimrôd; Nye a nga taté bo éwôlô môt ôsu e si nyô.
Guiziga: Kus a yi Nemrot, bugawla mudumbuŋ ngi si ruwuyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kus danyi Nimrudu, kaŋko woni aartuɗo laataago baawɗo dow lesdi.
Fulfulde_DC: Kus danyi Nimrudu, kaŋko woni aartuɗo laataago baawɗo dow lesdi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kus koo Nɛmrod mbɛt nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ kuti ŋgaŋa-wi zu nù.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kus koo Nɛmrod mbɛt nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ kuti ŋgaŋa-wi zu nù.
Kapsiki_DC: Kəwsh yitenyɛa Nɛmrod nya kande ghate ta wəndə nya kanza ghyanake te hɛɗi.
Tupurri: Kus raw biñ Nimrod maga kol de eegre debañ tañgu ti tamsir mono,

Francais: - Mesraïm engendra les Ludim, les Anamim, les Laabim, les Nephthuhim,
Anglais: And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Misrayim vuɗ sum sa Ludimna, sa Anamimna, sa Lehabimna, sa Naftuhimna,
Bulu: Misrayim a nga biaé bôte ya Lud, ba ya Anam, ba ya Lehab a ba ya Naftua,
Guiziga: Misrayim i dideˀ ngi mizli Lutoy, Anemey, Lehapay, Naftuhoy,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Misrayim danyi Luudi'en e Anami'en e Lehabi'en e Naftu'en
Fulfulde_DC: Misrayim danyi Luudi'en e Anami'en e Lehabi'en e Naftu'en
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Misraim nɛ́ zɔmdáa ko o be Lud, o be Ɛinam, o be Lɛhab, o be Naftua,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Misraim nɛ́ zɔmdáa ko o be Lud, o be Ɛinam, o be Lɛhab, o be Naftua,
Kapsiki_DC: Misrayim ya kashia ka Ləwd, ka Anɛm, ka Lehab, ka Naftəw,
Tupurri: Misrayim raw joñge diñ pan jar Ludim wo, jar Anamim wo, jar Lehabim wo, jar Naftuyim wo,

Francais: les Phétrusim, les Casluhim, d'où sont sortis les Philistins, et les Caphthorim
Anglais: And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (of whom came the Philistines,) and Caphtorim.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: sa Patrusimna, sa Kasuluhimna, hay nisi pa sum sa Filistina hiɗi sum sa Kaftorimna may goyo.
Bulu: bôte ya Patrus, ba ya Kaslu, e vôme Befilisteñ be nga so a bôte ya Kaftor.
Guiziga: Patrosoy, Kasluhoy waɗ Kaftoro. Filistehey a boko tivi Kasluhoy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Paturusi'en e Kaslu'en e Kaftori'en. Filisti'en iwi haa Kaslu'en.
Fulfulde_DC: e Paturusi'en e Kaslu'en e Kaftori'en. Filisti'en iwi haa Kaslu'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: o be Patros, o be Kaslua nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ tugun o be Filistii, ká bá nɛ̀ o be Kaftɔr.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: o be Patros, o be Kaslua nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ tugun o be Filistii, ká bá nɛ̀ o be Kaftɔr.
Kapsiki_DC: ka Patros, ka Kasləw nyi kaka hwelefefia ka Filisti ba'a ka Kaftor.
Tupurri: Jar Patrusim wo, jar Kasluhim maga jar Filisteçeç wo de jar Kaftorim a wo le see äaara mono.

Francais: - Chanaan engendra Sidon, son premier-né, et Heth,
Anglais: And Canaan begat Zidon his firstborn, and Heth,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kanaan vuɗ Sidon, goora valam ma vuɗi jewna hiɗi Het,
Bulu: Kanaan a nga biaé Sidoñ, ntôle mone wé a Hét,
Guiziga: Kanaˀan a yi Sidoŋ, mangal naŋ modogom waɗ Het.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kanaana danyi Sidon, afo muuɗum e Hetu
Fulfulde_DC: Kanaana danyi Sidon, afo muuɗum e Hetu
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kaya-bem ko Kanaŋ nɛ́ Sidɔŋ, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Hɛt;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kaya-bem ko Kanaŋ nɛ́ Sidɔŋ, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Hɛt;
Kapsiki_DC: Kanan yitenyɛa Sidon nya katezhɛa wəzege ta ŋkɛ, ba'a Hɛt,
Tupurri: Kanaan raw joñge diñ pan Sidoñ jag weel äen wo de Hede,

Francais: ainsi que les Jébuséens, les Amorrhéens, les Gergéséens,
Anglais: The Jebusite also, and the Amorite, and the Girgashite,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hiɗi sa Yebusna, sa Amoriyana, sa Girgasiyena,
Bulu: bôte ya Yebuz, Beamorééñ, Begirgazieñ,
Guiziga: Yo i dideˀ ngi Zebusihey, Amorihey, Girgasihey,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Yebusi'en e Amoori'en e Girgasi'en
Fulfulde_DC: e Yebusi'en e Amoori'en e Girgasi'en
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kanaŋ nɛ́ zɔmdáa ko o be Jebus, o be Amɔr, o be Girgas,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kanaŋ nɛ́ zɔmdáa ko o be Jebus, o be Amɔr, o be Girgas,
Kapsiki_DC: shia ka Zhɛbəs ŋkɛ le ka Amor, le ka Girgash,
Tupurri: Diñ pan je Yebus no, je Amorid no, je Girgasid no,

Francais: les Hévéens, les Aracéens, les Sinéens,
Anglais: And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: sa Heviyena, sa Arkiyena, sa Siniyena,
Bulu: Behérieñ, Bearkieñ, Besinieñ,
Guiziga: Hivihey, Arkitey, Sinihey,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Hewi'en e Arki'en e Siniti'en
Fulfulde_DC: e Hewi'en e Arki'en e Siniti'en
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: o be Hiv, o be Ark, o be Sin,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: o be Hiv, o be Ark, o be Sin,
Kapsiki_DC: le ka Hava, le ka Ark, le ka Sin,
Tupurri: je Hifid no, je Arkid no, je Sinid no,

Francais: les Aradiens, les Samaréens et les Hamathéens.
Anglais: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: sa Arvadiyena, sa Semariyena, sa Hamatiyena,
Bulu: Bearvadieñ, Besemarieñ, Behamatieñ.
Guiziga: Arvadihey, Semarihey waɗ Hamatay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Arwidi'en e Cemariti'en e Hamati'en.
Fulfulde_DC: e Arwidi'en e Cemariti'en e Hamati'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: o be Arbad, o be Sɛmar in o be Hamat.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: o be Arbad, o be Sɛmar in o be Hamat.
Kapsiki_DC: le ka Arvad, le ka Semar ba'a ka Hamat.
Tupurri: je Arfadid no, je Semarid no, je Hamatid no, wer jar sen wo mo äuy a wo le see Kanaan äuy.

Francais: Fils de Sem: Elam, Assur, Arphaxad, Lud, Aram; Hus, Hul, Géther et Mosoch.
Anglais: The sons of Shem; Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram, and Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Meshech.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: gurona vi Sem: Elam, Asur, Arpaksad, Lud hiɗi Aram; Us, Hul, Geter hiɗi Mekek.
Bulu: Bone be Sem: Elam, Asur, Arpaksad, Lud a Aram; Uts, Hul, Géter a Mesék.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Semey i ti: Elam, Asur, Arpakzat, Lut, A ram, Us, Hul, Geter waɗ Mesek.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Sem ngoni: Elam e Assuru e Arfasada e Luuda e Aram e Uus e Hul e Geter e Meesek.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Sem ngoni: Elam e Assuru e Arfasada e Luuda e Aram e Uus e Hul e Geter e Meesek.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Sɛm nɛ́ Elam, Asur, Arpaksad, Lud, Aram, Us, Hul, Getɛr in Mɛsɛk.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Sɛm nɛ́ Elam, Asur, Arpaksad, Lud, Aram, Us, Hul, Getɛr in Mɛsɛk.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Sɛm: Ɛlam, Asəwr, Arpaksad, Ləwd, Aram, Əws, Həwl, Gɛtɛr le Mɛshɛk.
Tupurri: Jar ni Sem wo diñ: Elam, Asur, Arpaksad, Lud wo de Aram, Uts, Hul, Geter wo de Mesege.

Francais: - Arphaxad engendra Salé, et Salé engendra Héber.
Anglais: And Arphaxad begat Shelah, and Shelah begat Eber.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Arpaksad vuɗ Selah; Selah vuɗ Heber.
Bulu: Arpaksad a nga biaé Séla; Séla a nga biaé Héber.
Guiziga: Arpakzat a yi Sela, yo Sela kwana, a yi Eber.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Arfasada danyi Selaha, Selaha danyi Eber.
Fulfulde_DC: Arfasada danyi Selaha, Selaha danyi Eber.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Arpaksad koo Sɛla, ɓɛɛ Sɛla ko Ebɛr.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Arpaksad koo Sɛla, ɓɛɛ Sɛla ko Ebɛr.
Kapsiki_DC: Arpaksad yitenyɛa Shɛla, Shɛla yitenyɛa Ɛbɛr.
Tupurri: Arpaksad raw biñ Sela, Sela biñ Hebere.

Francais: Il naquit à Héber deux fils: le nom de l'un fut Phaleg, parce que de son temps la terre fut partagée, et le nom de son frère fut Jectan.
Anglais: And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of the one was Peleg; because in his days the earth was divided: and his brother's name was Joktan.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Heber vuɗ gurona ma': Semda vi ma kepna ala Peleg, kay hay liyna valamu nagat ɓuraway goyo, semda vi ɓasulumna ala Yoktan.
Bulu: Bobefam bebaé be nga bialé e be Héber: wua jôé na Pélég, amu si é nga kaban éyoñe melu jé, a jôé monyañe wé é mbe Yôktan.
Guiziga: Eber a yi cuw: modogomo a zilaka Pelek, a mbiɗeˀvra ‹Wunuk.› Naŋ kine, ar vi nga naŋ na, mizli ngi si ruwuyoyo a wunkam le zleˀe. Sukum mizile ngi Peleke, a zilaka Yoktaŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Eber danyanaama ɓiɓɓe worɓe ɗiɗo. Innde gooto, Pelek, ngam nder zamanu maako duniyaaru senndaama. Innde deerɗiiko boo, Yoktan.
Fulfulde_DC: Eber danyanaama ɓiɓɓe worɓe ɗiɗo. Innde gooto, Pelek, ngam nder zamanu maako duniyaaru senndaama. Innde deerɗiiko boo, Yoktan.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ebɛr koo bem yiitoo; nin kaya-a nɛ́ Pɛlɛg  wen nɛ́ ŋgimbi kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ nù kɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛnɛ. Nin hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Yoktaŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ebɛr koo bem yiitoo; nin kaya-a nɛ́ Pɛlɛg  wen nɛ́ ŋgimbi kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ nù kɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛnɛ. Nin hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Yoktaŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Bake ŋwale tezhili va Ɛbɛr: Pɛlɛg sləa nde ghate, gezete ta ŋkɛ “Nehe geva mbe”, kwa nza nde mbe vəa ŋkɛ ne, na mbeli nyi te hɛɗi nehemte geva mbe. Yoktan sləa wəza meghekɛ.
Tupurri: Heber raw biñ weere äoge: Ëu mapo boñ hay ga Peleg wer maga ti kal äe ni tamsir car äil go, ëu hen äen hay ga Yoktane.

Francais: - Jectan engendra Elmodad, Saleph, Asarmoth, Jaré,
Anglais: And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yoktan vuɗ Almodad, Selek, Hatsarmavet, Yerah,
Bulu: Yôktan a nga biaé Almôdad, Séléf, Hatsarmavét, Yéra,
Guiziga: Yoktaŋ a yi Almodat, Selef, Hasarmavet, Yera,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yoktan danyi Almodat e Selef e Hacamawet e Yeraha
Fulfulde_DC: Yoktan danyi Almodat e Selef e Hacamawet e Yeraha
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yoktaŋ koo Almɔdad, Sɛlɛf, Hasarmavɛt, Yera,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yoktaŋ koo Almɔdad, Sɛlɛf, Hasarmavɛt, Yera,
Kapsiki_DC: Yoktan yitenyɛa yɛ Almodad, le Shɛlɛf, le Hasarmavɛt, le Yɛra,
Tupurri: Yoktan raw biñ Almodad, Selef, Hatsarmafed, Yera,

Francais: Adoram, Huzal, Décla,
Anglais: Hadoram also, and Uzal, and Diklah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hadoram, Uzal, Dikla,
Bulu: Hadôram, Uzal, Dikla,
Guiziga: Hadoram, Uzal, Dikla,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Hadoram e Usal e Dikila
Fulfulde_DC: e Hadoram e Usal e Dikila
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hadɔram, Uzal, Dikla,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hadɔram, Uzal, Dikla,
Kapsiki_DC: le Hadoram, le Əwzal, le Dikla,
Tupurri: Hadoram, Usal, Dikla,

Francais: Hébal, Abimaël, Saba,
Anglais: And Ebal, and Abimael, and Sheba,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ebal, Abimayel, Saba, Ofir, Havila hiɗi Yobab.
Bulu: Ebal, Abimaél, Saba, Ofir, Havila a Yôbab.
Guiziga: Ebal, Abimayel, Saba,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Ebal e Abimayel e Seba
Fulfulde_DC: e Ebal e Abimayel e Seba
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛbal, Avimaɛl, Saba,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛbal, Avimaɛl, Saba,
Kapsiki_DC: le Ɛbal, le Abimayɛl, le Saba,
Tupurri: Ebal, Abimayel, Saba, Ofir, Hafila wo de Yobabe.

Francais: Ophir, Hévila et Jobab. Tous ceux-là furent fils de Jectan.
Anglais: And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab. All these were the sons of Joktan.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kaf kayni vuɗsi mi Yoktan.
Bulu: Balé beta bese be mbe bone be Yôktan.
Guiziga: Ofir, Havila waɗ Yobap. Tayna cek i ziri ngi Yoktaŋhay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Ofir e Hawila e Yobaba. Fuu maɓɓe ɓe ɓiɓɓe Yoktan.
Fulfulde_DC: e Ofir e Hawila e Yobaba. Fuu maɓɓe ɓe ɓiɓɓe Yoktan.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ofir, Hawila in Yobab. O wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ bem ko Yɔktaŋ lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ofir, Hawila in Yobab. O wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ bem ko Yɔktaŋ lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: le Ofir, le Havila ba'a Yobab. Pɛtɛ hɛ kaŋwalea Yoktan.
Tupurri: Jar sen wo äuy hay wo diñ jar ni Yoktan wo.

Francais: Sem, Arphaxad, Salé,
Anglais: Shem, Arphaxad, Shelah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sem, Arpaksad, Selah,
Bulu: Miaé awôme ya be Sem: Arpakad, Séla,
Guiziga: Sem a yi Arpakzat, Arpakzat a yi Sela.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa danygol Sem: Sem danyi Arfasada, Arfasada danyi Selaha, Selaha danyi
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa danygol Sem: Sem danyi Arfasada, Arfasada danyi Selaha, Selaha danyi
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Pɛ́r-nam ko Sɛm hɔ tɛ Abram nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Sɛm, Arpaksad, Sɛla,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Pɛ́r-nam ko Sɛm hɔ tɛ Abram nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Sɛm, Arpaksad, Sɛla,
Kapsiki_DC: Sɛm yitenyɛa Arpaksad, Arpaksad yitenyɛa Shɛla,
Tupurri: Sem, Arpaksad, Sela.

Francais: Héber, Phaleg, Ragau, Serug,
Anglais: Eber, Peleg, Reu,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Heber, Peleg, Rew,
Bulu: Héber, Pélég, Réu,
Guiziga: Sela a yi Eber, Eber a yi Pelek, Pelek a yi Rewu,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Eber, Eber danyi Pelek, Pelek danyi Re'u, Re'u danyi Saruku,
Fulfulde_DC: Eber, Eber danyi Pelek, Pelek danyi Re'u, Re'u danyi Saruku,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ebɛr, Pɛlɛg, Rɛu,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ebɛr, Pɛlɛg, Rɛu,
Kapsiki_DC: Shɛla yitenyɛa Ɛbɛr, Ɛbɛr yitenyɛa Pɛlɛg, Pɛlɛg yitenyɛa Rɛwə,
Tupurri: Heber, Peleg, Rewu,

Francais: Nachor, Tharé,
Anglais: Serug, Nahor, Terah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Serug, Nakor, Terak,
Bulu: Serug, Nakor, Téra,
Guiziga: Rewu a yi Seruk, Seruk a yi Nahor, Nahor a yi Tera.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saruku danyi Nahor, Nahor danyi Tara, Tara danyi Abraama,
Fulfulde_DC: Saruku danyi Nahor, Nahor danyi Tara, Tara danyi Abraama,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Serug, Nahɔr, Tɛra,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Serug, Nahɔr, Tɛra,
Kapsiki_DC: Rɛwə yitenyɛa Serəwg, Serəwg yitenyɛa Nahor, Nahor yitenyɛa Tɛra,
Tupurri: Serug, Nahor, Tera,

Francais: Abram, qui est Abraham.
Anglais: Abram; the same is Abraham.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Abram ma yum Abraham.
Bulu: Abram, nye a ne Abraham.
Guiziga: Tera kwana, a yi Abraham, misa zilaka Abraham.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Abraama, kaŋko woni Ibrahiima.
Fulfulde_DC: Abraama, kaŋko woni Ibrahiima.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: in Abram nɛ‘i sa'e Abraham.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: in Abram nɛ‘i sa'e Abraham.
Kapsiki_DC: Tɛra yitenyɛa Abram nya zhɛrenyɛ sləa ŋkɛ kaAbraham te kwete və.
Tupurri: Abram maga diñ Abraham mono.

Francais: Fils d'Abraham: Isaac et Ismaël.
Anglais: The sons of Abraham; Isaac, and Ishmael.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Abraham: Isaak hiɗi Ismayel.
Bulu: Bone bʼAbraham: Izak a Ismaél.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Abrahamay i ti: Izak ati Ismayel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Ibrahiima ngoni: Isiyaaku e Isma'iilu.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Ibrahiima ngoni: Isiyaaku e Isma'iilu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Abraham nɛ́ Izak in Ismaɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Abraham nɛ́ Izak in Ismaɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Abraham: Izak le Ismayɛl.
Tupurri: Jar ni Abraham wo diñ Isag wo de Ismayele.

Francais: Voici leur postérité: Nabaïoth, premier-né d'Ismaël, puis Cédar, Adbéel, Mabsam,
Anglais: These are their generations: The firstborn of Ishmael, Nebaioth; then Kedar, and Adbeel, and Mibsam,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni mi jafna visiya: Nebayot, goor ma vuɗi jewna vi Ismayel, Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam.
Bulu: E mvoñe bôte jap e nje nyô: Nebayôt, e ntôle mone Ismaél, Kédar, Adbeél, Mibsam,
Guiziga: dideˀ taŋhay muboko baɗ avu t'ani: Ismayele, a yi Nebayot mangal naŋ modogom, waɗ Kedar, Adibeyel, Mibisam,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa danygol maɓɓe: Nebayot woni afo Isma'iilu. Nden o danyi Keedar e Aɗɓe'el e Mipsaam
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa danygol maɓɓe: Nebayot woni afo Isma'iilu. Nden o danyi Keedar e Aɗɓe'el e Mipsaam
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O nutua kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: kaya-bem ko Ismaɛl nɛ́ Nɛbayot, sɛka Kɛdɛr, Adbeɛl, Mibsam,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O nutua kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: kaya-bem ko Ismaɛl nɛ́ Nɛbayot, sɛka Kɛdɛr, Adbeɛl, Mibsam,
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi sləa hwelefe ta nci nyi: Nebayot nya katezhɛa wəzege ta Ismayɛl, Kɛdar, Adbɛyɛl, Mibsam,
Tupurri: Mokay diñ wer mani Ismayeln wo: Nebayod diñ jag weel Ismayel no, Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam,

Francais: Masma, Duma, Massa, Hadad, Thema,
Anglais: Mishma, and Dumah, Massa, Hadad, and Tema,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Misma, Duma, Masa, Hadad, Tema,
Bulu: Mikma, Duma, Nasa, Hadad, Téma,
Guiziga: Misema, Duma, Masa, Hadat, Tema,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Misma e Duuma e Massa e Hadat e Tema
Fulfulde_DC: e Misma e Duuma e Massa e Hadat e Tema
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Misma, Duma, Masa, Hadad, Tɛma,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Misma, Duma, Masa, Hadad, Tɛma,
Kapsiki_DC: Mishema, Dəwma, Masa, Hadad, Tɛma,
Tupurri: Misma, Duma, Masa, Hadad, Tema,

Francais: Jétur, Naphis, Cedma. Ce sont les fils d'Ismaël.
Anglais: Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah. These are the sons of Ishmael.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yetur, Nappik hiɗi Kedma. Nisi kayni si gurona vi Ismayel.
Bulu: Yetur, Napik a Kédma. Bone be Ismaél mbe le.
Guiziga: Yetur, Nefik waɗ Keɗma. Tayna cek i ziri mizile ngi Ismayeley.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Yetuuru e Naafis e Keduma. Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Isma'iilu.
Fulfulde_DC: e Yetuuru e Naafis e Keduma. Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Isma'iilu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yɛtur, Nafis in Kɛdma; o bem ko Ismaɛl nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yɛtur, Nafis in Kɛdma; o bem ko Ismaɛl nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Yetəwr, Nafish ba'a Kɛdma. Nyi ya kaŋwalea Ismayɛl.
Tupurri: Yetur, Mafis, wo de Kedma. Mona diñ jar ni Ismayeln wo so.

Francais: Fils de Cétura, concubine d'Abraham: elle enfanta Zamram, Jecsan, Madan, Madian, Jesboc et Sué. -Fils de Jecsan: Saba et Dadan.
Anglais: Now the sons of Keturah, Abraham's concubine: she bare Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah. And the sons of Jokshan; Sheba, and Dedan.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Ketura cat ta sunda vi Abraham: Na' vuɗ Zimran, Yoksan, Medan, Madiyan, Yikbak hiɗi Suwah. Gurona vi Yoksan: Saba hiɗi Dedan.
Bulu: Bone be Ketura, ébon Abraham: Zimran, Yôksan, Medan, Madian, Yisbak a kua. Bone be Yôksan: Saba a Dedan.
Guiziga: Ketura ngwas mangasl ngi Abrahama, a yi Zimraŋ, Yokzaŋ, Medaŋ, Madiyan, Isebak waɗ Suwa. Ziri mizile ngi Yokzaŋhay i ti: Saba ati Dedaŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe'e ngoni ɓiɓɓe Ketura, culaaɗo Ibrahiima: Zimran e Yoksan e Medaan e Mediyan e Yisbak e Suha. Ɓiɓɓe Yoksan boo: Seba e Dedan.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe'e ngoni ɓiɓɓe Ketura, culaaɗo Ibrahiima: Zimran e Yoksan e Medaan e Mediyan e Yisbak e Suha. Ɓiɓɓe Yoksan boo: Seba e Dedan.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Kɛtura zɔŋa-kóò ko Abraham nɛ́ Zimram, Yoksaŋ, Mɛdaŋ, Madiaŋ, Yisbak in Sua. O bem ko Yoksaŋ nɛ́ Saba in Dɛdaŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Kɛtura zɔŋa-kóò ko Abraham nɛ́ Zimram, Yoksaŋ, Mɛdaŋ, Madiaŋ, Yisbak in Sua. O bem ko Yoksaŋ nɛ́ Saba in Dɛdaŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Kɛtəwra, male meghwa ta Abraham nde yake yɛ Zimran, Yoksan, Mɛdan, Madiyan, Ishebak ba'a Shəwa. Ŋwalea Yoksan: yɛ Saba le Dɛdan.
Tupurri: Jar ni Ketura, waçy ma klee mani Abraham no: A biñ Simran, Yoksan, Medan, Madiyañ, Yisbag wo de Suwa. Jar ni Yoksan wo diñ Saba wo de Dedan.

Francais: - Fils de Madian: Epha, Epher, Hénoch, Abida et Eldaa.-Tous ceux-là sont fils de Cétura.
Anglais: And the sons of Midian; Ephah, and Epher, and Hanoch, and Abida, and Eldaah. All these are the sons of Keturah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Madiyan: Efa, Efer, Henok, Abida hiɗi Eldaa. Nisi kaf kayni si gurona vi Ketura,
Bulu: Bone be Madian: Efa, Efer, Hénok, Abida a Elda.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Madiyanay i ti: Efa, Efer, Hanok, Abida waɗ Elda. Tayna cek i dideˀ ngi Keturahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Mediyan boo: Efa e Efer e Hanok e Abida e Elda'a. Ɓe fuu ɓe yimɓe danygol Ketura.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Mediyan boo: Efa e Efer e Hanok e Abida e Elda'a. Ɓe fuu ɓe yimɓe danygol Ketura.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Madiaŋ nɛ́ Eifa, Efɛr, Hanɔk, Abida in Ɛlda; o wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ o bem ko Kɛtura lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Madiaŋ nɛ́ Eifa, Efɛr, Hanɔk, Abida in Ɛlda; o wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ o bem ko Kɛtura lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Madiyan: Ɛfa, Ɛfɛr, Hanok, Abida le Ɛlda. Ghenci nyighɛ ŋwale tezhili nyi yake Kɛtəwra.
Tupurri: Jar ni Madiyañ wo diñ: Efa, Efer, Henog, Abida, wo de Eldaa. Wo mo äuy na diñ jar ni Ketura wo.

Francais: Abraham engendra Isaac. Fils d'Isaac: Ésaü et Jacob.
Anglais: And Abraham begat Isaac. The sons of Isaac; Esau and Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Abraham vuɗ Isaak. Gurona vi Isaak: Esaw hiɗi Israyel.
Bulu: Abraham a nga biaé Izak. Bone bʼIzak: ésô a Israél.
Guiziga: Abraham a yi Izak. Ziri mizile ngi Izakay i ti: Esaw ati Israyel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ibrahiima danyi Isiyaaku. Ɓe'e ngoni ɓiɓɓe Isiyaaku: Isuwa e Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Ibrahiima danyi Isiyaaku. Ɓe'e ngoni ɓiɓɓe Isiyaaku: Isuwa e Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Abraham koo Izak. O bem ko Izak nɛ́ Esau in  Israɛl .
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Abraham koo Izak. O bem ko Izak nɛ́ Esau in  Israɛl .
Kapsiki_DC: Abraham yitenyɛa Izak. Ŋwalea Izak: Ɛzawə le Israyɛl.
Tupurri: Abraham biñ Isage. Jar ni Isag wo diñ Esaw wo de Israyele.

Francais: Fils d'Ésaü: Eliphaz, Rahuel, Jéhus, Ihélom et Coré.
Anglais: The sons of Esau; Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Esaw: Elifaz, Rewel, Yewus, Yayelam hiɗi Korah.
Bulu: Bone bʼEsô: Elifaz, Reuél, Yeus, Yaélam a Kôra.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Esaway i ti: Elifas, Rewuyel, Yewus, Yalam waɗ Kora.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Isuwa boo: Elifas e Re'uwel e Ye'us e Ya'alaam e Koora.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Isuwa boo: Elifas e Re'uwel e Ye'us e Ya'alaam e Koora.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Esau nɛ́ Elifaz, Reuɛl, Yɛus, Yaɛlam in Kɔra.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Esau nɛ́ Elifaz, Reuɛl, Yɛus, Yaɛlam in Kɔra.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Ɛzawə: Ɛlifaz, Rɛwəyɛl, Yɛyəwsh, Yalam, le Kora.
Tupurri: Jar ni Esaw wo diñ: Elifas, Reuwel, Yewus, Yaelam wo de Kora.

Francais: - Fils d'Eliphaz: Théman, Omar, Séphi, Gathan, Cénez, Thamna, Amalec.
Anglais: The sons of Eliphaz; Teman, and Omar, Zephi, and Gatam, Kenaz, and Timna, and Amalek.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Elifaz: Teman, Omar, Sefi, Gayetam, Kenaz, Timna hiɗi Amalek.
Bulu: Bone bʼElifaz: Téman, Omar, Sefi, Gaétam, Kemaz, Timna a Amalék.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Elifasay i ti: Temaŋ, Omar, Sefi, Gatam, Kenas, Timna waɗ Amalek.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Elifas boo: Teman e Omar e Cefi e Gatam e Kenas e Timna e Amalek.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Elifas boo: Teman e Omar e Cefi e Gatam e Kenas e Timna e Amalek.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Elifaz nɛ́ Teman, Omar, Sɛfi, Gɛtam, Kɛnaz, Timna in Amalɛk.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Elifaz nɛ́ Teman, Omar, Sɛfi, Gɛtam, Kɛnaz, Timna in Amalɛk.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Ɛlifaz: Tɛman, Omar, Sɛfi, Gatam, Kenaz, Timna le Amalɛk.
Tupurri: Jar ni Elifas wo diñ: Teman, Omar, Sefi, Gaetam, Kenas, Timna wo de Amalege.

Francais: - Fils de Rahuel: Nahath, Zara, Samma et Méza.
Anglais: The sons of Reuel; Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Rewel: Nahat, Zerah, Samma hiɗi Miza.
Bulu: Bone be Reuél: Nahat, Zéra, Samma a Miza.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Rewuyeley i ti: Nahat, Zera, Samma waɗ Miza.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Re'uwel boo: Nahat e Zeraha e Samma e Misa.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Re'uwel boo: Nahat e Zeraha e Samma e Misa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Reuɛl nɛ́ Nahat, Zɛra, Sama in Miza.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Reuɛl nɛ́ Nahat, Zɛra, Sama in Miza.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Rɛwəyɛl: Nahat, Zɛra, Shama ba'a Miza.
Tupurri: Jar ni Reuwel wo diñ: Nahad, Sera, Sama wo de Misa.

Francais: Fils de Séir: Lotan, Sobal, Sébéon, Ana, Dison, Eser et Disan. -
Anglais: And the sons of Seir; Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah, and Dishon, and Ezer, and Dishan.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Seyir: Lotan, Sobal, Sibeyon, Ana, Dison, Etser hiɗi Disan.
Bulu: Bone be Séir: Lôtan, Kôbal, Sibéôn, Ana, Disôn, Etsér a Disan.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Seˀirey i ti: Lotaŋ, Sobal, Sibeyoŋ, Eser waɗ Disaŋ. Sibeyoŋ a yi Ana, yo i dideˀ ngi Disoŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe'e ngoni ɓiɓɓe Se'ir: Lotan e Sobal e Cibe'on e Ana e Dison e Ecer e Disan.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe'e ngoni ɓiɓɓe Se'ir: Lotan e Sobal e Cibe'on e Ana e Dison e Ecer e Disan.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Sɛir nɛ́ Lɔtaŋ, Sɔbal, Sibɛɔŋ, Ana, Disɔŋ, Esɛr in Disaŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Sɛir nɛ́ Lɔtaŋ, Sɔbal, Sibɛɔŋ, Ana, Disɔŋ, Esɛr in Disaŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Sɛyir: Lotan, Shobal, Sibɛyon, Ana, Dishon, Ɛsɛr ba'a Dishan.
Tupurri: Jar ni Seyir wo diñ: Lotan, Sobal, Sibewoñ, Ana, Dison, Etser wo de Disan.

Francais: Fils de Lotan: Hori et Homam. Soeur de Lotan: Thamna.
Anglais: And the sons of Lotan; Hori, and Homam: and Timna was Lotan's sister.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Lotan: Hori hiɗi Homam, ɓasum Lotanta ya' Timna.
Bulu: Bone be Lôtan: Hôri a Hômam. Kala Lôtan: Timna.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Lotaŋhay i ti: Hori waɗ Homam. Lotaŋ, sukum naŋ mongoso ada, a zilaka Timna.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Lotan boo: Hori e Homam. Timna, ɗum deerɗiraawo Lotan debbo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Lotan boo: Hori e Homam. Timna, ɗum deerɗiraawo Lotan debbo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Lɔtaŋ nɛ́ Hɔri in Hɔmam. Timna nɛ́ boko-nya Ɔtaŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Lɔtaŋ nɛ́ Hɔri in Hɔmam. Timna nɛ́ boko-nya Ɔtaŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Lotan: yɛ Hori le Homam. Timna sləa wəzha ta meghekɛa Lotan.
Tupurri: Jar ni Lotan wo diñ: Hori wo de Homam. Maygeman Lotan diñ Timna.

Francais: - Fils de Sobal: Alian, Manahath, Ebal, Séphi et Onam. - Fils de Sébéon: Aïa et Ana. - Fils d'Ana: Dison.
Anglais: The sons of Shobal; Alian, and Manahath, and Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. And the sons of Zibeon; Aiah, and Anah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Sobal: Alyan, Manahat, Ebal, Sefi hiɗi Onam. Gurona vi Sibeyon: Aya hiɗi Ana.
Bulu: Bone be Kôbal: Alyan, Manahat, Ebal, Sefi a Onam. Bone be Sibeôn: Aya a Ana.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Kobalay i ti: Aliyaŋ, Manahat, Ebal, Sefi waɗ Onam. Ziri mizile ngi Sibeyoŋhoy i ti: Aya ati Ana.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Sobal boo: Aliyan e Manahat e Ebal e Cefi e Onam. Ɓiɓɓe Cibe'on boo: Aya e Ana.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Sobal boo: Aliyan e Manahat e Ebal e Cefi e Onam. Ɓiɓɓe Cibe'on boo: Aya e Ana.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Sɔbal nɛ́ Aliaŋ, Manahat, Ebal, Sɛfi in Onam. O bem ko Sibɛɔŋ nɛ́ Aya in Ana.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Sɔbal nɛ́ Aliaŋ, Manahat, Ebal, Sɛfi in Onam. O bem ko Sibɛɔŋ nɛ́ Aya in Ana.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Shobal: Aliyan, Manahat, Ɛbal, Shefi le Onam. Ŋwalea Sibɛyon: Aya le Ana.
Tupurri: Jar ni Sobal wo diñ Alyan, Manahad, Ebal, Sefi wo de Onam. Jar ni Sibewoñ wo diñ Aya wo de Ana.

Francais: - Fils de Dison: Hamram, Eséban, Jéthran et Charan. –
Anglais: The sons of Anah; Dishon. And the sons of Dishon; Amram, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Goora vi Ana: Dison. Gurona vi Dison: Hamran, Ekban, Yitran hiɗi Keran.
Bulu: Bone bʼAna: Disôn; Bone be Disôn: Hamran, Ekban Yitrañ a Kerañ.
Guiziga: Mangal ngi Ana i Disoŋ. Ziri mizile ngi Disoŋhoy i ti: Hamraŋ, Esebaŋ, Itraŋ waɗ Keraŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓii Ana boo, Dison. Ɓiɓɓe Dison boo: Hamran e Esban e Yituran e Keran.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓii Ana boo, Dison. Ɓiɓɓe Dison boo: Hamran e Esban e Yituran e Keran.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bem ko Ana nɛ́ Disɔŋ. O bem ko Disɔŋ nɛ́ Hamaraŋ, Ɛsbaŋ, Yitraŋ in Kɛraŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bem ko Ana nɛ́ Disɔŋ. O bem ko Disɔŋ nɛ́ Hamaraŋ, Ɛsbaŋ, Yitraŋ in Kɛraŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Wəzege ta Ana: Dishon. Ŋwalea Dishon: Hamran, Ɛsheban, Itran le Keran.
Tupurri: Je ni Ana diñ Dison. Jar ni Dison wo diñ Hamran, Esban, Yitran wo de Keran.

Francais: Fils d'Eser: Balaan, Zavan et Jacan. - Fils de Disan: Hus et Aran.
Anglais: The sons of Ezer; Bilhan, and Zaavan, and Jakan. The sons of Dishan; Uz, and Aran.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Etser: Bilhan, Zaavan, hiɗi Yakan, gurona vi Disan: Us hiɗi Aran.
Bulu: Bone be Etsér: Bilan, Zavan a Yakan. Bon be Dikan: Uts a Aran.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Eserey i ti: Bilehaŋ, Zavaŋ waɗ Yakaŋ. Ziri mizile ngi Disaŋhay i ti: Us ati Araŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Ezer boo: Bilhan e Za'awan e Ya'akan. Ɓiɓɓe Disan boo: Uus e Aaran.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Ezer boo: Bilhan e Za'awan e Ya'akan. Ɓiɓɓe Disan boo: Uus e Aaran.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Esɛr nɛ́ Bilaŋ, Zaawaŋ in Yakaŋ. O bem ko Disɔŋ nɛ́ Us in Araŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Esɛr nɛ́ Bilaŋ, Zaawaŋ in Yakaŋ. O bem ko Disɔŋ nɛ́ Us in Araŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Ɛsɛr: Bilehan, Zavan le Yakan. Ŋwalea Dishan: yɛ Əws le Aran.
Tupurri: Jar ni Etser wo diñ Bilhan, Saafan wo de Yaakan. Jar ni Disan wo diñ Uts wo de Aran.

Francais: Voici les rois qui ont régné dans le pays d'Edom avant qu'un roi régnât sur les enfants d'Israël: Béla, fils de Béor; le nom de sa ville était Dénaba.
Anglais: Now these are the kings that reigned in the land of Edom before any king reigned over the children of Israel; Bela the son of Beor: and the name of his city was Dinhabah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si muliyana sa ti mulda hay nagat Edom jew a mul mus kay sa Israyella: Bela, goora vi Bewor, semda vi hoyok-ziyna valam ala Dinhaba.
Bulu: Bejô bôt be nga jôô e si yʼEdom te na njô bôt éziñ a tebe na a jôô bone bʼIsraél: Béla, e mone Béor, jôé tisone jé e mbe Dinhaba.
Guiziga: Buy madiɗahay a ruwuy Edom, naɓa a cifam buy ɗaˀ a ruwuy Israyele t'aruŋ na, slimiɗ taŋhay ani: Bela mangal ngi Behor, walahay naŋ a zilaka Dinaba.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa inɗe laamiiɓe Edoomi'en diga Isra'iila walaano laamiiɗo: Bela ɓii Be'or, innde wuro maako Dinhaba.
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa inɗe laamiiɓe Edoomi'en diga Isra'iila walaano laamiiɗo: Bela ɓii Be'or, innde wuro maako Dinhaba.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi nɛ̀ ɔɔ wan sɛn Edɔm nɛti sɛka ŋma bezaŋ  Israɛl  ku̧ naŋ ɔɔ wan nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Bɛla bem ko Bɛɔr; nin gasa ye kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Dinaba.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi nɛ̀ ɔɔ wan sɛn Edɔm nɛti sɛka ŋma bezaŋ  Israɛl  ku̧ naŋ ɔɔ wan nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Bɛla bem ko Bɛɔr; nin gasa ye kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Dinaba.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi sləa ka meghe nyi kese kambeɗe geva pelɛ pasla ta ka Ɛdom tewə meghe kenaka kadzehwa ka Israyɛl nyi: Bɛla wəzege ta Bɛyor nya mbe meleme ta ka Dinaba.
Tupurri: Mokay diñ ëu wañre maga hay joñ wo ti sir Edom go tañgu maga wañ po hay ti sir Israyel ga ëa mono: AÀ wo diñ Bela je ni Bower no, ëu äi leege äen hay ga Dinhaba.

Francais: Béla mourut, et, à sa place, régna Jobab, fils de Zaré, de Bosra.
Anglais: And when Bela was dead, Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his stead.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bela mita, Yobab goora vi Zerah ma Bosrana ti mulda hay baŋalamu.
Bulu: Béla a nga wu, a Yôbab, e mone Zéra ya Bôtsra a nga jôô éjiane jé.
Guiziga: Bela a mucu, Yobat mangal ngi Zera, ngi ruwuy Bosra, a zum buy ar li naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Bela maayi. Yobaba ɓii Zeraha mo Bosra laami haa pellel maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Bela maayi. Yobaba ɓii Zeraha mo Bosra laami haa pellel maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bɛla fea, ɓɛɛ Yobab bem ko Zɛra be Ɔsra ɔ wan oi-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bɛla fea, ɓɛɛ Yobab bem ko Zɛra be Ɔsra ɔ wan oi-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa mtenyɛ Bɛla, Yobab wəzege ta Zɛra ta ka Bosra nde dzete meghe te zhia ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Bela kal hugi go, Yobab je ni Sera ma Bosra raw kolge wañ ti ngeel äe.

Francais: Jobab mourut, et à sa place régna Husam, du pays des Thémanites.
Anglais: And when Jobab was dead, Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his stead.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yabab mita, Husam ma hay nagata vi Temanna ti mulda hay baŋalamu.
Bulu: Yôbab a nga wu a Hukam ya si Betémanite a nga jôô éjiane jé.
Guiziga: Yobat a mucu, Husam ngi ruwuy Temani, a zum buy ar li naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yobaba maayi. Husam mo lesdi Temani'en laami haa pellel maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Yobaba maayi. Husam mo lesdi Temani'en laami haa pellel maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yɔbab fee kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ Husam be nú Teman ɔ wan oi-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yɔbab fee kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ Husam be nú Teman ɔ wan oi-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa mtenyɛ Yobab ne, Həwsham nde hɛɗia ka Tɛman nde kelete meghea ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Yobab hu go, Husam ma ti sir mani jar Temanidn kal kolge wañ ti ngeel äe.

Francais: Husam mourut, et, à sa place, régna Hadad, fils de Badad, qui défit Madian dans les champs de Moab; le nom de sa ville était Avith. Hadad mourut,
Anglais: And when Husham was dead, Hadad the son of Bedad, which smote Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Avith.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Husam mita, Hadad goora vi Bedad ti mulda hay baŋalamu. Namu mi ma kol kay sa Madiyanna hay duura vi Mowab. Hoyok-ziyna valamu yum ala Awit.
Bulu: Hukam a nga wu a Hadad, e mone Bedad, a nga jôô éjiane jé. E nye a nga bôé bôte ya Madian e si ya Môab. Jôé ya tisone jé e mbe na Avit.
Guiziga: Husam a muc, Hadat mangal ngi Bedat ngi ruwuy Davit, a zum buy ar li naŋ. Mikiɗaka mizli Madiyanay angi hirwuy Moˀap na, i naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Husam maayi. Hadat ɓii Bedaada, mo jaali Mediyan nder lesdi Mo'ab, laami haa pellel maako. Innde wuro maako, Awit.
Fulfulde_DC: Husam maayi. Hadat ɓii Bedaada, mo jaali Mediyan nder lesdi Mo'ab, laami haa pellel maako. Innde wuro maako, Awit.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Husam fea, ɓɛɛ Hadad bem ko Bɛdad ɔ wan oi-aa. A̧ bìí Madiaŋ sɛn nú Mɔab; nin gasa ye kɔ̧-a̧ duka nɛ́ Avit.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Husam fea, ɓɛɛ Hadad bem ko Bɛdad ɔ wan oi-aa. A̧ bìí Madiaŋ sɛn nú Mɔab; nin gasa ye kɔ̧-a̧ duka nɛ́ Avit.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa mtenyɛ Həwsham ne, Hadad, wəzege ta Bɛdad nde kelete meghea ŋkɛ. Gheŋkɛ nde ɗate ka Madiyan te hɛɗia ka Mowab. Avit sləa meleme ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Husam hu go, Hadad je ni Bedadn raw kolge ti ngeel äe. AÀ diñ je maga hay äum Madiyañ wo äil pay ma Mowabn mono. Ëu äi leege äen hay ga Afidi.

Francais: et, à sa place, régna Semla, de Masréca.
Anglais: And when Hadad was dead, Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his stead.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hadad mita, Samra ma hay Masrekana ti mulda hay baŋalamu.
Bulu: Ane Hadad a nga wu a Samla ya Masréka a nga jôô éjiane jé.
Guiziga: Hadat a muc, Samla ngi ruwuy Masleka, a zum buy ar li naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hadat maayi. Samla mo Masreeka laami haa pellel maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Hadat maayi. Samla mo Masreeka laami haa pellel maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hadad fea, ɓɛɛ Samla be Masrɛka ɔ wan oi-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hadad fea, ɓɛɛ Samla be Masrɛka ɔ wan oi-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa mtenyɛ Hadad ne, pa Samla, nde meleme ta Masrɛka kelete meghea ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Hadad hu go, Samla ma Masreka raw kolge wañ ti ngeel äe.

Francais: Semla mourut, et, à sa place, régna Saül, de Rohoboth sur le Fleuve.
Anglais: And when Samlah was dead, Shaul of Rehoboth by the river reigned in his stead.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Samla mita, Sawul ma Rehobot-kel-niy-lumna ti mulda hay baŋalamu.
Bulu: Eyoñe Samla a wuya, Saül ya Rehôbôt a ne e mfôm ôsôé a nga jôô éjiane jé.
Guiziga: Samla a muc, Sawul ngi ruwuy Rehobat ngi ˀayzaw, a zum buy ar li naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Samla maayi. Sawulu mo Rehobot-dow-Maayo laami haa pellel maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Samla maayi. Sawulu mo Rehobot-dow-Maayo laami haa pellel maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Samla fea, ɓɛɛ Saul be Rehobot ká̧ Efrat ɔ wan oi-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Samla fea, ɓɛɛ Saul be Rehobot ká̧ Efrat ɔ wan oi-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa mtenyɛ Samla ne, pa Shawəl nde meleme ta Rehobot nya mɛa hələa Efrate kelete meghea ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Samla hu go, Sawul ma Rehobod jag maarog ma de paçaçgen kal kolge wañ ti ngeel äe.

Francais: Saül mourut, et à sa place, régna Balanan, fils d'Achobor.
Anglais: And when Shaul was dead, Baal–hanan the son of Achbor reigned in his stead.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sawul mita, Baal-Hanan goora vi Akbor ti mulda hay baŋalamu.
Bulu: Eyoñe Saül a wuya, Baal Hanan, e mone Akbor a nga jôô éjiane jé.
Guiziga: Sawul a muc, Baˀal-Hasan, mangal ngi Akbor, a zum buy ar li naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sawulu maayi. Ba'al-Hanan ɓii Akbor laami haa pellel maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Sawulu maayi. Ba'al-Hanan ɓii Akbor laami haa pellel maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Saul fea, ɓɛɛ Bal-Hanaŋ bem ko Akbɔr ɔ wan oi-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Saul fea, ɓɛɛ Bal-Hanaŋ bem ko Akbɔr ɔ wan oi-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa mtenyɛ Shawəl ne, pa Ba'al-Hanan wəzege ta Akbor nde kelete meghea ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Sawul hu go, Baal-Hanan je ni Aknorn raw kolge wañ ti ngeel äe.

Francais: Balanan mourut, et, à sa place, régna Hadad; le nom de sa ville était Phau, et le nom de sa femme, Méétabel, fille de Matred, fille de Mézaab.
Anglais: And when Baal–hanan was dead, Hadad reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Pau; and his wife's name was Mehetabel, the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Mezahab.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Baal-Hanan mita, Hadad ti mulda hay baŋalamu. Semda vi hoyok-ziyna valam ala Pay, sem cata valam ala Mehetabeel, goota vi Matred, goota vi Mezahab.
Bulu: Mvus awu Baal Hanan, ane Hadad a nga jôô éjiane je. Jôé ya tisone jé e mbe na Payi, a jôé minga wé e mbe na Mehétabeél, ngone Matréd, ngone Mézahab.
Guiziga: Baˀal-Hasan a muc, Hadat ngi ruwuy Pay a zum buy ar li naŋ. Ngwas naŋ a zilaka Metabeyel, i zuŋ ngi Matret, yo i dideˀ ngi Me-Zahap
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ba'al-Hanan maayi. Hadat laami haa pellel maako. Innde wuro maako, Pa'i. Innde debbo maako, Mehetabeyel ɓii Matireeda ɓii Mezahat.
Fulfulde_DC: Ba'al-Hanan maayi. Hadat laami haa pellel maako. Innde wuro maako, Pa'i. Innde debbo maako, Mehetabeyel ɓii Matireeda ɓii Mezahat.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bal-Hanaŋ fea, ɓɛɛ Hadad ɔ wan oi-aa; nin gasa ye kɔ̧-a̧ duka nɛ́ Pai. Nin kóò kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Mɛhɛtabɛl boko-bem ko Matrɛd be-koo Mɛzahab.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bal-Hanaŋ fea, ɓɛɛ Hadad ɔ wan oi-aa; nin gasa ye kɔ̧-a̧ duka nɛ́ Pai. Nin kóò kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Mɛhɛtabɛl boko-bem ko Matrɛd be-koo Mɛzahab.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa mtenyɛ Ba'al-Hanan ne, pa Hadad kelete meghea ŋkɛ. Pay sləa meleme ta ŋkɛ. Ma male ta ŋkɛ, Mɛtabɛyɛl sləa nta, wəzha ta Matrɛd nde kashia Mɛ-Zahab.
Tupurri: Baal-Hanan hu go, Hadad kal kolge wañ ti ngeel äe. Ëu äi leege äen hay ga Payi, ëu waçy äen hay ga Mehetabeel may ma Matred may mani Mesahab no.

Francais: Hadad mourut.  Les chefs d'Edom étaient: le chef Thamna, le chef Alva, le chef Jétheth,
Anglais: Hadad died also. And the dukes of Edom were; duke Timnah, duke Alvah, duke Jetheth,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hadad mita, sa ŋulona vi Edom kayni: Ma ŋolla Timna, ma ŋolla Alva, ma ŋolla Yetet,
Bulu: Ane Hadad a nga wu. Bivete yʼEdom bi mbe na: Évete Timna, évete Alva, évete Yetét,
Guiziga: Hadat mumuc muduba na, i buy ngi sukwihey mijaka hirwuy Edomo. Slimiɗ taŋhay ani: Timna, Alva, Yetet,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hadat maayi. Ndaa yimɓe ɓe ardani lesdi Edoom: Timna, Aliya e Yetet,
Fulfulde_DC: Hadat maayi. Ndaa yimɓe ɓe ardani lesdi Edoom: Timna, Aliya e Yetet,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hadad fea mbɛt. O wanye Edɔm nɛ̀ yaa so nɛ́ Timna, Alia, Yɛtɛt,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hadad fea mbɛt. O wanye Edɔm nɛ̀ yaa so nɛ́ Timna, Alia, Yɛtɛt,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa mtenyɛ meghe Hadad ne, mbelia jama nyi te ghəa ka yita ka se kasleke Ɛdom. Wa nyi sləa nci nyi: Timna, Alva Yɛtɛt,
Tupurri: Hadad hu go, wañre Edom raw wo joñge diñ: Wañ Timna, wañ Alfa, wañ Yeted,

Francais: le chef Oolibama, le chef Ela, le chef Phinon,
Anglais: Duke Aholibamah, duke Elah, duke Pinon,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ma ŋolla Oholibama, ma ŋolla Ela, ma ŋolla Pinon,
Bulu: évete Ohôlibama, évet Ela, évete Pinôn,
Guiziga: Oholibama, Ela, Pinoŋ,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Oholibama e Ela e Pinon,
Fulfulde_DC: Oholibama e Ela e Pinon,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Oholibama, Ela, Pinɔŋ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Oholibama, Ela, Pinɔŋ,
Kapsiki_DC: Oholibama, Ɛla, Pinon,
Tupurri: wañ Oholibama, wañ Ela, wañ Pinon,

Francais: le chef Cénez, le chef Théman, le chef Mabsar,
Anglais: Duke Kenaz, duke Teman, duke Mibzar,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ma ŋolla Kenaz, ma ŋolla Teman, ma ŋolla Mibsar,
Bulu: évete Kenaz, évete Téman, évete Mibtsar,
Guiziga: Kenas, Temaŋ, Mibisar,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kenas e Teman e Mipsaara,
Fulfulde_DC: Kenas e Teman e Mipsaara,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kɛnaz, Teman, Mibsar,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kɛnaz, Teman, Mibsar,
Kapsiki_DC: Kenaz, Tɛman, Mibsar,
Tupurri: wañ Kenas, wañ Teman, wañ Mibsar,

Francais: le chef Magdiel, le chef Hiram. Ce sont là les chefs d'Edom.
Anglais: Duke Magdiel, duke Iram. These are the dukes of Edom.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ma ŋolla Magdiyel, ma ŋolla Iram. Nisi kayni si sa ŋulona vi Edom.
Bulu: évete Magdiel, évet Iram. Bivete yʼEdom mbie le.
Guiziga: Magidiyel waɗ Iram. Tayna cek i buy ngi sukwi Edomoy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Magdiyel e Iram. Kamɓe ngoni ardiiɓe Edoom.
Fulfulde_DC: Magdiyel e Iram. Kamɓe ngoni ardiiɓe Edoom.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Magdiɛl in Iram. Wa lɛŋ nɛ́ o wanye Edɔm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Magdiɛl in Iram. Wa lɛŋ nɛ́ o wanye Edɔm.
Kapsiki_DC: Magdiyɛl le Iram. Ghenci meghe nyi kese mbe yita nyi mbe Ɛdom.
Tupurri: wañ Magdiyel, wañ Irame. Mo na diñ wañre maga hay joñ wo ti sir Edom mo so no.

Francais: Voici les fils d'Israël: Ruben,
Anglais: These are the sons of Israel; Reuben, Simeon, Levi, and Judah, Issachar, and Zebulun,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si gurona vi Israyel: Ruben, Simeyon, Levi, Yuda, Isakar, Zabulon,
Bulu: Môé me bone bʼIsraél mme ma: Ruben, Siméon, Lévi, Yuda, Isakar, Zabuloñ,
Guiziga: Zakop, mazilaka Israyele ma na, slimiɗ ngi ziri naŋhay ani: Ruben, Simeyoŋ, Levi, Zuda, Isakar, Zabuloŋ,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Isra'iila ngoni: Ruben, Simeyon, Lewi, Yahuuda, Issakar, Zabulon,
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Isra'iila ngoni: Ruben, Simeyon, Lewi, Yahuuda, Issakar, Zabulon,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko  Israɛl  nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Rubɛn, Simɛɔŋ, Levii, Juda, Isakar, Zabulɔŋ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko  Israɛl  nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Rubɛn, Simɛɔŋ, Levii, Juda, Isakar, Zabulɔŋ,
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi sləa ŋwalea Zhakob nya heka mbeli kaIsrayɛl nyi: Rəbɛn, Simɛyon, Lɛvi, Zhəwda, Isakar, Zabəlon,
Tupurri: Mokay diñ ëu jar ni Israyel wo: Ruben, Simeyoñ Lefi, Juda, Isakar, Sabuloñ,

Francais: Siméon, Lévi, Juda, Issachar, Zabulon, Dan, Joseph, Benjamin, Nephthali, Gad et Aser.
Anglais: Dan, Joseph, and Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad, and Asher.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Dan, Yosef, Benyamin, Neftali, Gad hiɗi Aser.
Bulu: Dan, Yôsep, Bényamin, Néftali, Gad a Azér.
Guiziga: Daŋ, Zozef, Benjameŋ, Neftali, Gat waɗ Aser.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Dan, Yusufu, Benyamin, Neftali, Gada, Aser.
Fulfulde_DC: Dan, Yusufu, Benyamin, Neftali, Gada, Aser.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dan, Jozɛf, Bɛnjamin, Nɛftalii, Gad in Asɛr.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dan, Jozɛf, Bɛnjamin, Nɛftalii, Gad in Asɛr.
Kapsiki_DC: Dan, Zhozɛf, Bɛnjamɛn, Nɛftali, Gad le Asɛr.
Tupurri: Dañ, Josef, Benjamin, Neftali, Gad wo de Asere.

Francais: Fils de Juda: Her, Onan et Séla; ces trois lui naquirent de la fille de Sué, la Chananéenne. -Her, premier-né de Juda, était méchant aux yeux de Yahweh, qui le fit mourir. -
Anglais: The sons of Judah; Er, and Onan, and Shelah: which three were born unto him of the daughter of Shua the Canaanitess. And Er, the firstborn of Judah, was evil in the sight of the  Lord ; and he slew him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Yuda: Er, Onan, Sela, Guro nisi sa ɦidin lakŋi vuɗsi ti goota vi Suwa, ta Kanaaniyata. Er goor ma jewna vi Yuda, nam kir Ma-Vatɗin joo'o, Ma-Vatɗin cum goy mati,
Bulu: Bone be Yuda: Er, Onan, Séla; belale bete mbe, e monaminga Kua, ngone ya Kanaan a nga biaé nye; Er, ntôle mone Yuda, ô mbe abé e mise me Nti: ane a nga wôé nye.
Guiziga: Zuda a yi ziri mizilehey le makir ti ngwas naŋ, zuŋ ngi Suwa, mbur Kanaˀan, i ti: Er, Onaŋ waɗ Sela. Er mangal naŋ modogomo, a gi malambaˀ le a mbuŋ Bumbulvuŋ, joˀ Bumbulvuŋ a ga ɓa a mucu.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Yahuuda tato ɓe ɓii Su'a Kanaaniijo danyani mo ngoni: Eer e Oonan e Sela. Ammaa Eer, afo Yahuuda o kalluɗo yeeso Jawmiraawo, Jawmiraawo mbari mo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Yahuuda tato ɓe ɓii Su'a Kanaaniijo danyani mo ngoni: Eer e Oonan e Sela. Ammaa Eer, afo Yahuuda o kalluɗo yeeso Jawmiraawo, Jawmiraawo mbari mo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Juda nɛ́ Ɛr, Onaŋ in Sɛla. Nɛ́ boko-bem ko Sua zɔŋa Kanaŋ a̧ koo wa taar'i lɛŋ. Ɛr, kaya-bem ko Juda, yɔɔ kaya ti GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN gbɛ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Juda nɛ́ Ɛr, Onaŋ in Sɛla. Nɛ́ boko-bem ko Sua zɔŋa Kanaŋ a̧ koo wa taar'i lɛŋ. Ɛr, kaya-bem ko Juda, yɔɔ kaya ti GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN gbɛ a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Mahekene ŋwalea Zhəwda nyi yake ŋkɛ hwa male ta ŋkɛ nya kawəzha ta Shəwa kwa Kanan. Yɛ Ɛr, Onan le Shɛla. Ama Ɛr nya katezhɛa wəzege ta Zhəwda ne, nde beze ghena ŋkɛ sha Mahwətə, pa peslekɛ.
Tupurri: Jar ni Juda wo diñ Er, Onan wo de Sela. Biñ weere se swa'n wo ne hen diñ may mani Suwa, may jar Kanaan no. Er jag weel Judan hay de älagge nen Manwuri, Manwur raw 'warge äe go.

Francais: Thamar, belle-fille de Juda, lui enfanta Pharès et Zara. - Tous les fils de Juda furent au nombre de cinq.
Anglais: And Tamar his daughter in law bare him Pharez and Zerah. All the sons of Judah were five.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Tamar ta kuno Yudata, vuɗum Peres hiɗi Zerah. Gurona vi Yuda noŋ pet vasl.
Bulu: Tamar, mbome Yuda, a nga biaé nye Pérés a Zéra. Bone be Yuda bese be mbe betan.
Guiziga: A dirba nah, Zuda a yi ti Tamar, ngwas ngi mangal naŋ, ziri mizile mekelemey cuwo ma, i Peres ati Zera. A gam jom gar na, ziri mizilehey zlum.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa Tamar, esiiko debbo danyani mo Peres e Zeraha. Ɓiɓɓe Yahuuda worɓe fuu, ɓe njowo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa Tamar, esiiko debbo danyani mo Peres e Zeraha. Ɓiɓɓe Yahuuda worɓe fuu, ɓe njowo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Juda duka in Tamar be-for ko nɛ̀ Pɛrɛs in Zɛra. O bem ko Juda lɛŋ yaa nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Juda duka in Tamar be-for ko nɛ̀ Pɛrɛs in Zɛra. O bem ko Juda lɛŋ yaa nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, pa Tamar nya kamakwa ta ŋkɛ yake nda ŋwale tezhili bake, yɛ Pɛrɛs le Zɛra. Mcɛfe ŋ'wete ŋwale tezhili ŋkɛ pɛtɛ nci.
Tupurri: Tamar, moo Judan raw biñ Peres wo de Sera ne hene. Jar ni Juda wo äuy dwee.

Francais: Fils de Pharès: Hesron et Hamul.
Anglais: The sons of Pharez; Hezron, and Hamul.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Peres: Hesron hiɗi Hamul.
Bulu: Bone be Pérés: Etsroñ a Hamul.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Perizihey i ti: Hesroŋ waɗ Hamul.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Peres ngoni: Hesruunu e Hamul.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Peres ngoni: Hesruunu e Hamul.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Pɛrɛs nɛ́ Hɛsrɔŋ in Hamul.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Pɛrɛs nɛ́ Hɛsrɔŋ in Hamul.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Pɛrɛs: Hɛsron le Haməwl.
Tupurri: Jar ni Peres wo diñ: Hesrom wo de Hamul.

Francais: - Fils de Zara: Zamri, Ethan, Eman, Chalchal et Dara: en tout, cinq. –
Anglais: And the sons of Zerah; Zimri, and Ethan, and Heman, and Calcol, and Dara: five of them in all.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Zerah: Zimri, Etan, Heman, Kalkol hiɗi Dara.  Nisi noŋ pet vasl.
Bulu: Bone be Zéra: Zimri, Etan, Héman, Kalkol a Dara, bese betan.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Zerahay i ti: Zimri, Etaŋ, Heman, Kalkol waɗ Dara, jom gar ziri mizilehey zlum.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Zeraha ngoni: Zimiri e Etan e Heman e Kalkol e Dara, fuu maɓɓe, ɓe njowo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Zeraha ngoni: Zimiri e Etan e Heman e Kalkol e Dara, fuu maɓɓe, ɓe njowo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Zɛra nɛ́ Zimri, Etaŋ, Heman, Kalkɔl in Dara; wa lɛŋ mɔɔrɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Zɛra nɛ́ Zimri, Etaŋ, Heman, Kalkɔl in Dara; wa lɛŋ mɔɔrɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Zɛra: Zimri, Ɛtan, Hɛman, Kalkol le Dara, mcɛfe hɛ pɛtɛa nci.
Tupurri: Jar ni Sera wo diñ: Simri, Etan, Heman, Kalkol wo de Dara, saara äuy dwee.

Francais: Fils de Charmi: Achar, qui troubla Israël par une transgression au sujet d'une chose vouée à l'anathème.
Anglais: And the sons of Carmi; Achar, the troubler of Israel, who transgressed in the thing accursed.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Karmi: Akar,  namu mi ma mar joot kay sa Israyella, hay li ma nam li suluku hiɗi slen ma telayna.
Bulu: Bone be Karmi: Akar, nye a nga dutu Israél minjuk éyoñ a nga baʼale ngabe ya biôm bi mbe ntiñetane ya jañ.
Guiziga: Mangal ngi Karmi i Akar, i naŋ muso ti mendere da Israyeleye, asi a gi malambaˀ ti naŋ muzuɓa gwat mitika jiviɗ naŋ le.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓii Karmi boo, Akar mo nastini Isra'iila nder sarru ngam o yewi umroore Allah, o hoo'i kuuje kaɗaaɗe .
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓii Karmi boo, Akar mo nastini Isra'iila nder sarru ngam o yewi umroore Allah, o hoo'i kuuje kaɗaaɗe .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bem ko Karmi nɛ́ Akar nɛ̀ daka so fom pi̧ zu  Israɛl , wen n'aa baa mɔɔ-fom hu̧si.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bem ko Karmi nɛ́ Akar nɛ̀ daka so fom pi̧ zu  Israɛl , wen n'aa baa mɔɔ-fom hu̧si.
Kapsiki_DC: Wəzege ta Karmi ne, Akar. Gheŋkɛ nde kekele ndiremi kadzembe Israyɛl kwa keseyi wəsə nya keveyi geva kaŋa Shala ŋkɛ kaŋa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Jar ni Karmi wo diñ: Akar maga hay haçy Israyel wo go ti maga aà joñ fen ma bay ngar ti feçeçre maga Baa hay riñ ga baa do ti äaara wa mono.

Francais: - Fils d'Ethan: Azarias.
Anglais: And the sons of Ethan; Azariah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Goora vi Etan: Azariya.
Bulu: Bone bʼEtan: Azaria.
Guiziga: Mangal ngi Etaŋ i Azariya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓii Etan boo, Azariya.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓii Etan boo, Azariya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bem ko Etaŋ nɛ́ Azaria.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bem ko Etaŋ nɛ́ Azaria.
Kapsiki_DC: Azariya sləa wəzege ta Ɛtan.
Tupurri: Je ni Etan diñ Asariya.

Francais: Fils qui naquirent à Hesron: Jéraméel, Ram et Calubi.
Anglais: The sons also of Hezron, that were born unto him; Jerahmeel, and Ram, and Chelubai.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona sa Hesron vuɗsina: Yerahmeel, Ram hiɗi Kelubay.
Bulu: E bone Etsroñ a nga biaé: Yerameél, Ram a Kelubayi. Bone be Yakob.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Hesroŋhoy i ti: Yeramiyel, Ram waɗ Kalep. A zilaka Kalep vuna Kelubay ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Hesruunu danyanaaɓe mo ngoni: Yerahameel e Ram e Kelubay.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Hesruunu danyanaaɓe mo ngoni: Yerahameel e Ram e Kelubay.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Hɛsrɔŋ nɛ́ Yerameɛl, Ram in Kɛlubai.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Hɛsrɔŋ nɛ́ Yerameɛl, Ram in Kɛlubai.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Hɛsron: Yeramɛyɛl, Ram le Kalɛb nya heka mbeli kaKɛləwbay perə.
Tupurri: Weere maga Hesron biñ ra mono wo diñ: Yerameel, Ram wo de Kelubay.

Francais: Ram engendra Aminadab; Aminadab engendra Nahasson, prince des fils de Juda;
Anglais: And Ram begat Amminadab; and Amminadab begat Nahshon, prince of the children of Judah;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ram vuɗ Aminadab, Aminadab vuɗ Nahson, namu mi yerimana vi gurona vi Yuda.
Bulu: Ram a nga biaé Aminadab, Aminadab a nga biaé Nahsôn, évete bone be Yuda.
Guiziga: Ram a yi Aminadap, Aminadap a yi Nasoŋ, buy ngi sukwi ngi Zuda.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ram danyi Amminadabu, Amminadabu danyi Nahasunu, ardiiɗo ɓiɓɓe Yahuuda.
Fulfulde_DC: Ram danyi Amminadabu, Amminadabu danyi Nahasunu, ardiiɗo ɓiɓɓe Yahuuda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ram koo Aminadab; Aminadab koo Nasɔŋ gasawi ko o bezaŋ Juda.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ram koo Aminadab; Aminadab koo Nasɔŋ gasawi ko o bezaŋ Juda.
Kapsiki_DC: Ram yitenyɛa Aminadab, Aminadab yitenyɛa Nashon nya kawəndə nya te ghəa yita ta Zhəwda.
Tupurri: Ram raw biñ Aminadab, Aminadab raw biñ Nason, wañ ma pel jar ni Judan wo.

Francais: Nahasson engendra Salma; Salma engendra Booz;
Anglais: And Nahshon begat Salma, and Salma begat Boaz,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nahson vuɗ Salma, Salma vuɗ Bowaz,
Bulu: Nahsôn a nga biaé Salma. Salma a nga biaé Bôaz.
Guiziga: Nasoŋ a yi Salma, Salma a yi Boˀos,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nahasunu danyi Salma, Salma danyi Bo'es,
Fulfulde_DC: Nahasunu danyi Salma, Salma danyi Bo'es,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nasɔŋ koo Salma, Salma koo Boaz,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nasɔŋ koo Salma, Salma koo Boaz,
Kapsiki_DC: Nashon ya kayitenyɛa Salma, Salma yitenyɛa Bəwz,
Tupurri: Nason raw biñ Salma, Salma raw biñ Bowase.

Francais: Booz engendra Obed; Obed engendra Isaï;
Anglais: And Boaz begat Obed, and Obed begat Jesse,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bowaz vuɗ Obed. Obed vuɗ Isay.
Bulu: Bôaz a nga biaé Obéd. Obéd a nga biaé Izayi.
Guiziga: Boˀos a yi Obet, yo Obete kwana, a yi Zese.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Bo'es danyi Obet, Obet danyi Yessa.
Fulfulde_DC: Bo'es danyi Obet, Obet danyi Yessa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Boaz koo Obɛd, ɓɛɛ Obɛd ko Jɛse.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Boaz koo Obɛd, ɓɛɛ Obɛd ko Jɛse.
Kapsiki_DC: Bəwz yitenyɛa Obɛd, Obɛd yitenyɛa Zhɛsɛ.
Tupurri: Bowas raw biñ Obede, Obed raw biñ Isayi.

Francais: Isaï engendra Eliab son premier-né, Abinadab. le deuxième, Simmaa le troisième,
Anglais: And Jesse begat his firstborn Eliab, and Abinadab the second, and Shimma the third,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Isay vuɗ Eliyab, goora valam ma vuɗi jewna, Abinadab mi ma vuɗ kalamna, Simeya mi ma ɦidina,
Bulu: Izayi a nga biaé Eliab, ntôle mone wé, Abinadab ki nyô baa, Siméa e nyô lale.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Zeseheye tarnaˀa. Tˀani vur mijingaˀ vur mijingaˀ: Eliyap, Aminadap, Samma,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yessa danyi Eliyabu, afo muuɗum, nden Abinadabu ɗiɗaɓo e Sim'a tataɓo
Fulfulde_DC: Yessa danyi Eliyabu, afo muuɗum, nden Abinadabu ɗiɗaɓo e Sim'a tataɓo
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jɛse koo kaya-bem kɔ‘i Eliab, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Abinadab, taar-a nɛ́ Simɛa,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jɛse koo kaya-bem kɔ‘i Eliab, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Abinadab, taar-a nɛ́ Simɛa,
Kapsiki_DC: Mberefaŋe yake ŋwale Zhɛsɛ: Ɛliyab nde ghate, Abinadab nde zhɛne kadzeyite, Shimɛya nde mahekene,
Tupurri: Isayi kal biñ Eliyab jag weel äe no, Abinadab ma de äog no, Simeya, ma de swa' no,

Francais: Nathanaël, le quatrième, Raddaï, le cinquième,
Anglais: Nethaneel the fourth, Raddai the fifth,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Netaneel mi ma fiɗina, Radday mi ma vaslna,
Bulu: Natanaél a mbe nyô nyini, Radayi e nyô tane,
Guiziga: Natanayel, Raday,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Netaneyel nayaɓo e Radday njowaɓo
Fulfulde_DC: e Netaneyel nayaɓo e Radday njowaɓo
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: naar-a nɛ́ Nɛtanɛl, mɔɔrɔ-a nɛ́ Radai,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: naar-a nɛ́ Nɛtanɛl, mɔɔrɔ-a nɛ́ Radai,
Kapsiki_DC: Netanɛyɛl nde wəfaɗe, Raday nde mcɛfe,
Tupurri: Nataneel ma de naa no, Raday ma de dwee no,

Francais: Asom, le sixième, et David, le septième.
Anglais: Ozem the sixth, David the seventh:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Otsem mi ma karkiyana, David mi ma siɗiyana.
Bulu: Otsém e nyô samane, David e nyô zamgbwale.
Guiziga: Osem waɗ Davit.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Ocem njoweegoojo e Daawuda njoweeɗiɗaɓo.
Fulfulde_DC: e Ocem njoweegoojo e Daawuda njoweeɗiɗaɓo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a nɛ́ Osɛm, mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-aa nɛ́ David.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a nɛ́ Osɛm, mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-aa nɛ́ David.
Kapsiki_DC: Osɛm nde ŋkwaŋe, David nde mberefaŋe kakwa keɗaŋe.
Tupurri: Otsem ma de hiira' no, Dafid ma de renam no.

Francais: Leurs soeurs étaient: Sarvia et Abigaïl. - Fils de Sarvia: Abisaï, Joab et Asaël, trois.
Anglais: Whose sisters were Zeruiah, and Abigail. And the sons of Zeruiah; Abishai, and Joab, and Asahel, three.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ɓosiyosi sa boyn kayni si Seruya hiɗi Abigayil. Gurona vi Seruya: Absay, Yowab hiɗi Asayel. Nisi ɦidi.
Bulu: Bekale bap be mbe môé na: Seruya a Abigayil. Bone be Seruya be mbe na: Absayi, Yôab a Asaél, bese belaa.
Guiziga: Sukum taŋ mongosohoyo i ti: Seruya waɗ Abigal. Ziri mizile ngi Seruyahay i ti: Abisay, Zoˀap waɗ A sayel, jom gar ziri mizilehey makir.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Deerɗiraaɓe maɓɓe rewɓe ngoni: Seruyatu e Abigayil. Ɓiɓɓe Seruyatu boo: Abisay e Yo'ab e Asa'el, ɓe tato.
Fulfulde_DC: Deerɗiraaɓe maɓɓe rewɓe ngoni: Seruyatu e Abigayil. Ɓiɓɓe Seruyatu boo: Abisay e Yo'ab e Asa'el, ɓe tato.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O boko-nya-wa so nɛ́ Sɛruya in Abigail. O bem ko Sɛruya yaa so nɛ́ taar: Absai, Jɔab in Asahɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O boko-nya-wa so nɛ́ Sɛruya in Abigail. O bem ko Sɛruya yaa so nɛ́ taar: Absai, Jɔab in Asahɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea kwɛa yiteyɛa nci ne, yɛ Serəwya hɛ le Abigal. Mahekene ŋwale va Serəwya: Abishay, Zhowab le Asayɛl.
Tupurri: Heçeçre äaara ma tenaare hay wo diñ: Seruya wo de Abigayil. Jar ni Seruya wo diñ Absay, Jowab wo de Asayel saara swa'a.

Francais: - Abigaïl enfanta Amasa, dont le père fut Jéther, l'Ismaélite.
Anglais: And Abigail bare Amasa: and the father of Amasa was Jether the Ishmaelite.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Abigayil vuɗ Amasa, bum Amasa kayni mi Yeter ma Ismayella.
Bulu: Abigayil a nga biaé Amasa; ésaa Amasa a mbe Yéter, mone Ismaélite.
Guiziga: Mangal ngi Abigala naŋ purla, i Amasa, cine a zilaka Yeter, mbur Ismayel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Abigayil danyi Amasa. Baaba Amasa, Yeter Isma'iiluujo.
Fulfulde_DC: Abigayil danyi Amasa. Baaba Amasa, Yeter Isma'iiluujo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Abigail koo Amasa; nin dáà ko Amasa nɛ́ Yɛtɛr, bezaŋ Ismaɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Abigail koo Amasa; nin dáà ko Amasa nɛ́ Yɛtɛr, bezaŋ Ismaɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Abigal yake wəzege teza, Amasa sləa ŋkɛ, ma yitenyɛa Amasa ne, nde Ismayɛl ŋkɛ, Yɛtɛr sləa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Abigayil kal biñ Amasa, pan Amasa hay diñ Yeter je ma ti wer mani Ismayel no.

Francais: Caleb, fils de Hesron eut des enfants d'Azuba, sa femme, et de Jérioth. Voici les fils qu'il eut d'Azuba: Jaser, Sobab et Ardon.
Anglais: And Caleb the son of Hezron begat children of Azubah his wife, and of Jerioth: her sons are these; Jesher, and Shobab, and Ardon.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kaleb goora vi Hesron, vuɗ gurona hiɗi cata valam Azuba hiɗi Yeriyot. Kayni si gurona sa nam vuɗsi hiɗi Azubana: Yeser, Sobab, hiɗi Ardon.
Bulu: Kaléb, e mone Etsroñ, a nga biaé bon ba be binga bé Azuba a Yériôt. E bone ba Azuba be nga biaé mbe ba: Yéser, Kôbab a Ardôn.
Guiziga: Kalep, mangal ngi Hesroŋ, a yi ti ngwas naŋ Azuba waɗ Yeriyoto, ziri mizilehey makir i ti: Yeser, Sobap ati Ardoŋ, waɗ mongoso purla, a zilaka Yerot.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kaaleb ɓii Hesruunu danydi bee debbo muuɗum Ajuba e bee Yeri'ot. Ajuba danyi Yeser e Soobaba e Ardon.
Fulfulde_DC: Kaaleb ɓii Hesruunu danydi bee debbo muuɗum Ajuba e bee Yeri'ot. Ajuba danyi Yeser e Soobaba e Ardon.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kalɛb bem ko Hɛsrɔŋ koo o bem naar in kóò kɔ̧-a̧ Azuba: be-okoo kpɔk, nin-a nɛ́ Yɛriot; be-wiwii taar, nin-wa nɛ́ Yɛsɛr, Sɔbab, in Ardɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kalɛb bem ko Hɛsrɔŋ koo o bem naar in kóò kɔ̧-a̧ Azuba: be-okoo kpɔk, nin-a nɛ́ Yɛriot; be-wiwii taar, nin-wa nɛ́ Yɛsɛr, Sɔbab, in Ardɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma Kalɛb wəzege ta Hɛsron ne, mahekene yake ŋwale tezhili ŋkɛ sawa hwa mia ŋkɛ Azəwba le Yeriyot: Yɛshɛr, Shobab le Ardon.
Tupurri: Kaleb je ni Hesron biñ weere de Asuba waçy äe no, biñ de Yeriyod lay. Mokay diñ ëu weere maga a biñ ra de Asuba mono: Yeser, Sobab wo de Ardon.

Francais: Azuba mourut, et Caleb prit pour femme Ephrata, qui lui enfanta Hur.
Anglais: And when Azubah was dead, Caleb took unto him Ephrath, which bare him Hur.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Azuba mita, bugolda Kaleb sli Efrat, na' vuɗum Hur.
Bulu: Eyoñ Azuba a wuya, Kaléb a nga luʼu Efrat, nyô a nga biaé nye Hur.
Guiziga: A dirba Azuba mumuc na, Kalep a ɗuva Efrata, a yaŋ mizile pal, a zilaka Hur.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Ajuba maayi. Kaaleb ɓaŋgi Efratu, kaŋko danyani mo Huuru.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Ajuba maayi. Kaaleb ɓaŋgi Efratu, kaŋko danyani mo Huuru.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Azuba fea, ɓɛɛ Kalɛb ba Efrat nɛ̀ kóò, ko nɛ̀ Hur.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Azuba fea, ɓɛɛ Kalɛb ba Efrat nɛ̀ kóò, ko nɛ̀ Hur.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa mtenyɛ Azəwba, pa Kalɛl wəmeve Ɛfrata kamale ta ŋkɛ, pa yave nda wəzege teza Həwr ke mbeli shɛ.
Tupurri: Asuba kal hugi go, Kaleb raw mañ Efrade, se raw biñ Hur ne hene.

Francais: Hur engendra Uri, et Uri engendra Bézéléel.
Anglais: And Hur begat Uri, and Uri begat Bezaleel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hur vuɗ Uri, Uri vuɗ Betsaleel may.
Bulu: Hur a nga biaé Uri a Uri a nga biaé Betsaleél.
Guiziga: Hur i cine ngi Uri, Uri kwana, i cine ngi Besalel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Huuru danyi Uuri, Uuri danyi Becaleel.
Fulfulde_DC: Huuru danyi Uuri, Uuri danyi Becaleel.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hur koo Uri, ɓɛɛ Uri ko Bɛsalɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hur koo Uri, ɓɛɛ Uri ko Bɛsalɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Həwr yake Əwri, Əwri yitenyɛ Bɛsalɛl.
Tupurri: Hur biñ Uri, Uri kal biñ Betsalel.

Francais: - Ensuite Hesron s'unit à la fille de Machir, père de Galaad: il avait soixante ans quand il la prit; elle lui enfanta Ségub.
Anglais: And afterward Hezron went in to the daughter of Machir the father of Gilead, whom he married when he was threescore years old; and she bare him Segub.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugol kayni Hesron tuɗ tam goota vi Makir, bum Galaad. Nam sla'a hay li ma busata valam coy dok-karkiya, na' vuɗum Segub may.
Bulu: Ane Etsroñ a nga ke bômbô ngone Makir, ésaa Galad. A nga luʼu nye valé émien a ntoo mimbu mewôm mesaman, nde a nga biaé nye Ségub.
Guiziga: Hesroŋ mindila vi kukur merkeɗ na, a ɗuva zuŋ ngi Makir, cine ngi Galaˀat, a yi di mizile purla, a zilaka Segup.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓaawo maajum Hesruunu waaldi bee ɓii Makir debbo, Makir woni baaba Gile'at. Hesruunu marno duuɓi cappanɗe joweego saa'i o ɓaŋga debbo man. O danyani mo Seguba.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓaawo maajum Hesruunu waaldi bee ɓii Makir debbo, Makir woni baaba Gile'at. Hesruunu marno duuɓi cappanɗe joweego saa'i o ɓaŋga debbo man. O danyani mo Seguba.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ ɗoŋ, Hɛsrɔŋ duka in boko-bem ko Makir, dáà ko Galad. A̧ baa a̧ nɛ̀ kóò, ŋgimbi'i ká Hɛsrɔŋ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk; boko-bem’ɛi koo Sɛgub ha̧ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ ɗoŋ, Hɛsrɔŋ duka in boko-bem ko Makir, dáà ko Galad. A̧ baa a̧ nɛ̀ kóò, ŋgimbi'i ká Hɛsrɔŋ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk; boko-bem’ɛi koo Sɛgub ha̧ a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Va ŋkwaŋemsə Hɛsron menete, pa ŋkɛ wəmeve wəzha ta Makir, yitenyɛa Gala'ad. Pa ŋkɛ yake Sɛgəwb kawəzege teza sawa hwə.
Tupurri: Blam äe Hesron raw woge see may mani Makir pan Galaad no. AÀ mañn de maga kiñgi äe hay do hiira' mono, se raw biñ Segub ne hene.

Francais: Ségub engendra Jaïr, qui eut vingt-trois villes dans le pays de Galaad.
Anglais: And Segub begat Jair, who had three and twenty cities in the land of Gilead.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Segub vuɗ Yayir, hoyok-ziyna valam ka dok-ma' yam ɦidi hay nagata vi Galaad.
Bulu: Ségub a nga biaé Yayir nyô a nga bili bitison mewôm mebaé a bilaa e si ya Galad.
Guiziga: Segup a yi Yayir. Asi ruwuy ngi Galaˀata, walahay naŋhaya taˀ taˀ kukur cuw ti makir.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Seguba danyi Ya'ir mo mari gure noogas e tati nder lesdi Gile'at.
Fulfulde_DC: Seguba danyi Ya'ir mo mari gure noogas e tati nder lesdi Gile'at.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛgub koo Yair nɛ̀ ɔɔ wan zu ye ɓu-yiitoo-zua-taar sɛn nú Galad.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛgub koo Yair nɛ̀ ɔɔ wan zu ye ɓu-yiitoo-zua-taar sɛn nú Galad.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Sɛgəwb yake Yayir nya keŋ'wete meleme bakemsə mahekeneghəmbe te hɛɗia Gala'ad.
Tupurri: Segub raw biñ Yayir maga da' äi leege ti' ti' do äog ti swa' ti sir Galaad mono.

Francais: Les Gessuriens et les Syriens leur prirent les Bourgs de Jaïr, ainsi que Canath et les villes de sa dépendance: soixante villes. -Tous ceux-là étaient fils de Machir, père de Galaad.
Anglais: And he took Geshur, and Aram, with the towns of Jair, from them, with Kenath, and the towns thereof, even threescore cities. All these belonged to the sons of Machir the father of Gilead.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa Gesuriyena hiɗi sa Siriyana yaw hoyok-ziyna vi Yayir hay ɓisiya, Kenat hiɗi naga ma kuɗa'na kaw, hoyok-ziyn noŋ pet dok-karkiya. Nisi kaf kayni si gurona vi Makir, bum Galaad.
Bulu: Begézurieñ a Besirieñ be nga nyoñe be bitison bi too môé na Yayir, Kenat a mewôm me ne éjôé jé, bise bitison mewôm mesaman. Balé bete bese be mbe bone be Makir, ésaa Galad.
Guiziga: Amma buy madiɗa ngi Gesur ati ngi A rama, a tiɓaka walahay ngi Yayireye waɗ walahay Kenat ati prok naŋhaya. A tiɓam jom gar walahay kukur merkeɗ. Mizli ngi digahay cek i dideˀ ngi Makirey, cine ngi Galaˀat.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa yimɓe Gesur e Siriya kooci gure Ya'ir haa maɓɓe, non boo berniwol Kenat e gure maagol, waato gure cappanɗe joweego. Kamɓe fuu ɓe ɓiɓɓe Makir, baaba Gile'at.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa yimɓe Gesur e Siriya kooci gure Ya'ir haa maɓɓe, non boo berniwol Kenat e gure maagol, waato gure cappanɗe joweego. Kamɓe fuu ɓe ɓiɓɓe Makir, baaba Gile'at.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gɛsur in Aram ɓara o be ye ko Yair er-a, wa baa Kɛnat in o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ a̧ mbɛt; ye lɛŋ nɛ́ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk. O wi nɔ‘i yaa nɛ́ o bezaŋ Makir, dáà ko Galad.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gɛsur in Aram ɓara o be ye ko Yair er-a, wa baa Kɛnat in o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ a̧ mbɛt; ye lɛŋ nɛ́ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk. O wi nɔ‘i yaa nɛ́ o bezaŋ Makir, dáà ko Galad.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama nahe yɛ meghea ka Gɛshəwr le ŋa ka Aram kefəhwe kweci meleme ta Yayir, le Kenat ba'a le kweci meleme nyi yite, meleme ŋkwaŋemsə pɛtɛa nci. Nahe pɛtɛa mbeli nyi mbe hɛ kenza kahwelefefia Makir, yitenyɛa Gala'ad.
Tupurri: Jar Gesur wo de jar Siri kal wo yaçaç äi leege ma kluuri mani Yayirn wo go, äi leege Kenad de progre äen wo äuy, äuy äi leege do hiira'a. Jar maga hay wo äil äaara mo äuy diñ jar ni Makir, pan Galaade.

Francais: Après la mort de Hesron à Caleb-Ephrata, Abia, la femme de Hesron, lui enfanta Ashur, père de Thécua.
Anglais: And after that Hezron was dead in Caleb–ephratah, then Abiah Hezron's wife bare him Ashur the father of Tekoa.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugol mitta vi Hesron hay Kaleb-Efrata, Abiya cata vi Hesron vuɗum Aksur, bum Tekowa.
Bulu: E Mvus awu Etsroñ e Kaléb-Efrata, Abiya e minga Etsroñ a nga biaé nye Askur ésaa Tekôa.
Guiziga: A dirba Hesroŋ mumuc na, Kalep a hin ti Efrat, ngwas ngi cine tuwa ma, a yaŋ Esur, cine ngi Tikwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓaawo maayde Hesruunu haa Kaaleb-Efratu, Abiya debbo maako danyani mo Askuru, baaba Teko'a.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓaawo maayde Hesruunu haa Kaaleb-Efratu, Abiya debbo maako danyani mo Askuru, baaba Teko'a.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ fio ko Hɛsrɔŋ, Kalɛb duka in Efrat zɔŋa-kóò ko dáà kɔ‘i Hɛsrɔŋ ko nɛ̀ Asɛhur wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧naŋ ye Tɛkɔa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ fio ko Hɛsrɔŋ, Kalɛb duka in Efrat zɔŋa-kóò ko dáà kɔ‘i Hɛsrɔŋ ko nɛ̀ Asɛhur wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧naŋ ye Tɛkɔa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa mtenyɛ Hɛsron, pa Kalɛb wəmehwe Ɛfrata male ta yitenyɛ, pa nde yave nda Ashehəwr, yitenyɛa Tɛkowa.
Tupurri: Blam huli Hesron go äi leege Kaleb-Efrata mono, Abiya, waçy Hesron raw biñ Ashur pan Tekowa ne hene.

Francais: Les fils de Jéraméel, premier-né de Hesron, furent: Ram, le premier-né, Buna, Aran, Asom et Achia.
Anglais: And the sons of Jerahmeel the firstborn of Hezron were, Ram the firstborn, and Bunah, and Oren, and Ozem, and Ahijah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Yerahmeel, ma vuɗi jewna vi Hesron kayni Ram, bugolda Buna, Oren hiɗi Otsem, Ahiya.
Bulu: Bone be Yérahmeél, ntôle mone Etsroñ, be mbe: Ram, ntôle mon, Buna, Orén a Otsem, Ahiya.
Guiziga: Yerayel, modogom ngi Hesroŋ, a yi ziri mizileheye, i ti: Ram modogom naŋ, aseˀe i Buna, Oreŋ, Osem ati Ahiya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Yerahameel, afo Hesruunu ngoni: Ram, afo maako e Buna e Oren e Ocem e Ahiya.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Yerahameel, afo Hesruunu ngoni: Ram, afo maako e Buna e Oren e Ocem e Ahiya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Yerameɛl kaya-bem ko Hɛsrɔŋ nɛ́ Ram nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ kaya-bem, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Buna, Orɛŋ, Osɛm in Ahiya.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Yerameɛl kaya-bem ko Hɛsrɔŋ nɛ́ Ram nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ kaya-bem, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Buna, Orɛŋ, Osɛm in Ahiya.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ŋwalea Yeramɛyɛl nya kande ghate ta wəzege ta Hɛsron nyi: Ram nya katezhɛa wəzege ta ŋkɛ, Bəwna, Orɛn, Osɛm ba'a Ahiya.
Tupurri: Jar ni Yerameel jag weel Hesron wo diñ: Ram, jag weel äe no, diñ Buna, Oren wo de Otsem, diñ Ahiya.

Francais: Jéraméel eut une autre femme, nommée Athara, qui fut mère d'Onam.
Anglais: Jerahmeel had also another wife, whose name was Atarah; she was the mother of Onam.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yerahmeel sli cat tara'a ya' Atara na'a ti sum Onam.
Bulu: Yerahmeél a nga luʼu minga mfe jôé na: Atara, nye a mbe nyia Onam.
Guiziga: Yerameyel a ɗuv ngwas mekelem le ma, a zilaka Atara, a yi Onam.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yerahameel woodi boo debbo feere, innde maako Atara. Kaŋko woni daada Onam.
Fulfulde_DC: Yerahameel woodi boo debbo feere, innde maako Atara. Kaŋko woni daada Onam.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yerameɛl baa mbe kóò, nin-a nɛ́ Atara; nɛ́ à̧ á̧ koo Onam.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yerameɛl baa mbe kóò, nin-a nɛ́ Atara; nɛ́ à̧ á̧ koo Onam.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Yeramɛyɛl ŋ'wete kwete male nya nza sləa nta kaAtara, ghenta meghekɛa Onam.
Tupurri: Yerameel raw da waçy ma tigriñ, ëu äe ga Atara maga diñ man Onam mono.

Francais: - Les fils de Ram, premier-né de Jéraméel furent Moos, Jamin et Acar.
Anglais: And the sons of Ram the firstborn of Jerahmeel were, Maaz, and Jamin, and Eker.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Ram kayni: Ma vuɗi jewna vi Yerahmeel kayni mi Maas, bugolda Yamin hiɗi Eker.
Bulu: Bone be Ram, ntôle mone Yerahmeél, be mbe na: Maats, yamin a Eker.
Guiziga: Ram, modogom ngi Yerameyele, ziri mizile naŋhay i ti: Maˀas, Yamin waɗ Eker.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Ram, afo Yerahameel ngoni: Ma'as e Yamin e Eker.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Ram, afo Yerahameel ngoni: Ma'as e Yamin e Eker.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Ram kaya-bem ko Yerameɛl nɛ́ Maas, Yamin in Ekɛr.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Ram kaya-bem ko Yerameɛl nɛ́ Maas, Yamin in Ekɛr.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ŋwalea Ram nya katezhɛa wəzege ta Yeramɛyɛl ne, yɛ Ma'as, le Yamin le Ɛkɛr.
Tupurri: Jar ni Ram jag weel Yerameeln wo diñ: Maas, Yamin wo de Ekere.

Francais: - Les fils d'Onam furent: Séméï et Jada. - Fils de Séméï: Nadab et Abisur.
Anglais: And the sons of Onam were, Shammai, and Jada. And the sons of Shammai; Nadab, and Abishur.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Onam kayni Samay hiɗi Yada. Gurona vi Samay: Nadab hiɗi Abisur.
Bulu: Bone bʼOnam be mbe na: Sammayi a Yada. Bone be Sammayi: Nadab a Abisur.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Onamay i ti: Sammay ati Yada. Ziri mizile ngi Sammayay i ti: Nadap ati Abisur.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Onam boo: Sammay e Yada. Ɓiɓɓe Sammay boo: Nadab e Abisuru.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Onam boo: Sammay e Yada. Ɓiɓɓe Sammay boo: Nadab e Abisuru.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Onam nɛ́ Samai in Yada, ɓɛɛ o bem ko Samai nɛ́ Nadab in Abisur.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Onam nɛ́ Samai in Yada, ɓɛɛ o bem ko Samai nɛ́ Nadab in Abisur.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ŋwalea Onam nyi: Shamay le Yada. Ma ŋwalea Shamay ne, yɛ Nadab le Abishəwr.
Tupurri: Jar ni Onam wo diñ: Samay wo de Yoda. Jar ni Samay wo diñ Nahab wo de Abisuri.

Francais: Le nom de la femme d'Abisur était Abihaïl, et elle lui enfanta Ahobban et Molid.
Anglais: And the name of the wife of Abishur was Abihail, and she bare him Ahban, and Molid.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sem cata vi Abisur ala Abihayil, na' vuɗum Akban hiɗi Molid.
Bulu: E minga Abisur a mbe jôé na: Abihayil, nde a nga biaé nye Ahban a Môlid.
Guiziga: Abisuro, ngwas naŋ i Abihayil, a yaŋ Abaŋ ati Molit.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Innde debbo Abisuru, Abihayil. Kaŋko danyani mo Ahaban e Molidi.
Fulfulde_DC: Innde debbo Abisuru, Abihayil. Kaŋko danyani mo Ahaban e Molidi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nin kóò ko Abisur nɛ́ Abihai. A̧ koo Abaŋ in Mɔlid.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nin kóò ko Abisur nɛ́ Abihai. A̧ koo Abaŋ in Mɔlid.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Abishəwr wəmeve Abihayil nya keyake nda yɛ Aban le Molid.
Tupurri: AÈ hay ëe waçy Abisur ga Abihayil, se raw biñ Ahban wo de Molid ne hene.

Francais: Fils de Nadab: Saled et Apphaïm. Saled mourut sans fils.
Anglais: And the sons of Nadab; Seled, and Appaim: but Seled died without children.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Nadab: Seled hiɗi Apayim. Seled mit bay gooro.
Bulu: Bone be Nadab: Séled a Apayim. Séled a nga wu teke mon.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Nadapay i ti: Selet ati Apayim, Selet a muc manja zuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Nadab ngoni: Selet e Appayim. Selet maayi, heɓaay ɓikkoy.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Nadab ngoni: Selet e Appayim. Selet maayi, heɓaay ɓikkoy.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Nadab nɛ́ Sɛlɛd in Apaim. Sɛlɛd fea, bem bo na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Nadab nɛ́ Sɛlɛd in Apaim. Sɛlɛd fea, bem bo na.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ŋwalea Nadab ne, yɛ Sɛlɛd le Apayim. Pa Sɛlɛd mtenyɛ kaɗema keyake wəzege.
Tupurri: Jar ni Nadab wo diñ Seled wo de Apayim. Seled raw hugi go bay weere.

Francais: Fils d'Apphaïm; Jési. Fils de Jési: Sésan.
Anglais: And the sons of Appaim; Ishi. And the sons of Ishi; Sheshan. And the children of Sheshan; Ahlai.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Goora vi Apayim: Yiskey. Goora vi Yiskey: Sesan: Goora vi Sesan: Aklay.
Bulu: Bone be Apayim: Yiseyi. Bone be Yiseyi: Sésan. Bone be Sésan: Alayi.
Guiziga: Mangal ngi Apayim i Iseyi. Mangal ngi Iseyi i Sesaŋ, mangal ngi Sesaŋ i Alay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓii Appayim boo, Yisi. Ɓii Yisi boo, Seesan. Ɓii Seesan boo, Ahilay.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓii Appayim boo, Yisi. Ɓii Yisi boo, Seesan. Ɓii Seesan boo, Ahilay.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bem ko Apai nɛ́ Yisɛi; bem ko Yisɛi nɛ́ Sɛsaŋ; ɓɛɛ bem ko Sɛsaŋ nɛ́ Alai.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bem ko Apai nɛ́ Yisɛi; bem ko Yisɛi nɛ́ Sɛsaŋ; ɓɛɛ bem ko Sɛsaŋ nɛ́ Alai.
Kapsiki_DC: Ishɛyi, wəzege ta Apayim. Shɛshan, wəzege ta Ishɛyi. Alay ŋa Shɛshan.
Tupurri: Je Apayim diñ Yisey, je Yisey diñ Sesan, je Sesam diñ Ahlay.

Francais: Fils de Sesan: Oholaï. - Fils de Jada, frère de Séméï: Jéther et Jonathan.
Anglais: And the sons of Jada the brother of Shammai; Jether, and Jonathan: and Jether died without children.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Yada, ɓosiyom Samayna: Yeter hiɗi Yonatan. Yeter mit bay gooro.
Bulu: Bone be yada, monyañe Sammayi: Yéter a Yônatan. Yéter a nga wu teke mon.
Guiziga: Yada, sukum ngi Sammaya, ziri mizile naŋhay i ti: Yeter ati Yonataŋ. Yeter a muc manja zuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Yada, deerɗu Sammay ngoni: Yeter e Yonatan. Yeter maayi, heɓaay ɓikkoy.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Yada, deerɗu Sammay ngoni: Yeter e Yonatan. Yeter maayi, heɓaay ɓikkoy.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Yada nya Samai nɛ́ Yɛtɛr in Yɔnataŋ. Yɛtɛr fea, bem bo na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Yada nya Samai nɛ́ Yɛtɛr in Yɔnataŋ. Yɛtɛr fea, bem bo na.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ŋwalea Yada, wəza meghekɛa Shamay ne, yɛ Yɛtɛr le Yonatan. Pa Yɛtɛr mtenyɛ kaɗema wəzege ve.
Tupurri: Jar ni Yada hen Samayn wo diñ: Yeter wo de Jonatañ, Yeter kal hugi go bay weere.

Francais: Jéther mourut sans fils. Fils de Jonathan: Phaleth et Ziza. - Ce sont là les fils de Jéraméel.
Anglais: And the sons of Jonathan; Peleth, and Zaza. These were the sons of Jerahmeel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Yonatan: Pelet hiɗi Zaza. Nisi kayni si gurona vi Yerahmeel.
Bulu: Bone be Yônatan: Pélét a Zaza. Bone be Yérahmeél mbe le.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Yonataŋhaya i ti: Pelet ati Zaza. Dideˀ ngi Yerameyeley i taŋ so.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Yonatan boo: Pelet e Zaaza. Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Yerahameel.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Yonatan boo: Pelet e Zaaza. Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Yerahameel.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Yɔnataŋ nɛ́ Pɛlɛt in Zaza. O bezaŋ Yerameɛl nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Yɔnataŋ nɛ́ Pɛlɛt in Zaza. O bezaŋ Yerameɛl nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ŋwalea Yonatan ne, yɛ Pɛlɛt le Zaza. Tsagha se hwelefe ta Yeramɛyɛl.
Tupurri: Jar ni Jonatañ wo diñ Peled wo de Sasa. Mo na diñ jar ni Yerameel wo so.

Francais: - Sésan n'eut pas de fils, mais il eut des filles. Il avait un esclave Égyptien, nommé Jéraa;
Anglais: Now Sheshan had no sons, but daughters. And Sheshan had a servant, an Egyptian, whose name was Jarha.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sesan may vuɗ guro sa jufayɗi, may nam vuɗsi si guro sa boyo. Sesan ka hiɗi gorvo ma Egipte kep yum ala Yarha.
Bulu: Sésan a nji bi bobefam, ve a nga bili bobebinga. Sésan a nga bili ôlo ô too mon Ejiptieñ jôé na Yara.
Guiziga: Sesaŋ a yi ziri mizileheye ta, sey mongosohoy. Beke naŋ, mbur Ezipte ada, a zilaka Yara.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa Seesan walaa ɓiɓɓe worɓe, sey rewɓe. Seesan woodi maccuɗo Misraajo, innde maako Yarha.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa Seesan walaa ɓiɓɓe worɓe, sey rewɓe. Seesan woodi maccuɗo Misraajo, innde maako Yarha.
