KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛsaŋ bo so kɔ‘i nɛ̀ be-wiwii na, kànà nɛ́ o be-okoo ɓɛɛ. Sɛsaŋ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ bara be Egiptɛ, nin-a nɛ́ Yara.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛsaŋ bo so kɔ‘i nɛ̀ be-wiwii na, kànà nɛ́ o be-okoo ɓɛɛ. Sɛsaŋ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ bara be Egiptɛ, nin-a nɛ́ Yara.
Kapsiki_DC: Kese wəzege teza va Shɛshan we, deke ŋwalea kwɛ. Nde Ɛzhipte nya nza sləa ŋkɛ kaYara se nde mene slene ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Sesan hay biñ weel ma twar gaa, aà hay biñ diñ mayre wo. Je Ejipte po hay diñ gebe Sesan, aè hay ëe ge äe ga Yarha.

Francais: il lui donna sa fille pour femme, et elle lui enfanta Ethéï.
Anglais: And Sheshan gave his daughter to Jarha his servant to wife; and she bare him Attai.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sesan vul goota valam mi Yarha ma gorvona valamu, na' vuɗum Attay.
Bulu: Sésan a nga ve Yara, ôlo vié ngo jé a luʼu je; ngon éte é nga biaé nye Atayi.
Guiziga: Sesaŋ a vulaŋ zuŋ naŋ ɓa a ɗuvaŋ. Zuŋ tuwa, a yi mangal mizile, a zilaka Atay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Seesan te'ni maccuɗo muuɗum Yarha ɓiyum debbo. Kaŋko o danyani mo Attay.
Fulfulde_DC: Seesan te'ni maccuɗo muuɗum Yarha ɓiyum debbo. Kaŋko o danyani mo Attay.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛsaŋ ha̧a̧ boko-bem kɔ‘i nɛ̀ kóò ha̧ Yara bara kɔ‘i, kó nɛ̀ Atai.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛsaŋ ha̧a̧ boko-bem kɔ‘i nɛ̀ kóò ha̧ Yara bara kɔ‘i, kó nɛ̀ Atai.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Shɛshan ndeke nda kwete wəzha ta ŋkɛ kamale ke nde mene slene ta ŋkɛ Yara, pa nde yave nda Atay kawəzege teza.
Tupurri: Sesan raw haç may äe ne Yarha gebe äen waçy, may sen raw biñ Atay ne hene.

Francais: Ethéï engendra Nathan; Nathan engendra Zabad;
Anglais: And Attai begat Nathan, and Nathan begat Zabad,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Attay vuɗ Natan, Natan vuɗ Zabad;
Bulu: Atayi a nga biaé Natan, Natan a nga biaé Zabad;
Guiziga: Atay a yi Nataŋ, Nataŋ a yi Zabat,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Attay danyi Natan, Natan danyi Zabada,
Fulfulde_DC: Attay danyi Natan, Natan danyi Zabada,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Atai koo Nataŋ, Nataŋ koo Zabad,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Atai koo Nataŋ, Nataŋ koo Zabad,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Atay yake Natan, pa Natan yake Zabad.
Tupurri: Atay raw biñ Natañ, Natañ raw biñ Sabade

Francais: Zabad engendra Ophlal; Ophlal engendra Obed;  Obed engendra Jéhu;
Anglais: And Zabad begat Ephlal, and Ephlal begat Obed,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Zabad vuɗ Eflal, Eflal vuɗ Obed;
Bulu: Zabad a nga biaé Eflal; Eflal a nga biaé Obéd;
Guiziga: Zabat a yi Eflal, Eflal a yi Obet.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Zabada danyi Efilal, Efilal danyi Obet,
Fulfulde_DC: Zabada danyi Efilal, Efilal danyi Obet,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Zabal koo Ɛflal, ɓɛɛ Ɛfla ko Obɛd.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Zabal koo Ɛflal, ɓɛɛ Ɛfla ko Obɛd.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Zabad yake Ɛflal. Pa Ɛflal yake Obɛd.
Tupurri: Sabad raw biñ Eflal, Eflal kal biñ Obede

Francais: Jéhu engendra Azarias;
Anglais: And Obed begat Jehu, and Jehu begat Azariah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Obed vuɗ Yehu, Yehu vuɗ Azariya;
Bulu: Obéd a nga biaé Yéhu; Yéhu a nga biaé Azaria;
Guiziga: Obet a yi Yehu, Yehu a yi Azariya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Obet danyi Yeehu, Yeehu danyi Azariya,
Fulfulde_DC: Obet danyi Yeehu, Yeehu danyi Azariya,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Obɛd koo Yɛhu, Yɛhu koo Azaria,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Obɛd koo Yɛhu, Yɛhu koo Azaria,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Obɛd yake Yɛhəw. Pa Yɛhəw yake Azariya.
Tupurri: Obed raw biñ Jehu, Jehu kal biñ Asariya,

Francais: Azarias engendra Hellès; Hellès engendra Elasa;
Anglais: And Azariah begat Helez, and Helez begat Eleasah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Azariya vuɗ Heles, Heles vuɗ Elaza;
Bulu: Azaria a nga biaé Hélét; Hélét a nga biaé Elasa;
Guiziga: Azariya a yi Heles, Heles a yi Elasa,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Azariya danyi Heeles, Heeles danyi El'aasa,
Fulfulde_DC: Azariya danyi Heeles, Heeles danyi El'aasa,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Azaria koo Hɛlɛs, Hɛlɛs koo Ɛlɛasa,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Azaria koo Hɛlɛs, Hɛlɛs koo Ɛlɛasa,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Azariya yake Hɛlɛs. Pa Hɛlɛs yake Ɛlasa.
Tupurri: Asariya, raw biñ Heles, Heles raw biñ Elasa,

Francais: Elasa engendra Sisamoï; Sisamoï engendra Sellum;
Anglais: And Eleasah begat Sisamai, and Sisamai begat Shallum,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Elaza vuɗ Sismay, Sismay vuɗ Sallum;
Bulu: Elasa a nga biaé Sismayi; Sismayi a nga biaé Salum;
Guiziga: Elasa a yi Sismay, Sismay a yi Salum,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: El'aasa danyi Sismay, Sismay danyi Sallum,
Fulfulde_DC: El'aasa danyi Sismay, Sismay danyi Sallum,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛlɛasa koo Sismai, Sismai koo Salum,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛlɛasa koo Sismai, Sismai koo Salum,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Ɛlasa yake Sismay. Pa Sismay yake Shaləwm.
Tupurri: Elasa raw biñ Sismay, Sismay kal biñ Salum.

Francais: Sellum engendra Icamias, et Icamias engendra Elisama.
Anglais: And Shallum begat Jekamiah, and Jekamiah begat Elishama.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sallum vuɗ Yekamiya, Yekamiya vuɗ Elisama.
Bulu: Salum a nga biaé Yekamya; Yekamya a nga biaé Elisama.
Guiziga: Salum a yi Yekamiya, yo Yekamiya kwana, a yi Elisama.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sallum danyi Yekamiya, Yekamiya danyi Eliisama.
Fulfulde_DC: Sallum danyi Yekamiya, Yekamiya danyi Eliisama.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Salum koo Yekamia, ɓɛɛ Yɛkamia ko Elisama.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Salum koo Yekamia, ɓɛɛ Yɛkamia ko Elisama.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Shaləwm yake Yɛkamiya. Pa Yɛkamiya yake Ɛlishama.
Tupurri: Salum kal biñ Yekamiya, Yekamiya raw biñ Elisama.

Francais: Fils de Caleb, frère de Jéraméel: Mésa, son premier-né, qui fut père de Ziph, et les fils de Marésa, père d'Hébron.
Anglais: Now the sons of Caleb the brother of Jerahmeel were, Mesha his firstborn, which was the father of Ziph; and the sons of Mareshah the father of Hebron.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Kaleb ɓasum Yerahmeel: Meka goora valam ma vuɗi jewna, namu mi bum Zif, hiɗi gurona vi Maresa bum Hebron.
Bulu: Bone be Kaléb, monyañe Yerahmeél: Mésa, ntôle mone wé, nye a mbe ésaa Zif, a bone be Marésa, ésaa Ebroñ.
Guiziga: Kalep, sukum ngi Yeramiyele, ziri mizile naŋhay ani: modogom i Mesa, a yi Zif, yo Maresa kwana, a yi Hebroŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Kaaleb, deerɗiraawo Yerahameel ngoni: Afo maako, Meesa, baaba Zif e ɓiɓɓe Maresa, baaba Heburuun.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Kaaleb, deerɗiraawo Yerahameel ngoni: Afo maako, Meesa, baaba Zif e ɓiɓɓe Maresa, baaba Heburuun.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Kalɛb nya Yerameɛl nɛ́ Mɛsa, kaya-bem nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ dáà ko Zif, in Marɛsa, dáà ko Hebrɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Kalɛb nya Yerameɛl nɛ́ Mɛsa, kaya-bem nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ dáà ko Zif, in Marɛsa, dáà ko Hebrɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ŋwalea Kalɛb, wəza meghekɛa Yeramɛyɛl ne, Mɛsha nya katezhɛa wəzege ta ŋkɛ, gheŋkɛ yitenyɛa Zif. Ma hwelefe ta Marɛsha, ghenci kase mbe Hɛbron.
Tupurri: Jar ni Kaleb hen Yerameeln wo diñ: Mesa jag weel äe maga joñ diñ pan Sif wo de jar ni Marera pan Hebroñn wo.

Francais: - Fils d'Hébron: Coré, Thaphua, Récem et Samma.
Anglais: And the sons of Hebron; Korah, and Tappuah, and Rekem, and Shema.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Hebron: Korah, Tappuwa, Rekem hiɗi Sema.
Bulu: Bone bʼEbroñ: Kôra, Tapua, Rékém a Sema.
Guiziga: Ziri ngi Hebroŋhoy i ti: Kora, Tapuwa, Rekem waɗ Sema.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Heburuun boo: Koora e Tappuha e Rekem e Sema.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Heburuun boo: Koora e Tappuha e Rekem e Sema.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Hɛbrɔŋ nɛ́ Kɔra, Tapua, Rɛkɛm in Sɛma.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Hɛbrɔŋ nɛ́ Kɔra, Tapua, Rɛkɛm in Sɛma.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ŋwalea Hɛbron, yɛ Kora le Tapəwa, le Rɛkɛm le Shɛma.
Tupurri: Jar ni Hebroñ wo diñ: Kora, Tapuwa, Rekem wo de Sema.

Francais: Samma engendra Raham, père de Jercaam; Récem engendra Sammaï.
Anglais: And Shema begat Raham, the father of Jorkoam: and Rekem begat Shammai.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sema vuɗ Raham, bum Yorkeyam, Rekem vuɗ Samay.
Bulu: Sema a nga biaé Raham, ésaa Yorkeam. Rékém a nga biaé Sammayi.
Guiziga: Sema a yi Raham, Raham a yi Yorkoˀam. Rekem a yi Samay,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sema danyi Raham, baaba Yorke'am. Rekem danyi Sammay.
Fulfulde_DC: Sema danyi Raham, baaba Yorke'am. Rekem danyi Sammay.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛma koo Raham dáà ko Yɔrkɛam; Rɛkɛm koo Samai.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛma koo Raham dáà ko Yɔrkɛam; Rɛkɛm koo Samai.
Kapsiki_DC: Shɛma yitenyɛa Raham, Raham yitenyɛa Yorkowam. Rɛkɛm yitenyɛa Shamay.
Tupurri: Sema raw biñ Raham pan Yorkeyam, Yekem kal biñ Samay.

Francais: -Fils de Sammaï: Maon; et Maon fut père de Bethsur.
Anglais: And the son of Shammai was Maon: and Maon was the father of Beth–zur.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Goora vi Samay: Mawon; Mawon namu mi bum Bet-Sur.
Bulu: Bone be Sammayi: Maôn; a Maôn a mbe ésaa Bét-Sur.
Guiziga: Samay a yi Maˀoŋ, Maˀoŋ kwana a yi Bet-Sur.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓii Sammay boo, Ma'on. Ma'on woni baaba Bayti-Cura.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓii Sammay boo, Ma'on. Ma'on woni baaba Bayti-Cura.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bem ko Samai nɛ́ Maɔŋ; ɓɛɛ Maɔŋ duka nɛ́ dáà ko Bɛt-Sur.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bem ko Samai nɛ́ Maɔŋ; ɓɛɛ Maɔŋ duka nɛ́ dáà ko Bɛt-Sur.
Kapsiki_DC: Shamay yitenyɛa Mawon, Mawon yitenyɛa Bɛt-Səwr.
Tupurri: Jar ni Samay wo diñ: Mawon, Mawon diñ pan Bet-Suri.

Francais: - Epha, concubine de Caleb, enfanta Haran, Mosa et Gézez. Haran engendra Gézez.
Anglais: And Ephah, Caleb's concubine, bare Haran, and Moza, and Gazez: and Haran begat Gazez.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Efa, cata-sunda vi Kaleb vuɗ Haran, Motsa hiɗi Gazez. Haran vuɗ Gazez.
Bulu: Efa, ébone Kaléb a nga biaé Harañ, Môtsa a Gazéz. Harañ a nga biaé Gazéz.
Guiziga: Kalepe, ngwas naŋ mangasl ada, a zilaka Efa, a yaŋ Haraŋ, Mosa waɗ Gazes. Haraŋ a ya mangal naŋ, a zilaka Gazes aya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Efa, culaaɗo Kaaleb danyi Haran e Moosa e Gaajes. Haran danyi Gaajes.
Fulfulde_DC: Efa, culaaɗo Kaaleb danyi Haran e Moosa e Gaajes. Haran danyi Gaajes.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem nɛ̀ Kalɛb koo in zɔŋa-kóò kɔ̧-a̧ Eifa nɛ́ Haraŋ, Mɔsa in Gazɛz; Haraŋ koo bem, ɓɛɛ gbar nin Gazɛz ha̧ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem nɛ̀ Kalɛb koo in zɔŋa-kóò kɔ̧-a̧ Eifa nɛ́ Haraŋ, Mɔsa in Gazɛz; Haraŋ koo bem, ɓɛɛ gbar nin Gazɛz ha̧ a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Kalɛb ŋ'wete kwete male meghwa Ɛfa sləa nta, pa nde yake nda Haran, Mosa ba'a Gazɛz. Pa Haran yake wəzege teza kandeke nda slə kaGazɛz perə.
Tupurri: Efa nday Kalebn raw biñ Haran, Motsa wo de Gasese, Haran raw biñ Gasese.

Francais: - Fils de Jahaddaï: Regom, Joathan, Gosan, Phalet, Epha et Saaph.
Anglais: And the sons of Jahdai; Regem, and Jotham, and Geshan, and Pelet, and Ephah, and Shaaph.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Yahday: Regem, Yotam, Gesan, Pelet, Efa hiɗi Saaf.
Bulu: Bone be Yadayi: Régém, Yôtam, Gésan, Pelét, Efa a Saaf.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Yadayay i ti: Regem, Yotam, Gesaŋ, Pelet, Efa waɗ Saˀaf.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Yaaday ngoni: Regem e Yotam e Geesan e Pelet e Efa e Sa'af.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Yaaday ngoni: Regem e Yotam e Geesan e Pelet e Efa e Sa'af.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Yadai nɛ́ Rɛgɛm, Yɔtam, Gɛsaŋ, Pɛlɛt, Eifa in Saf.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Yadai nɛ́ Rɛgɛm, Yɔtam, Gɛsaŋ, Pɛlɛt, Eifa in Saf.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ŋwalea Yaday: yɛ Rɛgɛm, Yotam, Gɛshan, Pɛlɛt, le Sha'af.
Tupurri: Jar ni Yahday wo diñ: Regem, Yotam, Gesan, Peled, Efa wo de Saaf.

Francais: - Maacha, concubine de Caleb, enfanta Saber et Tharana.
Anglais: Maachah, Caleb's concubine, bare Sheber, and Tirhanah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Maaka, cata-sunda vi Kaleb vuɗ Keber hiɗi Tirhana.
Bulu: Maaka, ébone Kaléb, a nga biaé Séber a Tirhana.
Guiziga: Kalepe, ngwas naŋ mangasl mekelem ada ma, a zilaka Maˀaka. A yaŋ Seber ati Tirana.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ma'aka, culaaɗo Kaaleb danyi Seber e Tirhana.
Fulfulde_DC: Ma'aka, culaaɗo Kaaleb danyi Seber e Tirhana.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓii zɔŋa-kóò ko Kalɛb, Maka koo Sɛbɛr in Tirana.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓii zɔŋa-kóò ko Kalɛb, Maka koo Sɛbɛr in Tirana.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Kalɛb ŋ'wete kwete meghwa Ma'aka sləa nta, pa yake nda ŋwale: yɛ Shɛbɛr le Tirana
Tupurri: Maaka, nday Kalebn raw biñ Seber wo de Tirhana.

Francais: Elle enfanta encore Saaph, père de Madména, Sué, père de Machbéna et père de Gabaa. La fille de Caleb était Achsa.
Anglais: She bare also Shaaph the father of Madmannah, Sheva the father of Machbenah, and the father of Gibea: and the daughter of Caleb was Achsah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lo na' vuɗ Saaf bum Madmanna hiɗi Seva bum Makbena hiɗi bum Gibeya. Goota vi Kaleb ya' Aksa.
Bulu: A nga biaé fe Saaf, ésaa Madmana a Seva ésaa Makbéna a ésaa Gibéa. Ngone Kaléb é mbe Aksa.
Guiziga: A zikam ma na, Maˀaka a yaŋ Saˀaf, cine ngi Matmana waɗ Seva cine ngi Makbena ati Gibeya. Kalep a yi zuŋ mongoso le pal, a zilaka Aksa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden o danyi Sa'af, baaba Madamanna e Sewu, baaba Makabena e baaba Gibiya. Ɓii Kaaleb debbo boo, Aksa.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden o danyi Sa'af, baaba Madamanna e Sewu, baaba Makabena e baaba Gibiya. Ɓii Kaaleb debbo boo, Aksa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ ɗoŋ, a̧ koo Saaf dáà ko Madmana, in Sɛwa dáà ko Makbɛna in Gibea. Boko-bem ko Kalɛb duka so nɛ́ Aksa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ ɗoŋ, a̧ koo Saaf dáà ko Madmana, in Sɛwa dáà ko Makbɛna in Gibea. Boko-bem ko Kalɛb duka so nɛ́ Aksa.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwetere wəmbəa ŋkɛ, pa zhɛne kayake yɛ Sha'af nya kayitenyɛa Madmana ba'a Sheva nya kayitenyɛa yɛ Makbɛna le Gibɛya. Aksa sləa wəzha ta Kalɛb.
Tupurri: Se biñ pa diñ: Saaf pan Madmana wo de Sefa, pan Makbena wo de Gibeya. May mani Kalebn hay diñ Aksa.

Francais: Ceux-ci furent fils de Caleb. Fils de Hur, premier-né d'Ephrata: Sobal, père de Cariathiarim;
Anglais: These were the sons of Caleb the son of Hur, the firstborn of Ephratah; Shobal the father of Kirjath–jearim,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si gurona vi Kaleb: Sobal goora vi Hur, ma vuɗi jewna vi Efrata, bum Kiryat-Yeyarim;
Bulu: Bana be mbe bone be Kaléb: Kôbal, e mone Hur, ntôle mone Efrata a ésaa Kiryat-Yearim.
Guiziga: Kalepe, dideˀ naŋ mekelemey ada ma, i ti: Hur, i modogom ngi ngwas naŋ mazilaka Efrata. Hur a yi ziri mizile mekelemey le makir, i ti: Sobal mipa hirwuy Kiriyat-Yeˀarim,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Kaaleb. Ɓiɓɓe Huuru, afo Efratu debbo Kaaleb ngoni: Sobal, baaba Kiriyat-Ye'arim
Fulfulde_DC: Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Kaaleb. Ɓiɓɓe Huuru, afo Efratu debbo Kaaleb ngoni: Sobal, baaba Kiriyat-Ye'arim
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa nɔ‘i nɛ́ o bem ko Kalɛb. O bem ko Hur kaya-bem ko Efrata nɛ́ Sɔbal, wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Kiriat-Yearim,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa nɔ‘i nɛ́ o bem ko Kalɛb. O bem ko Hur kaya-bem ko Efrata nɛ́ Sɔbal, wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Kiriat-Yearim,
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi kweci nyi ŋwalea Kalɛb: pa Həwr nya katezhɛa wəzege ta male ta ŋkɛ Ɛfrata, mahekene ŋwale ve: yɛ Shobal nya keŋslete meleme ta Kiriyat-Yɛyarim,
Tupurri: Jar ma kay wo diñ jar ni Kaleb wo: Sobal je ni Hur jag weel Efrata, pan Kiryat-Yearim no,

Francais: Salma, père de Bethléem; Hariph, père de Bethgader.
Anglais: Salma the father of Beth–lehem, Hareph the father of Beth–gader.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Salma, bum Betlehem, Haref bum Bet-Gader.
Bulu: Salma, ésaa Bétléhém, Haréf, ésaa Bét-Gédér.
Guiziga: Salma, mipa hirwuy Betelyem, waɗ Haref mipa hirwuy Bet-Geder.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Salma, baaba Baytilaama e Haref, baaba Bayti-Gader.
Fulfulde_DC: e Salma, baaba Baytilaama e Haref, baaba Bayti-Gader.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Salma, wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Bɛtlɛhɛm, in Harɛf, wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Bɛt-Gadɛr mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Salma, wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Bɛtlɛhɛm, in Harɛf, wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Bɛt-Gadɛr mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Salma nya keŋslete Bɛtelɛhɛm ba'a Harɛf nya keŋslete Bɛt-Gɛdɛr.
Tupurri: Salma, pan Betlehem Haref, pan Bet-Gadere.

Francais: - Les fils de Sobal, père de Cariathiarim, furent: Haroé, Hatsi-Hamménuhoth.
Anglais: And Shobal the father of Kirjath–jearim had sons; Haroeh, and half of the Manahethites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Sobal bum Kiryat-Yeyarim kayni: Harowe, Hatsi-Hamenuhot.
Bulu: Bone be Kôbal, ésaa Kiryat-Yearim be mbe na: Harôé Hatsi-Hammenuhôt.
Guiziga: Sobal mipa hirwuy Kiriyat-Yeˀarim tuwa, dideˀ naŋhay i mizli ngi ruwuy Harowe waɗ reta ngi ruwuy Menuhot,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Sobal, baaba Kiriyat-Ye'arim ngoni: Haroye e reeta Manooha'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Sobal, baaba Kiriyat-Ye'arim ngoni: Haroye e reeta Manooha'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɔbal duka so nɛ́ wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Kiriat-Yearim; a̧ nɛ́ dáà ko Harɔe, in zɔmdáa o ko reeta be Mana,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɔbal duka so nɛ́ wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Kiriat-Yearim; a̧ nɛ́ dáà ko Harɔe, in zɔmdáa o ko reeta be Mana,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma Shobal nya keŋslete meleme ta Kiriyat-Yɛyarim, na ŋ'wete hwelefe kaka ka shihɛnyɛ: mbeli nyi mbe Harowɛ le kwete bela ta mbeli nyi mbe Mɛnəwhot,
Tupurri: Jar ni Sobal pan Kiryat-Yearim wo diñ: Harowe, Hatsi-Hamenuhod.

Francais: Les familles de Cariathiarim, furent: les Jethréens, les Aphuthéens, les Sémathéens et les Maséréens. D'eux sont sortis les Saréens et les Esthaoliens.
Anglais: And the families of Kirjath–jearim; the Ithrites, and the Puhites, and the Shumathites, and the Mishraites; of them came the Zorathites, and the Eshtaulites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa hay vuɗna vi Kiryat-Yeyarim kayni: Sa Yeteriyena, sa Puriyena, sa Sumatiyena, hiɗi sa Mikrayena; sum sa Soreyatna hiɗi sum sa Ektawolla may goy hay nisi pa.
Bulu: Mebum me bôte me Kiryat-Yearim me mbe na: Beyetérieñ, Bepurieñ, Bekumatieñ a Bemikrayieñ; E ne Besoréatieñ be nge so be nalé fe Beéktaôlieñ.
Guiziga: yo muy naŋhay ngi ruwuy kiriyat-Yeˀarime, i mizli Itrihey, Putihey, Sumatihey waɗ Miserayay mipam zleˀe a Sora ati Esataˀol.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ci'e nder danygol Kiriyat-Ye'arim ngoni: Yitiri'en e Puti'en e Sumati'en e Misirayi'en. Haa maɓɓe yimɓe Cor'a e Estawol iwi.
Fulfulde_DC: Ci'e nder danygol Kiriyat-Ye'arim ngoni: Yitiri'en e Puti'en e Sumati'en e Misirayi'en. Haa maɓɓe yimɓe Cor'a e Estawol iwi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: in zɔmdáa ko o be nú-gara Kiriat-Yearim: mɛ̀ nɛ́ o be Yitri, o be Put, o be Suma in o be Misrai. O be Sɔrɛa in o be Ɛstaɔl gboo nɛ̀ tɛ wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: in zɔmdáa ko o be nú-gara Kiriat-Yearim: mɛ̀ nɛ́ o be Yitri, o be Put, o be Suma in o be Misrai. O be Sɔrɛa in o be Ɛstaɔl gboo nɛ̀ tɛ wa.
Kapsiki_DC: zlaɓe le yɛ yita nyi mbe Kiriyat-Yɛyarim, gezete ŋkɛ: yɛ ka Itri, ka Pəwt, ka Shəwmat le ka Mishra. Shave mbe hɛ shave mbeli nyi mbe Tsorɛyat le nyi mbe Ɛshetawol.
Tupurri: Moobe ma Kiryat-Yearimn wo diñ: Jar Yetrid wo, jar Putid wo, jar Sumatid wo de jar Misrayid wo. Jar Soreya wo de jarn Estowa laa wo le go na see äaara.

Francais: -Fils de Salma: Bethléem et les Nétophatiens, Ataroth-Beth-Joab, moitié des Manachtiens, les Saréens,
Anglais: The sons of Salma; Beth–lehem, and the Netophathites, Ataroth, the house of Joab, and half of the Manahethites, the Zorites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Salma: Betlehem hiɗi sa Netofana, Arotbet-Yowab, Hatsi-Hamanati, sa Soreyena;
Bulu: Bone be Salma: Bétléhém a Benetôfatieñ, Arrôt-Bét-Yôab, Hatsi-Hammanati, Besoréieñ;
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Salmahay i mizli ngi ruwuy Betelyemey, ngi Netofa, ngi Atrot-Bet-Yoˀap waɗ reta ngi mizli ngi ruwuy Manahat ati ngi Sorahay
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Salma ngoni: Baytilaama e Netofa'en e Atarot-Bayti-Yo'ab e reeta Manooha'en e Cor'i'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Salma ngoni: Baytilaama e Netofa'en e Atarot-Bayti-Yo'ab e reeta Manooha'en e Cor'i'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Salma nɛ́ o be Bɛtlɛhɛm, o be Nɛtɔfa, o be Atrɔt-Bɛt-Yɔab, reeta o be Mana, o be Sorɛi,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Salma nɛ́ o be Bɛtlɛhɛm, o be Nɛtɔfa, o be Atrɔt-Bɛt-Yɔab, reeta o be Mana, o be Sorɛi,
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi hwelefe nyi kesawa mbe Salma nyi: ka Bɛtelɛhɛm, ka Netofa, ka Atrot-Bɛt-Yowab, kwete bela ta ka Manahat, nyi mbe Sora,
Tupurri: Jar ni Salma wo diñ: Betlehem wo de jar Netofa wo, diñ Arot-Bet-Jowabe, Hatsi-Hamanati, jar Soreyid wo,

Francais: ainsi que les familles des Scribes demeurant à Jabès, savoir, les Thiratiens, les Schimathiens et les Sucathiens. Ce sont les Cinéens, issus de Hamath, père de la maison de Réchab.
Anglais: And the families of the scribes which dwelt at Jabez; the Tirathites, the Shimeathites, and Suchathites. These are the Kenites that came of Hemath, the father of the house of Rechab.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hiɗi jafna vi sa wi ɗota sa ka li ziy hay Yayebes, sa Tireyatna, sa Simeyatna, hiɗi sa Sukkatna. Nisi kayni si sa Keniyena, nisi may goy hay Hamat, bum jafna vi Rekab pa.
Bulu: Mebum me bôt me betili bekalate me nga too Yaébét Betiréatieñ, Besiméatieñ a Besukatieñ. Be mbe Bekénieñ, be soʼo be Hamat ésaa nda bôte Rékab.
Guiziga: waɗ sukwi ngi mizli muwuna slimiɗey misi a ruwuy Yabes, i mizli Tirahay, Simahay waɗ Sukahay. Taŋ i mizli Kenihey, a boko tivi Hamat, dideˀ ngi Rekapihey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Geɓe nder lenyol winndooɓe jooɗiiɓe haa Ya'bes ngoni: Tirati'en e Simati'en e Sukati'en. Kamɓe ngoni Keni'en iwɓe haa Hammat, baaba saare Rekab.
Fulfulde_DC: Geɓe nder lenyol winndooɓe jooɗiiɓe haa Ya'bes ngoni: Tirati'en e Simati'en e Sukati'en. Kamɓe ngoni Keni'en iwɓe haa Hammat, baaba saare Rekab.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: in o be nú-gara Sɔfri nɛ̀ ɔ ye Yɛbɛs, o be Tirat, o be Simɛa, o be Sukat. Wa nɛ́ o be Kɛn, o bezaŋ Hamat nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ zɔmdáa ko o bíí nutua ko Rɛkab.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: in o be nú-gara Sɔfri nɛ̀ ɔ ye Yɛbɛs, o be Tirat, o be Simɛa, o be Sukat. Wa nɛ́ o be Kɛn, o bezaŋ Hamat nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ zɔmdáa ko o bíí nutua ko Rɛkab.
Kapsiki_DC: le yita ta ka rafe wəshi nyi mbe Yabɛs kala ka Tirat, ka Shəwmat le ka Səwkat. Ka Kɛn nyighɛ, hwelefe ta Hamat nya kashia ka yita ta Rɛkab hɛ.
Tupurri: diñ moobe mani jar Sofrid ma Yeabesn wo, jar Tireyatid wo, jar Simeyatid wo, jar Sukatid wo. Mo na diñ jar Kenid maga laa wo le go see Hamad pan tiñ mani Rekabn mono.

Francais: Voici les fils de David qui lui naquirent à Hébron: le premier-né, Amnon, d'Achinoam de Jezraël; le second, Daniel, d'Abigaïl de Carmel;
Anglais: Now these were the sons of David, which were born unto him in Hebron; the firstborn Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; the second Daniel, of Abigail the Carmelitess:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si gurona vi David sa nam vuɗsi hay Hebron: Ma vuɗi jewna, Amnon, vuɗum ti Ahinowam ta Yisreelta; ma ma'na Daniel, vuɗum ti Abigayil ta Karmelta;
Bulu: Bone be David be nga bialé nye Ebroñ mbe ba: ntô ô mbe jôé na Amon, ba Ahinôam ngone ya Yizrél be nga biaé nye; nyô baa a mbe jôé na Daniel ba Abigayil ya Karmel be nga biaé nye;
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Davitey, naŋ miya taŋ a Hebroŋ, slimiɗ taŋ ani: Modogomo i Amnoŋ, a ya ti Ahinoˀam, zuŋ Zizreyel, Daniyel mijingaˀ naŋ, i mangal ngi Abigayel, zuŋ Karmel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa ɓe'e ngoni ɓiɓɓe Daawuda danyaaɓe haa Heburuun: Amnon, afo maako, innde daada mum Ahino'am mo Yisre'el. Daniyel, ɗiɗaɓo, innde daada mum Abigayil mo Karmel.
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa ɓe'e ngoni ɓiɓɓe Daawuda danyaaɓe haa Heburuun: Amnon, afo maako, innde daada mum Ahino'am mo Yisre'el. Daniyel, ɗiɗaɓo, innde daada mum Abigayil mo Karmel.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem nɛ̀ David koo sɛn Hebrɔŋ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: kaya-a nɛ́ Amnɔŋ bem ko Ahinɔam, zɔŋa Yizreɛl; hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Daniɛl bem ko Abigail, zɔŋa Karmɛl;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem nɛ̀ David koo sɛn Hebrɔŋ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: kaya-a nɛ́ Amnɔŋ bem ko Ahinɔam, zɔŋa Yizreɛl; hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Daniɛl bem ko Abigail, zɔŋa Karmɛl;
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi sləa ŋwalea David nyi keya nyi kwa Hɛbron: Amnon tezhɛa wəzege nya yake Ahinowam, wəzha ta ka Zhizrɛyɛl. Daniyɛl nde bake, wəzege ta Abigayil nya kawəzha ta ka Karmɛl,
Tupurri: Mokay diñ ëu weere maga Dafid biñ ra Hebroñ mono: Jag weel äen diñ Amnon, man äe diñ Ahinawam may Jisreyele ma de äog diñ Danyele, man äe diñ Abigayel may Karmele

Francais: le troisième, Absalom, fils de Maacha, fille de Tholmaï, roi de Gessur; le quatrième, Adonias, fils de Haggith;
Anglais: The third, Absalom the son of Maacah the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur: the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ma ɦidina Absalom, goora vi Maaka, goota vi Talmay, mulla vi Gesur; ma fiɗina, Adoniya, goora vi Haggit;
Bulu: Nyô lale a mbe jôé na Absalom, e mone Maaka, ngone Talmayi, njô bôte ya Gésur; nyô nyini a mbe jôé na Adôniya e mone Agir;
Guiziga: Mimakir taŋ i Absalom, mangal ngi Maˀaka, zuŋ ngi Talmay, buy ngi ruwuy Gesur. Mumufaɗ taŋ i Adoniya, mangal ngi Hagit.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Absalom, tataɓo, innde daada mum Ma'aka ɓii Talmay, Talmay boo o laamiiɗo Gesur. Adoniya, nayaɓo, innde daada mum Haggit.
Fulfulde_DC: Absalom, tataɓo, innde daada mum Ma'aka ɓii Talmay, Talmay boo o laamiiɗo Gesur. Adoniya, nayaɓo, innde daada mum Haggit.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: taar-a nɛ́ Absalɔm, bem ko Maka, boko-bem ko Talmai wannu Gɛsur; naar-a nɛ́ Adɔnias bem ko Hagit;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: taar-a nɛ́ Absalɔm, bem ko Maka, boko-bem ko Talmai wannu Gɛsur; naar-a nɛ́ Adɔnias bem ko Hagit;
Kapsiki_DC: Absalom nde mahekene nya yake Ma'aka nya kawəzha ta Talmay, meghea ka Gɛshəwr. Adoniya nya yake Hagite, nde wəfaɗe.
Tupurri: ma de swa'n diñ Absalom, man äe diñ Maaka may mani Talmay wañ Gesur no ma de naan diñ Adonija je ni Hagid no

Francais: le cinquième, Saphatias, d'Abital; le sixième, Jéthraham, d'Egla, sa femme.
Anglais: The fifth, Shephatiah of Abital: the sixth, Ithream by Eglah his wife.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ma vaslna, Sefatiya, vuɗum ti Abital; ma karkiyana Yitreyam, vuɗum ti cata valam Egla.
Bulu: Nyô tane a mbe jôé na Sefatia, ba Abital be nga biaé nye; nyô samane a mbe jôé na Yitream, ba minga wé Agla be nga biaé nye.
Guiziga: Muzlum taŋ i Sefatiya, mangal ngi Abital. Mimerkeɗ taŋ i Itreˀam, a ya ti gwas naŋ Egla.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sefatiya, njowaɓo, innde daada mum Abital. Yitiriyam, njoweegoojo, innde daada mum Egila, debbo Daawuda.
Fulfulde_DC: Sefatiya, njowaɓo, innde daada mum Abital. Yitiriyam, njoweegoojo, innde daada mum Egila, debbo Daawuda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: mɔɔrɔ-a nɛ́ Sɛfatia bem ko Abital; mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a nɛ́ Yitrɛam, bem ko Ɛgla nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ ŋma kóò kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: mɔɔrɔ-a nɛ́ Sɛfatia bem ko Abital; mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a nɛ́ Yitrɛam, bem ko Ɛgla nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ ŋma kóò kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Shefatiya nde mcɛfe, Abital meghekɛ. Itrɛyam nde ŋkwaŋe, Ɛgla meghekɛ, kwete nde male ta meghe perə.
Tupurri: ma de dween diñ Sefatiya, man äe diñ Abitale ma de hiira'n diñ Yitreyam, man äe diñ Egla waçy Dafid no.

Francais: Ces six lui naquirent à Hébron, où il régna sept ans et six mois; puis il régna trente-trois ans à Jérusalem.
Anglais: These six were born unto him in Hebron; and there he reigned seven years and six months: and in Jerusalem he reigned thirty and three years.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Guro nisi sa karkiyan cani nam vuɗsi hay Hebron. Nam ti mulda hay Hebron ir busat siɗiya hiɗi til karkiya, nam ti mulda hay Yerusalem ir busat dok-ɦidi yam ɦidi may.
Bulu: Bone bete besaman be nga bialé nye Ebroñ; a nga jôô Ebroñ valé mimbu zamgbwa a ngon ésaman, wôna a nga jôô ki e Yérusalém mimbu mewôm mela a mila.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile mimerkeɗ tayna, a ya ka taŋ angi vi tarnaˀ ti reta, ngi Davit muzum di buy a Hebroŋ. A dirba nah, a gi vi kukur makir ti makir ar li zumabuy a Zeruzaleme ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Daawuda njoweego ɓe'e fuu ndanyaama haa Heburuun. Daawuda laami ton duuɓi joweeɗiɗi e lebbi joweego. Nden o laami haa Urusaliima duuɓi cappanɗe tati e tati .
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Daawuda njoweego ɓe'e fuu ndanyaama haa Heburuun. Daawuda laami ton duuɓi joweeɗiɗi e lebbi joweego. Nden o laami haa Urusaliima duuɓi cappanɗe tati e tati .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa koo wa mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk lɛŋ sɛn Hebrɔŋ ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan hi̧i̧ tɛ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ reeta. A̧ ɔɔ wan sɛn Jerusalɛm tɛ pɛ ɓu-taar-zua-taar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa koo wa mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk lɛŋ sɛn Hebrɔŋ ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan hi̧i̧ tɛ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ reeta. A̧ ɔɔ wan sɛn Jerusalɛm tɛ pɛ ɓu-taar-zua-taar.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa Hɛbron yake ŋwale nyi ŋkwaŋe nyighɛ ŋkɛ mbe va nyi menete ŋkɛ te meghe mberefaŋe pa tere ŋkwaŋe kwa. Kwetere wəmbəa ŋkɛ, va mahekenemsə mahekeneghəmbe menete ŋkɛ te meghe mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm.
Tupurri: AÀ biñ weere se hiira'n wo Hebroñ. AÀ joñ wañ Hebroñ ni kiñgi renam de few ti hiira'a, se raw joñ wañ kiñgi do swa' ti swa' Jerusalem.

Francais: Et ceux-ci lui naquirent à Jérusalem:
Anglais: And these were born unto him in Jerusalem; Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, four, of Bath–shua the daughter of Ammiel:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si guro sa nam vuɗsi hay Yerusalemna: Simeya, Sobab, Natan, hiɗi Salomon, guro sa fiɗin lakŋi vuɗsi ti Bat-Suwa goota vi Ammiyel;
Bulu: Bone be nga bialé nye Yérusalém mbe ba: Siméa, Sôbab, Natan a Solômon, ba Bat-sua, ngone Ammiél, be nga biaé benyin;
Guiziga: Ziri naŋ miya taŋ a Zeruzaleme t'ani: Batseba zuŋ ngi Amiyel, a yaŋ ziri mizilehey le mufaɗ: i ti Sima, Sobap, Nataŋ waɗ Salomoŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa ɓe o danyi haa Urusaliima: Sim'a e Sobaba e Natan e Suleymaanu. Daada maɓɓe, Bat-Su'a ɓii Ammiyel debbo. Ɓe nayo .
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa ɓe o danyi haa Urusaliima: Sim'a e Sobaba e Natan e Suleymaanu. Daada maɓɓe, Bat-Su'a ɓii Ammiyel debbo. Ɓe nayo .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem n'aa koo sɛn Jerusalɛm nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Simɛa, Sɔbab, Nataŋ in Salomɔŋ; wa naar lɛŋ nɛ́ bem ko Bat-Sua, boko-bem ko Amiɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem n'aa koo sɛn Jerusalɛm nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Simɛa, Sɔbab, Nataŋ in Salomɔŋ; wa naar lɛŋ nɛ́ bem ko Bat-Sua, boko-bem ko Amiɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ŋwale nyi yake ŋkɛ nyi pelɛ Zhɛrəzalɛm: wəfaɗe nyi yake ŋkɛ hwa Bacɛba, wəzha ta Amiyɛl: Shima, Shobab, Natan le Salomon.
Tupurri: Mokay diñ ëu weere maga se biñ sen wo Jerusalem mono: AÀ wo diñ Simeya, Sobab, Natañ wo de Salomoñ, wo naa diñ jar ni Bat-Suwa, may mani Amiyel no,

Francais: Simmaa, Sobab, Nathan, Salomon, quatre, de Bethsué, fille d'Ammiel;
Anglais: Ibhar also, and Elishama, and Eliphelet,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yibhar, Elisama, Elifelet,
Bulu: Yibhar, Elisama, Elifélét
Guiziga: Davit a yi ziri mizile mekelemey le ngoltir ma, i ti: Ibar, Elisuwa, Elpelet
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Daawuda danyi boo Yibehar e Eliisama e Elifelet
Fulfulde_DC: Daawuda danyi boo Yibehar e Eliisama e Elifelet
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ŋma o bem ko David mbɛt nɛ́ Yibar, Elisua, Elifɛlɛt,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ŋma o bem ko David mbɛt nɛ́ Yibar, Elisua, Elifɛlɛt,
Kapsiki_DC: Mesli yake kweci ŋkɛ ŋwale tezhili: Ibar, Ɛlishəwa, Ɛlpɛlɛt,
Tupurri: diñ Yibhar, Elisama, Elifeled.

Francais: Jébaar, Elisama, Eliphaleth, Nogé, Népheg, Japhia,
Anglais: And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Noga, Nefeg, Yafiya
Bulu: Nôga, Néfég, Yafia,
Guiziga: Noga, Nefek, Yafiya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Nooga e Nefek e Yafiya
Fulfulde_DC: e Nooga e Nefek e Yafiya
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɔga, Nɛfɛg, Yafia,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɔga, Nɛfɛg, Yafia,
Kapsiki_DC: Noga, Nɛfɛg, Yafiya
Tupurri: Noga, Nefeg, Yafiya,

Francais: Elisama, Eliada, Eliphéleth, neuf.
Anglais: And Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Elisama, Elyada hiɗi Elifelet, zleeŋe.
Bulu: Elisama, Eliada a Elifélét, bôt ébu.
Guiziga: Elisama, Elyada waɗ Elifelet.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Eliisama e Eliyada e Elifelet, ɓe njoweenayo.
Fulfulde_DC: e Eliisama e Eliyada e Elifelet, ɓe njoweenayo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Elisama, Eliada in Elifɛlɛt; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Elisama, Eliada in Elifɛlɛt; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar.
Kapsiki_DC: Ɛlishama, Ɛliyada, ba'a Ɛlifɛlɛt.
Tupurri: Elisama, Elyada wo de Elifelede, wo äuy kaawa',

Francais: Ce sont là tous les fils de David, sans compter les fils des concubines. Thamar était leur sœur.
Anglais: These were all the sons of David, beside the sons of the concubines, and Tamar their sister.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kaf kayni si gurona vi David, gurona vi boy sa sunda say hayɗi. Tamar ti ɓasusita.
Bulu: Bese be too bobefam be David, te lañe bobefam a nga biaé e be bibon. Tamar a mbe kale jap.
Guiziga: Mbak ziri tayna le ma na, ngwas naŋ mangaslaya, a yakaŋ ziri mekelemeye le ma, yo a yi zuŋ mongoso le pala ma, a zilaka Tamar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe fuu ɓe ɓiɓɓe Daawuda, ɓiɓɓe sulaaɓe limaaka. Tamar woni deerɗiraawo maɓɓe debbo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe fuu ɓe ɓiɓɓe Daawuda, ɓiɓɓe sulaaɓe limaaka. Tamar woni deerɗiraawo maɓɓe debbo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O be-wiwii nɛ̀ David koo nɛ̀ mɔɔ nɔ‘i, wi tɔr o bem ko o zɔŋa-kóò na. Tamar duka nɛ́ boko-nya-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O be-wiwii nɛ̀ David koo nɛ̀ mɔɔ nɔ‘i, wi tɔr o bem ko o zɔŋa-kóò na. Tamar duka nɛ́ boko-nya-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ɓiyitsa ne, nahe kweci mia ŋkɛ nyi kaka mi meghwa keyake nda ŋwale tezhili perə. Tamar wəzha ta ŋkɛ nya ŋ'wete ŋkɛ hwa hɛ.
Tupurri: diñ jar ni Dafid wo äuy, aè bay de kee weere mani ndere äen wo ni wa. Tamar hay diñ hen äaara ma twaçy no.

Francais: Fils de Salomon: Roboam; Abias, son fils; Asa, son fils; Josaphat, son fils;
Anglais: And Solomon's son was Rehoboam, Abia his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Salomon: Robowam, Abiya, goora valamu, Asa goora valamu, Yosafat goora valamu;
Bulu: E mone Solômon a mbe jôé na Rôbôam; mone Rôbôam a mbe Abiya; mone Abiya a mbe Asa; mone Asa a mbe Yôzafat;
Guiziga: dideˀ ngi Salomoŋhoy migisiŋ gisiŋ i ti: Roboˀam, Abiya, Asa, Zozafat.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa ɓe'e ngoni danygol Suleymaanu: Suleymaanu danyi Robo'am, Robo'am danyi Abiya, Abiya danyi Asa, Asa danyi Yusafat,
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa ɓe'e ngoni danygol Suleymaanu: Suleymaanu danyi Robo'am, Robo'am danyi Abiya, Abiya danyi Asa, Asa danyi Yusafat,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Salomɔŋ nɛ́ Roboam, Abiya, Asa, Josafat,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Salomɔŋ nɛ́ Roboam, Abiya, Asa, Josafat,
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ŋwale nyi yake Salomon nyi: Robowam, Abiya, Asa, Zhozafat,
Tupurri: Jar ni Salomoñ wo diñ: Robowam pan Abiya je Abiya diñ Asa, je Asa diñ Josafad,

Francais: Joram, son fils; Ochozias, son fils; Joas, son fils;
Anglais: Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yoram goora valamu, Ahaziya goora valamu; Yowas goora valamu;
Bulu: mone Yôzafat a mbe Yôram mone Yôram a mbe Ahazia; mone Ahazia a mbe Yôta;
Guiziga: Zoram, Ahaziya, Zoˀas,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yusafat danyi Yehoram, Yehoram danyi Ahaziya, Ahaziya danyi Yo'as,
Fulfulde_DC: Yusafat danyi Yehoram, Yehoram danyi Ahaziya, Ahaziya danyi Yo'as,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yoram Akazias, Jɔas,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yoram Akazias, Jɔas,
Kapsiki_DC: Zhoram, Ɛzɛkiyas, Jowas,
Tupurri: je Josafad diñ Yoram, je Yoram diñ Ahasiya je Ahasiya diñ Jowase,

Francais: Amazias, son fils; Azarias, son fils; Joatham, son fils;
Anglais: Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Amatsiya goora valamu: Azariya goora valamu; Yotam goora valamu;
Bulu: E mone Yôta a mbe Amatsia; e mone Amatsia a mbe Azaria; e mone Azaria a mbe Yôtam;
Guiziga: Amasiya, Azariya, Yotam,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yo'as danyi Amasiya, Amasiya danyi Azariya, Azariya danyi Yotam,
Fulfulde_DC: Yo'as danyi Amasiya, Amasiya danyi Azariya, Azariya danyi Yotam,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Amasia, Azaria, Yɔtam,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Amasia, Azaria, Yɔtam,
Kapsiki_DC: Amasiya, Azariya, Yotam,
Tupurri: je Jowas diñ Amatsiya je Amatsiya diñ Asariya, je Asariya diñ Yotam,

Francais: Achaz, son fils; Ezéchias, son fils; Manassé, son fils;
Anglais: Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ahaz goora valamu; Ezekiyas goora valamu; Manase goora valamu;
Bulu: e mone Yôtam a mbe Ahaz; e mone Ahaz a mbe Ezékias; e mone Ezékias a mbe Manasé
Guiziga: Ahas, Ezekiyas, Manase,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yotam danyi Akas, Akas danyi Hezekiya, Hezekiya danyi Manassa,
Fulfulde_DC: Yotam danyi Akas, Akas danyi Hezekiya, Hezekiya danyi Manassa,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ahaz, Ezɛkias, Manase,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ahaz, Ezɛkias, Manase,
Kapsiki_DC: Ahaz, Ɛzɛkiyas, Manasɛ,
Tupurri: je Yotam diñ Akas, je Akas diñ Esekiyas, je Esekiyas diñ Manase,

Francais: Amon, son fils; Josias, son fils.
Anglais: Amon his son, Josiah his son.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Amon goora valamu; Yosiyas goora valamu;
Bulu: e mone Manasé a mbe Amon; e mone Amon a mbe Yôzias;
Guiziga: Amoŋ waɗ Zoziyas.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Manassa danyi Amon, Amon danyi Yusiya.
Fulfulde_DC: Manassa danyi Amon, Amon danyi Yusiya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Amɔŋ in Josias.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Amɔŋ in Josias.
Kapsiki_DC: Amon le Zhoziyas.
Tupurri: je Manase diñ Amoñ, je Amoñ diñ Josiyase.

Francais: Fils de Josias: le premier-né Johanan; le deuxième, Joakim; le troisième, Sédécias; le quatrième, Sellum.
Anglais: And the sons of Josiah were, the firstborn Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: gurona vi Yosiyas: Ma vuɗi jewna Yohanan; ma ma'na Yehoyakim. Ma ɦidina Sedekiyas; ma fiɗina Sallum.
Bulu: E bone be Yôzias be mbe avale di: ntô ô mbe jôé na Yôhanañ; nyô baa: Yehôyakin; nyô lale: Sédékias; nyô nyini: Salum.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Zoziyasaya, modogomo i Yohanaŋ, minjingaˀ naŋ i Zoˀakim, mimakir taŋ i Sedesiyas, waɗ mumufaɗ taŋ i Salum.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Yusiya ngoni: Yohanan woni afo maako, Yooyakim, ɗiɗaɓo, Sedekiya, tataɓo, Sallum, nayaɓo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Yusiya ngoni: Yohanan woni afo maako, Yooyakim, ɗiɗaɓo, Sedekiya, tataɓo, Sallum, nayaɓo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kaya-bem ko Josias nɛ́ Jɔhanaŋ, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Yoyakim, taar-a nɛ́ Sedekias, naar-a nɛ́ Salum,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kaya-bem ko Josias nɛ́ Jɔhanaŋ, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Yoyakim, taar-a nɛ́ Sedekias, naar-a nɛ́ Salum,
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Zhoziyas: Yohanan nya keya mpelɛa, Zhowakim nde zele ŋkɛ, Sɛdɛsiyas nde mahekene, Shaləwm nde wəfaɗe.
Tupurri: Jar ni Josiyas wo diñ: Yohanan jag weel äe no, Yehoyakim ma de äog no, Sedesiyas ma de swa' no, Salum ma de naa no.

Francais: - Fils de Joakim: Jéchonias, son fils; Sédécias, son fils.
Anglais: And the sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, Zedekiah his son.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Yehoyakim: Yekoniya, Sedekiyas.
Bulu: E mone Yehôyakin: Yékônia; e mone Yékônia: Sédékias.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Zoˀakimey i ti: Yekoniyas ati Sedesiyas.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Yooyakim boo: Yooyakim danyi Yekoniya e Yekoniya danyi Sedekiya.
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Yooyakim boo: Yooyakim danyi Yekoniya e Yekoniya danyi Sedekiya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ o bem ko Yoyakim nɛ́ Yekonia in Sedekias.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ o bem ko Yoyakim nɛ́ Yekonia in Sedekias.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Zhowakim: yɛ Yekoniya le Sɛdɛsiyas.
Tupurri: Je Yehoyakim diñ Yekoniya pan Sedesiyase.

Francais: -Fils de Jéchonias: Asir, Salathiel, son fils,
Anglais: And the sons of Jeconiah; Assir, Salathiel his son,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Goora vi Yekoniya sa ma daŋgayna: Sayaltiyel,
Bulu: Bone be mone mimbôk Yekônia: Sealtiél e mone wé,
Guiziga: Yekoniya, mbur mijakaŋ nga Babiloŋ na, ziri naŋ mizileheye, i ti: Seˀaltiyel,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Yekoniya kaɓɓaaɗo boo ngoni: Salatiyel
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Yekoniya kaɓɓaaɗo boo ngoni: Salatiyel
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nin o bem ko Yɛkɔnia nɛ̀ wa baa so nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Saltiɛl,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nin o bem ko Yɛkɔnia nɛ̀ wa baa so nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Saltiɛl,
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Yekoniya nya keseve mbeli kadzawa Babilone: Shɛyaltiyɛl,
Tupurri: Jar ni Yekoniya maga aè ban wo go ti dañgay Babilon wo diñ: Sealtiyel weel äe no,

Francais: Melchiram, Phadaïa, Sennéser, Jécémias, Sama et Nadabias.
Anglais: Malchiram also, and Pedaiah, and Shenazar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Malkiram, Pedaya, Senatsar, Yekamiya, Hokama hiɗi Nedabiya.
Bulu: Malkiram, Pedaya, Sénatsar, Yekamia, Hôkama a Nedabia.
Guiziga: Malkiram, Pedaya, Senasar, Yekamiya, Hosama waɗ Nedabiya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Malkiram e Pedaya e Senaccar e Yekamiya e Hosama e Nedabiya.
Fulfulde_DC: e Malkiram e Pedaya e Senaccar e Yekamiya e Hosama e Nedabiya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Malkiram, Pɛdaya, Sɛnasar, Yekamia, Hɔsama in Nedabia.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Malkiram, Pɛdaya, Sɛnasar, Yekamia, Hɔsama in Nedabia.
Kapsiki_DC: Malkiram, Pedaya, Shɛnasar, Yɛkamiya, Hoshama ba'a Nedabiya.
Tupurri: Malkiram, Pedaya, Senatsar, Yekamiya, Hosama, wo de Nedabiya.

Francais: -Fils de Phadaïas: Zorobabel et Séméï, - fils de Zorobabel: Mosollam, Hananias et Salomith, leur sœur
Anglais: And the sons of Pedaiah were, Zerubbabel, and Shimei: and the sons of Zerubbabel; Meshullam, and Hananiah, and Shelomith their sister:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Pedaya: Zorobabel, hiɗi Simey. Gurona vi Zorobabel: Mesullam hiɗi Hananiya, Selomit ti ɓasusita;
Bulu: Bone be Pedaya: Zôrôbabél a Simeyi. Bone be Zôrôbabél: Mesulam a Hanania, Selômit a mbe kale jap;
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Pedayahay i ti: Zorobabel ati Simey. Zorobabel a yi ziri mizilehey cuw, i ti: Mesulam ati Hananiya, waɗ zuŋ mongoso pal, a zilaka Selomit.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Pedaya boo: Zorobaabila e Sim'i. Ɓiɓɓe Zorobaabila boo: Mesullam e Hananiya. Selomit woni deerɗiraawo maɓɓe debbo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Pedaya boo: Zorobaabila e Sim'i. Ɓiɓɓe Zorobaabila boo: Mesullam e Hananiya. Selomit woni deerɗiraawo maɓɓe debbo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Pɛdaya nɛ́ Zorobabɛl in Simɛi; o bem ko Zorobabɛl nɛ́ Mɛsulam, Hanania in boko-nya-wa Sɛlɔmit.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Pɛdaya nɛ́ Zorobabɛl in Simɛi; o bem ko Zorobabɛl nɛ́ Mɛsulam, Hanania in boko-nya-wa Sɛlɔmit.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Pedaya: yɛ Zorobabɛl le Shimɛyi. Bake Zorobabɛl yake ŋwale tezhili, yɛ Meshəwlam le Hananiya, pa wəzha makwa kwetɛŋe, Shelomit,
Tupurri: Jar ni Pedaya wo diñ: Sorobabel wo diñ Simey. Jar ni Sorobabel wo diñ: Mesulam wo de Hananiya, Selomid diñ ma twaçy äaara.

Francais: et Hasaban, Ohol, Barachias, Hasadias, Josabhésed, cinq.
Anglais: And Hashubah, and Ohel, and Berechiah, and Hasadiah, Jushab–hesed, five.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hiɗi Hasuba, Ohel, Berekiya, Hasadiya, Yusab, Hesed, nisi vasl.
Bulu: a Kasuba, Ohel, Bérékia, Hasadia, Yusab, Héséd, bôte betan.
Guiziga: A dirba nah, a yi ziri mizile mekelemey zlum ma, i ti: Hasuba, Ohel, Berekiya, Hasadiya waɗ Yusap-Heset.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O danyi boo Hasuba e Oheel e Berekiya e Hasadiya e Yusab-Hesed, ɓe njowo.
Fulfulde_DC: O danyi boo Hasuba e Oheel e Berekiya e Hasadiya e Yusab-Hesed, ɓe njowo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Mɛsulam nɛ́ Hasuba, Ohɛl, Berekia, Hasadia in Yusab-Hɛsɛd; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Mɛsulam nɛ́ Hasuba, Ohɛl, Berekia, Hasadia in Yusab-Hɛsɛd; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ɓiyitsa, mcɛfe ŋwale tezhili: Hashəwba, Ohɛl, Bɛrɛkiya, Hasadiya le Yəwshab-Hɛsɛd.
Tupurri: Ma tigriñ wo ni dwee pa diñ: Hasuba, Ohel, Berekiya, Yusab, Hesed.

Francais: - Fils de Hananias: Phaltias et Jéséïas, les fils de Raphaïa, les fils d'Arnan, les fils d'Obdia, les fils de Séchénias.
Anglais: And the sons of Hananiah; Pelatiah, and Jesaiah: the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shechaniah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Hananiya: Pelatiya hiɗi Esaya; gurona vi Refaya, gurona vi Arnan, gurona vi Abdiyas, gurona vi Sekaniya.
Bulu: Bone be Hanania: Pelatia a Ezayi; Bone be Refaya, bone be Arnan, bone be Abdias, bone be Sekania.
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Hananiyahay i ti: Pelatiya ati Yesaya, waɗ ziri ngi Refayahay, ngi Arnaŋhay, ngi Obadiyahay ati ngi Sekaniyahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Hananiya boo: Pelatiya e Yesa'ya e ɓiɓɓe Refaya e Arnan e Obadiya e Sekaniya.
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Hananiya boo: Pelatiya e Yesa'ya e ɓiɓɓe Refaya e Arnan e Obadiya e Sekaniya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Hanania nɛ́ Pɛlatia in Yɛsaya; o bem ko Rɛfaya, o bem ko Arnaŋ, o bem ko Obadia, in o bem ko Sɛkania nɛ́ o bezaŋ-aa mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Hanania nɛ́ Pɛlatia in Yɛsaya; o bem ko Rɛfaya, o bem ko Arnaŋ, o bem ko Obadia, in o bem ko Sɛkania nɛ́ o bezaŋ-aa mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Hananiya: Pelatiya le Yeshaya, ba'a ŋwalea Shekaniya.
Tupurri: Jar ni Hananiya wo diñ: Pelatiya wo de Esayi, diñ jar ni Refeya wo, jar ni Arnan wo, jar ni Abdiyas wo, jar ni Sekaniya wo.

Francais: - Fils de Séchénias: Séméïa. - Fils de Séméïa: Hattus, Jégaal, Baria, Naaria, Saphat, six.
Anglais: And the sons of Shechaniah; Shemaiah: and the sons of Shemaiah; Hattush, and Igeal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Goora vi Sekaniya: Semayeya. Gurona vi Semayeya: Hattuk, Yigeyal, Bariya, Neyariya, hiɗi Safat. Nisi karkiya.
Bulu: Bone be Sekania: Semaéya; Bone be Semaéya: Hatuk, Yigéal, Baria, Nearia a Safat, bôte besaman.
Guiziga: Sekaniya a yi ziri mizilehey merkeɗ, i ti: Semaya, Hatus, Igal, Bariya, Neyariya waɗ Safat.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓii Sekaniya boo, Sema'ya. Ɓiɓɓe Sema'ya boo: Hattus e Yigal e Bariyak e Ne'ariya e Safat, njoweego.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓii Sekaniya boo, Sema'ya. Ɓiɓɓe Sema'ya boo: Hattus e Yigal e Bariyak e Ne'ariya e Safat, njoweego.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛkania koo Sɛmaya, ɓɛɛ o bem ko Sɛmaya nɛ́ Hatus, Yigɛal, Baria, Nɛaria in Safat; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛkania koo Sɛmaya, ɓɛɛ o bem ko Sɛmaya nɛ́ Hatus, Yigɛal, Baria, Nɛaria in Safat; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋkwaŋe ŋ'wete ŋwale tezhili Shekaniya: Shemaya, Hatəwsh, Igal, Bariya, Nɛyariya le Shafat.
Tupurri: Jar ni Sekaniya wo hira'a, diñ Semaeya wo de jar ni äe maga wo diñ Hatus, Yegeyal, Bariya, Neariya wo de Safade.

Francais: -Fils de Naaria: Elioénaï, Ezéchias et Ezricam: trois.
Anglais: And the sons of Neariah; Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Neyariya: Elyohenay, Ezekiyas, hiɗi Azrikam. Nisi ɦidi.
Bulu: Bone be Nearia: Elioémayi, Ezékias a Azrikam, bôte belaa.
Guiziga: Neyariya a yi ziri mizilehey makir, i ti: Eliyohenay, Hizkiya waɗ Azrikam.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Ne'ariya boo: Eliyo'enay e Hezekiya e Azrikam, ɓe tato.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Ne'ariya boo: Eliyo'enay e Hezekiya e Azrikam, ɓe tato.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Nɛaria nɛ́ Ɛlyɔnai, Hizkia in Azrikam; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ taar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Nɛaria nɛ́ Ɛlyɔnai, Hizkia in Azrikam; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ taar.
Kapsiki_DC: Mahekene yake ŋwale tezhili Nɛyariya: yɛ Ɛliyohɛnay, le Hizkiya ba'a Azrikam.
Tupurri: Jar ni Neariya wo diñ: Elyoenay, Esekiyas, wo de Asrikam, wo swa'a.

Francais: - Fils d'Elioénaï: Oduïa, Eliasub, Phéléïa, Accub, Johanan, Dalaïa et Anani: sept.
Anglais: And the sons of Elioenai were, Hodaiah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Dalaiah, and Anani, seven.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Elyohenay: Hodaviya, Eliyasib, Pelaya, Akub, Yohanan, Delaya hiɗi Anani. Nisi siɗiya.
Bulu: Bone bʼElioénayi: Hôdavyawu, Eliasib, Pelaya, Akub, Yôhanañ, Delaya a Anani bôte zamgbwa.
Guiziga: Eliyohenay a yi ziri mizilehey tarnaˀ, i ti: Hodaviya, Eliyasip, Pelaya, Akup, Yohanaŋ, Delaya ati Anani.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Eliyo'enay boo: Hodawiya e Eliyasib e Pelaya e Akkubu e Yohanan e Delaya e Anani, ɓe njoweeɗiɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Eliyo'enay boo: Hodawiya e Eliyasib e Pelaya e Akkubu e Yohanan e Delaya e Anani, ɓe njoweeɗiɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Ɛlyɔnai nɛ́ Hɔdavia, Eliasib, Pɛlaya, Akub, Yohanaŋ, Delaya in Anani; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Ɛlyɔnai nɛ́ Hɔdavia, Eliasib, Pɛlaya, Akub, Yohanaŋ, Delaya in Anani; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili mberefaŋe yake Ɛliyohɛnay: Hodaviya, Ɛliyashib, Pelaya, Akəwb, Yohanan, Delaya le Anani.
Tupurri: Jar ni Elyoe naèy wo diñ: Hadafiyahu, Eliyakib, Pelaya, Akub, Yohanan, Delaya wo de Anani, wo rename.

Francais: Fils de Juda: Pharès, Hesron, Charmi, Hur et Sobal.
Anglais: The sons of Judah; Pharez, Hezron, and Carmi, and Hur, and Shobal.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Yuda: Peres, Hesron, Karmi, Hur hiɗi Sobal.
Bulu: Bone be Yuda: Pérés, Etsroñ, Karmi, Hura Kôbal.
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Zudahay i ti: Peres, Hesroŋ, Karmi, Hur waɗ Sobal.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa danygol Yahuuda: Yahuuda danyi Peres, Peres danyi Hesruunu, Hesruunu danyi Karmi, Karmi danyi Huuru, Huuru danyi Sobal.
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa danygol Yahuuda: Yahuuda danyi Peres, Peres danyi Hesruunu, Hesruunu danyi Karmi, Karmi danyi Huuru, Huuru danyi Sobal.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Juda nɛ́ Pɛrɛs, Hɛsrɔŋ, Karmi, Hur in Sɔbal.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Juda nɛ́ Pɛrɛs, Hɛsrɔŋ, Karmi, Hur in Sɔbal.
Kapsiki_DC: Hwelefe ta Zhəwda: Pɛrɛs, Hɛsron, Karmi, Həwr le Shobal.
Tupurri: Jar ni Juda wo diñ: Peres, Hesron, Karmi, Hur wo de Sobal.

Francais: -Raïa, fils de Sobal, engendra Jahath; Jahath engendra Achamaï et Lahad, Ce sont les familles des Saréens.
Anglais: And Reaiah the son of Shobal begat Jahath; and Jahath begat Ahumai, and Lahad. These are the families of the Zorathites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Reyaya goora vi Sobal vuɗ Yahat, Yahat vuɗ Ahumay hiɗi Lahad. Nisi kayni si vuɗna vi Soreyatna.
Bulu: Reaya, e mone Kôbal, a nga biaé Yahat; Yahat a nga biaé Ahumayi a Lahad. Mebum me bôt Besoréatieñ mme le.
Guiziga: Rehaya mangal ngi Sobala, a yi Yahat, Yahata kwana, a yi Ahumay ati Lahaɗ. Hanayna i dideˀ misintiwaka ngi Sorahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Re'aya ɓii Sobal danyi Yahat, Yahat danyi Ahumay e Lahat. Ɗum ci'e Cor'ati'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Re'aya ɓii Sobal danyi Yahat, Yahat danyi Ahumay e Lahat. Ɗum ci'e Cor'ati'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Rɛaya bem ko Sɔbal koo Yahat, ɓɛɛ Yahat ko Ahumai in Lahad; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ o bíí nú-gara ko Sɔrɛa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Rɛaya bem ko Sɔbal koo Yahat, ɓɛɛ Yahat ko Ahumai in Lahad; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ o bíí nú-gara ko Sɔrɛa.
Kapsiki_DC: Rɛyaya, wəzege ta Shobal yitenyɛa Yahat, Yahat yitenyɛa yɛ Ahwəmay le Lahad. Ghenci ka shihɛnyɛa ka yita nyi mbe Sora.
Tupurri: Reaya je ni Sobaln raw biñ Yahad, Yahad kal biñ Ahumay wo de Lahad. Mo na diñ moobe mani jar Soreyan wo.

Francais: Voici les descendants du père d'Etam: Jezrahel, Jéséma et Jédébos; le nom de leur soeur était Asalelphuni.
Anglais: And these were of the father of Etam; Jezreel, and Ishma, and Idbash: and the name of their sister was Hazelelponi:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si jafna vi bum Etam: Yisreel, Yikma hiɗi Yikbah. Ɓasusita semda va' ala Hatselelponi.
Bulu: Mvoñe bôte ésaa Etam nje nyô: Yizrél, Yisma a Yidba; jôé kale jap e mbe Hatselélpôni.
Guiziga: Mipaka hirwuy Etama i ti: Zizreyel, Isema waɗ Idibak. Sukum taŋ mongoso a zilaka Haslelponi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa danygol baaba Etam: Yisre'el e Yisma e Yidbas. Innde deerɗiraawo maɓɓe debbo boo, Hacalelponi.
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa danygol baaba Etam: Yisre'el e Yisma e Yidbas. Innde deerɗiraawo maɓɓe debbo boo, Hacalelponi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Hur nɛ́ Etam, Yizreɛl, Yisma in Yidbas; nin boko-nya-wa duka nɛ́ Hasɛlɛlpɔni;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Hur nɛ́ Etam, Yizreɛl, Yisma in Yidbas; nin boko-nya-wa duka nɛ́ Hasɛlɛlpɔni;
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi hwelefe nyi keŋslete Ɛtam nyi: Zhizrɛyɛl, Ishema le Idbash. Haslɛlponi sləa wəzha ta megheyɛa nci.
Tupurri: Mokay diñ jar ma ti wer mani pan Etamn wo: AÀ wo diñ Jisreyel, Yisma wo de Yidba. Ëu ma twaçy äaaran hay ga Hat-Selelponi.

Francais: Phanuel fut le père de Gédor, et Ezer celui de Hosa. Ce sont là les fils de Hur, premier-né d'Ephrata, père de Bethléem.
Anglais: And Penuel the father of Gedor, and Ezer the father of Hushah. These are the sons of Hur, the firstborn of Ephratah, the father of Beth–lehem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Penuwel mi bum Gedor hiɗi Ezer bum Husa. Nisi cani si gurona vi Hur, goor ma vuɗi jewna vi Efrata, bum Betlehem.
Bulu: Penuél a mbe ésaa Gedor a Ezér ésaa Husa. Bone be Hur mbe le, ntôle mone Efrata ésaa Bétléhém.
Guiziga: Penuwel mipa hirwuy Gedor, yo Ezer mipa hirwuy Husa, i ziri mizile ngi Huroy, Hur, mangal modogom ngi Efrata, mbur mipa Betelyem.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Penuwel, baaba Gedor e Ezer, baaba Husa. Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Huuru, afo Efratu, Huuru woni baaba Baytilaama boo.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Penuwel, baaba Gedor e Ezer, baaba Husa. Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Huuru, afo Efratu, Huuru woni baaba Baytilaama boo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: a̧ koo Pɛnuɛl, wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Gɛdɔr, in Ezɛr, wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Husa mbɛt. Nin o bem ko Hur nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. A̧ nɛ́ kaya-bem ko Efrata, ɓɛɛ nɛ a̧‘i a̧ ku̧u̧ so naŋ ye Bɛtlɛhɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: a̧ koo Pɛnuɛl, wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Gɛdɔr, in Ezɛr, wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Husa mbɛt. Nin o bem ko Hur nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. A̧ nɛ́ kaya-bem ko Efrata, ɓɛɛ nɛ a̧‘i a̧ ku̧u̧ so naŋ ye Bɛtlɛhɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: Panəwɛl nya keŋslete Gedor le Ɛzɛr nya keŋslete Həwsha ne, ŋwalea Həwr nya katezhɛa wəzege ta Efrate ba'a nya keŋslete Bɛtelɛhɛm hɛ.
Tupurri: Penuwel hay diñ pan Gedor wo de Eser pan Husa. Sen mo na diñ jar ni Hur jag weel Efrata pan Betlehemn wo.

Francais: Assur, père de Thécué, eut deux femmes: Halaa et Naara.
Anglais: And Ashur the father of Tekoa had two wives, Helah and Naarah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Akhur bum Tekowa yaw boy ma', Heleya hiɗi Naara.
Bulu: Akhur, ésaa Tekôa, a nga luʼu binga bebaé, Héléa a Naara.
Guiziga: Asehur, mbur mipa hirwuy Tekwa, a ɗuv ngwasaya cuw: Hela ati Naˀara.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Askuru, baaba Teko'a woodi rewɓe ɗiɗo: Heleya e Na'ara.
Fulfulde_DC: Askuru, baaba Teko'a woodi rewɓe ɗiɗo: Heleya e Na'ara.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Asɛhur, wi nɛ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Tɛkɔa, baa so kóò yiitoo; Hɛlɛa in Naara.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Asɛhur, wi nɛ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Tɛkɔa, baa so kóò yiitoo; Hɛlɛa in Naara.
Kapsiki_DC: Mi bake ka se va Ashehəwr nya keŋslete Tɛkowa, sləa nci ne, Hɛla le Na'ara.
Tupurri: Ashur pan Tekowa hay de naare äoge, diñ Heliya wo de Naara.

Francais: Naara lui enfanta Oozam, Hépher, Thémani et Ahasthari: ce sont là les fils de Naara.
Anglais: And Naarah bare him Ahuzam, and Hepher, and Temeni, and Haahashtari. These were the sons of Naarah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Naara vuɗum Ahusam, Hefer, Temeni hiɗi Ahaktari. Nisi cani si gurona vi Naara.
Bulu: Naara a nga biaé nye Ahuzam, Héfer, Témeni a Ahaktari: bone be Naara mbe le.
Guiziga: Naˀara a yaŋ ziri mizilehey mufaɗa, i ti: Ahuzam, Hefer, Temni waɗ Ahasetari.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Na'ara danyani mo Ahujam e Hefer e Temni e Ahastaari. Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Na'ara.
Fulfulde_DC: Na'ara danyani mo Ahujam e Hefer e Temni e Ahastaari. Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Na'ara.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Naara koo Ahuzam, Hɛfɛr, Teman in o bezaŋ, bá nɛ̀ Ahastar in o bezaŋ mbɛt. O bem ko Naar-a nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Naara koo Ahuzam, Hɛfɛr, Teman in o bezaŋ, bá nɛ̀ Ahastar in o bezaŋ mbɛt. O bem ko Naar-a nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili wəfaɗe yake nda Na'ara: Ahwəzam, Hɛfɛr, Tɛmni le Ahashetari.
Tupurri: Naara raw biñ Ahusam, Hefer, Temeni wo de Ahastari wo ne hene, sen na diñ jar ni Naara wo.

Francais: - Fils de Halaa: Séreth, Isaar et Ethnan.
Anglais: And the sons of Helah were, Zereth, and Jezoar, and Ethnan.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Heleya: Seret, Sohar hiɗi Etnan.
Bulu: Bone be Héléa: Sérét, Sôhar a Etnan.
Guiziga: Hela a yaŋ ziri mizilehey makir, i ti: Seret, Sohar waɗ Etinaŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Heleya boo: Seret e Cohar e Etanan.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Heleya boo: Seret e Cohar e Etanan.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Hɛlɛa nɛ́ Sɛrɛt, Sɔhar in Ɛtnaŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Hɛlɛa nɛ́ Sɛrɛt, Sɔhar in Ɛtnaŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma Hɛla ne, mahekene yave nda nde: Sɛrɛt, Sohar le Ɛtnan.
Tupurri: Jar ni Heleya wo diñ: Sered, Sohar wo de Etnan.

Francais: Cos engendra Anob et Soboba, et les familles d'Aharéhel, fils d'Arum.
Anglais: And Coz begat Anub, and Zobebah, and the families of Aharhel the son of Harum.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kos vuɗ Anub hiɗi Hatsobeba, hiɗi jafna vi Aharehel goora vi Harum.
Bulu: Kôt a nga biaé Anub a Hatsobéba a mebum Beaharehél, e mone Harum.
Guiziga: Kos i cine ngi Anup ati Sobeba. I dideˀ misintiwaka ngi Aharehel, mangal ngi Harum.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Koos danyi Anuba e Sobeba. Ci'e nder danygol Aharhel ɓii Harum boo iwi haa maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Koos danyi Anuba e Sobeba. Ci'e nder danygol Aharhel ɓii Harum boo iwi haa maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kos koo Anub in Hasɔbɛba; a̧ nɛ́ zɔmdáa ko o bíí nú-gara ko Aharɛl bem ko Harum mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kos koo Anub in Hasɔbɛba; a̧ nɛ́ zɔmdáa ko o bíí nú-gara ko Aharɛl bem ko Harum mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Kos yitenyɛa yɛ Anəwb le Sobɛba, hwelefe ta ŋkɛ yɛ yita ta yɛ Aharɛhɛl, wəzege ta Harəwm.
Tupurri: Kos raw biñ Anub wo de Hatsobeba wo de jar ma ti moobe mani Aharehel je ni Harumn wo.

Francais: Jabès était plus honoré que ses frères; sa mère lui donna le nom de Jabès, en disant: "C'est parce que je l'ai enfanté avec douleur."
Anglais: And Jabez was more honourable than his brethren: and his mother called his name Jabez, saying, Because I bare him with sorrow.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yayebes nisi minim ŋolo suw ɓosiyomna, sulum tunum selem ala Yayebes kayn kuɗ ta ala na' vuɗum hiɗi makka.
Bulu: Be nga semé Yaébet a dañe bobenyañ, nyia a nga yôlé nye jôé na Yaébet a jôʼô na: Amu me nga biaé nye e mintaé été.
Guiziga: A wuzla sukum naŋhaya, a wuɗam ɓi ngi Yabese haɗa. Mumuŋ a caŋ slimiɗe Yabes na, a mbiɗeˀvra: ‹I ya ti tuwaˀa.›
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ya'bes heɓi tedduŋgal ɓuri deerɗiraaɓe muuɗum. Daada maako hokki mo innde Ya'bes ngam bee bone o danyiri mo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ya'bes heɓi tedduŋgal ɓuri deerɗiraaɓe muuɗum. Daada maako hokki mo innde Ya'bes ngam bee bone o danyiri mo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yabɛs duka so nɛ́ tu̧u̧-tɛ bíí mgbara o nya-a̧, ɓɛɛ nàà kɔ̧-a̧ sa nin-a Yaebɛs, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ tɔ̧: «Kòò-tɛ́-bɔnɛ.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yabɛs duka so nɛ́ tu̧u̧-tɛ bíí mgbara o nya-a̧, ɓɛɛ nàà kɔ̧-a̧ sa nin-a Yaebɛs, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ tɔ̧: «Kòò-tɛ́-bɔnɛ.»
Kapsiki_DC: Yabɛs nde se kawəndə nya nza zləvə te za ma ke ka kesaka yitenyɛ. Va nya sahwe yaka meghekɛ yite kwele kwele te və nya ya ŋkɛ nda ndeke nda slə nde kaYabɛs.
Tupurri: Yaebes hay diñ je ma tinoo yoo heçeçre äen wo, man äe kañ ëu ne hen ga Yeabes na gana: Diñ wer maga ndi biñn nen bon mono.

Francais: Jabès invoqua le Dieu d'Israël en disant: "Si vous me bénissez et que vous étendiez mes limites, si votre main est avec moi et si vous me préservez du malheur, en sorte que je ne sois pas dans l'affliction!..." Et Dieu lui accorda ce qu'il avait demandé.
Anglais: And Jabez called on the God of Israel, saying, Oh that thou wouldest bless me indeed, and enlarge my coast, and that thine hand might be with me, and that thou wouldest keep me from evil, that it may not grieve me! And God granted him that which he requested.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yayebes yi sem Lawna vi Israyel, nam ka di ala: La naŋ hoban hiɗi bolda, la naŋ ɦur vun nagata van goyo, la naŋ ka hiɗi nanu, la naŋ li ala, jaran ja goy gine'e hiɗi joota hiɗi makka. Lawn vulum va ma nam jobom kalamna.
Bulu: Yaébét a nga yeʼelane Zambe ya Israél a jô na: Nge wo jalé ma a bibotan, a nene minné miam nge wo wôé ô ne be ma nge wo bo na, ôyab a bidim, me fame mintaé! Ane Zambe a nga ve nye e mam a nga sili.
Guiziga: Yabes a dir dibiɗ ani: «Buymisemuŋ ngi Israyel, ɗuwuliy mi, ska hirwuy ɗu, jiy kaw a haŋ ɗiki, ɓula hiryi ati bonoyo kileŋ avu ya!» Dar Buymisemuŋ a gaŋ gwat naŋ mucufuɗa tuwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ya'bes tori Allah Isra'iila, wi'i: “Barkiɗinam, yaajin maral am, juŋngo ma faddo yam, daaynanam sarru ngam taa mi yara bone!” Allah jaɓani mo ko o tori.
Fulfulde_DC: Ya'bes tori Allah Isra'iila, wi'i: “Barkiɗinam, yaajin maral am, juŋngo ma faddo yam, daaynanam sarru ngam taa mi yara bone!” Allah jaɓani mo ko o tori.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yaebɛs kɔfa Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl  tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ tók de yoŋgo zu'm nɛ̀ mbetɛ, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ de ha̧ nù kɔ‘m mɛ gasi, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ duk in am, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ ndaka ɗaŋmɔ yinɛ wen ká‘m tɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk bɔnɛ.» Ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ kpɛk mɔ n'aa aka'i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yaebɛs kɔfa Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl  tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ tók de yoŋgo zu'm nɛ̀ mbetɛ, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ de ha̧ nù kɔ‘m mɛ gasi, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ duk in am, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ ndaka ɗaŋmɔ yinɛ wen ká‘m tɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk bɔnɛ.» Ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ kpɛk mɔ n'aa aka'i.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Yabɛs səkwəte Shala ta ka Israyɛl, ma ke: «Ma kewəpikɛ ɗa na kambakete ɗa hɛɗia ɗa, kənəa 'ya tenza dzeve ta ŋa kaya ɗa, cakeɗake tenza ndiremi nya te 'ya ba'a yaka ta ɗa!» Pa Shala yipəte nda wəsə nya 'yɛwete ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Yeabes raw ëe Baa ma Israyel no, day gana: Hayga ndo nges ndi we go de bosa' wo, day ndo ya' hagu äin wo wo pel ni, hayga do äo kay we wer äi, ndo joñ we ga ree po mo caa ndi wa day ndi yaçaç go jag bon no!... Baa kal joñ fen maga aà hay wiin ne hene.

Francais: Kélub, frère de Sua, engendra Mahir, qui fut père d'Esthon.
Anglais: And Chelub the brother of Shuah begat Mehir, which was the father of Eshton.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kelub ɓasum Subana vuɗ Mehir, namu mi bum Ekton.
Bulu: Kelub, monyañe Suha, a nga biaé Mehir, nye a mbe ésaa Ektôn.
Guiziga: Kelup sukum ngi Suwa, a yi Mehir, Mehire kwana i cine ngi Esetoŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kelub, deerɗiraawo Suha danyi Mehir, kaŋko woni baaba Eston.
Fulfulde_DC: Kelub, deerɗiraawo Suha danyi Mehir, kaŋko woni baaba Eston.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kɛlub nya Suha koo Mɛhir nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ dáà ko Ɛstɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kɛlub nya Suha koo Mɛhir nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ dáà ko Ɛstɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Kɛləwb wəza meghekɛa Shəwha yitenyɛa Mɛhir, Mɛhir yitenyɛa Ɛsheton,
Tupurri: Kelub, hen Suhan raw biñ Mehir, pan Eston.

Francais: Esthon engendra la maison de Rapha, Phessé et Tehinna, père de la ville de Naas. Ce sont là les hommes de Récha.
Anglais: And Eshton begat Beth–rapha, and Paseah, and Tehinnah the father of Ir–nahash. These are the men of Rechah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ekton vuɗ Bet-Rafa, Paseya hiɗi Tehinna, bum hoyok-ziyna vi Nahak. Nisi kayni si sumuna vi Reka.
Bulu: Ektôn a nga biaé e nda Rafa, Paséa a Tehina, ésaa tisone Nahak. Bôte ya Réka mbe le.
Guiziga: Esetoŋ a yi Bet-Rafa, Paseya waɗ Tehina. Mipa walahay Nahas i Tehina vuna, taŋ i mizli Rekahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Eston danyi Bayti-Rafa e Paseha e Tehinna, baaba berniwol Nahas. Kamɓe ngoni yimɓe Reka.
Fulfulde_DC: Eston danyi Bayti-Rafa e Paseha e Tehinna, baaba berniwol Nahas. Kamɓe ngoni yimɓe Reka.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛstɔŋ koo Bɛt-Rafa, Pasɛa in Tɛhina, wi nɛ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Nahas. Wa nɛ́ o bíí Hɛka.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛstɔŋ koo Bɛt-Rafa, Pasɛa in Tɛhina, wi nɛ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Nahas. Wa nɛ́ o bíí Hɛka.
Kapsiki_DC: Ɛsheton yitenyɛa yɛ Bɛt-Rafa Pasɛya le Tehina. Tehina nde ŋslete meleme ta ka Nahash. Ghenci hwelefe nyi kese mbe Rɛka.
Tupurri: Eston kal biñ Rapha, Paseya wo de Tehina je laa äi leege Nahas no. Mo na diñ werpiiri mani Rekan wo.

Francais: Fils de Cénez: Othoniel et Saraïa. -Fils d'Othoniel: Hathath et Maonathi; Maonathi engendra Ophra
Anglais: And the sons of Kenaz; Othniel, and Seraiah: and the sons of Othniel; Hathath.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Kenaz: Otniyel hiɗi Seraya. Gurona vi Otniyel: Hatat,
Bulu: Bone be Kenaz: Otniél a Seraya. Bone be Otniél: Hatat
Guiziga: Ziri ngi Genasay i ti: Otniyel waɗ Seraya. Ziri ngi Otniyeley i ti: Hatat waɗ Meyonatay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Kenas ngoni: Otniyel e Seraya. Ɓiɓɓe Otniyel boo: Hatat e Me'onotay.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Kenas ngoni: Otniyel e Seraya. Ɓiɓɓe Otniyel boo: Hatat e Me'onotay.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Kɛnaz nɛ́ Otniɛl in Sɛraya. Bem ko Otniɛl nɛ́ Hatat;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Kɛnaz nɛ́ Otniɛl in Sɛraya. Bem ko Otniɛl nɛ́ Hatat;
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhilia Kenaz: Otniyɛl le Seraya. Ŋwale tezhilia Otniyɛl: yɛ Hatat le Mɛyonotay.
Tupurri: Jar ni Kenas wo diñ: Otniyel wo de Seraya. Jar ni Otniyel wo diñ: Hatad wo de

Francais: - Saraïa engendra Joab, père de ceux qui habitaient la vallée de Charaschim, car ils étaient ouvriers.
Anglais: And Meonothai begat Ophrah: and Seraiah begat Joab, the father of the valley of Charashim; for they were craftsmen.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hiɗi Mewonotay ma vuɗ Ofra. Seraya vuɗ Yowab, namu mi bum lokŋa vi sa kot slena; kay nam kay tuwamu mi sa ma kot slena.
Bulu: a Méônôtayi nyô a nga biaé Ofra. Seraya a nga biaé Yôab, ésaa mbiʼili belui biôm; amu be mbe belui biôm.
Guiziga: Meyonatay a yi Ofra. Seraya a yi Yoˀap, i dideˀ ngi miɗiya gwatay, a pam ar sozo ngi misina ɗiya gwatay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Me'onotay danyi Ofra. Seraya danyi Yo'ab, baaba Waadiwol-Sanaa'a, ngam ɓe waɗooɓe sanaa'a.
Fulfulde_DC: Me'onotay danyi Ofra. Seraya danyi Yo'ab, baaba Waadiwol-Sanaa'a, ngam ɓe waɗooɓe sanaa'a.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛɔnatai koo Ofra, ɓɛɛ Sɛraya ko Yɔab zɔmdáa ko o wi-dui-mɔ nɛ̀ yaa so kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ ko o Wi-dui-mɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛɔnatai koo Ofra, ɓɛɛ Sɛraya ko Yɔab zɔmdáa ko o wi-dui-mɔ nɛ̀ yaa so kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ ko o Wi-dui-mɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Mɛyonotay yitenyɛa Ofra. Seraya yitenyɛa Yowab nya kashia ka ɗepe mene wəshi nyi kwa zlərəa ka ɗepe mene wəshi, kwa nza hɛ kaka ɗepe mene wəshi.
Tupurri: Moenotay maga biñ Ofra mono. Seraya raw biñ Jowab je laa tiñ ma ti log mani jar joñ joñre ma defed defedn wo werga joñre äaara hay diñ se no.

Francais: - Fils de Caleb, fils de Jéphoné: Hir, Ela et Maham. - Fils d'Ela: Cénez.
Anglais: And the sons of Caleb the son of Jephunneh; Iru, Elah, and Naam: and the sons of Elah, even Kenaz.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Kaleb goora vi Yefune: Iru, Ela hiɗi Naam, hiɗi gurona vi Ela, hiɗi Kenaz.
Bulu: Bone be Kaléb e mone Yefuné: Iru, Ela a Naam, a bone bʼEla, a Kenaz.
Guiziga: Kalep, mangal ngi Yefune, a yi ziri mizilehey makir, i ti: Iru, Ela waɗ Naˀam. Ela i cine ngi Kenas.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Kaaleb ɓii Yefunna ngoni: Iiru e Ela e Na'am. Ɓii Ela boo, Kenas.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Kaaleb ɓii Yefunna ngoni: Iiru e Ela e Na'am. Ɓii Ela boo, Kenas.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kalɛb bem ko Yefunɛ koo Iru, Ela in Naam, ɓɛɛ Ela ko Kɛnaz.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kalɛb bem ko Yefunɛ koo Iru, Ela in Naam, ɓɛɛ Ela ko Kɛnaz.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili mahekene ŋ'wete Kalɛb nya kawəzege ta Yefəwnɛ. Yɛ Irəw, Ɛla ba'a Na'am. Ɛla yitenyɛa Kenaz.
Tupurri: Jar ni Kaleb je ni Yefunen wo diñ: Iru, Ela wo de Naam, diñ jar ni Ela wo, diñ Kenase.

Francais: Fils de Jaléléel: Ziph, Zipha, Thiria et Asraël.
Anglais: And the sons of Jehaleleel; Ziph, and Ziphah, Tiria, and Asareel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Yehalelel: Zif, Zifa, Tirya hiɗi Asareel.
Bulu: Bone be Yehaléleél: Zif, Zifa, Tirya a Azarél.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Lehaleleley, i ti: Zif, Zifa, Tiriya waɗ Asarel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Yehallelel ngoni: Zif e Zifa e Tiriya e Asariilu.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Yehallelel ngoni: Zif e Zifa e Tiriya e Asariilu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem Ko Yɛhalɛlɛl nɛ́ Zif, Zifa, Tiria in Asareɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem Ko Yɛhalɛlɛl nɛ́ Zif, Zifa, Tiria in Asareɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhilia Yehalɛlɛl: Zif, Zifa, Tiriya ba'a Asarɛl.
Tupurri: Jar ni Yehalelel wo diñ: Sif, Sifa, Tiriya wo de Asareyel.

Francais: Fils d'Esra: Jéther, Méred, Epher et Jalon. La femme de Méred, l'Égyptienne, enfanta Mariam, Sammaï et Jesba, père d'Esthamo.
Anglais: And the sons of Ezra were, Jether, and Mered, and Epher, and Jalon: and she bare Miriam, and Shammai, and Ishbah the father of Eshtemoa.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Esdras: Yeter, Mered, Efer hiɗi Yalon, (cata vi Mered) vuɗ Miriyam, Samay hiɗi Yikbah, bum Ektemowa.
Bulu: Bone be Esdras: Yeter, Meréd, Efer a yalôn. E minga Méréd a nga biaé Miriam, Samayi a Yisba ésaa Ektemôa.
Guiziga: __Error__
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: __Error__
Tupurri: Jar ni Esdras wo diñ: Yeter, Mered, Efer wo de Yalon. Waçy mani Meredn raw biñ Miriyam, Samay wo de Yisba pan Estemowa.

Francais: Son autre femme, la Juive, enfanta Jared, père de Gédor, Héber, père de Socho, et Icuthiel, père de Zanoé. Ceux-là sont les fils de Béthia, fille de Pharaon, que Méred avait prise pour femme.
Anglais: And his wife Jehudijah bare Jered the father of Gedor, and Heber the father of Soco, and Jekuthiel the father of Zanoah. And these are the sons of Bithiah the daughter of Pharaoh, which Mered took.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Cata valamu ta Yudata vuɗ Yered, bum Gedor, Heber, bum Soko hiɗi Yekutiyel, bum Zanowa. Nisi kayni si gurona vi Bitya, goota vi Farawn, ta Mered sla' cata.
Bulu: E minga Meréd ate, ngone ya Yudée, a nga biaé Yéréd, ésaa Gedor, Héber ésaa Sôkô a Yekutiél, ésaa Zanôa. Bone be Bitia, ngone Faraoñ, nje Méréd a nga luk mbe le.
Guiziga: __Error__
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: __Error__
Tupurri: Waçy äe may jar Juden raw biñ Yered pan Gedore, biñ Heber pan Soko, biñ Yekutiyel pan Sanowa. Mo na diñ weere mani Bitiya, may mani Farawoñ maga Mered hay dan waçy mono.

Francais: Fils de la femme d'Odaïa, soeur de Naham: le père de Céïla, le Garmien, et le père d'Esthamo, le Machathien.
Anglais: And the sons of his wife Hodiah the sister of Naham, the father of Keilah the Garmite, and Eshtemoa the Maachathite.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi cata vi Hodiya, ɓasum Nahamta: Bum Keyla ma Garmiyena, hiɗi Ektemowa ma Maakatiyena.
Bulu: Bone be minga Hôdiya, kale Naham: ésaa Kéla, mone Garmieñ, a Ektemôa, mone Maakatieñ.
Guiziga: Hodiya a zuɓ ngwasa, i sukum ngi Naham, cine ngi Keyla mbur Garmi, waɗ Estemoa mbur Maˀakati.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe debbo Hodiyya, deerɗiraawo Naham debbo ngoni: Baaba Ke'ila Garmiijo e Estemo'a Ma'akatiijo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe debbo Hodiyya, deerɗiraawo Naham debbo ngoni: Baaba Ke'ila Garmiijo e Estemo'a Ma'akatiijo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hɔdia baa boko-nya Naham nɛ̀ kóò; o bezaŋ-wa so nɛ́ o be Garmi nɛ̀ yaa so Kɛila in o be Maka nɛ̀ yaa so Ɛstɛmɔa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hɔdia baa boko-nya Naham nɛ̀ kóò; o bezaŋ-wa so nɛ́ o be Garmi nɛ̀ yaa so Kɛila in o be Maka nɛ̀ yaa so Ɛstɛmɔa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Hodiya wəmeve kwete wəzha ta meghekɛa Naham. Ma hwelefe nyi kesawa mbe hɛ ne, ka Garme nyi kese mbe Kɛyila le ka Ma'aka nyi kese mbe Ɛshtemowa.
Tupurri: Jar ni may mani Hodiya, hen Nahamn wo diñ: Je Garmid maga laa äi leege Keyla mono, diñ je Maakatid maga wo Estemowa mono.

Francais: Fils de Simon: Amnon, Rinna, Ben-Hanan et Thilon.  Fils de Jési: Zoheth et Ben-Zoheth.
Anglais: And the sons of Shimon were, Amnon, and Rinnah, Ben–hanan, and Tilon. And the sons of Ishi were, Zoheth, and Ben–zoheth.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Simon: Annon, Rinna, Ben-Hanan hiɗi Tilon. Gurona vi Yikey: Zohet hiɗi Ben-Zohet.
Bulu: Bone Be Simon: Amnon, Rinna, Ben-Hanan a Tilôn. Bone be Yiseyi: Zôhét a Ben-Zôhét.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Simoŋhoy i ti: Amnoŋ, Rina, Ben-Hanaŋ waɗ Tiloŋ. Tizer ngi Yiseye, i ti: Zohet ati mangal naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Simona ngoni: Amnon e Rimna e Ben-Hanan e Tilon. Ɓiɓɓe Yisi ngoni: Zohet e Ben-Zohet.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Simona ngoni: Amnon e Rimna e Ben-Hanan e Tilon. Ɓiɓɓe Yisi ngoni: Zohet e Ben-Zohet.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Simɔŋ nɛ́ Amnɔŋ, Rina, Bɛn-Hanaŋ in Tilɔŋ. O bem ko Yisɛi nɛ́ Zɔhɛt in Bɛn-Zɔhɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Simɔŋ nɛ́ Amnɔŋ, Rina, Bɛn-Hanaŋ in Tilɔŋ. O bem ko Yisɛi nɛ́ Zɔhɛt in Bɛn-Zɔhɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhilia Shimon: Amnon, Rina, Bɛn-Hanan le Tilon. Ŋwale tezhilia Ishɛyi: yɛ Zohɛt le wəzege ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Jar ni Simon wo diñ: Amnon, Rina, Ben-Hanañ wo de Tiloñ. Jar ni Yisey wo diñ: Sohed wo de Ben-Sohede.

Francais: Fils de Séla, fils de Juda: Her, père de Lécha, Laada, père de Marésa, et les familles de la maison où l'on travaille le byssus, de la maison d'Aschbéa,
Anglais: The sons of Shelah the son of Judah were, Er the father of Lecah, and Laadah the father of Mareshah, and the families of the house of them that wrought fine linen, of the house of Ashbea,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Sela goora vi Yuda: Er bum Leka, Laheda, bum Maresa, jafna vi sum sa li lopna vi duɓar barawna, hay ziyna vi Akbeya,
Bulu: Bone be Séba e mone Yuda: Er, ésaa Léka, Laéda, ésaa Marésa, a mebume me bôte ya e nda ba bo ésaé sut a ma ya e nda Akbéa,
Guiziga: Sela, mangal ngi Zuda, dideˀ naŋhay ani: Er mipa hirwuy Leka, Lada mipa hirwuy Maresa, waɗ muy ngi mizli miji gabaga ti gugumay mukuluf kulufoy mipam a Bet-Asebeya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Sela ɓii Yahuuda ngoni: Eer, baaba Leka e La'eda, baaba Maresa, non boo ci'e sannyooɓe limce ɗigguɗe haa Bayti-Asbeha.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Sela ɓii Yahuuda ngoni: Eer, baaba Leka e La'eda, baaba Maresa, non boo ci'e sannyooɓe limce ɗigguɗe haa Bayti-Asbeha.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Sɛla, bem ko Juda nɛ́ Ɛr, wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Lɛka, Lada wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Marɛsa, in o bíí nú-gara ko o wi-tok yɛm-yɛm-laa sɛn Bɛt-Asebɛa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Sɛla, bem ko Juda nɛ́ Ɛr, wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Lɛka, Lada wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Marɛsa, in o bíí nú-gara ko o wi-tok yɛm-yɛm-laa sɛn Bɛt-Asebɛa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili nyi kesawa mbe Shɛla, wəzege ta Zhəwda: Ɛr, nya keŋslete Lɛka, Lada nya keŋslete Marɛsha, ba'a yita ta mbeli nyi ketsa zlave kwa Bɛt-Ashebɛya.
Tupurri: Jar ni Sela je ni Judan wo diñ: Er pan Leka, diñ Laeda pan Maresa, diñ jar ma ti moobe mani jar maga joñ wo joñre äodge oçoçbe de swee ma de yulgi mono, diñ jar ma liñ ni Asbeyan wo,

Francais: et Jokim, et les hommes de Cozéba, et Joas, et Saraph, qui dominèrent sur Moab, et Jaschubi-Léchem. Ces choses sont anciennes.
Anglais: And Jokim, and the men of Chozeba, and Joash, and Saraph, who had the dominion in Moab, and Jashubi–lehem. And these are ancient things.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hiɗi Yokim, hiɗi sum sa hay Kozebana, Yowas hiɗi Saraf, sa ti mulda kay Mowabna, hiɗi Yakubi-Lehem. Slen cani ɓa-ɓa.
Bulu: a Yôkim, a bôte ya Kôzéba, Yôak a Saraf, mbe be nga jôô Môab a Yakubi-Léhem. Mam mete me ne minnôme mi mam.
Guiziga: Sela kwana i dideˀ ngi Yokim, mipam a Kozeba, a Yohas waɗ a Saraf. A zuɓam ngi ngwasa i ziri Moˀapay, a dirba nah, a mam, ara pam a Lehem. Gwat tayna, a gam diga zlezle.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Fahin Yokim e worɓe wuro Kojeba e Yo'as e Saraf, laamaniiɓe Mo'ab, ɓaawoɗon ɓe ngarti Yasubi-Lahem. Kuuje ɗe'e ɗe ɓooymaaje.
Fulfulde_DC: Fahin Yokim e worɓe wuro Kojeba e Yo'as e Saraf, laamaniiɓe Mo'ab, ɓaawoɗon ɓe ngarti Yasubi-Lahem. Kuuje ɗe'e ɗe ɓooymaaje.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛla nɛ́ zɔmdáa ko Yokim, in zɔmdáa ko o wi Kɔzɛba, ká bá nɛ̀ Yoas in Saraf nɛ̀ kaia so o zɔŋa Mɔab nɛ̀ kóò nɛti kaɗi sɛka wa be tɛ̀ɛ́ pìì píí Lekɛm mbɛt. Mɔ‘i nɛ́ gba̧‘a̧ mɔ nɛ̀ yaka so ɓeemɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛla nɛ́ zɔmdáa ko Yokim, in zɔmdáa ko o wi Kɔzɛba, ká bá nɛ̀ Yoas in Saraf nɛ̀ kaia so o zɔŋa Mɔab nɛ̀ kóò nɛti kaɗi sɛka wa be tɛ̀ɛ́ pìì píí Lekɛm mbɛt. Mɔ‘i nɛ́ gba̧‘a̧ mɔ nɛ̀ yaka so ɓeemɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Shia Yokim Shɛla perə le ŋa ka Kozɛba, ba'a ŋa Yowash le Saraf nyi kese kasleke ka Mowab nda tezhɛre geva hɛ kanza mbe Bɛtelɛhɛm. Wəshi nyi kemenete geva vəashi hɛ.
Tupurri: diñ Yokim wo de jar ma Koseban wo, diñ jar ma Yowas wo de ma Saraf maga hay wo waçaç ree Mowab mono, diñ Yasubi-Lehem. Sen diñ feçeçre ma äaaäaa wo le go.

Francais: C'étaient les potiers et les habitants de Nétaïm et de Gédéra; ils demeuraient là, près du roi, travaillant pour lui.
Anglais: These were the potters, and those that dwelt among plants and hedges: there they dwelt with the king for his work.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kayni si sum sa in dowayna hiɗi sum sa gi zlaɓna; tam sinena, nisi lakay kulo goboy kat mulla, nisi ka lum lopna.
Bulu: Be mbe bemé mevieʼe bikon, a e bôte be too mefub a e bilum été; be nga too valé ba be njô bôt, be boʼo nye bisaé.
Guiziga: I mindira gwatay, a pam a Netayim waɗ a Gedera. Adiga, taŋ a ciki buy, a gam gawla naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kamɓe ɓe mahooɓe payanɗe, ɓe ɗon njooɗi haa Neta'im e Gedera, kommbi laamiiɗo, ɓe ɗon kuuwana ɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: Kamɓe ɓe mahooɓe payanɗe, ɓe ɗon njooɗi haa Neta'im e Gedera, kommbi laamiiɗo, ɓe ɗon kuuwana ɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ-wa yaa so nɛ́ o wi-ɓu-kpánà sɛn Nɛtaim in Gɛdɛra;  wa ɔ so hi̧i̧ in wannu de nɛ̀ tom ha̧ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ-wa yaa so nɛ́ o wi-ɓu-kpánà sɛn Nɛtaim in Gɛdɛra;  wa ɔ so hi̧i̧ in wannu de nɛ̀ tom ha̧ a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Kaka ŋa ghene se hwelefefia nci mbe Netayim ba'a Gedɛra. Tagha se hɛ kanza le meghe ba'a kamene nda slene.
Tupurri: AÀ hay wo diñ jar boorge, jar maga hay wo de tiñ yoo koore ma de peëge wo, jag kaw horog wo. AÀ hay wo de tiñ ti jeñ wañ ni day saara hay joñ joñre ne hene.

Francais: Fils de Siméon: Namuel, Jamin, Jarib, Zara, Saül.
Anglais: The sons of Simeon were, Nemuel, and Jamin, Jarib, Zerah, and Shaul:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Simeyon: Nemuwel, Yamin, Yarib, Zerah, Sawul;
Bulu: Bone be Siméoñ: Nemuél, Yamin, Yarib Zéra, Saül;
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Simeyoŋhoy i ti: Nemuyel, Yamin, Yarip, Zera waɗ Sawul.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Simeyon ngoni: Nemuwel e Yamin e Yariba e Zeraha e Sawulu.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Simeyon ngoni: Nemuwel e Yamin e Yariba e Zeraha e Sawulu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Simɛɔŋ nɛ́ Nɛmuɛl, Yamin, Yarib, Zɛra, Saul.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Simɛɔŋ nɛ́ Nɛmuɛl, Yamin, Yarib, Zɛra, Saul.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhilia Simɛyon: Neməwɛl, Yamin, Yarib, Zɛra le Shawəl.
Tupurri: Jar ni Simeyoñ wo diñ: Nemuwel, Yamin, Yarib, Sera, Sawul,

Francais: Sellum, son fils; Madsam, son fils; Masma, son Fils.
Anglais: Shallum his son, Mibsam his son, Mishma his son.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sallum, goora valam Mibsam, goora valam Misema.
Bulu: Salum e mone wé; Mibsam e mone wé, mikma e mone wé.
Guiziga: Mikwanay ngi Sawulo i Salum, Mibisam waɗ Misema.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓii Sawulu, Sallum on. Ɓii Sallum boo, Mipsaam. Ɓii Mipsaam boo, Misma.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓii Sawulu, Sallum on. Ɓii Sallum boo, Mipsaam. Ɓii Mipsaam boo, Misma.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Saul koo Salum, Salum koo Mibsam, ɓɛɛ Mibsam ko Misma.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Saul koo Salum, Salum koo Mibsam, ɓɛɛ Mibsam ko Misma.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale nyi kesawa mbe Shawəl nya wəzege ta ŋkɛ: Shaləwm, Mibsam ba'a Mishema.
Tupurri: Salum diñ je Sawul, Mibsam diñ je Salum, Misma diñ je Mibsam.

Francais: - Fils de Masma: Hamuel, son fils; Zachur, son fils; Séméï, son fils.
Anglais: And the sons of Mishma; Hamuel his son, Zacchur his son, Shimei his son.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Misema: Hammuel, Zakkur, Simey.
Bulu: Bone be Mikma: Hamuel e mone wé.
Guiziga: Mikwanay ngi Misema kwana i Hamuyel, Zakur waɗ Simey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Misma boo: Misma danyi Hamuwel, Hamuwel danyi Zakkur, Zakkur danyi Sim'i.
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Misma boo: Misma danyi Hamuwel, Hamuwel danyi Zakkur, Zakkur danyi Sim'i.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Misma koo Hamuɛl, Hamuɛl koo Zakur, ɓɛɛ Zakur ko Simɛi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Misma koo Hamuɛl, Hamuɛl koo Zakur, ɓɛɛ Zakur ko Simɛi.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhilia Mishema: Haməwɛl, Zakəwr le Shimɛyi.
Tupurri: Jar ni Misma wo diñ: Hamuwel, Sakur diñ je Hamuwel, Simeyi diñ je Sakur.

Francais: - Séméï eut seize fils et six filles; ses frères n'eurent pas beaucoup de fils, et toutes leurs familles ne se multiplièrent pas autant que les fils de Juda.
Anglais: And Shimei had sixteen sons and six daughters; but his brethren had not many children, neither did all their family multiply, like to the children of Judah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Simey vuɗ guro sa jufayn doogo yam karkiya, hiɗi guro sa boyn karkiya. Ɓosiyomna may vuɗ guron ŋolɗi. Vuɗna visi may biya ŋolo ki gurona vi Yuda naɗi.
Bulu: Simeyi a nga biaé bobefam awôm a besaman a bobebinga besaman. Bobenyañ be nji ke biaé abui bon . Mebum me bôte map mese me nji ke fôé ane bone be Yuda.
Guiziga: Simey a yi ziri mizilehey kuruˀ nga merkeɗ waɗ mongosohoy merkeɗ, amma sukum naŋhaya a yam haɗa ta. Muy ngir sukwi ngi Simeyoŋhoy a ndilaka muy ngi Zuda ta na, vurˀe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sim'i woodi ɓiɓɓe worɓe sappo e njoweego e ɓiɓɓe rewɓe njoweego. Ammaa deerɗiraaɓe maako fuu ngalaa ɓiɓɓe ɗuuɗɓe, yimɓe saare maɓɓe yottaaki limgal ɓiɓɓe Yahuuda.
Fulfulde_DC: Sim'i woodi ɓiɓɓe worɓe sappo e njoweego e ɓiɓɓe rewɓe njoweego. Ammaa deerɗiraaɓe maako fuu ngalaa ɓiɓɓe ɗuuɗɓe, yimɓe saare maɓɓe yottaaki limgal ɓiɓɓe Yahuuda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Simɛi koo so be-wiwii ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk in boko-bem mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk; o nya-a̧ ko so kɔ‘i dɔk na. O bíí nú-gara kɔ-wa dɔk so hee ko o bezaŋ Juda ga na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Simɛi koo so be-wiwii ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk in boko-bem mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk; o nya-a̧ ko so kɔ‘i dɔk na. O bíí nú-gara kɔ-wa dɔk so hee ko o bezaŋ Juda ga na.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili meŋe ŋkwaŋeghəmbe le ŋwalea kwɛ ŋkwaŋe yake Shimɛyi, ama kweci ka kesaka yitenyɛ ne, keŋ'wete ŋwale hɛ kwele kwele we. Vatse sema ka yita ta Simɛyon kambake geva kwele kwele kala ŋa Zhəwda.
Tupurri: Simeyi raw biñ weere ma twerpiiri hwal ti hiira' de ma tenaare hiira' lay. Heçeçre äen biñ wo weere ngaäa do se no gaè. Moobe mani äaaran tes wo go debañ do jar ni Juda wo no gaè.

Francais: Ils habitaient à Bersabée, à Molada, à Hasar-Suhal,
Anglais: And they dwelt at Beer–sheba, and Moladah, and Hazar–shual,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi ka lakay ziy hay Ber-Seba, hay Molada, hay Hatsar-Suwal,
Bulu: Be nga too e Birséba, e Môlada a e Hatsar-Kual,
Guiziga: A pam ar walahay Berseba, Molada, Hasar-Suwal,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ɗon njooɗi haa Biirsaba e Molada e Hacar-Su'al.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ɗon njooɗi haa Biirsaba e Molada e Hacar-Su'al.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa dee so ye sɛn Bɛrseba, Mɔlada, Hasar-Sual,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa dee so ye sɛn Bɛrseba, Mɔlada, Hasar-Sual,
Kapsiki_DC: Mbe meleme nyi se hɛ kanza: Bɛrshɛba, Molada, Hasar-Shəwal,
Tupurri: Saara hay de tiñ Beer-Seba, Molada, Hatsar-Suwal,

Francais: à Bala, à Asom, à Tholad,
Anglais: And at Bilhah, and at Ezem, and at Tolad,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hay Bilha, hay Etsem, hay Tolad,
Bulu: e Bila, e Etsém, e Tôlad,
Guiziga: Bila, Esem, Tolat,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Non boo haa Bilha e Esem e Tolat,
Fulfulde_DC: Non boo haa Bilha e Esem e Tolat,
