KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bilha, Ɛsɛm, Tɔlad,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bilha, Ɛsɛm, Tɔlad,
Kapsiki_DC: Bila, Ɛsɛm, Tolad,
Tupurri: Bilha, Etsem, Tolad,

Francais: à Bathuel, à Horma, à Sicéleg,
Anglais: And at Bethuel, and at Hormah, and at Ziklag,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hay Betuwel, hay Horma, hay Siklag,
Bulu: e Bétuél, e Horma, e Tiklag,
Guiziga: Betuwel, Horma, Siklak,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: haa Betu'iila e Horma e Cikilak,
Fulfulde_DC: haa Betu'iila e Horma e Cikilak,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bɛtuɛl, Hɔrma, Siklag,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bɛtuɛl, Hɔrma, Siklag,
Kapsiki_DC: Betəwɛl, Horma, Siklag,
Tupurri: Betuwel, Horma, Siglag,

Francais: à Beth-Marchaboth, à Hasar-Susim, à Beth-Béraï et à Saarim: ce furent là leurs villes jusqu'au règne de David, et leurs villages,
Anglais: And at Beth–marcaboth, and Hazar–susim, and at Beth–biri, and at Shaaraim. These were their cities unto the reign of David.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hay Bet-Markabot, hay Hatsar-Susim, hay Bet-Birey, hiɗi Saarim. Nisi ay ki kayni nala ta-ta tam mulda vi David,
Bulu: e Bét-Markabôt, e Hatsar-Susim, e Bét-Bireyi a e Saarayim. Bitisone biap a minlame miap mbie le,
Guiziga: Bet-Markabot, Hasar-Susim, Bet-Biri waɗ Sarayim. Hanayna i walahay madiɗa taŋhay, hã a ndila Davit muzum buy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: haa Bayti-Markabot e Hacar-Susim e Bayti-Biri e Saarayim. Kanji ngonno berniiji maɓɓe diga Daawuda laamaaki tawon
Fulfulde_DC: haa Bayti-Markabot e Hacar-Susim e Bayti-Biri e Saarayim. Kanji ngonno berniiji maɓɓe diga Daawuda laamaaki tawon
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bɛt-Markabot, Hasar-Susim, Bɛt-Birɛi in Saraim. O gasa ye kɔ-wa hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ David ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bɛt-Markabot, Hasar-Susim, Bɛt-Birɛi in Saraim. O gasa ye kɔ-wa hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ David ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Bɛt-Markabot, Hasar-Səwsim, Bɛt-Biri, le Sha'arayim. Ghenci ya kameleme ta nci pa te vəa meghe David.
Tupurri: Bet-Markabod, Hatsar-Surim, Bet-Birey wo de Saarayim. Haçaç a go ti wur maga Dafid hay joñ wañ mono.

Francais: Ils avaient encore: Etam, Aën, Remmon, Thochen et Asan, cinq villes,
Anglais: And their villages were, Etam, and Ain, Rimmon, and Tochen, and Ashan, five cities:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hoyok-ziyna visi ma ŋulona hiɗi ma gurayna ki Etam, Ayin, Rimmon, Token, hiɗi Asan, hoyok-ziyn vasl;
Bulu: a kui éyoñe David a nga jôô, avale te fe bitisone bi: Etam, Ayin, Rimôn, Tôkén a Akan;
Guiziga: A cifam ar walahay madiɗa madiɗa mekelemey zlum ma: a Etam, a ayin, a Rimoŋ, a Token waɗ a Asaŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: bee gure maɓɓe. Etaam e Ayin e Rimmon e Token e Asan, berniiji jowi,
Fulfulde_DC: bee gure maɓɓe. Etaam e Ayin e Rimmon e Token e Asan, berniiji jowi,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ŋma ye kɔ-wa nɛ́ Etam, Ain, Rimɔŋ, Tɔkɛn in Asaŋ, gasa ye mɔɔrɔ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ŋma ye kɔ-wa nɛ́ Etam, Ain, Rimɔŋ, Tɔkɛn in Asaŋ, gasa ye mɔɔrɔ,
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe hɛ kese kanza mbe kweci meleme mcɛfe ɓiyitsa: Ɛtam, Ayin, Rimon, Tokɛn ba'a Ashan,
Tupurri: Äi leege äaaran wo de sir äaaran hay wo na dosen nono. Ma tigriñ hay wo ni pa diñ Etam, Ayin, Rimon, Token wo de Asan, äi leege dwee de

Francais: et tous leurs villages, qui étaient aux environs de ces villes, jusqu'à Baal. Voilà leurs habitations, et leurs registres généalogiques.
Anglais: And all their villages that were round about the same cities, unto Baal. These were their habitations, and their genealogy.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hiɗi hoyok-ziy ma gurayn kaf ma ka ŋuyi tam hoyok-ziy namna ta-ta hay Baal. Kayni mi liyn ma lakka visiya hiɗi jafna visiya.
Bulu: ô laté a minlam mia bômane bitison bite a kui Baal. Bitabaʼa biap a bindane biap mbie le.
Guiziga: Yo waɗ ar prok taŋhaya gara ma, hã sesẽŋ a Baˀalat. Li taŋ mipam anga anga i tayna so. Slimiɗ ngi mizli ngi hay taŋhaya, a tohoko taŋ le ar ɗerewol madiɗa ngi toho slimiɗeye.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: bee gure maɓɓe piltuɗe berniiji ɗi'i fuu, haa yotti Ba'al. Kanje ngoni joole maɓɓe, ɓe mbinndi boo deftere asli maɓɓe .
Fulfulde_DC: bee gure maɓɓe piltuɗe berniiji ɗi'i fuu, haa yotti Ba'al. Kanje ngoni joole maɓɓe, ɓe mbinndi boo deftere asli maɓɓe .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: in o geɗek ye nɛ̀ ya ká̧ o gasa ye nɔ‘i hɔ Baalat. O ye kɔ-wa in o pɛ́r-nam kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: in o geɗek ye nɛ̀ ya ká̧ o gasa ye nɔ‘i hɔ Baalat. O ye kɔ-wa in o pɛ́r-nam kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: tsagha kweci meleme ka ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ nyi kese dzasle yitea hɛ hwa'a kwa Ba'alat. Wa nyighɛ meleme nyi se nyighɛ hɛ mbe. Terafe sləa hwelefefia nci mbe palepa keɓela ŋkwa.
Tupurri: sir ma ti äi leege sen wo kara äuy haçaç wo go Baale. Mona diñ ngeel lagge äaaran wo de wer mani äaaran wo le ti kaçaçra ta' ta'.

Francais: Mosobab, Jemlech, Josa, fils d'Amasias,
Anglais: And Meshobab, and Jamlech, and Joshah the son of Amaziah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mekobad; Yamlet; Yosa; gurona vi Amatsiya;
Bulu: Mekôbad; Yamlek; Yôka e mone Amatsia;
Guiziga: I ti: Mesobap, Yamelek, Yosa mangal ngi Amasiya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mesobab e Yamlek e Yoosa ɓii Amasiya
Fulfulde_DC: Mesobab e Yamlek e Yoosa ɓii Amasiya
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: __Error__
Tupurri: Mesobad, Yamleg, Yosa wo diñ jar ni Amatsiya.

Francais: Joël, Jéhu, fils de Josabias, fils de Saraïas, fils d'Asiel,
Anglais: And Joel, and Jehu the son of Josibiah, the son of Seraiah, the son of Asiel,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jowel, Yehu, gurona vi Yokibiya, goora vi Seraya, goora vi Asiyel,
Bulu: Yôél, Yéhu e mone Yôkibia e mone Seraya, e mone Asiél,
Guiziga: Zowel, Yehu mangal ngi Yosibiya, Yosibiya i mangal ngi Seraya, yo i dideˀ meciɗek ngi Asiyel,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Yo'el e Yeehu, ɓii Yosibiya, ɓii Seraya, ɓii Asiyel
Fulfulde_DC: e Yo'el e Yeehu, ɓii Yosibiya, ɓii Seraya, ɓii Asiyel
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: __Error__
Tupurri: Jowel, Jehu wo diñ jar ni Yosibiya je ni Seraya, je ni Asiyel no.

Francais: Elioénaï, Jacoba, Isuhaïa, Asaïa, Adiel, Ismiel, Banaïa,
Anglais: And Elioenai, and Jaakobah, and Jeshohaiah, and Asaiah, and Adiel, and Jesimiel, and Benaiah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Elyohenay, Yaakoba; Yekohaya, Asaya, Adiyel, Yesimiyel, Benaya,
Bulu: Elioénayi, Yaakôba; Yekôhaya, Asaya, Adiel, Yesimiél, Benaya,
Guiziga: Eliyohenay, Yakoba, Yesohaya, Asaya, Adiyel, Yesimiyel, Benaya waɗ
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Eliyo'enay e Yakoba e Yesohaya e Asaya e Adiyel e Yesimiyel e Benaya
Fulfulde_DC: e Eliyo'enay e Yakoba e Yesohaya e Asaya e Adiyel e Yesimiyel e Benaya

Kapsiki_DC: __Error__
Tupurri: Elyoenay, Yaakoba, Yesohaya, Asaya, Adiyel, Yesimiyed, Benaya,

Francais: Ziza, fils de Séphéï, fils d'Allon, fils d'Idaïa, fils de Semri, fils de Samaïa.
Anglais: And Ziza the son of Shiphi, the son of Allon, the son of Jedaiah, the son of Shimri, the son of Shemaiah;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ziza, goora vi Sifey, goora vi Allon, goora vi Yedaya, goora vi Simri, goora vi Semayeya,
Bulu: Ziza e mone Sifeyi e mone Alôn, e mone Yedaya, e mone Simri, e mone Semaéya.
Guiziga: Ziza, mangal ngi Sifey, yo i dideˀ meciɗek ngi Aloŋ, Aloŋ vuna i dideˀ ngi Yedaya, ngi Simri ati Semaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Ziza ɓii Sifi, ɓii Allon, ɓii Yedaya, ɓii Simiri, ɓii Sema'ya,
Fulfulde_DC: e Ziza ɓii Sifi, ɓii Allon, ɓii Yedaya, ɓii Simiri, ɓii Sema'ya,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: __Error__
Tupurri: Sisa wo diñ jar ni Sifey je ni Alon, je ni Yedaya, je ni Semaeya no.

Francais: Ces hommes désignés par leurs noms étaient princes dans leurs familles. Leurs maisons patriarcales ayant pris un grand accroissement,
Anglais: These mentioned by their names were princes in their families: and the house of their fathers increased greatly.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: sum sa nay yi semda visi tan kayni nisi si sa ŋulona kuɗ jafna visiya, jafna visi biya ŋolo.
Bulu: Ba bi ndôme tote biyôlé le be mbe bivet e mebume map a menda me bôte map me nga fôé abui.
Guiziga: Mizli mizilaka slimiɗ taŋhay ani na i buyoy a wuzla muy taŋhaya, mizli ngi hay taŋhay a yam haɗi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ɓe'e limtaaɓe innde innde laati ardiiɓe ci'e , ci'e maɓɓe ɗuuɗi masin.
Fulfulde_DC: ɓe'e limtaaɓe innde innde laati ardiiɓe ci'e , ci'e maɓɓe ɗuuɗi masin.

Tupurri: Jar se maga aè kañ ëu äaara la wo diñ wañre ma ti moobe äaaran wo, day feele mani äaaran tes wo debañ debañ.

Francais: ils allèrent vers l'entrée de Gador, jusqu'à l'orient de la vallée, afin de chercher des pâturages pour leurs troupeaux.
Anglais: And they went to the entrance of Gedor, even unto the east side of the valley, to seek pasture for their flocks.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kali ta-ta hay vun Gedor, ta-ta hay gal kuɗuwu vi lokŋa, kay gar liyn ma hatna kay farayna visiya.
Bulu: Be nga ke mfaʼa anyiine Gedor a kui e mbiʼili mfaʼa jôp da tôô, na be jeñe bidi asu mimbame biyeme miap.
Guiziga: A waham ɓaˀ li, hã a ndilam sesẽŋ a Gedor, tisi pas ngi miprik ngi sozo, ngi sipa gwat ngi zum da ginew taŋhay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam maajum ɓe ndilli nastirde Gedor haa yotti fuunaaŋge waadiwol, haa ɓe ɗaɓɓita durduɗe ngam dammooji maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam maajum ɓe ndilli nastirde Gedor haa yotti fuunaaŋge waadiwol, haa ɓe ɗaɓɓita durduɗe ngam dammooji maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ wa pɛsi yak si ká̧ Gɛdɔr nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese kur ɗoŋgɔ mɛ, kii nɛ̀ fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ wen o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ wa pɛsi yak si ká̧ Gɛdɔr nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese kur ɗoŋgɔ mɛ, kii nɛ̀ fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ wen o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Vatse se hɛ kapesle geva mbe pa va Gedor kwa ŋkwa kepəkwə ta veci va zlərə kezha sepa nda gwəzə ke timɛti.
Tupurri: Saara dus wo go nen jag feele Gedor haçaç wo wo go nen nen wur botoñ log no, ma kië ngeel koë fiiri äaaran wo.

Francais: Ils trouvèrent des pâturages gras et bons, et un territoire spacieux, tranquille et paisible; ceux qui y habitaient auparavant provenaient de Cham.
Anglais: And they found fat pasture and good, and the land was wide, and quiet, and peaceable; for they of Ham had dwelt there of old.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi fi hat ma goɗayna ma ŋaana, nagata ta beɗay ŋolo kaw, ta tuni kiliŋ hay sle'ta, kay sum sa li ziy haya' jewna nisi si jafna vi Kam.
Bulu: Be nga yene bidi bi ne abeñ a abui éfuse si éziñ é too anen a évôvoé, e vôme mvoñe bôte Sam é nga too melu mvus.
Guiziga: A lumam li zum mezle da ginew taŋhay a diga, li mufuk fuk, yo a cifam jam jam, a pulam vu. Mipam zleˀe a diga i dideˀ ngi Kamay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe keɓi durduɗe booɗɗe, nafooje, non boo lesdi njaasndi koo toy fuu bee de'ere e jam, ngam jooɗiiɓe ton naane ɓe danygol Haamu.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe keɓi durduɗe booɗɗe, nafooje, non boo lesdi njaasndi koo toy fuu bee de'ere e jam, ngam jooɗiiɓe ton naane ɓe danygol Haamu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa kpaa o de mbɔɗi zɔ̧; fara'i duk nɛ́ de ga̧a̧ fara nɛ̀ pɛsa-a. Nɛ́ o bezaŋ Kam a̧ yaa so hi̧i̧ nɛti.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa kpaa o de mbɔɗi zɔ̧; fara'i duk nɛ́ de ga̧a̧ fara nɛ̀ pɛsa-a. Nɛ́ o bezaŋ Kam a̧ yaa so hi̧i̧ nɛti.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ ntsate ŋkwa keya wəshi ganji nyi nza nya nza gwəzə te kwele kwele te kwete hɛɗi nya bezle ba'a nya gwezlayɛ, nya se hwelefefia Sham te vəashi.
Tupurri: Saara raw da' ngeel koëge ma debañ ga hoçoç ni lay diñ sir ma kluu lay, ëeged lay, jam lay, werga jar maga hay wo de tiñ tañgu ni diñ jar ma ti wer mani Kam wo.

Francais: Ces hommes, inscrits par leurs noms, arrivèrent du temps d'Ezéchias, roi de Juda; ils détruisirent leurs tentes, ainsi que les Maonites qui se trouvaient là et, les ayant dévoués à l'anathème jusqu'à ce jour, ils s'établirent à leur place, car il y avait là des pâturages pour leurs troupeaux.
Anglais: And these written by name came in the days of Hezekiah king of Judah, and smote their tents, and the habitations that were found there, and destroyed them utterly unto this day, and dwelt in their rooms: because there was pasture there for their flocks.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay liyna vi Ezekiyas mulla vi Yuda kayni, sum nisi sa nay yisi sesin lakŋi co'o; guɗukŋa hiɗi liyn ma buura hay liy namna nisi tom gaa'a, sum sa hayna nisi cisi goyo, nisi lak hay baŋalsiya ta-ta vaydi, kay liyn ma hatna kay farayna visi ka'a.
Bulu: Melu Ezékias, njô bôte ya Yuda, bôte bete be nga suan, e môé map me too ntilan; be nga tyame menda bindelé a bitabaʼa bise be nga koone bie valé, be nga mane jiane bôte ya si éte a kui môse wu, a be nga tabe éjiane jap, amu bidi bi mbe valé asu bone mimbame biyeme miap.
Guiziga: Naŋ kine, ar vi ngi Ezekiyas, buy ngi Zuda na, buyoy mizilaka slimiɗ taŋhay wurenna, a ndiloko, a mbizlaka guɗukoy ati mazlaɓ ngi dideˀ ngi Kamaya, waɗ a ngizlaka mizli pay wãˀ, wurenna wus ngi gwat taŋ neˀ anta a diga mata. A dirba nah, taŋ a pam ar li taŋ, asi giziŋ ngi zum da ginew taŋhay ada a diga.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limtaaɓe innde innde go ngari nder zamanu Hezekiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, ɓe kalki laymaaji ɓeya e Me'uni'en jooɗiiɓe ton, ɓe nattini ɓe haa wargo hannde. Ɓe njooɗi haa pellel maɓɓe, ngam durduɗe ɗon ton ngam dammooji maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Limtaaɓe innde innde go ngari nder zamanu Hezekiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, ɓe kalki laymaaji ɓeya e Me'uni'en jooɗiiɓe ton, ɓe nattini ɓe haa wargo hannde. Ɓe njooɗi haa pellel maɓɓe, ngam durduɗe ɗon ton ngam dammooji maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i nɛ̀‘i tɔra kinii'i tɛ̀ɛ̀ tɛ́ ŋgimbi wan ko Ezɛkias wannu Juda. Wa ɗaŋa o fara-duk in o tua-laa ko o bíí fara'i, kum nɛ̀ wa nɛ̀‘i iŋ géé oi-wa sɔsɔɔ ɓɔna. Wa dee ye oi wa, wen o fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ a̧a̧ so hi̧i̧ wen o geɗek mɔ-dai kɔ-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i nɛ̀‘i tɔra kinii'i tɛ̀ɛ̀ tɛ́ ŋgimbi wan ko Ezɛkias wannu Juda. Wa ɗaŋa o fara-duk in o tua-laa ko o bíí fara'i, kum nɛ̀ wa nɛ̀‘i iŋ géé oi-wa sɔsɔɔ ɓɔna. Wa dee ye oi wa, wen o fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ a̧a̧ so hi̧i̧ wen o geɗek mɔ-dai kɔ-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Va nya nza nde te vəa nya nza Ɛzɛkiyas kameghea ka Zhəwda ne, na ka meghe nyi hekate sləa nci nyighɛ mbeli kezamte sebe te yɛ cɛ lekwesa le kweci ŋkwa nyi se hwelefe nyi ta Sham mbe kampəmte mbeli nyi ɗema mbeli kaɗepe sebe ta nci ɓeshi. Kwetere wəmbəa ŋkɛ, pa hɛ nzanji te ŋkwa nya se mbeli nyighɛ, kwa nza nde kwele kwele se gwəzə kezeme ta wəshi te kezha timɛtia nci.
Tupurri: Ti kal mani Esekiyas wañ Judan mono, jar sen la hay wo go de yer ëu äaara, saara raw age, älag wo tiñ ma de bagge mani jar sirn wo go de duuli maga hay wo ni wo go, taw wo jar sirn wo go haçaç wara. Saara kal wo laa tiñ go ti ngeel äaara werga aà hay da' wo ngeel koë fiiri äaaran wo ni.

Francais: Des fils de Siméon allèrent aussi à la montagne de Séïr, au nombre de cinq cents hommes; Phaltias, Naarias, Raphaïas et Oziel, fils de Jési, étaient à leur tête.
Anglais: And some of them, even of the sons of Simeon, five hundred men, went to mount Seir, having for their captains Pelatiah, and Neariah, and Rephaiah, and Uzziel, the sons of Ishi.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Simeyon kaw, nisi ir sumun kis-vasl, nisi kali kay hiɗiyt Seyir. Sum sa tuni voksin kayni: Pelatiya, Nehariya, Refaya, hiɗi Uziyel, gurona vi Yikey.
Bulu: Bone be Siméoñ fe, bôte mintete mitan, be nga ke e minkôle ya Séyir. Pelatia, Nearia, Refaya a Uziél, bone Yiseyi be too bivete biap.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Simeyoŋhoyo cah, a ram ngir ti vay muwã ngi Edom, taŋ mizli skat skat zlum. Mikaka taŋ mbuŋ i ziri ngi Seˀirey mufaɗa: Pelatiya, Neyariya, Refaya waɗ Uziyel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Woɗɓe nder yimɓe Simeyon, worɓe teemeɗɗe njowo njehi haa hooseere Se'ir. Pelatiya e Ne'ariya e Refaya e Uzziyel, ɓiɓɓe Yisi ardi ɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Woɗɓe nder yimɓe Simeyon, worɓe teemeɗɗe njowo njehi haa hooseere Se'ir. Pelatiya e Ne'ariya e Refaya e Uzziyel, ɓiɓɓe Yisi ardi ɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ŋma bíí gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ tɛ zuduk ko Simɛɔŋ nɛɛ kɔ‘i si zu kaya Sɛir. O gasawi kɔ-wa so nɛ́ Pɛlatia, Nɛaria, Rɛfaya in Uziɛl; wa nɛ́ o bem ko Yisɛi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ŋma bíí gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ tɛ zuduk ko Simɛɔŋ nɛɛ kɔ‘i si zu kaya Sɛir. O gasawi kɔ-wa so nɛ́ Pɛlatia, Nɛaria, Rɛfaya in Uziɛl; wa nɛ́ o bem ko Yisɛi.
Kapsiki_DC: Le kweci mbeli gwəmsə mcɛfe nyi mbe yita ta Simɛyon kedzembenji kanza te hɛɗia ka Ɛdom hwa ghweme. Ma mbeli nyi te ghəa nci, wəfaɗe hɛ: yɛ Pelatiya, Nɛyariya, Refaya, ba'a Əwziyɛl, kaŋwalea Ishɛyi.
Tupurri: Jar ni Simeyoñ mapo wo kiskis dwee raw wo wo go ti huuli ma Seyir wo. Jar ma pel äaaran hay wo diñ Pelatiya, Meariya, Refaya wo de Usiyel, jar ni Yisey wo.

Francais: Ils battirent le reste des Amalécites qui avaient échappé, et ils s'établirent là jusqu'à ce jour.
Anglais: And they smote the rest of the Amalekites that were escaped, and dwelt there unto this day.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Dir sumuna vi Amalek sa pir goyna nisi cisi goyo, nisi lak hay liy namna ta-ta vaydi.
Bulu: Be nga mane wôé mebukaʼa ya Beamalésite be nga mane tup a tabe valé a zu kui e môse wu.
Guiziga: Mizli Amalekey milaham zleˀe, mira pam a diga na, a kiɗaka taŋ vagay vagay. Dar taŋ a pam ar li taŋ, hã dana aruŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe mbari daɗɓe Amaleki'en luttuɓe, nden ɓe njooɗi ton haa wargo hannde.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe mbari daɗɓe Amaleki'en luttuɓe, nden ɓe njooɗi ton haa wargo hannde.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa bìí oi o be Amalɛk nɛ̀ yuu so mɔ si hi̧i̧, ɓɛɛ wa de ye hi̧i̧ hɔ sɔsɔɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa bìí oi o be Amalɛk nɛ̀ yuu so mɔ si hi̧i̧, ɓɛɛ wa de ye hi̧i̧ hɔ sɔsɔɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ mpəmte ka Amalɛk nyi mba teghweme nyi kehwɛnji kanzanji pelɛagha. Mba hwelefe ta nci pa va ɓeshi te ŋkwa shɛ.
Tupurri: Saara raw taw jar Amaleg maga hay dañ wo wo go ni wo go, day laa wo tiñ go ti ngeel ni haçaç wara.

Francais: Fils de Ruben, premier-né d'Israël. - Car il était le premier-né; mais, parce qu'il souilla la couche de son père, son droit d'aînesse fut donné aux fils de Joseph, fils d'Israël, non, toutefois, pour que Joseph fût inscrit dans les généalogie comme premier-né.
Anglais: Now the sons of Reuben the firstborn of Israel, (for he was the firstborn; but, forasmuch as he defiled his father's bed, his birthright was given unto the sons of Joseph the son of Israel: and the genealogy is not to be reckoned after the birthright.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Ruben, ma vuɗi jewna vi Israyel. Kay namu mi ma vuɗi jewna; may kay nam muɗ liyn ma buura vi bulum liwisi, nisi sli ŋolda valam goyo, vula' mi gurona vi Yosef goora vi Israyel; ki kayn nala Ruben selem may ɗoy kulo voko kuɗ ŋolda valamɗi.
Bulu: Ruben, ntôle mone Israél, amu nye a nga taté bialé, vʼamu a nga bo nsem énoñ ésaa, nde éto ntôle jé é nga veban e be bone be Yôsep, e mone Israél; ajô te be nji ke bo élañe bôte Ruben avalʼane éto ntôle jé é mbe.
Guiziga: Ruben i modogom ngi Zakop zleˀe, amma a dirba naŋ mihin ti ngwas ngi cine na, gi modogom naŋ a tuwuɗ ng'avi ziri mizile ngi Zozefey, Zozef i mangal ngi Zakop vuna ya. Ruben a tiri i modogom mata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ruben woni afo baaba muuɗum. Ammaa o huuwi cemtiniiɗum, o waaldi bee culaaɗo baaba maako. Ngam maajum daraja afaaku maako hokkaama ɓiɓɓe Yusufu ɓii Isra'iila. Innde maako nastaay deftere asli fodde afaaku .
Fulfulde_DC: Ruben woni afo baaba muuɗum. Ammaa o huuwi cemtiniiɗum, o waaldi bee culaaɗo baaba maako. Ngam maajum daraja afaaku maako hokkaama ɓiɓɓe Yusufu ɓii Isra'iila. Innde maako nastaay deftere asli fodde afaaku .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Rubɛn duka nɛ́ kaya-bem ko  Israɛl . Ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa duka in ŋma zɔŋa-kóò ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ dàlà ga, wa baa ŋgai ko kaya-bem er-a yinɛ ha̧ ha̧ o bem ko Jozɛf, bem ko  Israɛl , ɓɛɛ e a̧ hee wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ ŋgai mɛ duk kaya-bem na ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Rubɛn duka nɛ́ kaya-bem ko  Israɛl . Ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa duka in ŋma zɔŋa-kóò ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ dàlà ga, wa baa ŋgai ko kaya-bem er-a yinɛ ha̧ ha̧ o bem ko Jozɛf, bem ko  Israɛl , ɓɛɛ e a̧ hee wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ ŋgai mɛ duk kaya-bem na ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Tezhɛa wəzege ta Zhakob Rəbɛn, ama kwa se ŋkɛ kaɓelahe le kwete male ta yitenyɛ, pa mbeli ndeke nda kwelea ŋkɛ ke ŋwalea Zhozɛf nya kakwete wəzege ta Zhakob perə. Mba Rəbɛn kanya kwele ɓiyitsa we.
Tupurri: La diñ jar ni Ruben jag weel Israyel no. AÀ hay mbe diñ jag weel no, day wer maga a suu go de waçy pan äe, dem fen suuli pan äen go mono, aè haç nen mo mani jag weeln go ne jar ni Josef je ni Israyeln no. Diñ wersen so ga aè sra' jar ni Ruben wo ti faage mani jag weeln gaa mono.

Francais: Car Judas fut puissant parmi ses frères, et de lui est issu un prince. Mais le droit d'aînesse est à Joseph.
Anglais: For Judah prevailed above his brethren, and of him came the chief ruler; but the birthright was Joseph's:)
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay gasita, Yuda nam muɗ dono ŋolo suw guro-biyomna, sa ma tun vok sumuna may goy hay nam pa; may ŋolda na' vi Yosef.
Bulu: Yuda nye a nga dañ éwôlô e bobenyañ été a e nne môt a nga suʼulane bo évet a nga so be nye, ve Yôsep a nga nyoñ éto ntôl.
Guiziga: Naŋ kine, Zuda a tiri madiɗa angi sukum naŋhaya, Yarma a bo ti vaŋ, amma gi modogomo i ngi Zozef.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yahuuda laati mawɗo caka deerɗum'en, gooto diga danygol maako boo laati ardiiɗo. Ammaa daraja afaaku laatani Yusufu .
Fulfulde_DC: Yahuuda laati mawɗo caka deerɗum'en, gooto diga danygol maako boo laati ardiiɗo. Ammaa daraja afaaku laatani Yusufu .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Juda duka nɛ́ gasawi mgbara o nya-a̧, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ŋma bezaŋ-aa a̧ ɔɔ wan  Israɛl ; mɔ kpɔk, ŋgai ko kaya-bem ɓɔna so kànà nɛ́ er Jozɛf.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Juda duka nɛ́ gasawi mgbara o nya-a̧, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ŋma bezaŋ-aa a̧ ɔɔ wan  Israɛl ; mɔ kpɔk, ŋgai ko kaya-bem ɓɔna so kànà nɛ́ er Jozɛf.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma Zhəwda le ŋa ŋkɛ ne, gheŋkɛ nde se berete ma hwa ŋwalea yitenyɛ, hwa ŋwalea ŋkɛ ntave geva wəndə nya kenza kameghe mbe Israyɛl, ama ke Zhozɛf ndeke nda kwele mbeli.
Tupurri: Je maga hay de eegre yoo heçeçre äen wo diñ Juda, je ma seege de kaçaçran hay kal le go na see äe, ama mo mani jag weeln go diñ ma Josefe.

Francais: - Fils de Ruben, premier-né d'Israël: Enoch, Phallu, Esron et Charmi.
Anglais: The sons, I say, of Reuben the firstborn of Israel were, Hanoch, and Pallu, Hezron, and Carmi.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Ruben ma vuɗi jewna vi Israyel: Henok, Pallu, Hesron hiɗi Karmi.
Bulu: Bone be Ruben, ntôle mon Israél: Hénok, Palu, Etsroñ a Karmi.
Guiziga: Ruben, modogom ngi Zakopo, ziri naŋhaya i ti: Hanok, Pallu, Hesroŋ, waɗ Karmi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Ruben, afo Isra'iila ngoni: Hanok e Pallu e Hesruunu e Karmi.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Ruben, afo Isra'iila ngoni: Hanok e Pallu e Hesruunu e Karmi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Rubɛn kaya-bem ko  Israɛl  nɛ́ Hanɔk, Palu, Hɛsrɔŋ in Karmi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Rubɛn kaya-bem ko  Israɛl  nɛ́ Hanɔk, Palu, Hɛsrɔŋ in Karmi.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhilia Rəbɛn nya katezhɛa wəzege ta Zhakob: Hanok, Paləw, Hɛsron ba'a Karmi.
Tupurri: Jar ni Ruben jag weel Israyeln wo diñ: Henog, Palu, Hesron wo de Karmi.

Francais: Fils de Joël: Samia, son fils; Gog, son fils; Séméï, son fils;
Anglais: The sons of Joel; Shemaiah his son, Gog his son, Shimei his son,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Jowel: Semayeya, Gog, Simey,
Bulu: Bone be Yôél: Semaéya e mone wé; Gôg e mone wé. Siméyi e mone wé;
Guiziga: Ziri mizile, mikwanay ngi Zoweley i ti: Zowel a yi Semaya, Semaya a yi Gok, Gok a yi Simey,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa danygol Yo'el: Yo'el danyi Sema'ya, Sema'ya danyi Gog, Gog danyi Sim'i,
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa danygol Yo'el: Yo'el danyi Sema'ya, Sema'ya danyi Gog, Gog danyi Sim'i,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Jɔɛl nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Jɔɛl koo Sɛmaya, Sɛmaya koo Gɔg, Gɔg koo Simri,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Jɔɛl nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Jɔɛl koo Sɛmaya, Sɛmaya koo Gɔg, Gɔg koo Simri,
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhilia Zhowɛl: Shemaya, Gog, Shimɛyi,
Tupurri: Jar ni Jowel wo diñ: Semaeya pan Gog, je Gog diñ Simey,

Francais: Micha, son fils;
Anglais: Micah his son, Reaia his son, Baal his son,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mikka, Reyaya, Baal;
Bulu: Miké e mone wé; Reaya e mone wé; Baal e mone wé;
Guiziga: Simey a yi Mika, Mika a yi Reyaya, Reyaya a yi Baˀal,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sim'i danyi Mika, Mika danyi Re'aya, Re'aya danyi Ba'al,
Fulfulde_DC: Sim'i danyi Mika, Mika danyi Re'aya, Re'aya danyi Ba'al,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Simri koo Mika, Mika koo Rɛaya, Rɛaya koo Bal.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Simri koo Mika, Mika koo Rɛaya, Rɛaya koo Bal.
Kapsiki_DC: Mika, Rɛyaya, Ba'al
Tupurri: Je Simey diñ Mise, je Mise diñ Reaya, je Reaya diñ Baal,

Francais: Réïa, son fils; Baal, son fils; Bééra, son fils, que Thelgathphalnasar, roi d'Assyrie, emmena captif: il fut un des princes des Rubénites.
Anglais: Beerah his son, whom Tilgath–pilneser king of Assyria carried away captive: he was prince of the Reubenites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Beera, ma Tiglat-Pilneser  mulla vi Asiriya kalam gorvo'o, namu mi ma ŋolla vi jafna vi Ruben.
Bulu: Beéra e mone wé nye Tilgat-Pilnéser, njô bôte ya Asiri, a nga kee nye nkôm: a mbe évete ya bone be Ruben.
Guiziga: yo Baˀala kwana a yi Beˀera micifi buy ngi mizli Rubeney. Buy ngi ruwuy Asiri, mazilaka Teglat-Falazar a ja nga ruwuy naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ba'al danyi Beera. O hooreejo yimɓe Ruben. Tigilat-Pileser, laamiiɗo Assuura dahi mo .
Fulfulde_DC: Ba'al danyi Beera. O hooreejo yimɓe Ruben. Tigilat-Pileser, laamiiɗo Assuura dahi mo .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ Bal ko Beɛra nɛ̀ Tilgat-Pilnɛzɛr, wannu Asirii baa so yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara; a̧ duka nɛ́ be-wan ko o bezaŋ Rubɛn.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ Bal ko Beɛra nɛ̀ Tilgat-Pilnɛzɛr, wannu Asirii baa so yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara; a̧ duka nɛ́ be-wan ko o bezaŋ Rubɛn.
Kapsiki_DC: ba'a Beyɛra. Ma Beyɛra shɛ ne, kameghea ka Rəbɛn se ŋkɛ, nya keseghe Tɛglat-Falasar, meghea ka Siri kadzete kwete ŋkwa.
Tupurri: je Baal diñ Beera maga Tilgat-Pilneser wañ Asiri baan wo go dañgay mono: AÀ hay diñ wañ pel jar ma ti wer mani Rubenn wo.

Francais: - Frères de Bééra, chacun selon sa famille, tels qu'ils sont inscrits dans les généalogies selon leurs générations: le chef, Jéhiel; Zacharie;
Anglais: And his brethren by their families, when the genealogy of their generations was reckoned, were the chief, Jeiel, and Zechariah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ɓosiyom Beera, kuɗ vuɗna visiya, ki nisi ka ɗoy kuɗ tuwsi nala: Ma jewna Yeyel, Zakariya,
Bulu: Bobenyañe be Beéra, ane mebume map me né avale be ne nlañan be tôñe mebialé map: Yeiél ntô, Zakari,
Guiziga: Beˀera, sukum naŋ ngi jambahaya, vur tizere vur tizere, slimiɗ taŋhay i mutoho le toh toh ar ɗerewol ngi toho slimiɗe: mudumbuŋ i Yehiyel, a dirba nah i Zakari,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Banndiraaɓe maako fodde ci'e maɓɓe mbinndaama e nastinaama nder deftere asli bana ni'i: Ye'iyel woni arano, nden Zekariya
Fulfulde_DC: Banndiraaɓe maako fodde ci'e maɓɓe mbinndaama e nastinaama nder deftere asli bana ni'i: Ye'iyel woni arano, nden Zekariya
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O nya Beɛra nɛ̀ yaa nɛ́ gasawi nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ̀ nin-wa yɔra zaŋ kalata nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: kuti bíí nɛ́ Yɛyɛl, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Zakarii,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O nya Beɛra nɛ̀ yaa nɛ́ gasawi nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ̀ nin-wa yɔra zaŋ kalata nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: kuti bíí nɛ́ Yɛyɛl, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Zakarii,
Kapsiki_DC: Ka kesaka yitenyɛa Beyɛra, na mbeli rafete sləa nci ke sebe ke sebe: Yɛyiyɛl nde ghate, pa Zakari
Tupurri: Heçeçre Beera maga wo go de yerge ti moobe ta' ta'a, go ti ngeel kaçaçge äaara ti' ti' wo diñ: Yeyel ma tañgu no, diñ Sakari,

Francais: Bala, fils d'Azaz, fils de Samma, fils de Joël. Bala habitait à Aroër, et jusqu'à Nébo et à Béel-Méon;
Anglais: And Bela the son of Azaz, the son of Shema, the son of Joel, who dwelt in Aroer, even unto Nebo and Baal–meon:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bella, goora vi Azaz, goora vi Sema, goora vi Jowel, nam musi ziy hay Arower, ta-ta hay Nebo hiɗi Baal-Mewon;
Bulu: Béla e mone Azaz, e mone Séma, e mone Yôél. A nga too Aroér, a kui Nébô a Baal-Meôn:
Guiziga: ngi dirba wãˀ i Bela mangal ngi Azas, i dideˀ meciɗek ngi Sema, yo i dideˀ ngi popurok ngi Zowel. Mizli Rubeneye, taŋ zleˀe a ruwuy misi ar wala ngi Aroˀer tir vay ruwuy, muwã Nebo ati walahay Baˀal-Mehoŋ tir vay muŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Bela ɓii Azaza ɓii Sema ɓii Yo'el. Kaŋko o jooɗi haa Aro'er haa yotti Nebo e Ba'al-Me'on.
Fulfulde_DC: e Bela ɓii Azaza ɓii Sema ɓii Yo'el. Kaŋko o jooɗi haa Aro'er haa yotti Nebo e Ba'al-Me'on.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ sɔŋkur-aa nɛ́ Bɛla, bem ko Azaz. Bɛla nɛ́ be-koo Sɛma bem ko Jɔɛl. O bezaŋ Rubɛn duka ɔ, e Arɔɛr nɛ̀ war ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ e kaya Nɛbo in ye Bal-Mɛɔŋ nɛ̀ war ŋgɔn.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ sɔŋkur-aa nɛ́ Bɛla, bem ko Azaz. Bɛla nɛ́ be-koo Sɛma bem ko Jɔɛl. O bezaŋ Rubɛn duka ɔ, e Arɔɛr nɛ̀ war ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ e kaya Nɛbo in ye Bal-Mɛɔŋ nɛ̀ war ŋgɔn.
Kapsiki_DC: ba'a Bɛla, wəzege ta Azaz, wəzege ta Shɛma nya kawəzege ta Zhowɛl. Te kwete hɛɗi kwelɛ yɛ Arowɛr nya laka bela kwa zeme, le ghweme ta Nɛbo ba'a le meleme ta ka Ba'al-Mɛyon laka bela kwa gwela se hwelefe ta Rəbɛn kanza.
Tupurri: diñ Bela je ni Asas, je ni Sema je ni Jowel no. AÀ hay de tiñ Arower haçaç wo go ti huuli Nebo, haçaç wo go Baal-Mewoñ.

Francais: à l'orient, il habitait jusqu'à l'entrée du désert, qui va depuis le fleuve de l'Euphrate, car leurs troupeaux étaient nombreux dans le pays de Galaad.
Anglais: And eastward he inhabited unto the entering in of the wilderness from the river Euphrates: because their cattle were multiplied in the land of Gilead.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hay gal ma kuɗuwna, nam ka musi ta-ta goy vun fulda, tun caw tam niy-lumna Eufrata pa, kay farayna visi ay ŋolo hay nagata Galaad.
Bulu: mfaʼa jôp da tôô, a nga too a kui anyiine ya nkôte si, ataté ôsôé Efrat, amu mimbame biyeme miap mi mbe abui e si ya Galad.
Guiziga: Tisi pas ngi miprike, a pam ndah ndah, hã sesẽŋ a miher ngi wuzlaɓuh mikirɗak kirɗak, mawuɗoka walahay taŋ ati mizaw Babiloŋ mazilaka Efrat, asi tir vay Galaˀat nah na, taŋ ti gezleŋ ngi ginewey haɗi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Heedi fuunaaŋge o jooɗi haa yotti nastirde ladde gaa'e maayo Efratis, ngam yimɓe maako marno tokke ɗuuɗɗe nder lesdi Gile'at.
Fulfulde_DC: Heedi fuunaaŋge o jooɗi haa yotti nastirde ladde gaa'e maayo Efratis, ngam yimɓe maako marno tokke ɗuuɗɗe nder lesdi Gile'at.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa ɔɔ ye hɔ nú ŋga-gbárà nɛ̀ a̧a̧ mgbara wa in nana-yí Efrat si daŋa-wese wen nɛ̀ o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa ɔ dɔka sɛn tɛ nú Galad'i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa ɔɔ ye hɔ nú ŋga-gbárà nɛ̀ a̧a̧ mgbara wa in nana-yí Efrat si daŋa-wese wen nɛ̀ o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa ɔ dɔka sɛn tɛ nú Galad'i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma laka ŋkwa kesame ta veci ne, pa va sleme ta ɓerama nya kaghala kwelɛ hɛɗia nci le Efrate se hɛ. Va nya nza nde kwele kwele wəshi keseɗa va hɛ te hɛɗia Gala'ad.
Tupurri: Go nen wur botoñ mono, sir äen le' wo go haçaç jag puuli no, mañ le de Efrad maarog ma de paçaçge no, werga horog äaaran hay wo debañ äil sir Galaade.

Francais: Du temps de Saül, ils firent la guerre aux Agaréens, qui tombèrent entre leurs mains, et ils habitèrent dans leurs tentes, sur tout le côté oriental de Galaad.
Anglais: And in the days of Saul they made war with the Hagarites, who fell by their hand: and they dwelt in their tents throughout all the east land of Gilead.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay liyna vi Sawul kayni, nisi li duura hiɗi sum sa Hagariyena, nisi kol kisiya; nisi lak hay guɗukŋa visiya, hay gal ma kuɗuwna vi Galaad kafe.
Bulu: Melu Saül, be nga wosane Behagarénieñ, be ve ku e mo map; be nga tabe e menda bindelé map, éfas ése ya Galad e jôp da tôô.
Guiziga: Ar vi ngi Sawul na, a gam vurum ati mizli Hagrihey, a lumam bugawla a hirnga taŋ, a pam ar li misi tisi pas ngi miprik ngi Galaˀata cek cek.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder zamanu laamiiɗo Sawulu ɓe mbaɗi konu bee Hagari'en, ɓe njaali ɓe. Nden ɓe njooɗi nder cuuɗi Hagari'en haa lesdi Gile'at fuunaaŋgeeri fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder zamanu laamiiɗo Sawulu ɓe mbaɗi konu bee Hagari'en, ɓe njaali ɓe. Nden ɓe njooɗi nder cuuɗi Hagari'en haa lesdi Gile'at fuunaaŋgeeri fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi wan ko Saul, wa bìí biro in o be Hagri, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ wa, ba nù nɛ̀ a̧a̧ ká̧ Galad nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi wan ko Saul, wa bìí biro in o be Hagri, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ wa, ba nù nɛ̀ a̧a̧ ká̧ Galad nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe vəa Sawəl ne, nahe hɛ kese kampa le ka Hagri ba'a hərəte hɛ. Kwetere wəmbəa ŋkɛ, pa hɛ nzanji mbe dzeyi mbe yɛ cɛ lekwesa ta nci te pɛtɛa hɛɗi nyi laka ŋkwa kesame ta veci yitea Gala'ad.
Tupurri: Ti wur mani Sawuln mono, saara raw dur jar Hagarid wo, jar sen leë wo go ne hara äi coo do saara kal laage go äil tiñ äaara ma de baggen wo, go ti sir Galaad ma nen wur botoñn äuy.

Francais: Les fils de Gad habitaient vis-à-vis d'eux dans le pays de Basan, jusqu'à Selcha.
Anglais: And the children of Gad dwelt over against them, in the land of Bashan unto Salecah:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Gad ka lakay goy voksi ɗiger hay nagata vi Basan, ta-ta hay Salka.
Bulu: Bone be Gad be nga too be Zôsôô, e si ya Basañ a kui Salka.
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Gataya kwana, a pam tir vay muŋ ngi mizli Rubeney, ar ɗigar micay ngi Basaŋ, hã sesẽŋ a Salka tisi pas ngi mipriki.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe Gada njooɗi, tiitotiri bee yimɓe Ruben nder lesdi Baasan haa yotti Salka:
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe Gada njooɗi, tiitotiri bee yimɓe Ruben nder lesdi Baasan haa yotti Salka:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Gad ɔɔ tan ŋmaa in o bezaŋ Rubɛn sɛn nú Basaŋ hɔ Salka.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Gad ɔɔ tan ŋmaa in o bezaŋ Rubɛn sɛn nú Basaŋ hɔ Salka.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ŋwale tezhilia Gad ne, kwa kema kwa kema le hɛ se hɛ te hɛɗia Bashan pa mbe Salka:
Tupurri: Jar ni Gad hay wo de laa tiñ kar de jar ni Ruben wo äil sir Basañ haçaç wo go Salka.

Francais: C'étaient: le chef, Joël; le second, Saphan, puis Janaï et Saphath, en Basan.
Anglais: Joel the chief, and Shapham the next, and Jaanai, and Shaphat in Bashan.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jowel ma jewna, Safan ma ma'na, Yayenay hiɗi Safat hay Basan.
Bulu: Yôél ntô, Safam ébatan, Yaénayi a Safat, e Basañ.
Guiziga: Mizli misi a diga, mihaɗa i sukwi ngi Zowel, mijingaˀ taŋ i sukwi ngi Safaŋ waɗ sukwi ngi Yanay ati Safat
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yo'el arano, Safam ɗiɗaɓo, nden Ya'anay e Safat nder Baasan.
Fulfulde_DC: Yo'el arano, Safam ɗiɗaɓo, nden Ya'anay e Safat nder Baasan.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kuti nú-gara nɛ́ ko Jɔɛl, yiitoo-aa nɛ́ ko Safam, sɛka ko Yaɛnai in ko Safa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kuti nú-gara nɛ́ ko Jɔɛl, yiitoo-aa nɛ́ ko Safam, sɛka ko Yaɛnai in ko Safa.
Kapsiki_DC: Zhowɛl nde ghate, Shafan nde zhɛte kadzeyite, ba'a yɛ Yanay le Shafat.
Tupurri: AÀ hay wo diñ: Jowel jag cerew no, Safam ma de äog no, diñ Yaenay wo de Safad wo ti sir Basañ.

Francais: Leurs frères, d'après leurs maisons patriarcales, étaient: Michaël, Mosollam, Sébé, Joraï, Jachan, Zié et Héber: sept.
Anglais: And their brethren of the house of their fathers were, Michael, and Meshullam, and Sheba, and Jorai, and Jachan, and Zia, and Heber, seven.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ɓosiyosina kuɗ vuɗna visiya visiya: Mikayel, Mesullam, Seba, Yoray, Yayekan, Ziya hiɗi Eber, nisi siɗiya.
Bulu: Bobenyañ, avalʼane menda me bôte map me né be mbe na: Mikaél, Mesulam, Séba, Yôrayi, Yaékan, Zia a Eber, bôte zamgbwa.
Guiziga: A dirba taŋ ma na, sukwi mekelemey ada tarnaˀa ma: i sukwi ngi Mikayel, Mesulam, Seba, Yoray, Yakaŋ, Ziya waɗ sukwi ngi Eber.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Banndiraaɓe maɓɓe fodde ci'e maɓɓe ngoni: Mika'iilu e Mesullam e Seba e Yoray e Ya'akan e Ziya e Eber, ɓe njoweeɗiɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: Banndiraaɓe maɓɓe fodde ci'e maɓɓe ngoni: Mika'iilu e Mesullam e Seba e Yoray e Ya'akan e Ziya e Eber, ɓe njoweeɗiɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ŋma nú-gara nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nya-wa nɛ́ ko Mikaɛl, Mɛsulam, Seba, Yɔrai, Yakaŋ, Zia in Ebɛr; wa lɛŋ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ŋma nú-gara nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nya-wa nɛ́ ko Mikaɛl, Mɛsulam, Seba, Yɔrai, Yakaŋ, Zia in Ebɛr; wa lɛŋ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Kapsiki_DC: Ɓiyitsa, le kweci yita ta mbeli shɛ mberefaŋe tagha: ŋa yɛ Mikayɛl, Meshəwlam, Shɛba, Yoray, Yakan, Ziya ba'a Ɛbɛr.
Tupurri: Heçeçre äaara go ti feele ta' ta' hay wo diñ: Mikayel, Mesulam, Seba, Yoray, Yaekañ, Siya wo de Eber, wo renam.

Francais: Ils étaient fils d'Abihaïl, fils de Huri, fils de Jara, fils de Galaad, fils de Michaël, fils de Jésési, fils de Jeddo, fils de Buz.
Anglais: These are the children of Abihail the son of Huri, the son of Jaroah, the son of Gilead, the son of Michael, the son of Jeshishai, the son of Jahdo, the son of Buz;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si gurona vi Abihayil, goora vi Huri, goora vi Yarowak, goora vi Galaad, goora vi Mikayel, goora vi Yesisay, goora vi Yahdo, goora vi Bowaz;
Bulu: Be mbe bone be Abihayil e mone Huri, e mone Yarôa, e mone Galad, e mone Mikaél, e mone Yesikayi e mone Yadô, e mone Buz;
Guiziga: Muɗuvaka sukwi tayna, i ziri ngi Abihayiley, Abihayil i mangal ngi Huri, Huri i mangal ngi Yarowa, Yarowa i mangal ngi Galaˀat, Galaˀat i mangal ngi Mikayel, Mikayel i mangal ngi Yesisay, Yesisay i mangal ngi Yado, Yado kwana i mangal ngi Bus.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ɓiɓɓe Abihayil ɓii Huuri ɓii Yaroha ɓii Gile'at ɓii Mika'iilu ɓii Yesisay ɓii Yahado ɓii Bus.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ɓiɓɓe Abihayil ɓii Huuri ɓii Yaroha ɓii Gile'at ɓii Mika'iilu ɓii Yesisay ɓii Yahado ɓii Bus.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kuti zɔmdáa nɛ̀ koo o bem nɛ̀ o nú-gara nɔ‘i gboo sɛnɛ nɛ́ Bihail; a̧ nɛ́ sɔŋkur bezaŋ Buz nɛ̀ koo Yaro; Yaro koo Yesisai, Yesisai koo Mikaɛl, Mikaɛl koo Galad, Galad koo Yatɔa, Yatɔa koo Huri, ɓɛɛ Huri ko Abihaɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kuti zɔmdáa nɛ̀ koo o bem nɛ̀ o nú-gara nɔ‘i gboo sɛnɛ nɛ́ Bihail; a̧ nɛ́ sɔŋkur bezaŋ Buz nɛ̀ koo Yaro; Yaro koo Yesisai, Yesisai koo Mikaɛl, Mikaɛl koo Galad, Galad koo Yatɔa, Yatɔa koo Huri, ɓɛɛ Huri ko Abihaɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Mbeli nyi keŋslete yita shɛhɛ ne, ŋwalea Abihayil wəzege ta Həwri, wəzege ta Yarowa, wəzege ta Gala'ad, wəzege ta Mikayɛl, wəzege ta Yɛshishay, wəzege ta Yado, wəzege ta Bəwz.
Tupurri: Mokay diñ jar ni Abihayil je ni Huri, je ni Yarowa, je ni Galaad je ni Mikayel je ni Yesisay, je ni Yaholo, je ni Bus no.

Francais: Achi, fils d'Abdiel, fils de Guni, était chef de leurs maisons patriarcales.
Anglais: Ahi the son of Abdiel, the son of Guni, chief of the house of their fathers.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ahi goora vi Abdiyel, goora vi Guni mi ma ŋolla vi jafna visiya.
Bulu: Ahi, e mone Abdiél, e mone Guni, a mbe nlô ya menda me bôte map.
Guiziga: Buy ngi hay taŋ, i Ahi mangal ngi Abdiyel, dideˀ meciɗek ngi Guni.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ahi ɓii Abdiyel ɓii Guni woni baaba saare maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ahi ɓii Abdiyel ɓii Guni woni baaba saare maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ahi bem ko Abdiɛl, be-koo Guni nɛ́ gasawi nutua kɔ-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ahi bem ko Abdiɛl, be-koo Guni nɛ́ gasawi nutua kɔ-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ahi, wəzege ta Abdiyɛl nya kawəzege ta Gəwni nde se kameghe nya te ghəa yita nyighɛ.
Tupurri: Ahi je ni Abdiyel je ni Gunin hay diñ je ma pel feele mani äaaran wo.

Francais: Ils habitaient en Galaad, en Basan, et dans les villes de leurs dépendances, et dans tous les pâturages de Saron jusqu'à leurs extrémités.
Anglais: And they dwelt in Gilead in Bashan, and in her towns, and in all the suburbs of Sharon, upon their borders.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi ka li ziy hay Galaad, hay Basan hiɗi naga ma kuɗumna, hiɗi voora vi Saron kaf, ta-ta hay vunam ma vat goyna.
Bulu: Be nga too e Galad, e Basañ a minlam yʼété, a minlam mise mia bômane Saroñ a kui mekuʼu map.
Guiziga: dideˀ ngi Gataya, a pam zleˀe a ruwuy Galaˀat ati Basaŋ waɗ prok taŋhay, Saroŋ li zum ti ginewey, hã avu kiɗa mi ngi maakway taŋhaya rek rek.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kamɓe ɓe njooɗi nder lesɗe Gile'at e Baasan e nder gure maaje, non boo haa durduɗe Saron haa yotti keeri maaje.
Fulfulde_DC: Kamɓe ɓe njooɗi nder lesɗe Gile'at e Baasan e nder gure maaje, non boo haa durduɗe Saron haa yotti keeri maaje.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa duka ɔ nú Galad in sɛn nú Basaŋ in tɛ o be ye nɛ̀ a̧a̧ ká̧ fara'i, hɔ nɛnɛ Sarɔŋ fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ ko o mɔ-dai nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa duka ɔ nú Galad in sɛn nú Basaŋ in tɛ o be ye nɛ̀ a̧a̧ ká̧ fara'i, hɔ nɛnɛ Sarɔŋ fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ ko o mɔ-dai nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Te hɛɗia Gala'ad le hɛɗia Bashan ba'a kweci meleme nyi yite, zlaɓe le ŋkwa keya wəshi nyi mbe Saron pɛtɛ hwa'a te ŋkwa nya zhigə hɛɗia nci se hɛ kanza.
Tupurri: AÀ hay wo de tiñ äil sir Galaad, äil sir Basañ wo de ngeel maga wo ti äe mono, ti ngeel maga wo ti Saron mo äuy haçaç leë wo go ti hagu äaaran wo tem tem.

Francais: Tous ces fils de Gad furent enregistrés dans les généalogies du temps de Joatham, roi de Juda, et du temps de Jéroboam, roi d'Israël.
Anglais: All these were reckoned by genealogies in the days of Jotham king of Judah, and in the days of Jeroboam king of Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi ŋaɓsi goyo kuɗ jafna visi kaf hay liyna vi Yotam mulla vi Yuda, hay liyna vi Yerobowam mulla vi Israyel kaw.
Bulu: Bese be nga lañeban e bindan melu Yôtam, njô bôte ya Yuda a nga too a melu Yérôbôam baa, njô bôte ya Israél a nga jôô.
Guiziga: Hirak ti Yotam mazum buy a ruwuy Zuda, yo Zeroboˀam mazum buy a ruwuy Israyel na, a tohoko slimiɗ ngi sukwi tayna le cek ar ɗerewol ngi toho slimiɗe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe fuu ɓe mbinndaama nder deftere asli nder zamanu Yotam, laamiiɗo Yahuuda e Yerobo'am laamiiɗo Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe fuu ɓe mbinndaama nder deftere asli nder zamanu Yotam, laamiiɗo Yahuuda e Yerobo'am laamiiɗo Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa yɔra nin-wa lɛŋ tɛ ŋgimbi wan ko Yɔtam wannu Juda in ko Jeroboam wannu  Israɛl .
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa yɔra nin-wa lɛŋ tɛ ŋgimbi wan ko Yɔtam wannu Juda in ko Jeroboam wannu  Israɛl .
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbeli nyi mbe hwelefefia shɛhɛ ne, nahe sləa nci kerafete geva mbe palepa nya nza slə mbe te vəa yɛ Yotam, meghea ka Zhəwda le Zhɛrobowam, meghea ka Israyɛl.
Tupurri: AÈ hay yer ëu äaara go ti kaçaçge äaara ti' ti' ti kal mani Yotam wañ Juda no, ti wur mani Jerobowam wañ Israyel no.

Francais: Les fils de Ruben, les Gadites et la demi-tribu de Manassé avaient de vaillants hommes, portant le bouclier et l'épée, tirant de l'arc, et exercés à la guerre, au nombre de quarante quatre mille sept cent soixante, en état d'aller à l'armée.
Anglais: The sons of Reuben, and the Gadites, and half the tribe of Manasseh, of valiant men, men able to bear buckler and sword, and to shoot with bow, and skilful in war, were four and forty thousand seven hundred and threescore, that went out to the war.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jafna vi Ruben, jafna vi Gad hiɗi gal-jafna vi Manase ka hiɗi sum sa nagayn jarsiya, sa asay kay ziy marayna hiɗi kew-gaferaŋa, dur hiɗi ɓarawta, sa hatay duura noŋ pet nisi birim dok-fiɗi yam fiɗi diram kis-siɗiya kalam dok-karkiya, sa asay kay tuɗ vun duura.
Bulu: Mvôʼô Ruben, mvôʼô Gad a éfas ayoñe Manasé be nga bili biwôlô bi bôte, be beʼe ében a nkpwaté mekôn, be wuʼa élaé , be too fe nkômesan asu bita, bôte toyini mewôm menyin a ényin, mintete zamgbwa a mewôm mesaman, be too nguleya ke wosan.
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Rubeney, ngi Gatay waɗ reta ngi dideˀ ngi Manaseheye, taŋ a wuzla mizli miwirwirey, mikaw kaw ti mbaray waɗ maslalamay, gaway, yo a dubunaka gi vurumo le, taŋ mizli durmuk kukur mufaɗ nga mufaɗ, ti skat skat tarnaˀ ti kukur merkeɗe, mindilaka le ngi ru ng'ar vurumo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe Ruben e yimɓe Gada e reeta lenyol Manassa, worɓe honooɓe, jogiiɓe bawarɗe  e kaafaaje, tirooɓe lagaaje, waawɓe konu fuu, taaskaniiɓe haɓre, limgal maɓɓe waɗi ujine cappanɗe nayo e nayo e teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo e cappanɗe njoweego (44.760).
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe Ruben e yimɓe Gada e reeta lenyol Manassa, worɓe honooɓe, jogiiɓe bawarɗe  e kaafaaje, tirooɓe lagaaje, waawɓe konu fuu, taaskaniiɓe haɓre, limgal maɓɓe waɗi ujine cappanɗe nayo e nayo e teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo e cappanɗe njoweego (44.760).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Rubɛn, o bezaŋ Gad in reeta zuduk ko Manase yaa so nɛ́ o ŋga wi-ba-ŋgee, o wi-hɛr-gba-paa in o wi-pi̧-góò nɛ̀ yamba bíí biro. O bíí kɔ-wa nɛ̀ nyɛma mɛ nɛ̀ biro nɛ́ booro-ɓu-naar-zua-naar-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-zua-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Rubɛn, o bezaŋ Gad in reeta zuduk ko Manase yaa so nɛ́ o ŋga wi-ba-ŋgee, o wi-hɛr-gba-paa in o wi-pi̧-góò nɛ̀ yamba bíí biro. O bíí kɔ-wa nɛ̀ nyɛma mɛ nɛ̀ biro nɛ́ booro-ɓu-naar-zua-naar-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-zua-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma yɛ yita ta Rəbɛn le ŋa Gad ba'a kwete bela ta yita ta Manasɛ ne, ka sewajɛ ya va hɛ gare 44.760 nyi gare mpa le gelə, le kafayɛ keɗema le rəgi, nyi kehi hi yitea mpa.
Tupurri: Werpiiri ma tinoo maga wo de ko ëaw gidigli wo de moslam, wo de ko jwag waa lay, wo de ko ëeñ durgi lay hay wo we yoo jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Ruben no, yoo mani Gadn wo de nus äï¡ï¡ni mani Manase no. Saara hay ndar do naa ti naa de jar kiskis renam ti äe do hiira'a, wo äuy de kaçaçge ma laage go jag jaw.

Francais: Ils firent la guerre aux Agaréens, à Jéthur, à Naphis et à Nodab;
Anglais: And they made war with the Hagarites, with Jetur, and Naphish, and Nodab.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi li duura hiɗi sum sa Hagariyena, sum sa Yetura, hiɗi sa Nafisna hiɗi sa Nodabna.
Bulu: Be nga wosane Begarénieñ e Yetur, e Nafik a e Nôdab.
Guiziga: A gam vurum ati Hagrihey, ati dideˀ ngi Yaturoy, Nafikey waɗ Nodapay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe mbaɗi konu bee Hagari'en e yimɓe Yetuuru e Naafis e Nodaba.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe mbaɗi konu bee Hagari'en e yimɓe Yetuuru e Naafis e Nodaba.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa bìì o be Hagri in bezaŋ Yatur, Nafis in Nɔdab.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa bìì o be Hagri in bezaŋ Yatur, Nafis in Nɔdab.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ menete mpa le ka Hagri, le hwelefe ta yɛ Yetəwr, le ŋa Nafish ba'a le ŋa Nodab.
Tupurri: Saara kal dur jar Hagarid wo äi leege Yetur, Nafis wo de Nodabe.

Francais: Ils furent aidés contre eux, et les Agaréens et tous ceux qui étaient avec eux furent livrés entre leurs mains. Car ils avaient crié vers Dieu pendant le combat, et il les avait exaucés, parce qu'ils s'étaient confiés en lui.
Anglais: And they were helped against them, and the Hagarites were delivered into their hand, and all that were with them: for they cried to God in the battle, and he was entreated of them; because they put their trust in him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi fi gutda kay sa Hagariyena hiɗi sum sa kuɗsina vulis goy hay ɓisi kafe. Kay hay buura vi duur kayni, nisi tiy tam Lawna, nam hum tiyta visiya, kay nisi vul tuwsi hay ɓalamu.
Bulu: Be nga nyoñe mvolane ya wosane be; Begarénieñ a ba ba be be bese be mbe be nga ku e mo map. Amu e mewosane zañ be nga yône be Zambe, Nyô a nga kañese na be yeʼelane nye amu be nga ve bebiene be nye.
Guiziga: Angi vurum nah, a cufuɗam jini avu Buymisemuŋ, asi a pulakaŋ mevel taŋ le. Dar Buymisemuŋ a cine dir dibiɗ taŋ, a vula taŋ Hagrihey ati mizli ngi si taŋhay gar asi haŋ taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder haɓre ɓe tori Allah, kaŋko o jaɓi tornde maɓɓe ngam ɓe ɗon kooli mo. O walli ɓe haɓugo bee konne'en maɓɓe, o hokki ɓe jaalorgal dow Hagari'en e wonduɓe bee maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder haɓre ɓe tori Allah, kaŋko o jaɓi tornde maɓɓe ngam ɓe ɗon kooli mo. O walli ɓe haɓugo bee konne'en maɓɓe, o hokki ɓe jaalorgal dow Hagari'en e wonduɓe bee maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɔ̧ gbaka wa, ɓɛɛ wa bi o be Hagri. A̧ aa o be Hagri er wa in o wi nɛ̀ yee so ɗoŋ wa. A̧ zia aia-nú kɔ-wa tɛ ŋgimbi biro'i wen wa e so ta nɛ̀ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɔ̧ gbaka wa, ɓɛɛ wa bi o be Hagri. A̧ aa o be Hagri er wa in o wi nɛ̀ yee so ɗoŋ wa. A̧ zia aia-nú kɔ-wa tɛ ŋgimbi biro'i wen wa e so ta nɛ̀ a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe hɛ keŋ'wete kemane. Pa ka Hagri mbe dzeve ta nci ba'a mbeli nyi kejikəte geva le hɛ kwa 'yɛwakɛ kemane hɛ va Shala, pa ŋkɛ yipəyi nda kwa ke hɛ kwa vate ghə hɛ te.
Tupurri: AÈ caa war äaara le ma kay rage jag durgi no, jar Hagarid wo de jar maga hay wo wer äaara mo äuy laa wo go ne hara äi coo do. Gahaçyla, de maga jar ni Ruben wo, jar ni Gad wo de nus jar ni Manasen hay wo jag jaw mono, saara kal rage ne Baa ti, se raw laa jag äaara wer maga aà hay wo de kañ ëiggi äaara ti äe.

Francais: Ils enlevèrent leurs troupeaux, cinquante mille chameaux, deux cent cinquante mille brebis, deux mille ânes, et cent mille personnes,
Anglais: And they took away their cattle; of their camels fifty thousand, and of sheep two hundred and fifty thousand, and of asses two thousand, and of men an hundred thousand.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi yaw farayna vi sum nisina: Lamgan birim dok-vasl, fukunayna birim kis-ma' hiɗi diram dok-vasl, kuron birim ma', sumun birim kis kaw.
Bulu: Be nga bi biyeme biap: Bekamel toyini mewôm metan, bikela a mintômba toyini mintete mibaé a mewôm metan, bijakas toyini ébaé, nalé fe bôt e ntete toyini;
Guiziga: A tuɓoko ginew taŋhaya: zlogomohoy durmuk kukur zlum, tumuŋ ati ˀawaya durmuk skat skat cuw ti kukur zlum, zunguhoy durmuk cuw, waɗ bekehey durmuk skata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe kooci dabbaaji konne'en maɓɓe: Geelooɗi ujine cappanɗe jowi (50.000) e dammooji ujine teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi e cappanɗe jowi (250.000) e bamɗe ujine ɗiɗi (2.000), non boo yimɓe ujine teemerre (100.000).
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe kooci dabbaaji konne'en maɓɓe: Geelooɗi ujine cappanɗe jowi (50.000) e dammooji ujine teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi e cappanɗe jowi (250.000) e bamɗe ujine ɗiɗi (2.000), non boo yimɓe ujine teemerre (100.000).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa kaia o mɔ-dai ko o wi nɔ‘i: duka nɛ́ ŋgeloba booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, o geɗek mɔ-dai booro-gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, o tuifuu booro-yiitoo, in o bíí booro-gɔmŋmaa mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa kaia o mɔ-dai ko o wi nɔ‘i: duka nɛ́ ŋgeloba booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, o geɗek mɔ-dai booro-gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, o tuifuu booro-yiitoo, in o bíí booro-gɔmŋmaa mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe hɛ kefəhwe wəshi keseɗa ta nci: zlegwemə 50.000, timɛti le kwi 250.000, kwara 2.000 ba'a mbeli nyi keseve hɛ 100.000.
Tupurri: AÀ kal wo yaçë horog de fuçy äaaran wo: Yoñyoñ wo ndar do dwee, fiiri de äaale äaara ndar kiskis äog ti äe ndar do dwee, gerheçeçre wo ndar äoge, jar tebere wo ni ndar kis lay.

Francais: car il était tombé beaucoup de morts, parce que la guerre était de Dieu. Et ils s'établirent à leur place jusqu'à la captivité.
Anglais: For there fell down many slain, because the war was of God. And they dwelt in their steads until the captivity.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay hay buur namna sumun mit ŋolo, kay duur namna may vi Lawn pa. Nisi lak hay baŋalsiya ta-ta nisi kalsi goy gorvo kafe.
Bulu: bôt abui be nga wu, amu bita bi nga so be Zambe. Be nga tabe e vôme wop a kui éyoñe ya Minkôm.
Guiziga: A kiɗaka mizli sunok sunok, a gi kanah, asi miga vurum i Buymisemuŋ. Dar taŋ a pam ar li ngi Hagriheye, a ndiram a diga, hã ar hin ngi ɓul taŋ ngaˀr beke.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Naawnaaɓe ɗuuɗɓe maayi, ngam Allah bee hoore muuɗum waɗi haɓre maajum. Ɓaawoɗon yimɓe le'i ɗiɗi e reeta go njooɗi haa pellel ɓeya haa yotti saa'i daheeki.
Fulfulde_DC: Naawnaaɓe ɗuuɗɓe maayi, ngam Allah bee hoore muuɗum waɗi haɓre maajum. Ɓaawoɗon yimɓe le'i ɗiɗi e reeta go njooɗi haa pellel ɓeya haa yotti saa'i daheeki.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bíí kuma nɛ̀ dɔka-a wen duka so nɛ̀ biro ko Sɔ̧. O bezaŋ Rubɛn in Gad bá nɛ̀ reeta zuduk ko Manase baa fara oi o wi nɔ‘i hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa kaia wa nɛ̀ bara yaknɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bíí kuma nɛ̀ dɔka-a wen duka so nɛ̀ biro ko Sɔ̧. O bezaŋ Rubɛn in Gad bá nɛ̀ reeta zuduk ko Manase baa fara oi o wi nɔ‘i hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa kaia wa nɛ̀ bara yaknɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe hɛ kempəmte ka ghema ta nci kwele kwele va nya nza nde se va Shala se mpa shɛ. Pa hɛ nzanji te ŋkwa nya se hɛ pa te və nya fəhwe hɛ mbeli kadzete kwete ŋkwa cakeɗake.
Tupurri: Jar debañ huë wo go werga durgin a le do Baa. Saara raw laa tiñ go ti ngeel äaara haçaç go ti wur maga aè hoo ra wo go ti dañgay mono.

Francais: Les fils de la demi-tribu de Manassé habitaient dans le pays depuis Basan jusqu'à Baal-Hermon et à Sanir, et à la montagne d'Hermon; ils étaient nombreux.
Anglais: And the children of the half tribe of Manasseh dwelt in the land: they increased from Bashan unto Baal–hermon and Senir, and unto mount Hermon.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi gal-jafna vi Manase ka lakay ziy hay nagata, fokay hay Basan pa ta-ta Baal-Hermon, hay Senir pa, ta-ta tam hiɗiyta vi Hermon; nisi ŋolo.
Bulu: Bone be éfas ayoñe Manasé be nga too si ataté Basañ a kuyi Baal-Hermon, e Semir a e nkôle Hermon; be mbe abui.
Guiziga: Reta ngi sukwi ngi Manase, a soko, a pam a ruwuy mazli zle a Basaŋ hã sesẽŋ a Baˀal-Hermoŋ, a Senir a muwã Hermoŋ. Sukwi ngi Manase naŋ haɗi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe reeta lenyol Manassa njooɗi haa lesdi maajum diga Baasan haa yotti Ba'al-Hermoon e Seniira e hooseere Hermoon, ɓe ɗuuɗɓe masin.
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe reeta lenyol Manassa njooɗi haa lesdi maajum diga Baasan haa yotti Ba'al-Hermoon e Seniira e hooseere Hermoon, ɓe ɗuuɗɓe masin.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O reeta bezaŋ zuduk ko Manase ɔɔ kɔ‘i ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ Basaŋ nɛ̀ ɗɔɔ hɔ nɛnɛ Bal-Hɛrmɔŋ, Sɛnir in kaya Hɛrmɔŋ nɛ̀ ŋgɔn. Wa dɔka so nyɛmna.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O reeta bezaŋ zuduk ko Manase ɔɔ kɔ‘i ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ Basaŋ nɛ̀ ɗɔɔ hɔ nɛnɛ Bal-Hɛrmɔŋ, Sɛnir in kaya Hɛrmɔŋ nɛ̀ ŋgɔn. Wa dɔka so nyɛmna.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwete bela ta yita ta Manasɛ ne, pa hɛ lə kanzanji te hɛɗi nya kwelɛ Bashan, laka bela kwa zeme le Ba'al-Hɛrmon, kwelɛ yɛ Senir le Hɛrmon laka bela kwa gwela. Kwele kwele yanji mbeli nyi mbe.
Tupurri: Nus jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Manasen hay wo de tiñ äil sir no, ur le Basañ haçaç wo go Baal-Hermoñ, wo go Senir wo de huuli Hermoñ. Saara hay ngaäa debañ.

Francais: Voici les chefs de leurs familles: Epher, Jési, Eliel, Ezriel, Jérémia, Odoïa et Jédiel, hommes forts et vaillants, hommes de renom, chefs de leurs maisons patriarcales.
Anglais: And these were the heads of the house of their fathers, even Epher, and Ishi, and Eliel, and Azriel, and Jeremiah, and Hodaviah, and Jahdiel, mighty men of valour, famous men, and heads of the house of their fathers.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si sa ŋulona vi jafna visiya: Efer, Yikey, Eliyel, Azriyel, Yeremiyas, Hodaviya hiɗi Yahdiyel, sum sa dono'o, faray kaw, sum sa sesi tiya, kayni si nisi sa ŋulona vi jafna.
Bulu: Minlô ya menda me bôte map e mie mi: Efer, Yiseyi, Eliél, Azriél, Yérémi, Hôdavia a Yadiel, biwôlô a minkukume mi bôt, bôte ya duma, be too minlô ya menda me bôte map.
Guiziga: Buy ngi hay taŋhay gar, slimiɗ t'ani: Efer, Isey, Aliyel, Aziriyel, Irmeya, Hodaviya waɗ Yadiyel. Taŋ cek i mizli miwirwirey, slimiɗ taŋ ara zil.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa ɓe'e ngoni baaba-ci'e'en  maɓɓe: Efer e Yisi e Eliyel e Ajiriyel e Yeremiya e Hodawiya e Yahadiyel, ɓe fuu ɓe honooɓe semmbiɗɓe, worɓe tedduɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa ɓe'e ngoni baaba-ci'e'en  maɓɓe: Efer e Yisi e Eliyel e Ajiriyel e Yeremiya e Hodawiya e Yahadiyel, ɓe fuu ɓe honooɓe semmbiɗɓe, worɓe tedduɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O gasawi nutua kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Efɛr, Yisɛi, Eliɛl, Azriɛl, Yirmɛya, Hɔdavia in Yadiɛl. Wa duka so nɛ́ o ŋgaŋa-wi nɛ̀ nin-wa ɔ hura nyɛmna.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O gasawi nutua kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Efɛr, Yisɛi, Eliɛl, Azriɛl, Yirmɛya, Hɔdavia in Yadiɛl. Wa duka so nɛ́ o ŋgaŋa-wi nɛ̀ nin-wa ɔ hura nyɛmna.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi sləa mbeli nyi te ghəa yita shɛhɛ nyi: Ɛfɛr, Ishɛyi, Ɛliyɛl, Azriyɛl, Zhɛrɛmi, Hodaviya le Yadiyɛl. Kambeli nyi nza zləvə te ba'a nyi nza sləa nci pa tema tema se hɛ.
Tupurri: Mokay diñ ëu wañre moobe äaaran wo: Efer, Yisey, Eliyel, Asriyel, Jermi, Hodafiya wo de Yahdiyele, saara diñ jar po ma de eegre wo lay, wo de horog lay, diñ jar ma de ëu wo, diñ wañre ma ti feele äaaran wo.

Francais: Mais ils furent infidèles au Dieu de leurs pères, et ils se prostituèrent en servant les dieux des peuples du pays que Dieu avait détruits devant eux.
Anglais: And they transgressed against the God of their fathers, and went a whoring after the gods of the people of the land, whom God destroyed before them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May nisi noy Lawna vi sumaysi goyo, tun caw muɗ tuwsi viyuwu kuɗ lawayna vi sum sa hay nagata sa Lawn ɓulaksi goy voksina.
Bulu: Ve be nga bo te tabe e Zambe bʼésaa ndi, a bo bijabô ya tôñe bezambe meyoñe ya si éte, mme Zambe a nga jian ôsu viap.
Guiziga: A gam teŋteŋ avu Buymisemuŋ ngi dideˀ taŋhaya ta, a pulakaŋ mbak, a huruk hurukam a mbuŋ kuli ngi mizli Buymisemuŋ mingizla taŋ pay a mbuŋ taŋ tuwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe lenyol Ruben bee Gada e reeta lenyol Manassa ngewi umroore Allah kaakiraaɓe muuɗum'en, ɓe ɗakkotiri bee labbi ummaatooje lesdi man ɗe Allah nattinno yeeso maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe lenyol Ruben bee Gada e reeta lenyol Manassa ngewi umroore Allah kaakiraaɓe muuɗum'en, ɓe ɗakkotiri bee labbi ummaatooje lesdi man ɗe Allah nattinno yeeso maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Rubɛn, Gad, in reeta zuduk ko Manase dee so ŋgazu in Sɔ̧ ko o dáà kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa gasi o sɔ̧ ko o bíí tɛ nù nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ ɗaŋa so nɛ̀ yí-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Rubɛn, Gad, in reeta zuduk ko Manase dee so ŋgazu in Sɔ̧ ko o dáà kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa gasi o sɔ̧ ko o bíí tɛ nù nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ ɗaŋa so nɛ̀ yí-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama, kese hɛ kanza dɛŋe dɛŋe te Shala ta ka shihɛ nci we. Pa hɛ zlenekɛ kalənji yitea hawe va yɛ shala ta mbeli nyi mbe meleme nyi zamte sebe Shala te hɛ mbe kema ta nci.
Tupurri: Ama saara lag de deele see Baa mani paçaçre äaaran wo gaa, glub wo see äaara go de baa mani jar ma ti sirn maga Baa hay taw ra go ne hara pel mono.

Francais: Le Dieu d'Israël excita l'esprit de Phul, roi d'Assyrie, et l'esprit de Thelgathphalnasar, roi d'Assyrie; et Thelgathphalnasar emmena captifs les Rubénites, les Gadites et la demi-tribu de Manassé, et il les conduisit à Hala, à Habor, à Ara et au fleuve de Gozan, où ils sont demeurés jusqu'à ce jour.
Anglais: And the God of Israel stirred up the spirit of Pul king of Assyria, and the spirit of Tilgath–pilneser king of Assyria, and he carried them away, even the Reubenites, and the Gadites, and the half tribe of Manasseh, and brought them unto Halah, and Habor, and Hara, and to the river Gozan, unto this day.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lawna vi Israyel zut Pul mulla vi Asiriya katsiya, nam zut Tilgat-Pilneser  mulla vi Asiriya katsiya. Tilgat-Pilneser yaw jafna vi Ruben, jafna vi Gad hiɗi gal-jafna vi Manase, nam kalsi hay Halah, hay Habor, hay Hara, kel niy-lumna Gosan kaw, nisi lak ɗawni ta-ta vaydi.
Bulu: Zambe ya Israél a nga fôʼô nleme Pul, njô bôte ya Asiri a e nleme Tilgat-Pilnéser, njô bôte ya Asiri; Ane Tilgat-Pilnéser a nga kee mvôʼô Ruben, mvôʼô Gad a éfas ayoñe Manasé e minkôm. A nga kee be Hala, e Habor a e Hara, a ôsôé Gôzan, e vôm be nga tabe a kui môse wu.
Guiziga: Dar Buymisemuŋ ngi Israyele, a slikiɗa mevel da buy Asirihey, Pul ati Tegal-Falazar, ɓa a cam, a jaka mizli Rubeney, Gatay waɗ reta ngi sukwi ngi Manase tuwa, nga hirwuy Hala, Habor, Hara waɗ nga ciki mizaw Gozaŋ, t'ada a diga hã dana aruŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam maajum Allah Isra'iila ummini ɓerɗe Pul e Tigilat-Pileser, laamiiɓe Assuura ngam dahugo  yimɓe Ruben e yimɓe Gada e reeta lenyol Manassa haa Halah e maayo Habor e Hara e maayo Goosan. Ton ɓe ngoni haa wargo hannde .
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam maajum Allah Isra'iila ummini ɓerɗe Pul e Tigilat-Pileser, laamiiɓe Assuura ngam dahugo  yimɓe Ruben e yimɓe Gada e reeta lenyol Manassa haa Halah e maayo Habor e Hara e maayo Goosan. Ton ɓe ngoni haa wargo hannde .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hegɔ, Sɔ̧ dee ha̧ o wannu Asirii, Pul in Tilgat-Pilnɛzɛr mɛ kur zu wa, ɓɛɛ kai wa nɛ̀ bara yaknɛ si Hala, Habɔr, in Hara in si ká̧ nana-yí Gozaŋ hɔ sɔsɔɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hegɔ, Sɔ̧ dee ha̧ o wannu Asirii, Pul in Tilgat-Pilnɛzɛr mɛ kur zu wa, ɓɛɛ kai wa nɛ̀ bara yaknɛ si Hala, Habɔr, in Hara in si ká̧ nana-yí Gozaŋ hɔ sɔsɔɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma tagha gɛ, pa Shala ta ka Israyɛl feɗeghete mehele ta Pəwl, meghea ka Asiri ba'a ŋa Tɛglat-Falasar, meghea ka Asiri yitea hɛ. Pa ŋkɛ fəghe hwelefefia Rəbɛn, ŋa Gad ba'a kwete bela ta hwelefefia Manasɛ kadzete hɛɗia Hala, Habor ba'a Hara, terasle yitea hələa Gozan nya nza hɛ pa ɓeshi.
Tupurri: Baa ma Israyeln raw jaçë nen Pul, wañ Asiri le ne hara ti, srog wer Tilgat-Pilneser wañ Asiri le ne hara ti, day Tilgat-Pilneser raw hoo jar ni Ruben wo, jar ni Gad wo, nus jar ni Manase wo wo go ti dañgay, se kal rawge de äaara wo go Hala, go Habor, go Hara, wo go jag Gosan maarog ma de paçaçge no, saara wo go de tiñ ni haçaç wara.

Francais: Johanan engendra Azarias: c'est lui qui exerça le sacerdoce dans la maison que Salomon bâtit à Jérusalem; Azarias engendra Amarias;
Anglais: __Error__
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yohanan vuɗ Azariya ma li lop ɗifinna hay Tempella ma Salomon inim hay Yerusalemna.
Bulu: Yôhanañ a nga biaé Azaria a nga bo ésaé ntuni e Nda Zambe Solômon a nga lôñ e Yérusalém.
Guiziga: Yohanaŋ a yi Azariya. Azariya i mbur micifi ngi gi mikuli ar hay ngi Buymisemuŋ, Salomoŋ mindira a Zeruzalem na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yohanan danyi Azariya mo laati limanjo nder haykaliiru ndu Suleymaanu nyiɓi haa Urusaliima.

KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ Yohanaŋ ko Azaria. Nɛ́ Azaria’ɛ a̧ duka wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ Salomɔŋ dee so sɛn Jerusalɛm.

Francais: Josédec partit pour l'exil quand Yahweh fil emmener en captivité Juda et Jérusalem par l'intermédiaire de Nabuchodonosor.
Anglais: __Error__
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma Ma-Vatɗina yaw sa Yudana hiɗi Yerusalem goy gorvo hay ɓam Nebukadnesar kayni, Yehotsadak kali (gorvo'o) hay na'ta.
Bulu: Yehôsadak a nga ke éyoñe Nti a nga kee Yuda a Yérusalém e minkôm a wo Nébukatnétzar.
Guiziga: Ti Bumbulvuŋ mupula jiviɗ da Nabukodonozor, ɓa a ja Zeruzalemey ati Zudahay nga ruwuy naŋ na, a jaka Yosadaka le a haŋ ya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yocadak dahaama, yaake Jawmiraawo dahi Yahuuda e Urusaliima bee juŋngo Nabukodonosor.
Fulfulde_DC: Yocadak dahaama, yaake Jawmiraawo dahi Yahuuda e Urusaliima bee juŋngo Nabukodonosor.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ GASA WAN dee nɛnɛ ha̧ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr mɛ kai o bíí Jerusalɛm in o be Juda nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ, Yɛhɔsadak duka so mgbara wa mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ GASA WAN dee nɛnɛ ha̧ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr mɛ kai o bíí Jerusalɛm in o be Juda nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ, Yɛhɔsadak duka so mgbara wa mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Nabəkodonozor kesehwe Yosadak kwa ŋkaghe mbeli nyi mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm Mahwətə zlaɓe le mbeli nyi mbe Zhəwda kanza te kwete ŋkwa cakeɗake.
Tupurri: Yehosadag kal rawge de maga Manwur hoo jar Juda wo de jar Jerusalem wo wo go ti dañgay nen do Nebukanetsar mono.

Francais: Fils de Lévi: Gersom, Caath et Mérari.
Anglais: The sons of Levi; Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Levi: Gerson, Kehat, hiɗi Merari.
Bulu: Bone be Lévi: Gersom, Kehat a Merari.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Levihey i ti: Gersom, Kehat waɗ Merari.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Lewi ngoni: Gersom e Kahat e Meraari.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Lewi ngoni: Gersom e Kahat e Meraari.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Levii nɛ Gɛrsɔŋ, Kehat in Mɛrari.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Levii nɛ Gɛrsɔŋ, Kehat in Mɛrari.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Lɛvi: Gɛrshom, Kɛhat le Merari.
Tupurri: Jar Lefid wo diñ: Gerson, Kehad wo de Merari.

Francais: - Voici les noms des fils de Gersom: Lobni et Séméï.
Anglais: And the sons of Kohath; Amram, Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni mi sem gurona vi Gerson: Libni hiɗi Simey.
Bulu: Biyôlé bi bone be Gerson: Libni a Simeyi.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Gersomoy i ti: Libini ati Simey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa inɗe ɓiɓɓe Gersom: Libni e Sim'i.
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa inɗe ɓiɓɓe Gersom: Libni e Sim'i.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nin o bem ko Gɛrsɔŋ nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Libni in Simɛi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nin o bem ko Gɛrsɔŋ nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Libni in Simɛi.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi sləa ŋwalea Gɛrshom nyi: yɛ Libni le Shimɛyi.
Tupurri: Mokay diñ ëu jar ni Gerson wo: Libni wo de Simey.

Francais: - Fils de Caath: Amram, Isaar, Hébron et Oziel.
Anglais: And the children of Amram; Aaron, and Moses, and Miriam. The sons also of Aaron; Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Kehat: Amram, Yitsehar, Hebron hiɗi Uziyel.
Bulu: Bone be Kehat: Amram, Yitsehar, Ebroñ a Uziél.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Kehatay i ti: Amram, Isar, Hebroŋ waɗ Uziyel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Kahat boo: Amram e Yicehar e Heburuun e Uzziyel.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Kahat boo: Amram e Yicehar e Heburuun e Uzziyel.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Kehat nɛ Amram, Yisɛhar, Hebrɔŋ in Uziɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Kehat nɛ Amram, Yisɛhar, Hebrɔŋ in Uziɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Kɛhat: Amram, Isar, Hɛbron le Əwziyɛl.
Tupurri: Jar ni Kehad wo diñ: Amram, Yitsehar, Hebron wo de Usiyele.

Francais: - Fils de Mérari: Moholi et Musi.  Voici les familles de Lévi selon leurs pères:
Anglais: Eleazar begat Phinehas, Phinehas begat Abishua,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Merari: Makli hiɗi Musi.
Bulu: Bone be Merari: Mali a Muki.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Merarihey i ti: Mali ati Musi. Dideˀ muvulaka slimiɗ taŋ ar sukwi ngi Levi na i taŋ so.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Meraari boo: Mahali e Musi . Ndaa ci'e  Lewi'en fodde kaakiraaɓe maɓɓe:
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Meraari boo: Mahali e Musi . Ndaa ci'e  Lewi'en fodde kaakiraaɓe maɓɓe:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Mɛrari nɛ Mali in Musi. O nú-gara ko Levii nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ-wa nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Mɛrari nɛ Mali in Musi. O nú-gara ko Levii nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ-wa nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Merari: Mahli le Məwshi. Ghenci mbelia Lɛvi keyita keyita.
Tupurri: Jar ni Merari wo diñ: Mahli wo de Musi.

Francais: De Gersom: Lobni, son fils; Jahath, son fils; Zamma, son fils;
Anglais: And Abishua begat Bukki, and Bukki begat Uzzi,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni mi jafna vi Levi, kuɗ sumaysiya: Jafna vi Gerson: Libni, Yahat, Zimma;
Bulu: Mebum me Lévi ane bʼésaa bap be né mme ma: abume Gerson: Libni e mone wé; Yahat e mone wé; Zimma e mone wé;
Guiziga: Dideˀ mikwanay ngi Gersomoy i ti: Libini mangal naŋ, Yahat mangal ngi Libini, Zima mangal ngi Yahat,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Gersom: Gersom danyi Libni, Libni danyi Yahat, Yahat danyi Zimma,
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Gersom: Gersom danyi Libni, Libni danyi Yahat, Yahat danyi Zimma,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gɛrsɔŋ koo Libni, Libni koo Yahat, Yahat koo Zima,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gɛrsɔŋ koo Libni, Libni koo Yahat, Yahat koo Zima,
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ŋwale tezhili nyi mbe yita ta Gɛrshom nyi: Libni wəzege ta Gɛrshom, Yahat wəzege ta Libni, Zima wəzege ta Yahat,
Tupurri: Mokay diñ ëu moobe maLefidn wo, go ti paçaçrebe ta' ta'a: Ni Gerson diñ Libni, je Libni diñ Yahad, je Yahad diñ Sima,

Francais: Joah, son fils; Addo, son fils; Zara, son fils; Jethraï, son fils.
Anglais: And Uzzi begat Zerahiah, and Zerahiah begat Meraioth,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yowah, Iddo, Zerah, Yeyatray.
Bulu: Yôa e mone wé; Iddô e mone wé; Zéra e mone wé; Yeatrayi e mone wé.
Guiziga: Yowa mangal ngi Zima, Ido mangal ngi Yowa, Zera mangal ngi Ido waɗ Yeˀatray mangal ngi Zera.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Zimma danyi Yo'aha, Yo'aha danyi Iddo, Iddo danyi Zeraha, Zeraha danyi Yatiray.
Fulfulde_DC: Zimma danyi Yo'aha, Yo'aha danyi Iddo, Iddo danyi Zeraha, Zeraha danyi Yatiray.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Zima koo Yɔa, Yɔa koo Ido, Ido koo Zɛra, ɓɛɛ Zɛra ko Yeotrai.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Zima koo Yɔa, Yɔa koo Ido, Ido koo Zɛra, ɓɛɛ Zɛra ko Yeotrai.
Kapsiki_DC: Yowa wəzege ta Zima, Ido wəzege ta Yowa, Zɛra wəzege ta Ido, Yɛyatray, wəzege ta Zɛra.
Tupurri: Je Sima diñ Yowa, je Yowa diñ Ido, je Ido diñ Sera, je Sera diñ Yeatray.

Francais: - Fils de Caath: Aminadab, son fils; Coré, son fils; Asir, son fils;
Anglais: Meraioth begat Amariah, and Amariah begat Ahitub,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Kehat: Aminadab, Kore, Asir,
Bulu: Bone be Kehat: Aminadab e mone wé; Koré e mone wé; Asir e mone wé;
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Kehetay i ti: Aminadap mangal naŋ, Kore mangal ngi Aminadap, Asir mangal ngi Kore.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Kahat boo: Kahat danyi Amminadabu, Amminadabu danyi Koora, Koora danyi Assir,
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Kahat boo: Kahat danyi Amminadabu, Amminadabu danyi Koora, Koora danyi Assir,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kehat koo Aminadab, Aminadab koo Kore, Kore koo Asir,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kehat koo Aminadab, Aminadab koo Kore, Kore koo Asir,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ŋwale tezhili nyi mbe yita ta Kɛhat: Aminadab wəzege ta Kɛhat, Korɛ wəzege ta Aminadab, Asir wəzege ta Korɛ,
Tupurri: Jar ni Kehad wo diñ: Aminadab, je Aminadab diñ Kore, je Kore diñ Asir.

Francais: Elcana, son fils; Abiasaph, son fils; Asir, son fils;
Anglais: And Ahitub begat Zadok, and Zadok begat Ahimaaz,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Elkana, Ebyasaf, Asir,
Bulu: Elkana e mone wé; Ebyasaf e mone wé; Asir e mone wé;
Guiziga: Elkana mangal ngi Asir, Abiyasaf mangal ngi Elkana, Asir mangal ngi Abiyasaf.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Assir danyi Elkaana, Elkaana danyi Abiyasaf, Abiyasaf danyi Assir,
Fulfulde_DC: Assir danyi Elkaana, Elkaana danyi Abiyasaf, Abiyasaf danyi Assir,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Asir koo Ɛlkana, Ɛlkana koo Ebiasaf, Ebiasaf koo Asir,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Asir koo Ɛlkana, Ɛlkana koo Ebiasaf, Ebiasaf koo Asir,
Kapsiki_DC: Ɛlkana wəzege ta Asir, Abiyasaf wəzege ta Ɛlkana, Asir wəzege ta Abiyasaf,
Tupurri: Je Asir diñ Elkana, je Elkana diñ Ebiyasaf, je Ebiyasaf diñ Asir,

Francais: Thahath, son fils; Uriel, son fils; Ozias, son fils; Saül, son fils.
Anglais: And Ahimaaz begat Azariah, and Azariah begat Johanan,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Tahat, Uriyel, Uzziya, Sawul.
Bulu: Tahat e mone wé; Uriél e mone wé; Uzia e mone wé; Saül e mone wé.
Guiziga: Tahat mangal ngi Asir, Uriyel mangal ngi Tahat, Oziyas mangal ngi Uriyel waɗ Sawul mangal ngi Oziyas.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Assir danyi Tahat, Tahat danyi Uriyel, Uriyel danyi Uzziya, Uzziya danyi Sawulu.
Fulfulde_DC: Assir danyi Tahat, Tahat danyi Uriyel, Uriyel danyi Uzziya, Uzziya danyi Sawulu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Asir koo Tahat, Tahat koo Uriɛl, Uriɛl koo Uziɛl, Uziɛl koo Uzia, ɓɛɛ Uzia ko Saul.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Asir koo Tahat, Tahat koo Uriɛl, Uriɛl koo Uziɛl, Uziɛl koo Uzia, ɓɛɛ Uzia ko Saul.
Kapsiki_DC: Tahat wəzege ta Asir, Əwriyɛl wəzege ta Tahat, Oziyas wəzege ta Əwriyɛl, Shawəl wəzege ta Oziyas
Tupurri: je Asir diñ Tahad, je Tahad diñ Uriyel, je Uriyel diñ Usiya, je Usiya diñ Sawul.

Francais: Fils d'Elcana: Amasaï et Achimoth;
Anglais: And Johanan begat Azariah, (he it is that executed the priest's office in the temple that Solomon built in Jerusalem:)
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Elkana: Amasay hiɗi Ahimot;
Bulu: Bone be Elkana: Amasayi a Ahimôt;
Guiziga: Elkana a yi ziri mizile mekelemey le ma, i ti: Amasay ati Ahimot,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Elkaana ngoni: Amasay e Ahimot.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Elkaana ngoni: Amasay e Ahimot.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ŋma bem ko Ɛlkana nɛ Amasai in Ahimot.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ŋma bem ko Ɛlkana nɛ Amasai in Ahimot.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Ɛlkana: yɛ Amasay, Ahimot
Tupurri: Jar ni Elkana wo diñ Amasay wo de Ahimod,

Francais: Elcana, son fils; Sophaï, son fils; Nahath, son fils;
Anglais: And Azariah begat Amariah, and Amariah begat Ahitub,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Elkana, gurona vi Elkana: Sofay, Nahat;
Bulu: Elkana e mone wé; Sôfayi e mone wé; Nahat e mone wé;
Guiziga: waɗ Elkana. Dideˀ ngi Ahimotoy i ti: Elkana mangal naŋ, Sofay mangal ngi Elkana, Nahat mangal ngi Sofay,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Ahimot: Ahimot danyi Elkaana, Elkaana danyi Sofay, Sofay danyi Nahat,
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Ahimot: Ahimot danyi Elkaana, Elkaana danyi Sofay, Sofay danyi Nahat,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ahimot koo Ɛlkana, Ɛlkana koo Sofai, Sofai koo Nahat,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ahimot koo Ɛlkana, Ɛlkana koo Sofai, Sofai koo Nahat,
Kapsiki_DC: le Ɛlkana. Ŋwale tezhili nyi kwa yita ta Ɛlkana: Sofay, wəzege ta Ɛlkana, Nahat, wəzege ta Sofay,
Tupurri: Elkana, jar ni Elkana wo diñ Sofay, je Sofay diñ Nahad,

Francais: Eliab, son fils; Jéroham, son fils;
Anglais: And Ahitub begat Zadok, and Zadok begat Shallum,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Eliyab, Yeroham, Elkana;
Bulu: Eliab e mone wé; Yérôham e mone wé; Elkana e mone wé;
Guiziga: Eliyap mangal ngi Nahat, Yeroˀam mangal ngi Eliyap waɗ Elkana mangal ngi Yeroˀam.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nahat danyi Eliyabu, Eliyabu danyi Yeroham, Yeroham danyi Elkaana, Elkaana danyi Samuyila.
Fulfulde_DC: Nahat danyi Eliyabu, Eliyabu danyi Yeroham, Yeroham danyi Elkaana, Elkaana danyi Samuyila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nahat koo Aliab, Aliab koo Yeroam, Yeroam koo Ɛlkana, ɓɛɛ Ɛlkana ko Samuɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nahat koo Aliab, Aliab koo Yeroam, Yeroam koo Ɛlkana, ɓɛɛ Ɛlkana ko Samuɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Ɛliyab, wəzege ta Nahat, Yerowam, wəzege ta Ɛliyab, Ɛlkana, wəzege ta Yerowam.
Tupurri: je Nahad diñ Eliyab, je Eliyab diñ Yeroham, jar ni Yeroham wo diñ Elkana

Francais: Elcana, son fils. Fils de Samuel: le premier-né Vasséni, et Abia.
Anglais: And Shallum begat Hilkiah, and Hilkiah begat Azariah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: lo gurona vi Samuel, ma vuɗi jewna mi Vasni hiɗi Abiya.
Bulu: a bone be Samuel: ntô Vakni a Abiya.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Samuyeleye, i ti: modogomo i Zowel, mijingaˀ naŋ i Abiya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Samuyila boo: Yo'el woni afo maako, Abiya boo, ɗiɗaɓo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Samuyila boo: Yo'el woni afo maako, Abiya boo, ɗiɗaɓo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kaya-bem ko Samuɛl nɛ́ Jɔɛl ɓɛɛ hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Abiya.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kaya-bem ko Samuɛl nɛ́ Jɔɛl ɓɛɛ hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Abiya.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Saməyɛl: Zhowɛl tezhɛa wəzege, Abiya nde bake.
Tupurri: wo de jar ni Samyel maga jag weeln diñ Fasni, lan diñ Abiya mono.

Francais: - Fils de Mérari: Moholi; Lobni, son fils; Séméï, son fils; Oza, son fils; Sammaa, son fils;
Anglais: And Azariah begat Seraiah, and Seraiah begat Jehozadak,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Merari: Makli, Libni; Simey, Uzza;
Bulu: Bone be Merari: Mali; Libni mone wé; Simeyi e mone wé; Uza e mone wé;
Guiziga: dideˀ mikwanay ngi Merarihey i ti: Mali mangal naŋ, Libini mangal ngi Mali, Simey mangal ngi Libini, Uza mangal ngi Simey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Meraari boo: Meraari danyi Mahali, Mahali danyi Libni, Libni danyi Sim'i, Sim'i danyi Uzza,
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Meraari boo: Meraari danyi Mahali, Mahali danyi Libni, Libni danyi Sim'i, Sim'i danyi Uzza,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛrari koo Mali, Mali koo Libni, Libni koo Simɛi, Simɛi koo Uza,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛrari koo Mali, Mali koo Libni, Libni koo Simɛi, Simɛi koo Uza,
Kapsiki_DC: Hwelefe nyi keshave mbe Merari: Mahli wəzege ta Merari, Libni wəzege ta Mahli, Shimɛyi wəzege ta Libni, Əwza wəzege ta Shimɛyi,
Tupurri: Jar ni Merari wo diñ: Mahli, je Mahli diñ Libni, je Libni diñ Simey, je Simey diñ Usa,

Francais: Haggia, son fils; Asaïa, son fils.
Anglais: And Jehozadak went into captivity, when the  Lord  carried away Judah and Jerusalem by the hand of Nebuchadnezzar.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Simeya, Haggiya, Asaya.
Bulu: Simea e mone wé; Hagiya e mone wé; Asaya e mone wé.
Guiziga: Sima mangal ngi Uza, Hagiya mangal ngi Sima waɗ Asaya mangal ngi Hagiya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Uzza danyi Sim'a, Sim'a danyi Haggiya, Haggiya danyi Asaya.
Fulfulde_DC: Uzza danyi Sim'a, Sim'a danyi Haggiya, Haggiya danyi Asaya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Uza koo Simɛa, Simɛa koo Hagiya, ɓɛɛ Hagiya ko Asaya.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Uza koo Simɛa, Simɛa koo Hagiya, ɓɛɛ Hagiya ko Asaya.
Kapsiki_DC: Shimɛya wəzege ta Əwza, Hagiya wəzege ta Shimɛya, Asaya wəzege ta Hagiya.
Tupurri: je Usa diñ Simeya, je Simeya diñ Hagiya, je Hagiya diñ Asaya.

Francais: Voici ceux que David établit pour diriger le chant dans la maison de Yahweh, depuis que l'arche eut un lieu de repos:
Anglais: The sons of Levi; Gershom, Kohath, and Merari.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si sum sa David tunsi kay sli nulla hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina, hay li ma timgilla fi liyn ma nam tun suk hayam fina:
Bulu: E bôte David a nga telé na be wulu mame ya bia e Nda Nti éyoñ éwolo élat é nga bi awoʼon a bômbô ngume vôm.
Guiziga: Ti taŋ mulumam li ɗuva akoti ngi Buymisemuŋ lum si na, Davit a vula buyɓi ngi dimise da dideˀ ngi Levihey, ɓa a zlaka ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa yimɓe ɓe Daawuda darni ngam ɗowugo gimi nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo ɓaawo ɓe njo'ini sundukru alkawal nder maaru.
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa yimɓe ɓe Daawuda darni ngam ɗowugo gimi nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo ɓaawo ɓe njo'ini sundukru alkawal nder maaru.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: David ee so tom-bia-gima er o ŋma bezaŋ Levii kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa ee nɛ̀  Kuɓa  nɔɔ-tɔk fara-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: David ee so tom-bia-gima er o ŋma bezaŋ Levii kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa ee nɛ̀  Kuɓa  nɔɔ-tɔk fara-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi mbeli nyi veyi nyi David te ghəa cimə mbe ghɛa Mahwətə kwa veyi səndəkwə mbeli te ŋa ŋkɛ ŋkwa.
Tupurri: Mokay diñ ëu jar maga Dafid hay lag ra ma seege de siñn äil tiñ mani Manwurn de maga komromn da' ngeel kañge go mono.

Francais: ils remplirent les fonctions de chantres devant la Demeure de la tente de réunion, jusqu'à ce que Salomon eût bâti la maison de Yahweh à Jérusalem, et ils se tenaient à leur service selon leur règlement.
Anglais: And these be the names of the sons of Gershom; Libni, and Shimei.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi lum mi lopna vi nulla vok tabernaklena, vok guɗuk ma fi-tuwna, ta-ta a Salomon in ziyna vi Ma-Vatɗina hay Yerusalem tuwa kayni nisi ka dok-dok hay lopna visiya kuɗ gatta ta ɗoy tisita.
Bulu: Be nga bo ésaé ya yia bia ôsu Tabernakel, ôsu nda éndelé bendôbaʼan, akekui éyoñe David a nga lôñe nda Nti e Yérusalém, be nga too ésaé jap avale be nga yeʼele be.
Guiziga: Ɓa hã Salomoŋ a sa ndira hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ tikeˀe na, naɓa mizli tayna ara gaka slra ngi zli dimise si, a zlaka a mbuŋ guɗuk ngi zlir ati Bumbulvuŋ, kaɓa ɓi micicaka taŋ jiviɗ naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe kuuwi kuugal man yeeso laymaaru fottirde bee yimugo haa saa'i Suleymaanu nyiɓi haykaliiru Jawmiraawo haa Urusaliima. Ɓe kuuwi kuugal maɓɓe fodde umroore nde ɓe umri ɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe kuuwi kuugal man yeeso laymaaru fottirde bee yimugo haa saa'i Suleymaanu nyiɓi haykaliiru Jawmiraawo haa Urusaliima. Ɓe kuuwi kuugal maɓɓe fodde umroore nde ɓe umri ɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i duka nɛ́ o wi-bii-gima nú  Tua-kpa-ŋmaa  hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Salomɔŋ dee nɛ̀ Tua ko GASA WAN sɛn Jerusalɛm; wa duka de tom kɔ-wa nɛ̀ yuwar-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i duka nɛ́ o wi-bii-gima nú  Tua-kpa-ŋmaa  hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Salomɔŋ dee nɛ̀ Tua ko GASA WAN sɛn Jerusalɛm; wa duka de tom kɔ-wa nɛ̀ yuwar-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Slene ta cimə yamene hɛ mɛa cɛ lekwesa kebegeme geva, pa te və nya ŋate ghɛa Mahwətə Salomon mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm, keveci keveci nza hɛ mɛa slene ta nci kamene kala nya gezave nda mbeli ke hɛ.
Tupurri: Jar sen hay wo ti joñre siñ jag mburyug no, jag tiñ ma yiñgi no, haçaç Salomoñ wo go boo tiñ ne Manwur Jerusalem ëa. AÀ hay wo tum jag joñre äaaran do maga aè hay de äod faage äe go nono.

Francais: - Voici ceux qui officiaient avec leurs fils: - D'entre les fils des Caathites: Héman, le chantre, fils de Joël,
Anglais: And the sons of Kohath were, Amram, and Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kayni si nisi sa ay hay liy namna hiɗi gurona visiya. Jar gurona vi sa Kehatna: Heman, ma gi nulla, goora vi Jowel, goora vi Samuel,
Bulu: Ba be nga too a bone bap be mbe na: Mfaʼa bone be Kahat: Héman, nyia bia, e mone Yôél, e mone Samuel
Guiziga: Mizli migi slra tayna ati ziri taŋhaya, slimiɗ t'ani: muy ngi Kehatay i ti: Heman, mbur mizli dimisi, dideˀ naŋhay mijeŋŋe i ti: Zowel mangal ngi Samuyel, Samuyel mangal ngi Elkana,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa inɗe dariiɓe ton e ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe: Nder yimɓe Kahat, Heman gimoowo ɓii Yo'el, ɓii Samuyila,
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa inɗe dariiɓe ton e ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe: Nder yimɓe Kahat, Heman gimoowo ɓii Yo'el, ɓii Samuyila,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-bii-gima nɔ‘i in o bezaŋ-wa nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Mgbara o bezaŋ Kehat, nɛ́ Heman, bem ko Jɔɛl, bem ko Samuɛl,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-bii-gima nɔ‘i in o bezaŋ-wa nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Mgbara o bezaŋ Kehat, nɛ́ Heman, bem ko Jɔɛl, bem ko Samuɛl,
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi mbeli nyi kese nyi tagha le ŋwalea nci. Kwa yita ta Kɛhat: Hɛman nya te ghəa cimə, wəzege ta Zhowɛl nya kawəzege ta Saməyɛl, Saməyɛl wəzege ta Ɛlkana,
Tupurri: Mokay diñ jar maga hay wo ni de weere äaaran wo mono: Yoo jar ni Kehad wo mono, diñ je 'wad siñ Heman je ni Jowel je ni Samyel,

Francais: fils de Samuel, fils d'Elcana, fils de Jéroham, fils d'Eliel, fils de Thohu,
Anglais: The sons of Merari; Mahli, and Mushi. And these are the families of the Levites according to their fathers.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: goora vi Elkana, goora vi Yeroham, goora vi Eliyel, goora vi Towak,
Bulu: e mone Elkana, e mone Yérôham, e mone Eliél, e mone Tôa,
Guiziga: Elkana mangal ngi Yeroˀam, Yeroˀam mangal ngi Eliyel, Eliyel mangal ngi Towa,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ɓii Elkaana, ɓii Yeroham, ɓii Eliyel, ɓii Tooha,
Fulfulde_DC: ɓii Elkaana, ɓii Yeroham, ɓii Eliyel, ɓii Tooha,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: bem ko Ɛlkana, bem ko Yeroam, bem ko Eliɛl, bem ko Toa,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: bem ko Ɛlkana, bem ko Yeroam, bem ko Eliɛl, bem ko Toa,
Kapsiki_DC: Ɛlkana wəzege ta Yerowam, Yerowam wəzege ta Ɛliyɛl, Ɛliyɛl wəzege ta Towa, Towa wəzege ta Səwf,
Tupurri: je ni Elkana, je ni Yehoram, je ni Eliyel, je ni Towa,

Francais: fils de Suph, fils d'Elcana, fils de Mahath, fils d'Amasaï,
Anglais: Of Gershom; Libni his son, Jahath his son, Zimmah his son,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: goora vi Suf, goora vi Elkana, goora vi Mahat, goora vi Amasay,
Bulu: e mone Tuf, e mone Elkana, e mone Mahat, e mone Amasayi,
Guiziga: Towa mangal ngi Suf, Suf mangal ngi Elkana, Elkana mangal ngi Mahat, Mahat mangal ngi Amasay,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ɓii Cuuf, ɓii Elkaana, ɓii Mahat, ɓii Amasay,
