Fulfulde_DC: ɓii Cuuf, ɓii Elkaana, ɓii Mahat, ɓii Amasay,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: bem ko Suf, bem ko Ɛlkana, bem ko Mahat, bem ko Amasai,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: bem ko Suf, bem ko Ɛlkana, bem ko Mahat, bem ko Amasai,
Kapsiki_DC: Səwf wəzege ta Ɛlkana, Ɛlkana wəzege ta Mahat, Mahat wəzege ta Amasay, Amasay wəzege ta Ɛlkana,
Tupurri: je ni Suf, je ni Elkana, je ni Mahad, je ni Amasay,

Francais: fils d'Elcana, fils de Joël, fils d'Azarias, fils de Sophonias,
Anglais: Joah his son, Iddo his son, Zerah his son, Jeaterai his son.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: goora vi Elkana, goora vi Jowel, goora vi Azariya, goora vi Sofoniya,
Bulu: e mone Elkana, e mone Yôél, e mone Azaria, e mone Sôfôni,
Guiziga: Amasay mangal ngi Elkana, Elkana mangal ngi Zowel, Zowel mangal ngi Azariya, Azariya mangal ngi Sefaniya, t,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ɓii Elkaana, ɓii Yo'el, ɓii Azariya, ɓii Sefaniya,
Fulfulde_DC: ɓii Elkaana, ɓii Yo'el, ɓii Azariya, ɓii Sefaniya,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: bem ko Ɛlkana, bem ko Jɔɛl, bem ko Azaria, bem ko Sɛfania,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: bem ko Ɛlkana, bem ko Jɔɛl, bem ko Azaria, bem ko Sɛfania,
Kapsiki_DC: Ɛlkana wəzege ta Zhowɛl, Zhowɛl wəzege ta Azariya, Azariya wəzege ta Sefaniya, Sefaniya wəzege ta Tahat,
Tupurri: je ni Elkana, je ni Jowel, je ni Asariya, je ni Sofoni,

Francais: fils de Thahath, fils d'Asir, fils d'Abiasaph, fils de Coré,
Anglais: The sons of Kohath; Amminadab his son, Korah his son, Assir his son,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: goora vi Tahat, goora vi Asir, goora vi Ebyasaf, goora vi Kore,
Bulu: e mone Tahat, e mone Asir, e mone Ebyasaf, e mone Koré,
Guiziga: Sefaniya mangal ngi Tahat, Tahat mangal ngi Asir, Asir mangal ngi Abiyasaf, Abiyasaf mangal ngi Kore,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ɓii Tahat, ɓii Asir, ɓii Ebiyasaf, ɓii Koora,
Fulfulde_DC: ɓii Tahat, ɓii Asir, ɓii Ebiyasaf, ɓii Koora,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: bem ko Tahat, bem ko Asir, bem ko Ebiasaf, bem ko Kore,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: bem ko Tahat, bem ko Asir, bem ko Ebiasaf, bem ko Kore,
Kapsiki_DC: Tahat wəzege ta Asir, Asir wəzege ta Abiyasaf, Abiyasaf wəzege ta Korɛ, Korɛ wəzege ta Isar,
Tupurri: je ni Tahad, je ni Asir, je ni Ebiyasaf, je ni Kore,

Francais: fils d'Isaar, fils de Caath, fils de Lévi, fils d'Israël.
Anglais: Elkanah his son, and Ebiasaph his son, and Assir his son,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: goora vi Yitsehar, goora vi Kehat, goora vi Levi, goora vi Israyel.
Bulu: e mone Yitsehar, e mone Kehat, e mone Lévi, e mone Israél.
Guiziga: Kore mangal ngi Isar, Isar mangal ngi Kehat, Kehat mangal ngi Levi, Levi mangal ngi Zakop.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ɓii Yicehar, ɓii Kahat, ɓii Lewi, ɓii Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: ɓii Yicehar, ɓii Kahat, ɓii Lewi, ɓii Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: bem ko Yisɛhar, bem ko Kehat, bem ko Levii, bem ko  Israɛl .
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: bem ko Yisɛhar, bem ko Kehat, bem ko Levii, bem ko  Israɛl .
Kapsiki_DC: Isar wəzege ta Kɛhat, Kɛhat wəzege ta Lɛvi, Lɛvi wəzege ta Zhakob.
Tupurri: je ni Yitsehar, je ni Kehad, je Lefid, je ni Israyel no.

Francais: - Son frère Asaph, qui se tenait à sa droite: Asaph, fils de Barachias, fils de Samaa,
Anglais: Tahath his son, Uriel his son, Uzziah his son, and Shaul his son.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Basulumna Asaf, ma col hay galam ma jufna, Asaf, goora vi Berekiya, goora vi Simeya,
Bulu: Monyañe wé Asaf a nga tele nye mbo nnôm a too e mone Bérékiahu, e mone Siméa,
Guiziga: Misi tir vay hazum ngi Hemana, i muy naŋ Asaf. Dideˀ naŋ mijeŋŋehey i ti: Berekiya mangal ngi Sima,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Non boo Asaf banndiiko, dariiɗo haa nyaamo maako: Asaf ɓii Berekiya, ɓii Sim'a,
Fulfulde_DC: Non boo Asaf banndiiko, dariiɗo haa nyaamo maako: Asaf ɓii Berekiya, ɓii Sim'a,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hɔ-ɗoŋ Heman nɛ́ nya-a̧ Asaf nɛ̀ duk nɛ̀ war wii-er-a. A̧ nɛ́ bem ko Bɛrɛk-Yahu, bem ko Simɛa,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hɔ-ɗoŋ Heman nɛ́ nya-a̧ Asaf nɛ̀ duk nɛ̀ war wii-er-a. A̧ nɛ́ bem ko Bɛrɛk-Yahu, bem ko Simɛa,
Kapsiki_DC: Asaf kwete menənyɛ nya kese kanza te kwa zeme ta ŋkɛ: Asaf wəzege ta Bɛrɛkiya, Bɛrɛkiya wəzege ta Shima,
Tupurri: Hen äe Asaf hay ooge ti do war äe. AÀ saf hay diñ je Berekiyahu, je Simeya,

Francais: fils de Michaël, fils de Basaïas, fils de Melchias,
Anglais: And the sons of Elkanah; Amasai, and Ahimoth.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: goora vi Mikal, goora vi Baaseya, goora vi Malkiya,
Bulu: e mone Mikaél, e mone Baaséya, e mone Malkiya,
Guiziga: Sima mangal ngi Mikayel, Mikayel mangal ngi Baˀaseya, Baˀaseya mangal ngi Malkiya, tini,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ɓii Mika'iilu, ɓii Ba'aseya, ɓii Malkiya,
Fulfulde_DC: ɓii Mika'iilu, ɓii Ba'aseya, ɓii Malkiya,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: bem ko Mikaɛl, bem ko Basɛa, bem ko Malkia,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: bem ko Mikaɛl, bem ko Basɛa, bem ko Malkia,
Kapsiki_DC: Shima wəzege ta Mikayɛl, Mikayɛl wəzege ta Basɛya, Basɛya wəzege ta Malkiya,
Tupurri: je Mikayel, je Baaseya, je Malkiya,

Francais: fils d'Athanaï, fils de Zara,
Anglais: As for Elkanah: the sons of Elkanah; Zophai his son, and Nahath his son,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: goora vi Etni, goora vi Zerah, goora vi Adaya,
Bulu: e mone Etni, e mone Zéra, e mone Adaya,
Guiziga: Malkiya mangal ngi Etini, Etini mangal ngi Zera, Zera mangal ngi Adaya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ɓii Etani, ɓii Zeraha, ɓii Adaya,
Fulfulde_DC: ɓii Etani, ɓii Zeraha, ɓii Adaya,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: bem ko Ɛtni, bem ko Zɛra, bem ko Adaya,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: bem ko Ɛtni, bem ko Zɛra, bem ko Adaya,
Kapsiki_DC: Malkiya, wəzege ta Ɛtni, Ɛtni, wəzege ta Zɛra, Zɛra, wəzege ta Adaya,
Tupurri: je Etni, je Sera, je Adaya,

Francais: fils d'Adaïa, fils d'Ethan, fils de Zamma,
Anglais: Eliab his son, Jeroham his son, Elkanah his son.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: goora vi Etam, goora vi Zimma, goora vi Simey,
Bulu: e mone Etan, e mone Zimma, e mone Simeya,
Guiziga: Adaya mangal ngi Etaŋ, Etaŋ mangal ngi Zima, Zima mangal ngi Simey,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ɓii Etan, ɓii Zimma, ɓii Sim'i,
Fulfulde_DC: ɓii Etan, ɓii Zimma, ɓii Sim'i,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: bem ko Etaŋ, bem ko Zima, bem ko Simɛi,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: bem ko Etaŋ, bem ko Zima, bem ko Simɛi,
Kapsiki_DC: Adaya, wəzege ta Ɛtan, Ɛtan, wəzege ta Zima, Zima wəzege ta Shimɛyi,
Tupurri: je Etan, je Sima, je Simey,

Francais: fils de Séméï, fils de Jeth, fils de Gersom, fils de Lévi.
Anglais: And the sons of Samuel; the firstborn Vashni, and Abiah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: goora vi Yahat, goora vi Gerson, goora vi Levi.
Bulu: e mone Yahat, e mone Gersom, e mone Lévi.
Guiziga: Simey mangal ngi Yahat, Yahat mangal ngi Gersom, yo Gersom kwana i mangal ngi Levi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ɓii Yahat, ɓii Gersom, ɓii Lewi.
Fulfulde_DC: ɓii Yahat, ɓii Gersom, ɓii Lewi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: bem ko Yahat, bem ko Gɛrsɔŋ, bem ko Levii.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: bem ko Yahat, bem ko Gɛrsɔŋ, bem ko Levii.
Kapsiki_DC: Shimɛyi wəzege ta Yahat, Yahat wəzege ta Gɛrshom, Gɛrshom wəzege ta Lɛvi.
Tupurri: je Yahad, je Gerson, je Lefi.

Francais: - Fils de Mérari, leurs frères, à la gauche: Ethan, fils de Cusi, fils d'Abdi, fils de Maloch,
Anglais: The sons of Merari; Mahli, Libni his son, Shimei his son, Uzza his son,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Goora vi Merari, ɓosiyosina sa lak hay gal ma gulla; Etam goora vi Kisi, goora vi Abdi, goora vi Malluk.
Bulu: Bobenyañ, e bone be Merari, be nga tele be mbo nga, évete jap é too Etan e mone Kisi, e mone Abdi, e mone Maluk,
Guiziga: Mizli dimis ngir sukwi ngi Merariheye, taŋ dedeŋ tir gula ngi Heman. Mazla taŋ dimise i Etaŋ, dideˀ naŋ mijeŋŋehey i ti: Kisi mangal ngi Abidi, Abidi mangal ngi Maluk,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder yimɓe Meraari, banndiraaɓe maɓɓe dariiɓe haa wakeere nannde boo, Etan ɓii Kiisi, ɓii Abdi, ɓii Malluku,
Fulfulde_DC: Nder yimɓe Meraari, banndiraaɓe maɓɓe dariiɓe haa wakeere nannde boo, Etan ɓii Kiisi, ɓii Abdi, ɓii Malluku,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɔŋkur-aa nɛ́ Etaŋ tɛ nú-gara ko Mɛrari nɛ̀ yor kɔ‘i nɛ̀ war gale in o bíí kɔ‘i. Etaŋ nɛ́ nya o Heman in Asaf, a̧ nɛ́ bem ko Kísí, bem ko Abdi, bem ko Maluk,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɔŋkur-aa nɛ́ Etaŋ tɛ nú-gara ko Mɛrari nɛ̀ yor kɔ‘i nɛ̀ war gale in o bíí kɔ‘i. Etaŋ nɛ́ nya o Heman in Asaf, a̧ nɛ́ bem ko Kísí, bem ko Abdi, bem ko Maluk,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ka gha cimə nyi kwa yita ta Merari ne, te kwa gwela ta nci nza hɛ: Ɛtan nde se te ghəa nci. Wa nyi ka shihɛnyɛa Ɛtan nyi: Kishi wəzege ta Abdi, Abdi wəzege ta Maləwk,
Tupurri: Heçeçre äaara jar ni Merari hay wo lagge ti äañ guuri, aà hay wo diñ Etan je ni Kisi, je ni Abdi, je ni Malug,

Francais: fils de Hasabias, fils d'Amasias, fils de Helcias,
Anglais: Shimea his son, Haggiah his son, Asaiah his son.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Goora vi Hasabiya, goora vi Amatsiya, goora vi Hilkiya,
Bulu: e mone Hakabia, e mone Amatsia, e mone Ilkiya,
Guiziga: Maluk mangal ngi Hasabiya, Hasabiya mangal ngi Amasiya, Amasiya mangal ngi Hilkiya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ɓii Hasabiya, ɓii Amasiya, ɓii Hilkiyya,
Fulfulde_DC: ɓii Hasabiya, ɓii Amasiya, ɓii Hilkiyya,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: bem ko Hasafia, bem ko Amasia, bem ko Hilkia,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: bem ko Hasafia, bem ko Amasia, bem ko Hilkia,
Kapsiki_DC: Maləwk, wəzege ta Hashabiya, Hashabiya, wəzege ta Amasiya, Amasiya, wəzege ta Hilkiya,
Tupurri: je ni Hasabiya, je ni Amatsiya, je ni Hilkiya,

Francais: fils d'Amasaï, fils de Boni, fils de Somer,
Anglais: And these are they whom David set over the service of song in the house of the  Lord , after that the ark had rest.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: goora vi Amsi, goora vi Bani, goora vi Semer,
Bulu: e mone Amsi, e mone Bani, e mone Sémer,
Guiziga: Hilkiya mangal ngi Amsi, Amsi mangal ngi Bani, Bani mangal ngi Semer,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ɓii Amsi, ɓii Baani, ɓii Semer,
Fulfulde_DC: ɓii Amsi, ɓii Baani, ɓii Semer,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: bem ko Amsi, bem ko Bani, bem ko Sɛmɛr,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: bem ko Amsi, bem ko Bani, bem ko Sɛmɛr,
Kapsiki_DC: Hilkiya wəzege ta Amsi, Amsi wəzege ta Bani, Bani wəzege ta Shɛmɛr,
Tupurri: je ni Amsi, je ni Bani, je ni Semer,

Francais: fils de Moholi, fils de Musi, fils de Mérari, fils de Lévi.
Anglais: And they ministered before the dwelling place of the tabernacle of the congregation with singing, until Solomon had built the house of the  Lord  in Jerusalem: and then they waited on their office according to their order.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: goora vi Makli, goora vi Musi, goora vi Merari, goora vi Levi.
Bulu: e mone Mali, e mone Muki, e mone Merari, e mone Lévi.
Guiziga: Semer mangal ngi Mali, Mali mangal ngi Musi, Musi mangal ngi Merari, Merari mangal ngi Levi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ɓii Mahali, ɓii Musi, ɓii Meraari, ɓii Lewi.
Fulfulde_DC: ɓii Mahali, ɓii Musi, ɓii Meraari, ɓii Lewi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: bem ko Mali, bem ko Musi, bem ko Mɛrari, bem ko Levii.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: bem ko Mali, bem ko Musi, bem ko Mɛrari, bem ko Levii.
Kapsiki_DC: Shɛmɛr wəzege ta Mahli, Mahli wəzege ta Məwshi, Məwshi wəzege ta Merari, Merari wəzege ta Lɛvi.
Tupurri: je ni Mahli, je ni Musi, je Lefid no.

Francais: Leurs frères, les lévites, étaient chargés de tout le service du tabernacle de la maison de Yahweh.
Anglais: And these are they that waited with their children. Of the sons of the Kohathites: Heman a singer, the son of Joel, the son of Shemuel,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Guro-biyosina sa Levitna, lopna visi kayni mi lopna vi tabernaklena kafe, hay ziyna vi Lawna.
Bulu: Bobenyañ, e bone be Lévi, be nga bo ésaé Tabernakel e nda Zambe.
Guiziga: Mizli mekelemey ngir sukwi ngi Levi, slrahay gar misi ar hay ngi Buymisemuŋ na, magaka i taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Banndiraaɓe maɓɓe Lewi'en kalfinaama kuuɗe fuu haa jooɗorde, waato haykaliiru Allah.
Fulfulde_DC: Banndiraaɓe maɓɓe Lewi'en kalfinaama kuuɗe fuu haa jooɗorde, waato haykaliiru Allah.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa foo o nya kɔ-wa, o bezaŋ Levii a tɛ tom nɛtɛ nɛtɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa foo o nya kɔ-wa, o bezaŋ Levii a tɛ tom nɛtɛ nɛtɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kweci mbeli nyi mbe hwelefe ta Lɛvi ne, kweci slene nyi mbe ghɛa Shala yamene hɛ pɛtɛ.
Tupurri: Heçeçre äaara jar Lefidn hay wo de haç see äaara ne joñre ma äil mburyug, tiñ mani Baa no.

Francais: Mais Aaron et ses fils brûlaient les victimes sur l'autel des holocaustes et l'encens sur l'autel des parfums; ils avaient à remplir tout le ministère du saint des saints, et à faire l'expiation pour Israël, selon tout ce qu'avait ordonné Moïse, serviteur de Dieu.
Anglais: The son of Elkanah, the son of Jeroham, the son of Eliel, the son of Toah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Aaron hiɗi gurona valamu ka ŋal ɗifinna kulo kay giwin-ma-ɗifinna, ka ŋal urdina kulo kay giwin-ma-ɗifinna ma ŋal urdina kaw; nisi ka hob vun lopna kaf ma hay liyn ma suwi-peldetna, ka li poora kay sa Israyella, kuɗ slen ma Musus ma sunda vi Lawna dum kafna.
Bulu: Aron a bone bé be mbe be vaʼa bityiʼa ataʼa mimvean ba diʼi ngumba yôp a ôtu ataʼa beôlobinda yôp; be nga bo bisaé bise ya vôm a dañ étyi a bulu minsem asu Israél aval ése Môze mbo ésaé Zambe a nga bendé.
Guiziga: Aroŋ ati ziri naŋhaya, slra nga taŋ i zluma ginewey ar li gi mikuli waɗ wura urdi ar li nga naŋ ya. Gwat ngi gi ar li mipal wãˀ na, magaka i taŋ. Magaka mezegwel ngi puya mungra ngi Israyeley i taŋ ma, a gaka kasl kasl kaɓa Moyis, gawla ngi Buymisemuŋ miɓa taŋ di ɗaˀ le na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haruna bee ɓikkoy mum ɗon ngula kirsaaɗi dow hirsirde e uurle dow gulduɗum uurle. Kamɓe ngoni suklaniiɓe kuuje ɓurɗe senaago, ngam haa ɓe keɓana Isra'iila'en yaafuye fodde umroore Muusa, jaggiiɗo Allah.
Fulfulde_DC: Haruna bee ɓikkoy mum ɗon ngula kirsaaɗi dow hirsirde e uurle dow gulduɗum uurle. Kamɓe ngoni suklaniiɓe kuuje ɓurɗe senaago, ngam haa ɓe keɓana Isra'iila'en yaafuye fodde umroore Muusa, jaggiiɗo Allah.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i dɔ so kɔ-wa nɛ́ o kpoo-sɔ̧ in nyama sɛn zu  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ , ɗafi nɛ̀ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ bɛr-tua nɛ̀ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛmna, ak nɛ̀ ea-ɗaŋmɔ wen o be  Israɛl  lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko Moisɛ wi-de-tom ko Sɔ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i dɔ so kɔ-wa nɛ́ o kpoo-sɔ̧ in nyama sɛn zu  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ , ɗafi nɛ̀ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ bɛr-tua nɛ̀ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛmna, ak nɛ̀ ea-ɗaŋmɔ wen o be  Israɛl  lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko Moisɛ wi-de-tom ko Sɔ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma yɛ Aron le ŋa ŋkɛ hwelefe ne, dzeghe melɛ ŋa nci slene ba'a tere ta 'wərdə te yɛ reghwetɛ. Wəshi nyi keveyi geva pɛtɛ kaŋa Shala yamene slene ta nci hɛ. Hɛ ya te ghəa gəsəkə nyi mene mbeli yitea 'yɛwe kelemte ghena te wənə kezha ka Israyɛl, kala nya kegezeke geva laka Moyize nya kande mene slene ta Shala.
Tupurri: AÈron wo de weere äe hay wo roë feçeçre sië jagn wo ti ngeel sië jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuyn wo de ngeel roë fen foçoçre no wo. Saara hay bag jag joñre ma ti ngeel ma bay ëag debañn wo go äuy, hay wo joñ siigi jag mapor älagge Israyel wo go do maga Moyis weejoçoç Baan hay haç jag äe nono.

Francais: Voici les fils d'Aaron: Eléazar, son fils; Phinées, son fils; Abisué, son fils;
Anglais: The son of Zuph, the son of Elkanah, the son of Mahath, the son of Amasai,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si gurona vi Aaron: Eliyazar, Fineyas, Abisuwa,
Bulu: Bone bʼAron mbe ba: Eléazar e mone wé; Finéas e mone wé; Abisua e mone wé;
Guiziga: Slimiɗ ngi dideˀ mijeŋŋe ngi Aroŋhoy ani: Aroŋ a yi Elazar, Elazar kwana a yi Pinas, Pinas a yi Abisuwa,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa danygol Haruna: Haruna danyi Eli'azaaru, Eli'azaaru danyi Pinehas, Pinehas danyi Abisu'a,
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa danygol Haruna: Haruna danyi Eli'azaaru, Eli'azaaru danyi Pinehas, Pinehas danyi Abisu'a,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Arɔŋ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Arɔŋ koo Eleazar, Eleazar koo Pinas, Pinas koo Abisna,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Arɔŋ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Arɔŋ koo Eleazar, Eleazar koo Pinas, Pinas koo Abisna,
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi sləa mbeli nyi mbe hwelefe ta Aron nyi: Ɛlazar wəzege ta Aron, Pinhas wəzege ta Ɛlazar, Abishəwa wəzege ta Pinhas,
Tupurri: Mokay diñ ëu jar ni AÈron wo: Eleyasar diñ je äe, je Eleyasar diñ Fineyas, je Fineyas diñ Abisuwa,

Francais: Bocci, son fils; Ozi, son fils; Zaraïas, son fils;
Anglais: The son of Elkanah, the son of Joel, the son of Azariah, the son of Zephaniah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bukki, Uzzi, Zerahya,
Bulu: Buki e mone wé, Uzi e mone wé; Zeraya e mone wé;
Guiziga: Abisuwa kwana a yi Buki, Buki a yi Uzi, Uzi kwana a yi Zeraya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Abisu'a danyi Bukki, Bukki danyi Uzzi, Uzzi danyi Zerahiya,
Fulfulde_DC: Abisu'a danyi Bukki, Bukki danyi Uzzi, Uzzi danyi Zerahiya,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Abisna koo Buki, Buki koo Uzi, Uzi koo Zɛraya,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Abisna koo Buki, Buki koo Uzi, Uzi koo Zɛraya,
Kapsiki_DC: Bəwki wəzege ta Abishəwa, Əwzi wəzege ta Bəwki, Zɛraya wəzege ta Əwzi,
Tupurri: je Abisuwa diñ Buki, je Buki diñ Usi, je Usi diñ Serahiya,

Francais: Méraïoth, son fils; Amarias, son fils; Achitob, son fils;
Anglais: The son of Tahath, the son of Assir, the son of Ebiasaph, the son of Korah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Merayot, Amarya, Ahitub;
Bulu: Merayôt e mone wé; Amaria e mone wé; Ahitub e mone wé;
Guiziga: Zeraya a yi Merayot, Merayot a yi Amariya, Amariya a yi Ahitup,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Zerahiya danyi Merayot, Merayot danyi Amariya, Amariya danyi Ahitooba,
Fulfulde_DC: Zerahiya danyi Merayot, Merayot danyi Amariya, Amariya danyi Ahitooba,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Zɛraya koo Mɛrayot, Mɛrayot koo Amaria, Amaria koo Ahitub,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Zɛraya koo Mɛrayot, Mɛrayot koo Amaria, Amaria koo Ahitub,
Kapsiki_DC: Merayot wəzege ta Zɛraya, Amariya wəzege ta Merayot, Ahitəwb wəzege ta Amariya,
Tupurri: je Serahiya diñ Merayod, je Merayod diñ Amariya,

Francais: Sadoc, son fils; Achimaas, son fils.
Anglais: The son of Izhar, the son of Kohath, the son of Levi, the son of Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sadok, Ahimaas, kaf si gurona valamu.
Bulu: Sadok e mone wé; Ahimaat e mone wé.
Guiziga: Ahitup a yi Sadok, Sadoko kwana, a yi Ahimaˀas.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ahitooba danyi Cadok, Cadok danyi Ahimaas.
Fulfulde_DC: Ahitooba danyi Cadok, Cadok danyi Ahimaas.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ahitub koo Sadɔk, ɓɛɛ Sadɔk ko Ahimas
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ahitub koo Sadɔk, ɓɛɛ Sadɔk ko Ahimas
Kapsiki_DC: Sadok wəzege ta Ahitəwb, Ahimas wəzege ta Sadok.
Tupurri: je Amariya diñ Ahitub, je Ahitub diñ Sadog, je Sadog diñ Ahimaase.

Francais: Voici leurs habitations, selon leurs enceintes, dans leurs territoires: - Aux fils d'Aaron, de la famille des Caathites, désignés les premiers par le sort,
Anglais: And his brother Asaph, who stood on his right hand, even Asaph the son of Berechiah, the son of Shimea,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni mi liyn ma musta visiya, kuɗ gurona visiya visiya, hay nagata visi kafe. Tam gurona vi Aaron kuɗ jafna vi sa Kehatna, ŋaɓta kuɗ ɦayta yisi jewe,
Bulu: Mevôme mvoñe bôt Aron, abume Kéhat é nga too mme ma. Be mbe bôte ya ôsu be nga nyoñe ngap a mboone asimba :
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Aroŋhoy, muy ngi Kehataya, mulumam hirwuy dumbuŋ ti ceregezleŋ i taŋ. Li taŋ mipam ar taŋ t'ani:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa no Lewi'en njooɗori fodde beerle maɓɓe nder maral maɓɓe: Ɓiɓɓe Haruna nder danygol Kahat, bana kur'u aranu yeɗi ɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa no Lewi'en njooɗori fodde beerle maɓɓe nder maral maɓɓe: Ɓiɓɓe Haruna nder danygol Kahat, bana kur'u aranu yeɗi ɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi sləa meleme nyi te hɛɗi nyi se hwelefe ta Aron kanza mbe nyi, kwa yita ta Kɛhat. Mpelɛa ma hɛ ka ghate kakemave hɛɗia nci laka sla kwasheghediɗi:
Tupurri: Mokay diñ ëu ngeel lagge jar Lefidn wo, go ti koo siigi äaara ta' ta' äil tway äaara wo: AÈ haç ne jar ni AÈron ma ti moobe mani Kehadn wo do maga aè naa waçywaàale tañgu nono diñ

Francais: on donna Hébron, dans le pays de Juda, et les pâturages qui l'entourent;
Anglais: The son of Michael, the son of Baaseiah, the son of Malchiah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nisi vulsi Hebron, hay nagat vi Yuda, hiɗi voora ma ŋuya'na;
Bulu: be nga nyoñe tison Ebroñ e si ya Yuda a mevôm ma bômane nye;
Guiziga: Walahay Hebroŋ, hirwuy Zuda, jom ti li jigina ginew ngi ciki naŋhaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe keɓi berniwol Heburuun nder lesdi Yahuuda bee durduɗe maagol taariiɗe ngol.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe keɓi berniwol Heburuun nder lesdi Yahuuda bee durduɗe maagol taariiɗe ngol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: pa hɛ kemave meleme ta Hɛbron, mbe Zhəwda ba'a ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite.
Tupurri: Hebroñ ti sir Juda de ngoëog ma ti äen wo.

Francais: mais on donna le territoire de la ville et ses villages à Caleb, fils de Jéphoné.
Anglais: The son of Ethni, the son of Zerah, the son of Adaiah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: may sinena vi hoyok-ziy ma ŋulona hiɗi ma gurayna nisi vulum mi Kaleb, goora vi Yefune.
Bulu: Ve Kaléb, e mone Yefuné, a nga nyoñe minlam a mefane ya Ebroñ.
Guiziga: Amma guvahay ati walahay prok naŋhaya, a vulaka taŋ le zleˀe da Kalep mangal ngi Yefune si.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa gese berniwol maajum bee gure maagol, ɓe ndokki ɗum Kaaleb ɓii Yefunna.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa gese berniwol maajum bee gure maagol, ɓe ndokki ɗum Kaaleb ɓii Yefunna.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko fara-wa-fɔ in o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ Hebrɔŋ, wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ Kalɛb bem ko Yefunɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko fara-wa-fɔ in o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ Hebrɔŋ, wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ Kalɛb bem ko Yefunɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama yɛ wəve ba'a meleme nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ nyi sleke melemea shɛ ne, nahe hɛ keveyi geva kaŋa Kalɛb, wəzege ta Yefəwnɛ.
Tupurri: Ama, ngeel payre ma ti äi leegen wo de progre ma ti äen wo mono, aè haç sen wo ne Kaleb je ni Yefune no.

Francais: On donna donc aux fils d'Aaron la ville de refuge Hébron, Lobna et ses pâturages,
Anglais: The son of Ethan, the son of Zimmah, the son of Shimei,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Aaron nisi vulsi hoyok-ziy ma ŋayna ki Hebron, Libna hiɗi voora va'a.
Bulu: Be nga ve bone bʼAron Ebroñ tisone, ya sobô, Libna a mefôla mé, Yatir, Ektemôa a mefôla mé,
Guiziga: Walahayay muvulaka taŋ da dideˀ ngi Aroŋhoy ngi ɗum ar t'ani: Hebroŋ, Libina ati li jigina ginew ngi ciki naŋhaya, Yatir, Ektemowa ati li jigina ginew ngi ciki naŋhaya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ndokki ɓiɓɓe Haruna boo berniiji kisruɗi ɗi'i: Heburuun e Libna bee durduɗe maagol e Yattir e Estemo'a bee durduɗe maagol
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ndokki ɓiɓɓe Haruna boo berniiji kisruɗi ɗi'i: Heburuun e Libna bee durduɗe maagol e Yattir e Estemo'a bee durduɗe maagol
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ye-hu̧si-sɛnɛ nɛ̀ wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ o bezaŋ Arɔŋ nɛ́ Hebrɔŋ, Libna, Yatir, Ɛstɛmɔa,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ye-hu̧si-sɛnɛ nɛ̀ wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ o bezaŋ Arɔŋ nɛ́ Hebrɔŋ, Libna, Yatir, Ɛstɛmɔa,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma meleme nyi kemave hwelefe ta Aron kameleme kewəfərə ta nci, yɛ: Hɛbron, Libna le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite, Yatir, Ɛshtemowa le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite,
Tupurri: AÀ raw haçge ne jar ni AÈron wo diñ: Hebroñ, äi leege ma yaçaç wañ no, Libna wo de ngoëog äen wo, Yatir, Estemowa de ngoëog äen wo,

Francais: Jéther, Esthémo et ses pâturages, Hélon et ses pâturages,
Anglais: The son of Jahath, the son of Gershom, the son of Levi.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hilen hiɗi voora va'a, Debir hiɗi voora va'a,
Bulu: Hilén a mefôla mé. Debir a mefôla mé,
Guiziga: Hileŋ ati li jigina ginew ngi ciki naŋhaya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Hiles bee durduɗe maagol e Debir bee durduɗe maagol
Fulfulde_DC: e Hiles bee durduɗe maagol e Debir bee durduɗe maagol
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hilɛz, Ɛbir,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hilɛz, Ɛbir,
Kapsiki_DC: Hilɛn le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite, Debir le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite,
Tupurri: Hilen de ngoë og äen wo, Debir de ngoëog äen wo,

Francais: Dabir et ses pâturages, Asan et ses pâturages, Bethsémès et ses pâturages;
Anglais: And their brethren the sons of Merari stood on the left hand: Ethan the son of Kishi, the son of Abdi, the son of Malluch,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Asan hiɗi voora va'a, Bet-Semes hiɗi voora va'a;
Bulu: Akan a mefôla mé, Bétsemék a mefôla mé;
Guiziga: Hasan ati li jigina ginew ngi ciki naŋhaya, Bet-Hesek ati li jigina ginew ngi ciki naŋhaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Asan bee durduɗe maagol e Bayti-Semes bee durduɗe maagol.
Fulfulde_DC: e Asan bee durduɗe maagol e Bayti-Semes bee durduɗe maagol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Asaŋ in Bɛt-Sɛmɛs gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ tɛ o ye nɔ‘i lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Asaŋ in Bɛt-Sɛmɛs gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ tɛ o ye nɔ‘i lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ashan le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite, Bɛt-Shɛmɛsh le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite,
Tupurri: Asan de ngoëog äen wo, Bet-Semes de ngoëog äen wo.

Francais: de la tribu de Benjamin, Gabée et ses pâturages, Almath et ses pâturages, Anathoth et ses pâturages. Total de leurs villes: treize villes, d'après leurs familles.
Anglais: The son of Hashabiah, the son of Amaziah, the son of Hilkiah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kuɗ jafna vi Benyamin kayni, Geba hiɗi voora va'a, Allemet hiɗi voora va'a, Anatot hiɗi voora va'a. Hoyok-ziy ma ŋulon doogo yam ɦidi, kuɗ vuɗna visiya.
Bulu: E si Bényamin be nga nyoñe Géba a mefôla mé, Alémét a mefôla mé, Anatot a mefôla mé. Bitisone biabe bise bi mbe awôm a bilaa ane mebume map me né.
Guiziga: Yo angi sukwi ngi Benjameŋ kwana, a vulaka taŋ walahay Geba, Alemet, Anatot. A vulaka taŋ jom gar, walahay kuruˀ nga makir, jom ti li jigina ginewey misi a ciki taŋhaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haa lenyol Benyamin boo: Geba bee durduɗe maagol e Alemet bee durduɗe maagol e Anatot bee durduɗe maagol. Berniiji maɓɓe fuu, ɗi sappo e tati, fodde ci'e maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Haa lenyol Benyamin boo: Geba bee durduɗe maagol e Alemet bee durduɗe maagol e Anatot bee durduɗe maagol. Berniiji maɓɓe fuu, ɗi sappo e tati, fodde ci'e maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ nù ko Bɛnjamin wa ha̧a̧ Geba, Alɛmɛt in Anatot gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ o ye nɔ‘i. O gasa ye ko o bíí nú-gara kɔ-wa lɛŋ nɛ́ ɓu-zua-taar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ nù ko Bɛnjamin wa ha̧a̧ Geba, Alɛmɛt in Anatot gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ o ye nɔ‘i. O gasa ye ko o bíí nú-gara kɔ-wa lɛŋ nɛ́ ɓu-zua-taar.
Kapsiki_DC: ba'a te hɛɗia Bɛnjamɛn: Gɛba le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite, Alɛmɛt le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite le Anatot le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite. Jikə ta meleme ta ncia shɛ pɛtɛ ne, 13.
Tupurri: Wo yoo jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Benjamen wo mono, aè haç ne hara diñ Geba de ngoëog äen wo, Alemed de ngoëog äen wo, Anatod de ngoëog äen wo. Äi leege äaaran wo äuy hwal ti swa' de ngaäge de moobe äaaran wo.

Francais: - Le autres fils de Caath eurent par le sort dix villes des familles de la tribu, de la demi-tribu de Manassé.
Anglais: The son of Amzi, the son of Bani, the son of Shamer,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Tam gurona vi Kehat segena, ŋaɓta kuɗ ɦayta vulsi hoyok-ziyn doogo kuɗ jafna vi Efrayim, gal-jafna vi Dan, hiɗi gal-jafna Manase.
Bulu: E bone be Kehat bevok be nga nyoñe bitison awôm a mboon asimba e be ayoñ Efrayim, e be éfas ayoñe Dan a e be éfas ayoñe Manasé.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile mekelemey ngi Kehataya, vur dideˀ vur dideˀ taŋhaya, a lumam walahay kuruˀ ti ceregezleŋ, i walahay ngi ruwuy Efrayim, ngi Daŋ waɗ ngi reta ngi muy ngi Manasehey misi tisi pas ngi pastaˀ na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Kahat luttuŋgol heɓi berniiji sappo bee kur'u nder lenyol Efrayim e lenyol Dan e reeta lenyol Manassa.
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Kahat luttuŋgol heɓi berniiji sappo bee kur'u nder lenyol Efrayim e lenyol Dan e reeta lenyol Manassa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tani usa ye ɓu ha̧ o ŋma bem ko Kehat nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa mbɛt. O ye nɔ‘i duka so nɛ́ ko zuduk ko Efraim, ko zuduk ko Dan in reeta zuduk ko Manase.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tani usa ye ɓu ha̧ o ŋma bem ko Kehat nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa mbɛt. O ye nɔ‘i duka so nɛ́ ko zuduk ko Efraim, ko zuduk ko Dan in reeta zuduk ko Manase.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma yita nyi hwa kweci hwelefefia Kɛhat, nahe hɛ kekemave meleme meŋe le sla kwasheghediɗi te hɛɗia Ɛfrayim, Dan, ba'a bela ta hwelefe ta Manasɛ.
Tupurri: Ma te jar ni Kehad ma lan wo mono, aè naa waçywaàale ne hara ti äi leege wo hwal ti sir ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Efrayim no, yoo nus jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Dañ wo, yoo nus jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Manasen wo.

Francais: Les fils de Gersom, d'après leurs familles, eurent treize villes de la tribu d'Issachar, de la tribu d'Aser, de la tribu de Nephthali et de la tribu de Manassé, en Basan.
Anglais: The son of Mahli, the son of Mushi, the son of Merari, the son of Levi.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Tam gurona vi Gerson, kuɗ vuɗna visiya, hoyok-ziyn doogo yam ɦidi, kuɗ jafna vi Isakar, kuɗ jafna vi Aser, kuɗ jafna vi Neftali, kuɗ jafna vi Manase hay Basan kaw.
Bulu: Bone be Gersom be nga nyoñe bitison awôm a bilaa e be ayoñe Isakar, ayoñe azer, ayoñe Néftali, ayoñe Manasé, e Basañ, ane mebume map me né.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Gersomoyo vur dideˀ vur dideˀ taŋhaya, a lumam walahay kuruˀ nga makir, angi sukwi Isakar, ngi Aser, ngi Neftali waɗ ngi reta ngi sukwi ngi Manase mipam a Basaŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ci'e nder danygol Gersom keɓi berniiji sappo e tati bee kur'u, nder lenyol Issakar e lenyol Aser e lenyol Neftali e lenyol Manassa nder Baasan.
Fulfulde_DC: Ci'e nder danygol Gersom keɓi berniiji sappo e tati bee kur'u, nder lenyol Issakar e lenyol Aser e lenyol Neftali e lenyol Manassa nder Baasan.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Gɛrsɔŋ kpaa kɔ‘i ye ɓu-zua-taar nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nutua kɔ-wa. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o ye ko zuduk ko Isakar, ko Asɛr, ko Nɛftalii in ko reeta zuduk ko Manase sɛn Basaŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Gɛrsɔŋ kpaa kɔ‘i ye ɓu-zua-taar nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nutua kɔ-wa. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o ye ko zuduk ko Isakar, ko Asɛr, ko Nɛftalii in ko reeta zuduk ko Manase sɛn Basaŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma yita nyi hwa kweci hwelefefia Gɛrshom, nahe hɛ kekemave meleme meŋe mahekeneghəmbe te hɛɗia yɛ Isakar, Asɛr, Nɛftali le bela ta hwelefe ta Manasɛ nyi kenzanji kwa Bashan.
Tupurri: Jar ni Gersom wo go ti moobe äaara ta' ta' wo äi leege hwal ti swa' ti sir jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Isakarn wo, jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Asern wo, jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Neftalin wo, yoo nus jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Manasen wo.

Francais: Les fils de Mérari, d'après leurs familles, eurent par le sort douze villes de la tribu de Ruben, de la tribu de Gad et de la tribu de Zabulon.
Anglais: Their brethren also the Levites were appointed unto all manner of service of the tabernacle of the house of God.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Tam gurona vi Merari, kuɗ vuɗna visiya, ŋaɓta kuɗ ɦayta vulsi hoyok-ziyn doogo yam ma' kuɗ jafna vi Ruben, kuɗ jafna vi Gad hiɗi jafna vi Zabulon.
Bulu: Bone be Merari, ane mebume map me né, be nga nyoñe bitison awôm a bibaé a mboon asimba e be ayoñe Ruben, ayoñe Gad a ayoñe Zabuloñ.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Merariheye, vur dideˀ vur dideˀ taŋhaya, a lumam walahay kuruˀ nga cuw angi sukwi ngi Ruben, ngi Gat waɗ ngi Zabuloŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ci'e nder danygol Meraari keɓi berniiji sappo e ɗiɗi bee kur'u, nder lenyol Ruben e lenyol Gada e lenyol Zabulon.
Fulfulde_DC: Ci'e nder danygol Meraari keɓi berniiji sappo e ɗiɗi bee kur'u, nder lenyol Ruben e lenyol Gada e lenyol Zabulon.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tani usa ye ɓu-zua-yiitoo ha̧ o bezaŋ Mɛrari nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nutua kɔ-wa. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o ye ko zuduk ko Rubɛn, ko Gad in ko Zabulɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tani usa ye ɓu-zua-yiitoo ha̧ o bezaŋ Mɛrari nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nutua kɔ-wa. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o ye ko zuduk ko Rubɛn, ko Gad in ko Zabulɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma yita ta hwelefe ta Merari, meleme meŋe bakeghəmbe kemave hɛ te hɛɗia yɛ Rəbɛn, Gad, le Zabəlon le sla kwasheghediɗi.
Tupurri: AÈ naa waçywaàale ne jar ni Merari, go ti moobe ta' ta' ti äi leege wo hwal ti äog ti sir jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Ruben wo, yoo nus jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Gadn wo, yoo jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Sabuloñn wo.

Francais: Les enfants d'Israël donnèrent aux Lévites les villes et leurs pâturages.
Anglais: But Aaron and his sons offered upon the altar of the burnt offering, and on the altar of incense, and were appointed for all the work of the place most holy, and to make an atonement for Israel, according to all that Moses the servant of God had commanded.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa Israyella vul hoyok-ziyna hiɗi voora valamu mi sa Levitna.
Bulu: Bone bʼIsraél be nga ve Belévit bitison a mefôla map.
Guiziga: Israyeley a vulaka walahay tayna, jom ti li jigina ginew taŋhaya da dideˀ ngi Levihey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Bana nii Isra'iila'en ndokkiri Lewi'en berniiji ɗi bee durduɗe maaji.
Fulfulde_DC: Bana nii Isra'iila'en ndokkiri Lewi'en berniiji ɗi bee durduɗe maaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ye in o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ o be  Israɛl  ha̧a̧ ha̧ o bezaŋ Levii nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ye in o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ o be  Israɛl  ha̧a̧ ha̧ o bezaŋ Levii nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ka Israyɛl ndeke nda melemea shɛhɛ le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yitea hɛ ke hwelefe ta Lɛvi.
Tupurri: Jar Israyel haç wo äi leege wo ne jar Lefid wo de ngoëog äaara wo.

Francais: Ils donnèrent par le sort, de la tribu des enfants de Juda, de la tribu des enfants de Siméon et de la tribu des enfants de Benjamin, ces villes qu'ils désignèrent par leurs noms.
Anglais: And these are the sons of Aaron; Eleazar his son, Phinehas his son, Abishua his son,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hoyok-ziy namna nisi yum selem goyo, ŋaɓam kuɗ ɦayta, nisi yaw kuɗ jafna vi gurona vi Yuda, kuɗ jafna vi gurona vi Simeyon hiɗi jafna vi gurona vi Benyamin.
Bulu: Be nga ve bitisone bite a mboon asimba , a yôlé bie môé bi soʼo ayoñ bone be Yuda, ayoñe bone be Siméoñ, ayoñe bone be Bényamin.
Guiziga: Yo walahayay misi angi hirwuy ngi sukwi ngi Zuda, ngi Simeyoŋ waɗ ngi Benjameŋ, mizilaka slimiɗ taŋhay ani na, a vulaka taŋ di le ti ceregezleŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ta'i ɗum bee kur'u nder lenyol yimɓe Yahuuda e lenyol yimɓe Simeyon e lenyol yimɓe Benyamin, berniiji ɗi'i inndinaaɗi bee inɗe maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ta'i ɗum bee kur'u nder lenyol yimɓe Yahuuda e lenyol yimɓe Simeyon e lenyol yimɓe Benyamin, berniiji ɗi'i inndinaaɗi bee inɗe maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ tani á̧ wa pi̧i̧ kànà ha̧ nɛ̀ o ye tɛ nù ko Juda, ko Simɛɔŋ in ko Bɛnjamin ha̧ wa nɛ‘i tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen-aa nɛ̀ ŋgɔn mɛ‘i mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ tani á̧ wa pi̧i̧ kànà ha̧ nɛ̀ o ye tɛ nù ko Juda, ko Simɛɔŋ in ko Bɛnjamin ha̧ wa nɛ‘i tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen-aa nɛ̀ ŋgɔn mɛ‘i mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma meleme nyi te hɛɗia yɛ Zhəwda, Simɛyon le Bɛnjamɛn, ba'a nyi gezete sləa nyi mbeli ne, laka sla kwasheghediɗi kelete hɛ mbeli.
Tupurri: AÀ haç wo äi leege sen wo go ne hara de naage waçywaàale, ëe wo ra go de ëu de ëu ti sir jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Judan wo, ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Simeyoñn wo, ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Benjamen wo.

Francais: Pour les autres familles des fils de Caath, les villes qui leur échurent furent de la tribu d'Éphraïm.
Anglais: Bukki his son, Uzzi his son, Zerahiah his son,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hoyok-ziy ma nisi vulum mi vuɗna vi Kehatna nisi yawam kuɗ jafna vi Efrayim.
Bulu: Bitison be nga ve mebum mevoʼo ya bone be Kehat, be nga nyoñe bie e ayoñe Efrayim.
Guiziga: Ziri ngi Kehataya, dideˀ naŋ mekelemeye, walahay ɓa a pam ar taŋ na, a lumam nga taŋ angi hirwuy ngi sukwi Efrayim:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ci'e nder danygol Kahat goɗɗe nastini berniiji maral maaje nder lenyol Efrayim.
Fulfulde_DC: Ci'e nder danygol Kahat goɗɗe nastini berniiji maral maaje nder lenyol Efrayim.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O oi nú-gara ko o bezaŋ Kehat kpaa ye kɔ-wa tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Efraim.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O oi nú-gara ko o bezaŋ Kehat kpaa ye kɔ-wa tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Efraim.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma hwelefe nyi kwa yita ta Kɛhat ne, te hɛɗia Ɛfrayim kemave ŋa nci hɛ meleme.
Tupurri: Ne te jar mani Kehad ma lan wo aè naa waçywaàale ne hara ti äi leege ma ti sir jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Efrayimn wo.

Francais: On leur donna: la ville de refuge Sichem et ses pâturages, dans la montagne d'Éphraïm, Gazer et ses pâturages,
Anglais: Meraioth his son, Amariah his son, Ahitub his son,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi vulsi hoyok-ziy ma ŋayna, Sikem hiɗi voora va'a, hay hiɗiyta Efrayim, Geser hiɗi voora va'a kaw,
Bulu: Be nga ve be Sikem tisone ya sobô a mefôla mé, Gézér a mefôla mé e minkôle yʼEfrayim,
Guiziga: a vulaka taŋ walahay ngi ɗumo, i Sikem misi tir vay muwã Efrayim, jom ti li jigina ginew naŋhaya, Gezer jom ti li jigina ginew naŋhaya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ndokki ɓe berniiji kisruɗi ɗi'i: Sikem bee durduɗe maagol nder lesdi kooseeje Efrayim e Gezer bee durduɗe maagol
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ndokki ɓe berniiji kisruɗi ɗi'i: Sikem bee durduɗe maagol nder lesdi kooseeje Efrayim e Gezer bee durduɗe maagol
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ye-hu̧si-sɛnɛ nɛ̀ wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa nɛ́ Sikɛm zu kaya Efraim, Gezɛr,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ye-hu̧si-sɛnɛ nɛ̀ wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa nɛ́ Sikɛm zu kaya Efraim, Gezɛr,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ ndeke nda meleme nyi ke hɛ kameleme kewəfərə: Sishɛm nya hwa ghweme ta Ɛfrayim le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite, Gɛzɛr le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite,
Tupurri: Saara raw haç Sikem ne hara de ngoëog äen wo, wo ti huuli ma Efrayimn wo, Geser de ngoëog äen wo,

Francais: Jecmaam et ses pâturages, Bethoron et ses pâturages,
Anglais: Zadok his son, Ahimaaz his son.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yokmeyam hiɗi voora va'a, Bet-Horon hiɗi voora va'a,
Bulu: Yôkmeam a mefôla mé, Bétôroñ a mefôla mé,
Guiziga: Yokmeˀam jom ti li jigina ginew naŋhaya, Bet-Horoŋ jom ti li jigina ginew naŋhaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Yokme'am bee durduɗe maagol e Baytihurun bee durduɗe maagol
Fulfulde_DC: e Yokme'am bee durduɗe maagol e Baytihurun bee durduɗe maagol
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yokmɛam, Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yokmɛam, Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ,
Kapsiki_DC: Yokmɛyam le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite, Bɛt-Horon le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite,
Tupurri: Yokmeyam de ngoëog äen wo, Bet-Horon de ngoëog äen wo,

Francais: Hélon et ses pâturages, Geth-Remmon et ses pâturages;
Anglais: Now these are their dwelling places throughout their castles in their coasts, of the sons of Aaron, of the families of the Kohathites: for theirs was the lot.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ayalon hiɗi voora va'a, Gad-Rimmon hiɗi voora va'a,
Bulu: Ayalôn a mefôla mé, Gat-Rimôn a mefôla mé;
Guiziga: Ayaloŋ jom ti li jigina ginew naŋhaya. Gat-Rimoŋ jom ti li jigina ginew naŋhaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Ayyalon bee durduɗe maagol e Gat-Rimmon bee durduɗe maagol
Fulfulde_DC: e Ayyalon bee durduɗe maagol e Gat-Rimmon bee durduɗe maagol
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ayalɔŋ in Gat-Rimɔŋ gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ayalɔŋ in Gat-Rimɔŋ gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ayalon le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite ba'a Gat-Rimon le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite,
Tupurri: Ayalon de ngoëog äen wo, Gat-Rimon de ngoëog äen wo.

Francais: et de la demi-tribu de Manassé, Aner et ses pâturages, Balaam et ses pâturages: pour les familles des autres fils de Caath.
Anglais: And they gave them Hebron in the land of Judah, and the suburbs thereof round about it.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hiɗi gal-jafna vi Manase: Aner hiɗi voora va'a, Bileyam hiɗi voora va'a; kayni mi galla vi gurona vi Kehat sa hinna.
Bulu: Aner a mefôla mé, Bileam a mefôla mé e be éfas ayoñe Manasé; bitison bi nga veban asu abume ya bone be Kehat bevok mbie le.
Guiziga: Yo angi reta ngi sukwi ngi Manase, a lumam hirwuy Ener, Bileˀam jom ti li jigina ginew taŋhaya. A vulaka hirwuy tayna cek da ziri mekelem ngi Kehatay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: nder reeta lenyol Manassa boo: Aner bee durduɗe maagol e Bile'am bee durduɗe maagol. Kanji laatani danygol ɓiɓɓe Kahat luttuɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: nder reeta lenyol Manassa boo: Aner bee durduɗe maagol e Bile'am bee durduɗe maagol. Kanji laatani danygol ɓiɓɓe Kahat luttuɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ tɛ nù ko reeta zuduk ko Manase, nɛ́ Anɛr in Bilɛam gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa. O ye nɔ‘i lɛŋ duka nɛ́ ko o ŋma nú-gara ko o ŋma bezaŋ Kehat.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ tɛ nù ko reeta zuduk ko Manase, nɛ́ Anɛr in Bilɛam gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa. O ye nɔ‘i lɛŋ duka nɛ́ ko o ŋma nú-gara ko o ŋma bezaŋ Kehat.
Kapsiki_DC: te hɛɗia bela ta hwelefe ta Manasɛ: yɛ Anɛr le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite ba'a Bilɛyam le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite. Pɛtɛ hɛ kaŋa yita ta ŋwalea Kɛhat.
Tupurri: Wo yoo nus jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Manasen wo mono, aè haç ne hara diñ Aner de ngoëog äen wo, Bileyam de ngoëog äen wo, sen na diñ maga aè haç sen wo ne moobe mani Kehad maga hay gwa' wo mono.

Francais: On donna aux fils de Gersom: de la famille de la demi-tribu de Manassé, Gaulon en Basan et ses pâturages, Astharoth et ses pâturages;
Anglais: But the fields of the city, and the villages thereof, they gave to Caleb the son of Jephunneh.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mi gurona vi Gerson, hay gal-jafna vi Manase nisi vul Golan hay Basan hiɗi voora va'a, Astarot hiɗi voora va'a;
Bulu: Be nga ve bone be Gersom Gôlañ e Basañ a mefôla mé, Astarôt a mefôla mé, bitisone bite bi soʼo abume ya éfas ayoñe Manasé;
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Gersomoyo vur dideˀ vur dideˀ taŋhaya, a lumam hirwuyo angi reta ngi sukwi ngi Manase, i Golaŋ ngi ruwuy Basaŋ waɗ Asetarot, jom ti li jigina ginew taŋhaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Gersom heɓi berniiji ɗi'i nder yimɓe reeta lenyol Manassa: Golan nder Baasan bee durduɗe maagol e Astarot bee durduɗe maagol.
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Gersom heɓi berniiji ɗi'i nder yimɓe reeta lenyol Manassa: Golan nder Baasan bee durduɗe maagol e Astarot bee durduɗe maagol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa ha̧a̧ Gɔlaŋ sɛn nú Basaŋ in Astarot gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa tɛ nù ko reeta zuduk ko Manase ha̧ o bezaŋ Gɛrsɔŋ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa ha̧a̧ Gɔlaŋ sɛn nú Basaŋ in Astarot gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa tɛ nù ko reeta zuduk ko Manase ha̧ o bezaŋ Gɛrsɔŋ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi meleme nyi kemave hwelefe nyi mbe yita ta Gɛrshom nyi te hɛɗia kwete bela ta hwelefe ta Manasɛ: Golan mbe Bashan le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite, Ashetarot le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite,
Tupurri: AÈ haç ne jar ni Gersom yoo moobe ma ti nus jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Manasen wo diñ Golan ti sir Basañ de ngoëog äen wo, diñ Astarod de ngoëog äen wo.

Francais: de la tribu d'Issachar, Cédès et ses pâturages, Dabéreth et ses pâturages,
Anglais: And to the sons of Aaron they gave the cities of Judah, namely, Hebron, the city of refuge, and Libnah with her suburbs, and Jattir, and Eshtemoa, with their suburbs,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hay jafna vi Isakar, Kedes hiɗi voora va'a, Dobrak hiɗi voora va'a,
Bulu: bitison bi nga nyoñeban ayoñe Isakar bi mbe Kédés a mefôla mé, Dôbrat a mefôla mé,
Guiziga: Angi hirwuy ngi Isakara, a lumam Kedes, Dabrat ati li jigina ginew taŋhaya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder lenyol Issakar boo: Keedes bee durduɗe maagol e Daberat bee durduɗe maagol
Fulfulde_DC: Nder lenyol Issakar boo: Keedes bee durduɗe maagol e Daberat bee durduɗe maagol
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Isakar nɛ́ Kɛdɛs, Dabɛrat,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Isakar nɛ́ Kɛdɛs, Dabɛrat,
Kapsiki_DC: mbe hwelefe ta Isakar, yɛ Kɛdɛsh le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite, Dabrat le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite,
Tupurri: Wo ti sir jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Isakar wo mono, diñ Kedes de ngoëog äen wo, Dobrad de ngoëog äen wo,

Francais: Ramoth et ses pâturages, Anem et ses pâturages;
Anglais: And Hilen with her suburbs, Debir with her suburbs,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ramot hiɗi voora va'a, Anem hiɗi voora va'a;
Bulu: Ramôt a mefôla mé Anem a mefôla mé;
Guiziga: Ramot, Anem ati li jigina ginew taŋhaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Ramot bee durduɗe maagol e Anem bee durduɗe maagol.
Fulfulde_DC: e Ramot bee durduɗe maagol e Anem bee durduɗe maagol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ramot in Anɛm gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa á̧ wa ha̧a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ramot in Anɛm gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa á̧ wa ha̧a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ramot le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite le Anɛm le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite,
Tupurri: Ramod de ngoëog äen wo, Anem de ngoëog äen wo.

Francais: de la tribu d'Aser, Masal et ses pâturages, Abdon et ses pâturages,
Anglais: And Ashan with her suburbs, and Beth–shemesh with her suburbs:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hay jafna vi Aser: Makal hiɗi voora va'a, Abdon hiɗi voora va'a,
Bulu: Ayoñ Azér be nga nyoñe Makal a mefôla mé, Abdôn a mefôla mé,
Guiziga: Angi hirwuy ngi Aser, a lumam Masal, Abudoŋ, jom ti li jigina ginew taŋhaya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder lenyol Aser boo: Masal bee durduɗe maagol e Abdon bee durduɗe maagol
Fulfulde_DC: Nder lenyol Aser boo: Masal bee durduɗe maagol e Abdon bee durduɗe maagol
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Asɛr nɛ́ Masal, Abdɔŋ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Asɛr nɛ́ Masal, Abdɔŋ,
Kapsiki_DC: mbe hwelefe ta Asɛr, yɛ Mashal le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite, Abdon le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite,
Tupurri: Wo ti sir jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Asern wo diñ Masal de ngoëog äen wo, Abdon de ngoëog äen wo,

Francais: Hucac et ses pâturages, Rohob et ses pâturages;
Anglais: And out of the tribe of Benjamin; Geba with her suburbs, and Alemeth with her suburbs, and Anathoth with her suburbs. All their cities throughout their families were thirteen cities.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hukok hiɗi voora va'a, Rehob hiɗi voora va'a;
Bulu: Hukok a mefôla mé, Rehôb a mefôla mé;
Guiziga: Hukok, Rehop, jom ti li jigina ginew taŋhaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Hukok bee durduɗe maagol e Rehob bee durduɗe maagol.
Fulfulde_DC: e Hukok bee durduɗe maagol e Rehob bee durduɗe maagol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hukɔk in Rehob gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa á̧ wa ha̧a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hukɔk in Rehob gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa á̧ wa ha̧a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Həwkok le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite, ba'a Rehob le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite,
Tupurri: Hukog de ngoëog äen wo, Rehob de ngoëog äen wo.

Francais: et de la tribu de Nephthali, Cédès en Galilée et ses pâturages, Hamon et ses pâturages, et Cariathaïm et ses pâturages.
Anglais: And unto the sons of Kohath, which were left of the family of that tribe, were cities given out of the half tribe, namely, out of the half tribe of Manasseh, by lot, ten cities.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hay jafna vi Neftali: Kedes hay Galileya hiɗi voora va'a, Hamon hiɗi voora va'a, Kiryatayim hiɗi voora va'a.
Bulu: E ayoñe Néftali be nga nyoñe Kédés e Galilé a mefôla mé, Hamôn a mefôla mé, Kiryatayim a mefôla mé.
Guiziga: Angi sukwi ngi Neftali, a lumam hirwuy Keɗes a Galile, Hamoŋ waɗ Kiriyatayim, jom ti li jigina ginew taŋhaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder lenyol Neftali boo: Keedes nder Galiili bee durduɗe maagol e Hammon bee durduɗe maagol e Kiriyatayim bee durduɗe maagol.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder lenyol Neftali boo: Keedes nder Galiili bee durduɗe maagol e Hammon bee durduɗe maagol e Kiriyatayim bee durduɗe maagol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Nɛftalii, nɛ́ Kɛdɛs sɛn nú Galilee, Hamɔŋ in Kariataim gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa á̧ wa ha̧a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Nɛftalii, nɛ́ Kɛdɛs sɛn nú Galilee, Hamɔŋ in Kariataim gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa á̧ wa ha̧a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: mbe hwelefe ta Nɛftali, yɛ Kɛdɛsh mbe Galilɛ le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite, Hamon le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite le Kiriyatayim le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite.
Tupurri: Wo ti sir jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Neftalin wo diñ Kedes wo ti prog Galile de ngoëog äen wo, Hamon de ngoëog äen wo, Kiryatayim de ngoëog äen wo.

Francais: On donna au reste des Lévites, aux fils de Mérari: de la tribu de Zabulon, Remmono et ses pâturages, Thabor et ses pâturages;
Anglais: And to the sons of Gershom throughout their families out of the tribe of Issachar, and out of the tribe of Asher, and out of the tribe of Naphtali, and out of the tribe of Manasseh in Bashan, thirteen cities.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Cawsi ma hinina, gurona vi Merari, hay jafna vi Zabulon nisi vulsi Rimmon hiɗi voora va'a, Tabor hiɗi voora va'a.
Bulu: Be nga ve bone be Merari be nga liʼi Rimônô a mefôla mé, Tabor a mefôla mé, bitison bite bi soʼok ayoñe Zabuloñ été;
Guiziga: Ziri mekelem ngi Merariheye, angi hirwuy ngi sukwi ngi Zabuloŋ, a vulaka taŋ Rimoni waɗ Tabor jom ti li jigina ginew taŋhaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Meraari luttuŋgol heɓi berniiji ɗi'i nder lenyol Zabulon: Rimmono bee durduɗe maagol e Taboora bee durduɗe maagol.
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Meraari luttuŋgol heɓi berniiji ɗi'i nder lenyol Zabulon: Rimmono bee durduɗe maagol e Taboora bee durduɗe maagol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa ha̧a̧ Rimono in Tabɔr gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Zabulɔŋ ha̧ oi bezaŋ Levii nú-gara ko Mɛrari.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa ha̧a̧ Rimono in Tabɔr gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Zabulɔŋ ha̧ oi bezaŋ Levii nú-gara ko Mɛrari.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kweci hwelefefia Lɛvi, geze ta ŋkɛ ŋa Merari, meleme nyi yakemave hɛ: mbe hwelefe ta Zabəlon, yɛ Rimono le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite le Tabor le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite,
Tupurri: AÈ raw haçge ne te maga hay gwa' wo, ne jar ni Merari wo ti sir jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Sabuloñn wo diñ Rimono de ngoëog äen wo, Tabor de ngoëog äen wo.

Francais: de l'autre côté du Jourdain, vis-à-vis de Jéricho, à l'orient du Jourdain: de la tribu de Ruben, Bosor, au désert, et ses pâturages, Jassa et ses pâturages,
Anglais: Unto the sons of Merari were given by lot, throughout their families, out of the tribe of Reuben, and out of the tribe of Gad, and out of the tribe of Zebulun, twelve cities.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hiɗi gal hena vi Yordan, ɗiger vok Yeriko, hay gal kuɗuwu vi Yordan, hay gal jafna vi Ruben, Betser hay fulda hiɗi voora va'a, Yatsa hiɗi voora va'a,
Bulu: e Yordane yat mfaʼa jôp da tôô, zôsôô a Yérikô, e ngabe si Ruben, be nga nyoñe Bétser e nkôte si a mefôla mé, Yatsa a mefôla mé,
Guiziga: Angi sukwi ngi Ruben, tisi pas ngi miprik ngi dubazaw Zurdeŋ, migweˀ avu Zeriko, a vulaka taŋ Beker, mikini ngir ti wuzlaɓuh mikirɗak kirɗaka, jom ti li jigina ginew taŋhaya, Yahas jom ti li jigina ginew naŋhaya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haa gaɗa Urdun, wakeere fuunaaŋge haa tiitotirde Yeriko, ngol heɓi haa lenyol Ruben: Beser nder ladde bee durduɗe maagol e Yahas bee durduɗe maagol
Fulfulde_DC: Haa gaɗa Urdun, wakeere fuunaaŋge haa tiitotirde Yeriko, ngol heɓi haa lenyol Ruben: Beser nder ladde bee durduɗe maagol e Yahas bee durduɗe maagol
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ kur Jurdɛn nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese ká̧ Jeriko, tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Rubɛn, nɛ́ Besɛr ŋga-gbárà mɛ, Yahas,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ kur Jurdɛn nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese ká̧ Jeriko, tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Rubɛn, nɛ́ Besɛr ŋga-gbárà mɛ, Yahas,
Kapsiki_DC: te hɛɗia Rəbɛn pelɛ kwete kema ta Zhəwrdɛŋe, laka ŋkwa kesame ta veci sha Zhəwrdɛŋe, mbe kema ta Zhɛriko, yɛ Bɛsɛr, hɛɗi nya te ɓerama le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite ba'a Yahas le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite,
Tupurri: Wo go faale Jurdeçeç ma äañla nen wur botoñ ti sir maga kar de Jeriko mono, aè haç wo ne hara ti sir jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Ruben wo diñ Betser ma ti puulin de ngoëog äen wo, Jatsa de ngoëog äen wo,

Francais: Cadémoth et ses pâturages, Méphaat et ses pâturages;
Anglais: And the children of Israel gave to the Levites these cities with their suburbs.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kedemot hiɗi voora va'a, Mefaat hiɗi voora va'a;
Bulu: Kédé Môt a mefôla mé, Méfat a mefôla mé;
Guiziga: Kedemot, Mefaˀat, jom ti li jigina ginew taŋhaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Kedemot bee durduɗe maagol e Mefa'at bee durduɗe maagol.
Fulfulde_DC: e Kedemot bee durduɗe maagol e Mefa'at bee durduɗe maagol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kɛdɛmɔt in Mɛfat gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa á̧ wa ha̧a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kɛdɛmɔt in Mɛfat gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa á̧ wa ha̧a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Kedɛmot le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite le Mɛfat le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite,
Tupurri: Kedemod de ngoëog äen wo, Mefaad de ngoëog äen wo.

Francais: et de la tribu de Gad, Ramoth en Galaad et ses pâturages, Manaïm, et ses pâturages, Hésebon et ses pâturages,
Anglais: And they gave by lot out of the tribe of the children of Judah, and out of the tribe of the children of Simeon, and out of the tribe of the children of Benjamin, these cities, which are called by their names.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hay jafna vi Gad, Ramot hay Galaad hiɗi voora va'a, Mahanayim hiɗi voora va'a,
Bulu: ngap é nga so ayoñe Gad: Ramôt e Galad a mefôla mé, Mahanayim a mefôla mé,
Guiziga: Angi sukwi ngi Gata, a vulaka taŋ Ramot ngi ruwuy Galaˀat waɗ Mahanayim, jom ti li jigina ginew taŋhaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder lenyol Gada boo: Ramot nder Gile'at bee durduɗe maagol e Mahanayim bee durduɗe maagol
Fulfulde_DC: Nder lenyol Gada boo: Ramot nder Gile'at bee durduɗe maagol e Mahanayim bee durduɗe maagol
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Gad, nɛ́ Ramot nú Galad, Mahanayim,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Gad, nɛ́ Ramot nú Galad, Mahanayim,
Kapsiki_DC: mbe hwelefe ta Gad ne, yɛ Ramot nya mbe Gala'ad le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite, Mahanayim le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite,
Tupurri: Wo ti sir jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Gadn wo mono, aè haç ne hara diñ Ramod wo ti sir Galaad de ngoëog äen wo, Mahanayim de ngoëog äen wo,

Francais: Jézer et ses pâturages.
Anglais: And the residue of the families of the sons of Kohath had cities of their coasts out of the tribe of Ephraim.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hesbon hiɗi voora va'a, Yayezer hiɗi voora va'a kaw.
Bulu: Hesboñ a mefôla mé, Yaézer a mefôla mé.
Guiziga: Heseboŋ, Yazer jom ti li jigina ginew taŋhaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Hesbon bee durduɗe maagol e Ya'ajer bee durduɗe maagol.
Fulfulde_DC: e Hesbon bee durduɗe maagol e Ya'ajer bee durduɗe maagol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hɛsbɔŋ in Yazɛr gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa á̧ wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hɛsbɔŋ in Yazɛr gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa á̧ wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Hɛshebon le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite, le Yazɛr le ŋkwa nyi dzeyi yite.
Tupurri: Hesbon de ngoëog äen wo, Yaeser de ngoëog äen wo.

Francais: Fils d'Issachar: Thola, Phua, Jasub et Siméron: quatre,
Anglais: Now the sons of Issachar were, Tola, and Puah, Jashub, and Shimron, four.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Isakar: Tola, Puwa, Yakub, hiɗi Simron. Nisi fiɗi.
Bulu: Bone bʼIsakar: Tôla, Pua, Yasub a Simrôn Bôte benyin.
Guiziga: Isakar a yi ziri mizilehey mufaɗa, i ti: Tola, Puwa, Yasup waɗ Simroŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Issakar ngoni: Tola e Puwa e Yasuba e Simron, ɓe nayo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Issakar ngoni: Tola e Puwa e Yasuba e Simron, ɓe nayo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Isakar nɛ́ Tola, Pua, Yasub in Simrɔŋ; wa lɛŋ naar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Isakar nɛ́ Tola, Pua, Yasub in Simrɔŋ; wa lɛŋ naar.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ŋwalea Isakar ne, wəfaɗe hɛ: Tola, Pəwa, Yashəwb le Shimron.
Tupurri: Jar ni Isakar wo diñ: Tola, Puwa, Yasub, Simron, wo naa.

Francais: -Fils de Thola: Ozi, Raphaïa, Jériel, Jémaï, Jebsem et Samuel, chefs de leurs maisons patriarcales issues de Thola, vaillants hommes, inscrits d'après leurs générations, au temps de David, au nombre de vingt-deux mille six cents.
Anglais: And the sons of Tola; Uzzi, and Rephaiah, and Jeriel, and Jahmai, and Jibsam, and Shemuel, heads of their father's house, to wit, of Tola: they were valiant men of might in their generations; whose number was in the days of David two and twenty thousand and six hundred.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Tola: Uzzi, Refaya, Yeriyel, Yakmay, Yibsam hiɗi Samuel, sa ŋulona vi jafna vi Tola, sa jufayna sa donona kuɗ vokŋa visiya; hay liyna vi David kayni, nisi ay birim dok-ma' yam ma' hiɗi kis-karkiya.
Bulu: Bone be Tola: Uzi, Refaya, Yeriél, Yamayi, Yibsam a Samuel, bivete ya nda bôte Tôla, biwôlô bi bôte ya mebialé map; tañe bôte jap, melu me David, é mbe toyini mewôm mebaé a ébaé a mintete misaman.
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Tolahay i ti: Uzi, Refaya, Yeriyel, Yamay, Ibisam waɗ Semuyel. Buy ngi hayay asi ziri ngi Tolahay, i taŋ so. I mizli miwirwirey. Ar hin ngi Davit na, a gam le mizli durmuk kukur cuw nga cuw ti skat skat merkeɗe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Tola boo: Uzzi e Refaya e Yeriyel e Yahamay e Yipsam e Samuyila. Kamɓe ngoni baaba-ci'e'en nder danygol Tola, ɓe honooɓe semmbiɗɓe, suusɓe fodde gide maɓɓe. Limgal maɓɓe zamanu laamu Daawuda, ujine noogas e ɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe njoweego (22.600).
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Tola boo: Uzzi e Refaya e Yeriyel e Yahamay e Yipsam e Samuyila. Kamɓe ngoni baaba-ci'e'en nder danygol Tola, ɓe honooɓe semmbiɗɓe, suusɓe fodde gide maɓɓe. Limgal maɓɓe zamanu laamu Daawuda, ujine noogas e ɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe njoweego (22.600).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Tola nɛ́ Uzi, Rɛfaya, Yɛriɛl, Yamai, Yibsam in Sɛmuɛl nɛ̀ yaa so nɛ́ o gasawi nutua ko Tola; wa so nɛ́ o ŋga-wi, ɓɛɛ dɔka o bezaŋ-wa tɛ ŋgimbi-wan ko David nɛ́ booro-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Tola nɛ́ Uzi, Rɛfaya, Yɛriɛl, Yamai, Yibsam in Sɛmuɛl nɛ̀ yaa so nɛ́ o gasawi nutua ko Tola; wa so nɛ́ o ŋga-wi, ɓɛɛ dɔka o bezaŋ-wa tɛ ŋgimbi-wan ko David nɛ́ booro-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale nyi yake Tola: Əwzi, Refaya, Yeriyɛl, Yamay, Ibsam ba'a Sheməwɛl. Ghenci ka se kambeli nyi te ghəa mbeli mbe yita nyi kesawa mbe Tola. Kaka katsala kɛfi se hɛ mbe yita ta nci. Ma mbe vəa David ne, 22.600 se mbeli ganjia Tola.
Tupurri: Jar ni Tola wo diñ: Usi, Refaya, Yeriyel, Yahmay, Yibsam wo de Samyele, saara diñ wañre ma ti feele mani Tolan wo, diñ werpiiri ma de eegre ti moobe äaaran wo. Ti kal mani Dafidn mono, ngaäa jar ni Tola hay wo äuy ndar do äog ti äog de jar kiskis hiira'a.

Francais: - Fils d'Ozi: Izrahia. Fils de Izrahia: Michaël, Obadia, Johel et Jésia: en tout cinq chefs.
Anglais: And the sons of Uzzi; Izrahiah: and the sons of Izrahiah; Michael, and Obadiah, and Joel, Ishiah, five: all of them chief men.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Uzzi: Yisrakya. Gurona vi Yisrakya: Mikayel, Abdiyas, Jowel, Yikiya, sa ŋulon noŋ pet vasl;
Bulu: Bone be Uzi: Yizraya. Bone be Yizraya: Mikaél, Abdias, Yôél, Yisiya, bese bivete bitan;
Guiziga: Uzi a yi Izrahiya, Izrahiya kwana, a yi Mikapel, Obadiya, Zowel waɗ Isaya. Taŋ zlum taŋ i buyoy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓii Uzzi, Yisrahiya. Ɓiɓɓe Yisrahiya boo: Mika'iilu e Obadiya e Yo'el e Yissiya, hawti mawɓe njowo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓii Uzzi, Yisrahiya. Ɓiɓɓe Yisrahiya boo: Mika'iilu e Obadiya e Yo'el e Yissiya, hawti mawɓe njowo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bem ko Uzi nɛ́ Yisrahia, ɓɛɛ Yisrahia ko Mikaɛl, Obadia, Jɔɛl in Isia. Wa mɔɔrɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ o gasawi nutua.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bem ko Uzi nɛ́ Yisrahia, ɓɛɛ Yisrahia ko Mikaɛl, Obadia, Jɔɛl in Isia. Wa mɔɔrɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ o gasawi nutua.
Kapsiki_DC: Deke Izrahiya wəzege teza nya yake Əwzi. Ŋwale tezhili nyi yake Izrahiya: Mikayɛl, Obadiya, Zhowɛl ba'a Isiya, mcɛfe hɛ kaka meghe nyi mbe yita ta nci.
Tupurri: Je ni Usi diñ Yisrahiya. Jar ni Yisrahiya wo diñ: Mikayel, Abdiyas, Jowel, Yisiya wo äuy wañre dwee.

Francais: Ils avaient avec eux, selon leurs générations, selon leurs maisons patriarcales, des troupes armées pour la guerre, trente-six mille hommes; car ils avaient beaucoup de femmes et de fils.
Anglais: And with them, by their generations, after the house of their fathers, were bands of soldiers for war, six and thirty thousand men: for they had many wives and sons.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kuɗ vokŋa visiya, hay jafna visi noŋ pet kayni, soje sa tuwsi koti kay duura ka ir birim dok-ɦidi yam karkiya. Kay nisi ka hiɗi boyn ŋolo, guron ŋolo kaw.
Bulu: be nga bili bôte ya minsamba bita asu mewosan toyini mewôm mela a ésaman, amu be nga bili abui binga a bon , be nga bili be avalʼane mebialé a menda me bôte map me mbe.
Guiziga: Dideˀ taŋhaya vur haya, vur haya, taŋ haɗi. A wuzla taŋ, mizli mindilaka le ngi gi vurumo, taŋ durmuk kukur makir ti merkeɗe. A hay taŋhaya, ngwasay ati ziri, taŋ haɗi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mooɓe jama'aare konu ujine cappanɗe tato e njoweego (36.000) ngondi bee maɓɓe, fodde gide maɓɓe e ci'e maɓɓe, ngam ɓe ngoodi rewɓe e ɓiɓɓe ɗuuɗɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Mooɓe jama'aare konu ujine cappanɗe tato e njoweego (36.000) ngondi bee maɓɓe, fodde gide maɓɓe e ci'e maɓɓe, ngam ɓe ngoodi rewɓe e ɓiɓɓe ɗuuɗɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nutua kɔ-wa kpɔk kpɔk nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o bezaŋ-wa a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o gíí wi-biro tɛ booro-ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ o okoo in o obem a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ nyɛmna mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nutua kɔ-wa kpɔk kpɔk nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o bezaŋ-wa a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o gíí wi-biro tɛ booro-ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ o okoo in o obem a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ nyɛmna mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kala nza ta nci kwa yita, le wəvəsəa mbeli nyi wərə mpa va hɛ gare mbeli 36.000, le mi kwele kwele ba'a ŋwale.
Tupurri: Jar durgi hay wo wer äaara go ti kaçaçge ti' ti'i, go ti feele ta' ta' ndar do swa' ti hiira'a, wo go de gragge ma durgi äuy, werga naare äaara wo de weere äaara hay wo debañ.

Francais: Leurs frères, d'après toutes les familles d'Issachar, hommes vaillants, formaient un nombre total de quatre-vingt-sept mille, inscrits dans les généalogies.
Anglais: And their brethren among all the families of Issachar were valiant men of might, reckoned in all by their genealogies fourscore and seven thousand.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Guro-biyosina, kuɗ vuɗna vi Isakar noŋ kafe, sa jufayna sa donona tapay noŋ pet sumun birim dok-glafandi yam siɗiya, sa sesi ɗoy gaana.
Bulu: Bobenyañe bap, avale mebum mʼIsakar mese me né, biwôlô bi bôte ya bita, be mbe bese nlañan bôte toyini mewôme muam a zamgbwa.
Guiziga: Muy ngi Isaka ray gar, a slufaka taŋ jom gar na, mizli miwirwireye, taŋ mizli durmuk kukur dangafaɗ nga tarnaˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Banndiraaɓe maɓɓe nder ci'e Issakar'en fuu, limgal winndaaɓe nder deftere asli waɗi honooɓe semmbiɗɓe ujine cappanɗe njoweetato e njoweeɗiɗo (87.000).
Fulfulde_DC: Banndiraaɓe maɓɓe nder ci'e Issakar'en fuu, limgal winndaaɓe nder deftere asli waɗi honooɓe semmbiɗɓe ujine cappanɗe njoweetato e njoweeɗiɗo (87.000).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ nú-gara ko Isakar lɛŋ, dɔka o ŋga-wi nɛ̀ wa tɔra nɛ́ booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ nú-gara ko Isakar lɛŋ, dɔka o ŋga-wi nɛ̀ wa tɔra nɛ́ booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛ kweci ka kesaka yitehɛ nci nyi kwa yita ta Isakar kaka katsala kempa nyi keɓelate geva 87.000.
Tupurri: Te heçeçre äaara ma ti moobe mani Isakarn tay wo äuy ndar do nenma' ti renam, wo go de yerge äuy. Saara diñ werpiiri ma de eegre wo.

Francais: Fils de Benjamin: Béla, Béchor et Jadiel: trois.
Anglais: The sons of Benjamin; Bela, and Becher, and Jediael, three.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Benyamin: Bela, Beker, hiɗi Yediyel, ɦidi.
Bulu: Bone be Bényamin: Béla, Béker a Yediaél, bôte belaa.
Guiziga: Benjameŋ a yi ziri mizilehey makir, i ti: Bela, Beker waɗ Yediyayel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Benyamin ngoni: Bela e Beker e Yedi'ayel, ɓe tato.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Benyamin ngoni: Bela e Beker e Yedi'ayel, ɓe tato.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Bɛnjamin nɛ́ Bɛla, Bɛkɛr in Yɛdiaɛl; wa taar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Bɛnjamin nɛ́ Bɛla, Bɛkɛr in Yɛdiaɛl; wa taar.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhilia Bɛnjamɛn: Bɛla, Bɛkɛr le Yɛdiyayɛl.
Tupurri: Jar ni Benjame wo diñ: Bela, Beker, Yediyael, wo swa'a.

Francais: - Fils de Béla: Esbon, Ozi, Oziel, Jérimoth et Uraï: cinq chefs de maisons patriarcales, hommes vaillants, inscrits dans les généalogies, au nombre de vingt-deux mille quatre cents.
Anglais: And the sons of Bela; Ezbon, and Uzzi, and Uzziel, and Jerimoth, and Iri, five; heads of the house of their fathers, mighty men of valour; and were reckoned by their genealogies twenty and two thousand and thirty and four.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Bela: Esbon, Uzzi, Uziyel, Yerimot hiɗi Iri, sa ŋulona vi jafn vasl, sa jufayna, nisi ŋaɓay goy noŋ kaf ir birim dok-ma' yam ma' hiɗi diram dok-ɦidi yam fiɗi.
Bulu: Bone be Béla: Hesboñ, Uzi, Uziél, Yérimôt a Iri, bivete bitane ya menda me bôte map, biwôlô bi bôt, nlañan tañe bôte toyini mewôm mebaé a ébaé a bôte mewôm mela a benyin.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Belahaya taŋ zlum, i ti: Esboŋ, Uzi, Uziyel, Yerimot waɗ Iri. I mizli miwirwirey, i buyoy a wuzla muy taŋhaya. A slufa taŋ na, taŋ mizli durmuk kukur cuw nga cuw ti mizli kukur makir nga mufaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Bela boo: Esbon e Uzzi e Uzziyel e Yerimot e Iiri, ɓe njowo. Ɓe baaba-ci'e'en, honooɓe semmbiɗɓe. Limgal winndaaɓe maɓɓe waɗi ujine noogas e ɗiɗo e cappanɗe tato e nayo (22.034).
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Bela boo: Esbon e Uzzi e Uzziyel e Yerimot e Iiri, ɓe njowo. Ɓe baaba-ci'e'en, honooɓe semmbiɗɓe. Limgal winndaaɓe maɓɓe waɗi ujine noogas e ɗiɗo e cappanɗe tato e nayo (22.034).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Bɛla nɛ́ Ɛsbɔŋ, Uzi, Uziɛl, Yɛrimɔt in Iri; wa mɔɔrɔ‘i nɛ́ o gasawi nutua nɛ̀ duka so nɛ́ o ŋga-wi, ɓɛɛ o bezaŋ-wa nɛ̀ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ́ booro-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-taar-zua-naar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Bɛla nɛ́ Ɛsbɔŋ, Uzi, Uziɛl, Yɛrimɔt in Iri; wa mɔɔrɔ‘i nɛ́ o gasawi nutua nɛ̀ duka so nɛ́ o ŋga-wi, ɓɛɛ o bezaŋ-wa nɛ̀ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ́ booro-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-taar-zua-naar.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili mcɛfe yake Bɛla: Ɛsbon, Əwzi, Əwziyɛl, Yerimot ba'a Iri, kaka katsala kɛfi nyi kese kambeli nyi te ghə mbe yayata yita ta nci. Nahe mbeli keɓelate hɛ mbe yita ta nci 22.034 zhili.
Tupurri: Jar ni Bela wo diñ: Esbon, Usi, Usiyel, Yerimod wo de Iri, wañre ma ti feele wo dwee de werpiiri ma de eegre wo wer ndar do äog ti äog de jar do swa' ti naa wo go de yerge äuy.

Francais: - Fils de Béchor: Zamira, Joas, Eliézer, Elioénaï, Amri, Jérimoth, Abia, Anathoth et Almath: tous ceux-là fils de Béchor,
Anglais: And the sons of Becher; Zemira, and Joash, and Eliezer, and Elioenai, and Omri, and Jerimoth, and Abiah, and Anathoth, and Alameth. All these are the sons of Becher.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Beker: Zemira, Yowah, Eliyezer, Elyohenay, Omri, Yeremot, Abiya, Anatot hiɗi Alemet, nisi kaf kayni si gurona vi Beker,
Bulu: Bone be Zéker: Zemira, Yôak, Eliézer, Elyoénayi, Omri, Yérémôt, Abiya, Anatot a Alamét, be bese e bone be Béker,
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Bekerey i ti: Zemira, Yoˀas, Eliyezer, Eliyohenay, Omri, Yeremot, Abiya, Anatot waɗ Alemet. Tayna gar i dideˀ ngi Bekerey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Beker boo: Zimira e Yo'as e Eli'ezer e Eliyo'enay e Omri e Yeremot e Abiya e Anatot e Alemet, ɓe fuu ɓe ɓiɓɓe Beker.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Beker boo: Zimira e Yo'as e Eli'ezer e Eliyo'enay e Omri e Yeremot e Abiya e Anatot e Alemet, ɓe fuu ɓe ɓiɓɓe Beker.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Bɛkɛr nɛ́ Zɛmira, Yoas, Eliɛzɛr, Ɛlyɔnai, Ɔmri, Yɛrɛmɔt, Abia, Anatot ká bá nɛ̀ Alɛmɛt. O bem ko Bɛkɛr lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔ‘i,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Bɛkɛr nɛ́ Zɛmira, Yoas, Eliɛzɛr, Ɛlyɔnai, Ɔmri, Yɛrɛmɔt, Abia, Anatot ká bá nɛ̀ Alɛmɛt. O bem ko Bɛkɛr lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔ‘i,
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale nyi yake Bɛkɛr: Zɛmira, Yowash, Ɛliyɛzɛr, Ɛliyohɛnay, Omri, Yerɛmot, Abiya, Anatot le Alɛmɛt. Nahe pɛtɛa nci kenza kahwelefefia Bɛkɛr,
Tupurri: Jar ni Beker wo diñ: Semira, Yowas, Eliyeser, Elyoenay, Omri, Abiya, Anatod wo de Almed, wo äuy diñ jar ni Beker wo äuy.

Francais: inscrits dans les généalogies, d'après leurs générations, comme chefs de leurs maisons patriarcales, hommes vaillants, au nombre de vingt mille deux cents.
Anglais: And the number of them, after their genealogy by their generations, heads of the house of their fathers, mighty men of valour, was twenty thousand and two hundred.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nisi ŋaɓay goyo kuɗ vokŋa visiya visiya, si sa ŋulona vi jafna visiya, sum sa diksi jufayna, nisi ir birim dok-ma' yam ma' hiɗi kis-ma'.
Bulu: nlañan ane mebialé map me né, be too bivete ya menda me bôte map, biwôlô bi bôt tañe toyini mewôm mebaé a mintete mibaé.
Guiziga: A slufaka taŋ na, buyoy a wuzla muy taŋhaya, taŋ durmuk kukur cuw ti mizli skat skat cuw, i mizli miwirwirey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Winndaaɓe nder deftere asli maɓɓe fodde baaba-ci'e'en maɓɓe, honooɓe semmbiɗɓe ujine noogas e teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo (20.200).
Fulfulde_DC: Winndaaɓe nder deftere asli maɓɓe fodde baaba-ci'e'en maɓɓe, honooɓe semmbiɗɓe ujine noogas e teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo (20.200).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ dɔka o bezaŋ gasawi nutua nɔ‘i nɛ̀ wa tɔra nɛ́ booro-ɓu-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ dɔka o bezaŋ gasawi nutua nɔ‘i nɛ̀ wa tɔra nɛ́ booro-ɓu-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo.
Kapsiki_DC: kaka katsala kɛfi, kambeli nyi te ghəa mbeli keyita keyita. Kwa ɓelate hɛ mbeli ne, 20.200 zhili.
Tupurri: AÈ yer ra go ti kaçaçge äaara ti' ti'i, diñ wañre ma ti feele äaara wo no, saara diñ werpiiri ma de eegre wo lay. Ngaäa äaara hay ndar do äog ti äog de jar kiskis äoge.

Francais: - Fils de Jadihel: Balan. -Fils de Balan: Jéhus, Benjamin, Aod, Chanana, Zéthan, Tarsis et Abisahar:
Anglais: The sons also of Jediael; Bilhan: and the sons of Bilhan; Jeush, and Benjamin, and Ehud, and Chenaanah, and Zethan, and Tharshish, and Ahishahar.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Goora vi Yediyel: Bilhan. Gurona vi Bilhan: Yewus, Benyamin, Ehud, Kenaana, Zetan, Tarkis hiɗi Ahisakar,
Bulu: Bone Yediaél: Bilan; bone be Bilan: Yeuk, Bényamin, Ehud, Kenaana, Zétan, Tarsik a Ahisahar,
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Yediyayel i Bilehaŋ. Ziri mizile ngi Bilehaŋhay i ti: Benjameŋ, Ehut, Kenaana, Zetaŋ, Tarsis waɗ Ahisahar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓii Yedi'ayel, Bilhan. Ɓiɓɓe Bilhan boo: Ye'us e Benyamin e Ehuudi e Kenana e Zetan e Tarsis e Ahisahar.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓii Yedi'ayel, Bilhan. Ɓiɓɓe Bilhan boo: Ye'us e Benyamin e Ehuudi e Kenana e Zetan e Tarsis e Ahisahar.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bem ko Yɛdiaɛl nɛ́ Bilaŋ; o bem ko Bilaŋ nɛ́ Yɛus, Bɛnjamin, Ehud, Kɛnana, Zɛtaŋ, Tarsis in Ahisahar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bem ko Yɛdiaɛl nɛ́ Bilaŋ; o bem ko Bilaŋ nɛ́ Yɛus, Bɛnjamin, Ehud, Kɛnana, Zɛtaŋ, Tarsis in Ahisahar.
Kapsiki_DC: Wəzege ta Yɛdiyayɛl: Bilehan. Ŋwale nyi yake Bilehan: Yɛyəwsh, Bɛnjamɛn, Ɛhəwd, Kenana, Zɛtan, Tarsis le Ahishahar.
Tupurri: Je ni Yediyael diñ Bilhan. Jar ni Bilhan wo diñ Yewus, Benjame, Ehud, Kenaana, Setan, Tarsis wo de Ahisahar.

Francais: tous ceux là fils de Jadihel, chefs de leurs maisons patriarcales, hommes vaillants, au nombre de dix-sept mille deux cents, en état d'aller en armes à la guerre.
Anglais: All these the sons of Jediael, by the heads of their fathers, mighty men of valour, were seventeen thousand and two hundred soldiers, fit to go out for war and battle.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nisi kaf kayni si gurona vi Yediyel, sa ŋulona vi jafna visiya, sa jufayna sa donona, ir birim doogo yam siɗiya hiɗi kis-ma' as kal goy hiɗi sle ma duura kay dura.
Bulu: be bese be too bone be Yediaél, Bivete ya menda me bôte map, biwôlô bi bôt tañe toyini awôm a zamgbwa a mintete mibaé, be too nguleya kui atan be beʼe mengaa asu mewosan
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Yediyayel tayna gar, mizli miwirwirey, buyoy a wuzla muy taŋhay i taŋ so. I mizli mindilaka le ngi gi vurum, taŋ durmuk kuruˀ nga tarnaˀ ti mizli skat skat cuw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe fuu ɓe ɓiɓɓe Yedi'ayel, fodde baaba-ci'e'en, honooɓe semmbiɗɓe, waawɓe konu ujine sappo e njoweeɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo (17.200).
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe fuu ɓe ɓiɓɓe Yedi'ayel, fodde baaba-ci'e'en, honooɓe semmbiɗɓe, waawɓe konu ujine sappo e njoweeɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo (17.200).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Yɛdiaɛl nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ o gasawi nutua; o ŋga-wi kɔ-wa nɛ̀ iŋa biro nɛ́ booro-ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Yɛdiaɛl nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ o gasawi nutua; o ŋga-wi kɔ-wa nɛ̀ iŋa biro nɛ́ booro-ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛ ŋwalea Yɛdiyayɛl nyighɛ kaka meghe te ghəa mbeli keyita keyita, kaka katsala kɛfi nyi ɓelate hɛ mbeli 17.200 zhili nyi gare mpa.
Tupurri: Saara äuy diñ jar ni Yediyael wo, diñ werpiiri ma de eegre wo, diñ wañre ma ti feele äaaran wo lay. Ngaäa jar äaaran wo äuy ndar hwal ti renam ti äe kiskis äoge, wo äuy diñ jar maga wo de kaçaçge ma woge jag jaw äuy.

Francais: Sepham et Hapham, fils d'Hir: Hasim, fils d'Aher.
Anglais: Shuppim also, and Huppim, the children of Ir, and Hushim, the sons of Aher.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Suppim hiɗi Huppim gurona vi Ir; Husim goora vi Aher.
Bulu: Supim a Hupim, bone be Ir; Husim e mone Aher.
Guiziga: Supim ati hupime, i ziri mizile ngi Irey, Husime, i mangal ngi Aher.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Suppim e Huppim ngoni ɓiɓɓe Iir, Husim woni ɓii Aher.
Fulfulde_DC: Suppim e Huppim ngoni ɓiɓɓe Iir, Husim woni ɓii Aher.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Ir nɛ́ Supim in Hupim; bem ko Ahɛr nɛ́ Husim.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Ir nɛ́ Supim in Hupim; bem ko Ahɛr nɛ́ Husim.
Kapsiki_DC: Yɛ Shəwpim le Həwpim ŋwalea Ir. Həwshim wəzege ta Ahɛr.
Tupurri: Supim wo de Hupim hay wo diñ jar ni Ir wo. Husim diñ je Ahere.

Francais: Fils de Nephthali: Jasiel, Guni, Jéser et Sellum, fils de Bala.
Anglais: The sons of Naphtali; Jahziel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shallum, the sons of Bilhah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Neftali: Yatsiyel, Guni, Yatser, Sallum goora vi Bilha.
Bulu: Bone be Néftali: Yatsiél, Guni, Yétsér, Salum, bone be Bila.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Neftalihey i ti: Yasiyel, Guni, Yeser waɗ Salum, taŋ i dideˀ meciɗek ngi Bilahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Neftali ngoni: Yahaciyel e Guni e Yejer e Sallum. Kamɓe ngoni danygol Bilha .
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Neftali ngoni: Yahaciyel e Guni e Yejer e Sallum. Kamɓe ngoni danygol Bilha .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Nɛftalii nɛ́ Yasiɛl, Guni, Yɛsɛr in Salum. Wa so nɛ́ be-koo Bilha.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Nɛftalii nɛ́ Yasiɛl, Guni, Yɛsɛr in Salum. Wa so nɛ́ be-koo Bilha.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Nɛftali: Yasiyɛl, Gəwni, Yɛsɛr le Shaləwm. Bila, meghekɛa Nɛftali.
Tupurri: Jar ni Neftali wo diñ: Yasiyel, Guni, Yetser wo de Salum, kare Bilha wo.

Francais: Fils de Manassé: Esriel. Sa concubine syrienne enfanta Machir, père de Galaad.
Anglais: The sons of Manasseh; Asriel, whom she bare: (but his concubine the Aramitess bare Machir the father of Gilead:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Manase: Asriyel ma cata ta sunumta ta Siriyata vuɗumta, na' vuɗ Makir, bum Galaad.
Bulu: Bone be Manasé: Asriél nye ébone jé, ngone Sirieñ é nga biaé; a nga biaé fe Makir, ésaa Galad.
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Manasehey i ti: Asriyel ati Makir, a ya taŋ ti ngwas naŋ mangasl, zuŋ Siri, Makir i cine ngi Galaˀat.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Manassa ngoni: Asriyel mo culaaɗo Manassa Siriyaajo danyi. O danyi boo Makir, baaba Gile'at.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Manassa ngoni: Asriyel mo culaaɗo Manassa Siriyaajo danyi. O danyi boo Makir, baaba Gile'at.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Manase nɛ̀ zɔŋa-kóò kɔ̧-a̧, boko be Aram, koa nɛ́ Asriɛl in Makir dáà ko Galad.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Manase nɛ̀ zɔŋa-kóò kɔ̧-a̧, boko be Aram, koa nɛ́ Asriɛl in Makir dáà ko Galad.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili nyi yake Manasɛ: Asriyɛl le Makir nyi yake ŋkɛ hwa male meghwa ta ŋkɛ nya kawəzha ta ka Siri. Yitenyɛa Gala'ad ne, Makir.
Tupurri: Jar ni Manase wo diñ: Asriyel maga se biñn de nday äe may jar Sirim mono, waçy sen biñ Makir pan Galaad ni pa.

Francais: - Machir prit une femme de Happhim et de Saphan; le nom de sa soeur était Maacha. Le nom du second fils était Salphaad, et Salphaad eut des filles.
Anglais: And Machir took to wife the sister of Huppim and Shuppim, whose sister's name was Maachah;) and the name of the second was Zelophehad: and Zelophehad had daughters.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Makir sli ca mi Huppim hiɗi Suppim. Ɓasulumta ya' ala Maaka, goora valam ma ma'na semda valam ala Selofkad, Selofkad vuɗsi si guro sa boyo tuta.
Bulu: Makir a nga luʼu Hupim a Supim binga. Kale jé é mbe jôé na Maaka. Jôé e mona baa e mbe Selôfhad; Selôfhad a nji ke biaé bobebinga.
Guiziga: Makir a ɗuva ngwas da Hupim waɗ da Supime. Sukum mongoso ngi Makir ada, a zilaka Maˀaka. Makir a yi mangal mekelem le, a zilaka Selofat. Selofat a yi nga naŋ i ziri mongosohoyo si.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Makir te'ani Huppim e Suppim rewɓe. Innde deerɗiiko debbo, Ma'aka, innde ɓiyiiko ɗiɗaɓo, Celofhad. Kaŋko o walaa ɓiɓɓe worɓe, sey ɓiɓɓe rewɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Makir te'ani Huppim e Suppim rewɓe. Innde deerɗiiko debbo, Ma'aka, innde ɓiyiiko ɗiɗaɓo, Celofhad. Kaŋko o walaa ɓiɓɓe worɓe, sey ɓiɓɓe rewɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Makir baa kóò ha̧ Hupim in Supim; nin boko-nya-a̧ so nɛ́ Maka. Nin hɔ-ɗoŋ kaya-bem ko Makir nɛ́ Sɛlɔfɛhad; Sɛlɔfɛhad koo so kɔ‘i nɛ́ o be-okoo ɓɛɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Makir baa kóò ha̧ Hupim in Supim; nin boko-nya-a̧ so nɛ́ Maka. Nin hɔ-ɗoŋ kaya-bem ko Makir nɛ́ Sɛlɔfɛhad; Sɛlɔfɛhad koo so kɔ‘i nɛ́ o be-okoo ɓɛɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Makir sepate nda male ke Həwpim, tsagha ke Shəwpim. Ma'aka sləa wəzha ta meghekɛ. Ma sləa nde bake ta wəzege ta ŋkɛ ne, Selofad, deke ŋwalea kwɛ yayake Selofad.
Tupurri: Makir raw da naare ne Hupim wo de Supim. AÀ hay ëe hen äe ma twaçyn ga Maaka, ëu weel äe ma twar ma de äog hay ga Selofhade, day Selofhad raw biñgi diñ mayre tawa.

Francais: Maacha, femme de Machir, enfanta un fils, et l'appela du nom de Pharès; le nom de son frère était Sarès, et ses fils étaient Ulam et Récen.
Anglais: And Maachah the wife of Machir bare a son, and she called his name Peresh; and the name of his brother was Sheresh; and his sons were Ulam and Rakem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Maaka cata vi Makir vuɗ goor kep, na' tunum selem ala Peres, ɓasulumna yum ala Serek, gurona valam kayni si Ulam hiɗi Rekem.
Bulu: Maaka e minga Makir, a nga biaé monafam, nde a nga yôlé nye jôé na Pérés; monyañ a mbe jôé na Serék a bone bé be mbe Ulam a Rékém.
Guiziga: Maˀaka ngwas ngi Makire, a yi mangal mizile le pal, Maˀaka a zila Peres, a yi mekelem ma, a zila Sereks. Ziri mizile ngi Seresey i ti: Ulam ati Rekem.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ma'aka, debbo Makir danyi ɓiɗɗo gorko, inndi mo Peres. Innde deerɗiiko, Zeres. Ɓiɓɓe Zeres boo: Ulam e Rekem.
Fulfulde_DC: Ma'aka, debbo Makir danyi ɓiɗɗo gorko, inndi mo Peres. Innde deerɗiiko, Zeres. Ɓiɓɓe Zeres boo: Ulam e Rekem.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Maka kóò kó Makir koo o ŋma bem nɛ̀ nin-wa so nɛ́ Pɛrɛs in Sɛrɛs. Sɛrɛs koo Ulam in Rɛkɛm,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Maka kóò kó Makir koo o ŋma bem nɛ̀ nin-wa so nɛ́ Pɛrɛs in Sɛrɛs. Sɛrɛs koo Ulam in Rɛkɛm,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Ma'aka, male ta Makir yake kwete wəzege teza nya hekate nda slə nde kaPɛrɛsh, pa yake kwete zhɛkwa, Shɛrɛsh sləa ŋkɛ. Shɛrɛsh yitenyɛa yɛ Əwlam le Rɛkɛm.
Tupurri: Maaka, waçy Makir kal biñ weel ne hen pa, Maaka raw kañ ëu ne hen ga Perese, aè hay ëe hen äen ga Serese, weere äen hay wo diñ: Ulam wo de Rekeme.

Francais: - Fils d'Ulam: Badan. - Ce sont là les fils de Galaad, fils de Machir, fils de Manassé.
Anglais: And the sons of Ulam; Bedan. These were the sons of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Goora vi Ulam: Bedan. Nisi kayni si gurona vi Galaad, goora vi Makir, goora vi Manase.
Bulu: Bone be Ulam: Bedan. Bone be Galad mbe le, e mone Makir, e mone Manasé.
Guiziga: Ulama kwana, a yi Bedaŋ. Hanayna i dideˀ ngi Galaˀat, mangal ngi Makir, yo i dideˀ meceɗek ngi Manase.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓii Ulam boo, Bedan. Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Gile'at ɓii Makir ɓii Manassa.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓii Ulam boo, Bedan. Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Gile'at ɓii Makir ɓii Manassa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ Ulam ko Bedaŋ. O bem ko Galad, bem ko Makir, be-koo Manase nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ Ulam ko Bedaŋ. O bem ko Galad, bem ko Makir, be-koo Manase nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Bɛdan sləa wəzege teza nya yake Əwlam. Tsagha hwelefe nyi kesawa hwa Gala'ad nya kawəzege ta Makir ba'a nya kashia Manasɛ.
Tupurri: Ulam diñ pan Bedan lay. Mo na diñ jar ni Galaad je ni Makir, je ni Manasen wo so.

Francais: - Sa soeur Hammoléketh enfanta Ischod, Abiézer et Mohola.
Anglais: And his sister Hammoleketh bare Ishod, and Abiezer, and Mahalah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ɓasulumta Hamoleket vuɗ Isihod, Abiyezer hiɗi Mahla.
Bulu: Kale jé jôé na Hamôlékét a nga biaé Ishôd, Abiézer a Mala.
Guiziga: Homoleket, sukum mongoso ngi Galaˀata, a yi Isot, Abiyezer waɗ Mala.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hammoleket, deerɗu Gile'at debbo danyi Isihoda e Abi'ezer e Mahala.
Fulfulde_DC: Hammoleket, deerɗu Gile'at debbo danyi Isihoda e Abi'ezer e Mahala.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɔlɛkɛt boko-nya Galad koo Isɛhod, Abiɛzɛr in Mala.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɔlɛkɛt boko-nya Galad koo Isɛhod, Abiɛzɛr in Mala.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma Hamolɛkɛt nya kawəzha ta meghekɛa Gala'ad ne, yɛ Ishod, Abiyɛzɛr le Mala yayake nde.
Tupurri: Ma twaçy äe Hamoleked raw biñ Ishod, Abiyeser wo de Mahla.

Francais: -Les fils de Sémida étaient: Ahin, Séchem, Léci et Aniam.
Anglais: And the sons of Shemida were, Ahian, and Shechem, and Likhi, and Aniam.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Semida kayni si Ahiyan, Sikem, Likki hiɗi Aniyam.
Bulu: Bone be Semida be mbe na: Ayan, Sikem, Likhi a Aniam.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Semidahaya i ti: Ahiyaŋ, Sekem, Liki waɗ Aniyam.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Semida boo: Ahiyan e Sikem e Likhi e Ani'am.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Semida boo: Ahiyan e Sikem e Likhi e Ani'am.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Sɛmida so nɛ́ Ahiaŋ, Sɛkɛm, Liki in Aniam.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Sɛmida so nɛ́ Ahiaŋ, Sɛkɛm, Liki in Aniam.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili nyi yake Shemiday ne, yɛ Ahiyan, Shɛkɛm, Liki le Aniyam.
Tupurri: Jar ni Semida hay wo diñ: Ahiyan, Sikem, Likhi wo de Aniyam.

Francais: Fils d'Éphraïm: Suthala; Bared, son fils; Thahath, son fils; Elada, son fils; Thahath, son fils;
Anglais: And the sons of Ephraim; Shuthelah, and Bered his son, and Tahath his son, and Eladah his son, and Tahath his son,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Efrayim: Sutelak, Bered, Tahat, Eleyada, Tahat;
Bulu: Bone bʼEfrayim: Kutela; Beréd e mone wé; Tahat e mone wé; Eléada e mone wé; Tahat e mone wé;
Guiziga: Dideˀ mijeŋŋe ngi Efrayimeye, t'ani: Efrayim a yi Sutela, Sutela kwana, a yi Beret, Beret a yi Tahat, Tahat a yi Elada, Elada a yi Tahat.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa danygol Efrayim: Efrayim danyi Sutelaha, Sutelaha danyi Beeret, Beeret danyi Tahat, Tahat danyi El'aada, El'aada danyi Tahat,
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa danygol Efrayim: Efrayim danyi Sutelaha, Sutelaha danyi Beeret, Beeret danyi Tahat, Tahat danyi El'aada, El'aada danyi Tahat,
