KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Efraim nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Sutɛla koo Bɛrɛd, Bɛrɛd koo Tahat, Tahat koo Eleada, Eleada koo Tahat,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Efraim nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Sutɛla koo Bɛrɛd, Bɛrɛd koo Tahat, Tahat koo Eleada, Eleada koo Tahat,
Kapsiki_DC: Hwelefe ta Ɛfrayim: Shəwtɛla wəzege ta Ɛfrayim, Bɛrɛd wəzege ta Shəwtɛla, Tahat wəzege ta Bɛrɛd, Ɛlada wəzege ta Tahat, Tahat wəzege ta Ɛlada,
Tupurri: Je ni Efrayim diñ Sutela, Bered diñ je Sutela, Tahad diñ je Bered, Eleyada diñ je Tahad, je Eleyada diñ Tahade.

Francais: Zabad, son fils; Suthala, son fils; Ezer et Elad, que tuèrent les hommes de Geth nés dans le pays, parce qu'ils étaient descendus pour prendre leurs troupeaux.
Anglais: And Zabad his son, and Shuthelah his son, and Ezer, and Elead, whom the men of Gath that were born in that land slew, because they came down to take away their cattle.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Zabad, Setulak, Ezer hiɗi Eleyad. Sumuna vi Gat sa vuɗi hay nagatna cisi goyo, kay nisi kali hay nagata visiya kay sli farayna visiya.
Bulu: Zabad e mone wé; Kutela e mone wé; Ezér a Eléad. Bôte ya Gat be ne bebialébialé ya si éte a nga wôé be amu be nga siliki na be mane nyoñe be mimbame biyeme miap.
Guiziga: Tahat a yi Zabat, Zabat a yi Sutela. Ziri mizile mekelem ngi Efrayimey ada, i ti: Ezer ati Elat. A titilaka ɓula ginew ngi mizli vay Gatay, amma mizli Gatay a kiɗaka taŋ vagay vagay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Tahat danyi Zabada, Zabada danyi Sutelaha. Non boo Ezer e El'aadi ɓe yimɓe Gaat danyaaɓe nder lesdi maajum mbari, ngam ɓe njahno jaɓtugo tokke maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Tahat danyi Zabada, Zabada danyi Sutelaha. Non boo Ezer e El'aadi ɓe yimɓe Gaat danyaaɓe nder lesdi maajum mbari, ngam ɓe njahno jaɓtugo tokke maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tahat koo Zabad, ɓɛɛ Zabad ko Sutɛla. O ŋma bem ko Efraim, Ɛzɛr in Elɛad zira so wen ɓara o mɔ-dai tɛ nù ko o bíí Gat, ɓɛɛ o wi nɔ‘i gbɛ wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tahat koo Zabad, ɓɛɛ Zabad ko Sutɛla. O ŋma bem ko Efraim, Ɛzɛr in Elɛad zira so wen ɓara o mɔ-dai tɛ nù ko o bíí Gat, ɓɛɛ o wi nɔ‘i gbɛ wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Zabad wəzege ta Tahat, Shəwtɛla wəzege ta Zabad. Ɛzɛr le Ɛlad kweci ŋwalea Ɛfrayim bake nyi keɗe kaŋka wəshi keseɗa ta mbeli nyi te hɛɗia Gat nda mpəmte hɛ hɛ.
Tupurri: Sabad diñ je Tahad, Sutela diñ je Sabade. Jar ni Efrayim ma lan wo diñ Eser wo de Eleyad. Jar Gad maga biñ wo äil sir ni id wo ra go, wer maga aà hay kië wo ga saara mañ horog de fuçy äaaran wo.

Francais: Éphraïm, leur père, fut longtemps dans le deuil, et ses frères vinrent pour le consoler.
Anglais: And Ephraim their father mourned many days, and his brethren came to comfort him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Efrayim busiya ti do'olla ir buur ŋolo, ɓosiyomna co'o kay teŋem iramu.
Bulu: Efrayim ésaa wop, a nga tabe ôlun été a ayap, a bobenyañ be nga zu volô nye nlem .
Guiziga: Cine taŋ Efrayime, a zik ar li tuwuy taŋ haɗi. Muy naŋhay a soko, a tikinakaŋ ɓa a taˀa tuwuyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Baaba maɓɓe Efrayim woyi ɓe nyalɗe ɗuuɗɗe, deerɗiraaɓe maako ngari de'itingo mo.
Fulfulde_DC: Baaba maɓɓe Efrayim woyi ɓe nyalɗe ɗuuɗɗe, deerɗiraaɓe maako ngari de'itingo mo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dáà kɔ-wa Efraim zima fio ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧, ɓɛɛ o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ́ɛ̀ ha̧ ga̧a̧-see ha̧ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dáà kɔ-wa Efraim zima fio ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧, ɓɛɛ o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ́ɛ̀ ha̧ ga̧a̧-see ha̧ a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Mbe nehwene yiteyɛa nci Ɛfrayim kahɛ kwele kwele, kase ka menəhɛnyɛ kagweɗakwe nda wənə.
Tupurri: Efrayim pan äaara joñ naw pur debañ nen lawge, heçeçre äen raw wo woge teñ nen äe.

Francais: Et il alla vers sa femme, et elle conçut et enfanta un fils; il l'appela du nom de Béria, parce qu'on était dans le malheur en sa maison.
Anglais: And when he went in to his wife, she conceived, and bare a son, and he called his name Beriah, because it went evil with his house.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugol kayni nam bur tam cata valamu, na' vi haya, na' vuɗ goor kep; nam tunum selem ala Beriya, kay mige hay ziyna va' kayni na' musi hay yorta.
Bulu: Ane a nga jôʼôbô nga, nye ve nyoñ abum a biaé monafam; a nga yôlé nye jôé na Beria, amu a nga bili minjuk e nda jé été.
Guiziga: Efrayim a sinam vu ati ngwas naŋ ma, a yaŋ mangal mizile, a zila Beriya, asi hay naŋ a ro ti hiryi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden o hawti bee debbo maako, kaŋko o reedi, o danyi ɓiɗɗo gorko. Efrayim inndi mo Beri'a ngam sarru ɗon haa saare maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden o hawti bee debbo maako, kaŋko o reedi, o danyi ɓiɗɗo gorko. Efrayim inndi mo Beri'a ngam sarru ɗon haa saare maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ ɗoŋ, Efraim duka in kóò kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ kóò‘i ba zaŋ, kó nɛ̀ ŋma bem n'aa saa nin-a nɛ́ Bɛria,  wen kóò‘i duka so katɛ a̧ ŋgimbi bɔnɛ kɔ̧-a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ ɗoŋ, Efraim duka in kóò kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ kóò‘i ba zaŋ, kó nɛ̀ ŋma bem n'aa saa nin-a nɛ́ Bɛria,  wen kóò‘i duka so katɛ a̧ ŋgimbi bɔnɛ kɔ̧-a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Temə kadzeghə, cape ŋkɛ kaɓelahe le male ta ŋkɛ. Pa dzawa hwə nda kayake wəzege teza. Pa ŋkɛ ndeke nda sləa Beriya, va nya nzahwe nza nde mbe ndiremi nya kemenete geva ki ghɛa za nta.
Tupurri: Blam sen se raw woge see waçy äe, se raw mañ äiili, kal biñ weele. Efrayim kal kañ ëu ne hen ga Beriya wer maga ree hay caa waçyn liñ ni se ni debañ.

Francais: Sa fille était Sara, qui bâtit Bethoron le Bas et Bethoron le Haut, et Ozen-Sara. Rapha, son fils, et Réseph;
Anglais: (And his daughter was Sherah, who built Beth–horon the nether, and the upper, and Uzzen–sheerah.)
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Goota ta nam vuɗa'ta ya' Seera, na' in Bet-Horon ta gaa be'ɗta, hiɗi Bet-Horon ta kulo ɗiŋiriŋga, hiɗi Uzzen-Seera.
Bulu: A nga biaé monaminga jôé na Kééra nye a nga lôñe Bétôroñ ya nké a Bétôroñ ya akôé, a Uzén-Kééra.
Guiziga: Efrayim a yi zuŋ mongoso le pal, a zilaka Sera. Mindira walahay Bet-Horoŋ vay mukutuk ati Bet-Horoŋ vay miɗigar waɗ Uzen-Sera na, i Sera vuna.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O woodi boo ɓiɗɗo debbo. Innde maako Se'era mo nyiɓi Baytihurun-les e Baytihurun-dow e Uzzen-Se'era.
Fulfulde_DC: O woodi boo ɓiɗɗo debbo. Innde maako Se'era mo nyiɓi Baytihurun-les e Baytihurun-dow e Uzzen-Se'era.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Efraim koo so ŋma boko-bem nɛ̀ nin-a so'e Sɛra; nɛ́ boko-bem’ɛi a̧ dee ye Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ mɛ ŋgɔn in Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ mɛ ɗɔɔ bá nɛ̀ Uzɛn-Sɛra.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Efraim koo so ŋma boko-bem nɛ̀ nin-a so'e Sɛra; nɛ́ boko-bem’ɛi a̧ dee ye Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ mɛ ŋgɔn in Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ mɛ ɗɔɔ bá nɛ̀ Uzɛn-Sɛra.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Ɛfrayim ŋ'wete wəzha makwa, Shɛra, nya keŋate meleme ta Bɛt-Horon nya kwa zeweve ta ŋkwa le nya pelɛghə ba'a ŋa Əwzɛn-Shɛra.
Tupurri: May maga Efrayim biñn diñ Seera maga laa Bet-Horon ma ciñn wo de Bet-Horon ma gesiñn wo de Usen-Seera mono.

Francais: Thalé, son fils; Taan, son fils;
Anglais: And Rephah was his son, also Resheph, and Telah his son, and Tahan his son,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Refak, Resef; Telak; Tahan.
Bulu: Refa, e mone wé, a Réséf; Téta e mone wé; Tahan e mone wé;
Guiziga: Dideˀ mijeŋŋe ngi Beriyahaya t'ani: Beriya a yi Refa, Refa a yi Resef, Resef a yi Tela, Tela a yi ti haŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Beri'a danyi Refaha, Refaha danyi Resef, Resef danyi Telaha, Telaha danyi Tahan,
Fulfulde_DC: Beri'a danyi Refaha, Refaha danyi Resef, Resef danyi Telaha, Telaha danyi Tahan,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Bɛria nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Rɛfa koo Rɛsɛf, Rɛsɛf koo Tɛla, Tɛla koo Tahaŋ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Bɛria nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Rɛfa koo Rɛsɛf, Rɛsɛf koo Tɛla, Tɛla koo Tahaŋ,
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili nyi yake Beriya: Rɛfa wəzege ta Beriya, Rɛshɛf wəzege ta Rɛfa, Tɛla, wəzege ta Rɛshɛf, Tahan wəzege ta Tɛla,
Tupurri: Efrayim biñ pa diñ Refa weel äen wo de Resefe. Je Refa diñ Tela, je Tela diñ Tahan,

Francais: Laadan, son fils; Ammiud, son fils; Elisama, son fils;
Anglais: Laadan his son, Ammihud his son, Elishama his son,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Layedan, Amihud, Elisama;
Bulu: Laédan e mone wé; Amihud e mone wé; Elisama e mone wé;
Guiziga: ti haŋ a yi Ladaŋ, Ladaŋ a yi Amihuɗ, Amihuɗ a yi Elisama,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Tahan danyi La'adan, La'adan danyi Ammihudu, Ammihudu danyi Eliisama,
Fulfulde_DC: Tahan danyi La'adan, La'adan danyi Ammihudu, Ammihudu danyi Eliisama,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tahaŋ koo Ladaŋ, Ladaŋ koo Amihud, Amihud koo Elisama,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tahaŋ koo Ladaŋ, Ladaŋ koo Amihud, Amihud koo Elisama,
Kapsiki_DC: Ladan wəzege ta Tahan, Amihəwd wəzege ta Ladan, Ɛlishama wəzege ta Amihəwd,
Tupurri: je Tahan diñ Laedan, je Laedan diñ Amihud, je Amihud diñ Elisama,

Francais: Nun, son fils; Josué, son fils.
Anglais: Non his son, Jehoshua his son.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Non, Yosuwa, kayni si gurona valamu.
Bulu: Nôn e mone wé; Yasua e mone wé.
Guiziga: Elisama a yi Nun, Nun a yi Zozuwe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Eliisama danyi Nuuna, Nuuna danyi Yosuwa.
Fulfulde_DC: Eliisama danyi Nuuna, Nuuna danyi Yosuwa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Elisama koo Nun, Nun koo Josue.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Elisama koo Nun, Nun koo Josue.
Kapsiki_DC: Nəwn wəzege ta Ɛlishama, Zhozəwɛ wəzege ta Nəwn.
Tupurri: je Elisama diñ Non, je Non diñ Josuwe.

Francais: -Leurs possessions et leurs habitations étaient: Béthel et les villes de sa dépendance; à l'orient, Noran; à l'occident, Gézer et les villes de sa dépendance, Sichem et les villes de sa dépendance, jusqu'à Aza et aux villes de sa dépendance.
Anglais: And their possessions and habitations were, Beth–el and the towns thereof, and eastward Naaran, and westward Gezer, with the towns thereof; Shechem also and the towns thereof, unto Gaza and the towns thereof:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Liyna visi ma lakŋa kayni Betel hiɗi nagana ma kuɗa'na, gal kuɗuwu Naaran; gal vulatiya, Gezer hiɗi naga ma kuɗa'na, Sikem hiɗi naga ma kuɗa'na, ta-ta hay Gaza hiɗi naga ma kuɗa'na.
Bulu: Bétél a minlame mié bi mbe ngabe jap a be nga bili Gézér a minlame mié mfaʼa jôp da dim.
Guiziga: Hirwuy muvulaka da Efrayimey mipam ara na, i Betel jom ti prok naŋhaya, tisi pas ngi miprike, i Naha raŋ, tisi pas ngi pastaˀa, i Gezer, jom ti prok naŋhaya, waɗ Sikem hã sesẽŋ a Aya, jom ti prok taŋhaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe njooɗi haa berniwol Baytila bee gure maagol e Na'ara haa fuunaaŋge Gezer bee gure maagol haa hiirnaaŋge e Sikem bee gure maagol, haa yotti Ayya bee gure maagol. Ɗum laati maral maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe njooɗi haa berniwol Baytila bee gure maagol e Na'ara haa fuunaaŋge Gezer bee gure maagol haa hiirnaaŋge e Sikem bee gure maagol, haa yotti Ayya bee gure maagol. Ɗum laati maral maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O nù kɔ-wa in o fara-duk kɔ-wa so nɛ́ Bɛtɛl in o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ a̧. Ye Naraŋ nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese, in Gezɛr nɛ̀ war yee-wese gú nɛ̀ o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ a̧, bá nɛ̀ Sikɛm in o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ a̧ hɔ Aia gú nɛ̀ o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ a̧ mbɛt so nɛ́ kɔ-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O nù kɔ-wa in o fara-duk kɔ-wa so nɛ́ Bɛtɛl in o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ a̧. Ye Naraŋ nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese, in Gezɛr nɛ̀ war yee-wese gú nɛ̀ o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ a̧, bá nɛ̀ Sikɛm in o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ a̧ hɔ Aia gú nɛ̀ o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ a̧ mbɛt so nɛ́ kɔ-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma hɛɗi nyi kemave hɛ kezha nza te ne, yɛ: Bɛtɛl le kweci meleme nyi dzeyi yite, pa Na'ara laka ŋkwa kesame ta veci, pa yɛ Gɛzɛr le kweci meleme nyi yite laka ŋkwa kepəkwə ta veci ba'a Sishɛm le meleme nyi dzeyi yite pa vare Aya le meleme nyi dzeyi yite.
Tupurri: Tway äaara wo de ngeel lagge äaara hay diñ Betel de progre äen wo. Go nen nen wur botoñ diñ Naaran, go nen nen wur bolaw diñ Geser de progre äen wo, Sisem de progre äen wo, haçaç le' wo go Gasa de progre äen wo.

Francais: Entre les mains des fils de Manassé étaient encore Bethsan et les villes de sa dépendance, Thanach et les villes de sa dépendance, Mageddo et les villes de sa dépendance, Dor et les villes de sa dépendance. Ce fut dans ces villes qu'habitèrent les fils de joseph, fils d'Israël.
Anglais: And by the borders of the children of Manasseh, Beth–shean and her towns, Taanach and her towns, Megiddo and her towns, Dor and her towns. In these dwelt the children of Joseph the son of Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Manase lakay hay Bet-Seyan hiɗi naga ma kuɗa'na, Taanak hiɗi naga ma kuɗa'na, Megiddo hiɗi naga ma kuɗa'na, Dor hiɗi naga ma kuɗa'na. Gurona vi Yosef (goora vi Israyel) lak ziy kayni hay naga namna lakŋi.
Bulu: Bone be Manasé be nga bili Bétsean a minlame mié; Megidô a minlame mié, Dor a minlame mié. E nne bone be Yôsep, e mone Israél, be nga too bitison bite.
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Manaseheye, walahay nga taŋhaya, i Bet-Seyaŋ jom ti prok naŋhaya, Taˀanak jom ti prok naŋhaya, Migido jom ti prok naŋhaya, Dor jom ti prok naŋhaya. Mipam ar walahay tayna i dideˀ ngi Zozefey, mangal ngi Zakop.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa ɓiɓɓe Manassa mari Bayti-Se'an bee gure maagol e Ta'enak bee gure maagol e Megiddo bee gure maagol e Door bee gure maagol. Nder maaji fuu danygol Yusufu ɓii Isra'iila njooɗi.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa ɓiɓɓe Manassa mari Bayti-Se'an bee gure maagol e Ta'enak bee gure maagol e Megiddo bee gure maagol e Door bee gure maagol. Nder maaji fuu danygol Yusufu ɓii Isra'iila njooɗi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: War ko o bezaŋ Manase nɛ́ Bɛt-Seaŋ, Tanak, Mɛgido, in Dɔr gú nɛ̀ o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ wa. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn tɛ o ye nɔ‘i a̧ o bezaŋ Jozɛf, bem ko  Israɛl  ɔɔ so sɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: War ko o bezaŋ Manase nɛ́ Bɛt-Seaŋ, Tanak, Mɛgido, in Dɔr gú nɛ̀ o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ wa. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn tɛ o ye nɔ‘i a̧ o bezaŋ Jozɛf, bem ko  Israɛl  ɔɔ so sɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ŋwalea Manasɛ le ŋa nci, yɛ Bɛt-Shɛyan, Ta'anak, Mɛgido ba'a Dor le meleme nyi dzeyi yitea hɛ ŋa nci hɛɗi. Tsagha se meleme nyi se hwelefe ta Zhozɛf, wəzege ta Zhakob kanza mbe.
Tupurri: Tway jar ni Manase hay diñ Bet-Seyan de progre äen wo, Taanag de progre äen wo, Megido de progre äen wo, Dor de progre äen wo. Jar ni Josef je ni Israyeln hay wo de laa tiñ na äi leege sen wo so.

Francais: Fils d'Aser: Jemma, Jésua, Jessui, Baria, et Sara, leur soeur.
Anglais: The sons of Asher; Imnah, and Ishuah, and Ishvi, and Beriah, and Serah their sister.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Aser: Yimna, Yikwa, Yikvi hiɗi Beriya; hiɗi ɓasusita Sara.
Bulu: Bone bʼAzér: Yimna, Yisva, Yisvi a Beria; a kale jap Sara.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Aserey i ti: Imna, Iseva, Isevi waɗ Beriya. Sukum taŋ mongoso a zilaka Sera.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Aser ngoni: Yimna e Yisuwa e Yisuwi e Beri'a e Seraha, deerɗiraawo maɓɓe debbo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Aser ngoni: Yimna e Yisuwa e Yisuwi e Beri'a e Seraha, deerɗiraawo maɓɓe debbo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Asɛr nɛ́ Yimna, Yiswa, Yiswi, Bɛria, in boko-nya-wa Sɛra.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Asɛr nɛ́ Yimna, Yiswa, Yiswi, Bɛria, in boko-nya-wa Sɛra.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Asɛr: Imna, Isheva, Ishevi ba'a Beriya. Sɛra sləa wəzha ta megheyɛa nci.
Tupurri: Jar ni Aser wo diñ: Yimna, Yisfa, Yisfi wo de Beriya. Ma twaçy äaara diñ Sera.

Francais: - Fils de Baria: Héber et Melchiel, qui fut père de Barsaïth.
Anglais: And the sons of Beriah; Heber, and Malchiel, who is the father of Birzavith.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Beriya: Heber hiɗi Malkiyel. Malkiyel kayni mi bum Birzavit.
Bulu: Bone be Beria: Héber a Malkiel. Malkiel a ne ésaa Birzavit.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Beriyahay i ti: Heber ati Malkiyel. Mipa hirwuy Birzayit i Malkiyel vuna.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Beri'a boo: Heber e Malkiyel, baaba Birzawit.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Beri'a boo: Heber e Malkiyel, baaba Birzawit.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Bɛria nɛ́ Hɛbɛr in Malkiɛl nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ dáà ko Birzait.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Bɛria nɛ́ Hɛbɛr in Malkiɛl nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ dáà ko Birzait.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Beriya: yɛ Ɛbɛr le Malkiyɛl. Malkiyɛl ya kayitenyɛa ka Birzayit.
Tupurri: Jar ni Beriya wo diñ Heber wo de Malkiyel pan Birsafid.

Francais: Héber engendra Jéphlat, Somer, Hotham, et Suaa, leur soeur.
Anglais: And Heber begat Japhlet, and Shomer, and Hotham, and Shua their sister.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Heber vuɗ Yaflet hiɗi Somer, Hotam hiɗi ɓasusita Suwa.
Bulu: Héber a nga biaé Yaflét, Kômer Hôtam a kale jap Kua.
Guiziga: Heber a yi Yaflet, Semer, Hotam waɗ Suwa sukum taŋ mongoso.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Heber danyi Yaflet e Somer e Hotam e Su'a, deerɗiraawo maɓɓe debbo.
Fulfulde_DC: Heber danyi Yaflet e Somer e Hotam e Su'a, deerɗiraawo maɓɓe debbo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hɛbɛr koo Yaflɛt, Sɔmɛr, Hɔtam in boko-nya-wa Sua.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hɛbɛr koo Yaflɛt, Sɔmɛr, Hɔtam in boko-nya-wa Sua.
Kapsiki_DC: Ɛbɛr yitenyɛa yɛ Yaflɛt, Shɛmɛr le Hotam, pa wəzha ta megheyɛa nci Shəwa.
Tupurri: Heber raw biñ Yafled, Somer, Hotam wo de ma twaçy äaara Suwa.

Francais: - Fils de Jéphlat: Phosech, Chamaal et Asoth: ce sont là les fils de Jéphlat. -
Anglais: And the sons of Japhlet; Pasach, and Bimhal, and Ashvath. These are the children of Japhlet.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Yaflet: Pasak, Bimhal hiɗi Akwat. Nisi kayni si gurona vi Yaflet.
Bulu: Bone be Yaflét: Pasak, Bimhal a Akvat. Bone be Yaflét mbe le.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Yafletey i ti: Pasak, Bimal waɗ Asevat.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Yaflet boo: Pasak e Bimahal e Asuwat, kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Yaflet.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Yaflet boo: Pasak e Bimahal e Asuwat, kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Yaflet.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Yɛflɛt nɛ́ Pasak, Bimal in Aswat. O bem ko Yaflɛt nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Yɛflɛt nɛ́ Pasak, Bimal in Aswat. O bem ko Yaflɛt nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili nyi yake Yaflɛt, yɛ Pasak, Bimal le Asevat.
Tupurri: Jar ni Yafled wo diñ: Pasag, Bimhal wo de Asfade, mo na diñ jar ni Yafled wo.

Francais: Fils de Somer: Ahi, Roaga, Haba et Aram.
Anglais: And the sons of Shamer; Ahi, and Rohgah, Jehubbah, and Aram.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Semer: Ahi, Rohega, Hubba hiɗi Aram.
Bulu: Bone be Semer: Ahi, Rôhéga, Huba a Aram.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Semerey i ti: Ahi, Roga, Huba waɗ A ram.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Somer boo: Ahi e Rohaga e Huba e Siriya.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Somer boo: Ahi e Rohaga e Huba e Siriya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Sɛmɛr nɛ́ Ahi,  Rɔga, Yɛhuba in Aram.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Sɛmɛr nɛ́ Ahi,  Rɔga, Yɛhuba in Aram.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili nyi yake Shɛmɛr: Ahi, Roga, Həwba le Aram.
Tupurri: Jar ni Semer wo diñ: Ahi, Rohega, Huba wo de Aram.

Francais: - Fils de Hélem, son frère: Supha, Jemna, Sellès et Amal.
Anglais: And the sons of his brother Helem; Zophah, and Imna, and Shelesh, and Amal.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi ɓasulumna Helem: Sofat, Yimna, Selek hiɗi Amal.
Bulu: Bone be Hélém, monyañe wé: Sôfa, Yima, Selek a Amal.
Guiziga: Sukum naŋ Hotama, ziri mizile naŋhay i ti: Sofa, Imna, Selek waɗ Amal
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Helem, deerɗiraawo Somer ngoni: Sofaha e Yimna e Seles e Amal.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Helem, deerɗiraawo Somer ngoni: Sofaha e Yimna e Seles e Amal.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Hɛlɛm  nya Sɔmɛr nɛ́ Sɔfa, Yimna, Sɛlɛs in Amal.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Hɛlɛm  nya Sɔmɛr nɛ́ Sɔfa, Yimna, Sɛlɛs in Amal.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili nyi yake Hotam, nya kawəza meghekɛ: Səwfa, Imna, Shɛlɛsh le Amal.
Tupurri: Jar ni hen äe Helem wo diñ: Sofa, Yimna, Seles wo de Amal.

Francais: - Fils de Supha: Sué, Harnapher, Sual, Béri, Jamra,
Anglais: The sons of Zophah; Suah, and Harnepher, and Shual, and Beri, and Imrah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Sofat: Suwa, Harnefer, Suwal, Beri, Yimra,
Bulu: Bone be Sôfa: Sua, Harnéfer, Kual, Béri, Yimra,
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Sofahay i ti: Suwa, Harnefer, Suwal, Beri, Imra,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Sofaha boo: Suuha e Harnefer e Su'al e Beeri e Yimra
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Sofaha boo: Suuha e Harnefer e Su'al e Beeri e Yimra
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Sɔfa nɛ́ Sua, Harnɛfɛr, Sual, Bɛri, Yimra,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Sɔfa nɛ́ Sua, Harnɛfɛr, Sual, Bɛri, Yimra,
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale nyi yake Səwfa: Səwa, Harnɛfɛr, Shəwal, Bɛri, Imra,
Tupurri: Jar ni Sofa wo diñ: Suwa, Harnefer, Suwal, Beri, Yimra,

Francais: Bosor, Hod, Samma, Salusa, Jéthran et Béra.
Anglais: Bezer, and Hod, and Shamma, and Shilshah, and Ithran, and Beera.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Betser, Hod, Samma, Silka, Yitran, hiɗi Beera.
Bulu: Betser, Hok, Sama, Silka, Yitrañ a Beéra.
Guiziga: Beser, Hot, Sama, Silesa, Itraŋ waɗ Beˀera.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Beser e Hoodi e Samma e Silsa e Yitiran e Beera.
Fulfulde_DC: e Beser e Hoodi e Samma e Silsa e Yitiran e Beera.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bɛsɛr, Hɔd, Sama, Silsa, Yitraŋ in Bɛra.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bɛsɛr, Hɔd, Sama, Silsa, Yitraŋ in Bɛra.
Kapsiki_DC: Bɛsɛr, Hod, Shama, Shilesha, Itran ba'a Beyɛra.
Tupurri: Betser, Hod, Sama, Silsa, Yitran wo de Beera.

Francais: - Fils de Jéther: Jéphoné, Phaspha et Ara.
Anglais: And the sons of Jether; Jephunneh, and Pispah, and Ara.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Yeter: Yefune, Pispa hiɗi Ara.
Bulu: Bone be Yéter: Yefuné, Pispa a Ara.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Itraŋhay i ti: Yefune, Pisepa waɗ Era.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Yeter boo: Yefunna e Pispa e Ara.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Yeter boo: Yefunna e Pispa e Ara.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Yɛtɛr nɛ́ Yefunɛ, Pispa in Ara.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Yɛtɛr nɛ́ Yefunɛ, Pispa in Ara.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili nyi yake Itran: Yefəwnɛ, Pishepa ba'a Ɛra.
Tupurri: Jar ni Yeter wo diñ: Yefune, Pispa wo de Ara.

Francais: - Fils d'Olla: Arée, Haniel et Résia.
Anglais: And the sons of Ulla; Arah, and Haniel, and Rezia.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Ulla: Arah, Hanniyel hiɗi Ritsiya.
Bulu: Bone be Ula: Ara, Haniél a Ritsia.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Ulahay i ti: Ara, Haniyel waɗ Siriya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Ulla boo: Araha e Hanniyel e Risiya.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Ulla boo: Araha e Hanniyel e Risiya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Ula nɛ́ Ara, Haniɛl in Risia.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Ula nɛ́ Ara, Haniɛl in Risia.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili nyi yake Əwla: Ara, Haniyɛl le Risiya.
Tupurri: Jar ni Ula wo diñ Arah, Haniyel wo de Ritsiya.

Francais: - Tous ceux-là étaient fils d'Aser, chefs de maisons patriarcales, hommes d'élite et vaillants, chefs des princes, inscrits au nombre de vingt-six mille hommes en état d'aller en armes à la guerre.
Anglais: All these were the children of Asher, heads of their father's house, choice and mighty men of valour, chief of the princes. And the number throughout the genealogy of them that were apt to the war and to battle was twenty and six thousand men.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kaf kayni si gurona vi Aser, sa ŋulona vi jafna visiya, sum sa tuni vok sumuna sa jufayna, sa ŋulona vi yerimana, sesi ɗoy gaa'a, tuwsi koti kay li duura, nisi noŋ pet sumun birim dok-ma' yam karkiya.
Bulu: Balé bete bese be mbe bone bʼAzér, bivete ya menda me bôte map, biwôlô bi bôt asu mewosan bivete ya bejô bôt, be too nlañan be bili fe mengaa asu mewosan bôte tañe toyini mewôm mebaé a ésaman.
Guiziga: Mizli tayna gar i dideˀ ngi Aserey, i buy mezle ngi hayay a wuzla muy taŋhaya. I mizli mupuɗaway, miwirwirey, a sinaka jigina mizli le. Slaf slaf mizli taŋhay micam soje ngi gi vurumo na, a ndilaka durmuk kukur cuw nga merkeɗe le.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe fuu ɓe ɓiɓɓe Aser, baaba-ci'e'en suɓaaɓe, ardiiɓe mawɓe, honooɓe semmbiɗɓe. Limgal winndaaɓe maɓɓe nder jama'aare konu waɗi ujine noogas e njoweego (26.000).
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe fuu ɓe ɓiɓɓe Aser, baaba-ci'e'en suɓaaɓe, ardiiɓe mawɓe, honooɓe semmbiɗɓe. Limgal winndaaɓe maɓɓe nder jama'aare konu waɗi ujine noogas e njoweego (26.000).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ yaa so nɛ́ o bezaŋ Asɛr, o gasawi nutua, o ŋgaŋa wi-biro, o gasawi ko o be-wan, ɓɛɛ o bezaŋ-wa nɛ̀ wa tɔra lɛŋ mgbara o gii wi-biro nɛ́ booro-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ yaa so nɛ́ o bezaŋ Asɛr, o gasawi nutua, o ŋgaŋa wi-biro, o gasawi ko o be-wan, ɓɛɛ o bezaŋ-wa nɛ̀ wa tɔra lɛŋ mgbara o gii wi-biro nɛ́ booro-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe pɛtɛa mbelia shɛhɛ kenza kahwelefefi nyi kesawa mbe Asɛr. Nahe hɛ kese kambeli ganji nyi te ghəa yɛ pelə, kaka katsala kɛfi nyi nza zləvə te hɛ ba'a kambeli nyi te ghəa nyi nza ntsə te hɛ. Ma keɓelate mbelia nci nyi wərə dzemte mpa mbeli ne, wərə mbeli kakemave ka sewajɛ 26.000.
Tupurri: Jar sen wo mo äuy hay wo diñ jar ni Aser wo, diñ wañre ma ti feele äaaran wo, werpiiri ma de do ma de eegre wo. Wañre ma pel kaçaçra maga aè kee ra go day wo go de gragge ma durgi wo äuy ndar do äog ti hiira'a.

Francais: Benjamin engendra Béla, son premier-né, Asbel le second, Ahara le troisième,
Anglais: Now Benjamin begat Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Benyamin vuɗ Bela goora valam ma jewna, Akbel ma ma'na, Akarab ma ɦidina,
Bulu: Bényamin a nga biaé Béla, ntôle mone wé, nyô baa a mbe Akbél, nyô lale a mbe Ara,
Guiziga: Benjameŋ a yi ziri mizileheye zlum: modogom naŋ i Bela, aseˀe i Asebel, Ara,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Benyamin danyi Bela, afo maako, Asbeel ɗiɗaɓo, Aharaha tataɓo,
Fulfulde_DC: Benyamin danyi Bela, afo maako, Asbeel ɗiɗaɓo, Aharaha tataɓo,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bɛnjamin koo bem mɔɔrɔ: Bɛla nɛ́ kaya-a, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Asbɛl, taar-a nɛ́ Ara,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bɛnjamin koo bem mɔɔrɔ: Bɛla nɛ́ kaya-a, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Asbɛl, taar-a nɛ́ Ara,
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili mcɛfe yake Bɛnjamɛn. Wa nyi sləa nci nyi kekwele kekwele: Bɛla, Ashebɛl, Ara,
Tupurri: Benjame biñ Bela, jag weel äe no, Asbel ma de äog no, Ahra ma de swa' no,

Francais: Nohaa, le quatrième et Rapha le cinquième.
Anglais: Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Noha ma fiɗina, Rafa ma vaslna.
Bulu: Nyô nyini a mbe Nôha, nyô tane a mbe Rafa.
Guiziga: Noha waɗ Rafa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Noha nayaɓo e Rafa njowaɓo.
Fulfulde_DC: Noha nayaɓo e Rafa njowaɓo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: naar-a nɛ́ Nɔha, ɓɛɛ mɔɔrɔ-a nɛ́ Rafa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: naar-a nɛ́ Nɔha, ɓɛɛ mɔɔrɔ-a nɛ́ Rafa.
Kapsiki_DC: Noha le Rafa.
Tupurri: Noha ma de naa no, Rafa ma de de dwee no.

Francais: - Les fils de Béla furent: Addar, Géra, Abiud,
Anglais: And the sons of Bela were, Addar, and Gera, and Abihud,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Bela kayni: Addar, Ger, Abihud.
Bulu: Bone be Béla be mbe môé na: Adar, Géra, Abihud,
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Belahay i ti: Adar, Gera cine ngi Abihut,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Bela boo woodi ɓiɓɓe: Addar e Geera e Abihuda
Fulfulde_DC: Bela boo woodi ɓiɓɓe: Addar e Geera e Abihuda
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bɛla koo Adar, Gɛra, dáà ko Ehud,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bɛla koo Adar, Gɛra, dáà ko Ehud,
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili nyi yake Bɛla, yɛ Adar, Gɛra, Abihəwd,
Tupurri: Jar ni Bela wo diñ: Adar, Gera, Abihud,

Francais: Abisué, Naaman, Ahoé,
Anglais: And Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Abisuwa, Naaman, Ahoha,
Bulu: Abikua, Naaman, Ahôa,
Guiziga: Abisuwa, Naˀaman, Ahoˀa,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Abisu'a e Na'aman e Ahoha
Fulfulde_DC: e Abisu'a e Na'aman e Ahoha
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Abisua, Namaŋ, Ahɔa,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Abisua, Namaŋ, Ahɔa,
Kapsiki_DC: Abishəwa, Na'aman, Ahowa,
Tupurri: Abisuwa, Naama, Ahowa,

Francais: Géra, Séphuphan, et Huram.
Anglais: And Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gera, Sefufan hiɗi Huram.
Bulu: Géra, Sefufan a Uram.
Guiziga: Gera, Sefufaŋ waɗ Huram.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Geera e Sefufan e Huuram.
Fulfulde_DC: e Geera e Sefufan e Huuram.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gɛra, Sɛfufan in Huram.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gɛra, Sɛfufan in Huram.
Kapsiki_DC: Gɛra, Shefəwfan le Həwram.
Tupurri: Gera, Sefufan wo de Huram.

Francais: Voici les fils d'Ahod: - ils étaient chefs des familles qui habitaient Gabaa, et ils les déportèrent à Manahath –
Anglais: And these are the sons of Ehud: these are the heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Geba, and they removed them to Manahath:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si gurona vi Ehud, nisi ay si sa ŋulona vi jafna jar sum sa hay Geba;
Bulu: E bone bʼEhud be mbe bivete ya menda me bôte ya bôte be nga too e Géba,
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Ehutoyo i taŋ micifam buy ngi hayay a wuzla mizli mipam a Gebahaya, a dirba nah a slikiɗam ti mizli Gebahaya nga Manahat, i ti:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa ɓiɓɓe Ehuudi baaba-ci'e'en caka jooɗiiɓe haa Geba, dahaaɓe haa Manahat:
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa ɓiɓɓe Ehuudi baaba-ci'e'en caka jooɗiiɓe haa Geba, dahaaɓe haa Manahat:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwalea Ɛlihəwd nyi kaka meghe mbe yita ta ka Gɛba, ama nyi keŋkaghe hɛ kadzembe Manahat. Wa nyi sləa nci nyi:
Tupurri: Mokay diñ ëu jar ni Ehud maga wo diñ wañre ma ti feele wo yoo jar Geba wo,

Francais: Naaman, Achia et Géra; c'est lui qui les déporta, et il engendra Oza et Ahiud.
Anglais: And Naaman, and Ahiah, and Gera, he removed them, and begat Uzza, and Ahihud.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nam joksi goy hay Manahat: Naaman, Ahiya hiɗi Gera. Joksi goy kayn mi nam Gera. Nam vuɗ Uzza hiɗi Ahihud.
Bulu: a mbe be nga kee be mekaban e Manahat mbe ba: Naaman, Ahiya a Géra. Géra nye a nga kee be mekaban, nye fe a nga biaé Uza a Abihud.
Guiziga: Naˀaman, Ahiya waɗ Gera. Mislikiɗ taŋ nga Manahat vuna, i Gera cine ngi Uza ati Ahihut.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Na'aman e Ahiya e Geera, kaŋko dahi ɓe. O danyi Uzza e Ahihuda.
Fulfulde_DC: Na'aman e Ahiya e Geera, kaŋko dahi ɓe. O danyi Uzza e Ahihuda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: Na'aman, Ahiya le Gɛra. Gɛra nya kayitenyɛa yɛ Əwza le Ahihəwd nde ŋkaghe hɛ.
Tupurri: day aè ur de äaara wo go Manahad mono: Naama, Ahiya wo de Gera, hoo ra wo go ni diñ Gera. Gera raw biñ Usa wo de Ahihud.

Francais: Saharaïm eut des enfants au pays de Moab, après qu'il eut renvoyé ses femmes Husim et Bara.
Anglais: And Shaharaim begat children in the country of Moab, after he had sent them away; Hushim and Baara were his wives.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Saharayim vuɗ guro'o hay nagata Mowab, bugol nam digiɗ boyna valamu Husim hiɗi Baara goy digiɗna.
Bulu: Kaharayim a nga biaé bon e mefane ya Môab éyoñe te a maneya suu e binga bé bebaé Usim a Baara.
Guiziga: Sarayim muɓula ngwas naŋhay mucuw, Husim ati Baˀara na, a dirba nah a yi ziri mizilehey le a Moˀapa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saharayim danyi ɓiɓɓe haa lesdi Mo'ab, ɓaawo o riiwi rewɓe maako Husim e Ba'ara.
Fulfulde_DC: Saharayim danyi ɓiɓɓe haa lesdi Mo'ab, ɓaawo o riiwi rewɓe maako Husim e Ba'ara.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ sɛn nú Mɔab a̧ Saharaim koo nɛ̀ o bem ɗoŋ n'aa ndaka nɛ̀ o kóò kɔ̧-a̧ yiitoo, Husim in Bara yaknɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ sɛn nú Mɔab a̧ Saharaim koo nɛ̀ o bem ɗoŋ n'aa ndaka nɛ̀ o kóò kɔ̧-a̧ yiitoo, Husim in Bara yaknɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Sha'arayim yake ŋwale tezhili te hɛɗia Mowab, kwetere wəmbəa ŋkɛ, pa ŋkamte mia ŋkɛ: yɛ Həwshim le Ba'ara.
Tupurri: Saharayim raw biñ weere wo ti prog ma Mowabn blam maga se bus naare äe Husim wo de Baara wo go mono.

Francais: Il eut de Hodès, sa femme: Jobab, Sébia, Mosa, Molchom, Jéhus, Séchia et Marma;
Anglais: And he begat of Hodesh his wife, Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malcham,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si guro sa nam vuɗsi hiɗi cata valam Hodes: Yobab, Sibiya, Maka, Malkam, Yewus, Sakiya hiɗi Mirma.
Bulu: Ba minga wé Odék be nga biaé: Yôbab, Tibia, Maka, Malkam, Yeut, Sakia a Mirma.
Guiziga: A zuɓ ngwas mekelem, a zilaka Hodek, Hodek a yaŋ Yobap, Sibiya, Mesa, Malkam,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hodes, debbo maako danyani mo Yobaba e Cibiya e Meesa e Malkam
Fulfulde_DC: Hodes, debbo maako danyani mo Yobaba e Cibiya e Meesa e Malkam
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem n'aa koo in mbe kóò kɔ̧-a̧ Hɔdɛs nɛ́ Yobab, Sibia, Mɛsa, Malkam,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem n'aa koo in mbe kóò kɔ̧-a̧ Hɔdɛs nɛ́ Yobab, Sibia, Mɛsa, Malkam,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa wəmeve kwete male kwetere wəmbəa ŋkɛ, Hodɛsh sləa nta. Pa yake ŋwale sawa hwə: Yobab, Sibiya, Mɛsha, Malkam,
Tupurri: Se raw biñgi de waçy äe Hodes diñ: Yobab, Sibiya, Masa, Malkam, Yewus, Sakiya wo de Mirma.

Francais: ce sont là ses fils, chefs de familles.
Anglais: And Jeuz, and Shachia, and Mirma. These were his sons, heads of the fathers.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kayni si gurona valamu, nisi si sa ŋulona vi jafna.
Bulu: Bone bé mbe le, bivete ya menda me bôt.
Guiziga: Yewus, Sakiya waɗ Mirma. Ziri naŋ mizile tayna, a cifam buy ngahayay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Ye'us e Sakiya e Mirma. Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe maako, baaba-ci'e'en.
Fulfulde_DC: e Ye'us e Sakiya e Mirma. Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe maako, baaba-ci'e'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yɛus, Sakia in Mirma. O bem kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ yaa nɛ́ o gasawi nutua nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yɛus, Sakia in Mirma. O bem kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ yaa nɛ́ o gasawi nutua nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Yɛyəwsh, Sakiya le Mirma. Pa ŋwalea ŋkɛa shɛhɛ zhɛrenji kaka sleke ŋkwa mbe hwelefe.
Tupurri: Mo na diñ weere äe maga wo diñ wañre ma ti feelen wo mono.

Francais: Il eut de Husim: Abitob et Elphaal. –
Anglais: And of Hushim he begat Abitub, and Elpaal.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona sa nam vuɗsi hay Husim kayni: Abitub hiɗi Elpaal.
Bulu: Ba Usim be nga biaé: Abitub a Elpaal.
Guiziga: Naɓa Sarayime, a yi ziri mizilehey le cuw ti ngwas naŋ Husime, i Abitup ati Elpaˀal.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa bee Husim o danydi Abituba e Elpa'al.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa bee Husim o danydi Abituba e Elpa'al.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Husim kóò n'aa ndaka so kòó Abitub in Ɛlpal ha̧ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Husim kóò n'aa ndaka so kòó Abitub in Ɛlpal ha̧ a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Sha'arayim yake ŋwale tezhili bake hwa male ta ŋkɛ Həwshim. Yɛ Abitəwb le Ɛlpa'al.
Tupurri: Se biñ de Husim diñ Abitub wo de Elpaal.

Francais: Fils d'Elphaal: Héber, Misaam et Samad, qui bâtit Ono, Lod et les villes de sa dépendance.
Anglais: The sons of Elpaal; Eber, and Misham, and Shamed, who built Ono, and Lod, with the towns thereof:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Elpaal: Eber, Miseyam, hiɗi Semer ma in Ono, in Lod hiɗi naga ma talam kafna.
Bulu: Bone be Elpaal be mbe na: Eber, Miseam a Semer nyô a nga lôñe tisone Onô, tisone Lôd a minlame mié.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Elpaˀalay i ti: Eber, Misam waɗ Semet. Mindira walahay On ati Lot waɗ prok taŋhaya, i Semet vuna.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Elpa'al boo: Eber e Mise'am e Semed mo nyiɓi Oono e Lodo bee gure maagol.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Elpa'al boo: Eber e Mise'am e Semed mo nyiɓi Oono e Lodo bee gure maagol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Ɛlpal nɛ́ Ebɛr, Misɛam in Sɛmɛd. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ Sɛmɛd a̧ mboo ye Ɔnɔ bá nɛ̀ Lod in o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Ɛlpal nɛ́ Ebɛr, Misɛam in Sɛmɛd. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ Sɛmɛd a̧ mboo ye Ɔnɔ bá nɛ̀ Lod in o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili nyi yake Ɛlpa'al: Ɛbɛr, Misham le Shɛmɛd. Shɛmɛd nde ŋate meleme ta Ono ba'a ŋa Lod le kweci meleme nyi dzeyi yite.
Tupurri: Jar ni Elpaal wo diñ: Eber, Meseyam wo de Semer maga laa Ono, laa Lod de progre äen wo mono.

Francais: Baria et Sama, chefs des familles qui habitaient Aïalon, mirent en fuite les habitants de Geth.
Anglais: Beriah also, and Shema, who were heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who drove away the inhabitants of Gath:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Beriya hiɗi Sema sa ŋulona hay jafna jar sum sa hay Ayalon, nisi mun sum sa hay Gatna.
Bulu: Beria ba Kéma bivete ya menda me bôte ya bôt be nga too Ayalôn, be nga bo bôte ya Gat na be tup.
Guiziga: Beriya ati Sema, buy ngi hayay a wuzla mizli Ayaloŋhoy i taŋ. Muɓulaka mizli ngi ruwuy Gatay i taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Beri'a e Sema ngoni baaba-ci'e'en, jooɗiiɓe haa Ayyalon, ɓe ndiiwi yimɓe Gaat.
Fulfulde_DC: Beri'a e Sema ngoni baaba-ci'e'en, jooɗiiɓe haa Ayyalon, ɓe ndiiwi yimɓe Gaat.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bɛria in Sɛma yaa so nɛ́ o gasawi nutua ko o be saaye Ayalɔŋ; mɛ̀ nɛ́ wa á̧ ndaka o bíí saaye Gat yaknɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bɛria in Sɛma yaa so nɛ́ o gasawi nutua ko o be saaye Ayalɔŋ; mɛ̀ nɛ́ wa á̧ ndaka o bíí saaye Gat yaknɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Kambeli nyi te ghəa mbeli mbe yita se yɛ Beriya hɛ le Shama hwa ka Ayalon. Ghenci ka ŋkamte mbeli nyi kese mbe Gat.
Tupurri: Beriya wo de Sema maga hay wo diñ wañre ma ti feele yoo jar Ayalon kal wo nii jar Gad wo go.

Francais: Ahio, Sésac, Jérimoth,
Anglais: And Ahio, Shashak, and Jeremoth,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ahiyo, Sasak, Yeremot;
Bulu: Bone be Beria be mbe na: Ahyô, Sakak, Yerémôt;
Guiziga: Ahiyo Sasak, Yeremot,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ahiyo e Sasak e Yeremot
Fulfulde_DC: Ahiyo e Sasak e Yeremot
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O nya-wa so nɛ́ Sasak in Yɛrɛmɔt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O nya-wa so nɛ́ Sasak in Yɛrɛmɔt.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ŋwale nyi yake Beriya nyi: Ahiyo, Shashak, Yerɛmot,
Tupurri: Ahiyo, Sasag, Yeremod,

Francais: Zabadia, Arod, Héder,
Anglais: And Zebadiah, and Arad, and Ader,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Zebadiya, Arad, Eder;
Bulu: Zebadya, Arad, Eder;
Guiziga: Zebadiya, Arat, Eder,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Zebadiya e Arat e Eder
Fulfulde_DC: e Zebadiya e Arat e Eder
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Zɛbadia, Arad, Edɛr,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Zɛbadia, Arad, Edɛr,
Kapsiki_DC: Zɛbadiya, Arad, Ɛdɛr,
Tupurri: Sebadiya, Arad, Eder,

Francais: Michaël, Jespha et Joha étaient fils de Baria.
Anglais: And Michael, and Ispah, and Joha, the sons of Beriah;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mikayel, Yikfa hiɗi Yoha si gurona vi Beriya.
Bulu: Mikaél, Yisfa a Yôha.
Guiziga: Mikayel, Isepa waɗ Yoha, i ziri mizile ngi Beriyahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Mika'iilu e Yispa e Yoha, kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Beri'a.
Fulfulde_DC: e Mika'iilu e Yispa e Yoha, kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Beri'a.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mikaɛl, Yispa in Yɔha nɛ́ o bem ko Bɛria.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mikaɛl, Yispa in Yɔha nɛ́ o bem ko Bɛria.
Kapsiki_DC: Mikayɛl, Ishepa le Yoha.
Tupurri: Mikayel, Yisfa wo de Yoha hay wo diñ jar ni Beriya wo.

Francais: - Zabadia, Mosollam, Hézéci, Héber,
Anglais: And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hezeki, and Heber,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Zebadya, Mesullam, Hizki, Heber,
Bulu: Zebadya, Mesulam, Hizki, Héber,
Guiziga: Zebadiya, Mesulam, Hiziki, Heber,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Zebadiya e Mesullam e Hijiki e Heber
Fulfulde_DC: Zebadiya e Mesullam e Hijiki e Heber
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Zɛbadia, Mɛsulam, Hizki, Hɛbɛr,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Zɛbadia, Mɛsulam, Hizki, Hɛbɛr,
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhilia Ɛlpa'al: Zɛbadiya, Meshəwlam, Hizki, Hɛbɛr,
Tupurri: Sebadiya, Mesulam, Hiski, Heber,

Francais: Jésamari, Jezlia et Jobab étaient fils d'Elphaal.
Anglais: Ishmerai also, and Jezliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yismeray hiɗi Yabab si gurona vi Elpaal.
Bulu: Yismerayi a Yôbab ki be mbe bone be Elpaal.
Guiziga: Isemeray, Iziliya waɗ Yobapa, i ziri mizile ngi Elpaˀalay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Yismeray e Yisliya e Yobaba, kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Elpa'al.
Fulfulde_DC: e Yismeray e Yisliya e Yobaba, kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Elpa'al.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yismɛrai, Yizlia in Yɔbab nɛ́ o bem ko Ɛlpal.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yismɛrai, Yizlia in Yɔbab nɛ́ o bem ko Ɛlpal.
Kapsiki_DC: Ishemɛray, Izliya le Yobab.
Tupurri: Yismeray wo de Yobab hay wo diñ jar ni Elpaale.

Francais: - Jacim, Zéchri, Zabdi,
Anglais: And Jakim, and Zichri, and Zabdi,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yakim, Zikri, Zabdi,
Bulu: Bone be Simeyi be mbe na: Yakim, Zikri, Zabdi,
Guiziga: Yakim, Zikri, Zaɓdi,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yakim e Zikiri e Zabdi
Fulfulde_DC: Yakim e Zikiri e Zabdi
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yakim, Zikri, Zabdi,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yakim, Zikri, Zabdi,
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili nyi yake Shimɛyi: Yakim, Zikri, Zabdi,
Tupurri: Yakim, Sikri, Sabdi,

Francais: Elioénaï, Séléthaï, Eliel,
Anglais: And Elienai, and Zilthai, and Eliel,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Eliyenay, Siltay, Eliyel;
Bulu: Eliénayi, Tiltayi, Eliél
Guiziga: Eliyenay, Siletay, Eliyel,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Eli'enay e Cillitay e Eliyel
Fulfulde_DC: e Eli'enay e Cillitay e Eliyel
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛliɛnai, Silɛtai, Eliɛl,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛliɛnai, Silɛtai, Eliɛl,
Kapsiki_DC: Ɛliyɛnay, Siletay, Ɛliyɛl,
Tupurri: Eliyenay, Siltay, Eliyel,

Francais: Adaïa, Baraïa et Samarath étaient fils de Séméï.
Anglais: And Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, the sons of Shimhi;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Adaya, Beraya hiɗi Simrat si gurona vi Simey.
Bulu: Adaya, Beraya, a Simrat.
Guiziga: Adaya, Beraya waɗ Simrata, i ziri mizile ngi Simeyey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Adaya e Beraya e Simirat, kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Sim'i.
Fulfulde_DC: e Adaya e Beraya e Simirat, kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Sim'i.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Adaya, Bɛraya in Simrat nɛ́ o bem ko Simɛi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Adaya, Bɛraya in Simrat nɛ́ o bem ko Simɛi.
Kapsiki_DC: Adaya, Bɛraya le Shimrat.
Tupurri: Adaya, Beraya wo de Simrad hay wo diñ jar ni Simeyi.

Francais: - Jesphan, Héber,
Anglais: And Ishpan, and Heber, and Eliel,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yikpan, Eber, Eliyel;
Bulu: Yispan, Eber, Eliél
Guiziga: Isepaŋ, Eber, Eliyel,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yispan e Eber e Eliyel
Fulfulde_DC: Yispan e Eber e Eliyel
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yispaŋ, Ebɛr, Eliɛl,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yispaŋ, Ebɛr, Eliɛl,
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili nyi yake Shashak: Ishepan, Ɛbɛr, Ɛliyɛl,
Tupurri: Yispan, Eber, Eliyel,

Francais: Eliel, Abdon, Zéchri, Hanan,
Anglais: And Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Abdon, Zikri, Hanan;
Bulu: Abdon, Zikri, Hanan;
Guiziga: Abudoŋ, Zikri, Hanaŋ,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Abdon e Zikiri e Hanan
Fulfulde_DC: e Abdon e Zikiri e Hanan
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Abdɔŋ, Zikri, Hanaŋ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Abdɔŋ, Zikri, Hanaŋ,
Kapsiki_DC: Abdon, Zikri, Hanan,
Tupurri: Abdon, Sikri, Hanan,

Francais: Hanania, Elam, Anathothia,
Anglais: And Hananiah, and Elam, and Antothijah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Elam, Antotiya;
Bulu: Hananiya, Elam, Antôtiya;
Guiziga: Hananiya, Elam, Anetotiya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Hananiya e Elam e Antotiya
Fulfulde_DC: e Hananiya e Elam e Antotiya
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hanania, Elam, Anɛtotia,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hanania, Elam, Anɛtotia,
Kapsiki_DC: Hananiya, Ɛlam, Anetotiya,
Tupurri: Hananiya, Elam, Antotiya,

Francais: Jephdaïa et Phanuel étaient fils de Sésac.
Anglais: And Iphedeiah, and Penuel, the sons of Shashak;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yifdeya hiɗi Penuwel si gurona vi Sakak.
Bulu: Yifdeya a Penué be mbe bone be Sakak.
Guiziga: Ifdeya waɗ Penuyele, i ziri mizile ngi Sasakay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Yifdiya e Penuwel, kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Sasak.
Fulfulde_DC: e Yifdiya e Penuwel, kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Sasak.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yifdɛya in Pɛnuɛl nɛ́ o bem ko Sasak.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yifdɛya in Pɛnuɛl nɛ́ o bem ko Sasak.
Kapsiki_DC: Ifdɛya le Penəwɛl.
Tupurri: Yifdeya wo de Penuwel hay wo diñ jar ni Sasage.

Francais: - Samsari, Sohoria, Otholia,
Anglais: And Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Samseray, Sehariya, Ataliya;
Bulu: Samkerayi, Seharia, Atalia,
Guiziga: Sameseray, Sehariya, Ataliya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Samseray e Sehariya e Ataliya
Fulfulde_DC: Samseray e Sehariya e Ataliya
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Samsɛrai, Sɛharia, Atalia,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Samsɛrai, Sɛharia, Atalia,
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili nyi yake Yerowam: Shamesheray, Shehariya, Atali,
Tupurri: Samseray, Sehariya, Ataliya,

Francais: Jersia, Elia et Zéchri, étaient fils de Jéroham.
Anglais: And Jaresiah, and Eliah, and Zichri, the sons of Jeroham.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yaaresiya, Eliya hiɗi Zikri si gurona vi Yeroham.
Bulu: Yaarékia, Eliya Zikri ke be mbe bone be Yerôham.
Guiziga: Yaresiya, Eliya waɗ Zikri, i ziri mizile ngi Yerohamay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Ya'arsiya e Eliya e Zikiri, kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Yeroham.
Fulfulde_DC: e Ya'arsiya e Eliya e Zikiri, kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Yeroham.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yarɛsia, Ɛlia in Zikri nɛ́ o bem ko Yeroam.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yarɛsia, Ɛlia in Zikri nɛ́ o bem ko Yeroam.
Kapsiki_DC: Yarɛshiya, Ɛli le Zikri.
Tupurri: Yaaresiya, Eliya wo de Sikri hay wo diñ jar ni Yeroham.

Francais: - Ce sont là des chefs de famille, des chefs selon leurs générations; ils habitaient à Jérusalem.
Anglais: These were heads of the fathers, by their generations, chief men. These dwelt in Jerusalem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kayni si sa ŋulona vi jafna, si sa ŋulona kuɗ dersiya dersiya. Nisi lakay kayn hay Yerusalem.
Bulu: Bivete ya menda me bôt mbie le ane mebume map me né. Be nga too e Yérusalém.
Guiziga: Buy ngi hayay angi tizer taŋ i taŋ so. A pam a Zeruzalem.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe'e fuu ngoni baaba-ci'e'en fodde deftere asli maɓɓe, ɓe njooɗi haa Urusaliima.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe'e fuu ngoni baaba-ci'e'en fodde deftere asli maɓɓe, ɓe njooɗi haa Urusaliima.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O gasawi nutua nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ pɛ́r-nam kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. Wa dee so ye sɛn Jerusalɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O gasawi nutua nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ pɛ́r-nam kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. Wa dee so ye sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nya tsagha se mbeli nyi te ghəa mbeli keyita keyita kala nza ta hwelefe. Mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm se hɛ kanza.
Tupurri: Mo na diñ wañre ma ti feele wo, wañre ma ti kaçaçge ti' ti'n wo. Saara hay de tiñ Jerusalem.

Francais: Le père de Gabaon habitait à Gabaon, et le nom de sa femme était Maacha.
Anglais: And at Gibeon dwelt the father of Gibeon; whose wife's name was Maachah:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bum Gabawon musi hay Gabawon, cata valamu semda va' ala Maaka,
Bulu: Esaa Gabaoñ a nga too e Gabaoñ, a e minga wé a mbe jôé na Maaka.
Guiziga: Mbur mipa hirwuy Gabaˀoŋ, a cifam a diga ati ngwas naŋ Maˀaka.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Baaba Gibiyon jooɗi haa Gibiyon. Innde debbo maako, Ma'aka.
Fulfulde_DC: Baaba Gibiyon jooɗi haa Gibiyon. Innde debbo maako, Ma'aka.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ Yɛiɛl  á̧ ku̧u̧ so naŋ ye Gabaɔŋ; nin kóò kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Maka.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ Yɛiɛl  á̧ ku̧u̧ so naŋ ye Gabaɔŋ; nin kóò kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Maka.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma wəndə nya keŋslete Gabawon ne, mbe melemea shɛ se ŋkɛ le male ta ŋkɛ Ma'aka,
Tupurri: Je laa Gabawoñ hay de tiñ Gabawoñ, aè hay ëe waçy äen ga Maaka.

Francais: Son fils premier-né, Abdon, puis Sur, Cis, Baal, Nadab,
Anglais: And his firstborn son Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Nadab,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Abdon goora valam ma vuɗi jewna, bugolda Sur, Kis, Baal, Nadab,
Bulu: Abdôn a mbe ntôle mone wé; ba ba tôñe valé be mbe na: Tur, Kis, Baal, Nadab
Guiziga: Mangal naŋ modogom mazilaka Abudoŋ waɗ ziri naŋ mizile mekelemey, Sur, Kis, Baˀal, Nadap,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Abdon woni afo maako, nden o danyi boo Cuuru e Kis e Ba'al e Nadab
Fulfulde_DC: Abdon woni afo maako, nden o danyi boo Cuuru e Kis e Ba'al e Nadab
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kaya-bem kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Abdɔŋ, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Sur, sɛka Kis, Bal, Nadab,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kaya-bem kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Abdɔŋ, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Sur, sɛka Kis, Bal, Nadab,
Kapsiki_DC: ma wəzege ta ŋkɛ nya kwele ne, Abdon ba'a kweci ŋwalea ŋkɛ ne, yɛ Səwr, Kish, Ba'al, Nɛr, Nadab,
Tupurri: Abdon diñ jag weel äe no, blam äe diñ Sur, Kis, Baal, Nadab,

Francais: Gédor, Ahio et Zacher. Macelloth engendra Samaa.
Anglais: And Gedor, and Ahio, and Zacher.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gedor, Ahiyo hiɗi Zeker.
Bulu: Gedor, Ahyô a Zéker.
Guiziga: Gedor, Ahiyo Zeker,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Gedor e Ahiyo e Zeker.
Fulfulde_DC: e Gedor e Ahiyo e Zeker.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gɛdɔr, Ahio, Zɛkɛr,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gɛdɔr, Ahio, Zɛkɛr,
Kapsiki_DC: Gedor, Ahiyo, Zɛkɛr
Tupurri: Gebor, Ahiyo wo de Sekere.

Francais: Ils habitèrent aussi près de leurs frères à Jérusalem, avec leurs frères.
Anglais: And Mikloth begat Shimeah. And these also dwelt with their brethren in Jerusalem, over against them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Miklot vuɗ Simeya, nisi kaw lakay kat ɓosiyosina, nisi lakay ziy hay Yerusalem kat ɓosiyosina.
Bulu: Miklôt a nga biaé Siméa. Be fe be nga too Yérusalém ane bobenyañe bap.
Guiziga: waɗ Miklot, cine ngi Sima. Taŋ kwana, a pam a Zeruzalem kaɓa sukum taŋhay na ya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mikilot danyi Sim'a. Kamɓe ɓe njooɗodi banndiraaɓe maɓɓe haa Urusaliima, ɓe tiitotiri.
Fulfulde_DC: Mikilot danyi Sim'a. Kamɓe ɓe njooɗodi banndiraaɓe maɓɓe haa Urusaliima, ɓe tiitotiri.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: in Miklot dáà ko Simɛa. Wa dee so ye sɛn Jerusalɛm hee o nya-wa ga mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: in Miklot dáà ko Simɛa. Wa dee so ye sɛn Jerusalɛm hee o nya-wa ga mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: le Miklot nya kayitenyɛa Shima. Ma ghenci le ŋa nci perə, kala ka kesaka yiteyɛa nci ne, pelɛ Zhɛrəzalɛm se hɛ kanza le kweci mbeli nyi kwa yita ta nci.
Tupurri: Miklod raw biñ Simeya. Saara hay wo lagge äiñ heçeçre äaaran wo: AÀ hay wo de tiñ Jerusalem see heçeçre äaara wo.

Francais: - Ner engendra Cis; Cis engendra Saül; Saül engendra Jonathan, Melchisua, Abinadab et Esbaal.
Anglais: And Ner begat Kish, and Kish begat Saul, and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchi–shua, and Abinadab, and Esh–baal.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ner vuɗ Kis, Kis vuɗ Sawul, Sawul vuɗ Yonatan, Malkisuwa, Abinadab hiɗi Ekbaal.
Bulu: Ner a nga biaé Kis; Kis a nga biaé Saül; Saül a nga biaé Yônatan, MalkiKua, Abinadab a Ekbaal.
Guiziga: Ner i cine ngi Kis, Kis a yi Sawul, Sawulo a yi Zonataŋ, Malkisuwa, Abinadap waɗ Esebaˀal.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Neer danyi Kis, Kis danyi Sawulu, Sawulu danyi Yonatan e Malkisu'a e Abinadabu e Esba'al.
Fulfulde_DC: Neer danyi Kis, Kis danyi Sawulu, Sawulu danyi Yonatan e Malkisu'a e Abinadabu e Esba'al.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛr koo Kis, Kis koo Saul, ɓɛɛ Saul ko Jɔnataŋ, Malki-Sua, Abinadab in Ɛsbal.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛr koo Kis, Kis koo Saul, ɓɛɛ Saul ko Jɔnataŋ, Malki-Sua, Abinadab in Ɛsbal.
Kapsiki_DC: Nɛr yitenyɛa Kish, Kish yitenyɛa Sawəl, Sawəl yitenyɛa yɛ Zhonatan, Malkishəwa, Abinadab le Ishebal.
Tupurri: Ner hay biñ Kis, Kis raw biñ Sawul, Sawul kal biñ Jonatañ, Malki-Suwa, Abinadab wo de Esbaal.

Francais: -Fils de Jonathan: Méribbaal; Méribbaal engendra Micha.
Anglais: And the son of Jonathan was Merib–baal; and Merib–baal begat Micah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Goora vi Yonatan: Merib-Baal. Merib-Baal vuɗ Mikka.
Bulu: Bone be Yônatan: Méribaal. Méribaal a nga biaé Miké.
Guiziga: Mangal mizile ngi Zonataŋ i Meribaˀal, Meribaˀal a yi Mika.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓii Yonatan boo: Merib-Ba'al. Merib-Ba'al danyi Mika.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓii Yonatan boo: Merib-Ba'al. Merib-Ba'al danyi Mika.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bem ko Jɔnataŋ duka nɛ́ Mɛribal, ɓɛɛ Mɛribal ko Mika.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bem ko Jɔnataŋ duka nɛ́ Mɛribal, ɓɛɛ Mɛribal ko Mika.
Kapsiki_DC: Wəzege teza nyi yake Zhonatan: Meriba'al. Meriba'al yitenyɛa Mika.
Tupurri: Je Jonatañ diñ Merib-Baale, Merib-Baal kal biñ Mise.

Francais: - Fils de Micha: Phiton, Mélech, Tharaa et Achaz.
Anglais: And the sons of Micah were, Pithon, and Melech, and Tarea, and Ahaz.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Mikka: Piton, Melek, Tahereya hiɗi Ahaz.
Bulu: Bone be Miké: Piton, Mélék, Taeréa a Ahaz.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Mikahay i ti: Pitoŋ, Melek, Tareya waɗ Ahas.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Mika boo: Piton e Melek e Tahare'a e Akas.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Mika boo: Piton e Melek e Tahare'a e Akas.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Mika nɛ́ Pitɔŋ, Mɛlɛk, Tarɛa in Ahaz.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Mika nɛ́ Pitɔŋ, Mɛlɛk, Tarɛa in Ahaz.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili nyi yake Mika: Piton, Mɛlɛk, Tarɛya le Ahaz.
Tupurri: Jar ni Mise wo diñ Piton, Meleg, Taereya wo de Ahas.

Francais: Achaz engendra Joada; Joada engendra Alamath, Azmoth et Zamri; Zamri engendra Mosa.
Anglais: And Ahaz begat Jehoadah; and Jehoadah begat Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begat Moza,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ahaz vuɗ Yehoyada; Yehoyada vuɗ Alemet, Azmavet hiɗi Zimri;
Bulu: Ahaz a nga biaé Yehôada; Yehôada a nga biaé Alémét, Azmavét a Zimri;
Guiziga: Ahas a yi Yowada, Yowada a yi Alemek, Asmavet waɗ Zimri. Zimri a yi Mosa,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Akas danyi Yeho'adda, Yeho'adda danyi Alemet e Azmawet e Zimiri. Zimiri danyi Moosa,
Fulfulde_DC: Akas danyi Yeho'adda, Yeho'adda danyi Alemet e Azmawet e Zimiri. Zimiri danyi Moosa,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ahaz koo Yehoyada, Yehoyada koo Alɛmɛt, Azmavɛt in Zimri; Zimri koo Mɔsa,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ahaz koo Yehoyada, Yehoyada koo Alɛmɛt, Azmavɛt in Zimri; Zimri koo Mɔsa,
Kapsiki_DC: Ahaz yitenyɛa Yowada, Yowada yitenyɛa yɛ Alɛmɛt, Azmavɛt le Zimri, Zimri yitenyɛa Mosa,
Tupurri: Ahas raw biñ Yehoada, Yehoada kal biñ Alemed, Asmafed wo de Simri.

Francais: Mosa engendra Banaa; Rapha, son fils; Elasa, son fils; Asel, son fils.
Anglais: And Moza begat Binea: Rapha was his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Zimri vuɗ Motsa, Motsa vuɗ Bineya. Rafa, Eliyasa, Hatsel;
Bulu: Zimri a nga biaé Môtsa; Môtsa a nga biaé Binéa. Rafa e mone wé; Eléasa e mone wé; Atsél e mone wé;
Guiziga: Mosa a yi Bineya, Bineya a yi Rafa, Rafa a yi Elasa, Elasa a yi Asel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Moosa danyi Bine'a, Bine'a danyi Rafa, Rafa danyi El'aasa, El'aasa danyi Acel.
Fulfulde_DC: Moosa danyi Bine'a, Bine'a danyi Rafa, Rafa danyi El'aasa, El'aasa danyi Acel.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɔsa koo Binɛa, Binɛa koo Rafa, Elɛasa, ɓɛɛ Elɛasa ko Asɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɔsa koo Binɛa, Binɛa koo Rafa, Elɛasa, ɓɛɛ Elɛasa ko Asɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Mosa yitenyɛa Binɛya, Binɛya yitenyɛa Rafa, Rafa yitenyɛa Ɛlasa, Ɛlasa yitenyɛa Asɛl.
Tupurri: Simri raw biñ Motsa, Motsa kal biñ Bineya. Je Bineya diñ Rafa, je Rafa diñ Eleyasa, je Eleyasa diñ Atsel.

Francais: Asel eut six fils, dont voici les noms: Ezricam, Bocru, Ismaël, Saria, Obdia et Hanan: tous ceux-là étaient fils d'Asel.
Anglais: And Azel had six sons, whose names are these, Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan. All these were the sons of Azel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Atsel vuɗ guron karkiya, kayni semda visiya: Azrikam, Bokru, Ismayel, Seyariya, Abdiyas hiɗi Hanan. Nisi kaf kayni si gurona vi Atsel.
Bulu: Atsél a nga biaé bone besaman be too môé na: Azrikam, Bokru, Ismaél, Searia, Abdias a Hanan. Balé bete bese be mbe bone be Atsél.
Guiziga: Asel a yi ziri mizilehey merkeɗe, slimiɗ taŋhay ani: Asirkam, Bokru, Ismayel, Seyariya, Obadiya waɗ Hanaŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Acel woodi ɓiɓɓe worɓe njoweego. Ndaa inɗe maɓɓe: Azrikam e Bokuru e Isma'iilu e Se'ariya e Obadiya e Hanan. Ɓe fuu ɓe ɓiɓɓe Acel.
Fulfulde_DC: Acel woodi ɓiɓɓe worɓe njoweego. Ndaa inɗe maɓɓe: Azrikam e Bokuru e Isma'iilu e Se'ariya e Obadiya e Hanan. Ɓe fuu ɓe ɓiɓɓe Acel.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Asɛl koo bem mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk; nin-wa nɛ́ Azrikam, Bɔkru, Ismaɛl, Sɛaria, Obadia in Hanaŋ. O bem ko Asɛl lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Asɛl koo bem mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk; nin-wa nɛ́ Azrikam, Bɔkru, Ismaɛl, Sɛaria, Obadia in Hanaŋ. O bem ko Asɛl lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili ŋkwaŋe yake Asɛl, wa nyi sləa nci nyi: Azrikam, Bokrəw, Ismayɛl, Shɛyariya, Obadiya le Hanan.
Tupurri: Atsel raw biñ weere hiira'a, a wo diñ: Asrikam, Bokru, Ismayel, Seariya, Abdiyas wo de Hanan. Saara hay äuy diñ jar ni Atsel wo.

Francais: - Fils d'Esec, son frère: Ulam, son premier-né, Jéhus le deuxième, et Eliphalet le troisième.
Anglais: And the sons of Eshek his brother were, Ulam his firstborn, Jehush the second, and Eliphelet the third.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi ɓasulumna Esek: Ulam ma vuɗi jewna, Yewus ma vuɗi kalamna, Elifelet ma mul ɦidina.
Bulu: Bone be monyañe wé Ekek be mbe na: Ulam, ntôô, Yeuk ébatan a Elifélét e mone lale.
Guiziga: Esek i sukum ngi Asel, mangal naŋ modogomo i Ulam, mijingaˀ naŋ i Yewus, mimakir taŋ i Elifelet.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Esek, deerɗiiko ngoni: Ulam afo maako, Ye'us ɗiɗaɓo e Elifelet tataɓo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Esek, deerɗiiko ngoni: Ulam afo maako, Ye'us ɗiɗaɓo e Elifelet tataɓo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Esɛk nya kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Ulam, kaya-wi; hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Yɛus, taar-a nɛ́ Elifɛlɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Esɛk nya kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Ulam, kaya-wi; hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Yɛus, taar-a nɛ́ Elifɛlɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma Ɛshɛk, wəza meghekɛa Asɛl, mahekene ŋwale ve: Əwlam tezhɛa wəzege, Yɛyəwsh nde bake, Ɛlifɛlɛt nde mahekene.
Tupurri: Jar ni Eseg hen äen hay wo diñ: Ulam, jag weel äe no, Yewus ma de äog no, Elifeled ma de swa' no.

Francais: Les fils d'Ulam furent de vaillants hommes, tirant de l'arc, et ils eurent beaucoup de fils, et de petits-fils, cent cinquante.  Tous ceux-là sont des fils de Benjamin.
Anglais: And the sons of Ulam were mighty men of valour, archers, and had many sons, and sons' sons, an hundred and fifty. All these are of the sons of Benjamin.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Ulam nisi diksi jufay ŋolo, nisi gi ɓarawna. Nisi vuɗ gurona hiɗi guro-ŋolona sa jufayna hiɗi sa boyn ŋolo, ir kis kalam dok-vasl. Nisi kaf kayni si gurona vi Benyamin.
Bulu: Bone be Ulam be mbe biwôlô bi bôt ba wua élaé; be nga bili abui bon a bendaé tañe ntet a mewôm metan. Balé bete bese be mbe e bone be Bényamin.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Ulamay, i mizli miwirwir migi vurumoy, misinaka wi luvuto le. A yam ziri mizilehey ati dideˀ mizilehey le haɗi, taŋ jom gar mizli skat ti kukur zlum. Mizli mizilaka slimiɗ taŋhaya tayna gar na, i dideˀ ngi Benjameŋhey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Ulam fuu ɓe honooɓe semmbiɗɓe, tirooɓe lagaaje. Ɓe ngoodi ɓiɓɓe e taaniraaɓe ɗuuɗɓe, limgal maɓɓe waɗi yimɓe teemerre e cappanɗe njowo (150). Ɓe fuu maɓɓe ɓe ɗon nder danygol Benyamin.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Ulam fuu ɓe honooɓe semmbiɗɓe, tirooɓe lagaaje. Ɓe ngoodi ɓiɓɓe e taaniraaɓe ɗuuɗɓe, limgal maɓɓe waɗi yimɓe teemerre e cappanɗe njowo (150). Ɓe fuu maɓɓe ɓe ɗon nder danygol Benyamin.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Ulam yaa so nɛ́ o ŋga wi-biro nɛ̀ iŋa pi̧i̧ góò nyɛmna. Wa a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o bem in o be-koo nɛ̀ dɔka-a, lɛŋ nɛ́ gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ. O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ o bíí zuduk ko Bɛnjamin.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Ulam yaa so nɛ́ o ŋga wi-biro nɛ̀ iŋa pi̧i̧ góò nyɛmna. Wa a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o bem in o be-koo nɛ̀ dɔka-a, lɛŋ nɛ́ gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ. O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ o bíí zuduk ko Bɛnjamin.
Kapsiki_DC: Kambeli kempa nyi nza zləvə te se ŋwalea Əwlam ba'a kaka ɗepe he have zlahe. Kwele kwele se ŋwale tezhili le ka shihɛ va hɛ, gwəmsə ba'a mcɛfemsə se hɛ pɛtɛa nci. Pɛtɛ mbeli nyi nza nyi sləa nci teke kambeli nyi mbe hwelefe ta Bɛnjamɛn.
Tupurri: Jar ni Ulam hay wo diñ werpiiri ma de eegre de hm wo, wo de ko jwag waa lay. AÀ hay biñ wo weere debañ, moore äaara wo debañ lay, saara äuy kis ti äe do dwee. Jar sen wo mo äuy diñ jar ni Benjame wo.

Francais: Ainsi tout Israël fut enregistré dans les généalogies, et voici qu'ils sont inscrits dans le livre des rois d'Israël; et Juda fut emmené captif à Babylone à cause de ses transgressions.
Anglais: So all Israel were reckoned by genealogies; and, behold, they were written in the book of the kings of Israel and Judah, who were carried away to Babylon for their transgression.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa Israyel kaf ka ŋaɓaya, sesi ka ɗoy hay ɗerwella vi muliyana vi Israyel.
Bulu: Israél ase a nga lañeban a tiliban e kalate bejô bôte ya Israél. Yuda a nga ke minkôm e Babilôn amu be nji wulu ane da yian e mise me Zambe.
Guiziga: A slufaka Israyeleye le gar, vur hay vur hay, a tohoko taŋ ar ɗerewol ngi toho slimiɗ ngi buy ngi Israyeley. A jaka mizli Zudahay nga Babiloŋ, asi taŋ miteŋteŋ avu Buymisemuŋ ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Bana nii Isra'iila'en fuu mbinndaama fodde gide muuɗum'en nder Deftere Laamiiɓe Isra'iila. Ammaa yimɓe Yahuuda dahaama haa Baabila ngam ɓe ngewi umroore Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: Bana nii Isra'iila'en fuu mbinndaama fodde gide muuɗum'en nder Deftere Laamiiɓe Isra'iila. Ammaa yimɓe Yahuuda dahaama haa Baabila ngam ɓe ngewi umroore Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa tɔra o be  Israɛl  lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa yɔr nin-wa zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu  Israɛl . Wa kaia so o be Juda nɛ̀ bara si Babilɔŋ wen ŋgazu kɔ-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa tɔra o be  Israɛl  lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa yɔr nin-wa zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu  Israɛl . Wa kaia so o be Juda nɛ̀ bara si Babilɔŋ wen ŋgazu kɔ-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛ rafete sləa ka Israyɛl mbeli keyita keyita mbe palepa nya nza sləa ka meghea ka Israyɛl. Nahe mbeli kefəhwe ka Zhəwda kadzembe Babilone va nya ɗema hɛ kese kamene ɗe ta Shala.
Tupurri: Jar Israyel wo äuy hay wo go de yerge äil kefder mani wañre Israyeln wo.

Francais: Les premiers habitants, qui demeuraient dans leurs possessions, dans leurs villes, furent les Israélites, les prêtres, les lévites et les Nathinéens.
Anglais: Now the first inhabitants that dwelt in their possessions in their cities were, the Israelites, the priests, Levites, and the Nethinims.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jafna vi Yuda ka yaway goy gorvo'o hay Babilon, kuɗ bay-ɗigerta visiya, sum sa lak hay liyna visi hay hoyok-ziyn jewn kayni si sa Israyella, muliyan-sa-ɗifinna, sa Levitna hiɗi sa Netiniyena.
Bulu: Nsoone ya minkôm, e bôt be nga taté tabe mevôme map, e bitisone biap, be mbe jama nsamba bone bʼIsraél, betuni, Belévit a e bôt be mbe be boʼo bisaé ya a mo e Nda Zambe.
Guiziga: Mizli mumoko dumbuŋ dumbuŋ nga pi a ruwuy taŋ muŋ, ɓa a tiɓaka gwat taŋhay a muŋ, ati walahay taŋhay a muŋ na, i mizli ngi mbuŋ Israyele mizlewey waɗ, masayay, mizli levihey waɗ migi slra ngir hay ngi Buymisemuŋhoy a Zeruzalem.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Aartuɓe wartugo haa ɓe njooɗo nder maral maɓɓe e nder gure maɓɓe, ɗum Isra'iila'en woɗɓe e liman'en e Lewi'en e huuwooɓe kuuɗe pamare nder haykaliiru.
Fulfulde_DC: Aartuɓe wartugo haa ɓe njooɗo nder maral maɓɓe e nder gure maɓɓe, ɗum Isra'iila'en woɗɓe e liman'en e Lewi'en e huuwooɓe kuuɗe pamare nder haykaliiru.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O kuti bíí nɛ̀ pia ɗoŋ tɛ o nù kɔ‘i in o ye kɔ‘i nɛ́ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o be Levii in o wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ bá nɛ̀ o dɔka géé be  Israɛl .
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O kuti bíí nɛ̀ pia ɗoŋ tɛ o nù kɔ‘i in o ye kɔ‘i nɛ́ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o be Levii in o wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ bá nɛ̀ o dɔka géé be  Israɛl .
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbeli nyi kedzawanji mpelɛa ma kazhɛneve hɛɗia nci ba'a wəshia nci ne, ka Israyɛl, zhɛne ka dzeghe Shala, le ka Lɛvi ba'a mbeli nyi kemene slene mbe ghɛa Shala.
Tupurri: AÈ raw hoo jar Juda wo wo go ti dañgay Babilon wer debay yaçaçge jag äaaran wo. Jar ma tañgu maga fer wo le lagge ti tway äaaran wo, äi leege äaaran wo, hay diñ jar Israyel wo, jar sië jag wo, jar Lefid wo, jar Netiniyeçeç wo.

Francais: A Jérusalem, habitèrent des fils de Juda, des fils de Benjamin, et des fils d'Éphraïm et de Manassé;
Anglais: And in Jerusalem dwelt of the children of Judah, and of the children of Benjamin, and of the children of Ephraim, and Manasseh;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Yuda, gurona vi Benyamin, gurona vi Efrayim hiɗi gurona vi Manase lak hay Yerusalem.
Bulu: Ngabe bone be Yuda, nyô bone be Bényamin, nyô bone bʼEfrayim a Manasé be nga tabe e Yérusalém,
Guiziga: Mizli Zudahay cah, Benjameŋhey cah, Efrayimey cah waɗ mizli Manasehey cah, a pam a Zeruzalem.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe Yahuuda e Benyamin e Efrayim e Manassa woɗɓe boo njooɗi haa Urusaliima .
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe Yahuuda e Benyamin e Efrayim e Manassa woɗɓe boo njooɗi haa Urusaliima .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ŋma bezaŋ Juda, o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin, o bezaŋ Efraim in ŋma bezaŋ Manase pia ɗoŋ de ye sɛn Jerusalɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ŋma bezaŋ Juda, o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin, o bezaŋ Efraim in ŋma bezaŋ Manase pia ɗoŋ de ye sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe kweci ŋwalea Zhəwda, ŋa Bɛnjamɛn, ŋa Ɛfrayim ba'a ŋa Manasɛ kedzeme kanzanji pelɛ Zhɛrəzalɛm.
Tupurri: Lag Jerusalem diñ jar ni Juda wo, jar ni Benjame wo, jar ni Efrayim wo de Manase wo.

Francais: - des fils au Pharès, fils de Juda: Othéï, fils d'Ammiud, fils d'Amri, fils d'Omraï, fils de Bonni;
Anglais: Uthai the son of Ammihud, the son of Omri, the son of Imri, the son of Bani, of the children of Pharez the son of Judah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Utay, goora vi Amihud, goora vi Omri, goora vi Imri, gurona vi Bani, jar gurona vi Peres, goora vi Yuda.
Bulu: E ayoñe Yuda, Utayi e mone Amihud, ndaé Omri, ndile Imri, Ôwuabañe Bani, môte ya abume bôte Pérés.
Guiziga: Ar sukwi ngi Zuda, i Utay mangal ngi Amihuɗ, Amihuɗ i mangal ngi Umri, i dideˀ ngi Imri, yo i dideˀ ngi poporok ngi Bani, mbur ngir sukwi Peres.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder yimɓe Yahuuda: Utay ɓii Ammihudu ɓii Omiri ɓii Imiri ɓii Baani, nder danygol Peres ɓii Yahuuda
Fulfulde_DC: Nder yimɓe Yahuuda: Utay ɓii Ammihudu ɓii Omiri ɓii Imiri ɓii Baani, nder danygol Peres ɓii Yahuuda
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ zuduk ko Juda, nɛ́ Utai bem ko Amihud, bem ko Ɔmri, bem ko Imri, bem ko Bani, bem ko Pɛrɛs a̧ pia ɗoŋ ɔ ye Jerusalɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ zuduk ko Juda, nɛ́ Utai bem ko Amihud, bem ko Ɔmri, bem ko Imri, bem ko Bani, bem ko Pɛrɛs a̧ pia ɗoŋ ɔ ye Jerusalɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa hwelefe ta Zhəwda ne, le kwete wəndə shɛ kese, Əwtay ke mbeli shɛ, kawəzege ta Amihəwd nya kawəzege ta Omri, Omri ne, wəzege ta Imri ŋkɛ, Imri ne, wəzege ta Bani ŋkɛ, kakwete wəndə kwa yita ta Pɛrɛs.
Tupurri: Diñ Utay je ni Amihud, je ni Omri, je ni Imri, je ni Bani, yoo jar ni Peres je ni Judan wo.

Francais: - des Silonites: Asaïa, le premier-né, et ses fils;
Anglais: And of the Shilonites; Asaiah the firstborn, and his sons.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa Silonitna, Asaya, goor ma vuɗi jewna, hiɗi gurona valamu.
Bulu: Abume bôte Kéla é nga bili Asaya, ntôle môte ya nda bôte jé, ba be bone bé.
Guiziga: A wuzla ziri ngi Selahay a yi Asaya, modogom ngi haya, i Asaya ati ziri naŋhay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e nder Selani'en boo: Asaya, afo Selan e ɓiɓɓe maako.
Fulfulde_DC: e nder Selani'en boo: Asaya, afo Selan e ɓiɓɓe maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ nú-gara ko Sela nɛ́ Asaya kaya-wi in o bem kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ pia ɗoŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ nú-gara ko Sela nɛ́ Asaya kaya-wi in o bem kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ pia ɗoŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa yita ta Shɛla, tagha Asaya nya keghate kaya mbe yita le ŋwalea ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Yoo jar Silonid wo mono, diñ Asaya, jag weeln wo de jar ni äe.

Francais: - des fils de Zara: Jéhuel; et leurs frères: six cent quatre vingt dix; -
Anglais: And of the sons of Zerah; Jeuel, and their brethren, six hundred and ninety.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Zerah ma': Yewel hiɗi ɓosiyomna, nisi kis-karkiya hiɗi diram dok-zleeŋe.
Bulu: Abume bôte Zéra é nga bili Yeuél. E bôte ya ayoñe Yuda be nga too Yérusalém be mbe mintete minsaman a mewôm ébu.
Guiziga: A wuzla ziri ngi Zerahay a, i Yewuyel ati sukum naŋhay, taŋ jom gar mizli skat skat merkeɗ ti kukur ngoltir.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder ɓiɓɓe Zeraha boo: Ye'uwel e banndiraaɓe maɓɓe teemeɗɗe njoweego e cappanɗe njoweenayo (690).
Fulfulde_DC: Nder ɓiɓɓe Zeraha boo: Ye'uwel e banndiraaɓe maɓɓe teemeɗɗe njoweego e cappanɗe njoweenayo (690).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ nú-gara ko Zɛra nɛ́ Yɛuɛl a̧ pia ɗoŋ. O bezaŋ Juda nɛ̀ pia ɗoŋ Jerusalɛm lɛŋ nɛ́ bíí gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ nú-gara ko Zɛra nɛ́ Yɛuɛl a̧ pia ɗoŋ. O bezaŋ Juda nɛ̀ pia ɗoŋ Jerusalɛm lɛŋ nɛ́ bíí gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa yita ta Zɛra, tagha Yɛyəwɛl. Ma ka Zhəwda nyi pelɛ Zhɛrəzalɛm ne, gwəmsə ŋkwaŋe ba'a meslimsə hɛ.
Tupurri: Yoo jar ni Sera wo mono diñ Yeuwel wo de heçeçre äe, wo äuy kiskis hiira' ti äe do kaawa'a.

Francais: Des fils de Benjamin: Salo, fils de Mosollam, fils d'Oduia, fils d'Asana;
Anglais: And of the sons of Benjamin; Sallu the son of Meshullam, the son of Hodaviah, the son of Hasenuah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Benyamin: Sallu, goora vi Mesullam, goora vi Hodaviya, goora vi Hasenuwa;
Bulu: Ayoñe Bényamin e nga bili Salu e mone Mésulam ndaé Hôdavia, ndile Hasenua,
Guiziga: A wuzla ziri ngi Benjameŋheye, i Salu mangal ngi Mesulam, dideˀ meciɗek ngi Hadaviya, yo i dideˀ ngi poporok ngi Hasenuwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder yimɓe Benyamin boo: Sallu ɓii Mesullam ɓii Hodawiya ɓii Hassenuwa
Fulfulde_DC: Nder yimɓe Benyamin boo: Sallu ɓii Mesullam ɓii Hodawiya ɓii Hassenuwa
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ zuduk ko Bɛnjamin nɛ́ Saul, bem ko Mɛsulam, bem ko Hɔdavia, bem ko Ha-Sɛnua,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ zuduk ko Bɛnjamin nɛ́ Saul, bem ko Mɛsulam, bem ko Hɔdavia, bem ko Ha-Sɛnua,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa yita ta Bɛnjamɛn, tagha yɛ: Saləw, wəzege ta Meshəwlam, wəzege ta Hodaviya nya kawəzege ta Hasenəwa,
Tupurri: Yoo jar ni Benjame wo diñ: Salu je ni Mesulam, je ni Hodafiya, je ni Hasenuwa no

Francais: Jobania, fils de Jéroham; Ela, fils d'Ozi, fils de Mochori; Mosollam, fils de Saphatia, fils de Rahuel, fils de Jébania;
Anglais: And Ibneiah the son of Jeroham, and Elah the son of Uzzi, the son of Michri, and Meshullam the son of Shephathiah, the son of Reuel, the son of Ibnijah;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yibneya, goora vi Yeroham; Ela goora vi Uzzi, goora vi Mikri; Mesullam, goora vi Sepatiya, goora vi Rewel, goora vi Yibneya;
Bulu: é nga bili fe Ela e mone Uzi, ndaé Mikri; Mesulam e mone Sefatia, ndaé Reuél, ndile Ibnia.
Guiziga: Ibineya mangal ngi Yeroham, Ela mangal ngi Uzi, yo i dideˀ meciɗek ngi Mikri, Mesulam mangal ngi Sefatiya, dideˀ meciɗek ngi Rewuyel, yo i dideˀ ngi poporok ngi Ibiniya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Yibniya ɓii Yeroham e Ela ɓii Uzzi ɓii Mikiri e Mesullam ɓii Sefatiya ɓii Re'uwel ɓii Yibniya.
Fulfulde_DC: e Yibniya ɓii Yeroham e Ela ɓii Uzzi ɓii Mikiri e Mesullam ɓii Sefatiya ɓii Re'uwel ɓii Yibniya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: in Yibnɛa, bem ko Yeroam, bá nɛ̀ Ela, bem ko Uzi, bem ko Mikri; sɛka Mɛsulam, bem ko Sɛfatia, bem ko Reuɛl, bem ko Yibnia á̧ pia ɗoŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: in Yibnɛa, bem ko Yeroam, bá nɛ̀ Ela, bem ko Uzi, bem ko Mikri; sɛka Mɛsulam, bem ko Sɛfatia, bem ko Reuɛl, bem ko Yibnia á̧ pia ɗoŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ibnɛya, wəzege ta Yerowam, Ɛla, wəzege ta Əwzi nya kawəzege ta Mikri, Meshəwlam, wəzege ta Shefatiya, wəzege ta Rɛwəyɛl nya kawəzege ta Ibniya.
Tupurri: diñ Yibneya je ni Yeroham no, diñ Ela je ni Usi, je ni Mikri no diñ Mesalum je ni Sepatiya, je ni Reuwel, je ni Yibneyan

Francais: et leurs frères, selon leurs générations: neuf cent cinquante-six. Tous ces hommes étaient chefs de famille selon leurs maisons patriarcales.
Anglais: And their brethren, according to their generations, nine hundred and fifty and six. All these men were chief of the fathers in the house of their fathers.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ɓosiyosina kuɗ dersiya, kis-zleeŋe hiɗi diram dok-vasl yam karkiya. Sum nisin kaf kayni si sa ŋulona vi jafna visiya hay jafna vi sumaysiya.
Bulu: Bôte bete bese be mbe bivete ya menda me bôte map. Mvôʼô Bényamin be nga too Yérusalém be mbe mintet ébu mewôm metan a besaman.
Guiziga: Mizli tayna gar, i buyoy ngi hayay a wuzla muy angi tizer taŋhaya. Mizli Benjameŋhey mipam a Zeruzaleme, taŋ jom gar mizli skat skat ngoltir ti kukur zlum nga merkeɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal banndiraaɓe maɓɓe fodde defte asli maɓɓe, waɗi yimɓe teemeɗɗe njoweenayo e cappanɗe njowo e njoweego (956). Ɓe fuu ɓe baaba-ci'e'en maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal banndiraaɓe maɓɓe fodde defte asli maɓɓe, waɗi yimɓe teemeɗɗe njoweenayo e cappanɗe njowo e njoweego (956). Ɓe fuu ɓe baaba-ci'e'en maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ yaa nɛ́ o gasawi nutua kɔ-wa. O bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nɛ̀ pia ɗoŋ Jerusalɛm lɛŋ nɛ́ gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ yaa nɛ́ o gasawi nutua kɔ-wa. O bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nɛ̀ pia ɗoŋ Jerusalɛm lɛŋ nɛ́ gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛa mbeli nyighɛ kese kambeli nyi te ghəa mbeli keyita keyita ta nci. Pɛtɛ ne, gwəmsə mesli ba'a mcɛfemsə ŋkwaŋeghəmbe se hɛ.
Tupurri: wo de heçeçre äaaran wo, go ti kaçaçge ti' ti' wo kiskis kaawa' de jar do dwee ti hiira'a. Jar sen wo äuy hay wo diñ wañre ti feele mani paçaçre äaaran wo.

Francais: Des prêtres: Jédaïa, Joïarib, Jachim,
Anglais: And of the priests; Jedaiah, and Jehoiarib, and Jachin,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Muliyan-sa-ɗifinna: Yedaya, Yehoyarib; Yakin;
Bulu: E Nsamba betuni, bôt be mbe avale di: Yedaya, Yôyarib, Yakin,
Guiziga: A wuzla masayaya, i Yedaya, Yoyariɓ, Yakiŋ,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder liman'en: Yeda'ya e Yoyaribu e Yakin
Fulfulde_DC: Nder liman'en: Yeda'ya e Yoyaribu e Yakin
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: War ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ́ Yɛdaya, Yɛhɔyarib, Yakin,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: War ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ́ Yɛdaya, Yɛhɔyarib, Yakin,
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi mbeli nyi hwa ka dzeghe Shala nyi: Yedaya, Yoyarib, Yakin,
Tupurri: Yoo jar sië jagn wo mono diñ: Yedaeya, Yehoyarib, Yakin

Francais: Azarias, fils d'Helcias, fils de Mosollam, fils de Sadoc, fils de Maraïoth, fils d'Achitob, prince de la maison de Dieu;
Anglais: And Azariah the son of Hilkiah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Zadok, the son of Meraioth, the son of Ahitub, the ruler of the house of God;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Azariya goora vi Hilkiya, goora vi Mesullam, goora vi Sadok, goora vi Merayot, goora vi Ahitub, ma coli vokŋa hay ziyda vi Lawna;
Bulu: nalé fe Azaria; bimvame biap bi mbe na: Ilkiya, Mésulam, Sadok, Meyarôt a Ahitub nyô a mbe a bili ésaé ya nda Zambe;
Guiziga: waɗ Azariya. Dideˀ mijeŋŋe ngi Azariyahay i ti: Hilkiya, Mesulam, Sadok, Merayot waɗ Ahitup, buyɓi ngi hay Buymisemuŋ a Zeruzalem.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Azariya ɓii Hilkiyya ɓii Mesullam ɓii Cadok ɓii Merayot ɓii Ahitooba, kaliifaajo haykaliiru Allah.
Fulfulde_DC: e Azariya ɓii Hilkiyya ɓii Mesullam ɓii Cadok ɓii Merayot ɓii Ahitooba, kaliifaajo haykaliiru Allah.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: in Azaria, bem ko Hilkia, bem ko Mɛsulam, bem ko Sadɔk, bem ko Mɛrayot, bem ko Ahitub, wi-duk-zu Tua ko Sɔ̧ a̧ pia ɗoŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: in Azaria, bem ko Hilkia, bem ko Mɛsulam, bem ko Sadɔk, bem ko Mɛrayot, bem ko Ahitub, wi-duk-zu Tua ko Sɔ̧ a̧ pia ɗoŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: pa Azariya wəzege ta Hilkiya nya kawəzege ta Meshəwlam, gheŋkɛ perə ne, wəzege ta Sadok nya kawəzege ta Merayot ŋkɛ, Merayot ne, wəzege ta Ahitəwb nya te ghəa ghɛa Shala ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: diñ Asariya je ni Hilkiya, je ni Mesulam, je ni Sadog, je ni Merayod, je ni Ahitub, je waçaç ree tiñ Baa no

Francais: Adaïas, fils de Jéroham, fils de Phassur, fils de Melchias; Maasaï, fils d'Adiel, fils de Jezra, fils de Mosollam, fils de Mosollamith, fils d'Emmer;
Anglais: And Adaiah the son of Jeroham, the son of Pashur, the son of Malchijah, and Maasiai the son of Adiel, the son of Jahzerah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Meshillemith, the son of Immer;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Adaya goora vi Yeroham, goora vi Paskur, goora vi Malkiya; Mayesay, goora vi Adiyel, goora vi Yahzera, goora vi Mesullam, goora vi Mesilemit, goora vi Immer,
Bulu: Adaya fe a mbe été, bimvame bié bi mbe môé na. Yerôam Pasehur a Malkia; Masayi fe a mbe été, bimvame bié bi too môé na: Adiel, Yazéra, Mésulalam, Misilémit a Imér.
Guiziga: Mekelemeye i Adaya, dideˀ naŋhay i ti: Yeroˀam, Pasehur ati Malkiya, yo waɗ Masay mangal ngi Adiyel, Adiyel mangal ngi Yazera, Yazera mangal ngi Mesulam, Mesulam mangal ngi Mesilemit, Miseleme i mangal ngi Imer.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Non boo Adaya ɓii Yeroham ɓii Pashuuru ɓii Malkiya e Ma'asay ɓii Adiyel ɓii Yahasera ɓii Mesullam ɓii Mesillemit ɓii Immer
Fulfulde_DC: Non boo Adaya ɓii Yeroham ɓii Pashuuru ɓii Malkiya e Ma'asay ɓii Adiyel ɓii Yahasera ɓii Mesullam ɓii Mesillemit ɓii Immer
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Adaya bem ko Yeroam, bem ko Pasɛhur, bem ko Malkia, in Masai bem ko Adiɛl, bem ko Yazɛra, bem ko Mɛsulam, bem ko Mɛsilɛmit, bem ko Imɛr pia ɗoŋ mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Adaya bem ko Yeroam, bem ko Pasɛhur, bem ko Malkia, in Masai bem ko Adiɛl, bem ko Yazɛra, bem ko Mɛsulam, bem ko Mɛsilɛmit, bem ko Imɛr pia ɗoŋ mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha Adaya wəzege ta Yerowam, nya kawəzege ta Pashehəwr, nya kawəzege ta Malkiya perə. Ɓiyitsa, tagha Masay wəzege ta Adiyɛl nya kawəzege ta Yazɛra, wəzege ta Meshəwlam, wəzege ta Meshilɛmit nya kawəzege ta Imɛr.
Tupurri: diñ Adaya je ni Yeroham, je ni Pashur, je ni Malkiya no diñ Maesay je ni Adiyel, je ni Yahsera, je ni Mesulam, je ni Mesilemid, je ni Imern

Francais: et leurs frères, chefs de leurs maisons patriarcales: mille sept cent soixante hommes vaillants, pour l'oeuvre du service de la maison de Dieu.
Anglais: And their brethren, heads of the house of their fathers, a thousand and seven hundred and threescore; very able men for the work of the service of the house of God.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hiɗi ɓosiyosina, sa ŋulona vi jafna visiya, nisi pet birim kep kalam kis-siɗiya hiɗi diram dok-karkiya. Sum sa nagayna, sa ka hay lopna vun ziyda vi Lawna.
Bulu: Eyoñ wo late betuni bevok bivete bite ya menda me bôt bi mbe toyini, mintete zamgbwa a bôte mewôm mesaman, bese be too biwôlô bi bôt bia bo ésaé ya nda Zambe.
Guiziga: Taŋ jom ati sukum taŋ masayaya, mizli mekelemey magam mikuli, mizli miwirwirey gambarahay magam slra ar hay Buymisemuŋ a Zeruzalem, buyoy ngi hayay a wuzla muy taŋhaya tayna, a gam jom gar, mizli durmuk ti skat skat tarnaˀ ti kukur merkeɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e banndiraaɓe maɓɓe, baaba-ci'e'en ujineere e teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo e cappanɗe njoweego (1.760), ɓe worɓe waawɓe kuugal haa haykaliiru Allah.
Fulfulde_DC: e banndiraaɓe maɓɓe, baaba-ci'e'en ujineere e teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo e cappanɗe njoweego (1.760), ɓe worɓe waawɓe kuugal haa haykaliiru Allah.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O gasawi nutua in o nya-wa lɛŋ nɛ́ bíí booro-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-zua-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk. Wa lɛŋ nɛ́ o kpasa wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O gasawi nutua in o nya-wa lɛŋ nɛ́ bíí booro-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-zua-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk. Wa lɛŋ nɛ́ o kpasa wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma zlaɓe le kweci ka dzeghe Shala ne, 1.760 hɛ pɛtɛa nci kambeli nyi nza zləvə te nyi kemene slene mbe ghɛa Shala.
Tupurri: wo de heçeçre äaara wañre ma ti feelen wo. AÀ wo äuy ndar ti äe kiskis renam de jar do hiira'a, wo äuy diñ jar ma de kaçaçge ti joñre ma äil tiñ Baa no.

Francais: Des lévites: Séméïa, fils de Hassub, fils d'Ezricam, fils d'Hasébia, des fils de Mérari;
Anglais: And of the Levites; Shemaiah the son of Hasshub, the son of Azrikam, the son of Hashabiah, of the sons of Merari;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa Levitna: Semayeya, goora vi Hasub, goora vi Azrikam, goora vi Hasabya, gurona vi Merari;
Bulu: Belévit be mbe na: Semaéya, bimvame bié bi to na: Hasub Azrikam a Hakabia ya abume Merari;
Guiziga: A wuzla Levihey i Semaya, dideˀ naŋ mijeŋŋehey i ti: Hasup, Azirikam waɗ Hasabiya. A wuzla muy ngi Merarihey,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder Lewi'en Sema'ya ɓii Hassuba ɓii Azrikam ɓii Hasabiya mo danygol Meraari
Fulfulde_DC: Nder Lewi'en Sema'ya ɓii Hassuba ɓii Azrikam ɓii Hasabiya mo danygol Meraari
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ zuduk ko Levii nɛ́ Sɛmaya bem ko Hasub, bem ko Azrikam, bem ko Hasabia a̧ pia ɗoŋ. A̧ so nɛ́ bíí nú-gara ko Mɛrari.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ zuduk ko Levii nɛ́ Sɛmaya bem ko Hasub, bem ko Azrikam, bem ko Hasabia a̧ pia ɗoŋ. A̧ so nɛ́ bíí nú-gara ko Mɛrari.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma hwa ka Lɛvi, tagha Shemaya wəzege ta Hashəwb nya kawəzege ta Azrikam, wəzege ta Hashabiya, kwa yita ta Merari.
Tupurri: Yoo jar Lefid wo diñ: Semaeya, je ni Hasud, je ni Asrikam, je ni Hasabiya, je ni Merari no

Francais: Bacbacar, Hérès, Galal, Matthania, fils de Micha, fils de Zéchri, fils d'Asaph;
Anglais: And Bakbakkar, Heresh, and Galal, and Mattaniah the son of Mica, the son of Zichri, the son of Asaph;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bakbakar; Heres; Galal; Mattaniya, goora vi Mikka, goora vi Zikri, goora vi Asaf;
Bulu: Bakbakar, Hérék, Galal a Matania fe be mbe Belévit bimvame biap bi too Mika, Zikri a Asaf;
Guiziga: i Bakbakar, Herek, Galal waɗ Mataniya, dideˀ naŋhay i ti: Mika, Zikri waɗ Asaf.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Bakbakkar e Heeres e Galal e Mattaniya ɓii Mika ɓii Zikiri ɓii Asaf
Fulfulde_DC: e Bakbakkar e Heeres e Galal e Mattaniya ɓii Mika ɓii Zikiri ɓii Asaf
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bakbakar, Hɛrɛs, Galal in Matania bem ko Mika, bem ko Zikri, bem ko Asaf pia ɗoŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bakbakar, Hɛrɛs, Galal in Matania bem ko Mika, bem ko Zikri, bem ko Asaf pia ɗoŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha Bakbakar, Hɛrɛsh, Galal le Mataniya nya kawəzege ta Mika nya kawəzege ta Zikri, wəzege ta Asaf.
Tupurri: diñ Bakbakar, Heres, Galal, Mataniya je ni Mise, je ni Sikri, je ni Asaf no

Francais: Obdia, fils de Séméïa, fils de Galal, fils d'Idithun; Barachia, fils d'Asa, fils d'Elcana, qui habitait dans les villages de Nétophatiens.
Anglais: And Obadiah the son of Shemaiah, the son of Galal, the son of Jeduthun, and Berechiah the son of Asa, the son of Elkanah, that dwelt in the villages of the Netophathites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Abdiyas goora vi Semayeya, goora vi Galal, goora vi Yedutun; Berekiya, goora vi Asa, goora vi Elkana, ma ka musi hay nagata vi sum sa Netofana.
Bulu: Obadia fe a mbe Lévite, bimvame bié bi too: Semaya, Galal a Yedutun, lévit a suʼulan a mbe Bérékia e mone Asa, ndaé Elkana, a nga too éfuse si é mbe éjôé ya tisone Netôfa si.
Guiziga: Yo Obadiya ada ma, dideˀ naŋhay i ti: Semaya, Galal waɗ Yedutumŋ. Ngi kiɗa mi naŋ i Berekiya mangal ngi Asa, i dideˀ meciɗek ngi Elkana misi micifi ar prok ngi ruwuy Netofa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Obadiya ɓii Sema'ya ɓii Galal ɓii Yedutuun e Berekiya ɓii Asa ɓii Elkaana, mo jooɗi nder gure Netofa'en.
Fulfulde_DC: e Obadiya ɓii Sema'ya ɓii Galal ɓii Yedutuun e Berekiya ɓii Asa ɓii Elkaana, mo jooɗi nder gure Netofa'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Obadia bem ko Sɛmaya, bem ko Galal, bem ko Yedutun in Berekia bem ko Asa, bem ko Ɛlkana nɛ̀ ɔɔ so tɛ o ye ko o be Nɛtɔfa pia ɗoŋ mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Obadia bem ko Sɛmaya, bem ko Galal, bem ko Yedutun in Berekia bem ko Asa, bem ko Ɛlkana nɛ̀ ɔɔ so tɛ o ye ko o be Nɛtɔfa pia ɗoŋ mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ɓiyitsa perə, tagha Obadiya wəzege ta Shemaya nya kawəzege ta Galal, wəzege ta Yedəwtəwn ba'a kakwa keɗaŋe, Bɛrɛkiya wəzege ta Asa ba'a shia Ɛlkana nya kese kanza te hɛɗi nya sleke Netofa.
Tupurri: diñ Abdiyas je ni Semaeya, je ni Galal, je ni Yedutun no diñ Berekiya je ni Asa, je ni Elkana maga hay de tiñ äi leege mani jar Netofan wo mono.

Francais: Et les portiers: Sellum, Accub, Telmon, Ahiman, et leurs frères; Sellum était le chef,
Anglais: And the porters were, Shallum, and Akkub, and Talmon, and Ahiman, and their brethren: Shallum was the chief;
