Bulu: Nye ba David be nga too Pas-Damin, e vôme Befilisteñ be nga sulan asu mewosan. Efuse si éziñ é mbe été é too njalan a fôn, a bôt be nga tube Befilisteñ.
Guiziga: Filistihey micikilam ngi kiɗa vu a Pas-Damim, Israyeley mikilam taŋ na, naɓa naŋ da a ciki Davite. Guva ngi daw giziŋ ada akẽh.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kaŋko o wonduno bee Daawuda haa Pas-Damiima, nde Filisti'en mooɓi ton ngam haɓre. Woodi ton tayre ngesa heewnde sa'iiruuri. Yimɓe ndoggi yeeso Filisti'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Kaŋko o wonduno bee Daawuda haa Pas-Damiima, nde Filisti'en mooɓi ton ngam haɓre. Woodi ton tayre ngesa heewnde sa'iiruuri. Yimɓe ndoggi yeeso Filisti'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛ̀ nɛ́ à̧ á̧ duka so in David sɛn Pas-Damin, ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o be Filistii mɔi̧a so nɛ̀ ŋmaa hi̧i̧ wen biro. O wi-biro  Israɛl  pɛsa yu mɔ yak ti o be Filistii. Ŋma fɔ alkamaari duka so hi̧i̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛ̀ nɛ́ à̧ á̧ duka so in David sɛn Pas-Damin, ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o be Filistii mɔi̧a so nɛ̀ ŋmaa hi̧i̧ wen biro. O wi-biro  Israɛl  pɛsa yu mɔ yak ti o be Filistii. Ŋma fɔ alkamaari duka so hi̧i̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Gheŋkɛ nde se le David kwa Pas-Damim te və nya tsenete geva ka Filisti yitea mpa. Ntake ka sewajɛa ka Israyɛl kahwɛ mbe kema ta nci. Le kwete shɛ wəvea megi kwa.
Tupurri: Hay wo wer Dafid Pas-Damin, ti ngeel maga jar Filisteçeç hay tay wo le ni ma durgi mo na diñ se. Ngeel po hay we ni kab de coore orje äili, day jar Israyel hay lag wo de ëeere do jar Filisteçeç wo.

Francais: Ils se placèrent au milieu du champ, le défendirent et battirent les Philistins; et Yahweh opéra une grande délivrance.
Anglais: And they set themselves in the midst of that parcel, and delivered it, and slew the Philistines; and the  Lord  saved them by a great deliverance.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi lak kulo jar sinena, nisi sli sinena, nisi ci sa Filistina. Ma-Vatɗina li butta-goyta ŋolo hay na'ta.
Bulu: Nde be nga tebe tetele ézezañe ya éfuse si te, a beta nyoñe je, a bôé Befilisteñ. A Nti a nga kôté be beta nkôtan .
Guiziga: Elazar ati mizli naŋhay a cicam a wuzla guva, a kurusaka guva kuras kuras, a kiɗaka Filistiheye. Buymisemuŋ a vula bugawla madiɗa le da Israyele.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa Eli'azaaru bee yimɓe mum ndari caka tayre ngesa man, ɓe kisni nde, ɓe njaali Filisti'en. Bana nii Jawmiraawo heɓni Isra'iila'en jaalorgal maŋngal.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa Eli'azaaru bee yimɓe mum ndari caka tayre ngesa man, ɓe kisni nde, ɓe njaali Filisti'en. Bana nii Jawmiraawo heɓni Isra'iila'en jaalorgal maŋngal.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Eleazar in o bíí kɔ‘i hu̧sa̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ndak o be Filistii kum nɛ̀ wa a nù. GASA WAN dee ha̧ wa mɛ gbin biro wese'i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Eleazar in o bíí kɔ‘i hu̧sa̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ndak o be Filistii kum nɛ̀ wa a nù. GASA WAN dee ha̧ wa mɛ gbin biro wese'i.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa yɛ Ɛlazar le mbelia ŋkɛ nzanji te tepe ta wəvea shɛ, pa hɛ kelehwe kampəmte ka Filisti. Nahe Mahwətə kendeke nda hərə ŋkwa zlahe ke ka Israyɛl tagha.
Tupurri: Saara raw lagge äil ngeel se kab ni deñ deñ, yaçaç wo ne go day äum wo jar Filisteçeç wo. Manwur yaçaç jar go ni debañ.

Francais: Trois d'entre les trente capitaines descendirent auprès de David sur le rocher, à la caverne d'Odollam, tandis que le camp des Philistins était dressé dans la vallée des Réphaïm.
Anglais: Now three of the thirty captains went down to the rock to David, into the cave of Adullam; and the host of the Philistines encamped in the valley of Rephaim.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa ŋulon ɦidi jar dok-ɦidina jik kulo tam David kay hiɗiyta, kay zul-hiɗiyta vi Adullam, hay li ma kaŋŋa vi sa Filistina ka tuni hay lokŋa vi Refayim.
Bulu: Ane bilale ya bivete mewôm mela bi nga sis a ke be David akôm, e mbas akoʼo yʼAdulam été, éyoñe nkane Befilisteñ ô nga tele mbiʼili Berefayim.
Guiziga: Ti di numuŋ ada na, buyoy makir a wuzla mizli ngir makireye, a so lumaka Davite, naŋ ar mandazlay muwã migweˀ avu butum a Adulam, asi mizli filistihey a pam walahay guɗuk le ar sozo ngi mizli Refahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Tato nder honooɓe semmbiɗɓe cappanɗe tato ndiirti, ngari haa Daawuda haa lowol Adullam nder tapaare. Jama'aare Filisti'en ɗon saŋngini nder waadiwol Refayim.
Fulfulde_DC: Tato nder honooɓe semmbiɗɓe cappanɗe tato ndiirti, ngari haa Daawuda haa lowol Adullam nder tapaare. Jama'aare Filisti'en ɗon saŋngini nder waadiwol Refayim.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋma wese, o ŋma bíí taar mgbara o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-taar zira pi̧i̧ tɛ David zu ta ká̧ di̧i̧ ko Adulam ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o be Filistii baa nɛ̀ gbagari kɔ‘i kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ ko o be Refaim.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋma wese, o ŋma bíí taar mgbara o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-taar zira pi̧i̧ tɛ David zu ta ká̧ di̧i̧ ko Adulam ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o be Filistii baa nɛ̀ gbagari kɔ‘i kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ ko o be Refaim.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te kwete hɛ, mahekene kweci hwa mbelia jama nyi mahekenemsə lə kadzete keleɓa yitea David terasle yitea gezlɛŋəa Adəwlam, kwa nza nde ghedəkwəa ka Filisti ya shɛ kwa zlərəa ka Refay.
Tupurri: Jar po wo swa' yoo wañre ma do swa'n raw wo woge see Dafid ti huli äi rum huuli ma Adulamn de maga jar Filisteçeç hay wo de kañge äil log mani jar Refayim wo mono.

Francais: David était alors dans la forteresse, et il y avait un poste de Philistins à Bethléem.
Anglais: And David was then in the hold, and the Philistines' garrison was then at Beth–lehem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay na'ta David ay hay hoyok-ziy ma donona, vok-ma-duura vi sa Filistina hena ka tuni hay Betlehem.
Bulu: David a mbe Ôlem éyoñe te, a Befilisteñ be mbe be too e Bétléhém.
Guiziga: Naɓa Davit a ro ɗum ar li mugun gun kuy kuy. Yo buy miwi li ngi Filistihey ada a Betelyeme.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saa'i man Daawuda ɗon haa hisrude, Filisti'en aynooɓe ɗon haa Baytilaama.
Fulfulde_DC: Saa'i man Daawuda ɗon haa hisrude, Filisti'en aynooɓe ɗon haa Baytilaama.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: David a̧a̧ fara hu̧sa̧-a̧ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ ká ŋma fara-pɛm-mɔ ko o be Filistii a̧a̧ so sɛn Bɛtlɛhɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: David a̧a̧ fara hu̧sa̧-a̧ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ ká ŋma fara-pɛm-mɔ ko o be Filistii a̧a̧ so sɛn Bɛtlɛhɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma David ne, te ŋkwa kewəfərə ta ŋkɛ nya nza zli yite ŋkɛ, ama kwa Bɛtelɛhɛm kwete wəvəsəa ka Filisti.
Tupurri: Dafid hay de sen naäil kor ma de eegre kiñkiñ no, day sode jar Filisteçeç wo mbag hay wo we de lagge Betlehem.

Francais: David eut un désir, et il dit: " Qui me fera boire de l'eau de la citerne qui est à la porte de Bethléem? "
Anglais: And David longed, and said, Oh that one would give me drink of the water of the well of Beth–lehem, that is at the gate!
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: David ka di ala: Niy ma ka hay kaata hay vun Betlehem sa ma min garantiya kay nan ma cumu mi gige?
Bulu: Ane David a nga liti nkômban éziñ a jô na: Za a ye nyuu ma mendim me ne anjeñ é ne e mbé ya Bétléhém?
Guiziga: Davite, may gwat a jaŋ gurjik, a ɓi: «Yam misi ar futuŋ misi a mizlingre ngi Betelyem na, masiy di ɓa i si i waka?»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Daawuda yeli, wi'i: “Moy yarnatammi ndiyam ɓulndu wonndu haa dammugal Baytilaama?”
Fulfulde_DC: Daawuda yeli, wi'i: “Moy yarnatammi ndiyam ɓulndu wonndu haa dammugal Baytilaama?”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: David taa mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Nɛ́ o'o tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ɗu gɔna-yì nɛ̀ a̧a̧ sɛn nú garo Bɛtlɛhɛm ha̧‘m nɔ o?»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: David taa mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Nɛ́ o'o tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ɗu gɔna-yì nɛ̀ a̧a̧ sɛn nú garo Bɛtlɛhɛm ha̧‘m nɔ o?»
Kapsiki_DC: Pa David menete kwete zəzə te ŋkwa shɛnyɛ, ma ke: «Wa nde tesa ɗa yɛmə nya kwa weta nya wəba nya mɛa degha ta Bɛtelɛhɛm tse wa?»
Tupurri: Dafid raw ëiggi day gano: Wose wo yañ le ëa bii ma jooge me äi gutug ma jag feele Betlehem la?

Francais: Aussitôt les trois hommes, passant au travers du camp des Philistins, puisèrent de l'eau de la citerne qui est à la porte de Bethléem. Ils la prirent et l'apportèrent à David; mais David ne voulut pas la boire, et il en fit une libation à Yahweh, en disant:
Anglais: And the three brake through the host of the Philistines, and drew water out of the well of Beth–lehem, that was by the gate, and took it, and brought it to David: but David would not drink of it, but poured it out to the  Lord ,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki kay nala sum sa ɦidina jik hay kaŋŋa vi sa Filistin dono'o, nisi go niy ma hay kaata ta ka vun Betlehem, nisi mar niy namna mi David; may David min ci niy namnaɗi, nam yamam goy ɗifini vok ir Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: Nde bôte bete belaa be nga tulan e minkane Befilisteñ a laé mendime ya anjeñ é ne e mbé ya Bétléhém. Be nga soo me a ve me David; ve David a nji kômbô nyu me a sôé ôsu Nti,
Guiziga: Dar buy mimakirey tuwa, a cam ti gidaŋ ng'ar walahay guɗuk ngi Filistiheye. A nuwoko yam misi ar futuŋ ngi mizlingre ngi Betelyem tuwa, a soko di, a vulaka da Divite, amma buy Davite a ngum si naŋ ta, a pusla a ruwuy ti slimiɗ ngi Bumbulvuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Suusɓe tato man nasti caka saŋngeere Filisti'en, nyeɗi ndiyam ɓulndu haa dammugal Baytilaama, ngaddi ɗam haa Daawuda. Ammaa Daawuda sali yarugo ɗam. O rufi ɗam, ɗam laati dokkal ngam Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: Suusɓe tato man nasti caka saŋngeere Filisti'en, nyeɗi ndiyam ɓulndu haa dammugal Baytilaama, ngaddi ɗam haa Daawuda. Ammaa Daawuda sali yarugo ɗam. O rufi ɗam, ɗam laati dokkal ngam Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ŋgaŋa-wi nɔ‘i taar'i gbaa war gbo nɛ̀ kɔ̧ gbagari ko o be Filistii, nɛ́ɛ̀ ɗu yì kɔ̧ gɔna-yì nú garo Bɛtlɛhɛm, ɓɛɛ wa ba sinɛ ɗoŋ ha̧ David. David nɔ so yì‘i na, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛn a nù ha̧ GASA WAN,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ŋgaŋa-wi nɔ‘i taar'i gbaa war gbo nɛ̀ kɔ̧ gbagari ko o be Filistii, nɛ́ɛ̀ ɗu yì kɔ̧ gɔna-yì nú garo Bɛtlɛhɛm, ɓɛɛ wa ba sinɛ ɗoŋ ha̧ David. David nɔ so yì‘i na, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛn a nù ha̧ GASA WAN,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ɓiyitsa gɛ, pa mbeli nyi mahekene nyighɛ dzawanji laka ghedəkwəa ka Filisti le berete, gəve yɛmə nya kwa ŋkwa ketsene yɛmə nya mɛa degha ta Bɛtelɛhɛm. Pa hɛ keleke yɛməa shɛ ba'a ndeke nda ŋkɛ ke David. Ama kese ŋkɛ kasa we, pa ŋkɛ ndeke nda ŋkɛ ke Mahwətə laka ɓasle ŋkɛ te hɛɗi.
Tupurri: Jar se ma swa'n la raw wo laage de wañ yoo sode jar Filisteçeçn wo, ëa wo bii le go äi gutug ma jag feele Betlehem no. Saara raw age de äe, haçn wo ne Dafidi. AÀma se la jooge äe gaa, kal kaage äe go gesiñ pel Manwur do fen sii jag nono.

Francais: "Que mon Dieu me garde de faire cela! Boirais-je le sang de ces hommes avec leur vie? Car c'est au péril de leur vie qu'ils l'ont apportée. " Et il ne voulut pas la boire. Voilà ce que firent ces trois braves.
Anglais: And said, My God forbid it me, that I should do this thing: shall I drink the blood of these men that have put their lives in jeopardy? for with the jeopardy of their lives they brought it. Therefore he would not drink it. These things did these three mightiest.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam di'e: Lawna van hinan li nalaɗige. Sum sa vul irita visi vun mitta nan as ci busuwna visi ɗawn citige? Kay niy namna nisi maram kayni nisi tunum goy mi mitsiya. Nala nam min ci niy namna loɗi. Kayni mi va sum nisin sa jufayn sa ɦidina lumna.
Bulu: a jô na: Nti a Kamaʼane ma na me bo te bo avale jame te! Ye ma yiane nyu metyi ya bôte ba mbe be nga ke mfaʼa ya jañele ényiñe jap: amu ba te soo mendim mete a ntañ ya ényiñe jap. Ajô te a nji kômbô nyu me. E jame biwôlô bi bôte bite bilaa bi nga bo nde le.
Guiziga: A ɓi: «Da i sa yam hana le na, anja Buymisemuŋ ɗu a puriy ka mbur malambaˀ wãˀ. Ɓa i sa pumbus ngi mizli muvulaka hirnga taŋ taˀ da muc na sukwa? Asi ara nuwoko di, taˀ hirnga taŋ da mucu!» Dar a ngum si naŋ ta. Gwat bugawlahay mimakir migaka na, i hana so.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O wi'i: “Allah am haɗammi waɗugo irin ɗu'um! Kadi mi yara ƴiiƴam worɓe ɓe'e na? Ngam ɓe kasdi koo maayugo ngam waddango yam ndiyam man.” Ngam maajum o sali yarugo ɗam. Bana nii kuuɗe suusɓe tato ɓe'e mba'i.
Fulfulde_DC: O wi'i: “Allah am haɗammi waɗugo irin ɗu'um! Kadi mi yara ƴiiƴam worɓe ɓe'e na? Ngam ɓe kasdi koo maayugo ngam waddango yam ndiyam man.” Ngam maajum o sali yarugo ɗam. Bana nii kuuɗe suusɓe tato ɓe'e mba'i.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «GASA WAN a̧ dór am tɛ dee mɔ hegɔ. Yì'ɛ nɛ́ tɔk-tɛ o bíí nɛ̀ ee tɛ tɛ fio!» Ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔ̧ mɛ nɔ yì‘i na. Mɔ nɛ̀ o ŋgaŋa-wi nɔ‘i taar'i dea nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «GASA WAN a̧ dór am tɛ dee mɔ hegɔ. Yì'ɛ nɛ́ tɔk-tɛ o bíí nɛ̀ ee tɛ tɛ fio!» Ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔ̧ mɛ nɔ yì‘i na. Mɔ nɛ̀ o ŋgaŋa-wi nɔ‘i taar'i dea nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke David: «Shala ta ɗa, hweŋkwa va 'ya kasa yɛməa shɛ we! Nahe ŋkɛ kenza kala mimia mbeli nyi kelə kezha gə ŋkɛ nyi mbasa mbasa kezamte mpia nci.» Pa ŋkɛ ɗema sa yɛməa shɛ. Wa nya tsetse wəsə nya menete ka katsala kɛfi nyi mahekenea shɛhɛ.
Tupurri: Se day gano: Daga Baa mo men ndi joñ sen wa! Ndi joo ci jar se maga haç wo tenen äaara go na jooge la? Gahaçyla, aà haç wo tenen äaara go ma woge le ëa bii no. Dafid day jooge äe gaè. Mona diñ fen maga jar se swa'n hay joñn wo mono.

Francais: Abisaï, frère de Joab, était chef des Trois; il brandit sa lance contre trois cents hommes et les tua, et il eut du renom parmi les trois.
Anglais: And Abishai the brother of Joab, he was chief of the three: for lifting up his spear against three hundred, he slew them, and had a name among the three.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Abiskay ɓasum Yowabna, nam tuni vok sum sa ɦidina, namu mi ma weɗ kawayta valam kay sumun kis-ɦidi cisi goyna, selem tiy jar sum sa ɦidina.
Bulu: Abisayi, monyañe Yôab a mbe nlô ya be belaa. Nye a nga samese akoñe dé e nyôle bôte mintete mila a wôé be, nde a nga wum e zañe be belaa.
Guiziga: Abisay sukum ngi Zoˀapa, i buy ngi mizli mimakir tayna. Mududuɓa ziwit ng'ar mizli skat skat makir, mikiɗa taŋ vagay vagay na, i naŋ vuna. Amma slimiɗ nga naŋ, naŋ a wuzla mizli mimakirey na ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Abisay deerɗiraawo Yo'ab woni hooreejo suusɓe tato man. O mbari konne'en teemeɗɗe tato bee labbo maako. O heɓi innde caka suusɓe tato,
Fulfulde_DC: Abisay deerɗiraawo Yo'ab woni hooreejo suusɓe tato man. O mbari konne'en teemeɗɗe tato bee labbo maako. O heɓi innde caka suusɓe tato,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ Abisai nya Jɔab a̧ duka so gasawi ko o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-taar; nɛ́ à̧ á̧ bìì so o bíí gɔmŋmaa-taar nɛ̀ kpɔk sɛ́ɛ̀ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ nin-a hur mgbara o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-taar .
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ Abisai nya Jɔab a̧ duka so gasawi ko o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-taar; nɛ́ à̧ á̧ bìì so o bíí gɔmŋmaa-taar nɛ̀ kpɔk sɛ́ɛ̀ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ nin-a hur mgbara o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-taar .
Kapsiki_DC: Abishay, wəza meghekɛa Zhowab ya te ghəa wəvəsəa mbeli nyi mahekene nyighɛ. Gheŋkɛ nde kafete megha yitea ka ghema gwəmsə mahekene kampəmte hɛ. Pa zləvəa ŋkɛ dzemtenyɛ hwa wəvəsəa mbeli nyi mahekene nyighɛ.
Tupurri: Abisay hen Jowabn hay pel jar se swa'n wo. Hay naa manjaw go ti jar kiskis swa'a, day sor ra go na diñ se, se raw ra ëu yoo jar ma swa'n wo.

Francais: Il était le plus considéré de la seconde triade, et il fut leur chef; mais il n'égala pas les trois premiers.
Anglais: Of the three, he was more honourable than the two; for he was their captain: howbeit he attained not to the first three.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam fi gajijit ŋolo jar sum sa ɦidina vi vok ma mul ma'na, nam muɗ mi ma ŋolla kaw. May sum sa ɦidina sa jewna nam may ŋra hiɗi nisiɗi.
Bulu: E be belaa, nye a nga dañe nyoñe duma a bo évete jap, ve a nji kui ba belale ya ôsu.
Guiziga: A ɗuvakaŋ hirnga da naŋ makaw cuw fineˀ mekelemey mucuw na, a cifi buy taŋ, taŋ mimakir ar ngay taŋ na, ko mbur mindilaŋ anta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: o ɓurdi ɓe tedduŋgal cowi ɗiɗi, haa o laati hooreejo maɓɓe. Ammaa o yottaaki darnde suusɓe tato go.
Fulfulde_DC: o ɓurdi ɓe tedduŋgal cowi ɗiɗi, haa o laati hooreejo maɓɓe. Ammaa o yottaaki darnde suusɓe tato go.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa tu̧u̧ tɛ-a gan o bíí ɓu-taar. A̧ duka gasawi kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ nyɛm ŋmaa in o ŋgaŋa-wi taar na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa tu̧u̧ tɛ-a gan o bíí ɓu-taar. A̧ duka gasawi kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ nyɛm ŋmaa in o ŋgaŋa-wi taar na.
Kapsiki_DC: Gheŋkɛ yanza zləvə te za ma ke kweci mbeli nyi bake, pa zhɛrenyɛ kameghea nci. Wəndə keyipə geva shɛ le mbe wəvəsəa mbeli nyi mahekene nyighɛ we.
Tupurri: Yoo jar se ma de swa' ma de äogn wo mono, aè hay togoëge äe day se hay diñ wañ äaara, ane se day jar ma swa' tañgun wo go gaè.

Francais: Banaïas, fils de Joïada, fils d'un homme vaillant et riche en exploits, de Cabséel. Il frappa les deux ariels de Moab. Il descendit et frappa le lion au milieu de la citerne un jour de neige.
Anglais: Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, the son of a valiant man of Kabzeel, who had done many acts; he slew two lionlike men of Moab: also he went down and slew a lion in a pit in a snowy day.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Benaya, goora vi Yehoyada, nam mi goora vi sa ma manjufu ma li slen ŋolo, sa ma hay Kabseel, namu mi ma cal zlon ma' hay Mowab, namu ma jik gaa hay kaata, cal zlon kep gaa hay kaata, hay buur ma niyn ka si'e.
Bulu: Benaya, e mone Yehôyada, a mbe e mon éwôlô môt é nga bo abui mewosan, môte ya Kabseel. Nye a nga wôé bʼAriél bebaé ya Môab, Nye a nga sis a wôé ngbwengbwem anjeñe zañ. Metaʼa me nga ku abui môs ôte.
Guiziga: Benaya, mbur Kapseyel, mangal ngi Yoyada, i dideˀ meciɗek ngi mbur miwirwir ar vurum, a gi gwat mezlehey le haɗi. Mikiɗa bugawla Moˀapay mucuw na, i naŋ. Mipi sar ngi kiɗa mobor ar futuŋ, ar hin ngi yam mapawa ada buk buk na, i naŋ vuna ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Benaya ɓii Yoyada mo Kabseyel, o cemmbiɗɗo, o huuwi kuuɗe mawɗe ɗuuɗɗe. O mbari ɓiɓɓe Ariyel Mo'abiijo ɗiɗo. Nyannde feere nde mallimallooje toɓi, o jippi nder ɓulndu o mbari mbarooga ton.
Fulfulde_DC: Benaya ɓii Yoyada mo Kabseyel, o cemmbiɗɗo, o huuwi kuuɗe mawɗe ɗuuɗɗe. O mbari ɓiɓɓe Ariyel Mo'abiijo ɗiɗo. Nyannde feere nde mallimallooje toɓi, o jippi nder ɓulndu o mbari mbarooga ton.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bɛnaya bem ko Yehoyada be Kabsɛl nɛ́ ŋma ŋgaŋa-wi nɛ̀ dee o mɔ nɛ̀ dɔka-a. Nɛ́ à̧ á̧ gbɛɛ so o ŋgaŋa-wi Mɔab yiitoo a nù, nɛ́ à̧ á̧ gbɛɛ so dila kɔ̧ gɔna-yì wese gasa ɓɔrɔ;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bɛnaya bem ko Yehoyada be Kabsɛl nɛ́ ŋma ŋgaŋa-wi nɛ̀ dee o mɔ nɛ̀ dɔka-a. Nɛ́ à̧ á̧ gbɛɛ so o ŋgaŋa-wi Mɔab yiitoo a nù, nɛ́ à̧ á̧ gbɛɛ so dila kɔ̧ gɔna-yì wese gasa ɓɔrɔ;
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe Benaya, nde Kabsɛyɛl nya kawəzege ta Yoyada, nya kakatsala sewajɛ, kemene meyidala kwele kwele. Gheŋkɛ nde mpəmte ka sewajɛ nyi ghyana ghyana bake mbe Mowab. Gheŋkɛa shɛ nde dzawa kapeslekɛ nivɛrə kwa yitea weta yɛmə hwa kwacakelɛ nya dzawe.
Tupurri: Benaya, je sir Kabseeln hay diñ weel jobo ma de eegre maga hay joñ feçeçre werpiiri wo debañ, hay taw Ariyel ma äog ma ti sir Mowab wo go na diñ se. Hay cwaa wo äi gutugi, day ii mingir wo ni ti wur maga gedembar  de le'ge na diñ se.

Francais: Il frappa un Égyptien d'une stature de cinq coudées; et dans la main de l'Égyptien, il y avait une lance semblable à une ensouple de tisserand. Il descendit vers lui avec un bâton, et il arracha la lance de la main de l'Égyptien et le frappa de sa propre lance.
Anglais: And he slew an Egyptian, a man of great stature, five cubits high; and in the Egyptian's hand was a spear like a weaver's beam; and he went down to him with a staff, and plucked the spear out of the Egyptian's hand, and slew him with his own spear.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Namu mi ma cal sa ma Egiptena ma fiyokka valam ir goldoŋ vasl, sa ma Egiptena kaway ta hay ɓalamta ɗoray ŋolo, nam kali talamu hiɗi zugulda, sli kawayt hay ɓam sa ma Egiptena, cap cum hiɗi na'a.
Bulu: Nye a nga wôé mon Ejiptieñ a too nté menyiʼi me mo metan. Mon Ejiptieñ ate a nga bili akoñ, ntyen yʼété ô too abima mbôbé ntiñe bindelé; nde a nga sis a ke wosane nye a ôlé, ve wôlé mon Ejiptieñ ate akoñe mo a wôé nye a akoñe dé.
Guiziga: Mikiɗa mbur Ezipte, suburo, migil gwat ngi metir cuw ti reta na, i naŋ vuna ma. Mbur Ezipte naŋ kaw ti ziwit migbizl kaɓa dum ngi ji caka. A kirih ng'avaŋ, a zla kiɗ naŋ ti ganday, a tiɓa ziwit naŋ, a cika ti naŋ tehhe a muŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O mbari boo Misraajo mo darnde mum waɗi meetir ɗiɗi bee reeta. Misraajo man woodi labbo haa juŋngo muuɗum, ngo tekki bana leggal cannyargal. Benaya ɓaditi mo bee sawru, jaɓti labbo haa juŋngo maako, mbari mo bee maago.
Fulfulde_DC: O mbari boo Misraajo mo darnde mum waɗi meetir ɗiɗi bee reeta. Misraajo man woodi labbo haa juŋngo muuɗum, ngo tekki bana leggal cannyargal. Benaya ɓaditi mo bee sawru, jaɓti labbo haa juŋngo maako, mbari mo bee maago.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: nɛ́ kpɔk a̧‘i mbɛt a̧ gbɛɛ so ŋma zɔm kusa be Egiptɛ. Be Egiptɛ‘i a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ gba gasa sɛ́ɛ̀ er, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ ɓira te. A̧ ɓara sɛ́ɛ̀ er be Egiptɛ‘i yinɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba tok nɛ̀ a̧ gbɛ woyo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: nɛ́ kpɔk a̧‘i mbɛt a̧ gbɛɛ so ŋma zɔm kusa be Egiptɛ. Be Egiptɛ‘i a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ gba gasa sɛ́ɛ̀ er, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ ɓira te. A̧ ɓara sɛ́ɛ̀ er be Egiptɛ‘i yinɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba tok nɛ̀ a̧ gbɛ woyo.
Kapsiki_DC: Gheŋkɛa shɛ nde peslekɛ kwete nde Ɛzhipte gare mɛtre bake gasle kwete yite biya ŋkɛ, pa megha yite dzeve ve kedekenyɛ kala sheghwə kepeɗe pawa ketsa zlave nya vəashi. Tereŋe ŋkɛ yite le geta, pa ŋkɛ zləgwəhwe megha ta ŋkɛ ba'a peslekɛ ŋkɛ le.
Tupurri: Hay ii je Ejipte maga geçeçre äe meder äog de nus go na diñ se. Manjaw po hay do je Ejipten do koo gefay mani jar äod oçoçben wo nono, se raw seege wo ne hen ti de graw do, cegaw jaw ma do je Ejipte no, 'warn go de jaw äen doga.

Francais: Voilà ce que fit Banaïas, fils de Joïada, et il eut du renom parmi les trois vaillants.
Anglais: These things did Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, and had the name among the three mighties.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni mi va ma Benaya goora vi Yehoyada lumna; selem tiya jar sum sa jufayna sa ɦidina.
Bulu: Jame Benayahu e mone Yehôyada a nga bo nde le, a a nga wum e biwôlô bi bôte bilal été.
Guiziga: Benaya mangal ngi Yoyada, gwat naŋ miga i hana so, joˀ slimiɗ naŋ a zil a wuzla ngay ngi migi vurumoy mimakir na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kanjum Benaya ɓii Yoyada waɗi. O heɓi innde bana suusɓe tato go.
Fulfulde_DC: Kanjum Benaya ɓii Yoyada waɗi. O heɓi innde bana suusɓe tato go.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɔ nɛ̀ Bɛnaya bem ko Yehoyada dea ha̧ nin-a mɛ hur nɛnɛ mgbara o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-taar nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɔ nɛ̀ Bɛnaya bem ko Yehoyada dea ha̧ nin-a mɛ hur nɛnɛ mgbara o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-taar nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi wəshi nyi menete Benaya, wəzege ta Yoyada nyi, na kevate zləvə te ghəa ŋkɛ hwa ka katsala kempa nyi mahekene nyighɛ.
Tupurri: Mo na diñ fen maga Benayahu je ni Yehoyadan joñ mono, aà hay de ra ëu yoo werpiiri ma swa' de eegren wo.

Francais: Voici qu'il était plus considéré que les trente, mais il n'égala pas les trois. David le fit membre de son conseil secret.
Anglais: Behold, he was honourable among the thirty, but attained not to the first three: and David set him over his guard.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam fi gajijit ŋol suwa jar sa dok-ɦidina, may sum sa ɦidi sa jewna nam may ŋra hiɗi nisiɗi. David vulum liyn jar sa li dakka valam ta goy ŋayayta.
Bulu: Nye a nga dañe duma e bôte mewôm melal été; ve a nji kui ba belale yʼôsu. David a nga nyoñe nye émoʼo bebôndé mefeʼe jé.
Guiziga: Slimiɗ naŋ a zil kaˀ a wuzla ngay ngi mizli mizli ngir makir na, amma a ndila ngay ngi mizli mimakirey na ta. Davit a ci di buy ngi soje mijigin naŋhay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O ɓurdi suusɓe cappanɗe tato go tedduŋgal, ammaa o yottaaki darnde suusɓe tato. Daawuda darni mo o hooreejo aynooɓe muuɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: O ɓurdi suusɓe cappanɗe tato go tedduŋgal, ammaa o yottaaki darnde suusɓe tato. Daawuda darni mo o hooreejo aynooɓe muuɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ dee ha̧ nin-a mɛ hur gan o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-taar, ɓɛɛ a̧ gan o ŋgaŋa-wi taar na. David ea a̧ mgbara o wi-pɛm-wi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ dee ha̧ nin-a mɛ hur gan o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-taar, ɓɛɛ a̧ gan o ŋgaŋa-wi taar na. David ea a̧ mgbara o wi-pɛm-wi.
Kapsiki_DC: Gheŋkɛ yaɗepe mbeli za ma hwa wəvəsəa mbeli nyi mahekenemsə. Ama keɓelahwe mbeli hwa wəvəsəa mbeli nyi mahekene nyi we. Pa David mbeɗeyi ŋkɛ kawəndə nya keya ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ hay togoëge äe debañ yoo jar ma do swa'n wo ama se day jar ma swa' tangun wo go gaè. AÀ hay yoo jar maga Dafid hay ëe rage ma äod faare nen waçaçre äen wo de äaara mono.

Francais: Hommes vaillants de l'armée: Asaël, frère de Joab; Elchanan, fils de Dodo, de Bethléem;
Anglais: Also the valiant men of the armies were, Asahel the brother of Joab, Elhanan the son of Dodo of Beth–lehem,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum segena sa jufayna sa donona: Asayel, ɓasum Yowabna, Elhanan goora vi Dodo ma Betlehemna,
Bulu: Biwôlô bi bôte bivok mbie bi: Asaél, monyañe Yôab. Elhanañ, e mone Dodo ya Bétléhém.
Guiziga: Soje miwirwirey i ti: Asabeyel sukum ngi Zoˀap, Elahaŋ mangal ngi Dodo mbur Betelyem.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Honooɓe Daawuda semmbiɗɓe ngoni: Asa'el deerɗiraawo Yo'ab e Elhanan ɓii Doodo mo Baytilaama
Fulfulde_DC: Honooɓe Daawuda semmbiɗɓe ngoni: Asa'el deerɗiraawo Yo'ab e Elhanan ɓii Doodo mo Baytilaama
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O oi ŋgaŋa wi-biro nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Asahɛl nya Jɔab, Ɛlhanaŋ bem ko Dodo be Bɛtlɛhɛm;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O oi ŋgaŋa wi-biro nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Asahɛl nya Jɔab, Ɛlhanaŋ bem ko Dodo be Bɛtlɛhɛm;
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kweci ka katsala kempa ne, yɛ: Asayɛl, wəza meghekɛa Zhowab, Ɛlanan, wəzege ta Dodo nde Bɛtelɛhɛm,
Tupurri: Werpiiri ma de eegre ma lan hay wo diñ: Asayel, hen Jowab no Elhanan je ni Dodo ma Betlehem no,

Francais: Sammoth, d'Arori; Hellès, de Phalon;
Anglais: Shammoth the Harorite, Helez the Pelonite,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sammot ma hay Haror, Helet ma hay Palonna.
Bulu: Kamôt ya Haror. Hélét ya Palôn.
Guiziga: Samot mbur Haror, Heles mbur Paloŋ,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Sammot mo Harood e Heeles mo Pelon
Fulfulde_DC: e Sammot mo Harood e Heeles mo Pelon
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Samɔt be Harɔr; Hɛlɛs be Pɛlɔŋ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Samɔt be Harɔr; Hɛlɛs be Pɛlɔŋ,
Kapsiki_DC: Shamot, nde Haror, Hɛlɛs, nde Palon,
Tupurri: Samod ma Horare, Heles ma Palon,

Francais: Hira, fils d'Accès, de Thécué; Abiéser, d'Anathot;
Anglais: Ira the son of Ikkesh the Tekoite, Abi–ezer the Anathothite,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ira goora vi Ikes, ma Tekowana, Abiyezer, ma Anatotna.
Bulu: Ira e mone Ikék ya Tekôa. Abiézer yʼAnatot.
Guiziga: Ira mangal ngi Ikek mbur Tekoˀa, Abiyezer mbur Anatot,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Iira ɓii Ikkes mo Teko'a e Abi'ezer mo Anatot
Fulfulde_DC: e Iira ɓii Ikkes mo Teko'a e Abi'ezer mo Anatot
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ira bem ko Ikɛs be Tɛkɔa; Abiɛzɛr be Anatot;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ira bem ko Ikɛs be Tɛkɔa; Abiɛzɛr be Anatot;
Kapsiki_DC: Ira, wəzege ta Ikɛsh nde Tɛkowa, Abiyɛzɛr, nde Anatot,
Tupurri: Ira je ni Ikes ma Tekowa, Abiyeser ma Anatode,

Francais: Sobbochaï, le Husathite; Ilaï, l'Ahohite;
Anglais: Sibbecai the Hushathite, Ilai the Ahohite,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sibbekay, ma Husana hay ma Ahohana,
Bulu: Sibekayi ya Husa. Ilayi yʼAhôa.
Guiziga: Siɓkay mbur Husa, Ilay mbur Ahoˀa,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Sibbekay mo Husa e Iilay mo Ahoha
Fulfulde_DC: e Sibbekay mo Husa e Iilay mo Ahoha
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sibɛkai be Husa; Ilai be Ahɔa;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sibɛkai be Husa; Ilai be Ahɔa;
Kapsiki_DC: Sibkay, nde Həwsha, Ilay, nde Ahowa,
Tupurri: Sibekay ma Husa, Ilay ma Ahowa,

Francais: Maharaï, de Nétopha; Héled, fils de Baana, de Nétopha;
Anglais: Maharai the Netophathite, Heled the son of Baanah the Netophathite,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Maharay ma Netofana. Heled goora vi Baana ma Netofana,
Bulu: Maharayi ya Nétôfa. Héléd e mone Baana ya Nétôfa.
Guiziga: Maray mbur Netofa, Heleɗ mangal ngi Baˀana, mbur Netofa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Maharay mo Netofa e Heeled ɓii Ba'ana mo Netofa
Fulfulde_DC: e Maharay mo Netofa e Heeled ɓii Ba'ana mo Netofa
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Marai be Nɛtɔfa, Hɛlɛd bem ko Bana be Nɛtɔfa mbɛt;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Marai be Nɛtɔfa, Hɛlɛd bem ko Bana be Nɛtɔfa mbɛt;
Kapsiki_DC: Maray, nde Netofa, Hɛlɛd, wəzege ta Ba'ana, nde Netofa,
Tupurri: Maharay ma Netofa, Heled je ni Baana ma Netofa,

Francais: Ethaï, fils de Ribaï, de Gabaa des fils de Benjamin; Banaïa, de Pharaton;
Anglais: Ithai the son of Ribai of Gibeah, that pertained to the children of Benjamin, Benaiah the Pirathonite,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Itay goora vi Ribay, ma hay Gibeya vi Benyaminna. Benaya, ma Piratonna,
Bulu: Itayi e mone Ribayi ya Gibéa Bebenyaminite. Benaya ya Piratan.
Guiziga: Itay mangal ngi Ribay, mbur Gibeya, misi a ruwuy Benjameŋ, Benaya mbur Piratoŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Ittay ɓii Ribay mo Gibiya nder lesdi Benyamin e Benaya mo Piraton
Fulfulde_DC: e Ittay ɓii Ribay mo Gibiya nder lesdi Benyamin e Benaya mo Piraton
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Itai bem ko Ribai be Gibea tɛ nù ko Bɛnjamin, Bɛnaya be Pirɛatɔŋ;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Itai bem ko Ribai be Gibea tɛ nù ko Bɛnjamin, Bɛnaya be Pirɛatɔŋ;
Kapsiki_DC: Itay, wəzege ta Ribay, mbe Gibɛya te hɛɗia ŋwalea Bɛnjamɛn, Benaya, nde Piraton,
Tupurri: Itay je ni Ribay ma Gibeya ti sir Benjame Benaya ma Piratone,

Francais: Huraï, des vallées de Gaas; Abiel, d'Araba; Azmaveth, de Bauram; Eliaba, de Salabon;
Anglais: Hurai of the brooks of Gaash, Abiel the Arbathite,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Huray ma Nahale-Gaasna, Abiyel ma Arabana.
Bulu: Hurayi ya Nahalé-Gaas. Abiél ya Araba.
Guiziga: Huray mbur ngir sozo Gaˀak, Abiyel mbur Bet-Araba,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Huuray iwɗo waadiiji Ga'as e Abiyel mo Araba
Fulfulde_DC: e Huuray iwɗo waadiiji Ga'as e Abiyel mo Araba
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hurai be ká̧ zaŋ Gas, Abiɛl be Arbat;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hurai be ká̧ zaŋ Gas, Abiɛl be Arbat;
Kapsiki_DC: Həwray nya dekwede yitea hələa Ga'ash, Abiyɛl nde Bɛt-Araba,
Tupurri: Huray ma Nahale-Gaase, Abiyel ma ti Araba no,

Francais: Bené-Assem, de Gézon; Jonathan, fils de Sagé, d'Arar;
Anglais: Azmaveth the Baharumite, Eliahba the Shaalbonite,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Azmavet ma Baharumna. Eliyaba ma Saalbonna,
Bulu: Azmavét ya Baharum. Eliaba ya Kalbôn.
Guiziga: Azimavet mbur Bahurim, Eliyaba mbur Saˀalboŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Azmawet mo Baharuuma, Elihabba mo Sa'albon
Fulfulde_DC: e Azmawet mo Baharuuma, Elihabba mo Sa'albon
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Azmavɛt be Bahurim; Ɛliaba be Salbɔŋ;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Azmavɛt be Bahurim; Ɛliaba be Salbɔŋ;
Kapsiki_DC: Azmavɛt, nde Bahəwrim, Ɛliyaba, nde Sha'albon,
Tupurri: Asmafed ma Baharum, Eliyahba ma Saalbone,

Francais: Ahiam, fils de Sachar, d'Arar;
Anglais: The sons of Hashem the Gizonite, Jonathan the son of Shage the Hararite,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bene-Hasem ma Gizonna. Yonatan goora vi Sage, ma Harar,
Bulu: Bené Hasém ya Gizônl Yônatan e mone Sagé ya Harar.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Hasemey, mbur Gizoŋ, Yonataŋ mangal ngi Sage, mbur Harar,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e ɓiɓɓe Hasen Guniijo e Yonatan ɓii Sage mo Harar
Fulfulde_DC: e ɓiɓɓe Hasen Guniijo e Yonatan ɓii Sage mo Harar
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bɛnɛ-Hasim be Gisɔŋ; Yɔnataŋ bem ko Sage, be Harar;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bɛnɛ-Hasim be Gisɔŋ; Yɔnataŋ bem ko Sage, be Harar;
Kapsiki_DC: ŋwalea Hashɛm nya kande Gizon, Yonatan, wəzege ta Shagɛ, nde Harar,
Tupurri: Bene-Hasem ma Gison, Jonatañ je ni Sage ma Harare,

Francais: Eliphal, fils d'Ur;
Anglais: Ahiam the son of Sacar the Hararite, Eliphal the son of Ur,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ahiyam goora vi Sakar ma Harar, Elifal goora vi Ur,
Bulu: Ahiam e mone Sakar ya Harar. Elifal e mone Ur.
Guiziga: Ahiyam mangal ngi Sakar, mbur Harar, Elifal mangal ngi Ur.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Ahiyam ɓii Sakar mo Harar e Elifal ɓii Ur
Fulfulde_DC: e Ahiyam ɓii Sakar mo Harar e Elifal ɓii Ur
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ahiam bem ko Sakar be Harar mbɛt; Ɛlifal bem ko Ur;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ahiam bem ko Sakar be Harar mbɛt; Ɛlifal bem ko Ur;
Kapsiki_DC: Ahiyam, wəzege ta Sakar, nde Harar, Ɛlifal, wəzege ta Əwr,
Tupurri: Ahiyam je ni Sakar ma Harare, Elifal je ni Ur no,

Francais: Hépher, de Méchéra; Ahia, de Phélon;
Anglais: Hepher the Mecherathite, Ahijah the Pelonite,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hefer ma hay Mekerana, Ahiya ma Palonna.
Bulu: Héfer ya Mekéra. Ahiya ya Palôm.
Guiziga: Hefer mbur Mekara, Ahiya mbur Paloŋ,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Hefer Mekeraajo e Ahiya mo Pelon
Fulfulde_DC: e Hefer Mekeraajo e Ahiya mo Pelon
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hɛfɛr be Mɛkara; Ahiya be Pɛlɔŋ;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hɛfɛr be Mɛkara; Ahiya be Pɛlɔŋ;
Kapsiki_DC: Hɛfɛr, nde Mekɛra, Ahiya, nde Palon,
Tupurri: Hefer ma Mekera, Ahiya ma Palon,

Francais: Hesro, de Carmel; Naaraï fils d'Asbaï;
Anglais: Hezro the Carmelite, Naarai the son of Ezbai,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hetsro ma Karmella, Naaray goora vi Ezbay.
Bulu: Hetsrô ya Karmel. Naarayi e mone Ezbayi.
Guiziga: Hesro mbur Karmel, Naˀaray mangal ngi Ezibay,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Hesro mo Karmel e Na'aray ɓii Ejebay
Fulfulde_DC: e Hesro mo Karmel e Na'aray ɓii Ejebay
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hesro be Karmɛl; Narai bem ko Ɛsbai;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hesro be Karmɛl; Narai bem ko Ɛsbai;
Kapsiki_DC: Hɛsro, nde Karmɛl, Naray, wəzege ta Ɛzbay,
Tupurri: Hesro ma Karmele, Naaray je ni Esbay no,

Francais: Joël frère de Nathan; Mibahar, fils d'Agaraï;
Anglais: Joel the brother of Nathan, Mibhar the son of Haggeri,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jowel ma ɓasum Natanna, Mibhar goora vi Hagri.
Bulu: Yôél e mone Natan. Mibhar e mone Hagri.
Guiziga: Zowel, sukum ngi Nataŋ, Mibar mangal ngi Hagri,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Yo'el deerɗiraawo Natan e Mibehar ɓii Hagari
Fulfulde_DC: e Yo'el deerɗiraawo Natan e Mibehar ɓii Hagari
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jɔɛl nya Nataŋ; Mibar bem ko Hagri;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jɔɛl nya Nataŋ; Mibar bem ko Hagri;
Kapsiki_DC: Zhowɛl wəza meghekɛa Natan, Mibar wəzege ta Hagri,
Tupurri: Jowel hen Natañ no, Mibha je ni Hagri no,

Francais: Sélec, l'Ammonite; Naharaï, de Béroth, écuyer de Joab, fils de Sarvia;
Anglais: Zelek the Ammonite, Naharai the Berothite, the armourbearer of Joab the son of Zeruiah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Selek ma Amonna. Naharay ma Berotna, ma ziy sle-ma-duura vi Yowab goora vi Seruyana.
Bulu: Télék mone Amonite. Narayi ya Bérôt nye a nga beʼe mengale me Yôab, mone Seruya.
Guiziga: Serek mbur Amoŋ, Naray mbur Beˀerot, mangal ngi Seruya, i mijijira gwat ngi vurum ngi Zoˀapay,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Selek Ammooniijo e Naharay mo Beerot doondoowo balmi Yo'ab ɓii Seruyatu
Fulfulde_DC: e Selek Ammooniijo e Naharay mo Beerot doondoowo balmi Yo'ab ɓii Seruyatu
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛlɛk be Amɔŋ; Narai be Bɛrot baka-nyaŋa ko Jɔab bem ko Sɛruya;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛlɛk be Amɔŋ; Narai be Bɛrot baka-nyaŋa ko Jɔab bem ko Sɛruya;
Kapsiki_DC: Sɛlɛk, nde Amon, Naray, nde Beyɛrot nya kekele nda wəshi kempa ta Zhowab, Serəwya sləa meghekɛ,
Tupurri: Seleg je Amoñid no, Nahray ma Berod maga hay soë feçeçre durgi mani Jowab je ni Serujan mono,

Francais: Ira, de Jéther; Gareb, de Jéther;
Anglais: Ira the Ithrite, Gareb the Ithrite,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ira ma hay Yeter, Gareb ma hay Yeter.
Bulu: Ira ya Yéter. Garét ya Yéter.
Guiziga: Ira, mbur ngi hay Yeter, Garep i muy taŋ ma,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Iira mo Yatir e Gareb mo Yatir
Fulfulde_DC: e Iira mo Yatir e Gareb mo Yatir
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ira be Yitri; Garɛb be Yitri
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ira be Yitri; Garɛb be Yitri
Kapsiki_DC: Ira nya kwa yita ta Yɛtɛr, Garɛb nya kwa yita shɛnyɛ,
Tupurri: diñ Ira ma Yetere, Gareb ma Yetere,

Francais: Urie, le Hethéen; Zabad, fils d'Oholi;
Anglais: Uriah the Hittite, Zabad the son of Ahlai,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Uriyas ma Hititna, Zabad goora vi Aklay,
Bulu: Urie mone Hitite. Zabad e mone Alayi
Guiziga: Uri mbur Hiti, Zabaɗ mangal ngi Alay,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Uriya Hetiijo e Zabada ɓii Ahilay
Fulfulde_DC: e Uriya Hetiijo e Zabada ɓii Ahilay
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: bá nɛ̀ Urii be Hit. O ŋma ŋgaŋa wi-biro nɔ‘i mbɛt nɛ́ Zabad bem ko Alai;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: bá nɛ̀ Urii be Hit. O ŋma ŋgaŋa wi-biro nɔ‘i mbɛt nɛ́ Zabad bem ko Alai;
Kapsiki_DC: Əwri, nde Hɛt, Zabad, wəzege ta Alay,
Tupurri: Uri je Hitid no, Sabad je ni Ahlay no,

Francais: Adina, fils de Siza le Rubénite, chef des Rubénites, et trente avec lui;
Anglais: Adina the son of Shiza the Reubenite, a captain of the Reubenites, and thirty with him,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Adina, goora vi Siza, hay jafna vi Ruben, ma ŋolla hay jafna vi Ruben, segen dok-ɦidi hiɗi namu.
Bulu: Adina e mone Kiza, môte ya mvôʼô Ruben, évete jap, ba be bôte mewôm mela.
Guiziga: Adina mangal ngi Siza, i buy a wuzla buy ngi sukwi Ruben, soje kukur makir aseˀe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Adina ɓii Sija, mawɗo nder yimɓe Ruben e worɓe cappanɗe tato bee maako
Fulfulde_DC: e Adina ɓii Sija, mawɗo nder yimɓe Ruben e worɓe cappanɗe tato bee maako
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Adina bem ko Ziza bezaŋ Rubɛn; a̧ nɛ̀ ŋma gasawi ko o bezaŋ Rubɛn nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ ɓu-taar;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Adina bem ko Ziza bezaŋ Rubɛn; a̧ nɛ̀ ŋma gasawi ko o bezaŋ Rubɛn nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ ɓu-taar;
Kapsiki_DC: Adina wəzege ta Shiza, kwete hwa meghe nyi mbe hwelefe ta Rəbɛn, nya beghakɛ ka sewajɛ mahekenemsə,
Tupurri: Adina je ni Sisa je Rubenid maga hay diñ wañ jar Rubenidn wo mono, se de jar wer äe ni do swa'a,

Francais: Hanan, fils de Maacha; Josaphat, de Mathan;
Anglais: Hanan the son of Maachah, and Joshaphat the Mithnite,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hanan goora vi Maaka. Yosafat ma Mitnina.
Bulu: Hanan e mone Maaka. Yôsafat ya Mitni.
Guiziga: Hanaŋ mangal ngi Maˀaka, Yosafat mbur Meten,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Hanan ɓii Ma'aka e Yosafat Mitimiijo
Fulfulde_DC: e Hanan ɓii Ma'aka e Yosafat Mitimiijo
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hanaŋ bem ko Maka in Yɔsafat be Mɛtɛn;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hanaŋ bem ko Maka in Yɔsafat be Mɛtɛn;
Kapsiki_DC: Hanan, wəzege ta Ma'aka, Yoshafat, nde Mɛtɛn,
Tupurri: Hanan je ni Maaka no, Josafad ma Mitni no,

Francais: Ozia, d'Astaroth; Samma et Jéhiel, fils de Hotham d'Aroër;
Anglais: Uzzia the Ashterathite, Shama and Jehiel the sons of Hothan the Aroerite,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Uzziya ma Astarotna, Samma hiɗi Yehiyel, gurona vi Hotam ma Arowera.
Bulu: Uzia ya Aktarôt. Sama a Yehiél, e mone Hôtam ya Aroér.
Guiziga: Uziya mbur Asetarot, Sama ati Yehiyel ziri ngi Hotamay, mbur Aroˀer,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Uzziya mo Asterot e Sama e Ye'iyel ɓiɓɓe Hotam mo Aro'er
Fulfulde_DC: e Uzziya mo Asterot e Sama e Ye'iyel ɓiɓɓe Hotam mo Aro'er
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Uzia be Astɛrot, Sama in Yɛiɛl o bem ko Hɔtam be Arɔɛr.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Uzia be Astɛrot, Sama in Yɛiɛl o bem ko Hɔtam be Arɔɛr.
Kapsiki_DC: Əwziya, nde Ashetarot, Shama ba'a Yɛyiyɛl, ŋwalea Hotam, nde Arowɛr,
Tupurri: Usiya ma Astarode Sama wo de Yehiyel jar ni Hotam ma Arower wo,

Francais: Jédihel, fils de Samri; Joha, son frère, le Thosaïte;
Anglais: Jediael the son of Shimri, and Joha his brother, the Tizite,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yediyel goora vi Simri, Yoha ɓasulumna, ma Titsina,
Bulu: Yediaél e mone Simri. Yôha monyañe wé mone Titsite.
Guiziga: Yediyayel, mangal ngi Simri, waɗ Yoha sukum naŋ, i mbur Tis,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Yedi'ayel ɓii Simiri e deerɗum Yoha Tisiijo
Fulfulde_DC: e Yedi'ayel ɓii Simiri e deerɗum Yoha Tisiijo
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yɛdiaɛl bem ko Simri in Yɔha nya kɔ̧-a̧ be Tis;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yɛdiaɛl bem ko Simri in Yɔha nya kɔ̧-a̧ be Tis;
Kapsiki_DC: Yɛdiyayɛl, wəzege ta Shimri le Yoha, wəza meghekɛ nya kande Tis,
Tupurri: Yediyayel je ni Simri no, hen äe Joha je Tisid no.

Francais: Eliel, de Mahum; Jéribaï et Josaïa, fils d'Elnaëm; Jethma, le Moabite;
Anglais: Eliel the Mahavite, and Jeribai, and Joshaviah, the sons of Elnaam, and Ithmah the Moabite,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Eliyel ma Mahavimna, Yeribay hiɗi Yosaviya, gurona vi Elnaam, Yitma, ma Mowabna.
Bulu: Eliél ya Mahavim, Yéribayi a Yôkavia e mone Elnaam. Yitma mone Môabite.
Guiziga: Eliyel mbur Mahava, Yeribay waɗ Yosaviya, ziri ngi Elnamay, Itina mbur ngi ruwuy Moˀap,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Eliyel Mahawiijo e Yeribay e Yoswiya ɓiɓɓe Elna'am e Yitima Mo'abiijo
Fulfulde_DC: e Eliyel Mahawiijo e Yeribay e Yoswiya ɓiɓɓe Elna'am e Yitima Mo'abiijo
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Eliɛl be Mahawa, Yɛribai in Yɔsarbia o bem ko Ɛlnam, Yitma be Mɔab;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Eliɛl be Mahawa, Yɛribai in Yɔsarbia o bem ko Ɛlnam, Yitma be Mɔab;
Kapsiki_DC: Ɛliyɛl, nde Mahava, Yeribay le Yoshaviya, ŋwalea Ɛlnam, Itma, nde meleme ta ka Mowab,
Tupurri: Eliyel ma Mahafim no, Yeribay wo de Yosafiya jar ni Elnaam wo, Yitma je Mowab no.

Francais: Eliel, Obed et Jasiel, de Masobia.
Anglais: Eliel, and Obed, and Jasiel the Mesobaite.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Eliyel, Obed hiɗi Yaasiyel-Metsobaya.
Bulu: Eliél, Obéd a Yaasiél-Metsôbaya.
Guiziga: waɗ ti Eliyel, Obeɗ, Yasiyel mizli Sobahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Eliyel e Obet e Ya'asiyel mo Mecobaya.
Fulfulde_DC: e Eliyel e Obet e Ya'asiyel mo Mecobaya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Eliɛl, Obɛd in Yasiɛl be Soba.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Eliɛl, Obɛd in Yasiɛl be Soba.
Kapsiki_DC: ba'a yɛ Ɛliyɛl, Obɛd le Yasiyɛl, ka Soba.
Tupurri: Eliyel, Obed wo de Yaasiyel-Metsobaya.

Francais: Voici ceux qui vinrent vers David à Siceleg, lorsqu'il devait encore se tenir éloigné de la face de Saül, fils de Cis; ils étaient parmi les vaillants qui le secoururent pendant la guerre.
Anglais: Now these are they that came to David to Ziklag, while he yet kept himself close because of Saul the son of Kish: and they were among the mighty men, helpers of the war.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si sum sa kal kuɗ David hay Siklag hay li ma Sawul goora vi Kis digiɗim goy gine hiɗi namu. Nisi kayni jar sum sa jufayna sa gutumu hay duura.
Bulu: Melu David a nga solô Tiklag na a tube Saül e mone Kis, bôte be nga zu lat a nye. Be mbe biwôlô bezimbi be too nkômesane ya wosan ba be nye be too ngam;
Guiziga: Ar hin ngi Davit muro ɗum a Siklak, ɓa a lihi avu Sawul mangal ngi Kis na, mizli a soko, a sa lumakaŋ. I soje miwirwirey, mujuwam vu le ngi gi vurum.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saa'i Daawuda ɗonno suuɗo haa Cikilak ngam haa o daɗa Sawulu ɓii Kis, honooɓe semmbiɗɓe woɗɓe ngari haa maako, mballi mo nder konu.
Fulfulde_DC: Saa'i Daawuda ɗonno suuɗo haa Cikilak ngam haa o daɗa Sawulu ɓii Kis, honooɓe semmbiɗɓe woɗɓe ngari haa maako, mballi mo nder konu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe və nya se David kawəfərə mbe Siklag kezha mbelenyɛ va Sawəl, wəzege ta Kish ne, na kweci mbeli kalə kadzawa shɛ. Hwa ka katsala ka sewajɛ ɓela hɛ mbeli, ɗeke ɗeke hɛ yitea mpa zlaɓe le.
Tupurri: Mokay diñ ëu jar maga hay wo wo see Dafid Siglag de maga aà hay wo go de caa nen haçaç see Sawul je ni Kisn mono. AÀ hay wo yoo werpiiri ma de eegre maga hay caa wo war äe le jag durgin mono.

Francais: C'étaient des archers, exercés à lancer des pierres de la main droite et de la main gauche, et à tirer des flèches avec leur arc; ils étaient d'entre les frères de Saül, de Benjamin.
Anglais: They were armed with bows, and could use both the right hand and the left in hurling stones and shooting arrows out of a bow, even of Saul's brethren of Benjamin.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kayni si sum sa dur ɓarawta, sa gi hiɗiyna hiɗi ɓisi ta jufta hiɗi ɓisi ta gulda kaw, gi ɓarawta hiɗi diŋ-diŋŋa kaw. Nisi kayni hay jafna vi Benyamin, jar ɓosiyom Sawulla:
Bulu: Be nga bili bilaé a betoloo; be mbe nguleya wua mekok , nge wua mekoñ mʼélaé, be belaʼane mbo ngal a mbo nnôm bebaane. Be nga so ayoñe Bényamin, bobenyañ be Saül.
Guiziga: Taŋ ti gulum taŋhay waɗ vehvehluhoy a haŋ. A mulam ti gula ti hazum, rak raka si. Sukwi ngi Benjameŋ i sukwi ngi Sawul vuna, mizli ngi wuzla taŋhay ani:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ngoodi lagaaje e piwli, ɓe mbaawi fiɗugo kuri e kaa'e bee juŋngo nyaamo koo nano boo. Ɓe banndiraaɓe Sawulu mo Benyamin. Ndaa inɗe maɓɓe:
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ngoodi lagaaje e piwli, ɓe mbaawi fiɗugo kuri e kaa'e bee juŋngo nyaamo koo nano boo. Ɓe banndiraaɓe Sawulu mo Benyamin. Ndaa inɗe maɓɓe:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: Rəgi ya va hɛ ba'a yɛ beza pelɛ, wərə hɛ kabezate pelɛ ba'a kahe have le dzeve kwa gwela kala nya le dzeve kwa zeme. Wa nyi mbeli nyi kese nyi se mbe hwelefe ta Sawəl:
Tupurri: AÀ hay wo diñ jar waa wo, day äod wo huuli de do war lay de do guur lay, jwag wo waa de toñwaa äaaran wo. Saara hay diñ jar ma äi sir Benjame yoo heçeçre Sawuln wo.

Francais: A leur tête Ahiéser, puis Joas, tous deux fils de Samaa, de Gabaa; Jaziel et Phallet, fils d'Azmoth; Baracha; Jéhu, d'Anatoth;
Anglais: The chief was Ahiezer, then Joash, the sons of Shemaah the Gibeathite; and Jeziel, and Pelet, the sons of Azmaveth; and Berachah, and Jehu the Anathothite,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma ŋolla Ahiyezer hiɗi Yowas, goora vi Semaa ma Gibeyana; Yesiyel hiɗi Pelet gurona vi Azmavet; Beraka; Yehu, ma Anatotna;
Bulu: Be mbe môé na: Ahiézer, évet a Yôas, e bone be Sema môte ya Gibéa; Yéziél a Pelét e bone be Azmavét; Beraka; Yéhu môte ya Anatôt;
Guiziga: Buy Ahiyezer ati sukum naŋ Yoak, ziri ngi Semahay, mbur Gibeya. Yeziyel ati Pelet, ziri ngi Azimavetey, Beraka ati Yehu, mizli Anatotoy,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ahi'ezer, hooreejo maɓɓe e Yo'as ɓiɓɓe Sema'a mo Gibiya e Yesiyel e Pelet ɓiɓɓe Azmawet e Bereka e Yeehu mo Anatot
Fulfulde_DC: Ahi'ezer, hooreejo maɓɓe e Yo'as ɓiɓɓe Sema'a mo Gibiya e Yesiyel e Pelet ɓiɓɓe Azmawet e Bereka e Yeehu mo Anatot
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ahiezɛr gasawi zu wa, in o nya-a̧ Yoas bem ko Sɛma be Gibea, sɛka Yɛziɛl in Pɛlɛt o bem ko Azmavɛt, Bɛraka in Yɛhu be Anatot,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ahiezɛr gasawi zu wa, in o nya-a̧ Yoas bem ko Sɛma be Gibea, sɛka Yɛziɛl in Pɛlɛt o bem ko Azmavɛt, Bɛraka in Yɛhu be Anatot,
Kapsiki_DC: Ahiyɛzɛr nya kameghe, le wəza meghekɛ Yowash, ŋwalea Shɛma nya kande Gibɛya hɛ, yɛ Yeziyɛl le Pɛlɛt nyi kaŋwalea Azmavɛt, yɛ Beraka le Yɛhəw, ka Anatot hɛ,
Tupurri: AÀ hay wo diñ Ahiyeser wañn wo de Jowas jar ni Semaa ma Gibeya wo, diñ Yesiyel wo de Peled jar ni Asmafed wo, diñ Beraka, diñ Jehu ma Anatode,

Francais: Samaïas, de Gabaon, vaillant parmi les Trente et chef des Trente; Jérémie; Jéhéziel; Johanan; Jézabad, de Gédéra; Eluzaï; Jérimuth; Baalia;
Anglais: And Ismaiah the Gibeonite, a mighty man among the thirty, and over the thirty; and Jeremiah, and Jahaziel, and Johanan, and Josabad the Gederathite,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yikmayeya, ma Gabawonna, manjuf jar sa dok-ɦidina, tuni vok sa dok-ɦidina kaw;
Bulu: Yismaéya môte ya Gabaoñ, éwôlô môt e bôte mewôm melal éte a too fe nlô ya bôte bete mewôm mela;
Guiziga: Isemaya mbur Gabaˀoŋ, i buy ngi wuzla buy ngi mizli migi vurumoy mizli ngir makir na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Yisma'ya mo Gibiyon, o gooto nder suusɓe cappanɗe tato go, ɓurɗo ɓe fuu
Fulfulde_DC: e Yisma'ya mo Gibiyon, o gooto nder suusɓe cappanɗe tato go, ɓurɗo ɓe fuu
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yismaya be Gabaɔŋ, kpɔk mgbara o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-Taar, a̧ nɛ́ ŋma wan kɔ-wa mbɛt,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yismaya be Gabaɔŋ, kpɔk mgbara o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-Taar, a̧ nɛ́ ŋma wan kɔ-wa mbɛt,
Kapsiki_DC: Ishemaya, nde Gabawon, kwete ŋkɛ hwa ka meghe nyi mbe wəvəsəa mbeli kempa nyi mahekenemsə,
Tupurri: diñ Yismaeya ma Gabawoñ, je twar ma yoo jar ma do swa'n wo, je ma ti jar ma do swa'n wo,

Francais: Samaria; Saphatia, de Haruph;
Anglais: Eluzai, and Jerimoth, and Bealiah, and Shemariah, and Shephatiah the Haruphite,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yeremiyas, Yahaziyel, Yohanan, Yozabad ma Gederana;
Bulu: Yérémi, Yahaziél; Yôhanañ; Yôzabad môte ya Gedéra;
Guiziga: Irmeya, Yeziyel, Yohanaŋ waɗ Yozabat mizli Giderahay,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Yeremiya e Yahajiyel e Yohanan e Yozabat mo Gedera
Fulfulde_DC: e Yeremiya e Yahajiyel e Yohanan e Yozabat mo Gedera
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: sɛka Yirmɛya, Yahaziɛl, Yohanaŋ in Yɔzabad be Gedar,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: sɛka Yirmɛya, Yahaziɛl, Yohanaŋ in Yɔzabad be Gedar,
Kapsiki_DC: Zhɛrɛmi, Yaziyɛl, Yohanan le Yozabad, se mbe Gedɛra,
Tupurri: diñ Jermi, Yahasiyel, Yohanan, diñ Yosabad ma Gedera,

Francais: Elcana, Jésia, Azaréel, Joéser et Jesbaam, fils de Coré;
Anglais: Elkanah, and Jesiah, and Azareel, and Joezer, and Jashobeam, the Korhites,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Eluzay ma Yerimotna; Beyaliya; Semariya, Sepatiya ma Harofna;
Bulu: Eluzayi; Yérimôt; Bealia, Semaria; Sepatia môte ya Harôf;
Guiziga: Eluzay, Yerimot, Beyaliya, Simariya waɗ Sefatiya, mizli Harufoy,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Ele'ujay e Yerimot e Be'aliya e Semariya e Sefatiya mo Haruf
Fulfulde_DC: e Ele'ujay e Yerimot e Be'aliya e Semariya e Sefatiya mo Haruf
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛluzai, Yɛrimɔt, Bɛalya, Sɛmaria in Sɛfatia be Haruf,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛluzai, Yɛrimɔt, Bɛalya, Sɛmaria in Sɛfatia be Haruf,
Kapsiki_DC: Ɛləwzay, Yerimot, Bɛyaliya, Shemariya le Shefatiya, se mbe Harəwf,
Tupurri: diñ Ehisay, Yerimod, Bealiya, Semariya, Sepatiya ma Harofe,

Francais: Joéla et Zabadia, fils de Jéroham, de Gédor.
Anglais: And Joelah, and Zebadiah, the sons of Jeroham of Gedor.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Elkana, Yikya, Azareel, Yoyezer hiɗi Yokabeyam sa Korena;
Bulu: Elkana, Yikya, Azarél, Yôézer a Yakôbeam, Koréite;
Guiziga: Elkana, Isiya, Azarel waɗ Yasobam, dideˀ ngi Korehey,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Elkaana e Yissiya e Azareyel e Yo'ejer e Yasobo'am, ɓe Koora'en
Fulfulde_DC: e Elkaana e Yissiya e Azareyel e Yo'ejer e Yasobo'am, ɓe Koora'en
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛlkana, Isia, Azarɛl, Yɔɛzɛr, Yasobam, o bezaŋ Kore,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛlkana, Isia, Azarɛl, Yɔɛzɛr, Yasobam, o bezaŋ Kore,
Kapsiki_DC: Ɛlkana, Isiya, Azarɛl, Yowɛzɛr le Yashobam, hwelefe ta Kora,
Tupurri: diñ Elkana, Yisya, Asareyal, Yoeser wo de Yasobeyam, jar ma ti wer mani Koren wo,

Francais: Parmi les Gadites, des hommes vaillants passèrent auprès de David, dans les lieux forts, au désert: guerriers exercés au combat, sachant manier le bouclier et la lance, ayant un aspect de lions, aussi agiles que des gazelles sur les montagnes.
Anglais: And of the Gadites there separated themselves unto David into the hold to the wilderness men of might, and men of war fit for the battle, that could handle shield and buckler, whose faces were like the faces of lions, and were as swift as the roes upon the mountains;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yoyela hiɗi Zebadiya gurona vi Yerkam ma Gedor.
Bulu: Yôéla a Zebadia e mone Yerkam môte ya Gedor.
Guiziga: ti Yawela ati Zebadiya, ziri ngi Yerohamay, mbur Gedor.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Yo'ela e Zebadiya, ɓiɓɓe Yeroham mo Gedor.
Fulfulde_DC: e Yo'ela e Zebadiya, ɓiɓɓe Yeroham mo Gedor.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ká bá nɛ̀ Yɔɛla in Zabada, o bem ko Yeroam, nɛ̀ yaa so nɛ́ o be Gɛdɔr.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ká bá nɛ̀ Yɔɛla in Zabada, o bem ko Yeroam, nɛ̀ yaa so nɛ́ o be Gɛdɔr.
Kapsiki_DC: ba'a yɛ Yowɛla le Zɛbadiya, ŋwalea Yerowam, nde Gedor.
Tupurri: diñ Yoela wo de Sebadiya, jar ni Yersam ma Gedor wo.

Francais: Ezer était le chef; Obdias, le second; Eliab, le troisième;
Anglais: Ezer the first, Obadiah the second, Eliab the third,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jar jafna vi Gad, sum sa jufayna sa donona poŋ irsi goyo kay tuɗ kuɗ David hay liyna valam ma ŋayna hay fulda; kayni si sojena sa hatay duura, marayna visi ka'a, kawayna visi ka'a kaw, nisi ŋray ca hiɗi zlona, ciwer ki dukŋa ma kulo kay hiɗiyn nala.
Bulu: Bôte befe be nga kôlô ayoñe Gad a ke koone David e vôm a nga solô e nkôte si. Be mbe fe biwôlô bi bôte ya mewosan bi bili abui ayéʼé asu bita, be yeme belan ében a akoñ. Be mbe ékowoñe fe vʼane bengbwengbwem a avôle mebo ane minkoʼo mi ne minkôle minkô.
Guiziga: Mizli mekelemey a pulaka sukwi Gata, ara lumaka Davit ar li ɗum naŋ misi a wuzlaɓuh mikirɗak kirɗaka. Taŋ i mizli miwirwirey, i mizli migi vurumoy, a sirkaka taŋ le ngi kiɗa vu. Taŋ ti mbarayay waɗ ziwitey a haŋ. A gam zluwun da mbur kaɓa moboroy, taŋ wirwir kaɓa mangazaway a muwã.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe Gada woɗɓe ndilli, kawti bee Daawuda haa hisrude muuɗum nder ladde. Ɓe honooɓe semmbiɗɓe nder jama'aare konu. Ɓe mari baawal huuwtinirgo bawarɗe  mawɗe e labbe, geese maɓɓe nanndi bee geese barooɗe, ɓe mbaawi doggugo bana lelji. Ndaa inɗe maɓɓe:
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe Gada woɗɓe ndilli, kawti bee Daawuda haa hisrude muuɗum nder ladde. Ɓe honooɓe semmbiɗɓe nder jama'aare konu. Ɓe mari baawal huuwtinirgo bawarɗe  mawɗe e labbe, geese maɓɓe nanndi bee geese barooɗe, ɓe mbaawi doggugo bana lelji. Ndaa inɗe maɓɓe:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ŋma bezaŋ Gad nɛ̀ɛ́ ɗoŋ David fara hu̧sa̧-a̧ kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn ŋga-gbárà mɛ mbɛt. Wa yaa nɛ́ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ nɛ̀ yamba bíí biro; mɔɔ-de-biro kɔ-wa nɛ́ ŋgee in sɛ́ɛ̀; see-wa nɛ́ see dila; ɓɛɛ yì mɛ naŋ-wa kànà nɛ́ kalamba mɛ zu kaya.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ŋma bezaŋ Gad nɛ̀ɛ́ ɗoŋ David fara hu̧sa̧-a̧ kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn ŋga-gbárà mɛ mbɛt. Wa yaa nɛ́ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ nɛ̀ yamba bíí biro; mɔɔ-de-biro kɔ-wa nɛ́ ŋgee in sɛ́ɛ̀; see-wa nɛ́ see dila; ɓɛɛ yì mɛ naŋ-wa kànà nɛ́ kalamba mɛ zu kaya.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe kweci mbeli keslə mbe hwelefe ta ka Gad kadzawa sha David te ɓerama nya wəfərənyɛ ŋkɛ. Kweci katsala ka mpa hɛ, nyi keɗepe mpa le gelə ba'a le megha. Kala nivɛrə dzawe dzawea nci, kala kɛme hwa ghweme wɛrewɛa nci.
Tupurri: Yoo jar ni Gad wo mono, werpiiri ma de eegre jag jaw raw wo caage ma woge see Dafid wo ti ngeel yoñre ma ti puuli no. AÀ hay wo diñ sode maga wo de ko ëeñ durgi de gidigli de manjaw do wo. Nen äaara hay do mingir nono, saara hay deparday do baryam ma ti huuli wo nono.

Francais: Masmana, le quatrième; Jérémie, le cinquième;
Anglais: Mishmannah the fourth, Jeremiah the fifth,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ezer, ma ŋolla, Abdiyas ma mul ma'na; Eliyab ma mul ɦidina;
Bulu: Be mbe môé na: Ezér, évet; Abdias e môta baa; Eliab e nyô lale;
Guiziga: Ezer i buy taŋ, Obadiya i mucuw naŋ, Eliyap i mimakir taŋ,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ezer, o hooreejo maɓɓe, Obadiya ɗiɗaɓo, Eliyabu tataɓo,
Fulfulde_DC: Ezer, o hooreejo maɓɓe, Obadiya ɗiɗaɓo, Eliyabu tataɓo,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gasawi duka nɛ́ Ezɛr; hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Obadia; taar-a nɛ́ Eliab;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gasawi duka nɛ́ Ezɛr; hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Obadia; taar-a nɛ́ Eliab;
Kapsiki_DC: Ɛzɛr ya kameghe, zhɛne Obadiya kadzeyite, nde mahekene Ɛliyab,
Tupurri: AÀ hay wo diñ: Eser wañ no, Abdiyas ma de äog no, Eliyab ma de swa' no,

Francais: Ethi, le sixième; Eliel, le septième;
Anglais: Attai the sixth, Eliel the seventh,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mikamanna ma mul fiɗina; Yeremiyas ma mul vaslna;
Bulu: Mikamana e nyô nyini; Yérémi e nyô tane;
Guiziga: Misemana i mumufaɗ taŋ, Irmeya i muzlum taŋ,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mismana nayaɓo, Yeremiya njowaɓo,
Fulfulde_DC: Mismana nayaɓo, Yeremiya njowaɓo,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: naar-a nɛ́ Mismana; mɔɔrɔ-a nɛ́ Yirmɛya;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: naar-a nɛ́ Mismana; mɔɔrɔ-a nɛ́ Yirmɛya;
Kapsiki_DC: Mishemana nde wəfaɗe, Zhɛrɛmi nde mcɛfe,
Tupurri: Misamana, ma de naa no, Jermi ma de dwee no,

Francais: Johanan, le huitième; Elzébad, le neuvième;
Anglais: Johanan the eighth, Elzabad the ninth,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Attay ma mul karkiyana; Eliyel ma mul siɗiyana;
Bulu: Atayi e nyô samane; Eliél e nyô zamgbwale;
Guiziga: Atayi mimerkeɗ taŋ, Eliyel i mitarnaˀ taŋ,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Attay njoweegoojo, Eliyel njoweeɗiɗaɓo,
Fulfulde_DC: Attay njoweegoojo, Eliyel njoweeɗiɗaɓo,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Atai nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a; mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-aa nɛ́ Eliɛl;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Atai nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a; mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-aa nɛ́ Eliɛl;
Kapsiki_DC: Atay nde ŋkwaŋe, Ɛliyɛl nde mberefaŋe,
Tupurri: Atay ma de hiira' no, Eliyel ma de renam no,

Francais: Jérémie, le dixième; Machbanaï, le onzième.
Anglais: Jeremiah the tenth, Machbanai the eleventh.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yohanan ma mul glafandina, Elsabad ma mul zleeŋena;
Bulu: Yôhanañ e nyô muame; Elzabad e nyô ébulu;
Guiziga: Yohanaŋ midangafaɗ taŋ, Elzabat i mungoltir taŋ,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yohanan njoweetataɓo, Elzabat njoweenayaɓo,
Fulfulde_DC: Yohanan njoweetataɓo, Elzabat njoweenayaɓo,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-a nɛ́ Yohanaŋ; mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar-a nɛ́ Ɛlzabad,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-a nɛ́ Yohanaŋ; mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar-a nɛ́ Ɛlzabad,
Kapsiki_DC: Yohanan nde deghese, Ɛlzabad nde mesli,
Tupurri: Yohanan ma de nenma' no, Elsabad ma de kaawa' no,

Francais: C'étaient des fils de Gad, chefs de l'armée; un seul, le plus petit, pouvait l'emporter sur cent, et le plus grand sur mille.
Anglais: These were of the sons of Gad, captains of the host: one of the least was over an hundred, and the greatest over a thousand.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yeremiyas ma mul doogona, Makbanay ma doogo yam kepna.
Bulu: Yérémi e nyô awômô; Makbanayi e nyô awômô a wua
Guiziga: Irmeya i mukuruˀ taŋ, Makbanay i mukuruˀ ngaŋ kaˀ taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yeremiya sappoojo, Makabanay sappo e ngo'oojo.
Fulfulde_DC: Yeremiya sappoojo, Makabanay sappo e ngo'oojo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓu-a nɛ́ Yirmɛya; ɓɛɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk-a nɛ́ Makbanai.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓu-a nɛ́ Yirmɛya; ɓɛɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk-a nɛ́ Makbanai.
Kapsiki_DC: Zhɛrɛmi nde meŋe, Makbanay nde meŋe kwetɛŋeghəmbe.
Tupurri: Jermi ma de hwal no, Makbanay ma de hwal ti boñ no.

Francais: Ce sont eux qui passèrent le Jourdain au premier mois, alors qu'il déborde sur toutes ses rives, et qui mirent en fuite tous les habitants des vallées, à l'orient et à l'occident.
Anglais: These are they that went over Jordan in the first month, when it had overflown all his banks; and they put to flight all them of the valleys, both toward the east, and toward the west.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kayni si gurona vi Gad, ma ŋolla vi sojena, ma kepna ma jarsi goora asay ir sumun kis, ma ŋolla jarsiya asay ir sumun birimi.
Bulu: Be mbe e bone be Gad, bivete ya mewosan; môte wua yʼété, nyô a dañe tyôtyoé a mbe ane bôte ntet a nyô a dañ anen ane bôte toyini.
Guiziga: A wuzla ziri ngi Gataya, buy ngi sojehey i taŋ so. Mihĩyã ngi si taŋ a jum soje deŋ deŋ skat, migidaŋ ngi si taŋ a jim soje deŋ deŋ durmuk.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe Gada ɓe'e ngoni mawɓe konu, pamaro maɓɓe ɓuri yimɓe teemerre, mawɗo boo ɓuri yimɓe ujineere.
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe Gada ɓe'e ngoni mawɓe konu, pamaro maɓɓe ɓuri yimɓe teemerre, mawɗo boo ɓuri yimɓe ujineere.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O gasawi ko o wi-biro mgbara o bezaŋ Gad nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. Mgbara o wi nɔ‘i, geɗek wi tɛ biro tɛ bi bíí gɔmŋmaa, ɓɛɛ gasa-a, kɔ̧-a̧ kànà nɛ́ bíí booro.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O gasawi ko o wi-biro mgbara o bezaŋ Gad nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. Mgbara o wi nɔ‘i, geɗek wi tɛ biro tɛ bi bíí gɔmŋmaa, ɓɛɛ gasa-a, kɔ̧-a̧ kànà nɛ́ bíí booro.
Kapsiki_DC: Nya ya kaka Gad nyi te ghəa ka sewajɛ. Ma nya ɓɛhwɛ ma hwa hɛ, wərə ŋkɛ kanza te ghəa ka sewajɛ gwəmsə. Ma nya wəba ma, wərə kanza te ghəa ka sewajɛ slibə.
Tupurri: AÀ hay wo diñ jar ni Gad wo, jar ma pel durgi wo, ma klee ma yoo äaara boñ nen jar kissi, ma kluu äaaran nen jar ndare.

Francais: Des fils de Benjamin et de Juda vinrent vers David, dans les lieux forts.
Anglais: And there came of the children of Benjamin and Judah to the hold unto David.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si nisi sa ɦaw Yordan kulo'o, hay til ma jewna, hay li ma niyn ka hobay kulo ŋolo, sum sa hay lokŋa nisi munsi kafe, gal kuɗuwu hiɗi gal vulatiya kaw.
Bulu: E ba be nga dañe Yordane le, e ngon ôsu, éyoñe mendim me nga yandane bekindiʼi bé bese, a mbe be nga bo na ba bese be nga too mimbiʼili be tup be kele mfaʼa jôp da tôô a mfaʼa jôp da dim.
Guiziga: Angi kiya mudumbuŋ ngi vi, rak ti mekepel mazuɓ nay nay na, mutuwuɗam nga dubazaw Zurdeŋ i taŋ. A ɓulaka mizli ngir sozo micaya cek, zle asi pas ngi miprik hã asi pas ngi pastaˀa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kamɓe ɓe eeri maayo Urdun nder lewru aranndu, saa'i ngo teelata  dow pomoole maago. Ɓe ndiiwi jooɗiiɓe waadiiji fuu haa fuunaaŋge e hiirnaaŋge.
Fulfulde_DC: Kamɓe ɓe eeri maayo Urdun nder lewru aranndu, saa'i ngo teelata  dow pomoole maago. Ɓe ndiiwi jooɗiiɓe waadiiji fuu haa fuunaaŋge e hiirnaaŋge.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wa á̧ kuu so Jurdɛn mɛ ɓar tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ yì ha̧a̧ so nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ka wa ndak o bíí nɛ̀ ɔɔ so kɔ̧ ɗoŋgɔ nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese in yee-wese.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wa á̧ kuu so Jurdɛn mɛ ɓar tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ yì ha̧a̧ so nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ka wa ndak o bíí nɛ̀ ɔɔ so kɔ̧ ɗoŋgɔ nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese in yee-wese.
Kapsiki_DC: Ghenci ka jivenji te hələa Zhəwrdɛŋe te kwa ghate ta tere mbe va, te və nya nza ŋkɛ viɗi pa pelɛ hələ. Pa hɛ ŋkamte pɛtɛa mbeli nyi dzeyi kwelɛ yɛ zlərə laka ŋkwa kesame ta veci ba'a laka ŋkwa kepəkwə ta veci.
Tupurri: Mo na diñ jar maga hay cegad wo Jurdeçeç go ti few ma tañgun de maga Jurdeçeç hay wo go de duggi go ti ngeel äuy mono. Saara hay nii wo jar ma äil log ma nen wur botoñ wo de ma nen wur bolawn wo go äuy.

Francais: David sortit au-devant d'eux, prit la parole, et leur dit: "Si vous êtes venus à moi avec des sentiments pacifiques, pour me secourir, mon coeur se portera vers vous, en vue de nous unir; mais si c'est pour me livrer perfidement à mes ennemis, lorsque aucune violence ne s'attache à mes mains, que le Dieu de nos pères le voie et qu'il fasse justice!"
Anglais: And David went out to meet them, and answered and said unto them, If ye be come peaceably unto me to help me, mine heart shall be knit unto you: but if ye be come to betray me to mine enemies, seeing there is no wrong in mine hands, the God of our fathers look thereon, and rebuke it.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Benyamin segena hiɗi gurona vi Yuda segena kaw kali kuɗ David hay liyn ma nam ka ŋayay hayna.
Bulu: Bone be Bényamin a Yuda fe be nga ke be David e vôm a nga solô.
Guiziga: Mizli Benjameŋhey ati Zudahay, a soko nga pura Davite hã sesẽŋ ar li ɗum naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe Benyamin e yimɓe Yahuuda woɗɓe ngari haa hisrude Daawuda.
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe Benyamin e yimɓe Yahuuda woɗɓe ngari haa hisrude Daawuda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ŋma bezaŋ Bɛnjamin in Juda nɛ̀ɛ́ ɗoŋ David fara n'aa hu̧si sɛnɛ mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ŋma bezaŋ Bɛnjamin in Juda nɛ̀ɛ́ ɗoŋ David fara n'aa hu̧si sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa kweci wəvəsəa mbeli mbe hwelefe ta ka Bɛnjamɛn le ŋa ka Zhəwda lə kanewakɛ David te ŋkwa nya wəfərənyɛ ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Jar Benjame wo de jar Juda hay wo wo see Dafid ti ngeel yoñren lay.

Francais: L'Esprit revêtit Amasaï, chef des Trente, et il dit: "A toi, David, et avec toi, fils d'Isaï! Paix, paix à toi, et paix à celui qui te secourt, car ton Dieu t'a secouru!" Et David les accueillit et les plaça parmi les chefs de la bande.
Anglais: Then the spirit came upon Amasai, who was chief of the captains, and he said, Thine are we, David, and on thy side, thou son of Jesse: peace, peace be unto thee, and peace be to thine helpers; for thy God helpeth thee. Then David received them, and made them captains of the band.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: David kal ay goy kirsiya, nam sli ditiya di tisi ala: La nigi co katan kayni hiɗi toyta kay gutanu ni, dikan ka tap hiɗi nigiya; may la kay ɗutan goy mi sa gawt kanna ni, ɦawlat ma kal hayanu, nala Lawna vi sumiyaya ma wi kayni, nam ma ka kitat jaraya.
Bulu: David a nga zu tôbane be. Nde a nga nyoñe nkobô a jô be na: Nge mia zu be ma asu mvoʼé na mi volô ma, nleme wom wo ye lat a mia; ve nge mia zu na mi duʼu ma asu mfi besiñe bam, te na mbia nlem éziñ a ne be ma, Zambe ya bʼésaa bangan a yene jame te a tyiʼi ajô yʼété!
Guiziga: Davit a bo nga mbuŋ taŋ, a ɓa taŋ: «Da ki soko nga pur ɗu ngi jam ngi vu, yo ɓa ki jinikiy na, i tuɓukum ti mevel purla. Amma da ki soko ɓa ki tikinikiy da mesene ɗuwoy, manja i gi malambaˀa si na, anja Bumbulvuŋ ngi dideˀ ndrahay, a pura, yo a ga ndra kiita!»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Daawuda wurti, fotti bee maɓɓe, wi'i ɓe: “To jam waddi on haa ɗo haa on mballammi kam, mi jaɓan on bee ɓernde woore, ammaa to on ngari ngam zammbaago yam e wallugo konne'en am, koo to mi waɗaay aybe sam, nden kam sey Allah kaakiraaɓe meeɗen laara ɗum, hiito on!”
Fulfulde_DC: Daawuda wurti, fotti bee maɓɓe, wi'i ɓe: “To jam waddi on haa ɗo haa on mballammi kam, mi jaɓan on bee ɓernde woore, ammaa to on ngari ngam zammbaago yam e wallugo konne'en am, koo to mi waɗaay aybe sam, nden kam sey Allah kaakiraaɓe meeɗen laara ɗum, hiito on!”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: David gboo pii tɛ wa, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ wen ga̧a̧mɔ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ nɛnɛ pii tɛ‘m h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ gbak am, mi tɛ kpa desee nyɛmna wen duka-a in'nɛ̀ɛ́; ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛɛ wen ɔra'm ha̧ o wisɛn kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ n'am de kɔ‘m mɔ nɛ̀ ŋgai na ga, Sɔ̧ ko o dáà k’ɛɛ a̧ zɔ́k, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ dúk nɛ́ wi-kɛ̧-mgbara mɔ‘i!»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: David gboo pii tɛ wa, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ wen ga̧a̧mɔ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ nɛnɛ pii tɛ‘m h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ gbak am, mi tɛ kpa desee nyɛmna wen duka-a in'nɛ̀ɛ́; ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛɛ wen ɔra'm ha̧ o wisɛn kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ n'am de kɔ‘m mɔ nɛ̀ ŋgai na ga, Sɔ̧ ko o dáà k’ɛɛ a̧ zɔ́k, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ dúk nɛ́ wi-kɛ̧-mgbara mɔ‘i!»
Kapsiki_DC: Cape David kalə sha hɛ, ma ke: «Ma kenza nde gheyɛ se sha 'ya le kwelɛŋe ba'a kezha kemane ɗa ne, kageze ŋayɛ zayɛ mə le se 'ya. Ama kenza nde kezha pamte ɗa ba'a kezha ncɛ nda ɗa ke ka jaga ta ɗa se yɛ kaɗema 'ya kemenete wəsə nya ndiremi ne, pa Shala ta ka shihɛ ɓəmə neghate fete te ghena shɛ, pa ɗate ŋayɛ!»
Tupurri: Dafid raw kalge le go caa pel äaara. Se kal waçaç waçaçre day riñ ra gano: Hayga nday a see äi na ma jam nen maga nday mo caa war äi no, äil äi tay yañ mbe de äay, day hayga nday a na ma kañ tew äi go ne jar hee äin wo day ni paga ndi bay mbi kië waçaçre wa lay mono, daga Baa mani paçaçre naan mo ko, day mo cag mbe sen lay so!

Francais: Des hommes de Manassé se joignirent à David, lorsqu'il alla avec les Philistins faire la guerre à Saül. Mais ils ne secoururent pas les Philistins; car les princes des Philistins renvoyèrent à dessein David en disant: "Au péril de nos têtes, il joindrait son maître Saül."
Anglais: And there fell some of Manasseh to David, when he came with the Philistines against Saul to battle: but they helped them not: for the lords of the Philistines upon advisement sent him away, saying, He will fall to his master Saul to the jeopardy of our heads.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki kayn nala ŋusta cuk kay Amasay, ma ŋolla vi sum sa dok-ɦidina (nam di'e): Hiɗi naŋu David, kataŋ naŋu goora vi Isay, toyta, toyta ma li hiɗi naŋ lige; toyta ma li hiɗi sa ma gut kuɗaŋŋa lige. Kay Lawna vaŋu gutaŋawa. David visiya, nam laksi jar sa ŋulona vi sojena valamu.
Bulu: Eyoñe te Amasayi évete bôte mewôm mela a nga jaé a nsisim a Yôtane na: Bi ne a wo, bi ne e ngame jôé, a David e mon Izayi! Mvoʼé é ne asu dôé a asu bôt ba volô wo, amu Nti a volôya wo. Ane David a nga nyoñe be a telé be e bivete ya nsamba été.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, Uf ngi Bumbulvuŋ a ci avu Amasay, buy ngi soje mizli ngir makire, a ɓaŋ: «Ndra asi ka, mangal ngi Zese! Ndra tisi ka mangal ngi Zese! Anja ki cifi jam jam, yo waɗ mizli majinukuw ma! Asi i Bumbulvuŋ ɗik majinuw» Davit a tiɓa taŋ mulaka, dar a cifa taŋ i buyoy a wuzla soje naŋhay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Ruuhu Allah naŋngi Amasay, hooreejo suusɓe cappanɗe tato go, o wi'i: “Min yimɓe ma Daawuda! Min ngondan bee ma, ɓii Yeesa! Jam, jam laatano ma! Jam laatano wallooɓe ma, ngam Allah maaɗa ɗon walle!” Nden Daawuda jaɓɓi ɓe, darni ɓe ɓe mawɓe dow mooɓre hippooɓe muuɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Ruuhu Allah naŋngi Amasay, hooreejo suusɓe cappanɗe tato go, o wi'i: “Min yimɓe ma Daawuda! Min ngondan bee ma, ɓii Yeesa! Jam, jam laatano ma! Jam laatano wallooɓe ma, ngam Allah maaɗa ɗon walle!” Nden Daawuda jaɓɓi ɓe, darni ɓe ɓe mawɓe dow mooɓre hippooɓe muuɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ  Ɔmi  ko Sɔ̧ de ha̧ Amasai, wi-duk-zu o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-Taar mɛ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ: «Ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́ David, ɛ́ɛ́ a̧a̧ in'nɛ̀ɛ́, bem ko Jɛse! Ga̧a̧mɔ a̧ dúk in'nɛ̀ɛ́ in ga̧a̧mɔ a̧ dúk in o wi nɛ̀ gbak'nɛ́! Wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ gbák'nɛ́!» David kpɛka wa, ɓɛɛ e wa mgbara o gasawi ko o wi-biro kɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ  Ɔmi  ko Sɔ̧ de ha̧ Amasai, wi-duk-zu o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-Taar mɛ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ: «Ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́ David, ɛ́ɛ́ a̧a̧ in'nɛ̀ɛ́, bem ko Jɛse! Ga̧a̧mɔ a̧ dúk in'nɛ̀ɛ́ in ga̧a̧mɔ a̧ dúk in o wi nɛ̀ gbak'nɛ́! Wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ gbák'nɛ́!» David kpɛka wa, ɓɛɛ e wa mgbara o gasawi ko o wi-biro kɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ɓiyitsa gɛ ne, pa Sefəa Shala dzembe Amasay meghea ka ya ŋkwa, ma ke le berete: «Ŋa ŋa ghen'yɛ le gha nza ghen'yɛ David, wəzege ta Zhɛsɛ! Nza kwelɛŋe kaŋa ŋa ba'a kaŋa mbeli nyi kekemane ŋa va nya nza nde nahe Shala ta ŋa kekemanakɛ ŋa.» Pa David kemaneve hɛ kaveyi hɛ te slene hwa ka meghea ka sewajɛ.
Tupurri: Do kay no no, Nenterse raw laage ne Amasay wañ jar ma do swa'n wo ti, se day gano: Wuur wer äo, Dafidi, Wuur lag see äo, je ni Esay no, Daga jam, jam mo hay see äo, Daga jam mo hay see je maga caa war äo mono, Gahaçyla, Baa äon hay caa war äo le. Dafid raw yaçaç waare äaara, raw lag rage yoo wañre ma pel sode äen wo.

Francais: Comme il revenait à Siceleg, des hommes de Manassé se joignirent à lui: Ednas, Jozabad, Jédihel, Michaël, Jozabad, Eliu et Salathi, chefs des milliers de Manassé.
Anglais: As he went to Ziklag, there fell to him of Manasseh, Adnah, and Jozabad, and Jediael, and Michael, and Jozabad, and Elihu, and Zilthai, captains of the thousands that were of Manasseh.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sumuna vi Manase gi dirsi kuɗ vokŋa vi David, hay li ma nam co kuɗ sa Filistina kay dur Sawul. May nisi fi kay gut sa Filistinɗi; kay hay li ma sa ŋulona vi Filistin job tuwsi jobna, nisi gi ir David, kay nisi di'e: Kay la li ŋalɗi nam ma muɗ diram kuɗ mulamna Sawul, kay cay goyo.
Bulu: Bôte ya ayoñe Manasé fe be nga lat David éyoñ a nga ke late Befilisteñ asu ya wosane Saül. Ve David a e bôte bé be nji ke wosan e ngame Befilisteñ, amu bivete biap bi nga titane be; be nga simesan avale di na: David a ye beta lat a e nnôme masa wé Saül, a kuane bia be nye.
Guiziga: Mizli ngi Manasehey a jumom ng'avi Davit, hirak ti nana, naɓa Davit a boko le ati Filistihey nga kiɗa vu ati Sawul. Kpak naŋ na, Davit ati mizli naŋhaya, anta a gaka vurumo jom ati Filistiheye ta, asi buy Filistihey a ɓulaka mizli taŋhay avra, a ɓam na: «Davit a sa jum ng'avu buy naŋ Sawul a muŋ, dar a sa vula ndra asi haŋ ngi Sawul»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe Manassa woɗɓe boo ndilli, kawti bee Daawuda, wakkati o wardi bee Filisti'en ngam haɓugo bee Sawulu. Ammaa ɓe mballaay Filisti'en, ngam laamiiɓe Filisti'en carwootiri, mbi'i: “O tammi lortaago haa jawmiiko Sawulu, o mbara yimɓe meeɗen, o ta'a ko'e maɓɓe.” Ngam maajum ɓe njaɓɓiti mo.
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe Manassa woɗɓe boo ndilli, kawti bee Daawuda, wakkati o wardi bee Filisti'en ngam haɓugo bee Sawulu. Ammaa ɓe mballaay Filisti'en, ngam laamiiɓe Filisti'en carwootiri, mbi'i: “O tammi lortaago haa jawmiiko Sawulu, o mbara yimɓe meeɗen, o ta'a ko'e maɓɓe.” Ngam maajum ɓe njaɓɓiti mo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Manase yee biro ɗoŋ David ŋgimbi n'aa nɛɛ nɛnɛ in o be Filistii mɛ bi Saul. Mɔ kpɔk, David in o bíí kɔ‘i gbak so o be Filistii na, wen nɛ̀ o be-wan Filistii mɔi̧a ŋmaa ba keta, ɓɛɛ wa ndak David sinɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «A̧ tɛ zik tɛ-a ye ɗoŋ Saul, wan kɔ̧-a̧, mɛ gbɛ nɛ̀ yɛ!»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Manase yee biro ɗoŋ David ŋgimbi n'aa nɛɛ nɛnɛ in o be Filistii mɛ bi Saul. Mɔ kpɔk, David in o bíí kɔ‘i gbak so o be Filistii na, wen nɛ̀ o be-wan Filistii mɔi̧a ŋmaa ba keta, ɓɛɛ wa ndak David sinɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «A̧ tɛ zik tɛ-a ye ɗoŋ Saul, wan kɔ̧-a̧, mɛ gbɛ nɛ̀ yɛ!»
Kapsiki_DC: Pa kweci mbeli mbe hwelefe ta Manasɛ jikəyite geva yitea David te və nya jikəte geva ŋkɛ le ka Filisti yitea mpa le Sawəl. Ama kese yɛ David le mbelia ŋkɛ kakemane ka Filisti kaganda we, va nya nza nde kwa ntishɛ ka meghea ka Filisti, nahe hɛ kezhɛnaghe hɛ. Ma ke hɛ: «Katejikə geva David le wəndə nya kesleke ghalanza kapamte ɓə ve.»
Tupurri: Jar Manase kol wo go wer Dafid de maga aà hay ur le wer jar Filisteçeç wo ma dur Sawul mono. AÀma saara kay jar Filisteçeç wo gaa werga jar kluuri ma pel jar Filisteçeç hay ndal wo ti holañ äaara, fer wo Dafid liñ day wo gano: AÀ fer ge kolge go wer Sawul wañ äen na diñ de maga se taw naa go mono.

Francais: Ils secoururent David contre les bandes, car ils étaient tous des vaillants, et ils furent chefs dans l'armée.
Anglais: And they helped David against the band of the rovers: for they were all mighty men of valour, and were captains in the host.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma nam hot hay Siklag, kayni si sumuna vi Manase sa gi dirsi kuɗumna: Adnah, Yosabad, Yediyel, Mikayel, Yozabad, Elihu hiɗi Siltay sa ŋulona vi vokŋa vi Manase.
Bulu: Eyoñe David a nga bulan e Tiklag nje bôte ya Manasé be nga ke fubu nsamba wé; bôte bete be mbe na: Adna, Yôzabad, Yediaél, Mikaél, Yôzabad, Elihu a Siletayi bejôô ya minkane bita Manasé.
Guiziga: Ti Davit misi a Sikla na, mizli ngi Manasehey a jumom ngava so, i ti: Adna, Yozabap, Yediˀel, Mikayel, Yozabat, Elihu, waɗ Siletay, i buy miwi soje durmuk durmukoy ar sukwi ngi Manase.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde o lorti haa Cikilak, Manassa'en ɓe'e kawti bee maako: Adanaha e Yozabat e Yedi'ayel e Mika'iilu e Yozabat e Elihu e Cillitay, ɓe ardiiɓe dow honooɓe ujineere nder lenyol Manassa.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde o lorti haa Cikilak, Manassa'en ɓe'e kawti bee maako: Adanaha e Yozabat e Yedi'ayel e Mika'iilu e Yozabat e Elihu e Cillitay, ɓe ardiiɓe dow honooɓe ujineere nder lenyol Manassa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ David yaka nɛnɛ si Siklag, o be Manase nɛ̀ nɛɛ in a̧ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Adna, Yɔzabad, Yɛdiaɛl, Mikaɛl, Yɔzabad, Elihu in Silɛtai; wa nɛ́ o gasa wi-duk-zu bíí booro sɛn nù ko Manase.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ David yaka nɛnɛ si Siklag, o be Manase nɛ̀ nɛɛ in a̧ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Adna, Yɔzabad, Yɛdiaɛl, Mikaɛl, Yɔzabad, Elihu in Silɛtai; wa nɛ́ o gasa wi-duk-zu bíí booro sɛn nù ko Manase.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa slə David kadzawa Siklag ne, pa kweci mbelia Manasɛ jikəte geva le: yɛ Adna, Yozabad, Ɛlihəw le Siletay, ka meghe nyi te ghəa ka sewajɛa Manasɛ.
Tupurri: De maga se fer Siglag mono, mokay diñ ëu jar Manase maga hay kol wo go wer äe mono: AÀ hay wo diñ Adna, Yosabad, Yediyayel, Mikayel, Yosabad, Elihu wo de Siltay, wañre ma pel ngaäa jar Manasen wo.

Francais: Et de jour en jour des hommes arrivaient auprès de David pour le secourir, jusqu'à ce qu'il eût une grande armée, comme une armée de Dieu.
Anglais: For at that time day by day there came to David to help him, until it was a great host, like the host of God.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi tun vok sojena kay mar gutda visi mi David, kay nisi kaf si sum sa jufaya, sa dono'o, nisi ay si sa ŋulona vi vok-ma-duura.
Bulu: Bese be mbe biwôlô bi bôte mewosan a be nga zu ve nsamba David mvolan. Be nga suʼulane bo bivete ya nsamba mewosane wé.
Guiziga: Taŋ gar i soje miwirwirey, ara jinaka mizli ngi Daviteye. A tiram buy ngi soje naŋhay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe mballi Daawuda haɓugo bee mooɓre hippooɓe, ngam ɓe fuu ɓe honooɓe semmbiɗɓe, ɓe laati mawɓe nder jama'aare konu.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe mballi Daawuda haɓugo bee mooɓre hippooɓe, ngam ɓe fuu ɓe honooɓe semmbiɗɓe, ɓe laati mawɓe nder jama'aare konu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wa a̧ gbaka David in o gíí wi-biro, wen wa yaa so nɛ́ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ e wa nɛ́ o gasa wi-ya-zu o wi-biro.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wa a̧ gbaka David in o gíí wi-biro, wen wa yaa so nɛ́ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ e wa nɛ́ o gasa wi-ya-zu o wi-biro.
Kapsiki_DC: Kaka katsala kempa se hɛ ba'a kakemane mbelia David hɛ. Pa hɛ zhɛrenji kaka meghe te ghə ka sewajɛa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Saara raw caa war Dafid le, wo pel soden wo werga aà hay wo äuy diñ werpiiri ma de eegre jag jaw wo, saara raw joñge diñ wañre ma pel soden wo.

Francais: Voici le nombre des chefs des hommes armés pour la guerre qui vinrent auprès de David à Hébron, pour lui transférer la royauté de Saül, selon l'ordre de Yahweh.
Anglais: And these are the numbers of the bands that were ready armed to the war, and came to David to Hebron, to turn the kingdom of Saul to him, according to the word of the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay buurta buurta nisi ka co kat David kay gut kuɗumu, ta-ta vokŋa valam muɗ ŋolo, ki vokŋa vi Lawn nala.
Bulu: Môs ane môs , bôt be nga zu fubu nsamba David na be volô nye ajô te nsamba mewosane wé ô nga suʼulane bo anen.
Guiziga: Naŋ kine, vur hin gar na, mizli ara soko nga jina Davite, dar soje naŋhay a sikam haɗi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nyalɗe fuu yimɓe ngari ngam wallugo Daawuda, haa jama'aare konu maako laati mawnde masin.
Fulfulde_DC: Nyalɗe fuu yimɓe ngari ngam wallugo Daawuda, haa jama'aare konu maako laati mawnde masin.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dam ɗoŋ wese lɛŋ, o bíí a̧a̧ tɛ tɛa-a wen gbaka David tɛ biro, ɓɛɛ gbagari kɔ̧-a̧ gasi hee ko Sɔ̧ ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dam ɗoŋ wese lɛŋ, o bíí a̧a̧ tɛ tɛa-a wen gbaka David tɛ biro, ɓɛɛ gbagari kɔ̧-a̧ gasi hee ko Sɔ̧ ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Keveci keveci se mbeli kadzehwa wəvəsəa ka sewajɛa David kakemane. Ma tsagha, kwele kwele mbakete geva ka sewajɛa ŋkɛ kala ka sewajɛa Shala.
Tupurri: Ti naw tum jar hay woge see Dafid ma caa war äe, haçaç wo go ti wur maga jar tay wo go see äe ngaäa do jar mani Baa maga wo de kañge ta' nono.

Francais: Fils de Juda, portant le bouclier et la lance, six mille huit cents, armés pour la guerre.
Anglais: The children of Judah that bare shield and spear were six thousand and eight hundred, ready armed to the war.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni mi ŋaɓta vi nisi sa ay ganaya kay duura. Nisi kali kat David hay Hebron, kay jokom mulda vi Sawul, kuɗ dita vi Lawna.
Bulu: Tañe bôt be ne nguleya wosan, mbe be nga ke lat a David Ebroñ na be kalane nye éjôé Saül, aval abendé Nti é mbe:
Guiziga: Mizli mujuwam vu le kaˀ kaˀ ti gwat ngi vurumoy, a soko ngavi Davit a Hebroŋ, ɓa a ɓakaŋ ɓi ngi zumabuy ngi Sawulo, kaɓa Bumbulvuŋ muɓaŋ di ɗaˀ le. Mizli musoko vuna t'ani:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa limgal geɓe taaskaniiɓe konu, warɓe haa Daawuda haa Heburuun, ngam heɓango mo laamu Sawulu, bana Jawmiraawo umruno:
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa limgal geɓe taaskaniiɓe konu, warɓe haa Daawuda haa Heburuun, ngam heɓango mo laamu Sawulu, bana Jawmiraawo umruno:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bíí tɛ zuduk kpɔk kpɔk nɛ̀ wa tɔra, nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ boi wen bíí biro, nɛ̀ nɛ̀ɛ̀ sitɛ David sɛn Hebrɔŋ ha̧ wa mɛ ba wan ko Saul ha̧ ha̧ a̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bíí tɛ zuduk kpɔk kpɔk nɛ̀ wa tɔra, nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ boi wen bíí biro, nɛ̀ nɛ̀ɛ̀ sitɛ David sɛn Hebrɔŋ ha̧ wa mɛ ba wan ko Saul ha̧ ha̧ a̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ɓela ta mbeli nyi wərə mpa nyi, nyi kejikəte geva le David kwa Hɛbron kezha ve nda meghea Sawəl kala nya gezete Mahwətə:
Tupurri: Mokay diñ keege wañre jar maga hay wo go de gragge ma durgi mono. AÀ hay wo wo Hebroñ see Dafid ma haç wañ go ne hen ti jag Manwuri.

Francais: - Des fils de Siméon, hommes vaillants à la guerre, sept mille cent.
Anglais: Of the children of Simeon, mighty men of valour for the war, seven thousand and one hundred.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Yuda sa ziy marayna hiɗi kawayna, nisi birim karkiya hiɗi kis-glafandi, gani kay duura.
Bulu: Bone be Yuda, be beʼe ében a akoñ, bôte toyini ésaman a mintete muam, be bili biben a mekoñ.
Guiziga: Angi sukwi ngi Zuda, soje misi ti mbaray ati ziwiteye, taŋ durmuk merkeɗ ti skat skat dangafaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder yimɓe Yahuuda, marɓe bawarɗe e labbe, taaskaniiɓe konu ujine njoweego e teemeɗɗe njoweetato (6.800).
Fulfulde_DC: Nder yimɓe Yahuuda, marɓe bawarɗe e labbe, taaskaniiɓe konu ujine njoweego e teemeɗɗe njoweetato (6.800).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-biro tɛ zuduk ko Juda nɛ̀ mɔɔ-de-biro kɔ-wa nɛ́ sɛ́ɛ̀ in ŋgee nɛ́ bíí booro-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-biro tɛ zuduk ko Juda nɛ̀ mɔɔ-de-biro kɔ-wa nɛ́ sɛ́ɛ̀ in ŋgee nɛ́ bíí booro-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa hwelefe ta Zhəwda, ka sewajɛ 6.800 nyi le gelə ba'a le megha.
Tupurri: Jar Juda maga wo de ko ëaw gidigli wo de manjaw wo ndar hiira' ti äe kiskis nenma'aç wo go de gragge ma durgi.

Francais: - Des fils de Lévi, quatre mille six cents;
Anglais: Of the children of Levi four thousand and six hundred.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Simeyon, sum sa jufayna sa donona, gani kay duura, nisi birim siɗiya hiɗi diram kis.
Bulu: Bone be Siméoñ, biwôlô bezimbi toyini zamgbwa a ntete wua.
Guiziga: Angi sukwi ngi Simeyoŋ, mizli miwirwir ngi vurumoyo, taŋ durmuk tarnaˀ ti mizli skata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder yimɓe Simeyon, honooɓe semmbiɗɓe ujine njoweeɗiɗo e teemerre (7.100).
Fulfulde_DC: Nder yimɓe Simeyon, honooɓe semmbiɗɓe ujine njoweeɗiɗo e teemerre (7.100).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ zuduk ko Simɛɔŋ, o ŋga wi-biro nɛ́ booro-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ zuduk ko Simɛɔŋ, o ŋga wi-biro nɛ́ booro-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa.
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa hwelefe ta Simɛyon, 7.100 ka katsala kɛfia ka sewajɛ.
Tupurri: Jar ni Simeyoñ wo ndar renam de jar kisi, diñ werpiiri ma de eegre jag jaw wo.

Francais: et Joïada, chef de la famille d'Aaron, et avec lui trois mille sept cents;
Anglais: And Jehoiada was the leader of the Aaronites, and with him were three thousand and seven hundred;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Levi, nisi birim fiɗi hiɗi kis-karkiya;
Bulu: Bone be Lévi bôte toyini ényin a mintete misaman
Guiziga: Angi sukwi ngi Levi, durmuk mufaɗ ti skat skat merkeɗ,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder yimɓe Lewi, ujine nayo e teemeɗɗe njoweego (4.600).
Fulfulde_DC: Nder yimɓe Lewi, ujine nayo e teemeɗɗe njoweego (4.600).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ zuduk ko Levii nɛ́ bíí booro-naar-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ zuduk ko Levii nɛ́ bíí booro-naar-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk,
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa hwelefe ta Lɛvi, zhili 4.600,
Tupurri: Jar Lefid wo ndar naa ti äe kiskis hiira'a

Francais: et Sadoc, jeune homme vaillant, et la maison de son père, vingt-deux chefs.
Anglais: And Zadok, a young man mighty of valour, and of his father's house twenty and two captains.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hiɗi Yehoyada, ma vok jafna vi Aaron, sumun kuɗum birim ɦidi hiɗi kis-siɗiya;
