Fulfulde_DC: Nder ɓiɓɓe Heburuun boo, Yeriya woni arano e Amariya ɗiɗaɓo e Yahajiyel tataɓo e Yekame'am nayaɓo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Hebrɔŋ nɛ́ Yɛria kaya-a, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Amaria, taar-a nɛ́ Yahaziɛl, naar-a nɛ́ Yɛkamɛaŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Hebrɔŋ nɛ́ Yɛria kaya-a, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Amaria, taar-a nɛ́ Yahaziɛl, naar-a nɛ́ Yɛkamɛaŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili nyi yake Hɛbron: Yeriya nde ghate, Amariya nde zhɛne kadzeyite, Yaziyɛl nde mahekene ba'a Yekamam nde wəfaɗe.
Tupurri: Jar ni Hebroñ wo diñ: Yeriyahu wañ no, Amariya ma de äog no, Yahasiyel ma de swa' no, Yekameyan ma de naa no.

Francais: Fils d'Oziel Micha, le chef; Jésia, le second.
Anglais: Of the sons of Uzziel; Michah the first, and Isshiah the second.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Uziyel: Mikka ma ŋolla, Yikiya ma ma'na.
Bulu: Bone be Uziél: Miké, évet; a Yikiya e môta baa.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Uziyeleye, modogom i Mika, mijingaˀ naŋ i Isiya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder ɓiɓɓe Uzziyel boo, Mika woni arano e Yissiya boo ɗiɗaɓo.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder ɓiɓɓe Uzziyel boo, Mika woni arano e Yissiya boo ɗiɗaɓo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Uziɛl nɛ́ Mika, kaya-a in Isia hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Uziɛl nɛ́ Mika, kaya-a in Isia hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili nyi yake Əwziyɛl: Mika nde ghate, Isiya nde bake.
Tupurri: Jar ni Usiyel wo diñ Mise wañ no, diñ Yisiya ma de äog no.

Francais: Fils de Mérari: Moholi et Musi. –
Anglais: The sons of Merari; Mahli, and Mushi. The sons of Mahli; Eleazar, and Kish.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Merari: Makli hiɗi Musi. Gurona vi Makli: Eliyazar hiɗi Kis.
Bulu: Bone be Merari: Mali a Musi. Bone be Mali: Eléazar a Kis.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Merarihey i ti: Mali ati Musi. Mali a yi mizilehey cuw, i ti Elazar ati Kis.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Meraari ngoni: Mahali e Musi. Ɓiɓɓe Mahali boo, Eli'azaaru e Kis.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Meraari ngoni: Mahali e Musi. Ɓiɓɓe Mahali boo, Eli'azaaru e Kis.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Mɛrari nɛ́ Mali in Musi. O bem ko Mali nɛ́ Eleazar in Kis.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Mɛrari nɛ́ Mali in Musi. O bem ko Mali nɛ́ Eleazar in Kis.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili nyi yake Merari: yɛ Mahli le Məwshi. Bake yake ŋwale tezhili Mahli: yɛ Ɛlazar le Kish.
Tupurri: Jar ni Merari wo diñ Mahli wo de Musi. Jar ni Mahli wo diñ Eleyasar wo de Kisi.

Francais: Fils de Moholi: Eléazar et Cis. Eléazar mourut sans avoir de fils, mais seulement des filles; les fils de Cis, leurs frères, les prirent pour femmes. –
Anglais: And Eleazar died, and had no sons, but daughters: and their brethren the sons of Kish took them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Eliyazar mit bay fi guro sa jufaya; may nam fi guro sa boyo, gurona vi Kis sa ɓosiyosina yawsi boyo,
Bulu: Elézar a nga wu teke biaé monafam; ve a nga biaé bobebinga mbe bobefame be Kis bendôme bap, be nga luk.
Guiziga: Elazar a muc manja mizile, a pul mongosohoy halla, i sukum taŋhay, ziri ngi jamba taŋ Kis muɗuvaka taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Eli'azaaru maayi, walaa ɓiɓɓe worɓe, sey ɓiɓɓe rewɓe. Ɓiɓɓe Kis, banndiraaɓe maɓɓe ɓaŋgi ɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Eli'azaaru maayi, walaa ɓiɓɓe worɓe, sey ɓiɓɓe rewɓe. Ɓiɓɓe Kis, banndiraaɓe maɓɓe ɓaŋgi ɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Eleazar fea kpa be-wiwii na, a̧ koo nɛ́ o be-okoo, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ o nya kɔ-wa o bem ko Kis, a̧ kaia wa nɛ̀ kóò.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Eleazar fea kpa be-wiwii na, a̧ koo nɛ́ o be-okoo, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ o nya kɔ-wa o bem ko Kis, a̧ kaia wa nɛ̀ kóò.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Ɛlazar mtenyɛ kaɗema keyake wəzege teza, ama deke ŋwalea kwɛ nyi wəmehwe ŋwalea Kish nyi kaka kesaka yitehɛ nci yayake ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Eleyasar kal hugi go bay biñ weel ma tware, ane se biñ diñ mayre wo jar ni Kis heçeçre äaaran da wo ra go naare.

Francais: Fils de Musi: Molohi, Eder et Jérimoth: trois.
Anglais: The sons of Mushi; Mahli, and Eder, and Jeremoth, three.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: gurona vi Musi: Makli, Eder hiɗi Yeremot, nisi ɦidi.
Bulu: Bone be Musi: Mali, Eder a Yérémôt, bôte belaa.
Guiziga: Musi a yi ziri mizilehey makir, i ti: Mali, Eder waɗ Yeremot.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Musi boo, Mahali e Eder e Yeremot, ɓe tato.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Musi boo, Mahali e Eder e Yeremot, ɓe tato.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Musi nɛ́ Mali, Edɛr sɛka Yɛrɛmɔt; wa lɛŋ taar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Musi nɛ́ Mali, Edɛr sɛka Yɛrɛmɔt; wa lɛŋ taar.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili mahekene yake Məwshi: Mahli, Ɛdɛr le Yerɛmot.
Tupurri: Jar ni Musi wo diñ: Mahli, Eder wo de Yeremod, wo swa'a.

Francais: Ce sont là les fils de Lévi selon leurs familles, les chefs de famille selon qu'ils furent dénombrés, nommément comptés par tête; ils faisaient l'oeuvre du service de la maison de Yahweh, depuis l'âge de vingt ans et au-dessus.
Anglais: These were the sons of Levi after the house of their fathers; even the chief of the fathers, as they were counted by number of names by their polls, that did the work for the service of the house of the  Lord , from the age of twenty years and upward.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kayni si gurona vi Levi, kuɗ jafna vi sumaysi sa jufayna, sa ŋulona vi jafna. Kuɗ ŋaɓta ta ŋaɓsi goy kisi kep kepta. Nisi ka lakay hay lopna vi ziyna vi Ma-Vatɗina, tun caw tam busat dok-ma' pa ta-ta kulo voko.
Bulu: Bone be Lévi mbe le aval ane menda bʼésaa me né, bivete ya menda me bôt aval élañe bôt be nga bo é mbe éyoñe wo lañ biyôlé bi môt ase. Be nga bo ésaé e nda Nti ataté mimbu mewôm mebaé a lôte valé.
Guiziga: Ziri ngi Levihey i taŋ so, i buyoy a wuzla muy taŋhaya. A slufaka taŋ purla purla, a tohoko taŋ ng'ar ɗerewol ngi zila slimiɗe. Slra taŋ i slra ngir hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ, a zlaka zle ti vi kukur cuw hã nga mbuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kamɓe ngoni yimɓe Lewi fodde saare kaakiraaɓe maɓɓe, waato baaba-ci'e'en maɓɓe, huuwooɓe kuugal haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo. Ɓe limaama gooto gooto maɓɓe fuu bee innde innde, mo duuɓi noogas e ko ɓuri.
Fulfulde_DC: Kamɓe ngoni yimɓe Lewi fodde saare kaakiraaɓe maɓɓe, waato baaba-ci'e'en maɓɓe, huuwooɓe kuugal haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo. Ɓe limaama gooto gooto maɓɓe fuu bee innde innde, mo duuɓi noogas e ko ɓuri.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Levii nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nutua kɔ-wa, o gasawi nutua nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tom kɔ-wa, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ tɔra-bíí nutua kpɔk kpɔk usa ga nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. Tom kɔ-wa duka nɛ́ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ o wi nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo yak nɛnɛ siti.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Levii nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nutua kɔ-wa, o gasawi nutua nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tom kɔ-wa, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ tɔra-bíí nutua kpɔk kpɔk usa ga nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. Tom kɔ-wa duka nɛ́ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ o wi nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo yak nɛnɛ siti.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi tsagha se hwelefe ta Lɛvi, yayata wəndəa nci kameghe kwa yita ta ŋkɛ. Kwete kwete ɓelate hɛ mbeli le sləa nci. Se te va bakemsə ghate mene slene ta ghɛa Mahwətə hɛ.
Tupurri: Mo na diñ jar Lefid wo, go de carge ti tiñ mani paçaçre äaara wo ta' ta'a, go ti feele wañren wo ta' ta'a, do keege maga aà hay kee ra go boñ boñ nono. AÀ hay wo de kañge joñ peele äil tiñ mani Manwur no, tï¡ï¡ le ti ma kiñgi do äogn haçaç raw ciñ.

Francais: Car David dit: "Yahweh, le Dieu d'Israël, a donné le repos à son peuple, et il habitera pour toujours à Jérusalem;
Anglais: For David said, The  Lord  God of Israel hath given rest unto his people, that they may dwell in Jerusalem for ever:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay David di'e: Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vi Israyel vul tun-sukkawa mi sumuna valamu, nam ma mus hay Yerusalem dok-doko kaw.
Bulu: Amu David a nga jô na: Nti, Zambe ya Israél, a veya bôte bé awoʼon a Emien a ye tabe Yérusalém nnôm éto.
Guiziga: Naŋ kine, Davit a ɓi zleˀe na: «Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ngi Israyele, a vula zuy le da sukwi naŋ, naŋ vuna a sa ndir ngi caˀa a Zeruzaleme.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam Daawuda wi'no: “Allah Jawmiraawo Isra'iila hokki salaaman haa ummaatoore muuɗum. O ɗon jooɗi haa Urusaliima haa foroy.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam Daawuda wi'no: “Allah Jawmiraawo Isra'iila hokki salaaman haa ummaatoore muuɗum. O ɗon jooɗi haa Urusaliima haa foroy.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: David tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛti'e: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl  ha̧a̧ ɔma-tɛ ha̧ dukbíí kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ kinii, a̧ a̧a̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: David tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛti'e: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl  ha̧a̧ ɔma-tɛ ha̧ dukbíí kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ kinii, a̧ a̧a̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Va nya nza ŋkɛ ma ke David gezete: «Nahe Mahwətə, Shala ta ka Israyɛl kendeke nda nza kwelɛŋe ke mbelia ŋkɛ, mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm tenza ŋkɛ kaghala ghala.
Tupurri: Gahaçyla, Dafid hay waçaç go gana: Manwuri, Baa ma Israyel hay haç jag ne jar äen wo, aà hay ge mbe yañ wo sagsag äi leege Jerusalem.

Francais: et quant aux lévites, ils n'auront plus à porter la Demeure et tous les ustensiles pour son service."
Anglais: And also unto the Levites; they shall no more carry the tabernacle, nor any vessels of it for the service thereof.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay sa Levitna kaw, tabernaklena hiɗi jak ma li lop hayamna kaf nisi ma ziyim dok-dok loɗi.
Bulu: Ajô te, mfaʼa Belévit, ba ye bo te beta beʼe tabernakel a biôm bese ba yiane belane bie été.
Guiziga: Yo mana, Levihey, anta sa jijiraka guɗuk ati gwat ngi slraˀahaya ti jijir mata.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Bana nii Lewi'en tokkataako roondaago jooɗorde Jawmiraawo e kuuje kuugal nder maare” .
Fulfulde_DC: Bana nii Lewi'en tokkataako roondaago jooɗorde Jawmiraawo e kuuje kuugal nder maare” .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hegɔ, o be Levii beka tui  Tua-kpa-ŋmaa  in o nyɛk-ɗafi-sɔ̧ yar nɛnɛ ɓɔna.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hegɔ, o be Levii beka tui  Tua-kpa-ŋmaa  in o nyɛk-ɗafi-sɔ̧ yar nɛnɛ ɓɔna.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma tsagha ŋkɛ, mba ka Lɛvi kakele cɛ lekwesa kebegeme le Shala ba'a kweci wəshi nyi mene slene mbeli le mbe pɛtɛ kadzeghwa le we.»
Tupurri: Do kay nono, jar Lefid soë ge wo mburyugn wo de feçeçre joñre ma äil äen wo gaa so.

Francais: Ce fut d'après les derniers ordres de David que se fit le dénombrement des fils de Lévi depuis l'âge de vingt ans et au-dessus.
Anglais: For by the last words of David the Levites were numbered from twenty years old and above:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ŋaɓta vi gurona vi Levi li kayni kuɗ dita cawta vi David, tun-caw tam busat dok-ma' ta-ta voko.
Bulu: Be nga lañe bone be Lévi ataté mimbu mewôm mebaé a lôte valé avalʼane mejô David a nga kandane kobô me mbe.
Guiziga: Amma ar mingiɓi Davit miɓa ngi dirba na, toho slimiɗ ngi Levihey ar ɗerewolo, a zli ti vi kukur cuw hã nga mbuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lewi'en mbinndaama nder deftere limgal diga mo duuɓi noogas e ko ɓuri, fodde bolle Daawuda ragareeje.
Fulfulde_DC: Lewi'en mbinndaama nder deftere limgal diga mo duuɓi noogas e ko ɓuri, fodde bolle Daawuda ragareeje.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O be Levii nɛ̀‘i tɔra nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ sɔŋkur wen ko David nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo yak nɛnɛ siti nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O be Levii nɛ̀‘i tɔra nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ sɔŋkur wen ko David nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo yak nɛnɛ siti nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kala kwa keɗaŋe ta ghena ta David nya zəzəve ŋkɛ, tsagha rafete ka Lɛvi mbeli mbe palepa se te va bakemsə.
Tupurri: AÈ kee jar Lefid wo, tï¡ï¡ ti ma kiñgi do äog raw ciñ na ti jag Dafid ma blam tawn wo.

Francais: Car leur fonction était de se mettre à la disposition des fils d'Aaron pour le service de la maison de Yahweh, concernant les parvis et les chambres, la purification de toutes les choses saintes, et l'oeuvre du service de la maison de Dieu;
Anglais: Because their office was to wait on the sons of Aaron for the service of the house of the  Lord , in the courts, and in the chambers, and in the purifying of all holy things, and the work of the service of the house of God;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lop ma nisi lum kat gurona vi Aaron hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗin kayni: Hay ziyda, muzta-goyta vi slen ma peldetna kaf, slen ma li lop hiɗi namu hay ziyda vi Lawna,
Bulu: Bisaé biap, e mvuse bone bʼAron, asu ésaé ya nda Nti, bi mbe bi fombôʼô minseñ a bitune menda, ntunane biôm bise bi nʼétyi, biôm ba belane bie asu ésaé ya nda Nti,
Guiziga: A gam slra ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ, a wazlarayay, ar viŋhey, a bunaka gwat muvula le da Buymisemuŋ gar waɗ slra ngi gi ar hay ngi Buymisemuŋ ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa ɓe kuuwan njaggu maɓɓe nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo haa baŋnge ɓiɓɓe Haruna. Ɓe kalfitini ɓe kuugal dow babe e dow cuuɗi pamari e dow kuugal laɓɓitingo kuuje cenaaɗe fuu e dow kuugal taaskitingo kuuje dewal nder haykaliiru Allah
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa ɓe kuuwan njaggu maɓɓe nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo haa baŋnge ɓiɓɓe Haruna. Ɓe kalfitini ɓe kuugal dow babe e dow cuuɗi pamari e dow kuugal laɓɓitingo kuuje cenaaɗe fuu e dow kuugal taaskitingo kuuje dewal nder haykaliiru Allah
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa tɛ ya ɗɔɔ o bezaŋ Arɔŋ wen tom sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN: ɗafamɔ nú-zala, in kɔ̧ o gɔna-bɛr-tua, ɗafa war o nyɛk-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o ŋma tom sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa tɛ ya ɗɔɔ o bezaŋ Arɔŋ wen tom sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN: ɗafamɔ nú-zala, in kɔ̧ o gɔna-bɛr-tua, ɗafa war o nyɛk-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o ŋma tom sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Va hwelefe ta Aron fa ghena ta slene nyi kemene geva mbe ghɛa Mahwətə hɛ, te ŋwela ta ŋkɛ keɗema le kweci hwa cɛ nyi mbe. Kayaɓe wəshi nyi keveyi geva tekeleke hɛ wɛŋe wɛŋe ba'a kamene kweci slene tekeleke mbe ghɛa Shala.
Tupurri: Joñre äaara ti jeñ jar ni AÈron wo ti joñre ma äil tiñ mani Manwurn wo na diñ ma äi feele tiñ Baa no, ma äil tiñ naw ma äiñ tiñ Baan wo, diñ façaçge feçeçre ma bay ëagn wo äuy, diñ joñre ma defeë defeë maga wo de mañge see tiñ Baan mono,

Francais: concernant les pains de proposition, la fleur de farine pour les oblations, les galettes sans levain, ce qui est cuit sur la poêle et ce qui est mélangé, tout ce qu'il y avait à peser et à mesurer.
Anglais: Both for the shewbread, and for the fine flour for meat offering, and for the unleavened cakes, and for that which is baked in the pan, and for that which is fried, and for all manner of measure and size;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kay zlar fun yam tuwamu, futuw ma digeɗna kay ɗifinna, fun-bay-kufna, hambul ma cufi hay ŋarakŋa, hiɗi hambul ma ɗiliyna; slen ma ŋaɓ nekka hiɗi fiyokka;
Bulu: minnoñ mi belet, ékekeb avut asu mimvean ya mefup, biwôlé bi ne teke mvusan, biwôlé ba yañ e fulafan a biwôlé bi ne ñyaman; avek ese ya biôm bia sôé ane mendim a bi ba veʼe nté;
Guiziga: A kam slimiɗ ar ɗaf muvula le da Buymisemuŋ, hapa mukuɗ kuɗ ngi vul da Buymisemuŋ, tambali manja ˀis a ra, maɗaf mutuso, maɗaf milahaɗaŋ, yo a kam slimiɗ ar gwat ngi wi dudok ngi gwatay ati jek ngi gwatay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e ngam taaskitingo tamseeje jo'inteeɗe e kuroori ɗiggundi ngam dokke nyaamdu e tamseeje bette ɗe ufnaaka e ca'aaɗe e tamsaaɗum fuu e ngam hakkilango poondirɗe feere feere.
Fulfulde_DC: e ngam taaskitingo tamseeje jo'inteeɗe e kuroori ɗiggundi ngam dokke nyaamdu e tamseeje bette ɗe ufnaaka e ca'aaɗe e tamsaaɗum fuu e ngam hakkilango poondirɗe feere feere.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wa a̧ tɛ ɗafi o brɛt wen ha̧a̧-a̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧, in fuu wen ha̧a̧mɔ. Wa tɛ ɗafi o makala nɛ̀ hao bo sɛnɛ na, o hana makala sɛka o makala nɛ‘i aa mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ sɛnɛ in o nyɛk-we-mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wa a̧ tɛ ɗafi o brɛt wen ha̧a̧-a̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧, in fuu wen ha̧a̧mɔ. Wa tɛ ɗafi o makala nɛ̀ hao bo sɛnɛ na, o hana makala sɛka o makala nɛ‘i aa mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ sɛnɛ in o nyɛk-we-mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Kamene slene ta ɗafa nyi keveyi geva kaŋa Shala, kahi hə kezha wəshi nyi ve nda mbeli ke Shala nyi wəzate mbeli, le yɛ gatewe nyi kewepema, le kweci ma ta gatewe. Ghenci ka newe ghweme te wəshi kenewe ɗaŋeɗa ta wəshi le nyi kedzeghe yɛ n'yi.
Tupurri: diñ sraëge holen wo, diñ 'wuçygi coo ma legeën ma sië jagn wo, diñ joñge gato ma bay defoçoçre non wo, joñge gato ma de hiëilgin wo, joñge gato ma de kargen wo, diñ ëawge feçeçre ma ngaä feçeçren wo de ma ngaä paçaçge feçeçren wo.

Francais: Ils avaient à se présenter chaque matin et chaque soir, afin de célébrer et louer Yahweh,
Anglais: And to stand every morning to thank and praise the  Lord , and likewise at even;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nisi as co hay graw culumta kaf, kay li yuldeta, kay subur Ma-Vatɗina kaw, hay vulatita kaw,
Bulu: Tyé ése a ngôʼé ése be nga yiane zu kañ a seʼe Nti,
Guiziga: T'ada weˀ vu, prik pastaˀ ngi hunuma Bumbulvuŋ, yo ngi jaŋ salalay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe taasko boo fajiri e kiikiiɗe fuu ngam yettugo e maŋgtugo Jawmiraawo,
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe taasko boo fajiri e kiikiiɗe fuu ngam yettugo e maŋgtugo Jawmiraawo,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi gasa GASA WAN in zɔna a̧ mɛ tutuyɛ lɛŋ in mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ mbɛt, wa tɛ ya oi-aa,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi gasa GASA WAN in zɔna a̧ mɛ tutuyɛ lɛŋ in mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ mbɛt, wa tɛ ya oi-aa,
Kapsiki_DC: Nda hɛ kanza tagha kala masheke ta ŋkwa le tɛhwɛɗi kezha tsahe Mahwətə le tsa nda hana.
Tupurri: AÀ hay wo age tum de jag toñ lay, de law lay ma mañ ti Manwur ciñ, ma togoëge äe,

Francais: et d'offrir tous les holocaustes à Yahweh dans les sabbats, les nouvelles lunes et les fêtes, selon le nombre que la loi prescrit d'offrir à perpétuité devant Yahweh.
Anglais: And to offer all burnt sacrifices unto the  Lord  in the sabbaths, in the new moons, and on the set feasts, by number, according to the order commanded unto them, continually before the  Lord :
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kay li ɗifin ma ŋal-goyna vok Ma-Vatɗina hay buuri vi sabatna kaf, hay til ma wulina hiɗi buur ma yuldeta kuɗ ŋaɓta vi buura ma gatta colomu, ma nisi ka li kuɗum dok-doko.
Bulu: a ve Nti mimvean ba diʼi ngumba asu Nti, e besabat, e metéé me ngon a e beta mebôk , abime biyoñ e ne ntelan, e nyeʼelane wo jôô be éyoñ ése été.
Guiziga: Da ara gam mikuli mizlam zlam da Bumbulvuŋ, ar hin ngi sabat, hin ngi kiya muslo le, waɗ ar hin ngi muguzlumoy na, a hunumakaŋ, yo a jakaŋ salalaya ma, slaf slaf kaslsla ar hin naŋ mislaka taŋ di, ɓa a gaka ngi set a mbuŋ Bumbulvuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ɓe lii'o guleteeɗi fuu nder nyalɗe ciwtorɗe e juulɗe lewru hesru e juulɗe goɗɗe, yeeso Jawmiraawo tum fodde limgal ngal Jawmiraawo umri ɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: ɓe lii'o guleteeɗi fuu nder nyalɗe ciwtorɗe e juulɗe lewru hesru e juulɗe goɗɗe, yeeso Jawmiraawo tum fodde limgal ngal Jawmiraawo umri ɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: wa tɛ  dɔ  kpoo-sɔ̧ wan mɛ Sabat, wan mɛ mbe yí-zɛ in o wan mɛ tɛ gbaŋa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ. Wa tɛ ya kànà nɛ̀ dama-a ɓɔnsɛnɛ wen dee tom ti GASA WAN.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: wa tɛ  dɔ  kpoo-sɔ̧ wan mɛ Sabat, wan mɛ mbe yí-zɛ in o wan mɛ tɛ gbaŋa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ. Wa tɛ ya kànà nɛ̀ dama-a ɓɔnsɛnɛ wen dee tom ti GASA WAN.
Kapsiki_DC: Nda hɛ kanza tagha te yayata və nya nza mbeli kadzeghe nda melɛ kwa tere tere, le veci kezhɛne mpi, le kwa ghate ta hɛa tere keɗema kweci hɛa gəsəkə. Te yayata və mene slene ta nci hɛ mbe kema ta Mahwətə kala nya ɓelate nda mbeli ke hɛ.
Tupurri: ma sië siigi jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuy ne Manwur ti wur Saban wo, ti kolge few ciñn wo, ti wur kurwuyn wo, wo go de keege ta' ta' tum do maga jag liñgi ma äaaran de waçaçge ga aà mo see wo no mono.

Francais: Ils devaient s'appliquer au soin de la tente de réunion, au soin des choses saintes et au soin des fils d'Aaron, leurs frères, pour le service de la maison de Yahweh.
Anglais: And that they should keep the charge of the tabernacle of the congregation, and the charge of the holy place, and the charge of the sons of Aaron their brethren, in the service of the house of the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi ŋom guɗuk ma fi-tuwna, ŋom liyn ma peldetna, ka li kuɗ dita vi gurona vi Aaron sa ɓosiyosina kay li lop hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: Be nga yiane baʼale nda éndelé bendôbaʼan, vôm a nʼétyi a baʼale abendé bone bʼAron, bobenyañe bap, asu ésaé ya nda Nti.
Guiziga: Asa jiginaka guɗuk waɗ hay ngi Buymisemuŋ, yo a sa gaka slra ngir hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ jom ati sukum taŋ ziri ngi Aroŋhoy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ɗon kuuwa haa laymaaru fottirde e haykaliiru seniindu, ɓe kuuwana boo banndiraaɓe maɓɓe, ɓiɓɓe Haruna, kuugal nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo .
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ɗon kuuwa haa laymaaru fottirde e haykaliiru seniindu, ɓe kuuwana boo banndiraaɓe maɓɓe, ɓiɓɓe Haruna, kuugal nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hegɔ, wa tɛ de tom sɛn kɔ̧  Tua-kpa-ŋmaa , wa tɛ ɗafi mɔ nɛ̀‘i ee ha̧ Sɔ̧,  gbak nɛ̀ o nya-wa o bem ko Arɔŋ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hegɔ, wa tɛ de tom sɛn kɔ̧  Tua-kpa-ŋmaa , wa tɛ ɗafi mɔ nɛ̀‘i ee ha̧ Sɔ̧,  gbak nɛ̀ o nya-wa o bem ko Arɔŋ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Kanewe ghweme hɛ te nza ta cɛ lekwesa kebegeme le Shala ŋkwa nya vare reghwetɛ mbe ghɛa Shala. Kakemane mbelia Aron nyi kaka menəhɛ nci hɛ kezha slene ta ghɛa Mahwətə.
Tupurri: Joñre jar Lefid hay wo diñ gorge ti tiñ ma yiñgi no, gorge ti ngeel ma bay ëag no, day saara hay hoo sug ti jag maga heçeçre äaara jar ni AÈron hay wo haçge äe ne hara ti joñre ma äil tiñ mani Manwurn mono.

Francais: Quant aux fils d'Aaron, voici leurs classes:
Anglais: Now these are the divisions of the sons of Aaron. The sons of Aaron; Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Vokŋa vi gurona vi Aaron: Nadab, Abihu, Eliyazar hiɗi Itamar.
Bulu: Minsamba mi bone bʼAron: bone bʼAron: Nabad, Abihu, Eléazar a Itamar.
Guiziga: A ngicaka ziri ngi Aroŋhoyo le ti ngay ti ngay. Ziri mizile ngi Aroŋhoyo mufaɗa, i ti: Nadap, Abihu, Elazar, waɗ Itamar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa geɓe nder danygol Haruna. Ɓiɓɓe Haruna ngoni: Nadab e Abihu e Eli'azaaru e Itamar.
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa geɓe nder danygol Haruna. Ɓiɓɓe Haruna ngoni: Nadab e Abihu e Eli'azaaru e Itamar.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dùk o bezaŋ Arɔŋ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ. O bem ko Arɔŋ nɛ́ Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar in Itamar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dùk o bezaŋ Arɔŋ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ. O bem ko Arɔŋ nɛ́ Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar in Itamar.
Kapsiki_DC: Kewəvəsə kewəvəsə nehete ŋwalea Aron mbeli mbe. Wəfaɗe yake ŋwale tezhili Aron: Nadab, Abihəw, Ɛlazar le Itamar.
Tupurri: Carge äil jar ni AÈron wo: Jar ni AÈron wo diñ Nadab, Abihu, Eleyasar wo de Itamare.

Francais: Fils d'Aaron: Nadab, Abiu, Eléazar et Ithamar. Nadab et Abiu moururent avant leur père, sans avoir de fils, et Eléazar et Ithamar remplirent les fonctions du sacerdoce.
Anglais: But Nadab and Abihu died before their father, and had no children: therefore Eleazar and Ithamar executed the priest's office.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nadab hiɗi Abihu mit jew busiya, kay nisi may vuɗ guroɗi, Eliyazar hiɗi Itamar li lop ɗifinna.
Bulu: Nadab a Abihu be nga taté wu a ésaa wop teke liʼi bon; Eléazar a Itamar be nga bo ésaé betuni.
Guiziga: Nadap ati Abihu a micam dumbuŋ ar cine taŋ, manja a yam. Dar a vulaka slra ngi gi mikuli da Eliyazar ati Itamar tewle.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa Nadab e Abihu aarti baaba muuɗum'en maayugo, ɓe keɓaay ɓikkoy. Eli'azaaru e Itamar tan kuuwi kuugal limanku .
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa Nadab e Abihu aarti baaba muuɗum'en maayugo, ɓe keɓaay ɓikkoy. Eli'azaaru e Itamar tan kuuwi kuugal limanku .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nadab in Abihu fee nɛti ha̧ dáà kɔ-wa, be-wiwii bo na; hegɔ, wa ha̧a̧ tom ɗafa-sɔ̧ ha̧ Eleazar in Itamar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nadab in Abihu fee nɛti ha̧ dáà kɔ-wa, be-wiwii bo na; hegɔ, wa ha̧a̧ tom ɗafa-sɔ̧ ha̧ Eleazar in Itamar.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa yɛ Nadab le Abihəw mpənji mpelɛa ma ke yiteyɛa nci, kaɗema keyake ŋwale tezhili. Vatse nza nde yɛ Ɛlazar le Itamar ka mene slene ta dzeghe Shala.
Tupurri: Nadab wo de Abihu raw wo hugi go tañgu pan äaara bay biñ weere. Eleyasar wo de Itamar hay wo ti joñre siëgi jag no.

Francais: David, Sadoc, de la descendance d'Eléazar, et Achimélech, de la descendance d'Ithamar, répartirent les fils d'Aaron par classes selon leur service.
Anglais: And David distributed them, both Zadok of the sons of Eleazar, and Ahimelech of the sons of Ithamar, according to their offices in their service.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: David hiɗi Sadok jar gurona vi Eliyazar hiɗi Ahimelek jar gurona vi Itamar nisi poŋ ir gurona vi Aaron kuɗ lop ma nisi as lumna.
Bulu: David, nalé fe Sadok ya bone bʼEléazar a Ahimélek ya bone bʼItamar, be nga kabe bone bʼAron avalʼane bisaé biap bi né.
Guiziga: A dirba nah, Sadok mangal ngi Elizar waɗ Ahimelek mangal ngi Itamara, a jinaka Davite, a wunkaka masayaya ti ngay ti ngay, avu slra ngi mburo ngi mburo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Daawuda e Cadok mo danygol Eli'azaaru e Ahimelek mo danygol Itamar cenndi yimɓe Haruna ngam geɓe kuugal maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Daawuda e Cadok mo danygol Eli'azaaru e Ahimelek mo danygol Itamar cenndi yimɓe Haruna ngam geɓe kuugal maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: David in Sadɔk bezaŋ Eleazar bá nɛ̀ Ahimɛlɛk bezaŋ Itamar kɛ̧ɛ̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tom kɔ-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: David in Sadɔk bezaŋ Eleazar bá nɛ̀ Ahimɛlɛk bezaŋ Itamar kɛ̧ɛ̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tom kɔ-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa yɛ David le Sadok nya kahwelefe ta Ɛlazar ba'a le Ahimɛlɛk, hwelefe ta Itamar nehemte ka dzeghe Shala mbe kewəvəsə kewəvəsə kala nza ta slene ta nci.
Tupurri: Dafid lay, Sadog yoo jar ni Eleyasarn wo lay, Ahimeleg yoo jar ni Itamar wo lay, kal wo car jar ni AÈron wo go ta' ta' ti joñre maga a wo nen age joñge äe mono.

Francais: On trouva parmi les fils d'Eléazar plus de chefs que parmi les fils d'Ithamar, et on les répartit ainsi: pour les fils d'Eléazar, seize chefs de famille, et, pour les fils d'Ithamar, huit chefs de famille.
Anglais: And there were more chief men found of the sons of Eleazar than of the sons of Ithamar; and thus were they divided. Among the sons of Eleazar there were sixteen chief men of the house of their fathers, and eight among the sons of Ithamar according to the house of their fathers.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa ŋolona sa jar gurona vi Eliyazar suw sa ŋulona sa jar gurona vi Itamar, kuɗ na'ta jafna vi Eliyazar ɓuraw vokŋa visi doogo yam karkiya, jafna vi Itamar nisi ɓurawam ir vok glafandi may. Hiɗi sa ŋulona visi voksi kaf.
Bulu: Bone bʼEléazar be nga bili abui bivet a lôte bone bʼItamar, éyoñe te be nga kabe be avale di na: Bone bʼEléazar be bi bivet awôm a bisamane ya menda bʼésaa, bone bʼItamar ki bivete ya menda bʼésaa muam.
Guiziga: A praka keɗ keɗ na, dideˀ ngi Elazaraya taŋ haɗi a funaka ngi Itamaraya le. Vurˀe, a cifam buy asi muy ngi Elazaraya taˀtaˀ kuruˀ nga merkeɗ, yo a wuzla muy ngi Itamraya taˀtaˀ dangafaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Worɓe nder danygol Eli'azaaru ɓuri worɓe nder danygol Itamar ɗuuɗugo. Ngam man ɓe cenndi ɓe bana nii: Haa danygol Eli'azaaru baaba-ci'e'en sappo e njoweego, haa danygol Itamar boo baaba-ci'e'en njoweetato.
Fulfulde_DC: Worɓe nder danygol Eli'azaaru ɓuri worɓe nder danygol Itamar ɗuuɗugo. Ngam man ɓe cenndi ɓe bana nii: Haa danygol Eli'azaaru baaba-ci'e'en sappo e njoweego, haa danygol Itamar boo baaba-ci'e'en njoweetato.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wiwii dɔka so mgbara o bezaŋ Eleazar gan ko Itamar. Tɛ bezaŋ Eleazar wa kɛ̧ɛ̧ nutua ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk nɛ̀ o gasawi zu wa, ɓɛɛ ko o bezaŋ Itamar nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wiwii dɔka so mgbara o bezaŋ Eleazar gan ko Itamar. Tɛ bezaŋ Eleazar wa kɛ̧ɛ̧ nutua ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk nɛ̀ o gasawi zu wa, ɓɛɛ ko o bezaŋ Itamar nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma newe mbeli ne, kwele ma zhili mbe hwelefe ta Ɛlazar ke ŋa Itamar. Vatse nehemte hwelefe ta Ɛlazar mbeli mbe kapelə meŋe ŋkwaŋeghəmbe, kapelə deghese nehemte ŋa Itamar mbeli mbe. Yayata pelə le ŋa ŋkɛ wəndə nya te ghə.
Tupurri: Yoo jar ni Eleyasar wo mono, wañre raw joñge ni pur de dañ ma yoo jar ni Itamarn wo, day aè raw car rage go ta' ta' joñ go nen maga wañre ma ti tiñ paçaçrebe mo hay wo yoo jar ni Eleyasar wo hwal ti hiira'a, yoo jar ni Itamar wo nenma'aç.

Francais: On les répartit par le sort, les uns comme les autres, car il se trouvait des princes du sanctuaire et des princes de Dieu aussi bien parmi les fils d'Eléazar que parmi les fils d'Ithamar.
Anglais: Thus were they divided by lot, one sort with another; for the governors of the sanctuary, and governors of the house of God, were of the sons of Eleazar, and of the sons of Ithamar.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma nisi li ɓurawta visiya, nisi ŋaɓsi kuɗ ɦayta, segena hiɗi segen kaf, kay sa sun hay liyn ma peldetna hiɗi sa sunda vi Lawna nisi kaf si gurona vi Eliyazar hiɗi gurona vi Itamar.
Bulu: Be nga kabe be a mboon asimba , bana ba be ba bevok a amu bebo bisaé ya vôm a nʼétyi a bebo bisaé be Zambe be mbe bone bʼEléazar a bone bʼItamar.
Guiziga: A wunkaka taŋ ti cergizleŋ, asi a wuzla ziri ngi Elazaray ati ngi Itamaraya, yarma migi slra ngir li muvuku vu taŋ ada, yo migi slra ngi Buymisemuŋhoy ada.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe cenndi ɓe fuu bee kur'u, ngam mawɓe haykaliiru seniindu e jaggiiɓe Allah ɗon caka danygol Eli'azaaru bana ɓe ɗon nder danygol Itamar.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe cenndi ɓe fuu bee kur'u, ngam mawɓe haykaliiru seniindu e jaggiiɓe Allah ɗon caka danygol Eli'azaaru bana ɓe ɗon nder danygol Itamar.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa pi̧i̧ tani kɛ̧ nɛ̀ wa wen o gasawi  sa̧a̧-fara  in o gasawi ko Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ so mgbara o bezaŋ Eleazar hee mgbara o bezaŋ Itamar ga mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa pi̧i̧ tani kɛ̧ nɛ̀ wa wen o gasawi  sa̧a̧-fara  in o gasawi ko Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ so mgbara o bezaŋ Eleazar hee mgbara o bezaŋ Itamar ga mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Le sla kwasheghediɗi nehemte geva hɛ, kwa nza ŋkɛ ka mene slene mbe ŋkwa nya keveyi geva tekeleke ba'a ka mene nda slene ke Shala ya hwa hwelefefia Ɛlazar ba'a hwa hwelefefia Itamar.
Tupurri: AÈ raw car rage go ta' ta' de naage waçywaale, jar la wo lay, jar la wo lay werga jar kluuri joñre ma ti ngeel ma bay ëag wo de jar kluuri joñre mani Baan hay wo diñ jar ni Eleyasar wo de jar ni Itamar wo.

Francais: Séméïas, fils de Nathanaël, le secrétaire, un des lévites, les inscrivit devant le roi et les princes, devant Sadoc le grand prêtre, et Achimélech, fils d'Abiathar, et devant les chefs de familles sacerdotales et lévitiques, une famille étant tirée au sort pour Eléazar, puis une famille pour Ithamar.
Anglais: And Shemaiah the son of Nethaneel the scribe, one of the Levites, wrote them before the king, and the princes, and Zadok the priest, and Ahimelech the son of Abiathar, and before the chief of the fathers of the priests and Levites: one principal household being taken for Eleazar, and one taken for Ithamar.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma ɗo slena Semayeya goora vi Nataneel, ma hay jafna vi Levina, nam ɗosi sesi gaa vok mulla hiɗi sa ɗo slena, vok mul-ma-ɗifinna Sadok, vok Ahimelek goora vi Abiyatar, vok sa ŋulona vi jafna vi muliyan-sa-ɗifinna hiɗi sa Levitna. (Hay ŋaɓta) nisi ŋaɓ sumun ma' hay jafna vi Eliyazar, nisi ŋaɓ sa kep hay jafna vi Itamar may.
Bulu: Ntili bekalate Semaéya, e mone Natanaél ya ayoñe Lévi, a nga tili be môé ôsu njô bôt a bebo bisaé ôsu be ntuni Sadok, ôsu be Ahimélek, e mone Abiatar a ôsu be bivete ya menda me bôte betuni a Belévit. Be mbe be nyoñe nda bʼésaa jia asu Eléazar a nyô fok asu Itamar.
Guiziga: Semaya mbur mutoho gwat, mangal ngi Natanayel, ngir sukwi ngi Levi, a toho slimiɗ taŋ a mihiri ngi buy madiɗaŋ, ngi yarmahay, ngi Sadok ati Ahimelek masayay, yo a mihiri ngi buy ngi wuzla muyoy ati levihey. Asi muy ngi Elazaraya, a zuɓam ti ceregizleŋ is cuw, asi ngi Itamaraya is pal.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sema'ya ɓii Netaneyel, binndoowo Lewiijo, kaŋko o winndi inɗe maɓɓe yeeso laamiiɗo e mawɓe e Cadok limanjo e Ahimelek ɓii Abiyatar e baaba-ci'e'en liman'en e Lewi'en. Ɓe mbaɗi kur'u: Ɓe koo'i saare woore ngam Eli'azaaru e saare woore ngam Itamar.
Fulfulde_DC: Sema'ya ɓii Netaneyel, binndoowo Lewiijo, kaŋko o winndi inɗe maɓɓe yeeso laamiiɗo e mawɓe e Cadok limanjo e Ahimelek ɓii Abiyatar e baaba-ci'e'en liman'en e Lewi'en. Ɓe mbaɗi kur'u: Ɓe koo'i saare woore ngam Eli'azaaru e saare woore ngam Itamar.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛmaya, ŋma be Levii bem ko Nɛtanɛl wi-yɔr-mɔ yɔra nin-wa sɛn ti wannu, ti o gasawi, ti Sadɔk wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, ti Ahimɛlɛk bem ko Abiatar in ti o gasawi nutua ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, in ti o bezaŋ Levii. Wa pi̧i̧ tani war yiitoo ba nɛ̀ bíí yiitoo nutua ko Eleazar, ɓɛɛ wa pi̧ tani war kpɔk ba nɛ̀ bíí kpɔk nutua ko Itamar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛmaya, ŋma be Levii bem ko Nɛtanɛl wi-yɔr-mɔ yɔra nin-wa sɛn ti wannu, ti o gasawi, ti Sadɔk wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, ti Ahimɛlɛk bem ko Abiatar in ti o gasawi nutua ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, in ti o bezaŋ Levii. Wa pi̧i̧ tani war yiitoo ba nɛ̀ bíí yiitoo nutua ko Eleazar, ɓɛɛ wa pi̧ tani war kpɔk ba nɛ̀ bíí kpɔk nutua ko Itamar.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa nde rafe wəshi Shemaya nya kawəzege ta Netanɛyɛl hwa ka Lɛvi rafete hɛ kwa kema ta yɛ meghe nya wəba, le kweci ka meghe, le nde dzeghe Shala Sadok, le Ahimɛlɛk wəzege ta Abiyatar, ka meghe nyi kwa yita, ka dzeghe Shala le ka Lɛvi. Bake zhigəa mbeli kasla kwasheghediɗi kaŋa yita ta Ɛlazar, kwetɛŋe zhigə ŋa yita ta Itamar.
Tupurri: Semaeya je ni Netaneeln ti äï¡ï¡ni maLefidn raw yer keege äaara go pel wañ, yer keege jar kluuri joñren wo pel Sadog je sië jag no, pel Ahimeleg je ni Abiyatar no, pel wañre ma ti feele mani jar sië jagn wo de jar Lefidn wo. AÀ hoo wañre ma ti feele äog ni Eleyasar, aè baa boñ ni Itamare.

Francais: Le premier sort échut à Joïarib, le deuxième à Jédéï,
Anglais: Now the first lot came forth to Jehoiarib, the second to Jedaiah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ŋaɓta jewta nig kay Yehoyarib; ta mul ma'ta nig kay Yedaya;
Bulu: Mboon asimba ôsu ô nga liti Yehôyada; wu baa Yedaéya;
Guiziga: Ceregezleŋ mudumbuŋ a diɗ ar Yoyarip, mucuw naŋ ar Yedaya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kur'u aranu waŋgini Yoyariba, ɗiɗaɓu Yeda'ya,
Fulfulde_DC: Kur'u aranu waŋgini Yoyariba, ɗiɗaɓu Yeda'ya,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kuti tani baa Yɛhɔyarib, yiitoo tani baa Yɛdaya,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kuti tani baa Yɛhɔyarib, yiitoo tani baa Yɛdaya,
Kapsiki_DC: __Error__
Tupurri: Waçywaàale ma tañgun le' ti Yehoyarib, ma de äogn ti Yedaeya,

Francais: le troisième à Harim, le quatrième à Séorim,

BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ta mul ɦidita nig kay Harim; ta mul fiɗita nig kay Seworim;
Bulu: wu lale Harim; wu nyini Seorim;
Guiziga: mimakir naŋ ar Harim, mumufaɗ naŋ ar Seworim,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: tataɓu Harim, nayaɓu Se'orim,
Fulfulde_DC: tataɓu Harim, nayaɓu Se'orim,

KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-aa baa Hakɔs, mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-a baa Abia,

Francais: le neuvième à Jésua, le dixième à Séchénia,

BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ta mul zleeŋeta nig kay Yosuwa; ta mul doogota nig kay Sekaniya:
Bulu: wu ébulu Yasua; wu awômô Sekanya Hu;

Guiziga: mukuruˀ ngaŋ kaˀ naŋ ar Eliyasip, mukuruˀ nga cuw naŋ ar Yakim,

KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-a baa Bilga; ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a baa Imɛr,
Kapsiki_DC: __Error__

Anglais: The nineteenth to Pethahiah, the twentieth to Jehezekel,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ta doogo yam zleeŋeta nig kay Petahya; ta dok-ma'ta nig kay Ezekiyel;
Bulu: wu awôm a ébulu Pétaya; wu mewôm mebaa Ezékiel;
Guiziga: mukuruˀ nga ngoltir naŋ ar Petahiya, mizli ngir cuw naŋ ar Ezekiyel,

Kapsiki_DC: __Error__

Anglais: The one and twentieth to Jachin, the two and twentieth to Gamul,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ta dok-ma' yam kepta nig kay Yakin; ta dok-ma' yam ma'ta nig kay Gamul;
Bulu: wu mewôme baa a wua Yakin; wu mewôm mebaé a baa Gamul;
Guiziga: mizli ngir cuw ngaŋ kaˀ naŋ ar Yakiŋ, mizli ngir cuw nga cuw naŋ ar Gamul,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: noogas e ngo'oowu Yakin, noogas e ɗiɗaɓu Gamul,
Fulfulde_DC: noogas e ngo'oowu Yakin, noogas e ɗiɗaɓu Gamul,

Kapsiki_DC: __Error__

Francais: le vingt-troisième à Dalaiaü, le vingt-quatrième à Mazziaü.
Anglais: The three and twentieth to Delaiah, the four and twentieth to Maaziah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ta dok-ma' yam ɦidita nig kay Delaya; ta dok-ma' yam fiɗita nig kay Maaziya.
Bulu: wu mewôm mebaé a lale Delayahu, wu mewôm mebaé a nyini Maziahu.
Guiziga: mizli ngir cuw nga makir naŋ ar Delaya, mizli ngir cuw nga mufaɗ naŋ ar Maˀaziya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: noogas e tataɓu Delaya, noogas e nayaɓu Ma'ajiya.
Fulfulde_DC: noogas e tataɓu Delaya, noogas e nayaɓu Ma'ajiya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓu-yiitoo-zua-taar-a baa Delaya; ɓɛɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-naar-a ba Mazia.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓu-yiitoo-zua-taar-a baa Delaya; ɓɛɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-naar-a ba Mazia.
Kapsiki_DC: __Error__
Tupurri: ma de do äog ti swa'n ti Deleyahu, ma de do äog ti naan ti Maasiyahu

Francais: Telles furent leurs classes selon leur service, afin qu'ils vinssent à la maison de Yahweh, selon le règlement qu'ils avaient reçu par l'organe d'Aaron, leur père, comme le lui avait ordonné Yahweh, le Dieu d'Israël.
Anglais: These were the orderings of them in their service to come into the house of the  Lord , according to their manner, under Aaron their father, as the  Lord  God of Israel had commanded him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki kayn nala nisi vulsi lopna kay li sunda; kay cuk kalaf hay ziyna vi Ma-Vatɗina kuɗ gatta ta busi Aaron cola'ta, ki Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vi Israyel vulum hagat nala.
Bulu: Avale di nde be nga nyoñe mbeʼe ya ésaé jap, asu ya nyiin e nda Nti, avale nyeʼelan ô né ñwô ésaa wop Aron a nga telé avale Nti, Zambe ya Israél a nga bendé nye.
Guiziga: A wunkaka taŋ ngi ci ng'ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ ar slra taŋhay kahana so. A gaka slra taŋ kaɓa dideˀ taŋ Aroŋ mupula taŋ jiviɗ naŋ. Aroŋ kwana, a lumo di avu Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ngi Israyel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kanje ngoni geɓe kuugal maɓɓe, haa ɓe nasta haykaliiru Jawmiraawo fodde umroore nde Jawmiraawo Allah umrino kaaka maɓɓe Haruna.
Fulfulde_DC: Kanje ngoni geɓe kuugal maɓɓe, haa ɓe nasta haykaliiru Jawmiraawo fodde umroore nde Jawmiraawo Allah umrino kaaka maɓɓe Haruna.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kɛ̧ɛ̧ bíí a tɛ tom wen yee Tua ko GASA WAN nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl  tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ dáà kɔ-wa Arɔŋ nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kɛ̧ɛ̧ bíí a tɛ tom wen yee Tua ko GASA WAN nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl  tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ dáà kɔ-wa Arɔŋ nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Tsagha nehete geva hɛ yitea slene ta nci mbe ghɛa Mahwətə. Ki ghɛa shɛ mene slene ta nci hɛ kala ghena nya gezeyi nda shia nci Aron ke hɛ kala nya gezete nda Mahwətə, Shala ta ka Israyɛl.
Tupurri: Diñ do kay no so ga aè haç joñre äaaran ne hara, ma laage äil tiñ mani Manwur de faage maga pan äaara AÈron hay men do maga Manwuri, Baa ma Israyeln hay haç jag äe ne hen nono.

Francais: Voici les chefs du reste des lévites: des fils d'Amram: Subaël; des fils de Subaël: Jéhédéïa;
Anglais: And the rest of the sons of Levi were these: Of the sons of Amram; Shubael: of the sons of Shubael; Jehdeiah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni mi caw gurona vi Levi sa hinna: Goora vi Amram, Subayel; goora vi Subayel: Yehdeya,
Bulu: Mfaʼa bone be Lévi be nga liʼi, biyôlé biap mbie bi: e bone be Amram: Kubaél; e Bone be Kubaél, Yedeyahu;
Guiziga: Buyoy a wuzla muy ngi Levihey, mindiram i ti: Asi dideˀ ngi Amramay i Subaˀel, a wuzla ziri ngi Subaˀeley i Yediya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lewi'en luttuɓe ngoni: Subayel haa danygol Amram. Yehedeya haa danygol Subayel.
Fulfulde_DC: Lewi'en luttuɓe ngoni: Subayel haa danygol Amram. Yehedeya haa danygol Subayel.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ŋma bezaŋ Levii nɛ̀ ɓɔna nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: mgbara o bezaŋ Amram duka nɛ́ Subaɛl, ɓɛɛ mgbara o bezaŋ Subaɛl nɛ́ Yɛdaya.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ŋma bezaŋ Levii nɛ̀ ɓɔna nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: mgbara o bezaŋ Amram duka nɛ́ Subaɛl, ɓɛɛ mgbara o bezaŋ Subaɛl nɛ́ Yɛdaya.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi kweci nyi ka meghe mbe hwelefe ta Lɛvi: Hwa hwelefe ta Amram: Shəwbayɛl, ba'a hwa ŋa Shəwbayɛl, Yɛdiya.
Tupurri: Ma jar Lefid maga gwa' mono, aè baa yoo jar ni Amram wo diñ Subayel, yoo jar ni Subayel wo diñ Yehdeyahu

Francais: de Rohobia, des fils de Rohobia: le chef Jésias.
Anglais: Concerning Rehabiah: of the sons of Rehabiah, the first was Isshiah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hay jafna vi Rehabiya: Gurona vi Rehabiya, ma ŋolla Yikiya.
Bulu: e be Rehayahu, e be bone be Rehayahu, Yikiya évet.
Guiziga: A wuzla dideˀ ngi Rehabiyahay, buyo i Isiya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haa danygol Rehabiya boo, Yissiya woni arano.
Fulfulde_DC: Haa danygol Rehabiya boo, Yissiya woni arano.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ko Rɛhabia in o bezaŋ-aa nɛ́ Isia gasawi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ko Rɛhabia in o bezaŋ-aa nɛ́ Isia gasawi.
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa hwelefe ta Rehabiya: Isiya nya kande ghate mbe yita ta nci.
Tupurri: ni Rehabiyahu yoo jar ni Rehabiyahu wo mono diñ Yisiya wañ no,

Francais: Des Isaarites: Salémoth; des fils de Salémoth: Jahath.
Anglais: Of the Izharites; Shelomoth: of the sons of Shelomoth; Jahath.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jar jafna vi Yitsehar: Selomot; goora vi Selomot: Yahat.
Bulu: E be bone be Yitseharite: Selômôt; e be bone be Selômôt: Yehat.
Guiziga: A wuzla dideˀ ngi Isaray i Selomot, a wuzla dideˀ ngi Selomotoy i Yahat,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haa ɓiɓɓe Yicehar boo, Selomit. Haa ɓiɓɓe Selomit boo, Yahat.
Fulfulde_DC: Haa ɓiɓɓe Yicehar boo, Selomit. Haa ɓiɓɓe Selomit boo, Yahat.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ko o bezaŋ Isia nɛ́ Sɛlɔmɔt, ko o bezaŋ Sɛlɔmɔt nɛ́ Yahat;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ko o bezaŋ Isia nɛ́ Sɛlɔmɔt, ko o bezaŋ Sɛlɔmɔt nɛ́ Yahat;
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa hwelefe ta Isar: Shelomot, hwa ŋa Shelomot, Yahat.
Tupurri: yoo jar ni Yitsehar wo mono diñ Selomod, yoo jar ni Selomod wo mono diñ Yahad.

Francais: Fils d'Hébron: Jériaü le premier, Amarias le deuxième, Jahaziel le troisième,
Anglais: And the sons of Hebron; Jeriah the first, Amariah the second, Jahaziel the third, Jekameam the fourth.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Benay, Yeriya, Amarya, ma ma'na, Yahaziyel ma ɦidina, Yekameyan ma fiɗina.
Bulu: Benayi, Yériyahu, Amaryahu môta baa, Yahaziél e môta lale, Yekameam e môta nyini.
Guiziga: A wuzla ziri ngi Hebroŋhoy, mudumbuŋ i Yeriya, mijingaˀ naŋ i Amariya, mimakir taŋ i Yaziyel, waɗ mumufaɗ taŋ i Yekamam.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Heburuun ngoni: Yeriya arano e Amariya ɗiɗaɓo e Yahajiyel tataɓo e Yekame'am nayaɓo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Heburuun ngoni: Yeriya arano e Amariya ɗiɗaɓo e Yahajiyel tataɓo e Yekame'am nayaɓo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko o bezaŋ Hebrɔŋ duka nɛ́  kuti-wi  Yɛria, Amaria yiitoo bíí, Yaziɛl taar-a, sɛka Yekamam naar-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko o bezaŋ Hebrɔŋ duka nɛ́  kuti-wi  Yɛria, Amaria yiitoo bíí, Yaziɛl taar-a, sɛka Yekamam naar-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhilia Hɛbron: Yeriya nde ghate, Amariya nde bake, Yaziyɛl nde mahekene ba'a Yekamam nde wəfaɗe.
Tupurri: Ni Be naèy mono diñ Yeriyahu, diñ Amariyahu ma de äog no, Yahasiyel ma de swa' no, Yekameyam ma de naa no

Francais: Jecmaan le quatrième. Fils d'Oziel: Micha; des fils de Micha: Samir;
Anglais: Of the sons of Uzziel; Michah: of the sons of Michah; Shamir.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Uziyel: Mikka; jar gurona vi Mikka: Samir;
Bulu: E mone Uziél: Miké; e be bone Miké: Kamir;
Guiziga: A wuzla ziri ngi Uziyeley i Mika, a wuzla ziri ngi Mikahay i Samir.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓii Uzziyel, Mika. Haa ɓiɓɓe Mika boo, Samir.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓii Uzziyel, Mika. Haa ɓiɓɓe Mika boo, Samir.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bem ko Uziɛl nɛ́ Mika; mgbara o bezaŋ Mika nɛ́ Samir.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bem ko Uziɛl nɛ́ Mika; mgbara o bezaŋ Mika nɛ́ Samir.
Kapsiki_DC: Wəzege teza ta Əwziyɛl: Mika. Hwa hwelefe ta Mika: Shamir.
Tupurri: Je ni Usiyel diñ Mise, aè baa yoo jar ni Mise wo diñ Samir

Francais: frère de Micha: Jésia; fils de Jésia: Zacharias. –
Anglais: The brother of Michah was Isshiah: of the sons of Isshiah; Zechariah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ɓasum Mikkana: Yikiya; jar gurona vi Yikiya; Zakariya.
Bulu: monyañe Miké: Yikiya; e be bone be Yikiya: Zakiri.
Guiziga: Isiya sukum ngi Mika, a wuzla ziri naŋhay i Zakari.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Deerɗiraawo Mika, Yissiya. Haa ɓiɓɓe Yissiya boo, Zekariya.
Fulfulde_DC: Deerɗiraawo Mika, Yissiya. Haa ɓiɓɓe Yissiya boo, Zekariya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nya Mika duka nɛ́ Isia; mgbara o bezaŋ Isia nɛ́ Zakarii.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nya Mika duka nɛ́ Isia; mgbara o bezaŋ Isia nɛ́ Zakarii.
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa hwelefe ta Isiya nya kawəza meghekɛa Mika: Zakari.
Tupurri: hen Mise diñ Yisiya, yoo jar ni Yisiya wo aè baa diñ Sakari.

Francais: Fils de Mérari: Moholi et Musi.
Anglais: The sons of Merari were Mahli and Mushi: the sons of Jaaziah; Beno.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Merari: Makli hiɗi Musi, hiɗi gurona vi goora valam Yaaziya.
Bulu: Bone be Merari: Mali a Musi a bendaé bé bone be Yaziahu.
Guiziga: A wuzla ziri ngi Merarihey i ti Mali, Musi waɗ Yaziya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Meraari ngoni: Mahali e Musi e ɓiɓɓe ɓiyiiko Ya'ajiya.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Meraari ngoni: Mahali e Musi e ɓiɓɓe ɓiyiiko Ya'ajiya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Mɛrari nɛ́ Mali, Musi in Yazia.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Mɛrari nɛ́ Mali, Musi in Yazia.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhilia Merari: Mahli, Məwshi le Yaziya.
Tupurri: Jar ni Merari wo diñ Mahli wo de Musi de weere mani weel äe Yaasiyahun wo.

Francais: Fils de Mérari, par Oziaü, son fils: Saam, Zachur et Hébri.
Anglais: The sons of Merari by Jaaziah; Beno, and Shoham, and Zaccur, and Ibri.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Merari, kuɗ gurona valam Yaaziya, Sosam, Zakkur hiɗi Ibri.
Bulu: Bone be Merari, e be mone wé Yaziahu, Kôham, Zahur a Ibri.
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Merarihey muboko tivi mangal naŋ Yaziya i ti Soham, Zakur waɗ Ibri.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa danygol Meraari bee Ya'ajiya ɓiyum: Soham e Zakkur e Ibri.
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa danygol Meraari bee Ya'ajiya ɓiyum: Soham e Zakkur e Ibri.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Mɛrari nɛ̀ ɗoŋ bem kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Sɔham, Zakur in Ibri.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Mɛrari nɛ̀ ɗoŋ bem kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Sɔham, Zakur in Ibri.
Kapsiki_DC: Ka shihɛnyɛa Merari nyi yake wəzege ta ŋkɛ Yaziya: Shoham, Zakəwr ba'a Ibri.
Tupurri: Moore Merari mani weel äe Yaasiyahun wo diñ: Soham, Sakur wo de Ibri.

Francais: De Moholi: Eléazar, qui n'eut point de fils;
Anglais: Of Mahli came Eleazar, who had no sons.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jafna vi Makli: Eliyazar; nam may fi goorɗi. Jafna vi Kis;
Bulu: E be Mali: Eléazar, nyô a nji biaé bon; e be Kis,
Guiziga: Mangal ngi Mali i Elazar, Elazar a yi mizile ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haa Mahali boo, Eli'azaaru. Ammaa kaŋko o walaa ɓiɓɓe worɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Haa Mahali boo, Eli'azaaru. Ammaa kaŋko o walaa ɓiɓɓe worɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ko Mali nɛ́ Eleazar nɛ̀ kpa so kɔ‘i be-wiwii na,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ko Mali nɛ́ Eleazar nɛ̀ kpa so kɔ‘i be-wiwii na,
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhilia Mahli: Ɛlazar nya keyakema ŋwale tezhili,
Tupurri: Jar ni Mahli wo diñ Eleyasar maga biñ weel ma twar gaa mono, diñ Kisi.

Francais: de Cis, les fils de Cis; Jéraméel.
Anglais: Concerning Kish: the son of Kish was Jerahmeel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: jar gurona vi Kis kayni: Yerahmeel.
Bulu: bone be Kis: Yerameél,
Guiziga: Kise, mangal naŋ purla, i Yerameˀel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haa Kis boo, Yerahameel.
Fulfulde_DC: Haa Kis boo, Yerahameel.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: in Kis nɛ̀ ŋma bem kɔ̧-a̧ so nɛ́ Yerameɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: in Kis nɛ̀ ŋma bem kɔ̧-a̧ so nɛ́ Yerameɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: ba'a Kish nya nza Yeramɛyɛl kawəzege teza ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Jar ni Kis wo, yoo äaara diñ Yerahmeele.

Francais: Fils de Musi: Moholi, Eder et Jérimoth.
Anglais: The sons also of Mushi; Mahli, and Eder, and Jerimoth. These were the sons of the Levites after the house of their fathers.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Musi: Makli, Eder hiɗi Yerimot. Nisi kayni si gurona vi sa Levitna, kuɗ jafna vi sumaysiya.
Bulu: bone be Musi: Mali, Eder a Yerimôt. Bone Belévit mbe le ane menda bʼésaa me né.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Musihey i ti Mali, Eder waɗ Yerimot. Dideˀ ngi Levihey vur hay vur hay i taŋ so.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Musi boo, Mahali e Eder e Yerimot. Kamɓe ngoni Lewi'en fodde ci'e maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Musi boo, Mahali e Eder e Yerimot. Kamɓe ngoni Lewi'en fodde ci'e maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Musi nɛ́ Mali, Edɛr in Yɛrimɔt. O be Levii nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nutua kɔ-wa kpɔk kpɔk nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Musi nɛ́ Mali, Edɛr in Yɛrimɔt. O be Levii nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nutua kɔ-wa kpɔk kpɔk nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhilia Məwshi: Mahli, Ɛdɛr le Yerimot. Tsagha se sebe ta ka Lɛvi kala nza ta yita ta nci keghə keghə.
Tupurri: Jar ni Musi wo diñ: Mahli, Eder wo de Yerimode. Mo so no diñ jar ni jar Lefidn wo, go ti tiñ paçaçrebe ta' ta'a.

Francais: Ce sont là les fils de Lévi, selon leurs familles. Eux aussi, comme leurs frères, les fils d'Aaron, ils tirèrent le sort devant le roi David, devant Sadoc et Achimélech, et devant les chefs de famille sacerdotales et lévitiques, les plus anciens étant sur le même pied que les plus jeunes.
Anglais: These likewise cast lots over against their brethren the sons of Aaron in the presence of David the king, and Zadok, and Ahimelech, and the chief of the fathers of the priests and Levites, even the principal fathers over against their younger brethren.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kaw, ki ɓosiyosina gurona vi Aaron nala, nisi li ŋaɓta kuɗ ɦayta vok mulla David, Sadok, Ahimelek hiɗi sa ŋulona vi jafna vi muliyan-sa-ɗifinna hiɗi sa Levitna. Nisi li ki kayn nala kay sa ŋulona vi jafna kaf, kay sa kiɗayna jar ɓosiyosin kaw.
Bulu: Be fe ane bobenyañ bone be Aron, be nga bo asimba ôsu be njô bôte David, Sadok, Ahimélék a bivete menda me bôte Belévit. Avale te nde e nga boban asu évete ya nda bôt avale fe ane ôyôme môte ya bobenyañ.
Guiziga: Taŋ kwana, ɓa a gam slra ti jiviɗ naŋ na, a gam cergizleŋ kaɓa sukum taŋ ziri ngi Aroŋhoy na ya. A gaka cergizleŋ a mihiri ngi buy Davit, ngi Sadok, ngi Ahimelek, ngi buy ngi wuzla muyoy magam mikuli waɗ a mihiri ngi Levihey. Hay ngi sukum taŋ madiɗahaya, a gam taŋ rak rak ati hay ngi sukum taŋ memeɗeheye.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kamɓe boo, ɓe mbaɗi kur'u bana banndiraaɓe maɓɓe yimɓe Haruna. Ɓe mbaɗi ɗum yeeso laamiiɗo Daawuda e Cadok e Ahimelek e baaba-ci'e'en liman'en e Lewi'en. Bana non ɗum laati ngam baaba saare mawɗo e pamaro fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Kamɓe boo, ɓe mbaɗi kur'u bana banndiraaɓe maɓɓe yimɓe Haruna. Ɓe mbaɗi ɗum yeeso laamiiɗo Daawuda e Cadok e Ahimelek e baaba-ci'e'en liman'en e Lewi'en. Bana non ɗum laati ngam baaba saare mawɗo e pamaro fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa mbɛt, wa pi̧i̧ tani, hee o nya-wa o bezaŋ Arɔŋ ga ti wannu David, ti Sadɔk, ti Ahimɛlɛk, ti o gasawi nutua ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in ti o bezaŋ Levii. Tɛ mɔ‘i, kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ bo wen nutua ko kaya-wi in nutua ko be-ɗoŋ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa mbɛt, wa pi̧i̧ tani, hee o nya-wa o bezaŋ Arɔŋ ga ti wannu David, ti Sadɔk, ti Ahimɛlɛk, ti o gasawi nutua ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in ti o bezaŋ Levii. Tɛ mɔ‘i, kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ bo wen nutua ko kaya-wi in nutua ko be-ɗoŋ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Ghenci perə ne, kala ka kesaka yiteyɛa nci nyi kahwelefefia Aron se hɛ kasla kwasheghediɗi yitea mbeɗe ta slene ta nci. Kwa kema ta yɛ meghe David, le Sadok le Ahimɛlɛk ba'a kwa kema ta ka meghe nyi kwa yita ta ka dzeghe Shala le ka Lɛvi mene hɛ. Ma tsagha ne, kanya kwetɛŋe menete geva ŋkɛ mbe yita ta yayata meghe kala ŋa wəza meghekɛ nya ɓɛhwɛ ma.
Tupurri: AÀ wo de see äaara naa wo waçywaàale do heçeçre äaara jar ni AÈron wo pel wañ Dafidi, pel Sadog, Ahimeleg wo de wañre ma ti feele jar sië jagn wo de jar Lefidn wo lay. AÀ joñ go dosen nono go ti wañ ma ti feelen do je maga klee me' yoo heçeçre äen wo no lay.

Francais: David et les princes de l'armée mirent à part, pour le service, des fils d'Asaph, de Héman et d'Idithun qui prophétisaient avec la harpe, la cithare et les cymbales.
Anglais: Moreover David and the captains of the host separated to the service of the sons of Asaph, and of Heman, and of Jeduthun, who should prophesy with harps, with psalteries, and with cymbals: and the number of the workmen according to their service was:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: David hiɗi sa ŋulona vi sojena, hiɗi gurona vi Asaf, Heman hiɗi Yeditun lak sum sara goyo kay di slen ma voksina, tapay hiɗi nul ma gum hiɗi dilla hiɗi dil ŋolla, hiɗi darayna. Kayni mi ŋaɓta vi nisi sa ka hiɗi lopna kay li'e:
Bulu: Ane David a bivete ya nsamba mewosan be nga telé bôte fefe asu ésaé ya nda Zambe, be soʼo e be bone bʼAsaf, ba be Héman a ba be Yedutun mbe be mbe be kuluʼu mejô be bôme memvet, bingombé a biwoé. Tañe ya ba be nga bili bisaé nje nyô:
Guiziga: Davit ati buy ngi sojehey a gwahaka dideˀ ngi Asafay, ngi Hemanay waɗ ngi Yetudunoyo gwah gwah ngi gi slra. Ɓi ngi Buymisemuŋ manjika taŋ di na, a zlam di dimis asi gujuvur, garaya waɗ asi jãwjãw. Mizli migi slra tayna, slimiɗ t'ani:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Daawuda e mawɓe honooɓe cuɓi huuwooɓe caka yimɓe Asaf e Heman e Yedutuun, waɗooɓe annabaaku bee fiyugo moolooji e garayaaji e koŋsiije. Ndaa inɗe maɓɓe:
Fulfulde_DC: Daawuda e mawɓe honooɓe cuɓi huuwooɓe caka yimɓe Asaf e Heman e Yedutuun, waɗooɓe annabaaku bee fiyugo moolooji e garayaaji e koŋsiije. Ndaa inɗe maɓɓe:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: David in o gasawi zu o wi-biro hoka o bezaŋ Asaf, o bezaŋ Heman, in o bezaŋ Yedutun nɛ̀ tɔ̧ so wen oi nú Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ o kunde, o koloŋ in o sɔkɔ wen tom'i. Nin o wi-de-tom'i nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ:
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: David in o gasawi zu o wi-biro hoka o bezaŋ Asaf, o bezaŋ Heman, in o bezaŋ Yedutun nɛ̀ tɔ̧ so wen oi nú Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ o kunde, o koloŋ in o sɔkɔ wen tom'i. Nin o wi-de-tom'i nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ:
Kapsiki_DC: Pa yɛ David le ka meghe nyi te ghəa ka mene slene mbe ghɛa Shala veyi hwelefe ta Asaf, le ŋa Hɛman ba'a ŋa Yedəwtəwn te ŋa nci ŋkwa. Kagha ghena nya geze nda Shala ke hɛ hɛ kwa cimə le tsa wəshi ketsa nyi: ŋgwəleŋə, getsepele le ciŋəci. Wa nyi sləa mbeli nyi kemene slenea shɛ nyi:
Tupurri: Dafid wo de wañre soden kal wo lag jar ni Asaf wo, jar ni Heman wo de jar ni Yedutun wo go ti nen maga aà mo ndar wo nen waçaçre Baa go de siñ, de mbarge dilna wo de mandilna wo de soñre wo. Mokay diñ keege ngaäa maga aè hay haç joñre wo ne hara do ma joñge mono.

Francais: Voici leur nombre, - de ceux qui étaient occupés au service -: Des fils d'Asaph: Zacchur, Joseph, Nathania et Asaréla, fils d'Asaph, sous la direction d'Asaph, qui prophétisait selon les ordres du roi. –
Anglais: Of the sons of Asaph; Zaccur, and Joseph, and Nethaniah, and Asarelah, the sons of Asaph under the hands of Asaph, which prophesied according to the order of the king.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jar gurona vi Asaf: Zakkur, Yosef, Netaniya hiɗi Asareela goora vi Asaf, gaa kuɗ gaŋeraŋa vi Asaf, sa ka di slen ma voksina kuɗ va ma mulla ɗek tisiya.
Bulu: E be bone bʼAsaf: Zakur, Yôsep, Netania a Asaréla, bone bʼAsaf, Asaf a wuluʼu be, nyô a mbe a kuluʼu mejô avalʼane mebendé me njô bôt me né.
Guiziga: A wuzla ziri ngi Asafay, i ti Zakur, Zozef, Netaniya waɗ Asarela. Mazla taŋ dimise i cine taŋ Asaf, a zla taŋ di ti mingiɓi ngi Buymisemuŋ, kaɓa Davit maɓaŋ di.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder ɓiɓɓe Asaf: Zakkur e Yusufu e Netaniya e Asareela. Ɓe ɗonno dow ardaaŋgal baaba maɓɓe Asaf mo ɗonno waɗa annabaaku dow ardaaŋgal laamiiɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder ɓiɓɓe Asaf: Zakkur e Yusufu e Netaniya e Asareela. Ɓe ɗonno dow ardaaŋgal baaba maɓɓe Asaf mo ɗonno waɗa annabaaku dow ardaaŋgal laamiiɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: War ko o bem ko Asaf nɛ́ Zakur, Jozɛf, Nɛtania in Asarɛla. Asaf duka so zu o bem kɔ‘i tɔ̧ nɛ̀ wen oi nú Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen ko wannu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: War ko o bem ko Asaf nɛ́ Zakur, Jozɛf, Nɛtania in Asarɛla. Asaf duka so zu o bem kɔ‘i tɔ̧ nɛ̀ wen oi nú Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen ko wannu.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhilia Asaf: Zakəwr, Zhozɛf, Netaniya le Asarɛla. Yitenyɛa hɛ nya kegha ghena nya geze nda Shala ke hɛ kwa cimə nde se te ghəa nci kala nya gezete meghe.
Tupurri: Yoo jar ni Asaf wo mono diñ Sakur, Josef, Netaniya wo de Asareela, jar ni Asaf maga pan äaara Asaf hay pel äaara ndar nen waçaçre Baa go ti jag wañ mono.

Francais: D'Idithun, les fils d'Idithun: Godolias, Sori, Jéséïas, Hasabias, Mathathias et Séméi, six, selon les ordres de leur père Idithun, qui prophétisait avec la cithare pour célébrer et louer Yahweh. –
Anglais: Of Jeduthun: the sons of Jeduthun; Gedaliah, and Zeri, and Jeshaiah, Hashabiah, and Mattithiah, six, under the hands of their father Jeduthun, who prophesied with a harp, to give thanks and to praise the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay jafna vi Yeditun: Gurona vi Yeditun: Gedaliya, Seri, Esaya, Hasabiya, Matitiya, nisi ka karkiya, sa busi Yedutun ka ɗeksiya, sa ka di slen ma voksina hiɗi dilla kay subur sem Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: E be Yedutun; bone be Yedutun: Gedaliahu, Téri, Ezayi, Hakabiahu, Matitahu, bôte besaman, ésaa wop, Yedutun, a mbe ntebʼôsu wop, nye a mbe a kuluʼu mejô a bôme éngombé asu ya kañ a seʼe Nti.
Guiziga: Ziri ngi Yetudumoy i ti: Gedaliya, Seri, Yesaya, Simey, Hasabiya waɗ Matitiya. Taŋ merkeɗ taŋ, i cine taŋ Yetudum mazla taŋ dimise asi gujuvur. A zla taŋ ti mingiɓi ngi Buymisemuŋ, ngi hunumaŋ waɗ ngi gaŋ dudok.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder saare Yedutuun boo: Ɓiɓɓe maako Gedaliya e Ceri e Esaaya e Hasabiya e Matitiya e Sim'i, ɓe njoweego, ɓe ɗon dow ardaaŋgal baaba maɓɓe Yedutuun mo ɗonno waɗa annabaaku bee fiyugo moolooru ngam yettugo e maŋgtugo Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder saare Yedutuun boo: Ɓiɓɓe maako Gedaliya e Ceri e Esaaya e Hasabiya e Matitiya e Sim'i, ɓe njoweego, ɓe ɗon dow ardaaŋgal baaba maɓɓe Yedutuun mo ɗonno waɗa annabaaku bee fiyugo moolooru ngam yettugo e maŋgtugo Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: War ko Yedutun nɛ́ o bem kɔ̧-a̧, Gɛdalia, Sɛri, Yɛsaya, Hasabia, Matitia in Simɛi, wa mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk. Nɛ́ dáà kɔ-wa Yedutun a̧ duk zu wa tɔ̧ nɛ̀ wen oi nú Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ kunde, gasi nɛ̀ GASA WAN, zɔn nɛ̀ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: War ko Yedutun nɛ́ o bem kɔ̧-a̧, Gɛdalia, Sɛri, Yɛsaya, Hasabia, Matitia in Simɛi, wa mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk. Nɛ́ dáà kɔ-wa Yedutun a̧ duk zu wa tɔ̧ nɛ̀ wen oi nú Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ kunde, gasi nɛ̀ GASA WAN, zɔn nɛ̀ a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili nyi yake Yedəwtəwn: Gedaliya, Seri, Yeshaya, Shimɛyi, Hashabiya le Matitiya. Pɛtɛa nci ŋkwaŋe, yiteyɛa nci nya kegha ghena nya geze nda Shala ke hɛ kwa cimə katsa ŋgwəleŋə kezha tsahe kave nda zləvə ke Mahwətə nde se te ghəa nci.
Tupurri: Ni Yedutun mono, diñ jar ni Yedutun ma hiira'n wo diñ Gedeliyahu, Seri, Esayi, Hasabiyahu, Matitiyahu, pan äaara Yedutun hay pel äaara ndar nen waçaçre Baa go de siñ de mbar dilna ma mañ ti Manwur ciñ, ma togoëge äe.

Francais: De Héman, les fils de Héman: Bocciaü, Mathaniaü, Oziel, Subuël, Jérimoth, Hananias, Hanani, Eliatha, Geddelthi, Romemthiézer, Jesbacassa, Mellothi, Othir et Mahazioth;
Anglais: Of Heman: the sons of Heman; Bukkiah, Mattaniah, Uzziel, Shebuel, and Jerimoth, Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti, and Romamti–ezer, Joshbekashah, Mallothi, Hothir, and Mahazioth:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay jafna vi Heman: Gurona vi Heman: Bukkiya, Mattaniya, Uziyel, Sebuwel, Yerimot, Hananiya, Hanani, Eliyata, Giddalti, Romamti-Ezer, Yokbekasa, Malloti, Hotir, Mahaziyot,
Bulu: E be Héman, bone be Héman: Bukiyahu, Mataniahu, Uziél Sebuél, Yérimôt, Hanania, Hanani, Eliata, Gidalti, Rômamti-Ezer Yôkbekasa, Malôti, Hôtir, Mahaziôt,
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Hemanay i ti: Bukiya, Mataniya, Uziyel, Sebuyel, Yerimot, Hananiya, Hanani, Eliyata, Gidalti, Romameti-Ezer, Yosebekasa, Maloti, Hotir waɗ Mahaziyot.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder saare Heman boo, ɓiɓɓe maako Bukkiya e Mattaniya e Uzziyel e Sebuwel e Yerimot e Hananiya e Hanani e Eliyata e Giddalti e Romamti-Ejer e Yosebekasa e Malloti e Hotir e Mahaziyot.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder saare Heman boo, ɓiɓɓe maako Bukkiya e Mattaniya e Uzziyel e Sebuwel e Yerimot e Hananiya e Hanani e Eliyata e Giddalti e Romamti-Ejer e Yosebekasa e Malloti e Hotir e Mahaziyot.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: War ko Heman, nɛ́ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ Bukia, Matania, Uziɛl, Sɛbuɛl, Yɛrimɔt, Hanania, Hanani, Eliata, Gidalti, Rɔmamti-Ezɛr, Yɔsbɛkasa, Maloti, Hɔtir in Mahaziot;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: War ko Heman, nɛ́ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ Bukia, Matania, Uziɛl, Sɛbuɛl, Yɛrimɔt, Hanania, Hanani, Eliata, Gidalti, Rɔmamti-Ezɛr, Yɔsbɛkasa, Maloti, Hɔtir in Mahaziot;
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili nyi yake Hɛman: Bəwkiya, Mataniya, Əwziyɛl, Shebəwɛl, Yerimot, Hananiya, Hanani, Ɛliyata, Gidalti, Romameti-Ɛzɛr, Yoshebɛkasha, Maloti, Hotir le Mahaziyot.
Tupurri: Ni Heman mono, jar ni Heman hay wo diñ Bukiyahu, Mataniyahu, Usiyel, Sebuwel, Yerimod, Hananiya, Hanani, Eliyata, Gidalti, Romamti-Eser, Yosbekasa, Maloti, Hotir, Mahasiyode.

Francais: ils étaient tous fils de Héman, voyant du roi dans les paroles de Dieu, pour exalter sa puissance Dieu avait donné à Héman quatorze fils et trois filles.
Anglais: All these were the sons of Heman the king's seer in the words of God, to lift up the horn. And God gave to Heman fourteen sons and three daughters.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nisi kaf si gurona vi Heman, namu ma di slen ma vokomna tam mulla kay hagata vi Lawna, kay ɗek gaŋeraŋa valam goyo; Lawn vul gurona sa jufayn mi Heman doogo yam fiɗi, guro sa boyn ɦidi may.
Bulu: bese bone be Héman, nye a mbe e ñyene mame njô bôt amu ajô Zambe, asu ya wumulu ngule jé; Zambe a nga ve Héman bobefam awôm a benyin a bobebinga belaa.
Guiziga: Taŋ gar i ziri ngi Hemanay, i misi kleŋ ngi buyoy, a ɓakaŋ ɓi ngi Buymisemuŋ manjika taŋ di, ɓa a lum gidaŋ nga mbuŋ. Buymisemuŋ a vula ziri mizilehey kuruˀ nga mufaɗ da Hemana, waɗ mongosohoy makir.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe fuu ɓe ɓiɓɓe Heman, puufoowo luwal, gi'anoowo laamiiɗo fodde koŋngol Allah. Allah hokki Heman ɓiɓɓe worɓe sappo e nayo e ɓiɓɓe rewɓe tato.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe fuu ɓe ɓiɓɓe Heman, puufoowo luwal, gi'anoowo laamiiɗo fodde koŋngol Allah. Allah hokki Heman ɓiɓɓe worɓe sappo e nayo e ɓiɓɓe rewɓe tato.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: wa nɔ‘i lɛŋ yaa so nɛ́ o bem ko Heman, wi-zɔk-mɔ ko wannu, nɛ̀ we so ɗoŋ wen ko Sɔ̧ ha̧ wannu, ha̧ nɛ̀ ŋgai ha̧ a̧. Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ so o be-wiwii ɓu-zua-naar in o be-okoo taar ha̧ Heman.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: wa nɔ‘i lɛŋ yaa so nɛ́ o bem ko Heman, wi-zɔk-mɔ ko wannu, nɛ̀ we so ɗoŋ wen ko Sɔ̧ ha̧ wannu, ha̧ nɛ̀ ŋgai ha̧ a̧. Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ so o be-wiwii ɓu-zua-naar in o be-okoo taar ha̧ Heman.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛa nci kaŋwale tezhilia Hɛman nya kese kande kelɛŋə nya kegeze nda ghena ta Shala ke meghe kezha tsahe berete ta ŋkɛ. Ŋwale tezhili meŋe wəfaɗeghəmbe le ŋwalea kwɛ mahekene ndeke nda Shala ke Hɛman.
Tupurri: Saara äuy diñ jar ni Heman maga hay diñ je ko nen mani wañn ti waçaçre Baa no, nen maga aà mo togoë wo kluu mani Baa no. Baa hay haç weere ne Heman hwal ti naa de mayre swa'a.

Francais: Tous ces lévites étaient sous les ordres de leurs pères pour le chant de la maison de Yahweh, ayant des cymbales, des cithares et des harpes pour le service de la maison de Dieu, sous les ordres de David, d'Asaph, d'Idithun et de Héman.
Anglais: All these were under the hands of their father for song in the house of the  Lord , with cymbals, psalteries, and harps, for the service of the house of God, according to the king's order to Asaph, Jeduthun, and Heman.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kaf kayni busi ka ɗeksiya kay gi nulla hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina, nisi ka hiɗi kaway beɗayna, dilla hiɗi dil-ŋulona kay li lopna hay ziyna vi Lawna. Asaf, Yeditun hiɗi Heman mulla ka ɗeksiya may.
Bulu: Balé bete bese be mbe éjôé ésaa wobe si asu bia ya ndaa Nti, a be nga bili biwoé, bingombé a memvet asu ésaé ya nda Zambe. Asaf, Yedutun a Héman be mbe éjôé njô bôte si.
Guiziga: Ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ, mazla taŋ dimise gar i cine taŋ. A zla taŋ di asi jãwjãw, gujuvur waɗ asi garaya. A gaka slra taŋ da buyo, tisi mijigin taŋhay, Asaf, Yetudum waɗ Heman.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Worɓe ɓe'e fuu ngimi bee koŋsiije e garayaaji e moolooji nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo. Ɓe ɗonno dow ardaaŋgal baabiraaɓe maɓɓe Asaf e Yedutuun e Heman. Ɓe kuuwi kuugal maɓɓe haa haykaliiru Allah dow ardaaŋgal laamiiɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: Worɓe ɓe'e fuu ngimi bee koŋsiije e garayaaji e moolooji nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo. Ɓe ɗonno dow ardaaŋgal baabiraaɓe maɓɓe Asaf e Yedutuun e Heman. Ɓe kuuwi kuugal maɓɓe haa haykaliiru Allah dow ardaaŋgal laamiiɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dáà kɔ-wa duka so zu wa lɛŋ wen gima kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ o sɔkɔ, o koloŋ in o kunde wen tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧, ɗɔɔ  ha̧a̧nú  ko wannu, ko Asaf, ko Yedutun in ko Heman.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dáà kɔ-wa duka so zu wa lɛŋ wen gima kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ o sɔkɔ, o koloŋ in o kunde wen tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧, ɗɔɔ  ha̧a̧nú  ko wannu, ko Asaf, ko Yedutun in ko Heman.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛ se hɛ le yiteyɛa nci nya te ghəa nci kagha cimə mbe ghɛa Shala, katsa wəshi ketsa kadzeyite kala ciŋəci, getsepele ba'a ŋgwəleŋə kezha slene ta ghɛa Shala. Yɛ meghe, le Asaf, le Yedəwtəwn ba'a Hɛman ya te ghəa nci.
Tupurri: Jar sen wo mo äuy hay wo 'wad siñ äil tiñ mani Manwur no, hay wo de soñre wo, mandilna wo de dilna wo do ma joñre ma äil tiñ mani Baa no, paçaçre äaara hay wo pel äaara. AÀ saf, Yedutun wo de Heman hay wo nen do wañ.

Francais: Leur nombre, y compris leurs frères exercés à chanter Yahweh, tous ceux qui avaient de l'habileté, était de deux cent quatre-vingt-huit.
Anglais: So the number of them, with their brethren that were instructed in the songs of the  Lord , even all that were cunning, was two hundred fourscore and eight.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi noŋ kaf kis-ma' kalam dok-glafandi yam glafandi, ɓosiyosina sa wi nulla vi Ma-Vatɗin ŋaa'a ŋolo ka haya, nisi kaf si sa vul hatta.
Bulu: Be mbe bôte mintete mibaé, mewôme muam, ô late fe bobenyañe bap be nga dañe yeme bia bi Zambe, bese be too beyeʼele.
Guiziga: Mizli dimis, mudubunaka le kuy kuy tayna, waɗ sukum taŋ misirkahay ngi hunuma Bumbulvuŋ ti dimis na, a gam jom gar na, mizli skat skat cuw ti kukur dangafaɗ nga dangafaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal maɓɓe bee banndiraaɓe maɓɓe annduɓe yimango Jawmiraawo fuu waɗi teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo e cappanɗe njoweetato e njoweetato (288).
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal maɓɓe bee banndiraaɓe maɓɓe annduɓe yimango Jawmiraawo fuu waɗi teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo e cappanɗe njoweetato e njoweetato (288).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dɔka o wi nɔ‘i in o nya-wa nɛ̀ yamba bia gima ti GASA WAN nɛ̀ yuwar-a nɛ́ bíí gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dɔka o wi nɔ‘i in o nya-wa nɛ̀ yamba bia gima ti GASA WAN nɛ̀ yuwar-a nɛ́ bíí gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma jikə ka gha cimə le kweci mbelia nci nyi tekete nda mbeli ke hɛ mbe wəvəsəa nci, kezha tsahe Mahwətə le cimə ne, gwəmsə bake ba'a deghesemsə degheseghəmbe hɛ pɛtɛa nci.
Tupurri: AÀ hay wo äuy kiskis äog ti äe do nenma' ti nenma'aç, go de heçeçre äaara maga wo de geçeçge ti siñ mani Manwurn mono, saara äuy diñ jar had siñ wo äuy.

Francais: Ils tirèrent le sort pour leurs fonctions, petits et grands, maîtres et disciples.
Anglais: And they cast lots, ward against ward, as well the small as the great, the teacher as the scholar.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi li ŋaɓta kuɗ ɦayta, kay tun sumun hay lopna, sa gurayna hiɗi sa ŋulona, sa hatna hiɗi sa hatayna.
Bulu: Asu ya kabe be bisaé, be nga bo asimba , bone be bôt a beta be bôt, beyeʼele a beyéʼé.
Guiziga: Ɓa a gaka slra vur mijingaˀ vur mijingaˀ na, a gam cergizleŋ gar taŋ, mbur micawwa, zuŋ, buy, mbur mizlew.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe mbaɗi kur'u ngam kuugal maɓɓe, mawɓe e famarɓe, annduɓe e ekkitooɓe kal-kal.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe mbaɗi kur'u ngam kuugal maɓɓe, mawɓe e famarɓe, annduɓe e ekkitooɓe kal-kal.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa pi̧i̧ tani usi nɛ̀ yuwar tom ha̧ bíí kpɔk kpɔk, kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ bo mgbara geɗek-wi in gasawi na, kóó mgbara wi-iŋ-gima in wi-yamba-a na mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa pi̧i̧ tani usi nɛ̀ yuwar tom ha̧ bíí kpɔk kpɔk, kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ bo mgbara geɗek-wi in gasawi na, kóó mgbara wi-iŋ-gima in wi-yamba-a na mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Le sla kwasheghediɗi tseɓate nza ta mene slene ta nci hɛ. Ghala kwelɛ ka megelɛgeshi le meha zhili keɗema kwelɛ nyi keɗepemte cimə ba'a nyi kwatedzehwa hɛ we.
Tupurri: Saara raw wo ndar waçywaàale ti joñre äaaran wo, ma kleere de ma kluuri wo, jar hadge wo de jar maga aè de had rage mono.

Francais: Le premier sort échut, pour Asaph, à Joseph; le second, à Godolias: lui, ses frères et ses fils: douze;
Anglais: Now the first lot came forth for Asaph to Joseph: the second to Gedaliah, who with his brethren and sons were twelve:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ŋaɓta kuɗ ɦayta ta jewta kuɗ jafna vi Asaf nig kay Yosef, ta mul ma'ta nig kay Gedaliya, namu hiɗi ɓosiyomna hiɗi gurona valamu doogo yam ma;
Bulu: Mboon asimba ôsu ô nga liti Yôsep mfaʼa Asaf; wu baa ô nga liti Gedaliahu, émien, bobenyañ a bone bé, bôt awôm a bebaé;
Guiziga: Cergizleŋ mudumbuŋ a diɗ ar Zozef mangal ngi Asaf, mucuw naŋ ar Gedaliya, naŋ vuna, ziri naŋhaya waɗ sukum naŋhay, jom gar na, kuruˀ nga cuw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kur'u aranu waŋgini Yusufu ɓii Asaf, ɗiɗaɓu boo waŋgini Gedaliya e deerɗiraaɓe mum e ɓiɓɓe mum, ɓe sappo e ɗiɗo,
Fulfulde_DC: Kur'u aranu waŋgini Yusufu ɓii Asaf, ɗiɗaɓu boo waŋgini Gedaliya e deerɗiraaɓe mum e ɓiɓɓe mum, ɓe sappo e ɗiɗo,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kuti tani baa nɛ́ Jozɛf, bem ko Asaf. Yiitoo-aa baa nɛ́ Gɛdalia in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa lɛŋ ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kuti tani baa nɛ́ Jozɛf, bem ko Asaf. Yiitoo-aa baa nɛ́ Gɛdalia in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa lɛŋ ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Kapsiki_DC: __Error__
Tupurri: AÈ naa waçywaàale ma tañgun ne Asaf, se le' ti Josefe. Ma de äogn ti Gedaliyahu saara de heçeçre äe wo de weere äe wo hwal ti äoge.

Francais: le troisième, à Zachur: lui, ses fils et ses frères: douze;
Anglais: The third to Zaccur, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ŋaɓta ta mul ɦidita hay jafna vi Asaf nig kay Zakkur, gurona valamu hiɗi ɓosiyomna; doogo yam ma';
Bulu: wu lale ô nga liti Zakur, bone bé a bobenyañ, bôt awôm a bebaé;
Guiziga: Mumakir naŋ ar Zakur, ziri naŋhay waɗ sukum naŋhay, jom gar na, kuruˀ nga cuw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: tataɓu boo waŋgini Zakkur e ɓiɓɓe mum e deerɗum'en, ɓe sappo e ɗiɗo,
Fulfulde_DC: tataɓu boo waŋgini Zakkur e ɓiɓɓe mum e deerɗum'en, ɓe sappo e ɗiɗo,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Taar-a baa nɛ́ Zakur in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Taar-a baa nɛ́ Zakur in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Kapsiki_DC: __Error__
Tupurri: Ma de swa'n ti Sakur de weere äe wo de heçeçre äe wo, saara hwal ti äoge.

Francais: le quatrième, à Isari: lui, ses fils et ses frères: douze;
Anglais: The fourth to Izri, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ta mul fiɗita nig kay Yitseri, gurona valamu hiɗi ɓosiyomna; doogo yam ma';
Bulu: wu nyini ô nga liti Yitseri, bone bé a bobenyañ, bôt awôm a bebaé;
Guiziga: Mumufaɗ naŋ ar Isri, ziri naŋhay waɗ sukum naŋhay, jom gar na, kuruˀ nga cuw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: nayaɓu boo waŋgini Yiciri e ɓiɓɓe mum e deerɗiraaɓe mum, ɓe sappo e ɗiɗo,
Fulfulde_DC: nayaɓu boo waŋgini Yiciri e ɓiɓɓe mum e deerɗiraaɓe mum, ɓe sappo e ɗiɗo,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Naar-a baa nɛ́ Yisɛri in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Naar-a baa nɛ́ Yisɛri in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Kapsiki_DC: __Error__
Tupurri: Ma de naan ti Yitseri de weere äe wo de heçeçre äe wo, saara hwal ti äoge.

Francais: le cinquième à Nathania: lui, ses fils et ses frères: douze;

Bulu: Wu mewôme baa ônga liti Eliyata, bone bé a bobenyañe bé, bôt awôm a bebaé;
Guiziga: Mukukur cuw naŋ ar Eliyata, ziri naŋhay waɗ sukum naŋhay, jom gar na, kuruˀ nga cuw.

KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo-aa baa nɛ́ Gidalti in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.

Francais: le vingt-quatrième à Romemthiézer: lui, ses fils et ses frères: douze.

Fulfulde_Adamaoua: noogas e nayaɓu boo waŋgini Romamti-Ejer e ɓiɓɓe mum e deerɗum'en, ɓe sappo e ɗiɗo.

KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-naar-a ba nɛ́ Romamti-Ezɛr in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo mbɛt.
