Francais: Voici les classes des portiers:  Des Coréïtes: Mésélémia, fils de Coré, d'entre les fils d'Asaph.
Anglais: Concerning the divisions of the porters: Of the Korhites was Meshelemiah the son of Kore, of the sons of Asaph.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Vokŋa vi sa ŋom vun-galana: Jafna vi Kore: Mekelemiya, goora vi Kore, jar gurona vi Asaf.
Bulu: Minsamba bebaʼale mimbé: e be bone be Koré: Meselémiahu, e mone Koré, môte ya bone bʼAsaf.
Guiziga: Mijigina mizlingrehey, taŋ ti ngay taŋ taˀ taˀ ya. Meselemiya, mangal ngi Kore, i dideˀ ngi Abiyasaf ar sukwi ngi Kore,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa geɓe aynooɓe dammuɗe: Haa Koora'en, Meselemiya ɓii Koore nder ɓiɓɓe Asaf.
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa geɓe aynooɓe dammuɗe: Haa Koora'en, Meselemiya ɓii Koore nder ɓiɓɓe Asaf.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yuwar kɛ̧́ɛ̧́ tom ha̧ o bezaŋ Levii nɛ̀ de tom-pɛma-nú tua nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. Bíí nú-gara ko Kore duka nɛ́ Mɛsɛlɛmia, bem ko Kore, be-koo Abiasaf.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yuwar kɛ̧́ɛ̧́ tom ha̧ o bezaŋ Levii nɛ̀ de tom-pɛma-nú tua nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. Bíí nú-gara ko Kore duka nɛ́ Mɛsɛlɛmia, bem ko Kore, be-koo Abiasaf.
Kapsiki_DC: Te ŋa nci wəvəsə ka ya degha perə. Meshɛlɛmiya wəzege ta Korɛ shia Abiyasaf, nya kwa yita ta Korɛ ne,
Tupurri: Carge äil jar gor jag tiñn wo. Ti jar ma ti wer mani Koren wo mono, diñ Meselemiyahu je ni Kore yoo jar ni Asaf wo.

Francais: - Fils de Mésélémia; Zacharias, le premier-né; Jadihel le deuxième, Zabadias le troisième, Jathanaël le quatrième,
Anglais: And the sons of Meshelemiah were, Zechariah the firstborn, Jediael the second, Zebadiah the third, Jathniel the fourth,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Mekelemiya: Zakariya ma vuɗi jewna, Yediyel ma mul ma'na, Zebadiya ma mul ɦidina,
Bulu: Bone Meselémiahu: Zakari ntôl, Yediaél ébatan, Zabadyahu e mone lale,
Guiziga: Meselemiyel a yi ziri mizilehey tarnaˀ, i ti: Zakari, Yediyayel, Zebadiya, Yatiniyel,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Meselemiya boo woodi ɓiɓɓe ɓe'e: Zekariya woni afo, Yedi'ayel ɗiɗaɓo, Zebadiya tataɓo, Yatniyel nayaɓo,
Fulfulde_DC: Meselemiya boo woodi ɓiɓɓe ɓe'e: Zekariya woni afo, Yedi'ayel ɗiɗaɓo, Zebadiya tataɓo, Yatniyel nayaɓo,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Mɛsɛlɛmia nɛ́ kaya-wi Zakarii, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa Yɛdiaɛl, Zɛbadia nɛ́ taar-a; Yatniɛl nɛ́ naar-a,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Mɛsɛlɛmia nɛ́ kaya-wi Zakarii, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa Yɛdiaɛl, Zɛbadia nɛ́ taar-a; Yatniɛl nɛ́ naar-a,
Kapsiki_DC: ŋwale tezhili mberefaŋe yake ŋkɛ. Wa nyi sləa nci nyi kekwele kekwele kaya: Zakari, Yɛdiyayɛl, Zɛbadiya, Yatniyɛl,
Tupurri: Jar ni Miselemiyahu wo diñ: Sakari, jag weel no, Yediyayel ma de äog no, Sebadiyahu ma de swa' no,

Francais: Elam le cinquième, Johanan le sixième, Elioénaï le septième. –
Anglais: Elam the fifth, Jehohanan the sixth, Elioenai the seventh.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yatmiyel ma mul fiɗina, Elam ma mul vaslna, Yohanan ma mul karkiyana, Elyohenay ma mul siɗiyana.
Bulu: Yatniel e nyô nyini, Elam e nyô tane, Yôanañ e nyô samane, Elyoénayi e nyô zamgbwale.
Guiziga: Elam, Yohanaŋ waɗ Eliyohenay
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Elam njowaɓo, Yehohanan njoweegoojo e Eliyo'enay njoweeɗiɗaɓo.
Fulfulde_DC: Elam njowaɓo, Yehohanan njoweegoojo e Eliyo'enay njoweeɗiɗaɓo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Elam nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-a, Yehohanaŋ nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a; Ɛlyɔnai nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Elam nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-a, Yehohanaŋ nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a; Ɛlyɔnai nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ɛlam, Yohanan le Ɛliyohɛnay.
Tupurri: Yatniyel ma de naa no, Elam ma de dwee no, Yohanan ma de hiira' no, Elyoenaèyma de renam no.

Francais: Fils d'Obédédom: Séméïas, le premier-né; Jozabad le deuxième, Joaha le troisième, Sachar le quatrième, Nathanaël le cinquième,
Anglais: Moreover the sons of Obed–edom were, Shemaiah the firstborn, Jehozabad the second, Joah the third, and Sacar the fourth, and Nethaneel the fifth,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Obed-Edom: Semayeya, ma vuɗi jewna, Yehozabad ma sem ma'na, Yoha ma sem ɦidina, Sakar ma sem fiɗina, Nataneel, ma sem vaslna,
Bulu: Bone bʼObéd-Edom: Semaéya ntôl, Yehôzabad nyô baa, Yôa e mone lale, Sakar e nyô nyini, Natanaél e nyô tane,
Guiziga: Obet-Edom a yi ziri mizilehey dangafaɗ, slimiɗ t'ani vur mijingaˀ vur mijingaˀ: Semaya, Yozabaɗ, Yoˀa, Sakar, Netaneyel,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Obet-Edoom woodi ɓiɓɓe ɓe'e: Sema'ya woni afo, Yozabat ɗiɗaɓo, Yowaha tataɓo, Sakar nayaɓo, Netaneyel njowaɓo,
Fulfulde_DC: Obet-Edoom woodi ɓiɓɓe ɓe'e: Sema'ya woni afo, Yozabat ɗiɗaɓo, Yowaha tataɓo, Sakar nayaɓo, Netaneyel njowaɓo,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Obɛd-Edɔm nɛ́ Sɛmaya kaya-bem, Yehozabad be-ɗoŋ; Yɔa nɛ́ taar-a, Sakar nɛ́ naar-a, Nɛtanɛl nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-a;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Obɛd-Edɔm nɛ́ Sɛmaya kaya-bem, Yehozabad be-ɗoŋ; Yɔa nɛ́ taar-a, Sakar nɛ́ naar-a, Nɛtanɛl nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-a;
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili deghese yake Obɛd-Ɛdom. Wa nyi sləa nci nyi kadzeyite kadzeyite: Shemaya, Yozabad, Yowa, Sakar, Netanɛyɛl,
Tupurri: Jar ni Obed-Edom wo diñ: Semaeya jag weel no, Yehosabad ma de äog no, Yowa ma de swa' no, Sakar ma de naa no, Netaneel ma de dwee no,

Francais: Ammiel le sixième, Issachar le septième, Phollathi le huitième; car Dieu avait béni Obédédom.
Anglais: Ammiel the sixth, Issachar the seventh, Peulthai the eighth: for God blessed him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ammiyel ma sem karkiyana, Isakar ma sem siɗiyana, Pewoltay ma sem glafandina, kay Lawn gum bolo.
Bulu: Ammiél e nyô samane, Isakar e nyô zamgbwale, Peultayi e nyô muame, amu Zambe a nga botane nye.
Guiziga: Amiyel, Isakar waɗ Peˀultay. Naŋ kine, Buymisemuŋ a ɗuwula mi le da Obet-Edomo
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammiyel njoweegoojo, Issakar njoweeɗiɗaɓo e Pe'ulletay njoweetataɓo, ngam Allah barkiɗini mo .
Fulfulde_DC: Ammiyel njoweegoojo, Issakar njoweeɗiɗaɓo e Pe'ulletay njoweetataɓo, ngam Allah barkiɗini mo .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Amiɛl nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a; Isakar nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-aa; Pɛulɛtai nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-a, wen Sɔ̧ toka so de yoŋgo zu a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Amiɛl nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a; Isakar nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-aa; Pɛulɛtai nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-a, wen Sɔ̧ toka so de yoŋgo zu a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Amiyɛl, Isakar le Pɛwəltay. Kwa nza ŋkɛ ne, na Shala kewəpikɛ Obɛd-Ɛdom.
Tupurri: Amiyel ma de hiira' no, Isakar ma de renam, Pewultayi ma de nenma' no, gahaçyla Baa hay kañ bosa' ne hen ti.

Francais: - A Séméïas, son fils, naquirent des fils qui furent chefs dans la maison de leur père, car ils étaient de vaillants hommes.
Anglais: Also unto Shemaiah his son were sons born, that ruled throughout the house of their father: for they were mighty men of valour.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Goora valam Semayeya vuɗ gurona, sesi tiy ŋolo hay jafna visiya, kay nisi si sum sa dono'o, sa jufaya.
Bulu: Mone wé Semaéya a nga biaé bon mbe be nga bili éjôé ya nda bôte jap amu be mbe biwôlô bi bôte mewosan.
Guiziga: Modogom naŋ Semaya, a yi ziri misi gidaŋ ngi wi mizli a wuzla muy taŋhaya, asi i mizli mupuɗaway.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiyiiko Sema'ya kaŋko boo o woodi ɓiɓɓe, marɓe baawɗe nder saare baaba muuɗum'en, ngam ɓe ngoodi daraja.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiyiiko Sema'ya kaŋko boo o woodi ɓiɓɓe, marɓe baawɗe nder saare baaba muuɗum'en, ngam ɓe ngoodi daraja.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛmaya kaya-bem ko Obɛd-Edɔm koo o be-wiwii nɛ̀ yaa o gasawi nutua kɔ-wa, wen wa yaa so nɛ́ o kpasa-bíí.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛmaya kaya-bem ko Obɛd-Edɔm koo o be-wiwii nɛ̀ yaa o gasawi nutua kɔ-wa, wen wa yaa so nɛ́ o kpasa-bíí.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma Shemaya, wəzege teza nya kwelea ŋkɛ ne, ŋkwa kenza kanyi jama yaŋ'wete ŋwale tezhilia ŋkɛ mbe yita ta nci kwa nza nde kaka katsala kɛfi se hɛ.
Tupurri: Weel äe Semaeya raw biñ weere maga lag wo ngiñ ti feele äaaran wo werga aà hay wo diñ werpiiri ma de eegre wo.

Francais: Fils de Séméïas: Othni, Raphaël, Obed, Elzabad et ses frères, hommes vaillants, Eliu et Samachias.
Anglais: The sons of Shemaiah; Othni, and Rephael, and Obed, Elzabad, whose brethren were strong men, Elihu, and Semachiah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Semayeya: Otni, Retayel, Obed, Elsabad hiɗi ɓosiyomna, sum sa jufaya, Elihu hiɗi Samakiya.
Bulu: Bone be Semaéya: Otni, Refaél, Obéd, Elzabad a bobenyañe bé be too biwôlô bi bôt môé na: Elihu a Samakyahu.
Guiziga: Ziri ngi Semayahay i ti: Otni, Refayel, Obet, Elzabat waɗ sukum taŋhay, Elihu ati Semakiya, mizli mupuɗaw puɗaway.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Sema'ya ngoni: Otni e Refayel e Obet e Elzabat. Deerɗiraaɓe maako Elihu e Semakiya, ɓe marɓe daraja.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Sema'ya ngoni: Otni e Refayel e Obet e Elzabat. Deerɗiraaɓe maako Elihu e Semakiya, ɓe marɓe daraja.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Sɛmaya nɛ́ Otni, Rɛfaɛl, Obɛd, Ɛlzabad in o nya-wa, Elihu in Sɛmakia nɛ̀ yaa so nɛ́ o kpasa-bíí.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Sɛmaya nɛ́ Otni, Rɛfaɛl, Obɛd, Ɛlzabad in o nya-wa, Elihu in Sɛmakia nɛ̀ yaa so nɛ́ o kpasa-bíí.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ŋwalea Shemaya ne, yɛ: Otni, Refayɛl, Obɛd le Ɛlzabad, tsagha kweci ka kesaka yiteyɛa nci Ɛlihəw le Semakiya, pɛtɛa nci bake kambeli nyi nza zləvə te hɛ tekeleke.
Tupurri: Jar ni Semaeya wo diñ: Otni, Refayel, Obed, Elsabad wo de heçeçre äe Elihu wo de Semakiyahu werpiiri ma de eegren wo.

Francais: Tous ceux-là étaient des fils d'Obédédom; eux, leurs fils et leurs frères, hommes braves et forts pour le service, étaient au nombre de soixante-deux, issus d'Obédédom.
Anglais: All these of the sons of Obed–edom: they and their sons and their brethren, able men for strength for the service, were threescore and two of Obed–edom.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kaf kayni si gurona vi Obed-Edom; nisiya, gurona visiya hiɗi ɓosiyosina, si sum sa jufaya, hobay hiɗi donota kay li lopna, gurona vi Obed-Edom kaf dok-karkiya yam ma'.
Bulu: Balé bete bese be mbe bone bʼObéd-Edom; bebien, bone bap a bobenyañe bap be mbe biwôlô bi bôt njalan a ngul mfaʼa yʼésaé, bôte ya bʼObéd-Edom mewôm mesaman a bebaé.
Guiziga: Taŋ cek i ziri ngi Obet-Edomoy. Taŋ vuna, ziri taŋhay waɗ sukum taŋhaya, taŋ cek i mizli mupuɗaw puɗaway, asi ada a bigaka gidaŋ taŋ ar slra. Taŋ jom gar mizli kukur merkeɗ nga cuw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Worɓe danygol Obet-Edoom fuu, kamɓe bee ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe e deerɗiraaɓe maɓɓe, ɓe marɓe daraja, waawɓe kuugal, cappanɗe njoweego e ɗiɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: Worɓe danygol Obet-Edoom fuu, kamɓe bee ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe e deerɗiraaɓe maɓɓe, ɓe marɓe daraja, waawɓe kuugal, cappanɗe njoweego e ɗiɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ o bezaŋ Obɛd-Edɔm; wa in o bem kɔ-wa in o nya-wa yaa so nɛ́ o kpasa-bíí wen ŋgai nɛ̀ wa ha̧ so tɛ tom kɔ-wa. O bíí ko Obɛd-Edɔm nɛ́ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-zua-yiitoo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ o bezaŋ Obɛd-Edɔm; wa in o bem kɔ-wa in o nya-wa yaa so nɛ́ o kpasa-bíí wen ŋgai nɛ̀ wa ha̧ so tɛ tom kɔ-wa. O bíí ko Obɛd-Edɔm nɛ́ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-zua-yiitoo.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma hwelefefia Obɛd-Ɛdom nyighɛ zlaɓe le ŋa nci ŋwale ba'a ka menəhɛ ne, kaka katsala kɛfi se hɛ pɛtɛ kwa nza ŋkɛ le berete mbe ŋa nci slene. Ŋkwaŋemsə bakeghəmbe hɛ pɛtɛa nci.
Tupurri: Jar sen wo äuy diñ jar ni Obed-Edom wo, saara hay de weere äaaran wo diñ werpiiri ma de eegre debañ jag joñre. AÀ wo do hiira' ti äoge, diñ jar ni Obed-Edom wo.

Francais: Mésélémia avait des fils et des frères, hommes vaillants, au nombre de dix-huit.
Anglais: And Meshelemiah had sons and brethren, strong men, eighteen.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Mekelemiya hiɗi ɓosiyomna pet doogo yam glafandi, nisi si sum sa jufaya.
Bulu: Bon a bobenyañ be Mekelémiahu, biwôlô bi bôt, be mbe awôm a muam.
Guiziga: Ngay ngi Meselemiya, taŋ mujumom ati ziri naŋhay waɗ sukum naŋhay na, a gam jom gar mizli mupuɗaw puɗaway kuruˀ nga dangafaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Meselemiya boo woodi ɓiɓɓe e deerɗiraaɓe, marɓe daraja sappo e njoweetato.
Fulfulde_DC: Meselemiya boo woodi ɓiɓɓe e deerɗiraaɓe, marɓe daraja sappo e njoweetato.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛsɛlɛmia a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o nya in o bem ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ o kpasa-bíí.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛsɛlɛmia a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o nya in o bem ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ o kpasa-bíí.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma wəvəsəa yɛ Meshɛlɛmiya jikə le ŋwalea ŋkɛ ba'a ka kesaka yitenyɛ ne, meŋe degheseghəmbe zhili nyi kaka katsala le zləvə.
Tupurri: Jar ni Meselemiyahu wo de heçeçre äe wo hwal ti nenma'aç, diñ werpiiri ma de eegre wo.

Francais: Hosa, des fils de Mérari, avait pour fils: Semri, le chef: il n'était pas le premier-né, mais son père l'avait établi chef;
Anglais: Also Hosah, of the children of Merari, had sons; Simri the chief, (for though he was not the firstborn, yet his father made him the chief;)
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hosa, jar gurona vi Merari fi guro'o; Simri ma ŋolla, tunum ŋol mi bulumu, may nam mi ma vuɗi jewnɗi.
Bulu: Hôsa ya bone be Merari a nga biaé bon ana: Simri évet, ésaa nye a nga telé nye évet, akôsa bo na sa ke nye a mbe ntôl,
Guiziga: Hosa ngir muy ngi Merari, a yi ziri mizilehey mufaɗ: Semri i buy, i modogom ta ngbaŋ, amma cine a cifaŋ kaɓa buy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hosa mo danygol Meraari boo woodi ɓiɓɓe: Simiri woni arano, baaba maako darni mo o arano, koo nde o laataaki afo,
Fulfulde_DC: Hosa mo danygol Meraari boo woodi ɓiɓɓe: Simiri woni arano, baaba maako darni mo o arano, koo nde o laataaki afo,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hɔsa, ŋma bezaŋ Mɛrari a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ bem. Kuti-a nɛ́ Simri nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ gasawi; a̧ bó só nɛ́ kaya-bem na, ɓɛɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ de kànà ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk nɛ́ gasawi zu o nya-a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hɔsa, ŋma bezaŋ Mɛrari a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ bem. Kuti-a nɛ́ Simri nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ gasawi; a̧ bó só nɛ́ kaya-bem na, ɓɛɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ de kànà ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk nɛ́ gasawi zu o nya-a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili wəfaɗe yake Hosa nya kwa yita ta Merari: Shimri nde ghate mbe yita. Yitenyɛ nde veyi tsagha ya kwela ɗema ŋkɛ kande ghate ta wəzege,
Tupurri: Hosa yoo jar ni Merari biñ weere, diñ Simri, wañ no. Hay kañn wañ diñ pan äe, ba mbe de maga se bay mbe diñ jag weel wa mo äuy no,

Francais: Helcias le second, Tabélias le troisième, Zacharias le quatrième. Tous les fils et les frères de Hosa étaient au nombre de treize.
Anglais: Hilkiah the second, Tebaliah the third, Zechariah the fourth: all the sons and brethren of Hosah were thirteen.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hilkiya ma mul ma'na, Tebaliya, ma mul ɦidina, Zakariya ma mul fiɗina, gurona vi Hosa hiɗi ɓosiyomna pet doogo yam ɦidi.
Bulu: Hilkiyahu ébatan, Tebaliahu e mone lale, Zakari e nyô nyini. Bon a bobenyañe be Hôsa be mbe awôm a belaa.
Guiziga: Mijingaˀ naŋ i Hilkiya, mimakir taŋ i Tebaliya, mumufaɗ taŋ i Zakari. Ziri ngi Husahay ati sukum naŋhay a gam jom gar mizli kuruˀ nga makir.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: nden Hilkiyya ɗiɗaɓo, Tebaliya tataɓo e Zekariya nayaɓo. Limgal ɓiɓɓe e deerɗiraaɓe Hosa fuu, sappo e tato.
Fulfulde_DC: nden Hilkiyya ɗiɗaɓo, Tebaliya tataɓo e Zekariya nayaɓo. Limgal ɓiɓɓe e deerɗiraaɓe Hosa fuu, sappo e tato.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Hilkia, taar-a nɛ́ Tɛbalia, naar-a nɛ́ Zakarii: o bem ko Hɔsa in o nya-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ́ ɓu-zua-taar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Hilkia, taar-a nɛ́ Tɛbalia, naar-a nɛ́ Zakarii: o bem ko Hɔsa in o nya-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ́ ɓu-zua-taar.
Kapsiki_DC: Hilkiya nde dzete, Tebaliya nde mahekene, Zakari nde wəfaɗe. Ma wəvəsəa Hosa, ŋwale tezhilia ŋkɛ ba'a ka kesaka yitenyɛ ne, meŋe mahekeneghəmbe zhili.
Tupurri: diñ Hilkiyahu ma de äog no, Tebaliyahu ma de swa' no, Sakari ma de naa no. Jar ni Hosa wo de heçeçre äen wo äuy hay wo hwal ti swa'a.

Francais: Ces classes de portiers, les chefs de ces hommes, avaient, à côté de leurs frères, des fonctions pour le service de la maison de Yahweh.
Anglais: Among these were the divisions of the porters, even among the chief men, having wards one against another, to minister in the house of the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Vokŋa vi nisi sa ŋom vun-galana, sa ŋulona visiya hiɗi ɓosiyosin kaw, nisi si sa li lop ŋomda vi vun-ziyna hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: Minsamba bebaʼale mimbé mite, bivete ya bôt bete avale fe ane bobenyañe bap be nga too éyoñ ése asu ésaé ya nda Nti.
Guiziga: Buyoy ati mizli ngi si mijigina mizlingreheye, a gam slra ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ rak rak ati sukum taŋhaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Geɓe ardiiɓe aynooɓe dammuɗe ɓe'e kuuwi bana banndiraaɓe maɓɓe nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: Geɓe ardiiɓe aynooɓe dammuɗe ɓe'e kuuwi bana banndiraaɓe maɓɓe nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i dee nɛ́ tom-pɛma-nú Tua ko Sɔ̧. Wa in o gasawi kɔ-wa a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o tom nyɛm ŋmaa in ko o nya-wa kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i dee nɛ́ tom-pɛma-nú Tua ko Sɔ̧. Wa in o gasawi kɔ-wa a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o tom nyɛm ŋmaa in ko o nya-wa kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbeli nyi te ghəa mbeli le kweci mbeli nyi mbe wəvəsəa ka ya mɛa degha ne, jikə mene slene ta nci hɛ ki ghɛ Mahwətə.
Tupurri: Carge äil jar gor jag tiñ sen wo, wañre ma pel jar sen wo de heçeçre äaaran hay wo ti joñre gor jag tiñ mani Manwur no.

Francais: Ils tirèrent les sorts pour chaque porte, petits et grands, selon leurs familles.
Anglais: And they cast lots, as well the small as the great, according to the house of their fathers, for every gate.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi li ŋaɓta kuɗ vun-ziyn kaf, sa ŋulona hiɗi sa gurayn kaw, kuɗ jafna visi kaf.
Bulu: Be nga bo asimba asu mbé ôse bongô a benya bôtô ane menda me bôte map me né.
Guiziga: Ɓa ngi jigina mizlingre, gawlahay ati midigilahay, a wunkaka vur muy vur muy, rak rak, ti cergizleŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe mbaɗi kur'u dow famarɓe e mawɓe ngam dammugal koo ngale fuu fodde ci'e muuɗum'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe mbaɗi kur'u dow famarɓe e mawɓe ngam dammugal koo ngale fuu fodde ci'e muuɗum'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa pi̧i̧ tani ku̧u̧naŋ-a tɛ o geɗek-wi hɔ tɛ o gasawi nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nutua kɔ-wa wen pɛma o nú garo Tua ko Sɔ̧ kpɔk kpɔk.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa pi̧i̧ tani ku̧u̧naŋ-a tɛ o geɗek-wi hɔ tɛ o gasawi nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nutua kɔ-wa wen pɛma o nú garo Tua ko Sɔ̧ kpɔk kpɔk.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe hɛ kenehehwe mɛa ŋkwa nyi ya hɛ le sla kwasheghediɗi kala nza ta hwelefe, megelɛgeshi le meha mehɛɗi kanya kwetɛŋe.
Tupurri: Weere kleere de jar kluuri naa wo waçywaàale ti jag tiñn wo, wosela ne jar ma ti feele äen wo.

Francais: Le sort pour le côté de l'orient échut à Sélémias. On tira au sort pour Zacharias, son fils, qui était un sage conseiller, et le côté du septentrion lui échut.
Anglais: And the lot eastward fell to Shelemiah. Then for Zechariah his son, a wise counsellor, they cast lots; and his lot came out northward.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ŋaɓta nig kay Kelemiya, kay gal ma kuɗuwna. Nisi li ŋaɓta kuɗ ɦayta kay goora valam Zakariya, sa ma vul gatta ma wi yali, ŋaɓta kuɗ ɦayta vulum gal ma gaana.
Bulu: Asimba é nga liti Selémiahu asu mfaʼa jôp da tôô. Be nga bo asimba asu mone wé Zakari nye a mbe mve melep a yeme yen, asimba é nga ve nye mfaʼa yʼakôé.
Guiziga: Ngi jigina mizlingreŋ misi tisi pas ngi miprike, cergizleŋ a diɗ ar Selemiya. Ngi mizlingreŋ vay muŋ, a diɗ ar mangal naŋ Zakari, i mbur mukutivu misi lesle.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kur'u ta'ani Selemiya dammugal fuunaaŋge. Nden ɓe mbaɗi kur'u ngam ɓiyiiko Zekariya, carwoowo hikmaajo. Kur'u ta'ani mo dammugal woyla.
Fulfulde_DC: Kur'u ta'ani Selemiya dammugal fuunaaŋge. Nden ɓe mbaɗi kur'u ngam ɓiyiiko Zekariya, carwoowo hikmaajo. Kur'u ta'ani mo dammugal woyla.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese, tani baa nɛ́ Sɛlɛmia wen pɛma mɔ. War ko bem kɔ̧-a̧ Zakarii nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ de wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ, tani baa nɛ́ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn ha̧ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese, tani baa nɛ́ Sɛlɛmia wen pɛma mɔ. War ko bem kɔ̧-a̧ Zakarii nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ de wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ, tani baa nɛ́ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn ha̧ a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa kwasheghediɗi ntave Shɛlɛmiya kanza mɛa mɛ degha nya laka ŋkwa kesame ta veci. Ma wəzege ta ŋkɛ Zakari nya kande ntsehwele ntsehwele ne, mɛ degha nya laka bela kwa gwela nde ndeke nda geva.
Tupurri: Waçywaàale le' ti Selemiyahu ma gor jag tiñ ma nen wur bo toñ no. AÀ raw naa waçywaàale ne weel äe Sakari maga hay diñ je bag yañ ma de ëeñ mono, waçywaàalen raw baa ngeel ma nen äañ gloñhweden ne hene.

Francais: Le côté du midi échut à Obédédom, et la maison des magasins à ses fils.
Anglais: To Obed–edom southward; and to his sons the house of Asuppim.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gal ma kayamna nig kay Obed-Edom, ziy ma cuk jakŋa vuli ɓam gurona valamu.
Bulu: Obéd-Edom a nga nyoñ mfaʼa ya nké, bone bé ki be nga nyoñe nda é bili binaane biôm
Guiziga: Obet-Edomo, nga naŋ i mizlingreŋ vay ruwuy. Ziri naŋhay kwana, a jiginam dirgwaɗay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Obet-Edoom heɓi dammugal fombina, ɓiɓɓe maako boo cigorɗi.
Fulfulde_DC: Obet-Edoom heɓi dammugal fombina, ɓiɓɓe maako boo cigorɗi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: War ko Obɛd-Edɔm duka nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ; o bem kɔ̧-a̧ duka nɛ́ o wi-pɛm tua-a-mɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: War ko Obɛd-Edɔm duka nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ; o bem kɔ̧-a̧ duka nɛ́ o wi-pɛm tua-a-mɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Mɛa degha nya laka bela kwa zeme ya va Obɛd-Ɛdom, ma ŋwale tezhilia ŋkɛ, cɛ ketsene wəshi ya va hɛ.
Tupurri: Äañ waçybann raw le'ge ti Obed-Edom, tiñ ma lag feçeçre le' ti weere äe wo.

Francais: A Séphim et à Hosa échut le côté de l'occident, près de la porte Schalléketh, sur le chemin montant: une garde était en face de l'autre.
Anglais: To Shuppim and Hosah the lot came forth westward, with the gate Shallecheth, by the causeway of the going up, ward against ward.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gal ma vulatina nig kay Suppim hiɗi Hosa hiɗi vun-galana vi Salleket, jik vun hagata ta jik kulota: Sum sa ŋomda segena tuni goy ɗiger vok sa ŋomda segena.
Bulu: Kupim ba Hôsa be nga nyoñe mfaʼa jôp da dim ô laté a mbé ba loone Kalékét, ñwô wo yombô mfaʼa zene ja bet. Minsamba bebaʼale mi nga too nkaban avale di:
Guiziga: Supim ati Hosa, a jiginam nga taŋ i mizlingreŋ misi tisi pas ngi pastaˀ waɗ ngi Saleket, misi tir li miɗigir. A wunkaka mijigina mizlingrehey ani:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Suppim e Hosa keɓi dammugal hiirnaaŋge, baŋnge dammugal Salleket haa laawol ba'otooŋgol. Geɓe aynooɓe man ɗon tiitotiri.
Fulfulde_DC: Suppim e Hosa keɓi dammugal hiirnaaŋge, baŋnge dammugal Salleket haa laawol ba'otooŋgol. Geɓe aynooɓe man ɗon tiitotiri.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ko Supim in Hɔsa duka nɛ́ nú garo mɛ si yee-wese in nú tua ko Salɛkɛt nɛ̀ zɔk mɔ si fara-daŋ-nɛnɛ. Zuduk tom nɛtɛ nɛtɛ duka so hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ko Supim in Hɔsa duka nɛ́ nú garo mɛ si yee-wese in nú tua ko Salɛkɛt nɛ̀ zɔk mɔ si fara-daŋ-nɛnɛ. Zuduk tom nɛtɛ nɛtɛ duka so hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
Kapsiki_DC: Yɛ Shəwpim le Hosa ka ya mɛa cɛ nya laka ŋkwa kepəkwə ta veci ba'a mɛa degha ta Shalɛkɛt nya kepele geva laka hweŋkwa nya pelɛ ghəa ŋkwa. Ma ka ya mɛa cɛ nyighɛ ne, kala nya neheve geva hɛ:
Tupurri: Äañ ma nen wur bo lawn le' ti Supim wo de Hosa, jag tiñ Saleked ma ti faage ma de mañge ciñn lay. Faage joñre gorge tiñn hay de äodge do kay nono:

Francais: Il y avait à l'orient six lévites, au septentrion quatre par jour, au midi quatre par jour, et quatre aux magasins, deux à deux;
Anglais: Eastward were six Levites, northward four a day, southward four a day, and toward Asuppim two and two.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay gal ma kuɗuwna sum sa Levitna ka karkiya, gal gaa'a sa Levitn fiɗi hay buur kep, gal kayami, sa Levitn fiɗi hay buur kep, sa Levitna sa fiɗin hay vun-galana, hay liyn ir valamu valamu ma';
Bulu: e jôp da tôô, Belévit besaman, mfaʼa yʼakôé Belévit benyin môs ôse, mfaʼa ya nké, benyin môs ôse, benyin e mevôm ba naane biôm, nkabane minsamba mibaé;
Guiziga: Tisi pas ngi miprike, ar hiipasa, Levihey merkeɗ. Tir vay muŋ, hiipasa, Levihey mufaɗa. Tir vay ruwuyo, Levihey mufaɗa. Yo ngi jigina dirgwaɗaya kwana, hiipasa Levihey cuw makaw cuw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nyalaade fuu woodi Lewi'en njoweego haa fuunaaŋge, nayo haa woyla, nayo haa fombina, haa cuuɗi cigorɗi boo ɗiɗo ɗiɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: Nyalaade fuu woodi Lewi'en njoweego haa fuunaaŋge, nayo haa woyla, nayo haa fombina, haa cuuɗi cigorɗi boo ɗiɗo ɗiɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: mɛ daŋa-wese, o be Levii mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk tɛ ya nú garo nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese dam ɗoŋ wese kpɔk kpɔk; nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn nɛ́ bíí naar dam ɗoŋ wese kpɔk kpɔk; nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ nɛ́ bíí naar dam ɗoŋ wese kpɔk kpɔk mbɛt; ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko o wi-pɛm tua-a-mɔ nɛ́ bíí yiitoo yiitoo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: mɛ daŋa-wese, o be Levii mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk tɛ ya nú garo nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese dam ɗoŋ wese kpɔk kpɔk; nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn nɛ́ bíí naar dam ɗoŋ wese kpɔk kpɔk; nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ nɛ́ bíí naar dam ɗoŋ wese kpɔk kpɔk mbɛt; ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko o wi-pɛm tua-a-mɔ nɛ́ bíí yiitoo yiitoo.
Kapsiki_DC: Laka ŋkwa kesame ta veci ne, ŋkwaŋe nza ka Lɛvi kavəghwə mɛa degha. Wəfaɗe mɛa mɛa cɛ nya laka bela kwa gwela kavəghwə. Wəfaɗe mɛa mɛa cɛ nya laka bela kwa zeme kavəghwə. Bake wəvəsəa mbeli bake bake mɛa cɛ nyi tsene wəshi mbeli mbe,
Tupurri: Nen naw tum mono, jar Lefid lag wo hiira' nen wur botoñ, naa nen äañ gloñhwede, naa nen äañ waçybane, naa jag tiñ feçeçren wo go de car äil äog äog ti ngeel ta' ta' äog lay.

Francais: du côté des dépendances, à l'occident, quatre vers le chemin, deux aux dépendances. –
Anglais: At Parbar westward, four at the causeway, and two at Parbar.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: goy hay ŋor-jakŋa, hay gal vulatiya, Levitn fiɗi hay gal hagata, Levitn ma' goy hay ŋor-jakŋa.
Bulu: Asu e nda é ne fefel e jôp da dim, bôte benyin e njoñ a bebaé e nda été.
Guiziga: Hay mujoɓ avu cala tisi pas ngi pastaˀa, mizli mufaɗ a jiviɗe, waɗ cuw a huroˀo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haa babal heedi hiirnaaŋge woodi nayo haa laawol, ɗiɗo boo haa babal maajum.
Fulfulde_DC: Haa babal heedi hiirnaaŋge woodi nayo haa laawol, ɗiɗo boo haa babal maajum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ war Parbar mɛ si yee-wese nɛ́ bíí naar wen fara-daŋ-nɛnɛ, in bíí yiitoo wen kiitɛ Parbar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ war Parbar mɛ si yee-wese nɛ́ bíí naar wen fara-daŋ-nɛnɛ, in bíí yiitoo wen kiitɛ Parbar.
Kapsiki_DC: ma kaŋa kwete cɛ nya kejive laka ŋkwa kesame ta veci, wəfaɗe zhili kwa hweŋkwa ba'a bake mbe cɛ mbe cɛ.
Tupurri: Go ti ngeel ma ti jeñn go nen wur bolawn mono, jar naa wo nen ti faage no, jar äog wo nen ti faage ngeel ma ti jeñn lay.

Francais: Telles sont les classes des portiers, d'entre les fils des Coréïtes et les fils de Mérari.
Anglais: These are the divisions of the porters among the sons of Kore, and among the sons of Merari.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kayni si vokŋa vi sa ŋom vun-galana, jar gurona vi Kore hiɗi gurona vi Merari.
Bulu: Minsamba bebaʼale mimbé mmie le ya bone be Koré a bone be Merari.
Guiziga: Tayna i ngay ngi mijigina mizlingrehey, i dideˀ ngi Korehey ati ngi Merarihey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɗe'e ngoni geɓe aynooɓe dammuɗe haa danygol Koora e danygol Meraari.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɗe'e ngoni geɓe aynooɓe dammuɗe haa danygol Koora e danygol Meraari.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O duk wi-pɛm-nú tua mgbara o bezaŋ Kore in o bezaŋ Mɛrari nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O duk wi-pɛm-nú tua mgbara o bezaŋ Kore in o bezaŋ Mɛrari nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Tsagha se wəvəsəa ka ya mɛa cɛ nyi tsehave mbeli mbe hwelefe ta yɛ Korɛ le ŋa Merari.
Tupurri: Mo so no diñ carge äil jar gor jag tiñ ma yoo jar ni Koren wo de jar ni Merarin wo.

Francais: Les lévites, leurs frères, avaient l'intendance des trésors de la maison de Dieu et des trésors des choses consacrées.
Anglais: And of the Levites, Ahijah was over the treasures of the house of God, and over the treasures of the dedicated things.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kep jar sa Levitna, Ahiya nam ka ŋom timgilla hay ziyna vi Lawna, hiɗi timgilla vi sle ma peldetna.
Bulu: Belévit bʼéziñ, bobenyañe bap, be nga lôme be be bo ésaé ya baʼale akume ya nda Zambe a akume biôm bi nʼétyi.
Guiziga: A vulaka buyɓi ngi ji zlili ngir hay Buymisemuŋ waɗ gwat muvula le da Buymisemuŋ na, da Levihey cah.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ahiya gooto nder Lewi'en halfitinaama kuugal aynugo ndesaaje haa haykaliiru Allah e ndesaaje kuuje cenaaɗe:
Fulfulde_DC: Ahiya gooto nder Lewi'en halfitinaama kuugal aynugo ndesaaje haa haykaliiru Allah e ndesaaje kuuje cenaaɗe:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ŋma be Levii, nya-wi nɔ‘i, duka nɛ́ wi-zɔk-mbɔi kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ in wan nɛ‘i ee nɛtɛ ha̧ Sɔ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ŋma be Levii, nya-wi nɔ‘i, duka nɛ́ wi-zɔk-mbɔi kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ in wan nɛ‘i ee nɛtɛ ha̧ Sɔ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Kweci ka Lɛvi ne, mcɛlə nyi mbe ghɛa Shala ba'a kweci wəshi nyi keveyi geva kaŋa Shala, nyi ve nda mbeli yanewe ghweme hɛ te.
Tupurri: Ahiya, je Lefid po boñ hay diñ je ko wer horog ma äil tiñ Baan wo de feçeçre ma bay ëag maga aè haç ra mono.

Francais: Parmi les fils de Lédan, savoir les fils des Gersonites issus de Lédan, chefs des familles de Lédan le Gersonite, c'était Jéhiel;
Anglais: As concerning the sons of Laadan; the sons of the Gershonite Laadan, chief fathers, even of Laadan the Gershonite, were Jehieli.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jar gurona vi Leyadan, gurona vi sa Gersonna may goy hay Layedan, ma ŋolla vi jafna vi Leyadan ma Gersonna, yum Yehiyeli.
Bulu: Mfaʼa bone be Laéden, abume Gerson, be too bivete menda me bôte map, be mbe na: Yehiéli,
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Ladanay, ngir sukwi ngi gersoŋ, buy a wuzla muy taŋhaya, i ti Yehiyeli
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe La'adan mo danygol Gersom, baaba-ci'e'en man, ɗum Yehiyeli
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe La'adan mo danygol Gersom, baaba-ci'e'en man, ɗum Yehiyeli
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Ladaŋ, tɛ nú-gara ko Gɛrsɔŋ nɛ̀ yaa so nɛ́ o gasawi nutua kɔ-wa kpɔk kpɔk nɛ́ Yehiɛl,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Ladaŋ, tɛ nú-gara ko Gɛrsɔŋ nɛ̀ yaa so nɛ́ o gasawi nutua kɔ-wa kpɔk kpɔk nɛ́ Yehiɛl,
Kapsiki_DC: Hwelefe ta Ladan nyi kwa yita ta Gɛrshom, kambeli nyi te ghəa mbeli keyita keyita ne, yɛ Yɛhiyɛli,
Tupurri: Yoo jar ni Laedan maga wo ti moobe mani Gerson day wo diñ wañre ti feele äaaran wo, day biñ wo le go äil Laedan je ni Gerson mono diñ Yehiyeli,

Francais: les fils de Jéhiel, Zathan et Joël, son frère, avaient l'intendance des trésors de la maison de Yahweh.
Anglais: The sons of Jehieli; Zetham, and Joel his brother, which were over the treasures of the house of the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Yehiyeli, Zetam hiɗi ɓasulumna Jowel, sa ka ŋom timgilla ma hay ziyna vi Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: a bone be Yehiéli, Zétam a monyañe wé Yôél mbe be nga baʼale akume ya nda Nti.
Guiziga: ati ziri naŋhay waɗ Zetam ati sukum naŋ Zowel. Buy ɓi ngi zlili ngir hay Bumbulvuŋ i taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e ɓiɓɓe mum e Zetam e Yo'el deerɗum. Ɓe kalfitinaama kuugal aynugo ndesaaje haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: e ɓiɓɓe mum e Zetam e Yo'el deerɗum. Ɓe kalfitinaama kuugal aynugo ndesaaje haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: in o bem kɔ̧-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o nya-a̧ Zɛtam in Jɔɛl. Tom kɔ-wa so nɛ́ zɔka mbɔi kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: in o bem kɔ̧-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o nya-a̧ Zɛtam in Jɔɛl. Tom kɔ-wa so nɛ́ zɔka mbɔi kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.
Kapsiki_DC: ba'a ŋwalea Yɛhiyɛli, Zɛtam le wəza meghekɛ Zhowɛl. Ghenci ka se te ghəa mcɛlə nyi mbe ghɛa Mahwətə.
Tupurri: diñ Setam wo de hen äe Jowel jar ni Yehiyelin wo aè hay de haç joñre koge wer horog ma äil tiñ mani Manwurn ne hara do.

Francais: Parmi les Amramites, les Isaarites, les Hébronites et les Ozihélites,
Anglais: Of the Amramites, and the Izharites, the Hebronites, and the Uzzielites:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay jafna vi Amram, jafna vi Yitsehar, jafna vi Hebron, hiɗi jafna vi Uzzi,
Bulu: Mfaʼa bone be Amram, ba be Yitsehar, ba be Hébron a ba be Uziél,
Guiziga: Ar sukwi ngi Amram, ngi Isar, Hebroŋ waɗ Uziyele,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder yimɓe Amram e Yicehar e Heburuun e Uzziyel boo:
Fulfulde_DC: Nder yimɓe Amram e Yicehar e Heburuun e Uzziyel boo:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: War ko o bezaŋ Amram, o bezaŋ Yisɛhar, o bezaŋ Hebrɔŋ in o bezaŋ Uziɛl,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: War ko o bezaŋ Amram, o bezaŋ Yisɛhar, o bezaŋ Hebrɔŋ in o bezaŋ Uziɛl,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kaŋa yita ta Amram, ŋa Isakar, ŋa Hɛbron ba'a ŋa Əwziyɛl ne,
Tupurri: Yoo jar ma ti moobe mani Amram no, mani Yitsehar no, mani Hebroñn wo de Usiyeln wo mono,

Francais: c'était Subuël, fils de Gersom, fils de Moïse, qui était l'intendant en chef des trésors.
Anglais: And Shebuel the son of Gershom, the son of Moses, was ruler of the treasures.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: sa ma ŋom timgilla visi kayni mi Sebuwel goora vi Gerson, goora vi Musus.
Bulu: Sebuél, e mone Gersom, ndaé Môze, nye a mbe mbaʼale akum.
Guiziga: i Sebuyel dideˀ ngi Gersoŋ, mangal ngi Moyis, majigina zlili jom gar i naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sebuwel ɓii Gersom ɓii Muusa woni hooreejo aynooɓe ndesaaje.
Fulfulde_DC: Sebuwel ɓii Gersom ɓii Muusa woni hooreejo aynooɓe ndesaaje.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: nɛ́ Sɛbuɛl, bezaŋ Gɛrsɔŋ, nɛ̀ duka so nɛ́ bem ko Moisɛ, a̧ duk so zu mbɔi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: nɛ́ Sɛbuɛl, bezaŋ Gɛrsɔŋ, nɛ̀ duka so nɛ́ bem ko Moisɛ, a̧ duk so zu mbɔi.
Kapsiki_DC: Shebəwɛl nya kahwelefe ta Gɛrshom nya kawəzege ta Moyize ya kawəndə nya kwele nya kenewe ghweme te mcɛlə.
Tupurri: aè hay ba diñ Sebuwel je ni Gersom je ni Moyisn ma ëaw horogn wo.

Francais: Parmi ses frères issus d'Eliézer, dont le fils fut Rahabia, dont le fils fut Isaïas, dont le fils fut Joram, dont le fils fut Zéchri, dont le fils fut Sélémith,
Anglais: And his brethren by Eliezer; Rehabiah his son, and Jeshaiah his son, and Joram his son, and Zichri his son, and Shelomith his son.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jar ɓosiyomna valamu sa may goy hay Eliyazar pana, ma goora valam yum Rebiya, ma goora valam yum Esaya, ma goora valam yum Yoram, ma goora valam yum Zikri, ma goora valam yum Selomit,
Bulu: E bobenyañ be nga vumane nye be too mvoñ bôt Eliézer be mbe Rehabiahu moné wé, Ezayi mone wé, Yôram moné wé Zikri mone wé a Selômit mone wé,
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Sebuyeley ada a wuzla muy ngi Eliyezer sukum ngi Gersoŋ, i ti Rehabiya mangal ngi Eliyezer, Yesaya, Yoram, Zikri waɗ Selomit.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Banndiraaɓe maako boo: Eli'azaaru danyi Rehabiya, Rehabiya danyi Esaaya, Esaaya danyi Yoram, Yoram danyi Zikiri, Zikiri danyi Selomit.
Fulfulde_DC: Banndiraaɓe maako boo: Eli'azaaru danyi Rehabiya, Rehabiya danyi Esaaya, Esaaya danyi Yoram, Yoram danyi Zikiri, Zikiri danyi Selomit.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nya Sɛbuɛl nɛ́ Sɛlɔmit nɛ̀ ɗoŋ Eliɛzɛr nya Gɛrsɔŋ, wen Eliɛzɛr koo so Rɛhabia, Rɛhabia koo Yɛsaya, Yɛsaya koo Yoram, Yoram koo Zikri, ɓɛɛ Zikri ko Sɛlɔmit.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nya Sɛbuɛl nɛ́ Sɛlɔmit nɛ̀ ɗoŋ Eliɛzɛr nya Gɛrsɔŋ, wen Eliɛzɛr koo so Rɛhabia, Rɛhabia koo Yɛsaya, Yɛsaya koo Yoram, Yoram koo Zikri, ɓɛɛ Zikri ko Sɛlɔmit.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma hwa ka menəhɛnyɛ nyi mbe hwelefe ta Ɛliyɛzɛr, wəza meghekɛ Gɛrshom ne, kweci mbeli ya shɛ: Rehabiya wəzege ta Ɛliyɛzɛr, ba'a yɛ Yeshaya, Yoram, Zikri le Shelomit.
Tupurri: Yoo heçeçre äe jar ni Eliyesern wo mono, aè baa diñ Selomid je ni Sikri, je ni Yoram je ni Esayi, je ni Rehabiyahu no.

Francais: c'étaient Sélémith et ses frères qui avaient l'intendance de tous les trésors des choses saintes qu'avaient consacrées le roi David, les chefs de famille, avec les chefs de milliers et de centaines et les chefs de l'armée:
Anglais: Which Shelomith and his brethren were over all the treasures of the dedicated things, which David the king, and the chief fathers, the captains over thousands and hundreds, and the captains of the host, had dedicated.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Selomit hiɗi ɓosiyomna ka ŋom timgilla ma hiɗi sle ma peldetna ma mulla David hiɗi sa ŋulona vi jafna, sa ŋulona vi vok ma birimna hiɗi vok ma kisna hiɗi sa ŋulona vi sojena vulum goy ɗifini.
Bulu: Selômit a bobenyañe bé mbe be nga bili ésaé ya baʼale akume biôm bi nʼétyi mbie njô bôte David a nga telé étyi, nalé fe bivete menda me bôt, bejôô ya betoyini a mintet a ba ya nsamba mewosan;
Guiziga: Davit ati buyoy misi a wuzla muy taŋhay, waɗ soje muwam mizli durmuk durmukoy, ati skat skatay, muvulaka gwatay mipal da Buymisemuŋ na, buyɓi naŋ i Selomit ati sukum naŋhay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Selomit oo e deerɗiraaɓe mum ayni ndesaaje kuuje cenaaɗe, ɗe laamiiɗo Daawuda e baaba-ci'e'en e ardiiɓe dow honooɓe ujineere e ardiiɓe dow honooɓe teemerre e mawɓe honooɓe, ceni.
Fulfulde_DC: Selomit oo e deerɗiraaɓe mum ayni ndesaaje kuuje cenaaɗe, ɗe laamiiɗo Daawuda e baaba-ci'e'en e ardiiɓe dow honooɓe ujineere e ardiiɓe dow honooɓe teemerre e mawɓe honooɓe, ceni.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛ̀ nɛ́ Sɛlɔmit in o nya-wi a̧ duka so nɛ́ o wi-pɛm-mbɔi in mɔ nɛ̀ wannu David, o gasawi nú tua, o wi-duk-zu o wi-biro booro in gɔmŋmaa bá nɛ̀ o gasawi zu o wi-biro ee so ha̧ Sɔ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛ̀ nɛ́ Sɛlɔmit in o nya-wi a̧ duka so nɛ́ o wi-pɛm-mbɔi in mɔ nɛ̀ wannu David, o gasawi nú tua, o wi-duk-zu o wi-biro booro in gɔmŋmaa bá nɛ̀ o gasawi zu o wi-biro ee so ha̧ Sɔ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Shelomit ba'a ka kesaka yitenyɛ nde se te ghəa wəshi nyi veyi meghe David kaŋa Shala laka ka meghe nyi mbe yita, laka ka meghe nyi te ghəa ka sewajɛ slibə, laka kweci ka meghe nyi te ghəa ka sewajɛ gwəmsə ba'a laka kweci meghea ka sewajɛ.
Tupurri: Selomid wo de heçeçre äe hay wo diñ jar ko wer horog ma bay ëag maga wañ Dafidi, wañre ma ti feelen wo, wañre ma pel jar ndar ndarn wo de ma pel jar kiskisn wo de wañre soden hay lag ra wo go ti nen sagsag ne Baa mono.

Francais: ils les avaient consacrées sur le butin pris à la guerre, pour l'entretien de la maison de Yahweh.
Anglais: Out of the spoils won in battles did they dedicate to maintain the house of the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gal slen ma nisi yawamay vun duura nisi vulum goy ɗifini mi Lawna kay kot tuw ziyna vi Ma-Vatɗin hiɗi namu.
Bulu: biôm bite bi nga nyoñeban akume nsa été a veban asu mbaʼalane nda Nti.
Guiziga: Gwat taŋ mulumoko di ar vurumo, a vulam cah ngi ɗiya hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ngurtinno ɗum nder keɓal konuuji ngam mo'itingo haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ngurtinno ɗum nder keɓal konuuji ngam mo'itingo haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa kaia so o mɔɔ nɔ‘i mgbara mɔɔ-oi-biro e nɛtɛ wen ɗafa-a nɛ̀ Tua ko GASA WAN.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa kaia so o mɔɔ nɔ‘i mgbara mɔɔ-oi-biro e nɛtɛ wen ɗafa-a nɛ̀ Tua ko GASA WAN.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe mbelia shɛhɛ keveyi kweci bela ta mcɛlə nyi fəke mbeli hwa mpa kaŋa Shala kezha hi ghɛa Mahwətə le.
Tupurri: Horog sen hay wo diñ feçeçre maga aè hay yaçë ra le jag durgi, day aè lag ra go sagsag ti nen ma kay joñre ma äil tiñ mani Manwurn mono.

Francais: Tout ce qu'avaient consacré Samuel, le voyant, Saül, fils de Cis, Abner, fils de Ner, Joab, fils de Sarvia, ou tout autre, était sous la main de Sélémith et de ses frères.
Anglais: And all that Samuel the seer, and Saul the son of Kish, and Abner the son of Ner, and Joab the son of Zeruiah, had dedicated; and whosoever had dedicated any thing, it was under the hand of Shelomith, and of his brethren.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Slen kaf ma Samuel ma jobta vulum ɗifini, ma Sawul goora vi Kis vulum ɗifini, ma Abner goora vi Ner vulum ɗifini, ma Yowab goora vi Seruya vulum ɗifini hiɗi ma segen vulum ɗifin kafna ŋomom kayn mi Selomit hiɗi ɓosiyomna.
Bulu: Biôm bise Samuel ñyene mam a nga ve, bi Saül e mone Kis a nga ve, bi Abnér e mone Ner a nga ve, e bi Yôab e mone Seruya a nga ve, a bi bôte mevale mese be nga ve, Selômit a bobenyañ mbe be nga baʼale bie.
Guiziga: Gwat mijiviɗ Samiyel muvula taŋ, Sawul mangal ngi Kis muvulaŋ, Abner mangal ngi Ner muvulaŋ waɗ ngi Zoˀap mangal ngi Seruya muvulaka taŋ gar na, buyɓi naŋ, naŋ avu Selomit ati sukum naŋhaya ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ko Samuyila, gi'oowo e Sawulu ɓii Kis e Abineer ɓii Neer e Yo'ab ɓii Seruyatu ceni, cenaaɗum ɗum fuu, Selomit e deerɗiraaɓe mum ayni ɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: Ko Samuyila, gi'oowo e Sawulu ɓii Kis e Abineer ɓii Neer e Yo'ab ɓii Seruyatu ceni, cenaaɗum ɗum fuu, Selomit e deerɗiraaɓe mum ayni ɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa kaia o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ Samuɛl wi-zɔk-mɔ, Saul bem ko Kis, Abnɛr bem ko Nɛr in Jɔab bem ko Sɛruya ee so nɛtɛ ha̧ Sɛlɔmit in o nya-a̧ wen zɔka-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa kaia o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ Samuɛl wi-zɔk-mɔ, Saul bem ko Kis, Abnɛr bem ko Nɛr in Jɔab bem ko Sɛruya ee so nɛtɛ ha̧ Sɛlɔmit in o nya-a̧ wen zɔka-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛ wəshi nyi keveyi geva kaŋa Shala laka yɛ nde mɛ ŋkwa Saməyɛl, Sawəl wəzege ta Kish, Abnɛr wəzege ta Nɛr le Zhowab nya nza meghekɛ kaSerəwya ne, te dzeve ta yɛ Shelomit hɛ le ka kesaka yitenyɛ.
Tupurri: Fen po äuy maga Samyel je ko nen no, Sawul je ni Kis no, Abner je ni Ner no, Jowab je ni Serujan wo de wosela äuy maga do äe hay gel mopo go mo äuy hay lag ra wo go sagsag ti nen mono, aè lag Selomid wo de heçeçre äe wo ko wer äaara.

Francais: Parmi les Isaarites, Chonénias et ses fils étaient employés pour les affaires extérieures en Israël, comme scribes et comme magistrats.
Anglais: Of the Izharites, Chenaniah and his sons were for the outward business over Israel, for officers and judges.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jar jafna vi Yisrehat kayni, Kenaniya hiɗi ɓosiyomna ka li lop ma goy jiyna hay Israyel, kay ŋom slena hiɗi ka kitata.
Bulu: E bone be Yitsehar, Kenaniahu a bone bé be nga belane be asu mame ya Israél atan, nalé fe ane bejôô a betyiʼi mejô.
Guiziga: Kenaniya ngi sukwi ngi Isara, taŋ ati ziri naŋhaya, a jiginam nga taŋ i gwat ngi Israyeley misi i ngi Buymisemuŋhoy ta, kaɓa toho gwatay ati gi kiita.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kenaniya e ɓiɓɓe mum, ɓe yimɓe Yicehar, laati saraaki'en e hiitooɓe e ardaniiɓe kuuɗe laamu nder lesdi Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Kenaniya e ɓiɓɓe mum, ɓe yimɓe Yicehar, laati saraaki'en e hiitooɓe e ardaniiɓe kuuɗe laamu nder lesdi Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: War ko o bezaŋ Yisɛhar, Kɛnania in o bem kɔ‘i yaa so kɔ‘i tɛ tom-zɔka-nù in kita sɛn  Israɛl . Wa so nɛ o wi-yɔr-mɔ in o wi-gɔn-kita.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: War ko o bezaŋ Yisɛhar, Kɛnania in o bem kɔ‘i yaa so kɔ‘i tɛ tom-zɔka-nù in kita sɛn  Israɛl . Wa so nɛ o wi-yɔr-mɔ in o wi-gɔn-kita.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma yɛ Kenaniya le ŋwale tezhilia ŋkɛ mbe hwelefe ta Isar ne, ghenci ya kaka rafe wəshi ba'a kaka meha ghwə.
Tupurri: Yoo jar ma ti moobe mani Yitseharn wo mono, aè hoo Kenaniyahu wo de weere äe wo diñ jar joñre de jar Israyel wo ti äañ seele de jare, ti äañ carge kiida.

Francais: Parmi les Hébronites, Hasabias et ses frères, hommes vaillants, au nombre de mille sept cents, avaient la surveillance d'Israël de l'autre côté du Jourdain, à l'occident, pour toutes les affaires de Yahweh et le service du roi.
Anglais: And of the Hebronites, Hashabiah and his brethren, men of valour, a thousand and seven hundred, were officers among them of Israel on this side Jordan westward in all the business of the  Lord , and in the service of the king.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jar jafna vi Hebron, Hasabiya hiɗi ɓosiyomna, sum sa jufaya, nisi ir birimi hiɗi kis-siɗiya, nisi ŋom sa Israyella, goy bugol Yordan, hay gal vulatiya, kay lopna vi Ma-Vatɗina hiɗi lopna vi mulla kafe.
Bulu: E bone be Ebroñ, Hakabiahu a bobenyañ, biwôlô bi bôt toyini a mintete zamgbwa, be nga bo ésaé ya jom Israél e Yordane Yat, e jôb da dim, asu ésaé Nti ése a ji njô bôt.
Guiziga: Hasabiya waɗ sukum naŋhay mupuɗaw puɗaw, mizli durmuk ti skat skat tarnaˀ, taŋ ar sukwi ngi Hebroŋ, a jiginam nga taŋ i Israyel mikini tisi pas ngi pastaˀ ngi mizaw Zurdeŋ. Gwat ngi Bumbulvuŋhoy gar waɗ slra ngi buyo, ɓi naŋ avu taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hasabiya e deerɗum'en, ɓe yimɓe Heburuun, marɓe daraja ujineere e teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo (1.700), laati aynooɓe Isra'iila gaɗa maayo Urdun wakeere hiirnaaŋge, ngam kuuɗe Jawmiraawo fuu e ngam kuuɗe laamiiɗo boo.
Fulfulde_DC: Hasabiya e deerɗum'en, ɓe yimɓe Heburuun, marɓe daraja ujineere e teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo (1.700), laati aynooɓe Isra'iila gaɗa maayo Urdun wakeere hiirnaaŋge, ngam kuuɗe Jawmiraawo fuu e ngam kuuɗe laamiiɗo boo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: War ko o bezaŋ Hebrɔŋ nɛ́ Hasabia in o nya-a̧. Wa nɛ́ o kpasa-bíí, wa lɛŋ yaa so nɛ́ bíí booro-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo; wa yaa so kɔ-wa wen zɔka tom ko o be  Israɛl  nɛ̀ kur Jurdɛn mɛ si yee-wese; tom kɔ-wa'i nɛ́ zɔka o tom ko GASA WAN lɛŋ in tom ko wannu mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: War ko o bezaŋ Hebrɔŋ nɛ́ Hasabia in o nya-a̧. Wa nɛ́ o kpasa-bíí, wa lɛŋ yaa so nɛ́ bíí booro-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo; wa yaa so kɔ-wa wen zɔka tom ko o be  Israɛl  nɛ̀ kur Jurdɛn mɛ si yee-wese; tom kɔ-wa'i nɛ́ zɔka o tom ko GASA WAN lɛŋ in tom ko wannu mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Yɛ Hashabiya le kweci ka katsala 1.700 mbe yita ta Hɛbron ne, ghenci ya te ghəa hɛɗia ka Israyɛl nya laka ŋkwa kepəkwə ta veci yitea hələa Zhəwrdɛŋe. Ghenci ka se te ghəa wəshi pɛtɛ, nyi kaŋa slene ta Mahwətə le nyi kaŋa meghe.
Tupurri: Yoo jar ma ti moobe mani Hebroñn wo mono, Hasabiyahu wo de heçeçre äe, werpiiri ma de eegre wo ndar ti äe kiskis renam, hay wo diñ jar seege de jar Israyel ma faale Jurdeçeç äañla nen wur bolawn wo ti joñre mani Manwur wo de joñre mani wañ no.

Francais: Pour les Hébronites, Jéria était le chef, - Pour les Hébronites, selon leurs généalogies, par familles, on fit des recherches, la quarantième année du règne de David, et l'on trouva parmi eux de vaillants hommes à Jazer en Galaad,
Anglais: Among the Hebronites was Jeriah the chief, even among the Hebronites, according to the generations of his fathers. In the fortieth year of the reign of David they were sought for, and there were found among them mighty men of valour at Jazer of Gilead.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay jafna vi sa Hebronna, Yeriya mi ma ŋolla vi sa Hebronna kuɗ sumaysi sa jufayna, hay busata dok-fiɗita vi David hay mulda, nisi feka, nisi fi sum sa jufayna jarsiya hay Yayezer hay Galaad.
Bulu: E mfaʼa bone bʼEbroñ, Yériya a mbe évete jap. Mbu mewôme nyini David a nga jôô, be nga ke ba fas éndane ya mvôʼô Hébron, nde be nga koon, e Yazer, si Galad, biwôlô bi bôte yʼété.
Guiziga: Yeriya i madiɗa ngir muy ngi Hebroŋhoy. Ar vi mizli ngir mufaɗ naŋ Davit mazum buy na, mizli Hebroŋhoy a laka virzi ngi dideˀ taŋhaya le, yo a lumam mizli mupuɗaw puɗaway le a wuzla taŋ, a lumam a ruwuy Yazer ngi Galaˀat.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yeriya woni hooreejo yimɓe Heburuun. Nder nduuɓu laamu Daawuda cappanɗe nayaɓu ɓe linyi defte asli yimɓe Heburuun. Ɓe tawi caka maɓɓe, marɓe daraja haa Ya'ajer nder lesdi Gile'at.
Fulfulde_DC: Yeriya woni hooreejo yimɓe Heburuun. Nder nduuɓu laamu Daawuda cappanɗe nayaɓu ɓe linyi defte asli yimɓe Heburuun. Ɓe tawi caka maɓɓe, marɓe daraja haa Ya'ajer nder lesdi Gile'at.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: War ko o bezaŋ Hebrɔŋ, Yɛria duka so nɛ́ gasawi kɔ-wa; wa kia so tugun-wa tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ David kpaa nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-taar tɛ wan, ɓɛɛ wa kpa o kpasa-bíí mgbara wa sɛn Yazɛr nú Galad.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: War ko o bezaŋ Hebrɔŋ, Yɛria duka so nɛ́ gasawi kɔ-wa; wa kia so tugun-wa tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ David kpaa nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-taar tɛ wan, ɓɛɛ wa kpa o kpasa-bíí mgbara wa sɛn Yazɛr nú Galad.
Kapsiki_DC: Yeriya nde se kameghe mbe yita ta ka Hɛbron. Ma te kwa wəfaɗe ta va ta David te meghe ne, pa sepate nza ta hwelefe nya mbe yita shɛ. Nahe mbeli kesepate kweci mbeli nyi kaka katsala nyi kwa Yazɛr mbe Gala'ad.
Tupurri: Ti jar se ma ti moobe mani Hebroñn wo mono, Yeriya hay diñ wañ äaara. Nen kiñgi ma de do naa maga Dafid ti wañ mono, aè raw kië wer äaara le ti ceçw äaara, go ti feele äaaran wo, aè kal da' werpiiri ma de eegre wo yoo äaara wo Yaeser ti sir Galaade.

Francais: - et ses frères, hommes vaillants, étaient au nombre de deux mille sept cents chefs de famille. Le roi David les établit sur les Rubénites, sur les Gadites et sur la demi-tribu de Manassé pour toutes les affaires de Dieu et les affaires du roi.
Anglais: And his brethren, men of valour, were two thousand and seven hundred chief fathers, whom king David made rulers over the Reubenites, the Gadites, and the half tribe of Manasseh, for every matter pertaining to God, and affairs of the king.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ɓosiyomna, sum sa jufaya, nisi birim ma' hiɗi kis-siɗiya, sa ŋulona vi jafna. Mulla David tunsi kay jafna vi Ruben, jafna vi Gad hiɗi gal-jafna vi Manase, kay lopna vi Lawna hiɗi lopna vi mulla kaf.
Bulu: Yériya a bobenyañ be mbe bôte toyini a mintete zamgbwa be too biwôlô, bivete menda me bôt mbie njô bôte David a nga telé e be mvôʼô Ruben, mvôʼô Gad a éfas ayoñe Manasé asu mam me Zambe mese a ma me njô bôt.
Guiziga: Davit ati sukum naŋhaya, a gam jom gar, mizli mupuɗaw puɗaway durmuk cuw ti skat skat tarnaˀ, i buy ngi hayay a wuzla muy taŋhaya, Davit mucufa taŋ ɓa a waka Rubeney, Gatay waɗ reta ngi sukwi ngi Manase, ɓa a kam slimiɗ ar gwat ngi Buymisemuŋhoy ati ngi buyoy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yeriya e banndiraaɓe mum, marɓe daraja, baaba-ci'e'en ujine ɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo (2.700). Laamiiɗo Daawuda jo'ini ɓe ɓe aynooɓe dow le'i Ruben e Gada e reeta lenyol Manassa, ngam kuuɗe Allah e kuuɗe laamiiɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: Yeriya e banndiraaɓe mum, marɓe daraja, baaba-ci'e'en ujine ɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo (2.700). Laamiiɗo Daawuda jo'ini ɓe ɓe aynooɓe dow le'i Ruben e Gada e reeta lenyol Manassa, ngam kuuɗe Allah e kuuɗe laamiiɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yɛria in o nya-wi lɛŋ nɛ́ o kpasa-bíí in o gasawi nutua; dɔka wa lɛŋ nɛ́ booro-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo. Wannu David ee so wa zu o bezaŋ Rubɛn, o bezaŋ Gad in reeta zuduk ko Manase, wen zɔka o tom ko Sɔ̧ lɛŋ, in ko wannu mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yɛria in o nya-wi lɛŋ nɛ́ o kpasa-bíí in o gasawi nutua; dɔka wa lɛŋ nɛ́ booro-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo. Wannu David ee so wa zu o bezaŋ Rubɛn, o bezaŋ Gad in reeta zuduk ko Manase, wen zɔka o tom ko Sɔ̧ lɛŋ, in ko wannu mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghe David tsehave mbeli 2.700 mbe yita shɛ, pɛtɛ kaka meghe nyi mbe yita, kezha nza te ghəa wəshi nyi kaŋa Shala ba'a nyi kaŋa meghe te hɛɗi nya nza hwelefe ta yɛ Rəbɛn, ŋa Gad ba'a bela ta hwele ta Manasɛ, nya laka ŋkwa kesame te veci.
Tupurri: Heçeçre äe werpiiri ma de eegren hay wo ndar äog ti äe kiskis rename, wo diñ wañre ma ti feele wo. Wañ Dafid raw lag rage ti jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Ruben wo, mani Gadn wo de nus jar ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Manasen wo ma waçaç ree feçeçre mani Baan wo de feçeçre mani wañn wo.

Francais: Les enfants d'Israël selon leur nombre, chefs de familles, chefs de milliers et de centaines, officiers au service du roi pour tout ce qui concernait les divisions, celles qui arrivaient et celles qui partaient, mois par mois, pendant tous les mois de l'année, - chaque division étant de vingt-quatre mille hommes, - étaient:
Anglais: Now the children of Israel after their number, to wit, the chief fathers and captains of thousands and hundreds, and their officers that served the king in any matter of the courses, which came in and went out month by month throughout all the months of the year, of every course were twenty and four thousand.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Israyel kuɗ ŋaɓta visiya, sa ŋulona vi jafna, sa ŋulona vi vok ma birimna hiɗi vok ma kisna, sojena sa ka gut kuɗ mulla hay lopna vi vok-ma-duura, cota visiya hiɗi kalta visiya, hay tilla tilla kaf, hay tilla ma jar busat kafna, vok-ma-duur kep ka hiɗi sumun hayam birim dok-ma' yam fiɗi.
Bulu: E bone bʼIsraél ba mbe be nga saé be njô bôt ane tañe jap é né: bivete menda me bôt, bivete betoyini a mintet, bivete bezimbi bi nga too njô bôte fefe asu mam mese ma fombô minsamba bezimbi, nsoone wop a nkeane wop, ngon ése, nalé a bobaʼan e bengon bese ya mbu, nsamba bezimbi ôse ô bili bôte toyini mewôm mebaé a ényin.
Guiziga: Slimiɗ ngi Israyeley, gawla ngi buy madiɗahay ani: I madiɗa ngi wuzla muyoy, madiɗa miwi mizli durmuk durmuk ati skat skatay, waɗ mutoho gwatay, slra taŋ i ngica sojehey, asi a vam tiŋ ar li mbiɗa vu ngi kiya pal pal. Sojehey ngac purla na, i mizli durmuk kukur cuw ti mufaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa huuwanooɓe laamiiɗo Isra'iila'en fodde limle muuɗum'en, baaba-ci'e'en  e ardiiɓe dow honooɓe ujineere e ardiiɓe dow honooɓe teemerre e saraaki'en maɓɓe. Ɓe kuuwani laamiiɗo bee geɓe tokkindirɗe lewru lewru, lebbi hitaande fuu. Yeɓre koo ndeye woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa huuwanooɓe laamiiɗo Isra'iila'en fodde limle muuɗum'en, baaba-ci'e'en  e ardiiɓe dow honooɓe ujineere e ardiiɓe dow honooɓe teemerre e saraaki'en maɓɓe. Ɓe kuuwani laamiiɗo bee geɓe tokkindirɗe lewru lewru, lebbi hitaande fuu. Yeɓre koo ndeye woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O be  Israɛl  nɛ̀ dee tom ha̧ wannu nɛ́ o gasawi nutua, o wi-duk-zu o wi-biro booro in gɔmŋmaa, ká bá nɛ̀ o gasawi zu o wi-biro; tom kɔ-wa so nɛ́ zɔka dùk o wi-biro nɛ̀ kpai so nɛ́ ŋmaa ɗoŋ fio-zɛ kpɔk kpɔk tɛ pɛ lɛŋ. Dùk wi-biro kpɔk kpɔk a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o bíí booro-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-naar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O be  Israɛl  nɛ̀ dee tom ha̧ wannu nɛ́ o gasawi nutua, o wi-duk-zu o wi-biro booro in gɔmŋmaa, ká bá nɛ̀ o gasawi zu o wi-biro; tom kɔ-wa so nɛ́ zɔka dùk o wi-biro nɛ̀ kpai so nɛ́ ŋmaa ɗoŋ fio-zɛ kpɔk kpɔk tɛ pɛ lɛŋ. Dùk wi-biro kpɔk kpɔk a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o bíí booro-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-naar.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi kweci nyi sləa ka Israyɛl nyi kemene nda slene ke meghe: ka meghe nyi kwa yita, meghe nyi te ghəa ka sewajɛ slibə le nyi te ghəa ka sewajɛ gwəmsə ba'a mbelia jama nyi te ghəa mbeli. Tseɓa ta ka sewajɛ nyi kembeɗe slene ketere ketere mbe va ŋa nci slene, zhili 24.000 mbe yayata wəvəsə.
Tupurri: Mokay diñ ëu wañre ma ti feele maga wo diñ jar ma pel jar ndar ndarn wo de ma pel jar kiskisn wo, jar kluuri sode maga hay wo kay wañ ti waçaçre carge äil jar go ta'ta' mono. AÀ hay wo go de ngaäge ta'ta' de wur age äaara wo de wur rawge äaara, nen few de few, go nen few ma nen kiñgin wo kelkel äuy, caage äil ma honla äuy jar ni ndar do äog ti naa.

Francais: A la tête de la première division, pour le premier mois, était Jesboam, fils de Zabdiel, et il y avait dans sa division vingt-quatre mille hommes.
Anglais: Over the first course for the first month was Jashobeam the son of Zabdiel: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kuɗ vok-ma-duura ma jewna, kay til ma jewna, Yakobeyam goora vi Zabdiyel; vok-ma-duura valamu ka hiɗi sumun birim dok-ma' yam fiɗi.
Bulu: Nsamba ôsu ya ngon ôsu: Yakôbeam e mone Zabdiél; nsamba wé ô nga bili bôte toyini mewôm mebaé a ényin.
Guiziga: Mingac mudumbuŋ, ar kiya mudumbuŋ naŋ, i Yasobam mangal ngi Zaɓdiyel, a wi soje durmuk kukur cuw nga mufaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yasobo'am ɓii Zabdiyel woni hooreejo yeɓre arannde ngam lewru aranndu. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).
Fulfulde_DC: Yasobo'am ɓii Zabdiyel woni hooreejo yeɓre arannde ngam lewru aranndu. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: __Error__
Tupurri: Pel caage äil ma tañgun ga joñ joñre nen few ma tañgun hay diñ Yasobeam je ni Sabdiyel no, jar ti caage äil mani äen ndar do äog ti naa.

Francais: Il était d'entre les fils de Pharès, et il commandait tous les chefs des troupes du premier mois.
Anglais: Of the children of Perez was the chief of all the captains of the host for the first month.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Namu mi kep jar gurona vi Peres. Sa ŋulona vi sojena vi vok-ma-duura vi til ma jewna kaf nam ka tuni voksiya.
Bulu: A mbe wua ya bone be Pérét. A mbe nlô bivete bise ya minsamba mewosane e ngon ôsu.
Guiziga: Yasobam i dideˀ ngi Peres, miwa madiɗa ngi sojehey gar ar kiya mudumbŋ i naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O iwi haa danygol Peres, o hooreejo mawɓe honooɓe ngam lewru aranndu fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: O iwi haa danygol Peres, o hooreejo mawɓe honooɓe ngam lewru aranndu fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: __Error__
Tupurri: AÀ hay diñ jobo yoo jar ni Peres wo, se hay pel jar kluuri sode ma ti caage äil maga joñ wo joñre nen few ma tañgun mono.

Francais: - A la tête de la division du deuxième mois était Dudia, l'Ahohite; Macelloth, le prince, était un chef de sa division; et il y avait dans sa division vingt-quatre mille hommes.
Anglais: And over the course of the second month was Dodai an Ahohite, and of his course was Mikloth also the ruler: in his course likewise were twenty and four thousand.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kuɗ vok-ma-duura vi til ma ma'na vi Doday, ma Ahohitna; sa ma tuni vok vok-ma-duura namna mi Miklot; hay vok-ma-duura valamu sumun ka birim dok-ma' yam fiɗi.
Bulu: Nsamba e ngone baa: Dôdayi, mon Ahôhite; Miklôt nye a mbe njôô ya nsamba te; nsamba wé ô nga bili bôte toyini mewôm mebaé a ényin.
Guiziga: Mingac mucuw naŋ, ar kiya mucuw naŋ i Doday ngi ruwuy Ahoˀa, taŋ cuwa ati Miklot miwi sojehey. A wam soje durmuk kukur cuw nga mufaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Dooday Ahohiijo woni hooreejo yeɓre ngam lewru ɗiɗaɓru. Mikilot woni ɗowoowo nder yeɓre Dooday. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).
Fulfulde_DC: Dooday Ahohiijo woni hooreejo yeɓre ngam lewru ɗiɗaɓru. Mikilot woni ɗowoowo nder yeɓre Dooday. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).

Tupurri: Pel caage äil ma de äogn ga joñ joñre nen few ma de äogn hay diñ Doday je Ahowa no, go äe hay diñ Miklode. Jar hay ti caage äil mani äen ndar do äog ti naa.

Francais: - Le chef de la troisième division, pour le troisième mois, était Banaïas, fils du prêtre Joïada, chef; et il y avait dans sa division vingt-quatre mille hommes.
Anglais: The third captain of the host for the third month was Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, a chief priest: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma ŋolla vi vok-ma-duura ma mul ɦidina, kay til ma ɦidina mi Benaya, goora vi mul-ma-ɗifinna Yehoyada, ma ŋolla; sojen ka birim dok-ma' yam fiɗi hay vok-ma-duura valamu.
Bulu: Njôô nsamba mewosane lale asu ngone lale a mbe Benayahu, e mone ntuni Yehôyada, évet; nsamba wé ô nga bili bôte toyini mewôm mebaé a ényin.
Guiziga: Mingac mimakir naŋ, ar kiya mimakir naŋ: I Benaya, mangalngi masay Yoyada, madiɗa. A wi soje durmuk kukur cuw nga mufaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Benaya ɓii Yoyada limanjo, kaŋko woni mawɗo honooɓe dow yeɓre tataɓre ngam lewru tataɓru. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).
Fulfulde_DC: Benaya ɓii Yoyada limanjo, kaŋko woni mawɗo honooɓe dow yeɓre tataɓre ngam lewru tataɓru. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).

KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: __Error__
Tupurri: Je waçaç ree caage äil ma de swa'n maga joñ joñre nen few ma de swa'n hay diñ Benayahu je ni je sië jag Yehoyada no, se hay diñ wañ no. Jar hay ti caage äil mani äen ndar do äog ti naa.

Francais: Ce Banaïas était le héros des Trente, à la tête des Trente; Amizabad, son fils, était un chef de sa division.
Anglais: This is that Benaiah, who was mighty among the thirty, and above the thirty: and in his course was Ammizabad his son.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Benaya namna mi sa ma dono'o jar sa dok-ɦidina; nam mi ma ŋolla visiya, goora valamu Ammizadab ka hay vok-ma-duura valamu.
Bulu: Benayahu a mbe mbene ya bôte mewôm melal été a too nlô ya bôte mewôm melal bete; mone wé Amizadab a mbe e nsamba wé été.
Guiziga: Benaya i mbur gambara a wuzla mizli mizli ngir makire, yo i buy taŋ ma, miwa soje durmuk kukur cuw nga mufaɗa i mangal naŋ Amizabat.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Benaya oo woni gooto nder suusɓe cappanɗe tato, o hooreejo suusɓe cappanɗe tato man. Ɓiyiiko Ammizabat boo ɗon nder mooɓre man.
Fulfulde_DC: Benaya oo woni gooto nder suusɓe cappanɗe tato, o hooreejo suusɓe cappanɗe tato man. Ɓiyiiko Ammizabat boo ɗon nder mooɓre man.

Kapsiki_DC: __Error__
Tupurri: Benayahu sen hay diñ je twar ma yoo jar ma do swa'n wo, se hay diñ je mati jar se ma do swa'n wo. Je ni äe Amisadab hay yoo caage äil ma wer äe no.

Francais: - Le quatrième, pour le quatrième mois, était Asaël, frère de Joab, et, après lui, Zabadias, son fils; et il y avait dans sa division vingt-quatre mille hommes.
Anglais: The fourth captain for the fourth month was Asahel the brother of Joab, and Zebadiah his son after him: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma mul fiɗina kay til ma fiɗina mi Asayel ɓasum Yowabna; bugolom namu mi Zebadiya goora valamu, hay vok-ma-duura valamu sojen ka birim dok-ma' yam fiɗi.
Bulu: Nsamba nyini asu ngone nyini: Asaél, monyañe Yôab, mone wé Zebadia a zaʼa nye mvus; nsamba wé ô nga bili bôte toyini mewôm mebaé a ényin.
Guiziga: Mingac mumufaɗ naŋ, ar kiya mumufaɗ naŋ, i Asayel sukum ngi Zoˀap, a dirba naŋ, i mangal naŋ Zebadiya. A wi soje durmuk kukur cuw nga mufaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Asa'el deerɗiraawo Yo'ab woni nayaɓo ngam lewru nayaɓru. Ɓaawo maako ɓiyiiko Zebadiya laati hooreejo. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).
Fulfulde_DC: Asa'el deerɗiraawo Yo'ab woni nayaɓo ngam lewru nayaɓru. Ɓaawo maako ɓiyiiko Zebadiya laati hooreejo. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).

Kapsiki_DC: __Error__
Tupurri: Pel ma de naan ma nen few ma de naan hay diñ Asayel hen Jowab no, hay kol blam äe diñ weel äe Sebadiya. Jar hay ti caage äil mani äen ndar do äog ti naa.

Francais: - Le cinquième, pour le cinquième mois, était le chef Samaoth, l'Izrahite; et il y avait dans sa division vingt-quatre mille hommes.
Anglais: The fifth captain for the fifth month was Shamhuth the Izrahite: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma mul vaslna, kay til ma vaslna mi ma ŋolla vi sojena Samehut ma hay Yisran; hay vok-ma-duura valamu sojen ka birim dok-ma' yam fiɗi.
Bulu: Nsamba tane asu ngone tane: Kamhut ya Yizra nye a mbe njôô; nsamba wé ô nga bili bôte toyini mewôm mebaé a ényin.
Guiziga: Mingac muzlum naŋ, ar kiya muzlum naŋ, i Samut muy Izra. A wi soje durmuk kukur cuw nga mufaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hooreejo njowaɓo ngam lewru jowaɓru, Samahut Yisrahiijo. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).
Fulfulde_DC: Hooreejo njowaɓo ngam lewru jowaɓru, Samahut Yisrahiijo. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).

Francais: - Le sixième, pour le sixième mois, était Hira, fils d'Accès, de Thécua; et il y avait dans sa division vingt-quatre mille hommes.
Anglais: The sixth captain for the sixth month was Ira the son of Ikkesh the Tekoite: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma mul karkiyana kay til ma karkiyana vi Ira, goora vi Ikes, ma Tekowana; hay vok-ma-duura valamu sojen ka birim dok-ma' yam fiɗi,
Bulu: Nsamba samane asu ngone samane: Ira, e mone Ikés, môte ya Tékôa nye a mbe njôô; nsamba wé ô nga bili bôte toyini mewôm mebaé a ényin.
Guiziga: Mingac mimerkeɗ naŋ, ar kiya mimerkeɗ naŋ, i Ira mangal ngi Ikok, mbur Tekoˀa. A wi soje durmuk kukur cuw nga mufaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Iira ɓii Ikkes mo Teko'a woni njoweegoojo ngam lewru joweegooru. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).
Fulfulde_DC: Iira ɓii Ikkes mo Teko'a woni njoweegoojo ngam lewru joweegooru. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).

Tupurri: Pel ma de hiira'n ma joñre nen few ma de hiira'n hay diñ Ira je ni Ikes je Tekowa no. Jar hay ti caage äil mani äen ndar do äog ti naa.

Francais: - Le septième, pour le septième mois, était Hellès, le Phallonite, des fils d'Ephraïm; et il y avait dans sa division vingt-quatre mille hommes.
Anglais: The seventh captain for the seventh month was Helez the Pelonite, of the children of Ephraim: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ma mul siɗiyana, kay til ma siɗiyana, Heles ma Pelonna jar gurona vi Efrayim; sojen ka birim dok-ma' yam fiɗi hay vok-ma-duura valamu.
Bulu: Nsamba zamgbwale asu ngone zamgbwale: Hélét mone Pelônite ya bone bʼEfrayim nye a mbe njôô; nsamba wé ô nga bili bôte toyini mewôm mebaé a ényin.
Guiziga: Mingac mitarna naŋ, ar kiya mitarnaˀ naŋ, i Heles mbur Paloŋ, ngir sukwi Efrayim. A wi soje durmuk kukur cuw nga mufaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Heeles mo Pelon, goɗɗo lenyol Efrayim woni njoweeɗiɗaɓo ngam lewru joweeɗiɗaɓru. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).
Fulfulde_DC: Heeles mo Pelon, goɗɗo lenyol Efrayim woni njoweeɗiɗaɓo ngam lewru joweeɗiɗaɓru. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).

Francais: - Le huitième, pour le huitième mois, était Sobochaï, le Husathite, de la famille des Zarahites; et il y avait dans sa division vingt-quatre mille hommes.
Anglais: The eighth captain for the eighth month was Sibbecai the Hushathite, of the Zarhites: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma mul glafandina, kay til ma glafandina, Sibbekay ma Husana, hay jafna vi sa Zerahna; sojen ka birim dok-ma' yam fiɗi hay vok-ma-duura valamu.
Bulu: Nsamba muame asu ngone muame: Sibkayi, mone Hukatite ya nda bôte Zéra nye a mbe njôô; nsamba wé ô nga bili bôte toyini mewôm mebaé a ényin.
Guiziga: Mingac midanfaɗ naŋ, ar kiya midangafaɗ naŋ, i Sibekay, mbur Husa, ngir sukwi Zera. A wi soje durmuk kukur cuw nga mufaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sibbekay Zaraajo mo Husa woni njoweetataɓo ngam lewru joweetataɓru. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).
Fulfulde_DC: Sibbekay Zaraajo mo Husa woni njoweetataɓo ngam lewru joweetataɓru. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).

Francais: - Le neuvième, pour le neuvième mois, était Abiézer, d'Anathoth, des fils de Benjamin, et il y avait dans sa division vingt-quatre mille hommes.
Anglais: The ninth captain for the ninth month was Abi–ezer the Anathothite, of the Benjamites: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma mul zleeŋena, hay til ma zleeŋena, Abiyezer ma Ananotna, hay jafna vi Benyamin; sojen ka birim dok-ma' yam fiɗi hay vok-ma-duura valamu.
Bulu: Nsamba ébulu asu ngon ébulu: Abiézer ya mvôʼô Bényamin e Anatot nye a mbe njôô; nsamba wé ô nga bili bôte toyini mewôm mebaé a ényin.
Guiziga: Mingac mungoltir naŋ, ar kiya mungoltir naŋ, i Abiyezer mbur Anatot, ngir sukwi ngi Benjameŋ. A wi soje durmuk kukur cuw nga mufaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Abi'ezer Benyaminiijo mo Anatot woni njoweenayaɓo ngam lewru joweenayaɓru. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).
Fulfulde_DC: Abi'ezer Benyaminiijo mo Anatot woni njoweenayaɓo ngam lewru joweenayaɓru. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).

Francais: - Le dixième, pour le dixième mois, était Maraï, de Nétopha, de la famille des Zaharites; et il y avait dans sa division vingt-quatre mille hommes.
Anglais: The tenth captain for the tenth month was Maharai the Netophathite, of the Zarhites: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma doogona kay til ma doogona, Maharay ma Netofana, hay jafna vi Zerah; sojen ka birim dok-ma' yam fiɗi hay vok-ma-duura valamu.
Bulu: Nsamba awômô asu ngon awômô: Maharayi ya Nétôfa, e nda bôte Zéra nye a mbe évet; nsamba wé ô nga bili bôte toyini mewôm mebaé a ényin.
Guiziga: Mingac mukuruˀ naŋ, ar kiya mukuruˀ naŋ, i Maray, mbur Netofa, ngir sukwi Zera. A wi soje durmuk kukur cuw nga mufaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Maharay Zaraajo mo Netofa woni sappoojo ngam lewru sappooru. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).
Fulfulde_DC: Maharay Zaraajo mo Netofa woni sappoojo ngam lewru sappooru. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).

Francais: - Le onzième, pour le onzième mois, était Banaïas, de Pharathon des fils d'Ephraïm; et il y avait dans sa division vingt-quatre mille hommes.
Anglais: The eleventh captain for the eleventh month was Benaiah the Pirathonite, of the children of Ephraim: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma doogo yam kepna, kay til ma doogo yam kepna, Benaya ma Piratonna, jar gurona vi Efrayim; sojen ka birim dok-ma' yam fiɗi hay vok-ma-duura valamu.
Bulu: Nsamba awôm a wua asu ngon awômô a jia: Benaya ya Piraton, e bone bʼEfrayim nye a mbe njôô; bôt be mbe nsamba wé toyini mewôm mebaé a ényin.
Guiziga: Mingac mukuruˀ ngaŋ kaˀ naŋ, ar kiya mukuruˀ ngaŋ kaˀ naŋ, i Benaya, mbur Piratoŋ, ngir sukwi Efrayim. A wi soje durmuk kukur cuw nga mufaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Benaya Efrayimiijo mo Piraton woni sappo e go'oojo ngam lewru sappo e go'ooru. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).
Fulfulde_DC: Benaya Efrayimiijo mo Piraton woni sappo e go'oojo ngam lewru sappo e go'ooru. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).

Francais: - Le douzième, pour le douzième mois, était Holdaï, de Nétopha, de la famille d'Othoniel; et il y avait dans sa division vingt-quatre mille hommes.
Anglais: The twelfth captain for the twelfth month was Heldai the Netophathite, of Othniel: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma doogo yam ma'na, kay til ma doogo yam ma'na, Helday ma Netofana, hay jafna vi Otniyel. Sojen ka birim dok-ma' yam fiɗi hay vok-ma-duura valamu.
Bulu: Nsamba awôm a baa asu ngon awôm a baa: Heldayi ya Netôfa e nda bôte Otniél nye a mbe njôô; nsamba wé ô nga bili bôte toyini mewôm mebaé a ényin.
Guiziga: Mingac mukuruˀ nga cuw naŋ, ar kiya mukuruˀ nga cuw naŋ, i Helday mbur Netofa, ngir sukwi Otniyel. A wi soje durmuk kukur cuw nga mufaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Helday mo Netofa, mo danygol Otniyel, woni sappo e ɗiɗaɓo ngam lewru sappo e ɗiɗaɓru. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).
Fulfulde_DC: Helday mo Netofa, mo danygol Otniyel, woni sappo e ɗiɗaɓo ngam lewru sappo e ɗiɗaɓru. Yeɓre maako woodi worɓe ujine noogas e nayo (24.000).

Tupurri: Pel ma de hwal ti äog ma joñre nen few ma de hwal ti äogn hay diñ Helday ma Netofa ti feele mani Otniyel no. Jar hay ti caage äil mani äen ndar do äog ti naa.

Francais: Et il y avait à la tête des tribus d'Israël: des Rubénites: Eliézer, fils de Zéchri; des Siméonites: Saphatias, fils de Maacha;
Anglais: Furthermore over the tribes of Israel: the ruler of the Reubenites was Eliezer the son of Zichri: of the Simeonites, Shephatiah the son of Maachah:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa ka tuni vok jafna vi Israyel: Kuɗ jafna vi Ruben: Sa ma tuni voksina mi Eliyezer goora vi Zikri; kuɗ jafna vi Simeyon: Sefatiya goora vi Maaka;
Bulu: Bivete meyoñ ya Israél mbie bi: mfaʼa mvôʼô Ruben évet é mbe Eliézer e mone Zikri; mvôʼô Siméoñ évet é mbe: Sefatiahu e mone Maaka;
Guiziga: Ar sukwi Israyele, buyoy mijaka ruwuyo t'ani: Angi sukwi Ruben: I Eliyezer, mangal ngi Zikri. Angi sukwi ngi Simeyoŋ: I Sefatiya, mangal ngi Maˀaka.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa ardiiɓe le'i Isra'iila: Eli'ezer ɓii Zikiri woni ardiiɗo yimɓe Ruben. Sefatiya ɓii Ma'aka ardi yimɓe Simon.
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa ardiiɓe le'i Isra'iila: Eli'ezer ɓii Zikiri woni ardiiɗo yimɓe Ruben. Sefatiya ɓii Ma'aka ardi yimɓe Simon.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O gasawi nɛ duka zu o dùk be  Israɛl  nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Zu o bezaŋ Rubɛn nɛ́ Eliɛzɛr bem ko Zikri; ko o bezaŋ Simɛɔŋ nɛ́ Sɛfatia bem ko Maka;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O gasawi nɛ duka zu o dùk be  Israɛl  nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Zu o bezaŋ Rubɛn nɛ́ Eliɛzɛr bem ko Zikri; ko o bezaŋ Simɛɔŋ nɛ́ Sɛfatia bem ko Maka;
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ka meghe nyi kese nyi te ghəa mbeli mbe hwelefe nyi mbe Israyɛl: Sebe ta Rəbɛn: Ɛliyɛzɛr wəzege ta Zikri. Sebe ta Simɛyon: Shefatiya wəzege ta Ma'aka.
Tupurri: Hay pel äï¡ï¡ni ma Israyeln wo ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Ruben diñ Eliyeser je ni Sikri je ma seege de kaçaçra no, mani Simeyoñ diñ Sefatiyahu je ni Maaka no,

Francais: des Lévites: Hasabias, fils de Camuel; de la famille d'Aaron: Sadoc;
Anglais: Of the Levites, Hashabiah the son of Kemuel: of the Aaronites, Zadok:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kuɗ jafna vi Levi: Hasabiya goora vi Kemuwel; kuɗ jafna vi Aaron: Sadok;
Bulu: Mvôʼô Lévi évet é mbe Hakabia e mone Kemuél; mvôʼô Aron évet é mbe Sadok;
Guiziga: Angi sukwi ngi Levi: I Hasabiya mangal ngi Kemuyel, angi sukwi ngi Aroŋ i Sadok.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hasabiya ɓii Kemuwel ardi yimɓe Lewi. Cadok ardi yimɓe Haruna.
Fulfulde_DC: Hasabiya ɓii Kemuwel ardi yimɓe Lewi. Cadok ardi yimɓe Haruna.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko o bezaŋ Levii nɛ́ Hasabia bem ko Kemuɛl; ko o bezaŋ Arɔŋ nɛ́ Sadɔk;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko o bezaŋ Levii nɛ́ Hasabia bem ko Kemuɛl; ko o bezaŋ Arɔŋ nɛ́ Sadɔk;
Kapsiki_DC: Sebe ta Lɛvi: Hashabiya wəzege ta Keməwɛl. Hwelefe ta Aron: Sadok.
Tupurri: maLefidn diñ Hasabiya je ni Kemuwel no, ti moobe mani AÈron diñ Sadog,

Francais: de Juda: Eliu, frère de David; d'Issachar, Amri, fils de Michaël;
Anglais: Of Judah, Elihu, one of the brethren of David: of Issachar, Omri the son of Michael:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kuɗ jafna vi Yuda: Elihu, ɓosiyom Davidna; kuɗ jafna vi Isakar: Omri, goora vi Mikayel;
Bulu: Mvôʼô Yuda évet é mbe Elihu ya bone be David; mvôʼô Isakar évet é mbe Omri e mone Mikaél;
Guiziga: Angi sukwi ngi Zuda: I mbur pal a wuzla sukum ngi Davitey, i Elihu. Angi sukwi ngi Isakar: I Omri mangal ngi Mikayel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Elihu deerɗiraawo Daawuda ardi yimɓe Yahuuda. Omiri ɓii Mika'iilu ardi yimɓe Issakar.
Fulfulde_DC: Elihu deerɗiraawo Daawuda ardi yimɓe Yahuuda. Omiri ɓii Mika'iilu ardi yimɓe Issakar.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko o bezaŋ Juda nɛ́ Elihu ŋma nya David; ko o bezaŋ Isakar nɛ́ Ɔmri, bem ko Mikaɛl;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko o bezaŋ Juda nɛ́ Elihu ŋma nya David; ko o bezaŋ Isakar nɛ́ Ɔmri, bem ko Mikaɛl;
Kapsiki_DC: Yita ta Zhəwda: Ɛlihəw, kwete ŋkɛ hwa ka kesaka yitenyɛa David.
Tupurri: pel äï¡ï¡ni mani Judan diñ Elihu yoo heçeçre Dafidn wo, mani Isakarn diñ Omri je ni Mikayel no,

Francais: de Zabulon: Jesmaïas, fils d'Abdias; de Nephtali: Jérimoth, fils d'Ozriel;
Anglais: Of Zebulun, Ishmaiah the son of Obadiah: of Naphtali, Jerimoth the son of Azriel:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kuɗ jafna vi Zabulon: Yismaya goora vi Abdiyas; kuɗ jafna vi Neftali: Yerimot goora vi Azriyel;
Bulu: Mvôʼô Zabuloñ évet é mbe Yismaéyahu e mone Abdias; mvôʼô Néftali évet é mbe Yérimôt e mone Azriél;
Guiziga: Angi sukwi ngi Zabuloŋ: I Isemaya mangal ngi Obadiya. Angi sukwi ngi Neftali: I Yerimot mangal ngi Aziriyel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yisma'ya ɓii Obadiya ardi yimɓe Zabulon. Yerimot ɓii Asriyel ardi yimɓe Neftali.
Fulfulde_DC: Yisma'ya ɓii Obadiya ardi yimɓe Zabulon. Yerimot ɓii Asriyel ardi yimɓe Neftali.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko o bezaŋ Zabulɔŋ nɛ́ Yismaya bem ko Obadia; ko o bezaŋ Nɛftalii nɛ́ Yɛrimɔt bem ko Azriɛl;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko o bezaŋ Zabulɔŋ nɛ́ Yismaya bem ko Obadia; ko o bezaŋ Nɛftalii nɛ́ Yɛrimɔt bem ko Azriɛl;
Kapsiki_DC: Yita ta Zabəlon: Ishemaya wəzege ta Obadiya. Yita ta Nɛftali: Yerimot wəzege ta Azriyɛl.
Tupurri: mani Sabuloñ diñ Yismaeyahu je ni Abdiyas no, mani Neftalin diñ Yerimod je ni Asriyel no,

Francais: des fils d'Ephraïm: Osée, fils d'Ozaziu; de la demi-tribu de Manassé: Joël, fils de Phadaïas;
Anglais: Of the children of Ephraim, Hoshea the son of Azaziah: of the half tribe of Manasseh, Joel the son of Pedaiah:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kuɗ jafna vi gurona vi Efrayim: Hoseya, goora vi Azaziya; kuɗ gal-jafna vi Manase, Jowel goora vi Pedaya;
Bulu: Asu bone bʼEfrayim évet é mbe Hôsé e mone Azaziahu,
Guiziga: Angi sukwi ngi Efrayim: I Oze mangal ngi Azaziya. Angi reta ngi sukwi ngi Manase, misi tisi pas ngi pastaˀa: I Zowel mangal ngi Pedaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hose'a ɓii Azaziya ardi yimɓe Efrayim. Yo'el ɓii Pedaya ardi reeta lenyol Manassa.
Fulfulde_DC: Hose'a ɓii Azaziya ardi yimɓe Efrayim. Yo'el ɓii Pedaya ardi reeta lenyol Manassa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko o bezaŋ Efraim nɛ́ Osee bem ko Azazia; koo reeta zuduk ko o bezaŋ Manase nɛ́ Jɔɛl bem ko Pɛdaya;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko o bezaŋ Efraim nɛ́ Osee bem ko Azazia; koo reeta zuduk ko o bezaŋ Manase nɛ́ Jɔɛl bem ko Pɛdaya;
Kapsiki_DC: Yita ta Ɛfrayim: Ozɛ wəzege ta Azaziya. Bela ta hwelefe ta Manasɛ nyi laka ŋkwa kepəkwə ta veci: Zhowɛl wəzege ta Pedaya.
Tupurri: mani Efrayim diñ Hose je ni Asasiyahu no, mani nus äï¡ï¡ni mani Manasen diñ Jowel je ni Pedayahu no,

Francais: de la demi-tribu de Manassé, en Galaad: Jaddo, fils de Zacharias; de Benjamin: Jasiel, fils d'Abner;
Anglais: Of the half tribe of Manasseh in Gilead, Iddo the son of Zechariah: of Benjamin, Jaasiel the son of Abner:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kuɗ gal-jafna vi Manase hiɗi Galaad: Yiddo goora vi Zakariya; kuɗ jafna vi Benyamin, Yaasiyel goora vi Abner;
Bulu: asu éfas ayoñe Manasé ya Galad évet é mbe Yidô e mone Zakari; mvôʼô Bényamin évet é mbe Yaasiél e mone Abnér;
Guiziga: Angi reta ngi sukwi ngi Manase, mipam a Galaˀata: I Ido mangal ngi Zakari. Angi sukwi ngi Benjameŋ: I Yasiyel mangal ngi Abner.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Iddo ɓii Zekariya ardi reeta lenyol Manassa nder Gile'at. Ya'asiyel ɓii Abineer ardi yimɓe Benyamin.
Fulfulde_DC: Iddo ɓii Zekariya ardi reeta lenyol Manassa nder Gile'at. Ya'asiyel ɓii Abineer ardi yimɓe Benyamin.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko ɓii reeta zuduk o bezaŋ Manase nɛ̀ ya Galad nɛ́ Ido bem ko Zakarii; ko o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nɛ́ Yasiɛl bem ko Abnɛr;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko ɓii reeta zuduk o bezaŋ Manase nɛ̀ ya Galad nɛ́ Ido bem ko Zakarii; ko o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nɛ́ Yasiɛl bem ko Abnɛr;
Kapsiki_DC: Bela ta sebe ta Manasɛ nyi laka ŋkwa kesame ta veci, nyi mbe Gala'ad: Ido wəzege ta Zakari. Yita ta Bɛnjamɛn: Yasiyɛl wəzege ta Abnɛr.
Tupurri: mani nus äï¡ï¡ni mani Manase ma ti sir Galaadn diñ Yido, je ni Sakari no, mani Benjamen diñ Yaasiyel je ni Abner no,

Francais: de Dan: Ezrihel, fils de Jéroham. Ce sont les princes des tribus d'Israël.
Anglais: Of Dan, Azareel the son of Jeroham. These were the princes of the tribes of Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kuɗ jafna vi Dan: Azareel goora vi Yeroham. Nisi kayni si soje sa ŋulona vi jafna vi Israyel.
Bulu: mvôʼô Dan: évet é mbe Azareél e mone Yérôham. Bivete meyoñe ya Israél mbie le.
Guiziga: Angi sukwi ngi Daŋ: I Azarel mangal ngi Yeroˀam. Buyoy ar sukwi Israyel i taŋ so.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Azareyel ɓii Yeroham ardi yimɓe Dan. Kamɓe ngoni mawɓe le'i Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Azareyel ɓii Yeroham ardi yimɓe Dan. Kamɓe ngoni mawɓe le'i Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ ko o bezaŋ Dan nɛ́ Azarɛl bem ko Yeroam. O gasawi nɛ̀ yaa so zu o dùk be  Israɛl  nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ ko o bezaŋ Dan nɛ́ Azarɛl bem ko Yeroam. O gasawi nɛ̀ yaa so zu o dùk be  Israɛl  nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Yita ta Dan: Azarɛl wəzege ta Yerowam. Tsagha se ka meghe ke sebe ke sebe mbe Israyɛl.
Tupurri: mani Dañ diñ Asareel je ni Yeroham no. Mo na diñ jar waçaç ree äï¡ï¡ni ma Israyeln wo.

Francais: David ne fit point le dénombrement de ceux qui étaient âgés de vingt ans et au-dessous, car Yahweh avait dit qu'il multiplierait Israël comme les étoiles du ciel.
Anglais: But David took not the number of them from twenty years old and under: because the  Lord  had said he would increase Israel like to the stars of the heavens.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa busata visi coy dok-ma' hiɗi sa busata visi bay co dok-ma' tuwana David may li ŋaɓta visi goyɗi, kay Ma-Vatɗin di ala sum sa Israyella nam min lisi ŋol dak-dak ki mislek ma dukalawn nala.
Bulu: David a nji ke nyoñ tañe bôt be mbe ataté mimbu mewôm mebaé a sise si, amu Nti a nga jô na a ye bo Israél abui ane ateté ya yôp.
Guiziga: Mizli misi vi kukur cuwoy ati mindilaka ta gar na, Davit a toho slimiɗ taŋ ta. Asi Bumbulvuŋ a ɓi zleˀe na, a sa ska Israyeley haɗi, kaɓa wurzlaŋhay a muŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Daawuda limaay derke'en ɓe duuɓi muuɗum'en cikaay noogas tawon, ngam Jawmiraawo wi'no o ɗuɗɗinan Isra'iila'en bana koode asama .
Fulfulde_DC: Daawuda limaay derke'en ɓe duuɓi muuɗum'en cikaay noogas tawon, ngam Jawmiraawo wi'no o ɗuɗɗinan Isra'iila'en bana koode asama .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: David tɔr so o wi nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo, in o wan nɛ̀ tɛ kpa pɛ hegɔ na, na, wen GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e, wi tɛ de ha̧ o be  Israɛl  mɛ dɔk hee o sɔra yiwese ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: David tɔr so o wi nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo, in o wan nɛ̀ tɛ kpa pɛ hegɔ na, na, wen GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e, wi tɛ de ha̧ o be  Israɛl  mɛ dɔk hee o sɔra yiwese ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Kese David kaɓela ka megelɛgeshi nyi nza va ta nci gare bakemsə le nyi kekekavema we, kwa nza nde nahe Mahwətə kegezete katembake ka Israyɛl ŋkɛ kwele kwele kala saseregwa nyi pelɛ ghweme.
Tupurri: Dafid hay kee jar maga kiñgi äaara caa le ti do äog ka' fer gesiñ mo gaa, werga Manwur hay waçaç go ga se tes Israyel wo yañ debañ do ger ma ciñ wo nono.

Francais: Joab, fils de Sarvia, avait commencé le dénombrement, mais il ne l'acheva pas, la colère de Yahweh étant venue à cause de cela sur Israël, et le résultat n'en fut pas porté sur les rôles des chroniques du roi David.
Anglais: Joab the son of Zeruiah began to number, but he finished not, because there fell wrath for it against Israel; neither was the number put in the account of the chronicles of king David.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yowab goora vi Seruya, tun caw li ŋaɓta vi sumuna, may nam may vat ŋaɓta goyɗi, kayni ɓulak dik Ma-Vatɗina kat sa Israyella. Sum sa nam ŋaɓsi goyna nisi may ɗoy gaa hay ɗerwelda vi labar ma Liyna vi mulla Davidɗi.
Bulu: Yôab e mone Séruya, a nga beta taté nlañane bôt, ve a nji ke sondô wô, amu jame te e nga dutu Nti na a yaa Israél. Biyalan yʼété bi nji ke tiliban e metañe ya minkañete mi njô bôte David.
Guiziga: Zoˀap mangal ngi Seruya, a zla sluf taŋ le zleˀe, amma a kiɗa mi naŋ ta, Buymisemuŋ a ji mevel ar Israyele vurˀe. Israyeley jom gara, taŋ kini na, a bawa ar ɗerewol ngi Davite ta ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yo'ab ɓii Seruyatu fuɗɗuno limugo, ammaa o timminaay. Tikkere Jawmiraawo ukki dow Isra'iila ngam haala man. Limgal binndol maajum nastaay nder Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe nde Laamiiɗo Daawuda .
Fulfulde_DC: Yo'ab ɓii Seruyatu fuɗɗuno limugo, ammaa o timminaay. Tikkere Jawmiraawo ukki dow Isra'iila ngam haala man. Limgal binndol maajum nastaay nder Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe nde Laamiiɗo Daawuda .
