KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jɔab bem ko Sɛruya ku̧u̧ so naŋ tɔra wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔr kaɗi na, wen gasa nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ tika zu  Israɛl  tɛ mɔ‘i n'aa dea'i. Hegɔ nin-wa bo zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko wannu David na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jɔab bem ko Sɛruya ku̧u̧ so naŋ tɔra wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔr kaɗi na, wen gasa nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ tika zu  Israɛl  tɛ mɔ‘i n'aa dea'i. Hegɔ nin-wa bo zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko wannu David na.
Kapsiki_DC: Zhowab nya nza sləa meghekɛ kaSerəwya nde ghate kaɓela ŋkwa, ama kekiɗimte ŋkɛ we, kwa nza ŋkɛ nahe Shala kehwepete wənə va ka Israyɛl se te ghena shɛ. Vatse nda ɗema sləa mbeli pɛtɛ mbe palepa nya heka mbeli kaWəshi nyi menete meghe David.
Tupurri: Jowab hay tï¡ï¡ kee jar no, day se äo' jag go gaa werga jiili Manwur hay caa go ne Israyel ti. Ngaäge keege jar sen bay de yerge äil waçaçre ma nen naw mani wañ Dafid wo wa.

Francais: Asmoth, fils d'Adiel, était préposé sur les trésors du roi; Jonathan, fils d'Ozias, sur les trésors dans les champs, dans les villes, dans les villages et dans les tours;
Anglais: And over the king's treasures was Azmaveth the son of Adiel: and over the storehouses in the fields, in the cities, and in the villages, and in the castles, was Jonathan the son of Uzziah:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa ma ŋom slena vi mulla mi Azmavet goora vi Adiyel; sa ma ŋom sle ma hay sinena, hay hoyok-ziy ma ŋulona, hay hoyok-ziy ma gurayna hiɗi simdira: Yonatan goora vi Oziyas;
Bulu: Azmavét, e mone Adiél, a mbe mbaʼale akume njô bôt. Yônatan e mon Ozias a mbe mbaʼale biôm bi mbe e nnaan e si ya Israél ataté bitison a kui minlam a mewôm bebaʼale be né.
Guiziga: Azimavet mangal ngi Adiyel, i buyɓi miji kaw ngi buy. Yonataŋ mangal ngi Oziyas, i buyɓi ngi gwatay, buy miwi taŋ vu ar prokoy, ar walahay madiɗahay, ar walahay memeɗehey waɗ ar li misi mizli mijigina lihey ara.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Azmawet ɓii Adiyel woni kaliifaajo dow ndesaaje laamiiɗo. Yonatan ɓii Uzziya woni kaliifaajo dow ndesaaje nder lesdi, waato nder berniiji e gure e cuuɗi towɗi cemmbiɗɗi.
Fulfulde_DC: Azmawet ɓii Adiyel woni kaliifaajo dow ndesaaje laamiiɗo. Yonatan ɓii Uzziya woni kaliifaajo dow ndesaaje nder lesdi, waato nder berniiji e gure e cuuɗi towɗi cemmbiɗɗi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wi nɛ̀ duka so zu mbɔi ko wannu nɛ́ Azmavɛt, bem ko Adiɛl; ɓɛɛ ko Yɔnataŋ bem ko Uzia, a̧ duka so kɔ̧-a̧ zu o nyɔnɔ nɛ̀ wa ndɛma e ŋgɔn kɔ̧ o dam sɛn nú fɔ, sɛn tɛ o gasa ye in geɗek ye, in tɛ o fara-pɛm-mɔ mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wi nɛ̀ duka so zu mbɔi ko wannu nɛ́ Azmavɛt, bem ko Adiɛl; ɓɛɛ ko Yɔnataŋ bem ko Uzia, a̧ duka so kɔ̧-a̧ zu o nyɔnɔ nɛ̀ wa ndɛma e ŋgɔn kɔ̧ o dam sɛn nú fɔ, sɛn tɛ o gasa ye in geɗek ye, in tɛ o fara-pɛm-mɔ mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Azmavɛt wəzege ta Adiyɛl ya te ghəa mcɛləa meghe. Yonatan wəzege ta Oziyas ya te ghəa cɛ ketsene wəshi nyi te hɛɗia shɛ, nyi mbe meleme nyi jama jama le nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ ba'a cɛ nyi nza ka ya ŋkwa mbe.
Tupurri: Hay waçaç ree horog maga wañ lag ra ëogge diñ Asmafed je ni Adiyel no. Ti horog maga wo le go de laage yoofi, äi leege ma kluuri wo, äi leege ma kleere wo de tiñ ma gor ngeeln wo mono diñ Jonatañ je ni Osiyas no.

Francais: Ezri, fils de Chélub, sur les ouvriers des champs qui cultivaient la terre;
Anglais: And over them that did the work of the field for tillage of the ground was Ezri the son of Chelub:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ma ŋom sum sa hay sinena, sa ka zum sinena: Ezri, goora vi Kelub;
Bulu: Ezri, e mone Kelub, a mbe ntebʼôsu ya bebé mefup bese ya Israél.
Guiziga: Eziri mangal ngi Kelup, i buyɓi ngi mizli muhuvoy misi a ɓuh.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Eziri ɓii Kelub woni mawɗo remooɓe gese.
Fulfulde_DC: Eziri ɓii Kelub woni mawɗo remooɓe gese.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ezri bem ko Kɛlub duka zu o wi-wa-fɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ezri bem ko Kɛlub duka zu o wi-wa-fɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ɛzri, wəzege ta Kɛləwb ya te ghəa ka mene slene ta wəza te hɛɗia shɛ.
Tupurri: Ti jar joñre ma yoofi ga jeed wo sir mono diñ Esri je ni Kelub no.

Francais: Séméï, de Rama, sur les vignes; Zabdias, de Sapham, sur les provisions de vin dans les vignes;
Anglais: And over the vineyards was Shimei the Ramathite: over the increase of the vineyards for the wine cellars was Zabdi the Shiphmite:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ma ŋom gulda-guldana: Simey, ma hay Rama; ma ŋom vinna ma may goy hay sine gulda-guldana: Zabdi, goora vi Kefam;
Bulu: Simeyi ya Rama a mbe mbaʼale mefup mindiʼi mi woon Zabdi ya Kefam a mbe mbaʼale woon a mbe a soʼo mefube mete.
Guiziga: Simey mbur Rama, i buyɓi ngi guva ngi gudubunoy. Zaɓdi mbur Sefama, i buyɓi ngi mizli miwi vu ti mbaazla ngi gudubun vuna.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sim'i mo Rama woni kaliifaajo dow gese inabooje. Zabdi mo Sifam woni kaliifaajo dow nafuuda inabooje.
Fulfulde_DC: Sim'i mo Rama woni kaliifaajo dow gese inabooje. Zabdi mo Sifam woni kaliifaajo dow nafuuda inabooje.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Simɛi be Rama duka zu o wi-gun-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧, ɓɛɛ Zabdi be Sifmi duk kɔ‘i zu o wi-vati-dɔ̧ɔ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Simɛi be Rama duka zu o wi-gun-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧, ɓɛɛ Zabdi be Sifmi duk kɔ‘i zu o wi-vati-dɔ̧ɔ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Shimɛyi nya kande Rama nde se te ghəa wəvea rɛzɛŋe le mbeli nyi mbe. Zabdi nya kande Shefam ya te ghəa ŋkwa nyi tsene tɛ nya kese mbe wəvea shɛ mbeli mbe.
Tupurri: Ti pay tlalumn wo diñ Simeyi ma Rama, ti yii ma de laage ëogge äil pay tlalumn wo diñ Sabdi ma Sefam no.

Francais: Balanan, de Géder, sur les oliviers et les sycomores dans la Séphéla;
Anglais: And over the olive trees and the sycomore trees that were in the low plains was Baal–hanan the Gederite: and over the cellars of oil was Joash:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: sa ma ŋom gu-olive hiɗi gu-sikomora hay liyn ma beɗna: Baal-Hanan ma hay Geder; ma ŋom mulla: Yowas;
Bulu: Baal-Hanan ya Bét-Gédér a mbe mbaʼale mefube me ôlivié a ma me Sikomor afôla si é ne njeʼese. Yôas a mbe mbaʼale mimbon.
Guiziga: Baˀal-Hanaŋ, mbur Bet-Geder, i buyɓi ngi guva ngi tutumbur ati bazlawar misi tir musukunuh ngi ruwuy, Yoˀasa kwana, i buyɓi ngi malay muwam taŋ vu le.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ba'al-Hanan mo Geder woni kaliifaajo dow jaytunje e dundeeje nder lesdi towndiije. Yo'as woni kaliifaajo dow cigorɗi nebbam.
Fulfulde_DC: Ba'al-Hanan mo Geder woni kaliifaajo dow jaytunje e dundeeje nder lesdi towndiije. Yo'as woni kaliifaajo dow cigorɗi nebbam.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: War ko o te-nɔ̧́ in o te-mbɔra,  nɛ̀ war Hira-Nù, nɛ́ Bal-Hanaŋ be Gedɛr a̧ duk zu-a, ɓɛɛ wi-pɛm-nɔ̧́ nɛ̀ wa baa e nɛ́ Yoas.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: War ko o te-nɔ̧́ in o te-mbɔra,  nɛ̀ war Hira-Nù, nɛ́ Bal-Hanaŋ be Gedɛr a̧ duk zu-a, ɓɛɛ wi-pɛm-nɔ̧́ nɛ̀ wa baa e nɛ́ Yoas.
Kapsiki_DC: Ba'al-Hanan nya kande Bɛt-Gɛdɛr ya te ghəa wəvea yɛ bekele ba'a yɛ mekweɗa nyi te hɛɗi nya kwake kwake. Yowash ya kawəndə nya te ghəa ŋkwa nyi nza n'yi bekele mbe.
Tupurri: Ti koore Olifiyen wo de koore Sikomorn ma äil Sefelan wo diñ Baal-Hanan ma Gedere, ti noo ma de laage ëoggen wo diñ Yowase.

Francais: Joas, sur les provisions d'huile; Séthraï, de Saron, sur les boeufs qui paissaient en Saron; Saphat, fils d'Adli, sur les boeufs dans les vallées;
Anglais: And over the herds that fed in Sharon was Shitrai the Sharonite: and over the herds that were in the valleys was Shaphat the son of Adlai:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ma ŋom luwayna ma ka ti hatna hay Saron: Kitray ma hay Saron; ma ŋom luwayna ma ka ti hatna hay lokŋa: Safat, goora vi Adlay;
Bulu: Sitrayi ya Saroñ a mbe mbaʼale mimbame benyak, a vaʼa be bidi e miñyanebe ya Saron. Kafat e mone Adlayi a mbe mbaʼale mimbam benyak mi mbe mi jaʼak e minjeʼese.
Guiziga: Sitray mbur Saroŋ, i buyɓi ngi gezleŋ ngi slahay misi ar li zum taŋ a Saroŋ. Safat mangal ngi Adiley, i buyɓi ngi slahay mazumam ar sozohoy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Siritay mo Saron woni kaliifaajo dow na'i duranɗi haa lesdi Saron. Safat ɓii Adilay woni kaliifaajo dow na'i duranɗi nder waadiiji.
Fulfulde_DC: Siritay mo Saron woni kaliifaajo dow na'i duranɗi haa lesdi Saron. Safat ɓii Adilay woni kaliifaajo dow na'i duranɗi nder waadiiji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sitrai be Sarɔŋ duka zu o ndai nɛ̀ wa dai hi̧i̧, ɓɛɛ Safat bem ko Adlai duk kɔ‘i zu o ndai mɛ kɔ̧ ɗoŋgɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sitrai be Sarɔŋ duka zu o ndai nɛ̀ wa dai hi̧i̧, ɓɛɛ Safat bem ko Adlai duk kɔ‘i zu o ndai mɛ kɔ̧ ɗoŋgɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Shitray nya kande Saron ya te ghə wəvəsəa sla nyi mbe Saron. Shafat wəzege ta Adlay ya te ghəa nyi kwa zlərə.
Tupurri: Ti dere maga hay wo koëge äil Saroñ diñ Sitray ma Saroñ, ti dere ma äil logn wo diñ Safad je ni Adlay no.

Francais: Ubil, l'Ismaélite, sur les chameaux; Jadias, de Méronath, sur les ânesses;
Anglais: Over the camels also was Obil the Ishmaelite: and over the asses was Jehdeiah the Meronothite:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ma ŋom lamgana: Obil, ma Ismayella; ma ŋom kurona; Yedya, ma hay Meronot;
Bulu: Obil mone Ismaélite a mbe mbaʼale bekamel. Yedia ya Mérônôt a mbe mbaʼale beyale bijakas.
Guiziga: Obil mbur Ismayele, i buyɓi ngi zlogomohoy. Yediya mbur Meronot i buyɓi ngi madiya zunguhoy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Obil Isma'iiluujo woni kaliifaajo dow geelooɗi. Yehedeya mo Meronot halfitinaama bamɗe debbe.
Fulfulde_DC: Obil Isma'iiluujo woni kaliifaajo dow geelooɗi. Yehedeya mo Meronot halfitinaama bamɗe debbe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: War ko o ŋgeloba, nɛ Obil bezaŋ Ismaɛl a̧ duk zu wa, ko o nana-tuifuu nɛ́ Yɛdaya be Mɛrɔŋ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: War ko o ŋgeloba, nɛ Obil bezaŋ Ismaɛl a̧ duk zu wa, ko o nana-tuifuu nɛ́ Yɛdaya be Mɛrɔŋ,
Kapsiki_DC: Obil nya kande Ismayɛl ya te ghəa zlegwemə. Yɛdiya nya kande Mɛronot ya te ghəa kwara ŋemi.
Tupurri: Ti yoñyoñn wo diñ Obil, je ma ti wer mani Ismayel no, ti mangerheçeçren wo diñ Yehdiyahu ma Meronode.

Francais: Jaziz, l'Agarénien, sur les brebis. Tous ceux-là étaient intendants des biens du roi David.
Anglais: And over the flocks was Jaziz the Hagarite. All these were the rulers of the substance which was king David's.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ma ŋom fukunayna: Yaziz ma hay jaf Hagar. Nisi kaf kayni si sa ŋulona sa ŋom slena vi mulla David.
Bulu: Yaziz, mone Hagrite a mbe mbaʼale mintômba a bikela. E bôt be mbe na ba baʼale akume njô bôte David mbe le.
Guiziga: Yazis mbur Hagri, i buyɓi ngi tumuŋhoy ati ˀaway. Tayna gar, i miji kaw ngi buy Davitey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yazizi Hagariijo woni kaliifaajo dow dammooji. Kamɓe fuu ɓe mawɓe aynooɓe marle laamiiɗo Daawuda.
Fulfulde_DC: Yazizi Hagariijo woni kaliifaajo dow dammooji. Kamɓe fuu ɓe mawɓe aynooɓe marle laamiiɗo Daawuda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ ko o sami in o gbadua nɛ́ Yaziz be Hagri. O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ yaa so nɛ́ gasa wi-duk-zu mɔ ko wannu David.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ ko o sami in o gbadua nɛ́ Yaziz be Hagri. O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ yaa so nɛ́ gasa wi-duk-zu mɔ ko wannu David.
Kapsiki_DC: Yaziz nya kande Hagri ya te ghəa yɛ timɛti le kwi. Wa nyi sləa mbeli nyi kese nyighɛ te ghəa mcɛləa meghe David.
Tupurri: Ti fiirin wo diñ Yasis je Hagarid no. Jar sen wo äuy hay wo diñ minisdir ma ko wer horog mani wañ Dafidn wo.

Francais: Jonathan, oncle de David, était conseiller; c'était un homme de sens et de savoir. Jahiel, fils de Hachamoni, était avec les fils du roi.
Anglais: Also Jonathan David's uncle was a counsellor, a wise man, and a scribe: and Jehiel the son of Hachmoni was with the king's sons:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yonatan ma nasum Davidna, mi ma vul gatta. Namu mi sa ma yalam wi ŋolo. Namu mi ma ɗo slena; Yehiyel goora vi Hakmoni mi ma ŋom gurona vi mulla.
Bulu: Yônatan, ndômenyañe David, ntyetyeñ a ñyeman, a mbe ntebele njô bôt. Yehiel, e mone Hakmonite a nga bo ésaé ya yeʼele bone be njô bôt.
Guiziga: Yonataŋ jamba ngi Davite, i mbur misi lesle, yo a dubun le kuy kuy. I mbur mangila wuy da buy. Yehiyel mangal ngi mbur Hakmoni, i mudubuna gwat da ziri ngi buyoy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yonatan bappa Daawuda woni carwoowo, ngam o kakkilɗo, o binndoowo. Yehiyel ɓii Hakmoni ɗon wondi bee ɓikkoy laamiiɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: Yonatan bappa Daawuda woni carwoowo, ngam o kakkilɗo, o binndoowo. Yehiyel ɓii Hakmoni ɗon wondi bee ɓikkoy laamiiɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yɔnataŋ nɔkɔ ko David duka so nɛ́ gasa wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ kɔ̧-a̧; a̧ duka so nɛ́ gasa wi-iŋ-mɔ in wi-yɔr-mɔ mbɛt. Yehiɛl bem ko Hakmɔni duka so nɛ́ wi-usi-mɔ ha̧ o bem ko wannu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yɔnataŋ nɔkɔ ko David duka so nɛ́ gasa wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ kɔ̧-a̧; a̧ duka so nɛ́ gasa wi-iŋ-mɔ in wi-yɔr-mɔ mbɛt. Yehiɛl bem ko Hakmɔni duka so nɛ́ wi-usi-mɔ ha̧ o bem ko wannu.
Kapsiki_DC: Yonatan nya kakwesegwenyɛa David, ya kawəndə nya keɗepe wəshi kentsehwele ntsehwele, kande geze ghena za ta David. Yɛhiyɛl wəzege ta kwete nde Hakmon ya te ghəa teke nda ghena ta nza ganyɛ ke ŋwalea meghe.
Tupurri: Jonatañ hen pan Dafidn hay diñ je bag yañ ma de ti ngeel debañ. AÀ hay diñ je ma de ko yerge. Yehiyel je ni Hakmoni hay ko ngar weere mani wañn wo.

Francais: Achitophel était conseiller du roi, et Chusaï, l'Archéen, était ami du roi;
Anglais: And Ahithophel was the king's counsellor: and Hushai the Archite was the king's companion:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ahitofel kayni mi sa ma vul gatta mi mulla; Husay ma Arkiyena mi bana mulla;
Bulu: Ahitôfél a mbe fe ntebele njô bôt. Hukayi mon Arkite, a mbe mbaʼale minsolan mi mame njô bôt.
Guiziga: Ahitofel i mingila wuy da buyo ma. Husay mbur Arkit, i ngama ngi buy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ahitofel woni carwoowo laamiiɗo, Husay Arkiijo woni soobaajo laamiiɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ahitofel woni carwoowo laamiiɗo, Husay Arkiijo woni soobaajo laamiiɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ahitɔfɛl duka so nɛ́ wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ ko wannu mbɛt, ɓɛɛ Husa be Ark duk nɛ́ sɛm ko wannu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ahitɔfɛl duka so nɛ́ wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ ko wannu mbɛt, ɓɛɛ Husa be Ark duk nɛ́ sɛm ko wannu.
Kapsiki_DC: Ahitofɛl kwete nde geze ghena za ta meghe. Həwshay, nya kande Ark ya kamcɛnyɛ meghe.
Tupurri: Ahitofel hay diñ je bag yañ ne wañ, Husay je Arkidn hay diñ je ma ti nen wañ no.

Francais: après Achitophel, Joïada, fils de Banaïas, et Abiathar. Joab était chef de l'armée du roi.
Anglais: And after Ahithophel was Jehoiada the son of Benaiah, and Abiathar: and the general of the king's army was Joab.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: bugol Ahitofel mi Yehoyada goora vi Benaya hiɗi Abiyatar; Yowab mi ma ŋolla vi sojena vi mulla.
Bulu: E bôt be mbe Ahitôfél mvus be mbe Yôyada e mone Benaya a Abiatar. Yôab ki nye a mbe nlô évete ya nsamba mewosan.
Guiziga: Yoyada mangal ngi Benaya waɗ Abiyatar, a cam ar li ngi Ahitofel. Madiɗa ngi soje ngi buyoy kwana, i Zoˀap.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓaawo maayde Ahitofel, Yoyada ɓii Benaya e Abiyatar laati sarwooɓe laamiiɗo. Yo'ab woni mawɗo honooɓe laamiiɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓaawo maayde Ahitofel, Yoyada ɓii Benaya e Abiyatar laati sarwooɓe laamiiɗo. Yo'ab woni mawɗo honooɓe laamiiɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Ahitɔfɛl fea, nɛ́ Yehoyada bem ko Bɛnaya in Abiatar a̧ baa fara oi-aa. Gasa wi-duk-zu o wi-biro ko wannu duka nɛ́ Jɔab.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Ahitɔfɛl fea, nɛ́ Yehoyada bem ko Bɛnaya in Abiatar a̧ baa fara oi-aa. Gasa wi-duk-zu o wi-biro ko wannu duka nɛ́ Jɔab.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwetere wəmbəa Ahitofɛl ne, yɛ Yoyada, wəzege ta Benaya le Abiyatar ka se te ŋkwa ŋkɛ. Zhowab le ŋa ŋkɛ ne, kameghe nya te ghəa ka sewajɛa meghe se ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Hay kol ti ngeel Ahitofel blam diñ Yehoyada je ni Benayahun wo de Abiyatare. Jowab hay diñ je waçaç ree sode mani wañn wo.

Francais: David rassembla à Jérusalem tous les princes d'Israël: les princes des tribus, les chefs des divisions qui servaient le roi, les chefs de milliers et les chefs de centaines, les intendants de tous les biens et troupeaux du roi et de ses fils, ainsi que les intendants et les vaillants,- tous les vaillants soldats.
Anglais: And David assembled all the princes of Israel, the princes of the tribes, and the captains of the companies that ministered to the king by course, and the captains over the thousands, and captains over the hundreds, and the stewards over all the substance and possession of the king, and of his sons, with the officers, and with the mighty men, and with all the valiant men, unto Jerusalem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: David tok sa ŋulona vi Israyel kaf hay Yerusalem. Sa ŋulona vi jafna, sa ŋulona vi vok-ma-duura sa ka sun mulla, sa ŋulona vi vok ma birimna hiɗi vok ma kisna, nisi sa tuni kay ŋom slena hiɗi sa ŋom farayna vi mulla, sa lakay kat gurona valamu, sa patayna, sum sa donona hiɗi sum sa asayn kaf.
Bulu: Ane David a nga sulan bivete bise ya Israél, bivete meyoñ , bivete minsamba bia bo ésaé be njô bôt, bivete betoyini a bivete mintet, ba be mbe bivete ya baʼale akum a mimbam biyeme njô bôt a bone bé, bôte njô bôt a too be ndi, bezimbi ba dañ biwôlô a e bôte bese be bili ésemé.
Guiziga: Buy Davit a cikila buy ngi Israyeleye gar a Zeruzaleme: buy ngi sukwihey, buy ngi sojehey mingac ngac magam slra ngi buy, buyoy muwam soje durmuk durmuk ati skat skatay, buy miji zlili naŋhay, miwi ginewey misi a ɓuh ati miwi ziri naŋhay, mizli munguɗohoy, mizli miwirwirey ati mupuɗaw puɗaway gar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Daawuda mooɓti mawɓe Isra'iila fuu haa Urusaliima: Baaba-ci'e'en e hoore'en geɓe huuwanooɓe laamiiɗo e ardiiɓe dow honooɓe ujineere e ardiiɓe dow honooɓe teemerre e aynooɓe marle e dabbaaji e ɓikkoy laamiiɗo e saraaki'en e suusɓe e marɓe daraja fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Daawuda mooɓti mawɓe Isra'iila fuu haa Urusaliima: Baaba-ci'e'en e hoore'en geɓe huuwanooɓe laamiiɗo e ardiiɓe dow honooɓe ujineere e ardiiɓe dow honooɓe teemerre e aynooɓe marle e dabbaaji e ɓikkoy laamiiɗo e saraaki'en e suusɓe e marɓe daraja fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: David mɔi̧a o gasawi  Israɛl  lɛŋ pii Jerusalɛm, o gasawi zu o zuduk bíí, o gasawi zu dùk o wi-biro ko wannu, o gasawi zu o wi-biro booro in gɔmŋmaa, o wi-duk-zu o mbɔi in o mɔ-dai ko wannu in ko o bem kɔ̧-a̧ ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-de-tom kɔ̧ tua-wan, o ŋga wi-biro in o kpasa-bíí lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: David mɔi̧a o gasawi  Israɛl  lɛŋ pii Jerusalɛm, o gasawi zu o zuduk bíí, o gasawi zu dùk o wi-biro ko wannu, o gasawi zu o wi-biro booro in gɔmŋmaa, o wi-duk-zu o mbɔi in o mɔ-dai ko wannu in ko o bem kɔ̧-a̧ ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-de-tom kɔ̧ tua-wan, o ŋga wi-biro in o kpasa-bíí lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghe David tsenete ka meghe nyi mbe Israyɛl pɛtɛ pelɛ Zhɛrəzalɛm: ka meghe nyi mbe yita, ka meghe nyi te ghəa wəvəsəa ka sewajɛ nyi kemene nda slene ke meghe, ka meghe nyi te ghəa ka sewajɛ slibə ba'a nyi te ghəa ka sewajɛ gwəmsə, mbeli nyi te ghəa mcɛlə le wəshi keseɗa ta meghe, le ŋa ŋwalea ŋkɛ. Tsagha ka tsewe tsewe, le ka katsala ka sewajɛ, le mbeli nyi nza zləvə te hɛ.
Tupurri: Dafid raw tay wañre ma ti Israyeln wo le äuy Jerusalem. Diñ wañre ma ti äï¡ï¡nin wo, wañre ma pel carge äil ma joñ peele ne wañn wo, wañre ma pel jar ndar ndarn wo de ma pel jar kiskisn wo, wañre maga hay wo waçaç ree horog mani wañn wo mo äuy de maga hay wo waçaç ree horog de fuçy mani wañn wo mo äuy. Diñ jar maga hay wo ko ngar jar ni äe wo mono, jar ma de ndar äayn wo, werpiiri ma de eegren wo de jar ma tinoon wo äuy.

Francais: Le roi David se leva sur ses pieds et dit: "Écoutez-moi, mes frères et mon peuple. J'avais l'intention de bâtir une maison de repos pour l'arche de l'alliance de Yahweh et pour le marche-pied de notre Dieu, et je faisais des préparatifs pour la construction.
Anglais: Then David the king stood up upon his feet, and said, Hear me, my brethren, and my people: As for me, I had in mine heart to build an house of rest for the ark of the covenant of the  Lord , and for the footstool of our God, and had made ready for the building:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla David col kulo kay selemu, nam di'e: Humgiya, nigi ɓosiyonna, nigi sumuna vanu, nan varay jewe kay in ziya kay tun timgilla vi bonota vi Ma-Vatɗina haya, kay ziyd na'ta ma li mi liyn ma Lawna vaya tun selem haya, nan tun caw kot tuwanu kay in ziyda.
Bulu: Ane njô bôte David a nga tebe a jô na: Vôʼôlaʼane ma a bobejañ a bôte bam! Me nga bili nkômbane ya lôñe nda e vôme éwolo élate Nti é ne bômbô é too fe ételé mebo Zambe wongan, me mbe me kômesaʼane na me lôñe je.
Guiziga: Buy Davit a slikiɗ deŋ, a ɓa taŋ na: «Sukum ɗuwoy ati mizli ɗuwoy, cinaka mingiɓi ɗu ɗi. Ndira hay ngi ki akoti ngi jumoˀay ngi Bumbulvuŋ waɗ li ɗuva sar ngi Buymisemuŋ ndra na, wuluk naŋ naŋ da a mevel ɗu, yo i juw vu le ɓa i ndiraŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo Daawuda dari, wi'i: “Naneeɗam, onon deerɗiraaɓe am e ummaatoore am! Mi anniyino nyiɓugo suudu siwtordu ngam sundukru alkawal Jawmiraawo e ngam jooɗorde Allah meeɗen. Mi taaskani nyiɓugo.
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo Daawuda dari, wi'i: “Naneeɗam, onon deerɗiraaɓe am e ummaatoore am! Mi anniyino nyiɓugo suudu siwtordu ngam sundukru alkawal Jawmiraawo e ngam jooɗorde Allah meeɗen. Mi taaskani nyiɓugo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu David kura ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «O nya'm in dukbíí kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zìì. Mi taa so mɔ mɛ mbo Tua wen ee  Kuɓa  nɔɔ-tɔk ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-e-ɗɔɔ naŋ ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ mi ɗafi mɔ wen mboa-a;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu David kura ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «O nya'm in dukbíí kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zìì. Mi taa so mɔ mɛ mbo Tua wen ee  Kuɓa  nɔɔ-tɔk ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-e-ɗɔɔ naŋ ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ mi ɗafi mɔ wen mboa-a;
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghe David sate te ŋkwa, ma ke sha hɛ: «Fate ɗa mə ka kesaka ma, le mbelia ɗa. Nahe 'ya kezəzəte kezha ŋa ghɛ kave səndəkwəa jikə geva ta Mahwətə mbe, ŋkwa keŋkeɗe seɗa ta Shala ta ɓəmə.
Tupurri: Wañ Dafid kal ooge go de äaale äe deñ day gano: Co' wee sug äi, heçeçre äi wo de jar sir äi no. Ndi hay ëig ga ndi boo tiñ ma kañ komrom tayge jag mani Manwurn iggi ni, day aà mo hay diñ fen kañ äaale Baa naa no. Ndi hay go 'wuçy see äi ma booge äe.

Francais: Mais Dieu m'a dit: Tu ne bâtiras pas une maison à mon nom, parce que tu es un homme de guerre et que tu as versé le sang.
Anglais: But God said unto me, Thou shalt not build an house for my name, because thou hast been a man of war, and hast shed blood.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May Lawn di tanu: Naŋ as in ziy hay semda vanɗi, kay naŋ mi sena vi duura, kay naŋ ɦok busuwn goyo kaw.
Bulu: Ve Zambe a nga jô me na: Woo ye ke lôñe jôé dame nda , amu ô ne môta mewosan, ô kuliya fe abui metyi.
Guiziga: Amma Buymisemuŋ a ɓiy na: Masa ndiriy hay da ya i ka ta, asi ka ki mbur ngi vurum, yo ki pi pumbus le.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa Allah wi'i yam: An a nyiɓataa suudu ngam innde am, ngam a waɗi konuuji ɗuuɗɗi, a rufi ƴiiƴam.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa Allah wi'i yam: An a nyiɓataa suudu ngam innde am, ngam a waɗi konuuji ɗuuɗɗi, a rufi ƴiiƴam.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Mɛ beka mbo Tua wen nin-am na, wen mɛ́ nɛ́ wi-de-biro in mɛ gbaia tɔk-tɛ bíí a nù mbɛt.›
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Mɛ beka mbo Tua wen nin-am na, wen mɛ́ nɛ́ wi-de-biro in mɛ gbaia tɔk-tɛ bíí a nù mbɛt.›
Kapsiki_DC: Ama ma ke Shala gezete ɗa: ‹Gha nde teŋa ɗa ghɛ nya telə mbeli kahawe va 'ya ki we, kwa nza ŋkɛ kawəndə kempa na ba'a nahe na kempəmte mbeli kwele kwele.›
Tupurri: Ama Baa raw riñ mege gano: Ndo boo ge tiñ de ëu äi gaa werga ndo diñ je durgi day ndo kaa ci jar go gesiñ debañ.

Francais: Yahweh, le Dieu d'Israël, m'a choisi dans toute la maison de mon père, pour que je fusse roi sur Israël à jamais. Car il a choisi Juda pour être chef; et dans la maison de Juda, il a choisi la maison de mon père, et, parmi les fils de mon père, il s'est complu en moi pour me faire régner sur tout Israël.
Anglais: Howbeit the  Lord  God of Israel chose me before all the house of my father to be king over Israel for ever: for he hath chosen Judah to be the ruler; and of the house of Judah, the house of my father; and among the sons of my father he liked me to make me king over all Israel:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vi Israyel vilekan jar jafna vi sumiyan kaf, kay nan ma mus mi mulla vi Israyel dok-doko; kay nam vilek ziyna vi Yuda kay tun voko, nam vilek jafna vi bunu jar jafna vi Yuda, lo, jar gurona vi bunu nam minanti mi nanu kay nan ma ti mulda kay sa Israyel kafe.
Bulu: Nti, Zambe Israél, a nga tobe ma e nda bôt ésaa wom ése na me bo njô bôte ya Israél melu mese; amu a nga tobe Yuda a bo évet, a nga tobe nda ésaa wom e nda bôte Yuda été, a e bone bʼésaa wom été, a nga yene mvaé ya tobe ma na me jôô Israél ase.
Guiziga: Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ngi Israyel, a winiy le a wuzla muy ɗuwoyo, ɓa i cifi buy ngi Israyel ngi sete. Zleˀe na, a wini ngi buyo i Zuda. A dirba nah, ar sukwi ngi Zuda, a wini i hay ngi baha, yo a wuzla ziri ngi bahahaya, a hiyĩ le ɓa yi zum buy ar Israyel keɗeɗe gar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jawmiraawo Allah Isra'iila suɓi yam nder saare baaba am haa mi laato laamiiɗo Isra'iila haa foroy, o suɓi Yahuuda ngam haa o laato ardiiɗo, nder danygol Yahuuda boo o suɓi saare baaba am. Caka ɓiɓɓe baaba am boo, ɗum fottani mo o waɗammi laamiiɗo dow Isra'iila fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Jawmiraawo Allah Isra'iila suɓi yam nder saare baaba am haa mi laato laamiiɗo Isra'iila haa foroy, o suɓi Yahuuda ngam haa o laato ardiiɗo, nder danygol Yahuuda boo o suɓi saare baaba am. Caka ɓiɓɓe baaba am boo, ɗum fottani mo o waɗammi laamiiɗo dow Isra'iila fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl  hoka'm mgbara o bíí nutua kɔ‘m ha̧‘m mɛ ɔ wan zu o be  Israɛl  kpoo nɛ kpoo; a̧ hoka Juda nɛ̀ wi-usi-war, ɓɛɛ a̧ hoka nutua ko dáà kɔ‘m, tɛ zuduk ko Juda; mgbara o bem ko dáà kɔ‘m, a̧ hoka nɛ‘m mɛ ɔ wan zu  Israɛl  lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl  hoka'm mgbara o bíí nutua kɔ‘m ha̧‘m mɛ ɔ wan zu o be  Israɛl  kpoo nɛ kpoo; a̧ hoka Juda nɛ̀ wi-usi-war, ɓɛɛ a̧ hoka nutua ko dáà kɔ‘m, tɛ zuduk ko Juda; mgbara o bem ko dáà kɔ‘m, a̧ hoka nɛ‘m mɛ ɔ wan zu  Israɛl  lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ndagwara 'ya yantave Shala Mahwətə ta ka Israyɛl mbe hwelefe ta yiteyɛ ɗa kezha nza ghen'yɛ le hwelefe ta ŋkɛ te ghəa Israyɛl kaghala ghala. Ma mbe kwete və ne, nahe ŋkɛ kentave Zhəwda kawəndə nya te ghə, kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, pa ntave peləa yiteyɛ ɗa mbe hwelefe ta Zhəwda. Ɓiyitsa hwa ŋwalea yiteyɛ ɗa ne, nahe ŋkɛ keɗehwe nda kezha ve ɗa kameghe te ghəa pɛtɛa ka Israyɛl.
Tupurri: Manwuri, Baa ma Israyel hay gel ndi go yoo jar ni pan äi wo äuy maga ndi mo hay diñ wañ ti Israyel ma tum werga a go de baa Juda ma seege de kaçaçra no. AÀ raw baa feele mani pan äin ti sir Juda, day yoo weere mani pan äin wo mono, se baa diñ ndi maga ndi mo hay wañ ti Israyel wo äuy.

Francais: Et entre tous mes fils, - car Yahweh m'a donné beaucoup de fils, - il a choisi mon fils Salomon pour le faire asseoir sur le trône de la royauté de Yahweh, sur Israël.
Anglais: And of all my sons, (for the  Lord  hath given me many sons,) he hath chosen Solomon my son to sit upon the throne of the kingdom of the  Lord  over Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jar gurona sa nam vulanti ŋolla kayni, (kay Ma-Vatɗina vulan guron ŋolo) nam vilek goora van Salomon kay nam ma mus kay zlamda-mulda vi Ma-Vatɗina, kay sa Israyella.
Bulu: E bone bam bese été, amu Nti a nga ve ma abui bon , a nga tobe mone wom Solômon na a tooé nye éto njôane ya éjôé Nti Israél.
Guiziga: A wuzla ziri mizile ɗuwoy mihaɗi, Bumbulvuŋ muvuliy taŋ na, ngi cifi ar janga ngi a naŋm, ngi zumabuy ar Israyel na, a wini di i Salomoŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jawmiraawo hokki yam ɓiɓɓe ɗuuɗɓe. Caka maɓɓe o suɓi ɓiyam Suleymaanu haa o jooɗo dow leeso laamu Jawmiraawo, dow Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Jawmiraawo hokki yam ɓiɓɓe ɗuuɗɓe. Caka maɓɓe o suɓi ɓiyam Suleymaanu haa o jooɗo dow leeso laamu Jawmiraawo, dow Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bem kɔ‘m lɛŋ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ ha̧‘m, a̧ hoka nɛ́ Salomɔŋ mɛ duk zu damti ko GASA WAN zu  Israɛl .
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bem kɔ‘m lɛŋ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ ha̧‘m, a̧ hoka nɛ́ Salomɔŋ mɛ duk zu damti ko GASA WAN zu  Israɛl .
Kapsiki_DC: Ma tsetsenya ne, na kentave Salomon hwa ŋwale nyi ndeke ɗa Mahwətə kwele kwele, kezha nza kameghea pelɛ pasla ta ka Israyɛl kamene meghe Mahwətə.
Tupurri: Yoo weere äi maga Manwur haç ra ne ndi debañ mono, se raw baa weel äi Salomoñ ma hayge ti paale wañ sir mani Manwur no, ti Israyele.

Francais: Il m'a dit: C'est Salomon, ton fils, qui bâtira ma maison et mes parvis, car je l'ai choisi pour mon fils, et je serai pour lui un père.
Anglais: And he said unto me, Solomon thy son, he shall build my house and my courts: for I have chosen him to be my son, and I will be his father.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam di tanu: goora vaŋu Salomon ma in ziyda hiɗi wur-daŋŋa; kay nan vilekemu ki goora van nala, nan kay tuwamu ma muɗ mi bulumu may.
Bulu: A nga jô me na: Mone wome Solômon a ye lôñe nda jam a minseñe miam; amu me nga tobe nye na a bo mone wom a mamien ma ye bo nye ésaa.
Guiziga: A dirba nah, Bumbulvuŋ a ɓiy: Masa ndiriy hay jom ti wazlaray naŋhay i mangal ɗik Salomoŋ, asi yi wunaŋ le, ɓa a tiri mangal ɗu, yo ya kwana, yi sa tiri cine.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jawmiraawo wi'i yam: Ɓiya Suleymaanu nyiɓan suudu am e babe am. Ngam mi suɓi mo o laato ɓiɗɗo am, min boo mi laato baaba maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Jawmiraawo wi'i yam: Ɓiya Suleymaanu nyiɓan suudu am e babe am. Ngam mi suɓi mo o laato ɓiɗɗo am, min boo mi laato baaba maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m'e: ‹Mɛ̀ nɛ́ bem kɔ-mɛ Salomɔŋ a̧ tɛ mbo Tua kɔ‘m in bee-gara-a, wen mi hoka a̧ nɛ̀ bem kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ war kɔ̧-a̧, mi tɛ duk nɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m'e: ‹Mɛ̀ nɛ́ bem kɔ-mɛ Salomɔŋ a̧ tɛ mbo Tua kɔ‘m in bee-gara-a, wen mi hoka a̧ nɛ̀ bem kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ war kɔ̧-a̧, mi tɛ duk nɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke sha 'ya: Wəzege ta ŋa Salomon nde teŋa ɗa ghɛ le ŋwela nyi yite, kwa nza ŋkɛ gheŋkɛ yantave 'ya. Kawəzege ta ɗa tenza ŋkɛ, kayitenyɛ tenza 'ya.
Tupurri: AÀ hay riñ ndi gano: Boo ge tiñ äin wo de feele äin wo ge yañ na diñ weel äo Salomoñ werga ndi hay ban ga aà mo hay diñ weel äi, day ndi de see äi ndi joñ ge yañ diñ pan äe.

Francais: J'affermirai pour toujours sa royauté, s'il reste attaché, comme il l'est aujourd'hui, à la pratique de mes commandements et de mes ordonnances.
Anglais: Moreover I will establish his kingdom for ever, if he be constant to do my commandments and my judgments, as at this day.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nan ma muɗ mulda valam dono'o kay dok-doko, la nam li kuɗ gatta hiɗi dita vanu dok-doko ki vaydi nala.
Bulu: Ma ye yemete éjôé jé nnôm éto, nge a yeme na a baʼale mebendé mam a metiñe mam aval e ne môse wu.
Guiziga: Da ara ciniy mi, aro teŋteŋ avu ɓimuɗuva ɗuwoy ati ɓimujuwa ɗuwoy, kaɓa dana ani na, gidaŋ ngi zumabuy naŋ a sa ndir ngi sete.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mi tabitinan laamu maako haa foroy, to o tiinake ɗowtanaago umrooje am e kiitaaji am bana hannde boo .
Fulfulde_DC: Mi tabitinan laamu maako haa foroy, to o tiinake ɗowtanaago umrooje am e kiitaaji am bana hannde boo .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mi ɗafa yuwar mɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ tɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ, kà a̧ nɛ́ yora nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a tɛ kasa o geŋa in o heembea kɔ‘i de nɛ̀ tom-aa.›
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mi ɗafa yuwar mɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ tɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ, kà a̧ nɛ́ yora nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a tɛ kasa o geŋa in o heembea kɔ‘i de nɛ̀ tom-aa.›
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe 'ya kehite nda meghe nya ketenza kaghala ghala kenza nde kamene slene ŋkɛ le wəshi mahalegəa ɗa ba'a le ghena nyi gezeke 'ya kala nya nza ŋkɛ ɓeshi.
Tupurri: Ndi coä ge wañ äen yañ ma tum hayga a oo we ti jag liñgi äin wo de jag liñgi ma äod faage waçaçre äin wo do maga a de oole wara no mono.

Francais: Maintenant, aux yeux de tout Israël, de l'assemblée de Yahweh, et devant notre Dieu qui nous entend, gardez et observez avec soin tous les commandements de Yahweh, votre Dieu, afin que vous possédiez ce bon pays et que vous le transmettiez en héritage à vos fils après vous, à jamais.
Anglais: Now therefore in the sight of all Israel the congregation of the  Lord , and in the audience of our God, keep and seek for all the commandments of the  Lord  your God: that ye may possess this good land, and leave it for an inheritance for your children after you for ever.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Wulin kayni, vok ir Israyel kaf, vok ir tokŋa vi Ma-Vatɗina, vok ir Lawna vaya ma ka humgiya kaw, vun-ma-gatna vi Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vigi kaf nigi ma ŋomom ŋaa'a ŋolo, kay nigi ma lak dok-dok hay nagata na'ta ŋaata tani, kay nigi ma hina' voco'o mi gurona vigi sa bugolgina kay dok-doko.
Bulu: Eyoñe ji, e mise me Israél ase, ékôane Nti ése, a Zambe Emien a too, Nyô a wôʼô bia, tukaʼa baʼalane mebendé me Nti e Zambe wônan mese, nalé mia ye bi mbamba si nyô a liʼi je ane élik e be bone benan nnôm éto éyoñ mi maneya wu.
Guiziga: Na wurenna a mbuŋ Israyele gar, a mbuŋ kus ngi mizli ngi Bumbulvuŋhoy, yo a mbuŋ Buymisemuŋ ndra na, dubunaka ɓimuɗuva ngi Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ kumo, yo jaka a hirnga, ɓa ki lumaka hirwuy mezle hana, joˀ kisa pulaka a ndir da ziri kumoy wãˀ ngi set a dirba kumo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam maajum yeeso Isra'iila, jama'aare Jawmiraawo e yeeso Allah meeɗen, linye umrooje Jawmiraawo Allah mooɗon, ɗowtane ɗe haa on mara lesdi mboondi ndi'i, on marna ndi ɓiɓɓe mooɗon boo haa foroy.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam maajum yeeso Isra'iila, jama'aare Jawmiraawo e yeeso Allah meeɗen, linye umrooje Jawmiraawo Allah mooɗon, ɗowtane ɗe haa on mara lesdi mboondi ndi'i, on marna ndi ɓiɓɓe mooɗon boo haa foroy.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Ɓɛɛ kinii, sɛn yí o be  Israɛl  lɛŋ, sɛn yí giiwi ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí o geŋa ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ba fara tɛ de nù'ɛ, in h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ e nù'ɛ ha̧ o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ɗoŋ nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Ɓɛɛ kinii, sɛn yí o be  Israɛl  lɛŋ, sɛn yí giiwi ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí o geŋa ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ba fara tɛ de nù'ɛ, in h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ e nù'ɛ ha̧ o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ɗoŋ nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma tsetsenya gɛ ka kesaka meyɛ ɗa, mbe kema ta ka Israyɛl nyi kambelia Mahwətə pɛtɛ ba'a kwa kema ta Shala ta ɓəmə nya kefa ɓə, veyi mə geva kaneweve ba'a kamene slene le wəshi mahalegəa Shala Mahwətə ta ɓə. Ma tsagha, mba nza meleme nya ganyɛ nya kaŋa ŋayɛ ba'a wərə yɛ kayate kawəsə kezeme ghɛ nya kaghala ghala kaŋa ŋwalea ŋayɛ.
Tupurri: Patala, go nen jar Israyel wo äuy, go pel tayge mani Manwurn äuy, pel Baa naa maga de co' sug äayn mo lay no, hoo wee sug de el ti jag liñgi mani Manwuri, Baa äayn wo äuy nen maga sir ma de eln la mo hay nen do äay, day nday mo menn ge ne weere äay wo tway blam äay.

Francais: Et toi, Salomon, mon fils, connais le Dieu de ton père, et sers-le d'un coeur parfait et d'une âme dévouée, car Yahweh sonde tous les coeurs et pénètre tout dessein des pensées. Si tu le cherches, il se laissera trouver par toi; mais si tu l'abandonnes, il te rejettera pour toujours.
Anglais: And thou, Solomon my son, know thou the God of thy father, and serve him with a perfect heart and with a willing mind: for the  Lord  searcheth all hearts, and understandeth all the imaginations of the thoughts: if thou seek him, he will be found of thee; but if thou forsake him, he will cast thee off for ever.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Taŋ naŋu goora vanu Salomon, naŋ ma wi Lawna vi sumiyaŋu, naŋ ma sunumu hiɗi dikga ma' ma'taɗi, hiɗi ciwta vaŋ koti ŋaa'a, kay Ma-Vatɗina fek dikga kaf, nam poŋ ir varta kaf. La naŋ garamu nam ma hin tuwam a naŋ ma fumu, may la naŋ noyom goyo, nam ma gaŋ goyo kay dok-doko.
Bulu: Mfaʼa wôé, a mone wom Solômon, yeme Zambe ésoo wôé a saane nye a nlem ôse, a nsisim ô ne nkômesan, amu Nti a fase minlem mise a a yeme nkômban ôse. Nge wo jeñe nye, a ye bo na ô yene nye; ve nge wo liʼi nye, a ye wua wo fé nnôm éto.
Guiziga: Na ka, mangal ɗu Salomoŋ, dubuna si na bunuko, gi gawla naŋ ti mevel purla, yo ti membezleŋ ngi vu miwirwir. Asi Bumbulvuŋ ara ci a kwacay mizli gar, yo a sla wala ngi wuluk ngi mizli le gar. Da ki ra sipaŋ na, a sa buguw vu ɓa ki lumaŋ. Amma da ki pulaŋ le fuk na, a sa huzuguw a avra ngi sete.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: An boo, ɓiyam Suleymaanu, teddin Allah baaba maaɗa, jaggana mo bee ɓernde laaɓnde e nafsu ma fuu. Ngam Jawmiraawo ɗon linya ɓerɗe fuu o anndi anniyaaji e numooji. To a waylitake heedi maako, o waŋgante. Ammaa to a acci mo, o wudinte haa foroy.
Fulfulde_DC: An boo, ɓiyam Suleymaanu, teddin Allah baaba maaɗa, jaggana mo bee ɓernde laaɓnde e nafsu ma fuu. Ngam Jawmiraawo ɗon linya ɓerɗe fuu o anndi anniyaaji e numooji. To a waylitake heedi maako, o waŋgante. Ammaa to a acci mo, o wudinte haa foroy.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, bem kɔ‘m Salomɔŋ, mɛ̀ íŋ Sɔ̧ ko dáà kɔ-mɛ, mɛ̀ dé tom ha̧ a̧ nɛ̀ see kpɔk nɛ̀ fee-see, wen GASA WAN we nɛ́ see-wi ɓɛɛ a̧ kɛ̧ɛ̧ mgbara taamɔ ko bíí lɛŋ mbɛt. Kà mɛ kii a̧, a̧ tɛ e ha̧ mɛ mɛ kpa a̧, ɓɛɛ kà mɛ e a̧ duk, a̧ tɛ pi̧ mɛ nù kpoo nɛ kpoo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, bem kɔ‘m Salomɔŋ, mɛ̀ íŋ Sɔ̧ ko dáà kɔ-mɛ, mɛ̀ dé tom ha̧ a̧ nɛ̀ see kpɔk nɛ̀ fee-see, wen GASA WAN we nɛ́ see-wi ɓɛɛ a̧ kɛ̧ɛ̧ mgbara taamɔ ko bíí lɛŋ mbɛt. Kà mɛ kii a̧, a̧ tɛ e ha̧ mɛ mɛ kpa a̧, ɓɛɛ kà mɛ e a̧ duk, a̧ tɛ pi̧ mɛ nù kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma gha gɛ wəzege ta ɗa Salomon, tekeve kezha ɗepete Shala nya mene nda slene 'ya, hawe ve le wənə nya ɗema ghala kwa, pa na kanewe nza ta wənəa mbeli le zəzə ta nci pɛtɛ. Ma kezele ŋkɛ na ne, katepele ghəa ŋkɛ ŋkɛ kanewe ŋkɛ na, ama kewəfəyite ŋkɛ na ne, katenegha ŋa ŋkɛ kaghala ghala.
Tupurri: Day ndo Salomoñ weel äi, da' wer go de el ne Baa mani pan äo no, day ni ndo joñ peele ne hen go de jiili äo boñ, go de haç maysee äo sog boñ. Gahaçyla, Manwur da' wer go ne fen ma jiili jar äuy, ko wer ëiggi ma honla go äuy. Hayga ndo kiën we, se men see äe yañ da'ge ne ndo, day hayga ndo tobn we go no, se tob ge ndo go ma tum.

Francais: Vois maintenant que Yahweh t'a choisi pour bâtir une maison qui sera son sanctuaire. Sois fort, et à l'oeuvre."
Anglais: Take heed now; for the  Lord  hath chosen thee to build an house for the sanctuary: be strong, and do it.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Wulini naŋ ma wi ala Ma-Vatɗina vilekaŋawa, kay naŋ ma in ziyda ta peldetta valamu. Laŋ tuwaŋ dono'o, laŋ lopo.
Bulu: Yeme éyoñe jina na Nti a nga tobe wo na ô lôñe nda ja ye bo nyô yʼétyi. Yeme ngu a bo ane monafam.
Guiziga: Pura wurenna, Bumbulvuŋ a wunuˀw le ɓa ki ndiraŋ hay, ɓa a tiri li nga naŋ, cici zlak, yo gi slra.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hakkil jonta, ngam Jawmiraawo suɓi ma nyiɓana ɗum haykaliiru seniindu. Sey a semmbiɗa, a naŋnga kuugal.”
Fulfulde_DC: Hakkil jonta, ngam Jawmiraawo suɓi ma nyiɓana ɗum haykaliiru seniindu. Sey a semmbiɗa, a naŋnga kuugal.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛ̀ zɔ̀k, kinii, GASA WAN hoka mɛ wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ mbo Tua nɛ̀ duk nɛ́  sa̧a̧-fara  kɔ̧-a̧; mɛ̀ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi, mɛ̀ dé tom.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛ̀ zɔ̀k, kinii, GASA WAN hoka mɛ wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ mbo Tua nɛ̀ duk nɛ́  sa̧a̧-fara  kɔ̧-a̧; mɛ̀ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi, mɛ̀ dé tom.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma tsetsenya, wərə na kaɗepe nahe Mahwətə kentave ŋa kezha ŋa nda ghɛ nya ketenza kaŋkwa nya le kwelɛŋe. Hwepete ghə shɛ na dzembe slene.»
Tupurri: Ko patala ti äo de el so ga Manwur hay baa ndo nen maga ndo mo boo tiñ maga joñ ge diñ ngeel ma bay ëag ne se. Coä nen äo day ni ndo joñ ne!

Francais: David donna à Salomon son fils le modèle du portique et des bâtiments, chambres du trésor, chambres hautes, chambres intérieures qui s'y rattachaient, ainsi que de la chambre du propitiatoire;
Anglais: Then David gave to Solomon his son the pattern of the porch, and of the houses thereof, and of the treasuries thereof, and of the upper chambers thereof, and of the inner parlours thereof, and of the place of the mercy seat,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: David vul plaŋŋa vi diɓira hiɗi ziyna, ziy guray na cuk timgilla, ziy ma kulona, ziy ma hay kalafna, hiɗi ziyda vi goɓolokona.
Bulu: Eyoñe te David a nga ve Solômon mone wé éveʼelaʼa mbalaʼa si ya nda Zambe a mefase yʼété: bitune bi nda ba naan akum, bi ya yôp a bi ya été, a e vôm éwolo ja yiane bômbô.
Guiziga: Hay ngi Buymisemuŋ mutoho toh toh ngi ndir na, Davit a vula ɗerewol nah da mangal naŋ Salomoŋ, ɓa a ndira jom ti jawleeru naŋ, hayay, hay ngi pi gwatay, hay vay muŋhoy, hay ngi huroˀohoy, waɗ hay ngi akoti ngi Buymisemuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Daawuda hokki Suleymaanu suura zawleeru haykaliiru e cuuɗi maaru e cigorɗi maaru e cuuɗi dowji e geɓe haa nder haykaliiru e suudu jooɗordu ngam kefergal.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Daawuda hokki Suleymaanu suura zawleeru haykaliiru e cuuɗi maaru e cigorɗi maaru e cuuɗi dowji e geɓe haa nder haykaliiru e suudu jooɗordu ngam kefergal.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: David tɔ̧ɔ̧ yuwar deemɔ nɛ̀ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Salomɔŋ tɛ de lɛŋ: nú-zala, o tua nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, o fara-a-mɔ, o bɛr-tua mɛ ŋgɔn, o gɔna-bɛr-aa mɛ see-a in bɛr-tua e kuɓa mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: David tɔ̧ɔ̧ yuwar deemɔ nɛ̀ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Salomɔŋ tɛ de lɛŋ: nú-zala, o tua nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, o fara-a-mɔ, o bɛr-tua mɛ ŋgɔn, o gɔna-bɛr-aa mɛ see-a in bɛr-tua e kuɓa mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa David ndeke nda ntsehwelea nza ta ghɛ Shala ke Salomon, le kweci cɛ nyi vare. Yɛ cɛ ketsene mcɛlə, le cɛ nyi pelɛ ghəa ŋkwa keɗema nyi mbe, ba'a cɛ nya kaŋa səndəkwə Shala.
Tupurri: Dafid raw kañ nen weel äe Salomoñ ti faage booge ngeel se kluu no, de tiñ ma äil äen wo, de tiñ ma lag horogn wo, tiñ naw ma de geçeçre ciñn wo, äil tiñman wo de äil tiñ ma kañ komrom no.

Francais: le plan de tout ce qu'il avait dans l'esprit touchant les parvis de la maison de Yahweh et toutes les chambres à l'entour, pour les trésors de la maison de Dieu et les trésors du sanctuaire,
Anglais: And the pattern of all that he had by the spirit, of the courts of the house of the  Lord , and of all the chambers round about, of the treasuries of the house of God, and of the treasuries of the dedicated things:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Plaŋŋa vi sle ma ka hay dikam kalafna nam vulumta: Kay inda vi wur-daŋŋa vi ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina, ziy ma hay kalafna, ziy ma lak timgilla hay ziyna vi Lawna, hiɗi timgilla vi slen ma peldetna,
Bulu: A nga ve fe nye biveʼela bise a nga simesane na bia yiane lôñeban: minseñ ya nda Zambe, beta meba mbômaʼan a minseñ, bitune bi nda ba yiane naan akume ya nda Zambe a biôm bi nʼétyi bôt ba ve Zambe.
Guiziga: A vulaŋ ɗerewol naŋ mutoho toh toh, naŋ muro ti wuluk ngi gi naŋ ngi gi naŋ a wazlaray ngi hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ gar, hayay ngi ndir gun gun a ciki wazlaray, hayay ngi cikila zlili ar hay ngi Buymisemuŋ waɗ gwat muvula taŋ le da Buymisemuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O tinndini mo boo kuuje ɗe numooji maako anndini mo fuu: Haala babe haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo e cigorɗi taarotooɗi ndu e ndesaaje kuuje cenaaɗe
Fulfulde_DC: O tinndini mo boo kuuje ɗe numooji maako anndini mo fuu: Haala babe haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo e cigorɗi taarotooɗi ndu e ndesaaje kuuje cenaaɗe
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ usa yuwar deemɔ lɛŋ n'aa taa so mɛ de tɛ bee-gara Tua ko GASA WAN, in o gɔna-bɛr-tua mɛ ká̧ a̧, fara-a-mbɔi ko Tua ko GASA WAN, in o fara-a-mɔ nɛ‘i ha̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧ mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ usa yuwar deemɔ lɛŋ n'aa taa so mɛ de tɛ bee-gara Tua ko GASA WAN, in o gɔna-bɛr-tua mɛ ká̧ a̧, fara-a-mbɔi ko Tua ko GASA WAN, in o fara-a-mɔ nɛ‘i ha̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧ mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ ndeke nda ntsehwelea wəshi nyi zəzəte ŋkɛ pɛtɛ kezha ŋa, yɛ ŋwela nyi mbe ghɛa Shala, le cɛ nyi dzasle yite, le nyi tsene wəshia mcɛləa ghɛa shɛ mbeli mbe ba'a nyi tsene wəshi nyi keleke mbeli kaŋa Shala.
Tupurri: Se kañ nen äe go ni do maga aà hay le nen ëiggi äe nono, go ti feele tiñ mani Manwur no, ti tiñ ma nen äil korn ma lag horog ma äil tiñ Baan wo de ma lag feçeçre ma bay ëagn wo mo äuy no,

Francais: pour les classes des prêtres et des lévites, pour toute l'oeuvre du service de la maison de Yahweh, et pour tous les ustensiles employés au service de la maison de Yahweh;
Anglais: Also for the courses of the priests and the Levites, and for all the work of the service of the house of the  Lord , and for all the vessels of service in the house of the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: vokŋa vi muliyan-sa-ɗifinna hiɗi sa Levitna, slen kaf ma li lop hiɗi namu hay ziyna vi Ma-Vatɗina, jakŋa kaf ma li lop hiɗi namu hay ziyna vi Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: A nga ve nye afep é bili minsamba betuni a Belévit ntilan, nalé fe di bisaé bia yiane boban e nda Nti bi ne ntilan a e di biôme ya nkañan e nda Zambe été bi ne ntilan.
Guiziga: Dar a vulaŋ slimiɗ ngi masayay ati levihey, mingica taŋ le ngac ngac, slrahay ngi gi ar hay ngi Buymisemuŋ waɗ gwat ngi gi slrahay ar hay ngi Buymisemuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e haala geɓe liman'en e Lewi'en e kuuɗe nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo fuu e kuuje ngam kuugal nder maaru fuu
Fulfulde_DC: e haala geɓe liman'en e Lewi'en e kuuɗe nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo fuu e kuuje ngam kuugal nder maaru fuu
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ usa yuwar tom ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii, yuwar zɔka nyɛk in yuwar tom lɛŋ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ usa yuwar tom ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii, yuwar zɔka nyɛk in yuwar tom lɛŋ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ ndeke nda sləa wəvəsəa ka dzeghe Shala, le wəvəsəa ka Lɛvi, le slene nyi temene mbeli mbe ghɛa Mahwətə ba'a ŋa wəshi kesəkwə ghə mbe ghɛa Shala.
Tupurri: kañ nen äe go ti carge äil jar sië jagn wo de jar Lefidn wo, ti mopo äuy maga de mañge see joñre joñge peele ma äil tiñ mani Manwurn mo äuy de feçeçre joñre ma äil tiñ mani Manwurn wo äuy.

Francais: le modèle des ustensiles d'or, avec le poids de l'or, pour tous les ustensiles de chaque service; le modèle de tous les ustensiles d'argent, avec le poids, pour tous les ustensiles de chaque service;
Anglais: He gave of gold by weight for things of gold, for all instruments of all manner of service; silver also for all instruments of silver by weight, for all instruments of every kind of service:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam ɗekem kay ora, nekka vi sle ma kotom hiɗi ora, kayn di ala sle ma koti kay lopna mara'a mara'a kaf, hiɗi sle ma koti hiɗi doorota kaf, nekka vi slen ma koti kay lopna mara'a mara'a kaf;
Bulu: A nga kate nye abime or da yiane jôm ése ja yiane boban a or, a abime argent da yiane jôm ése ja yiane boban a argent,
Guiziga: A bigaŋ wi ɓiri tapasl tapasl vur gwat ngi slraˀahaya tiɗeˀe, ɓa a pa taŋ ti naŋ, yo a bigaŋ wi ɓiri bara vur gwat ngi slraˀahaya tiɗeˀe, ɓa a pa taŋ ti naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e haala teddeeŋga kaŋŋeeri, ngam kuuje koo ɗeye nder kuugal koo ngale e haala teddeeŋga cardi ngam kuuje koo ɗeye nder kuugal koo ngale
Fulfulde_DC: e haala teddeeŋga kaŋŋeeri, ngam kuuje koo ɗeye nder kuugal koo ngale e haala teddeeŋga cardi ngam kuuje koo ɗeye nder kuugal koo ngale
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O nyɛk nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ lɔr in bu-mbɔi, a̧ usa kilo-a nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tom-aa;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O nyɛk nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ lɔr in bu-mbɔi, a̧ usa kilo-a nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tom-aa;
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ncɛte nda kiləwəa mze kwa tere tere nya kehi kaŋa yayata wəsə nya mene mbeli le yite ba'a kiləwəa mze kwa ghwə ghwə kezha wəshi nyi mene mbeli le kala nza ta nci keghə keghə,
Tupurri: AÀ raw kañ nen äe go ti boo biñni no, ti poçoçre feçeçre maga sen joñ ge wo diñ boo biñni mono wer äe ga feçeçre maga aè joñ ge ra ma joñre go ti ngeel joñre wo ta' ta' äuy mono kañ nen äe ti feçeçre maga sen joñ ge wo de boo solay mono, go ti poçoçre feçeçre joñre maga joñ ge wo go ti ngeel joñre wo ta' ta' äuy mono.

Francais: le poids des chandeliers d'or et de leurs lampes d'or, selon le poids de chaque chandelier et de ses lampes, et le poids des chandeliers d'argent, selon le poids de chaque chandelier;
Anglais: Even the weight for the candlesticks of gold, and for their lamps of gold, by weight for every candlestick, and for the lamps thereof: and for the candlesticks of silver by weight, both for the candlestick, and also for the lamps thereof, according to the use of every candlestick.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nekka vi va ma tun fitilla ma ora, hiɗi fitilla ma ora, va ma tun fitilla hiɗi fitilla ma doorona, kuɗ lopna valamu valamu.
Bulu: nalé fe adite ya bibeʼe belambe a belambe be or, bibeʼe belambe a belambe be argent, avale ba yiane belan kan ése yʼété,
Guiziga: Yo a waŋ dudok ngi li ɗuva lampe ati lampehey mipaka taŋ ti ɓiri tapasl tapasla, waɗ li ɗuva lampe ati lampehey mipaka taŋ ti ɓiri bara, vur slra taŋ vur slra taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e teddeeŋga kaŋŋeeri ngam jo'inirɗe kaŋŋeeri e pittirlaaji maaji ɗum kaŋŋeeri, fodde teddeeŋga ngam jo'inirɗum fuu bee pittirlaaji muuɗum. Non boo teddeeŋga ngam jo'inirɗe cardi, fodde teddeeŋga ngam jo'inirɗum e pittirlaaji muuɗum, fodde kuuwtinirki jo'inirɗum pittirlaaji fuu nder kuugal.
Fulfulde_DC: e teddeeŋga kaŋŋeeri ngam jo'inirɗe kaŋŋeeri e pittirlaaji maaji ɗum kaŋŋeeri, fodde teddeeŋga ngam jo'inirɗum fuu bee pittirlaaji muuɗum. Non boo teddeeŋga ngam jo'inirɗe cardi, fodde teddeeŋga ngam jo'inirɗum e pittirlaaji muuɗum, fodde kuuwtinirki jo'inirɗum pittirlaaji fuu nder kuugal.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: o  dek-e-wee  in o lamba-a nɛ‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ lɔr in bu-mbɔi, a̧ usa kilo-a nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tom-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: o  dek-e-wee  in o lamba-a nɛ‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ lɔr in bu-mbɔi, a̧ usa kilo-a nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tom-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: le kiləwəa wəshi keve paterela zlaɓe le yɛ paterela kwa mze kwa tere tere, le ŋa wəshi keve paterela le yɛ paterela kwa mze kwa ghwə ghwə, kala slene nya mene mbeli keghə keghə le hɛ,
Tupurri: Se kañ nen äe go ti poçoçre feçeçre maga joñ ge wo de boo biñni ma hag lampan wo de lampa äaara maga joñ ge wo diñ boo biñni mono, go ti poçoçre mo ma hag lampa ma honla äuy de lampa äen wo, go ti poçoçre feçeçre ma hag lampa ma de joñge de boo solayn wo, go de poçoçre mo ma hag lampa ma honla äuy de lampa äen wo, go de ngaäge ti joñre äaaran wo ta' ta' äuy.

Francais: le poids de l'or pour les tables des pains de proposition, pour chaque table, et le poids de l'argent pour les tables d'argent;
Anglais: And by weight he gave gold for the tables of shewbread, for every table; and likewise silver for the tables of silver:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam vulum ora, ŋray dig nekka vi tablena ma lak fun kalamna, kay tablena kep kep kafe, doorota kay tablena ma doorona kaw.
Bulu: adite ya wua ase ya betawôlô be or be ne asu belet ba ve Zambe, a adite ya betawôlô be argent,
Guiziga: Tabul ngi ɓiri tapasl tapasl ngi pi ɗaf ngi vul da Buymisemuŋ ati tabul ngi ɓiri bara, a waŋ dudok taŋhaya tiɗeˀe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Non boo teddeeŋga kaŋŋeeri ngam taabe tamseeje jo'inteeɗe e teddeeŋga cardi ngam taabe cardi.
Fulfulde_DC: Non boo teddeeŋga kaŋŋeeri ngam taabe tamseeje jo'inteeɗe e teddeeŋga cardi ngam taabe cardi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O fara-e-brɛt ha̧ Sɔ̧ nɛ‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ lɔr in bu-mbɔi, a̧ usa kilo-a; yuwar dee fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama nɛ̀ sa̧a̧ lɔr in kilo-a,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O fara-e-brɛt ha̧ Sɔ̧ nɛ‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ lɔr in bu-mbɔi, a̧ usa kilo-a; yuwar dee fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama nɛ̀ sa̧a̧ lɔr in kilo-a,
Kapsiki_DC: le kiləwəa yayata kwete hwa tabele kwa mze kwa tere tere nyi ve ɗafa nyi keveyi geva kaŋa Shala mbeli te, le ŋa tabele kwa mze kwa ghwə ghwə,
Tupurri: AÀ raw haç boo biñni go ne hen de ngaä poçoçre maga nen joñ table ma sraë holen wo mono, go de ngaä poçoçre ma nen joñ tabul ma honla go äuy, ngaä poçoçre boo solay ma nen joñ table ma de boo solayn wo go lay.

Francais: le modèle des fourchettes, des aiguières et des coupes d'or pur; des amphores d'or, avec le poids de chaque amphore; des amphores d'argent, avec le poids de chaque amphore;
Anglais: Also pure gold for the fleshhooks, and the bowls, and the cups: and for the golden basins he gave gold by weight for every basin; and likewise silver by weight for every basin of silver:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam ɗekem kotta vi ɗamta,  tasa ma ŋulona, genna ma gurayna ma koti hiɗi or ma bay rigasna, tasa ma ora, hiɗi nekka vi tasan kaf, tasa ma donona; hiɗi nekka vi tasan kaf;
Bulu: adite ya bilum ba belane bie asu tit, di befandé a mendeʼe me or a ne mfuban , adite ya befandé be or a ba be argent, avale ba yiane belane kan ése yʼété,
Guiziga: A waŋ dudok ngi kuyer ngi zliga useˀey, dudok ngi kop ngi kuca lihey, gongoŋ ngi ɓiri tapasl tapasl pal naŋ, kisa ngi ɓiri tapasl tapasl ati ngi ɓiri gaza, vur slra taŋ vur slra taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Non boo haala tufirɗe e taasaaje e paalon kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi e njardukoy kaŋŋeeri e cardi, fodde teddeeŋga jardugel koo ngele fuu
Fulfulde_DC: Non boo haala tufirɗe e taasaaje e paalon kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi e njardukoy kaŋŋeeri e cardi, fodde teddeeŋga jardugel koo ngele fuu
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: o mɔɔ-tok-kpoo, o be yèé-misi̧-yí gaŋmɔ in o ɓii nɛ‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ sa̧a̧ lɔr, sɛka o mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ lɔr in bu-mbɔi, a̧ usa kilo-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: o mɔɔ-tok-kpoo, o be yèé-misi̧-yí gaŋmɔ in o ɓii nɛ‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ sa̧a̧ lɔr, sɛka o mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ lɔr in bu-mbɔi, a̧ usa kilo-a.
Kapsiki_DC: le ɗaŋeɗa ta lɛ nya njaŋa ŋa kezeme sli, ba'a ŋa zlerekwe kepisə ŋkwa le tereme kwa mze kwa tere tere nya ganyɛ, le ŋa 'yɛmbe kwa mze kwa tere tere ba'a ŋa mze kwa ghwə ghwə kala nya ɗe ŋkɛ,
Tupurri: Se kal ngaä faage joñge fursedn wo, tasan wo, klobon wo de kob boo biñnin wo ne hene, go de ngaä poçoçre kob ma honla äuy, de kob boo solayn wo go de poçoçre kob boo solay ma honla äuy.

Francais: de l'autel des parfums en or épuré, selon son poids; le modèle du char de Dieu, des Chérubins d'or qui étendent leurs ailes et couvrent l'arche de l'alliance de Yahweh.
Anglais: And for the altar of incense refined gold by weight; and gold for the pattern of the chariot of the cherubims, that spread out their wings, and covered the ark of the covenant of the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nam ɗekem jifta vi giwin-ma-ɗifinna ma koti hiɗi or ma yorayna, hiɗi nekka valamu. Lo nam ɗekem yal ma kot kekena, kerubena* ma ora ma gilaŋatam ka goy meɗiya kay bar yam timgilla vi bonota vi Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: adite ya ataʼa metunaʼa beôlobinda mboon a nya or. A nga suʼulane fe ve nye éveʼela vagoñ a nʼétyi, a dañe dañe na Bekerubim be or ba buti éwolo élate Nti a mefabe map me ne ndaman.
Guiziga: A waŋ dudok ngi ɓiri tapasl tapasl pal naŋ, ɓa ngi ɗiya li gi mikuli ti urdi. A vulaŋ ɗerewol misi mota ngi vurum toh toh ara, ɓa a ɗiya kanah, waɗ ngi  kerubeŋhey  misi zlara njar njar sirit hirnga ngi akoti ngi jumoˀay ngi Bumbulvuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e haala gulduɗum uurle kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi bee teddeeŋga muuɗum e suura moota pucci bee nga keruba'en kaŋŋeeri weeɗanɓe bileeji muuɗum'en, suddanɓe sundukru alkawal Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: e haala gulduɗum uurle kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi bee teddeeŋga muuɗum e suura moota pucci bee nga keruba'en kaŋŋeeri weeɗanɓe bileeji muuɗum'en, suddanɓe sundukru alkawal Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ usa kilo fara-dɔ-fuu nyama, yuwar dee keekee, in o  keribim  nɛ̀ nyɛi̧ ɓaa kpe nɛ̀ zu  Kuɓa  nɔɔ-tɔk ko GASA WAN mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ usa kilo fara-dɔ-fuu nyama, yuwar dee keekee, in o  keribim  nɛ̀ nyɛi̧ ɓaa kpe nɛ̀ zu  Kuɓa  nɔɔ-tɔk ko GASA WAN mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: ba'a kiləwəa reghwetɛ ketere 'wərdə le mze kwa tere tere nya ganyɛ. Ma kakwa keɗaŋe gɛ, pa ŋkɛ ndeke nda pa ta wəmata gədəwə nya keveyi geva kaŋa Shala, le ka shɛrəbɛŋe nyi nza bidzə ta nci tepele kənəa səndəkwəa jikə geva ta Mahwətə.
Tupurri: AÀ kañ nen äe go ti faage joñge ngeel sië jag ma roë fen foçoçre no maga de joñge de boo biñni ma bay sir nenn go de poçoçre äe, go ti pus durgi no, ti kerubeçeç boo biñni maga blar wo grañ äaara day yoñ wo komrom tayge jag mani Manwurn go mono.

Francais: "Tout cela, dit David, tous les ouvrages de ce modèle, Yahweh m'en a instruit par un écrit qui, de sa main, est venu à moi."
Anglais: All this, said David, the  Lord  made me understand in writing by his hand upon me, even all the works of this pattern.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: David di'e: Slen kayni ɗom mi Ma-Vatɗina hiɗi ɓalam namu, nam vulanta kay nan ma humum cawamu, nam ɗekan yalla ma (naŋ) ma in slen kafna.
Bulu: David a nga jô na e mam mese ma me ne ntilan e kalate me nga nyoñe be Nti; kalate ate a liti ne sañsañ avale ba yiane bo e jôm ése é ne éveʼela été.
Guiziga: Dar Davit a ɓi: «Gwat tayna cek, t'ada angi ɗerewol Bumbulvuŋ muvuliy di na, ɗerewol nana, a bo ti gwat ngi ɗiyiheye le pislek pislek wãˀ».
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Daawuda wi'i: “Haala ka'a winndaama dow ɗereewol ngol Jawmiraawo hokki yam. Ngol faamtini yam kuuɗe gonɗe haa suura man fuu.”
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Daawuda wi'i: “Haala ka'a winndaama dow ɗereewol ngol Jawmiraawo hokki yam. Ngol faamtini yam kuuɗe gonɗe haa suura man fuu.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: David tɔ̧a̧: «Mɔɔ nɔ‘i a̧a̧ zaŋ kalata nɛ̀ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ ha̧‘m. Kalata'i usi nɛ́ ɗoŋ yuwar-tom nɔ‘i.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: David tɔ̧a̧: «Mɔɔ nɔ‘i a̧a̧ zaŋ kalata nɛ̀ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ ha̧‘m. Kalata'i usi nɛ́ ɗoŋ yuwar-tom nɔ‘i.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke David ɓiyitsa: «Pɛtɛ wəshi nyighɛ kerafete geva mbe palepa nya kemave 'ya se va Mahwətə. Palepa shɛ nde ncɛ nza ta pɛtɛa wəshia shɛhɛ tsema tsema mene hɛ mbeli.»
Tupurri: Dafid kal gano: Sen mo äuy diñ fen maga le go de yerge äi coo do Manwur ga ndi mo laa wer joñre no, day ndi mo joñn do maga a de ngaäge nono.

Francais: David dit à Salomon, son fils; "Sois fort et courageux! A l'oeuvre! Ne crains point et ne t'effraie point; car Yahweh Dieu, mon Dieu, sera avec toi; il ne te délaissera pas et ne t'abandonnera pas, jusqu'à l'achèvement de tout l'ouvrage pour le service de la maison de Yahweh.
Anglais: And David said to Solomon his son, Be strong and of good courage, and do it: fear not, nor be dismayed: for the  Lord  God, even my God, will be with thee; he will not fail thee, nor forsake thee, until thou hast finished all the work for the service of the house of the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: David di tam Salomon: Laŋ tuwaŋ dono'o, laŋ kursuliya, laŋ lopo; li narɗi, tuwaŋ wiraŋɗi, kay Ma-Vatɗina Lawna, Lawna vanu ma li hiɗi naŋu; yalam ma jokaŋɗi, nam noyaŋ goyɗi, ta-ta lop ma kay ziyna vi Ma-Vatɗina vat goy kafe.
Bulu: David a nga jô mone wé Solômon na: Yeme ngu, boʼo ayoʼo nlem a bo ane fam; te ko woñ a te fôʼôban amu Zambe nyô a too, e Zambe wom, a ye tabe be wo; a ye bo te liʼi wo nge vuane wo, akekui biôm bise asu ésaé ya nda Nti bi maneya boban.
Guiziga: Joˀ Davit a ɓa mangal naŋ Salomoŋ na: «Mangal ɗu, tum vu tum, yo cici zlak! Zla slra, ki zluwun ta, ki jijik ta! Asi Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ɗu na, naŋ da ati ka. N'anta a sa puluw fuk ta, hã avu kiɗa mi ngi slra ngi hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ wãˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Daawuda wi'i ɓiyum Suleymaanu: “Sey a semmbiɗa, a laato cuusɗo, a naŋnga kuugal. Taa hul, taa tampu sam, ngam Allah Jawmiraawo, Allah am wondan bee maaɗa. O accataa ma, o wudintaa ma, haa kuugal nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo fuu timma.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Daawuda wi'i ɓiyum Suleymaanu: “Sey a semmbiɗa, a laato cuusɗo, a naŋnga kuugal. Taa hul, taa tampu sam, ngam Allah Jawmiraawo, Allah am wondan bee maaɗa. O accataa ma, o wudintaa ma, haa kuugal nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo fuu timma.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ David tɔ̧ ha̧ bem kɔ‘i Salomɔŋ: «Mɛ̀ ŋgáí gba̧a̧ tɛ-mɛ. Mɛ̀ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi mbɛt! Ká mɛ de kíì na. Ká tɛ-mɛ nak na mbɛt, wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m a̧a̧ in mɛɛ. A̧ beka e mɛ duk na, in tɛ-a beka bi ɗoŋ mɛ na hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ tom Tua ko GASA WAN lɛŋ tɛ kaɗi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ David tɔ̧ ha̧ bem kɔ‘i Salomɔŋ: «Mɛ̀ ŋgáí gba̧a̧ tɛ-mɛ. Mɛ̀ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi mbɛt! Ká mɛ de kíì na. Ká tɛ-mɛ nak na mbɛt, wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m a̧a̧ in mɛɛ. A̧ beka e mɛ duk na, in tɛ-a beka bi ɗoŋ mɛ na hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ tom Tua ko GASA WAN lɛŋ tɛ kaɗi.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwetere wəmbəa ŋkɛ, ma ke mbakete: «Wəzege ta ɗa, nza le hwepe ghə ba'a le berete. Mene slene, mba na kebare bare ba'a keghazlənə! Va nya nza ŋkɛ katewəfə ŋa Shala Mahwətə ta ɗa we. Le gha ŋkɛ ba'a katekemane ŋa ŋkɛ pa te kiɗi ta slene ta ghɛa Mahwətə.
Tupurri: Dafid raw riñ weel äe Salomoñ gano: Coä see, teñ nen äo day ni ndo joñ ne. Joñ heçeçne wa lay, dañ jiili go wa lay. Gahaçyla, Manwur Baa, Baa äin joñ ge yañ de äo. AÀ men ge ndo go gaa lay, tob ge ndo go gaa lay, haçaç joñre joñge peele ma ti tiñ mani Manwurn wo go äo' jag ëa.

Francais: Et voici avec toi les classes des prêtres et des lévites pour tout le service de la maison de Dieu; avec toi, pour toute espèce de travaux, sont aussi tous les hommes dévoués et habiles, pour tous les ouvrages; enfin, les chefs et le peuple pour l'exécution de tous tes ordres."
Anglais: And, behold, the courses of the priests and the Levites, even they shall be with thee for all the service of the house of God: and there shall be with thee for all manner of workmanship every willing skilful man, for any manner of service: also the princes and all the people will be wholly at thy commandment.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Vokŋa vi muliyan-sa-ɗifinna hiɗi sa Levitna kaf ka tani, kay li lop ziyda vi Lawna. Nisi ka kataŋu kay li lopn kafe, sum sa hiɗi minda sa yalla, sa li lop kuɗ jafam kaf ka'a, sa ŋulona hiɗi sumun kaf sa lumaɗna kay hum dita vaŋu.
Bulu: Minsamba betuni a Belévit asu ésaé ya nda Zambe mmie mi. Mfaʼa ya aval ésaé ése, ô bili mintyetyeñ mi bôt mi bili mbamba nkômbane ya bo ésaé e fefele jôé, nalé fe bivet a bôte bese be ne mewôk, e mam mese ba kobô be.
Guiziga: Masayay ati levihey, mingica taŋ le ngac ngac ngi gi slrahay gar ngir hay ngi Buymisemuŋ, t'ani joa ciki ɗike ni. Vur slrahay gar na, mizli misi mevel mezlehey, misinaka slrahay le, buyoy ati mizli gar t'ada vur ka»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa geɓe liman'en e Lewi'en ngam kuugal nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo fuu. Marɓe anniya mbooɗka fuu e marɓe anndal fuu ngam huuwugo kuugal koo ngale ɗon ngondi bee maaɗa, non boo mawɓe e yimɓe fuu, ɓe ɗowtanto umrooje ma.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa geɓe liman'en e Lewi'en ngam kuugal nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo fuu. Marɓe anniya mbooɗka fuu e marɓe anndal fuu ngam huuwugo kuugal koo ngale ɗon ngondi bee maaɗa, non boo mawɓe e yimɓe fuu, ɓe ɗowtanto umrooje ma.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii nɛ̀ ya wen ɗafa sɔ̧ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ in mɛɛ, ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ de taamɔ nɛ̀ iŋa mgbara mɔ tɛ tom lɛŋ tɛ gbak mɛ mbɛt. O gasawi in dukbíí lɛŋ tɛ mbo zu ha̧ mɛ.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii nɛ̀ ya wen ɗafa sɔ̧ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ in mɛɛ, ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ de taamɔ nɛ̀ iŋa mgbara mɔ tɛ tom lɛŋ tɛ gbak mɛ mbɛt. O gasawi in dukbíí lɛŋ tɛ mbo zu ha̧ mɛ.»
Kapsiki_DC: Le gha ka dzeghe Shala le yɛ ka Lɛvi nyi kemene slene ta ghɛa Shala kewəvəsə kewəvəsə perə. Ɓiyitsa kaŋa slene nya ketemene geva, le mbeli nyi nza ɗe ganyɛ va hɛ, nyi keɗepe slene tsape yitea yayata slene hwa ka meghe le jikə ta mbeli pɛtɛ.»
Tupurri: Jar sië jagn wo de jar Lefidn wo go de carge mo ta' ta' ma joñre ma ti tiñ Baa no. Ma joñ joñren go äuy mono, jar maga haç wo see äaara de see äaara tu ga wo de ko el joñre ma honla äuyn wo, wañre wo de jar ma yaçaç jag ti waçaçre äon wo äuy yañ wo see äo.

Francais: Le roi David dit à toute l'assemblée: "Mon fils Salomon, le seul que Dieu ait choisi, est jeune et faible, et l'ouvrage est considérable; car ce palais n'est pas pour un homme, mais pour Yahweh Dieu.
Anglais: Furthermore David the king said unto all the congregation, Solomon my son, whom alone God hath chosen, is yet young and tender, and the work is great: for the palace is not for man, but for the  Lord  God.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla David di tam tokŋa kaf ala: Goora van Salomon ma Lawn vilekem goy jargin zawni, nam joriyo'o, bay niya kaw, may lopn kayn ŋolo, kay inda vi ziyn kayni may mi lop vi saɗi, may lopna vi Ma-Vatɗina Lawna.
Bulu: Ane njô bôte David a nga jô ékôane bôt ése na: Mone wome Solômon, nye étame Zambe a nga top, a ne mongô a nteʼan, ésaé ke anen, amu nda nyô é nji bo asu môt, ve asu Zambe Nyô a too.
Guiziga: Buy Davit a ɓa mizli mukusom akẽh gar: «Mangal ɗu Salomoŋ, Buymisemuŋ a wini i naŋ pal naŋ, i zuŋ aruŋ, yo a titil gi gwat ɗaˀ ta, na slra ngi gi na, naŋ haɗa, asi hay nah, a ndiraka da mbur ta, amma da Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Fahin laamiiɗo Daawuda wolwani jama'aare fuu, wi'i: “Ɓiyam Suleymaanu mo Allah suɓi ɗum kanyum tan, o derkeejo mo walaa kirseeku tawon. Ammaa kuugal mawni masin, ngam laamorde nde laatataako ngam yimɓe, ammaa ngam Allah Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: Fahin laamiiɗo Daawuda wolwani jama'aare fuu, wi'i: “Ɓiyam Suleymaanu mo Allah suɓi ɗum kanyum tan, o derkeejo mo walaa kirseeku tawon. Ammaa kuugal mawni masin, ngam laamorde nde laatataako ngam yimɓe, ammaa ngam Allah Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ giiwi lɛŋ nɛ̀ mɔi̧a hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Bem kɔ‘m Salomɔŋ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ hoka, nɛ́ be-ŋgaiwi nɛ̀ kpa ŋgai na, ɓɛɛ tom-dee ɔ gasa, wen tua-wan’ɛ bo nɛ́ ko bíí na, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ giiwi lɛŋ nɛ̀ mɔi̧a hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Bem kɔ‘m Salomɔŋ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ hoka, nɛ́ be-ŋgaiwi nɛ̀ kpa ŋgai na, ɓɛɛ tom-dee ɔ gasa, wen tua-wan’ɛ bo nɛ́ ko bíí na, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke meghe David sha mbeli nyi tetsene: «Ma wəzege ta ɗa Salomon nya ntave Shala kwetɛŋe ne, mba ŋkɛ kawəzege, dewə ntsehwele ve. Ndagwara nahe slene nya ketemene geva kenza wəbake. Kwa nza ŋkɛ kenza ŋkɛ kaŋa ghɛ meghe kezha wəndə ŋelɛ we, ama ghɛa Shala Mahwətə.
Tupurri: Wañ Dafid kal riñ taygen äuy gano: Salomoñ, weel äi maga Baa ban mo deñ klee ëa lay, de leäay ëa lay, day joñren kluu debañ. Gahaçyla tiñ se kluun bay diñ ma je tabay wa, ama ma Manwur Baa.

Francais: J'ai mis tous mes efforts à préparer pour la maison de mon Dieu de l'or pour les objets d'or, de l'argent pour les objets d'argent, de l'airain pour les objets d'airain, du fer pour les objets de fer, du bois pour les objets de bois, des pierres d'onyx et des pierres à enchâsser, des pierres d'ornement et de diverses couleurs, toutes sortes de pierres précieuses et des pierres de marbre en abondance.
Anglais: Now I have prepared with all my might for the house of my God the gold for things to be made of gold, and the silver for things of silver, and the brass for things of brass, the iron for things of iron, and wood for things of wood; onyx stones, and stones to be set, glistering stones, and of divers colours, and all manner of precious stones, and marble stones in abundance.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nan vul donota van kaf kay kot slen kay ziyda vi Lawna vanu: Ora kay sle ma kotom hiɗi ora, doorota kay sle ma kotom hiɗi doorota, wayta kay sle ma kotom hiɗi wayta, kawayna kay sle ma kotom hiɗi kawayna, guna kay sle ma kotom hiɗi guna, hiɗiyna oniks kay hiɗiy ma cum gaana, hiɗiy ma wilena ma jifiyta valam mara'a mara'a, hiɗiy ma ŋaana kaf, hiɗiy ma haɓna kaw ka ŋolo.
Bulu: Me maneya belan e ngule jam ése na me tôkane biôm asu nda Zambe wom or asu biôme bi or, argent asu biôme bi argent, mvot asu biôme bi mvot, étyé asu biôme bia yian étyé a bilé asu biôme bia yiane boban a bilé, mekoʼo mʼônix a mekok ba yiane totan e mevôm mevôm asu ya ve abeñ: mekoʼo ma faé me too menyôle menyô, mevale mekoʼo mese me nʼédima a marbre a nʼéfumulu abui.
Guiziga: I vu le ti gwatay ngi ndira hay ngi Buymisemuŋ ɗu, mbar vu wãˀ: I cikil ɓiri tapasl tapasl, ɓiri baraŋ, ɓiri gaza, ɓiri ho gar waɗ dum, ɓa ngi ɗiya gwatay wal wal gar. I wi vu le ti ɗuguroy haɗi ma: ɗugur mupuɗaw kakayak kakayak waɗ ɗugur ngi gi wuyahay, ɗugur titrahay ati mekelemey, ɗugur mupuɗaw puɗaway gar waɗ ɗugur ɗoro haɗi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Bee baawɗe am fuu taaskitinmi kuuje ngam haykaliiru Allah am: Kaŋŋeeri ngam kuuje kaŋŋeeri e cardi ngam kuuje cardi e njamndi mboɗeeri ngam kuuje njamndi mboɗeeri e njamndi ɓaleeri ngam kuuje njamndi ɓaleeri e leɗɗe ngam kuuje leɗɗe e kaa'e onikis e kaa'e ngam jaagnugo e kaa'e ɓaleeje e ɗe noone feere feere e kaa'e marɗe saman e kaa'e daneeje ɗuuɗɗe masin .
Fulfulde_DC: Bee baawɗe am fuu taaskitinmi kuuje ngam haykaliiru Allah am: Kaŋŋeeri ngam kuuje kaŋŋeeri e cardi ngam kuuje cardi e njamndi mboɗeeri ngam kuuje njamndi mboɗeeri e njamndi ɓaleeri ngam kuuje njamndi ɓaleeri e leɗɗe ngam kuuje leɗɗe e kaa'e onikis e kaa'e ngam jaagnugo e kaa'e ɓaleeje e ɗe noone feere feere e kaa'e marɗe saman e kaa'e daneeje ɗuuɗɗe masin .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mi ha̧a̧ ŋgai tɛ‘m lɛŋ ɗafi nɛ̀ mɔ e wen Tua ko Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m: lɔr wen o mɔ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ lɔr, bu-mbɔi wen o mɔ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ bu-mbɔi, ndɛrɛ wen o mɔ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ, boi wen o mɔ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ boi, te wen o mɔ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ te, o de toka gbɛ̧ ta, in o tu̧ ta nɛ̀ dap-aa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, ta nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ̀ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya in de ŋga ta mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mi ha̧a̧ ŋgai tɛ‘m lɛŋ ɗafi nɛ̀ mɔ e wen Tua ko Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m: lɔr wen o mɔ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ lɔr, bu-mbɔi wen o mɔ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ bu-mbɔi, ndɛrɛ wen o mɔ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ, boi wen o mɔ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ boi, te wen o mɔ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ te, o de toka gbɛ̧ ta, in o tu̧ ta nɛ̀ dap-aa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, ta nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ̀ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya in de ŋga ta mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe 'ya kehwepete ghə kezha slekete wəshi nyi teŋa ghɛ Shala shɛ mbeli le: yɛ mze kwa tere tere, mze kwa ghwə ghwə, mze kwa tɛawetɛa, lɛ, sheghwə, kezha wəshi mze nyi tevɛsə mbeli le mze nyighɛ. Nahe 'ya ketsenete mama ta pelɛ nyi ghemea ghemea ba'a kweci pelɛ kesleke ŋkwa ganyɛke, le pelɛ kwa ŋkereyi kala mekwəlivə le kweci keghə keghə, le kweci ma ta pelɛ nyi pa mbeli dzawe ba'a kweci teɓehwe.
Tupurri: Ndi hay tob eegre äi go äuy ma bag jag feçeçre ma boo tiñ mani Baa äi no: Tay boo biñni go ma feçeçre maga wo nen joñge de boo biñi mono, boo solay go ma feçeçre maga wo nen joñge de boo solay mono, boo dob go ma feçeçre maga wo nen joñge de boo dob mono, boo go ma feçeçre maga wo nen joñge de boo mono, koo go ma feçeçre maga wo nen joñge de koo mono. Ndi bag jag huuli Onikse, huuli ma yer see tiñn wo, huuli ma sagge wo, iriñ huuli ma honla wo äuy, wer huuli ma de wore ma honla wo äuy de huuli ma kluuri de piiri wo debañ.

Francais: De plus, dans mon affection pour la maison de Dieu, l'or et l'argent que je possède en propre, je le donne à la maison de mon Dieu, outre tout ce que j'ai préparé pour la maison du sanctuaire:
Anglais: Moreover, because I have set my affection to the house of my God, I have of mine own proper good, of gold and silver, which I have given to the house of my God, over and above all that I have prepared for the holy house,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Suw kayni lo, hay tuwan ma vuli goy kay li lop ziyda vi Lawna, ora hiɗi doorota ma van kay tuwanna nan vulum goyo kay li lop ziyda vi Lawna hiɗi namu, nan kot sle mara'a lo kay liyn ma peldetna:
Bulu: Nalé fe na amu ma dañe nyeʼe e nda Zambe wom, ma ve e nda Zambe wom or a argent bi ne ébiam, ma beté bie e yôbe ya biôm bise me maneya tôkan asu vôm a ne étyi:
Guiziga: Yo ma na, ya mawuɗ hay ngi Buymisemuŋ ɗu na, ɓiri tapasl tapasl ati ɓiri bara nga ya, i vula le bac nga mi ya micikila na, ɓa ngi ndira hay ngi Buymisemuŋ nah.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ko ɓuri ɗum, goɗɗum kaŋŋeeri e cardi ndi marmi, mi hokkan ndi ngam haykaliiru Allah am, ngam mi seyorake ndu. Mi ɓesdan ɗum haa ko taaskitinmi ngam haykaliiru seniindu:
Fulfulde_DC: Ko ɓuri ɗum, goɗɗum kaŋŋeeri e cardi ndi marmi, mi hokkan ndi ngam haykaliiru Allah am, ngam mi seyorake ndu. Mi ɓesdan ɗum haa ko taaskitinmi ngam haykaliiru seniindu:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hee mi kpaa desee sɛn tɛ Tua ko Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m ga, lɔr in o bu-mbɔi nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ kɔ‘m, mi ha̧a̧ wen Tua ko Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m e zu mɔ n'am ɗafa wen sa̧a̧ tua'i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hee mi kpaa desee sɛn tɛ Tua ko Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m ga, lɔr in o bu-mbɔi nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ kɔ‘m, mi ha̧a̧ wen Tua ko Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m e zu mɔ n'am ɗafa wen sa̧a̧ tua'i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ɓiyitsa kwa nza nde kwele kwele ɗehwe ghɛa Shala ta ɗa 'ya ne, kave mze kwatera le mze kwa ghwə ghwə nyi kaŋa ɗa 'ya kadzevare nyi tsenete 'ya kezha ŋa ghɛa shɛ.
Tupurri: Wer maga ndi da tiñ mani Baa äin debañ mono, ndi haç boo biñni wo de boo solay maga sen go diñ nen mo äi ciñ ti maga ndi hay bag jag sen go se ngeel ma bay ëagn ni pa, ma boo tiñ mani Baa äi no.

Francais: trois mille talents d'or, d'or d'Ophir, et sept mille talents d'argent épuré, pour en revêtir les parois des chambres,
Anglais: Even three thousand talents of gold, of the gold of Ophir, and seven thousand talents of refined silver, to overlay the walls of the houses withal:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Talente ma ora birim ɦidi, ora ma hay Ofir, talente dooro ma yorayna birim siɗiya, kay kor tuw ziyd hiɗi namu.
Bulu: betalañ be or toyini éla, or ya Ofir a betalañ be argent toyini zamgbwa a too mfuban asu ya yañe mimfine menda.
Guiziga: I vul ɓiri tapasl tapasl pal naŋ, ton skat, ɓiri bara pal naŋ, ton skat skat cuw ti kukur mufaɗ, ɓa ngi ngirzla huroˀ ngi hay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kaŋŋeeri diga Ofir baakin kilo ujine cappanɗe joweenayi (90.000) e cardi laaɓndi baakin kilo ujine teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi e ujine sappo (210.000). Sey ɓe kuuwtinira ɗum ngam ɓasugo mahdi nder cuuɗi haykaliiru fuu,
Fulfulde_DC: Kaŋŋeeri diga Ofir baakin kilo ujine cappanɗe joweenayi (90.000) e cardi laaɓndi baakin kilo ujine teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi e ujine sappo (210.000). Sey ɓe kuuwtinira ɗum ngam ɓasugo mahdi nder cuuɗi haykaliiru fuu,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛ̀ nɛ́ kilo lɔr mɛ Ofir booro-gɔmŋmaa, in kilo sa̧a̧ bu-mbɔi booro-gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-naar wen sɔ̧a̧-a̧ ɗoŋ o ŋgeŋ tua,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛ̀ nɛ́ kilo lɔr mɛ Ofir booro-gɔmŋmaa, in kilo sa̧a̧ bu-mbɔi booro-gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-naar wen sɔ̧a̧-a̧ ɗoŋ o ŋgeŋ tua,
Kapsiki_DC: Kave mze kwa tere tere ta ka Ofir 'ya kakiləwə 100.000 ba'a kiləwəa mze kwa tɛawetɛa nya ganyɛ 240.000 kezha vɛvɛa kadzevare dewe ta ghɛa Shala.
Tupurri: Ndi haç ni diñ ton boo biñni ma Ofirn kisi, ton boo solay ma bay sir nen kiskis äog ti äe do naa ma kor äil tiñ Baa no.

Francais: l'or pour les objets d'or, l'argent pour les objets d'argent, et pour tous les travaux de la main des ouvriers. Qui veut aujourd'hui remplir spontanément sa main d'offrandes pour Yahweh?"
Anglais: The gold for things of gold, and the silver for things of silver, and for all manner of work to be made by the hands of artificers. And who then is willing to consecrate his service this day unto the  Lord ?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ora kay sle ma as kotom hiɗi ora, doorota kay sle ma as kotom hiɗi doorota, hiɗi lop ma sumun ma lum kafna. Sa ma min vul tuwam vaydi kay li lopna tam Ma-Vatɗina mi gige?
Bulu: Mfaʼa or asu jôm ja yiane or, a mfaʼa argent asu jôm ja yiane argent, a mfaʼa bisaé bise bebo bisaé ba yiane bo, za a bete wo yôp e môse ya den, te ntindan, a tiñeti Nti na a zu ve bie?
Guiziga: Na wurenna so na, ɓiri tapasl tapasl malla ɓiri bara, mawuɗ vul naŋ da Bumbulvuŋ ti mevel purla, ɓa migi slrahay, a ɗiyaka gwatay gar na, i wa asi kumo ka?
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ngam huuwugo kuuje kaŋŋeeri e cardi e ngam kuuɗe fawne ɗe waɗooɓe sanaa'a mbaɗata. Kadi moy haa mooɗon yerdake hokkugo caahu ngam Jawmiraawo jonta bee anniya ɓernde mum?”
Fulfulde_DC: ngam huuwugo kuuje kaŋŋeeri e cardi e ngam kuuɗe fawne ɗe waɗooɓe sanaa'a mbaɗata. Kadi moy haa mooɗon yerdake hokkugo caahu ngam Jawmiraawo jonta bee anniya ɓernde mum?”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: in mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ lɔr, mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ bu-mbɔi, in wen yoɓa o wi-de-tom mbɛt. Ɓɛɛ kinii mgbara'nɛ́ hɛ̧ɛ̧, nɛ́ o a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ha̧ mɔ sɔsɔɔ nɛ̀ ta-tɛ ha̧ GASA WAN o?»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: in mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ lɔr, mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ bu-mbɔi, in wen yoɓa o wi-de-tom mbɛt. Ɓɛɛ kinii mgbara'nɛ́ hɛ̧ɛ̧, nɛ́ o a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ha̧ mɔ sɔsɔɔ nɛ̀ ta-tɛ ha̧ GASA WAN o?»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma tsetsenya ne, wa wəndə nya nza ɗe ve kezha kele mze kwa tere tere keɗema mze kwa tɛawetɛa kase le ɗe ta ŋkɛ kaŋa Mahwətə kezha vɛsə wəshi mze kwa tere tere ba'a ŋa mze kwa tɛawetɛa nyi kehi ka vɛsə mze le hɛ wa?»
Tupurri: Ndi haç boo biñni ma feçeçre maga wo nen joñge de boo biñni mono, boo solay go ma feçeçre maga wo nen joñge de boo solay mono. Ndi haç ra ma joñre maga jar joñren joñn ge wo de do äaara mo äuy no. Wose yañ yoo äay wara ga se haç mopo de do be ne Manwur la?

Francais: Les chefs des familles, les princes des tribus d'Israël, les chefs de milliers et de centaines, ainsi que les intendants du roi, firent volontairement des offrandes.
Anglais: Then the chief of the fathers and princes of the tribes of Israel, and the captains of thousands and of hundreds, with the rulers of the king's work, offered willingly,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa ŋulona vi jafna vi Israyel, sa ŋulona vi vok ma birimna hiɗi vok ma kisna, hiɗi sa ŋulona vi lopna vi mulla kaw vul tuwsiya,
Bulu: Ane bivete menda me bôt, bivete meyoñ ya Israél, bivete betoyini a mintet, toʼo bivet bia tindi bisaé bi njô bôt be nga ve teke ntindan.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, buy ngi wuzla muyoy, buy ngi sukwi Israyeley, buyoy muwam soje durmuk durmuk ati skat skatay waɗ buyɓi ngi gwat ngi buyoy, a vulam gwatay ti mevel purla,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Baaba-ci'e'en e ardiiɓe le'i e ardiiɓe dow honooɓe ujineere e ardiiɓe dow honooɓe teemerre e mawɓe dow kuuɗe laamiiɗo, ɓe fuu ɓe ngerdi hokkugo caahuuji.
Fulfulde_DC: Baaba-ci'e'en e ardiiɓe le'i e ardiiɓe dow honooɓe ujineere e ardiiɓe dow honooɓe teemerre e mawɓe dow kuuɗe laamiiɗo, ɓe fuu ɓe ngerdi hokkugo caahuuji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ o gasawi nutua, o gasawi ko o zuduk be  Israɛl , o wi-duk-zu o wi-biro booro in gɔmŋmaa, in o wi-duk-zu mɔ ko wannu ha̧ mɔ nɛ̀ ta-tɛ
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ o gasawi nutua, o gasawi ko o zuduk be  Israɛl , o wi-duk-zu o wi-biro booro in gɔmŋmaa, in o wi-duk-zu mɔ ko wannu ha̧ mɔ nɛ̀ ta-tɛ
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, ntake ka meghe nyi mbe yita, le ka meghe nyi mbe hwelefe ta ka Israyɛl, le ka meghea ka sewajɛ nyi te ghəa mbeli slibə le nyi te ghəa mbeli gwəmsə ba'a mbeli nyi te ghəa mbeli nyi mbe wəvəsə nyi kemene nda slene ke meghe kave wəshi gəmə le ɗe ta nci,
Tupurri: Wañre ma ti feelen wo, wañre ma ti äï¡ï¡ni ma Israyeln wo, wañre jar ndar ndarn wo de jar kiskisn wo de wañre ma pel joñre mani wañn raw wo haç haçge de dage, de äil äaara.

Francais: Ils donnèrent pour le travail de la maison de Dieu cinq mille talents d'or, dix mille dariques, dix mille talents d'argent, dix-huit mille talents d'airain et cent mille talents de fer.
Anglais: And gave for the service of the house of God of gold five thousand talents and ten thousand drams, and of silver ten thousand talents, and of brass eighteen thousand talents, and one hundred thousand talents of iron.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nisi vul talente* ma ora birim vasl kay lopna vi ziyda vi Lawna, darikŋa* birim doogo, talente doorota birim doogo talente ma wayna birim doogo yam glafandi, talente ma kawayna birim kis may.
Bulu: Asu bisaé ya nda Zambe be nga ve betalañ be or toyini étan, minsañ mi or toyini awôm, betalañ be argent toyini awôm, betalañ be mvot toyini awôm a muam, betalañ bʼétyé toyini ntet.
Guiziga: ngi ɗiya hay ngi Buymisemuŋ: ɓiri tapasl tapasl, ton skat ti kukur tarnaˀ, suloy ngi ɓiri tapasl tapasl, durmuk kuruˀ, ɓiri bara, fineˀ ton skat skat makir, ɓiri gaza, gwat ngi ton skat skat merkeɗ, ɓiri ho gara, fineˀ ton durmuk makir.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ndokki ngam kuugal nder haykaliiru Allah kaŋŋeeri baakin kilo ujine teemerre e cappanɗe jowi (150.000) e ceede kaŋŋeeri ujine sappo (10.000) e cardi baakin kilo ujine teemeɗɗe tati (300.000) e njamndi mboɗeeri baakin kilo ujine teemeɗɗe jowi e cappanɗe nayi (540.000) e njamndi ɓaleeri baakin kilo miliyoŋje tati (3.000.000).
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ndokki ngam kuugal nder haykaliiru Allah kaŋŋeeri baakin kilo ujine teemerre e cappanɗe jowi (150.000) e ceede kaŋŋeeri ujine sappo (10.000) e cardi baakin kilo ujine teemeɗɗe tati (300.000) e njamndi mboɗeeri baakin kilo ujine teemeɗɗe jowi e cappanɗe nayi (540.000) e njamndi ɓaleeri baakin kilo miliyoŋje tati (3.000.000).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: wen tom ko Sɔ̧. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ kilo lɔr booro-gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, kɔya lɔr booro-ɓu, kilo bu-mbɔi booro-gɔmŋmaa-taar, kilo ndɛrɛ hee booro-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk ga, bá nɛ̀ kilo boi miliɔŋ taar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: wen tom ko Sɔ̧. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ kilo lɔr booro-gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, kɔya lɔr booro-ɓu, kilo bu-mbɔi booro-gɔmŋmaa-taar, kilo ndɛrɛ hee booro-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk ga, bá nɛ̀ kilo boi miliɔŋ taar.
Kapsiki_DC: pa hɛ keleke mze kwa tere tere kakiləwə 170.000, dəɓərəa mze kwa tere tere 10.000, mze kwa ghwə ghwə kwele ma ke kiləwə 300.000, mze kwa tɛawetɛa gare kiləwə slibə gwəmsə ŋkwaŋe ba'a kiləwəa lɛ kwele ma ke miliyeŋə mahekene.
Tupurri: Saara raw haç ton boo biñni kis ti äe do renam, solay boo biñni ndar hwale, boo solay de dañ ton kiskis swa'a, boo dob nen ton kiskis hiira'a, ton boo ndar swa'a, mo äuy na ma joñre tiñ Baa no.

Francais: Ceux qui possédaient des pierres précieuses les donnèrent, pour le trésor de la maison de Yahweh, entre les mains de Jahiel, le Gersonite.
Anglais: And they with whom precious stones were found gave them to the treasure of the house of the  Lord , by the hand of Jehiel the Gershonite.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hiɗiyna (ma ŋaana) kaw nisi vulum hay ɓam Yehiyel ma Gersonna, kay lakam hay timgilla vi ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: E mo me Yéhiél mone Gersonite, be nga kalane fe mekoʼo mese me nga too asu akume ya nda Zambe.
Guiziga: Mizli misi ada ti ɗugur mupuɗaw puɗaway gar na, a vulaka taŋ da Yehiyel, mbur ngi sukwi Gersoŋ, ɓa ngi pi ng'ar zlili ngir hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Marɓe kaa'e ɗuuɗa-samanje boo, ndokki ɗe nder ndesaari haykaliiru Jawmiraawo haa juŋngo Yehiyel, goɗɗo lenyol Gersom.
Fulfulde_DC: Marɓe kaa'e ɗuuɗa-samanje boo, ndokki ɗe nder ndesaari haykaliiru Jawmiraawo haa juŋngo Yehiyel, goɗɗo lenyol Gersom.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ta nɛ̀ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya ha̧a̧ ha̧ Yehiɛl bezaŋ Gɛrsɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ta nɛ̀ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya ha̧a̧ ha̧ Yehiɛl bezaŋ Gɛrsɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbeli nyi nza pelɛ nyi nza səkəmə dzawe te va hɛ, kave nda hɛ ke Yɛhiyɛl nya mbe yita ta Gɛrshon kezha mcɛləa ghɛa Shala.
